I love this giraffe it is a life savor and one of my child's favorite things. I am so glad I bought this and will be holding on to it for any more future children.

This is the greatest thing since sliced bread. I decided to buy these when starting to night potty train our almost 3 year old. I'm also 8 months pregnant (I know, not the best timing). I felt bad getting my husband up almost every night to change sheets because I couldn't lean over and tuck in her clean sheets. These pads are awesome! They're soft, breathable, and are not crinkly or plastic. The sides are extendEd to be able to tuck them under the sides of the mattress. They totally hold liquid no problem. My daughter has h a few accidents on them and they absorb everything without anything running off the sides. More all I have to do is take of the pad, throw it in the wash and put on the new onen. No need to change all the bedding! GENIOUS!
Love this chili! Makes a great 3-way spaghetti. May be a bit watery for some, but you can always add some cooked beef to thicken it up.

This thermos food jar works just as described.  We make our own babyfood and got tired of bringing it in a glass container to a restaurant to heat up only to find that a lot of restaurants don't have microwaves! I love that it keeps my food warm for hours but even better while I am feeding my little boo the food stay warms in the canister so every bite is just as hot as the first! It's a perfect size too.  I do fill it with hot water and let it warm up before I use it but it works very well!

I love this brand of coffee! I love the breakfast blend the best but I have to admit that I have only tried a couple of their wide variety.

The purchase price is right, and with this quality - you can't go wrong.

Brooklyn Beans Breakfast Blend just gets my day off to a good start.

I would recommend this product for those that like a smooth but not overly bold taste.
Love this diaper! Feels super soft! Tried it out during afternoon nap an no leaks! I did combine the charcoal insert with a mf insert so it wouldn't bunch.
my boyfriend loves this dutch coffee. i got him some and now this is all he drinks .so a other good customer

I like green olives in my salads, this is a pitted olive so you just toss them on the salad right out of the can. It is a clean tasting Mediterranean olive, no extra spices or sauces to ruin the olive taste. Since it is hard to find them in local stores, the free shipping makes it a good buy.
Fits the Dr. Brown's collars as advertised. Don't know where the caps are going but it's good to be able to get replacements.
Cornstarch was fine. It's cornstarch. It doesn't seem to be something other than cornstarch. 3 stars, because the packaging was crud. Cornstarch everywhere. Box damaged.
If your expecting something very sweet go elsewhere. Good cake and chocolate, a little dry peanut butter. Smaller then what I expected, though.
This Tea has good flavor but it is a little bit too weak for me. I prefer a stronger tea that can have milk added to it.

Love this product! And has anyone mentioned that it contains Tumeric which is said to be a homeopathic remedy for psoriasis? What better way to drink your herbal skin remedy! Plus it's low calorie and is as good as a redbull without all the nasty chemicals. Its super tasty too! Im NOT a health food freak, Im addicted to diet cokes and I bought these to replace my daily diet coke in an effort to detox myself of all that fake sugar. These are way more expensive at whole foods so buy them here!

If you like coconut then you are in for a treat. It is not what I consider to be water as its a little thicker than 'juice'. It has lots of white cubed pulp inside..that is very tender and not like the sweet cocount you get in the supermarket.  You can drink and chew at the same time so its really a meal in a can.  Its also very healthy and so delicious a healthy substition for sodas.  Buy it!!!....but in your local supermarket as the price here is steep as well as the shipping.
This activity gym has a lot of activity for an infant.  The individual toys are easy to take on and off.  The music and lights not to loud or bright.

I have a 2 month old who thinks this thing is an absolute party-out-of-bounds. She stares, completely transfixed...then she cracks up. Then she stares some more, smiling all the while. Then she cracks up. Repeat until the 15 minute timer runs out. The music is quite good, though the sound quality is not stellar. The design of the animals themselves and the movements they make are what make this toy so good. Would recommend.

I've got no complaints against the macaroni in this product. The product is designed to produce one bowl at a time of mac and cheese and the mac part comes out perfectly. I am still iffy on the cheese. Oh, I get that it's real. However, it's white, and it mixes with the starch water in such a way that... well, it's not appealing to look at. Even after adding a little butter. It tastes alright, but I cannot get past that weird, glue-like appearance. But a liberal dose of hot sauce later, it's easier to look at and quite palatable. This product is pretty convenient if you want a single serving of mac and cheese without a lot of additives, but in future I think I'll just boil a little elbow macaroni and melt some Muenster over it.

I chose this rating because the product was good. My only complaint is that one the Miracle Noodle was cut in the middle and was leaking out water when I had open the box. Other than that I did receive it on time and the one's that were not damage did taste good. I might try it again but not sure based on the torn bag of Noodles.

One word: Scrumptious!!!    Daughter, Hubby, Myself, Parents, Siblings, all love it!  Great combo. Most mixes have candy. This one doesn't!. Sweet for kids because of the papaya and pineapple. Love it Love it Love it! Have ordered 2 times within one month. Good for school snacks too.
We've been buying this soup for years, absolutely love it.  Cheaper here than in the store.  Try it with a broken egg in it, amazing stuff.
Awesome product.  Love the built in plastic ware.  The removable plate is great too.  The entire place mat stays put so she doesn't fling her food on the floor.
Not only cute, but well put together.  I use these on my diaper cakes at L.A. BabyCakes.  Customers are thrilled with the bean bag plush puppy too!  Would definitely recommend.

I am pregnant with my first child and was so excited when I found this considering most I've seen in stores are pretty expensive and this one is very reasonably priced. It arrived on time and looks just like the pic! I tried it on and it is very comfortable the straps that go over your shoulders are cushioned pretty well. Also the fold down in front has a bib that is attached by velcro so you can change it out when it's dirty so cool! I can't wait to be able to carry my little one in this for the first time thank you so much!!

I found these to be the most economical solution to keeping our child from reaching in the toilet bowl and also works for our lazy susan where other products cost about twice what one of these costs.  It's very simple to use and I'm not convinced that the other products "specialized" for toilet seats, etc.. would be any easier to use or more effective.  Our 16 month old still hasn't figured these out and probably won't till he's at least over two.  I haven't tried it yet, but I would think that you could probably even scrape the sticky tape off of these, get more sticky tape from a hardware store, and reuse them again in other locations if you wanted.  We've been using them for 2 months so far.  If our experience changes, I'll update this.
After 2 weeks my wife and I have noticed our fingernails our stronger. We also have noticed bowel function is better, with less straining. We have been sleeping better, especially me.
I was very pleased with the fast service and the quality of the tea from Peet's

This bouncer is great.  Not only does it entertain my son with the music and lights, its a great place to sit him while I take a shower.  I can easily bring the seat into the bathroom and he will sit there the whole time, normally falling asleep.  We haven't used the "Kick" part yet since my son is only a month old, but the calming vibrations really do calm him when he is upset.  I would recommend this to anyone who needs a few free minutes to get something done!

IBD can be a pain... The chocolate chip cookie dough LARABAR is a relatively safe food for me, even during a mild flare.

The ingredient list: Cashews, dates, chocolate chips, and salt.

The cashews aren't ground completely into a nut butter. There are some small cashew pieces, which may present a problem for some. The flavor is pretty good, and the chocolate is usually strong enough to overcome mild off-flavors from medications (think metallic tasting antibiotics). The calorie density is such that a few of these allow me to keep my weight up. They're a great source of fat. (Not so much protein though.)

My daughter loves these bottles! We tried the Philips avent and they just didn't compare to these, nipple wise, flow, and when it comes to air getting in their bellies. Will def keep buying. we bought these along with the preemie nipples which are the slowest flow you can get for new babies that are breast Fed.
My daughter loves gDiapers for her baby and the color goes with everything...  Great Product and she recommends for your baby

I bought these monitors because I wanted a portable, battery-operated option for travel outside the United States where the electrical currency is different and using AC adaptors would require an additional gadget. It turns out the baby unit doesn't take batteries and can only be used with the AC adapter -- which pretty much defeats my purpose. This wasn't clear on the packaging, which marketed the adapters as accessories.

I can't believe I was paying for all those tiny packets. I pour this in my sugar bowl and use a tiny spoon.

Wonderful.

Bought this for our daughter who is potty training. I love how it folds down to nothing, but wish it was a little sturdier. It does buckle when she is on it. I think because the plastic is not very thick, which makes it super portable, but not super sturdy. Will definitely use it for my son as well. It fits discreetly in my diaper bag or glove compartment.
Was able to install this in half an hour.  Well engineered.  Easy to use.  Bought to protect my mother from falling down the stairs.  I've ordered two more.  Instructions were very clear.
Great buy and product. Same just like in the store and for a way better price! So glad I found it online.
This stroller is super.  Sturdy - easy to fold - comfortable to push.  I used it for my grandbaby and it works just perfectly.  Goes in and out of car easy as pie.

I thought this would be a great product to encourage my daughter to hold her bottle. She seems more interested in the shape and texture of the Ba Baby Bottle holder rather than using it for it's intended purpose. We haven't owned this product for very long, so there is still hope of it working for her  :)

The materials used were durable. (You can take off and re-stick if you make a mistake) The colors were right on.  We asked for a custom color and they made the changes w/o any issues.  You need at least two people when sticking on the long branches.  But otherwise, good product, good service and it looks great.
Great quality and size bag. I have a Radian XT and it fits. Only thing I do not like is no way to lock bag.
Was disappointed when they arrived. They were very small. They used to be a lot larger. I remember buying them when I was a kid. The taste is still great.

I am committed to getting unfermented soy products out of my diet.  I find that most chocolate candies use soy lecithin as an emulsifier.  After finding out that soy lecithin is pretty much the sludge that is left over after chemicals like hexane are used to extract the oil from soybeans, I decided that I want nothing to do with it.  (In the days before corn and soy crops were subsidized by the government, we got lecithin from eggs, not soy sludge.)  Enjoy Life chips are soy free and they taste great.  I use them to make my own mint truffles.
Great stickers. Easy to use, stick very well but you can move them around very easily... great colors... my son absolutely loves them.

I like this so much I went for the 2500g can next. This is great stuff, better than the local liquid milk. It's a fine powder that dissolves about instantly in warm water, and the flavor is wonderful. Recommended.

My 10 month old son is more interested in the base of this toy rather than the actual toy. It's too easy to pull out of the base also, and once he does that, the "main attraction" part of the toy is of no interst to him. Great for some babies, though, I'm sure.
This was ordered for my husband and he loves it.  I was glad as he is a little hard to please, so we will be ordering more of it.

The product is very good.

The pouring always results in a dripping mess down the side of the bottle! Otherwise YUM!
This soup is pretty good but I have to say I prefer the Black Bean variety better.
Great product. Fiance hates the taste of coconut water but loves the benefits so she can add as much or little as she likes.

I ran out of shampoo one day and ended up using my son's shampoo which is this... It's funny because I never thought I'd be using baby shampoo... and actually like it. And I'm 36 yo, btw. Lol. I don't have any "favorite" shampoo because they always give me dandruff! Can you imagine how embarrassing it is to go to work and have your co-workers see your dandruff flakes while you're on the elevator? Man, I'm so glad running out of shampoo that day led me to this. It's the only shampoo I use now. My head doesn't get itchy anymore and I can now confidently brush my hand through my hair, knowing there will be no disgusting flakes falling around. So I can honestly say some of the reviews here are true because I use it myself. It's no tears formula too so there's no problem if I get it on my eye.
Happy with arrival time, came earlier than planned. However, very very small. More of a coin purse than a handbag. Did not feel it was worth the 8 dollars for something so small

Totally easy to use, and a must-have if you're like me and don't feel comfortable with the idea of food that is shelf stable for months on end like the other packs are.  PLUS, they cost a furtune.  These are so easy to use, I just pre-make a bunch of veggie/fruit blends, freeze into cubes, and put them into the pouches when we need them.  GET THESE!

I got this to use under my daughter's high chair, but once it arrived I changed my mind.  It is very thin and I don't like the pattern as much as I thought I would.  I'm sure it would be plenty functional, I just think it's ugly.  I do use it when we do messy projects to keep the floor clean.

I agree whole-heartedly with the first reviewer and can't understand why these have all but disappeared from retail shelves. They used to be called Cheese Waffies. They have a real bite to them and admittedly a few of my friends have found them too sharp, but others come over raiding my cupboard to see if a new shipment has arrived.  A lot more gusto with drinks than chips or pretzels.

One cup of this coffee is enough for the entire day. After a day of work, dealing with clients, dealing with employees, dealing with billing, book keeping. If you know how it feels, this coffee is the right answer.

I was given this salt by a friend.
Used it all. Started looking for more, and found
it on Amazon. It's a bit more than table salt, but
I think it is worth it for the health benefits.
I still like to use salt, and this is a good salt.
It isn't harmful to the body. Doesn't raise my blood pressure.
The sheets are not deep enough for a mattress.  It barely fits the cheapy foam mattress that comes with the crib.  Bad size.
This has been a godsend. Use it all the time for cooking. Makes meals even easier to prepare on a weekly basis

I have been eating Fiber One bars for 2 years now, and I've lost 50lbs. I am a runner and I'm always thinking of ways to increase my fiber intake. Luckily Fiber One products have me covered. These bars are so easy to take with you; to the gym, work, lunch, as a snack! I buy them in bulk now and enjoy them in my lunches. The recommended amount of fiber a person should have a day is about 18-25 grams...and this one little bar can take care of 9 of those grams! How awesome is that?!  I love the chocolate ones the best, but they now have a new one call chocolate mocha! And the gas that people have talked about on these reviews goes away once your body is able to handle more fiber. I have none of those side effects now.  Enjoy!

This is a great stroller for when your little one is in a car seat for any errands/trips out and about. For when you have a more active baby/toddler, this is a much too heavy/large stroller to be your go-to. I requires two hands to fold and I have to bend all the way to the ground to pick it up once it's folded which is hard when holding a baby. It doesn't even fit in the rear area of our Jeep Cherokee. (Fits fine in the trunk of Hyundai Sonata).  My son is 6 months and we're looking to replace this stroller with a folding stroller that is more compact and lighter and easier to fold. (City Mini?)
I ordered this bag for my daughter who is expecting.  We had looked at many stores and websites.  It looked great on line but even better in person. Lots of room/pockets. She loves it!!
good bag, but too little drawback is - would be better fixed pockets bag flypaper
Finally outsmarted my dog. Very nice size and she can't escape anymore.  Only our 5th pen we have bought and this is it. Finally.

I found this individual salsa product to be the perfect size, great tasting, not too spicy, just right.  Perfect size to make my favorite spicy dip without having to measure out the salsa.  Highly recommend.
Practico en la instalacion en una silla y sirve para mantener seguro al bebe durante su alimentacion. Muy facil de limpiar.
Awesome! This is so cool! Your entire cake is decorated in one motion.Just like putting on a sticker!
I hope that with continued use of the medicine, you can feel me better health, if I will continue buying this product

Very good buy all the time.
We really like the taste and the medium Roast
I would recommend this to everyone.

Interesting bread.  I tried the french bread sour dough with the starter. It went pretty well.  The people at Gold Rush are really great to work with.  There was a problem with my order and they made it right with no hassles at all.  I would recommend these sellers to anyone.

I would buy this again in a heartbeat - perfect size. My baby used this until she was almost 2.5..then we converted it into a twin. I like this crib size better than the standard size and I've had both.
Wish this were the Roses Lime Juice that we had regularly in the U.S.  It is superior in flavor, and no fructose!!!  Works well for alcoholic drinks and as a syrup for my Soda Stream!

We tried so many things for our son's gas that I'm not totally sure what finally worked but I suspect it was these drops.  We do 5 a day, took about a week to see an effect, but his fussiness went from 3+ hours a day to maybe 30 minutes.  This was when our son was between 3 and 4 weeks.  We have a standing reorder and plan to continue.

I literally just received my Teething Necklace (delivered directly to my door via UPS), immediately got it out of the box, and my daughter loves it!  I've wanted a necklace like this for some time, and I'm thrilled to have purchased from Dimples and Grace!  The necklace is exactly what I expected, delivered so very timely, and I was even lucky enough to purchase this necklace with a promotional code!  I WILL be purchasing as gifts for family and friends, and I can't wait to see what other products D&G will offer!!
This is a great Product and for what you get its a really great price. Thanks for having what we need at the right price.

For $10,000 this is a deal you can not pass up. I realized that with research and help from my local gourmet chefs that you can not get a better taste from a jarred product then this product. Nothing comes close, and nothing will come close for another million years. I had to put up my first child for sale on Ebay in order to afford such luxuries, not often do I get an internal culinary vacation, but it was worth the trade in. I am thinking about taking out a loan just so I can afford another jar before Xmas. If you love fermented Chili, Bean Chili paste, you can never go wrong here !

The dimensions are completely inaccurate.  This basket is not 17" wide and will not fit the stands Amazon associates with it without leaving a considerable gap.  It is also made in China with exceptionally poor quality and a slight chemical odor.  Not something I would ever dream of letting my baby lay in.

My husband is a fussy coffee drinker. When I told him I had ordered 8 o\\"clock coffee. His 1st comment was that is awful coffee. I asked him to try it out. He grumbling replied he would try it.
He not only liked the coffee he said it was the best Colombian coffee he had had in a very long time and when was the next shipment coming.
So I even increased my order to monthly. Just for him.
This works in the venerable Senseo pod coffee maker.  What's more to say, the folks in my house really like this tea.
I haven't tried the flavor yet, but I can tell you these are kind of an awful orange color instead of the pretty pink depicted in the picture.
These little guys are so neat! My order came quickly and the plants are very healthy. These would be such a great gift for anybody who loves plants. Thank you!

The spelt was clean, great tasting and arrived on schedule. The only problem being our scale read about 23 1/2 pounds instead of 25 pounds that we ordered. This could be a problem with our scale but hope the company will check into this to make sure.
Delicious.  Just the perfect amount to spread on an apple for breakfast.  Portion packs make it real easy to keep track of calories.

I've bought three of these things[[ASIN:B000K1XMOU Boon Green Oval Animal Bag]] now. Two of them are 6 years old, stuffed to the gills with everything imaginable including grandkids! The love to get in there and play. Because they are so well vented it is pretty safe - unless of course they start jumping on each other. The bottom line is these empty bags are versaile, comfortable and extremely durable.
If you are a cinnamon fan, you will love these. Not too strong or hot, and the texture is very chewy. So glad I found this flavor in Mentos. Highly recommend!!!!!
Your gonna love this tea, just give it a try. You'll understand. Make sure an grab a jar of organic honey while you're at it. It makes the perfect sweetener.

My favorite chip. Has a wonderful lite sweet taste. Very unique seasonings. They have been hard to find at our local chains. I was glad to find on Amazon. Price was great, $2.00 a bag, 1/2 the price of the chains, when they have them, and a few more ounces too!;

I had to wait until cooler weather (which is relative) in the Sonoran desert. But I judged it right, tartar sauce sent promptly, and I was back to my teenage years in Cincinnati. No other tartar sauce every taste right. Don't touch my tartar sauce!

I love this sleep cap!  I wish I had it when my other two children were growing up.  My son is very curious and is so stimulated by all that is around him - especially with my other two children buzzing around him and getting in his face.  I was looking for anything to help my son get to sleep, especially since we are always on the go and sometimes he needs to sleep wherever we are at.  With this cap, I just drop the shade and he calms down, and after a very short while, he falls asleep - anywhere!  I am sure it won't work for all babies, but if it might work for yours, it is worth a shot!  Sleep if precious for little ones (and for us!)
Great coconut oil to use in cooking, baking, and even as a snack (grab a spoon and go!). Will definitely order it again!

I love dark chocolate and peanut butter, and I am grateful that someone had the genius to combine them in a healthy snack. Low sugar (read: this is not Nutella), real cocoa, and incredible taste. I have this on apples, in breakfast cereal, on Kashi bars...it's the best. I've bought it at a few shops and have yet to find a better deal than this.
my mother was very pleased. cheapest price i have found on these. i will be buying again. if you have never tried buffalo you really should try these.

I talked to lots of mommies, and read about everything I could on the Internet about slings. For me, it came down to two options and I chose the mamas milk one. I am so very glad I did. It did take 2 days or so for my son and I to get it fitting right and get the hang of getting him in. Those 2 days were honestly a little frustrating. I hear that is pretty standard with all slings. But once we found our way, this sling was perfect. So comfortable and simple in design. I honestly couldn't have made a better choice.

And just for the heck of it, I did try the Moby wrap. What a nightmare. I wouldn't wish that mess on any sleep deprived new mommy.

We absolutely love the stroller. We we're very hesitant on spending that kind of money but after using it a couple times you can see why you pay a little extra to get the quality. It is so easy to push it practically goes itself and it turns on a dime. One of the main reasons I chose the stroller over the BOB is that it's very simple to use has everything you need. (I Wasn't getting it for jogging) it's extremely easy to fold up which is one of the things you're going to be doing a lot so I felt that that was high on my priority list. The other thing is it folds up very slim especially if you take off the wheels which is great when we have the car packed up traveling. There are a few things I wish were a little different. Like some of the reviews said the seats are a bit reclined back I wish they sat up further. Also the stow away strap that keeps it closed is a bit difficult to feed through the bracket. I wish it was a bracket style like some other brands. The best way to store it in my garage is on its side in the wheels. There's no other way with out it following over.
My daughter loves this small toy. Not much to say, other than its cute, soft on one side and has little rattle balls on the other side. Would recommend for a small, casual rattle toy.

There's only so much you can do with 2 bottles sticking out of your chest but this gets you there. I personally hate bras and other tight fitting clothing but this doesn't bother me at all. It's a tad saggy (I'm petite though) but it holds great and does the job. I use it while pumping 9 oz on both sides and no spills.
Bought this switch plate for my daughters room. It adds an artistic touch.  We love how they look in her room.

I first tried one of these coffee makers in Belgium. And I was hooked. Finally some of the wonderful flavors that are available in Europe are getting here. This is one of them....I like a cup after supper with my dessert, or just a cup as dessert...

I like it.
Good price is the main reason. according to price it is good I got my price worth morning cofee.

My readers, when I have been dumped by a beau, I know I can turn to Hostess.  And the Cadillac of all Hostess snacks cakes is... you guessed it, the Ding Dong.  I have been known to eat a box in one sitting.  They may not be health food, but they are not filling at least.

I used this for both my 2nd and 3rd children.  My daughter enjoyed this until she could sit unsupported on her own. My son, however, learned how to escape the Bumbo at 4 months with an arched back and quick turn of the leg.  It was safer to just put him on the floor, since that is where he would end up anyway.      I do caution those parents who put their child in the Bumbo and place it on tables or counter tops.  This is SO dangerous, and many children have been seriously hurt by falling from an incorrectly used Bumbo.
The thing I like the best about this coffee is not only can you smell the pecan you can actually taste it. A very pleasant cup of coffee.
I have been telling my friends how good the tea is. I also like the package it came in. I plan to give my daughter one for her birthday.

When a neighbor had twins, a friend insisted these were the best gifts for babies and young kids. Her brother gave her one when her first baby was born. although very cute and music plays for very long time...which is the ultimate!!
i found that Velcro strap unsafe.. wouldn't stick.. Tiny Love Take Along Mobile, Animal Friends
I generally prefer the dark roasted beans, but these had a decent rich flavor.  I like the fair trade organic although just a little pricier.

Stumbled across these wafer cookies at EPCOT in the Italy pavilion.  Enjoyed these with a glass of Pinot Grigio while watching the fireworks show!  They are delicious..and the dark chocolate is sweet..not bitter at all like some darks can be.  The wafer is light and crispy.  It is a good size bar...so it can be shared....but I always end up eating the whole thing myself!  We saved the wrapper and when we got home I searched for them and found them on Amazon.  We are still working our way through the box...but they are meant to savor...not eaten regularly like a store bought cookie.  Enjoy!
We have these on subscription.  Nice feature from Amazon.  My wife is adicted to these.  Occasionally, she says they are  a bit "stale" (maybe due to warehousing?), but still good.

The taste is pretty good. You need to use a fair amount of the powder (4-6 scoops for a coffee mug). The candy cane pieces sink to the bottom immediately, though. Even if I repeatedly stir it up, they stay at the bottom. They do flavor the drink with peppermint but I do not think by that much. Sometimes I eat the pieces after (hey, I like candy) but sometimes I just dump the candy out. I'd probably give this more like 3.5 stars if possible.

May buy again, but will probably move on to other flavors.

I bought this as a joke for my boyfriend because he is a beer lover but it wasn't funny when he opened it and said it smelled like the bottle return at Kroger (which it absolutely did) on his birthday in front of his family. I was embarrassed and felt I had wasted my money.

Keurig makes some damn good tea. This sampler pack was perfect, in that it enabled me to pick out a couple flavors I enjoyed, then just bought those. In particular, the green tea and the English breakfast tea were (and are) quite good. I was not so much of fan of any of the others, actually. But, again, obviously that's the point of buying a sampler, and CS provides a very good range in this selection. If you're a tea drinker, I'd recommend this sampler.

Nice little candy. Good for an afternoon pick me up. Last couple of orders had some candies that were crushed or melted, which tells me that the shipment has sat in the sun for a long time. Hope the vendor will fix its delivery issues.
So far swing looks sturdy and well made.  Can't really tell if baby will like, but I will have second review once in use.

We read so many reviews before deciding on the Safety First High Def monitor; sadly it has been discontinued. I was in Target and saw the Graco Secure Coverage monitor, looked up the reviews and they were pretty good, so I got it and figured if it wasn't what I needed I would simply return it. We're very happy with the purchase. We live in a 3 br apt and the range is far enough to reach outside to our mailbox downstairs. We've had no issue with interference from our cell phones, wi-fi or neighboor's devices. At first we were concerned that the monitor wasn't loud enough to hear over the heater or air conditioner or dishwasher. It took a few nights to feel comfortable with the sound level. It has lights that indicate sound level as well as a vibration option in case you're a sound sleeper. We find that the noises that are \\"serious\\" are heard/recognized with no trouble. I would recommend this product to anyone that has my similar needs. I feel the money was well spent.
*Update-
We've had this for almost 2 years and it has given us zero trouble! We would purchase this again. I have used the battery function on the kid's end of the monitor to move it temporarily into our room for the new baby while our older one played in his room where the monitor is usually stationed. It was simple to unplug it and move it without moving the bookcase to get the adapter from the outlet.

I have a few different brands of these refillable pouches, and these are my faves!  LOVE how easy they are to fill, eat from, & wash.  Perfect!  I use them with the Infantino Fresh Squeeze funnel, & they fit perfectly.
The picture did not match my order. I selected these as they were gender neutral. I was sent the Boy's Blue Elephant bottles!

It cost way to much. 16$ for a oreo sized back of cookies. They are great cookies but thats just way to much to pay for them unless your just wealthy and can through your money away. I would pay for these again unless the price goes down. or search for a better cheaper way to get them.

We use Element Caffeinated water before out workouts, it provides a great boost!

We drive to and from New York State and Florida, what better way to keep alert!

This product has no after taste and the big benefit is your stomach does not get upset at all like when I drink coffee for the caffeine boost.
It solidified in the bottle when I had used about half of it. Tried putting bottle in hot water, to no avail.

These are so tasty, really moist and a fun texture.  Great if you are craving something sweet but not a manufactured candy bar.  The peanut butter is not overpowering, I'm more of a chocolate girl myself.

I am a mother of 3 and with a new baby I was in need of a new crib mattress cover. My mother in law recommended I order this and I am glad I did! It is great quality and super easy to put on! Will definitely recommend to my friends!
These bibs work better than any others I've tried, and my baby is quite the drooler.  They are not completely waterproof, but they do a pretty good job.
Very nice product. Licorice must be fresh, and this is as fresh as it gets. Equal to the best I have tasted at a great price.

I ordered these items for a special occasion.  I received these in time for my occasion, as a matter of fact, they arrived way in advance of when they were supposed to be here.  However, when we tasted them, they were disappointing.  They definitely needed more crab in them.  For the price, we could have gone out to eat and it would have cost about the same with better results.
was pleased with purchase and happy to find these. not so easy to find in the stores.  they arrived unbroken and fresh

I am so happy that I can order these because the store I shop at only carries 4 or more. This exact flavor is the only one My son & I like. It is so good & satisfying.Please don't change these & keep them on order.

These soft washcloths for babies are wonderful for adults, too!!! They are so comfortable against the skin, so soft and maneuverable when bathing, also great for facial cloths.I far prefer them to terrycloth cotton. Thanks!
Great for peace of mind...It goes off sometimes when nothing is wrong, but I'd rather that than something happen for real.
Delicious and good for you at the same time.Plus they are gluten free!Taste good and reasonly price so its a winner

I bought this for my son, who likes Irish breakfast tea primarily (I suspect) for its strength. We're both tea drinkers, though I have long preferred Lapsang Souchong. When this tea arrived, I drink almost as much as he did.

This flavor is warm and possibly a little bit smoky. The generous teabags are great for our 20 oz cups, and if we don't pull the teabag after stepping it gets stronger but never bitter.

It is very, very hard to go back to teas from the supermarket, no matter how elegant their brand names, after Barry's. (We tried a few expensive brand names when we temporarily ran out, and there was no comparison in the taste, not to mention the amount of tea in the bags.)

Amazon's price for multiple-box deals is astonishingly economical,considering the quality of the tea.

I recommend it and I'd give it 10 stars if I could.

A good product but lacks the restricting orifice under the screw cap to allow controlled dispensing of the rose water. It's an open top like a soda bottle making it very difficult to add a few drops of rosewater to any dish or a cup of espresso.
Compared to other olive oils in this price range, Partanna is average. I don't expect too much for under $1 per ounce but I have had better. I wont buy it again but will use it up over time.

I simply haven't come across any better sheet, swaddler, and cover up than these. I bought two when I was pregnant (for much more than listed here btw), and now my daughter is 14 months old and after many many many washes they still look new and still continue to be the cover up of choice for us.

My daughter was a summer baby, born in July, so these wraps with their light material were optimal. Plus she's very tall for her age and these are a lot bigger than your average wrap which again made them my favorite.

She didn't like to be swaddled much, always wanted to have her arms out so after about 3 months this acted as her sheet and to date this is still her sheet.

I'd recommend these to everyone and anyone with a baby not just a swaddler but as the best coverup/sheet you can find on the market.

Pretty darn good.  Not sweet at all like adding flavored creamers.  A more mild roast coffee with unsweetened and mellow tropical and nutty flavoring. I wouldn't drink it all day, every day....but, it's pretty tasty.

A pantry must have that's pungent and flavorful without the tears...a brand carried at local stores just in larger quantity. I lucked up on this via Warehouse Deals cheap...onions already chopped and none to sprout or go to waste, what a deal at less than TEN BUCKS and eligible for free shipping. Since local dollar stores have gone out of business it's a cost effective alternative to the local supermarkets.

I loved this pump. I had my first child this past year and I wanted to breast feed but I was a little bit leery. My daughter wasn't latching on correctly and I was ready to give up breast feeding. Instead I always pumped and feed her with a bottle. So we both won. This pump was awesome and inexpensive. I took it everywhere to work, realitives houses, the car. The bag is discreet ( it almost looks like a purse). It only took me like 5 mins to pump and cleaning it was easy. I would recommend this pump to anyone.
We bought a waterproof mattress... realized this mattress pad isn't really necessary.  The mattress wipes up fine and so this pad isn't really worth it. Check your mattress first!
My daughter loved but could be more complete with the ring to be easier held by the children. The quality of the brand is unbeatable.
If you like hot apple cider, this is pretty good.  I do add a few spices to it, but like it very much.

This is a good set.  It is a very good buy for the money.  The top sheet has a fitted bottom which makes it easy to make the bed.  The quilt is very light - great for summer but probably not thick enough for winter.

I am an avid consumer of Jack Links Beef Steak Nuggets.  This batch is stale, dry and almost tasteless.  I can purchase these in even remote gas stations and they taste juicy and wonderful. I am too lazy to return them but will never buy them over the internet again.
These have a good regular muffin texture, but a really strong artificial sweetener taste. I will eat them since I made them, but I will never buy it again.
Excellent flavor!  We like bold coffee and Dark Magic is just that. It's probably the favorite selection at our house.
Not much else to add, it is very quiet and does what it is supposed to.  It doesn't leak and holds a lot of water.

this product is great! all baby seats are really the same my son is five months old he sits with support so i use this seat in the livig room too because he hates lieing down he feels like a big boy in it but always watch your baby carefully and NEVER leave them unattended common sense, it is not a reason for you not to be in the bathroom and i only say that out of love for children this product works great though and is worth every cent!!!

I had this same product for my 8 year old son when he was a toddler.  Now I have a 2 year old who can climb out of his crib and will do so at any hour of the night, so I purchased the new version.  I loved the older version of this, but this one is even better!  This tent wraps around the sides of the crib and attaches to the top of the crib rails.  There is plenty of room for my son to stand up inside.  They have made an improvement to the zipper so that toddlers can't unzip it from the inside.  There is a piece of material sewn inside covering the last 2 or so inches of the zipper so they can't work their little fingers in there and unzip the tent.  This is a must for any parent with a night wanderer.  Now I know that when I put my son to bed at night he is safe and comfortable and will still be there in the morning!
Good stuff but, the taste is a kinda brown sugar/molasses so don't end up using it all the time. Seems like a nice healthy alternative to have around.
It's amazing how these could lure her to go into the bath during her bath times. And these goes with her too whenever she goes for a swim.
A friend bought me this for the holiday and it was so delicious! I jumped on Amazon to find more - this is a great bulk price and it arrived timely as well.

Let's just get right to it. The monitor itself worked okay, but I am not in love especially for the price. The cons are too important to overlook (unless you want to wake up to a screaming baby because your battery died without warning).

Pros:
Good video quality (clear, colorful and works great at night)
Low interference (we didn't actually have any even with home WiFi)
The talk back option was good
It's nice to move the view/camera

Cons:
NO WARNING if you leave the zone
NO WARNING if the battery is low (This is the BIGGEST drawback)
No room temperature

You would think that if a company can figure out all these pros they could add some warnings.

My son is autistic and loves to do puzzles.  He has a hard time paying attention to the shapes.  This puzzle is just the right complexity level for him to do all by himm self.  I would highly reccommend this product
The tea is good and the price is quite reasonable, but the box was torn. The box is so soft and flimzy, it's a shame.
This item was a gift and the recipient was thrilled with them. I had them sent directly to the giftee, so I have not seen them myself.

I did not like this at all, and neither did anyone else in the household. The mint tastes very artificial. The coffee is weak and watery. The flavor reminded me of those sugar free hard candies, bitter and artificial. Just not good. I had to dump the one cup I made, I tried to force myself to finish, but couldn't.

I have this jacket and i wear it as a winter coat. It is very durable I had it for 2 years. and over time half of the jacket was saft and the other half was matted down i do not know why but besides that i love it!!!!!

The syrup was very good, and the bottle is very attractive.  The bottle would be the only reason to me to buy this, as the same syrup is cheaper in the jugs then these bottles, but for attractiveness and taste I have no complaints!  Two bottles are already gone!
I use this all the time.  Wish it was slightly bigger, but otherwise, it's great for the gym, pool, etc.

I absolutely love this teething necklace. I have three kids, and I sooooo wish I had these back then. Kids always want to chew on your necklaces. I am just thrilled that The color of this necklace is so pretty in person. It's a fun and vibrant color. This necklace is made from silicone. It is BPA free. Silicone is so soft and resilient. It has a safety clasp on it. It will screw on. You won't have to worry about your little one grabbing this off of you. Their little fingers can easily grasp onto this necklace, and it's safe for them to chew on. The silicone beads really feel great on their gums too. Now you can still wear jewelry while being a mom. The best part is that they can't drop or throw their teething ring, because it's around your neck. I hated being out and about, and they would throw their toy on the ground. I really wish I had one of these back then. It would have saved a lot of tears with my kids because I couldn't give them their dirty toy back. I feel really comfortable in recommending this product. The bangle is just an added plus! I love these both so much! I received this item in exchange for an unbiased and honest review. All opinions are my own.

I received a 6 pack of these apples from amazon.com because I absolutely LOVE this brand because of the taste and lack of sulfuric additives.  However, the quality of apples I received is substandard compared to what I've experienced by buying them in the normal grocery store.      These apples \\"look\\" as if they have a coating of dust/grey around them.  At first I thought they were coated in a light sugary substance.  I had to double check the front to make sure it said unsulfured.  Then there was the taste--they didn't even TASTE good!      Don't waste your time buying these from AMZ.  It seems to me that they're selling the bad batches that go through Quality Control and are deemed insufficient for normal store shelves.  BLYEACHK!!!!      I've opened three of the 6 packs and they're all the same.  I double checked the expiration date and they all show Oct. 23, 2009.  I also am wondering if they use different apples depending on the season because these taste NOTHING like the ones I bought back in early November (the reviewed ones I'm discussing were purchased in Jan. 2009).

I used this brand of coconut oil before for my hair and skin. I decided I would purchase this item because you get the double the amount you would get in a health food store or vitamin shop. The shipping was pretty fast and it was just like it was described.

Words are inadequate to describe the most pleasing texture, flavor and post consumption satisfation for this fruitcake. Expensive but incomparably worth it.

Love this water, taste so clean
And super hydrating. I also use it for my coffee. Makes such a difference

Healthy and light, I keep a couple of these in my purse all the time to calm my babies when they have rumbling tummies or are simply bored out of their minds in the supermarket cart. They keep them entertained, I can give them to my 8 month old since they dissolve quickly in the mouth or my toddler.
-Other cooked such as the Gerber Bananas make more of a mess, these are light and dissolve in the mouth so fast they don't have time to make "cookie goo" all over their little hands and face
-Doesn't leave them feeling "full" so don't worry about ruining dinner
-They come in individual packets of two so drop a couple in your purse and keep them ready for emergencies

I have bought these since my first baby started learning to eat solids almost 2 and a half years ago and haven't stopped since. My babies speech therapist asked me to use them for oral motor purposes and they simply turned into the funnest and healthiest snack I can give my kids.
These were a perfect size for a snack -- for the third graders & adults -- I would definitely purchase them again.

This chair is AWFUL! At first it seems great- when your little one is just learning to sit on their own- but then you realize the chair will NOT sit in an upright position. As some of the other reviewers have said, I too thought maybe it was put together wrong, but it's a design flaw. The toy that comes with it is not anything special either. Awesome addition to your collection of baby things, much faster and easier to warm up a cold bottle then the old hold it under the water trick. The nicest feature is the water reservoir that only has to be filled every couple days.

Happy dad

I can't eat gluten, so once I discovered these crackers they became my \\"bread.\\"  I agree with the other reviewers who say it's hard to stop once you start eating them.  Great with melted cheese and a small slice of tomatoe as a mini-\\"pizza\\" when you can't eat wheat.  mmmmmmmmmmmmm.
This was the best, freshest fried garlic I've tried.  The  Shipment was prompt and the  price was reasonable.  I would recommend to anyone who is into Asian-style condiments.

I like the thought of flavored coffee but to me, I really can't taste the mocha flavor. So rather then buy flavored coffee I have just been buying regular coffee and adding flavored creamer to it. Perfect, small, not to noise toy for a baby that likes music.

I like the fact that you can control the volume.
too many broken, crumpling pieces for this overpriced item.! Not worth the money nor effort to secure. Will not reorder again.

Oh my god. These are awesome. The capers themselves are huge - much larger than the ones I've gotten from other store brands. And the taste is amazing.
Threat for the stroller/car seat. Also used on a plane from atlanta to west coast- no noise and lots of giggles.

I bought this item before I had my daughter. I used it for exactly 8-10 days, pumping about 4 times a day for about 10 minutes each time. Around the 8th day my husband noticed the motor sounded strained and i wasn't getting as much as milk as i normally did ( 4 ounces each at the morning and evening sessions)   well on the 10th day, the suction power was almost non-existent. The most I pumped was one ounce. Then the suction button started to go over ( doesn't stop at the dial stop )I went out and got the manual pump instead and got 3 oz in 10 minutes  Luckily it looks like amazon is going to let me return it as it's still within the 30 day window. If they decide to just let me have a new one instead of refunding my money, i suppose i'll just have to sell it on craigslist.
GREATTTTTTTTTTTT . But packed full of calories . big box  really a treat  and well worth the money .....good deal ...

I thought I'd give the Rainforest Blend a try because, I could not get the Breakfast Blend (which is great also) @ the same low price at the time.  I am very satisfied with this purchase.  I still would  prefer the Breakfast Blend though, I would give it 5 1/2 stars!

I got this to go with the set and it's perfect for my baby girl's room.
The colors are exactly as shown.
It comes with the light bulb.
This picture shows only the night light cover which is for the most part, flat, and clips onto the plug-in socket assembly.
The light is manually turned on and off by a small, neutral white switch (which their picture does not show) that shows down below the bottom of the night light cover.
The butterfly is completely opaque, but the light shines through the flower and around from behind, giving a very pretty effect.

This is a HUGE tub of Coconut Oil (with beta carotine color). Perfect for popcorn. This should last...oh...forever. Only problem is, the expiration date is this November. I bought a small jar of coconut oil at the grocery store that has a two-year shelf life. This one? eight months.

Also, when it showed up to my door, the plastic jar was dented and the lid was cracked. Wouldn't seal on the jar. Having to cover lid with plastic and rubberband to keep the air out. Kind of a pain. But that's not the producer's fault, it's the sketchy shipping issue...

My son started using this bag before he passed 5 months old, and it fited well. He is just the average size. The bag doesn't restrain his movements at all during the night, and his hands are always warm.

I think its a solid gate and dose work well, but you should pay attention to the width of your doorway or stairway. The spindle rods that hold the gate in place for me are turned almost all the way out for a 40 inch opening and just seems like it may bend or warp out of place for a older toddler that may try to push or climb over it even with the wall cups in place. Also Regalo did not pay much attention to the bottom spindle rods will not work with anyone who has 3/4 round on their trim. You must use a riser or remove the 3/4 round in order to get the gate in place. I had to put a 1x2 wood board under mine to get the gate above the 3/4 round or you would have to remove it.

Love these bibs!  Made very well,easy to put on, light weight, and easy to wash.  The only suggestion is I wished there were more prints & you could customize a five pack with the colors/designs of your choosing.
While this is still a good product, the current price of $20 a barrel is way over the top.
Product broke after 1 day of gentle use. Would not recommend. Size not good for all products. Seems to be poor idea.
Not good..cheap but most of the bags will leak when filled so better to invest on a more expensive version.

I bought it for my child's lunch waste reduction program since normally I packed his utensil in a sandwich bag. Nuts, salt, and chocolate..what's not to love.  I remember when Enchanted Chocolates first came out with this product.  I would have a few, and then a few more, and then a few more.  I have tried other chocolate producers products, they don't get it right like Enchanted Chocolates does. I brought a 25lb of those into my office, with in a week they were gone.  If you want to be a super hero for your family, co-workers or friends, you cant go wrong buying this chocolate.

Ma yearned for pure sugar can syrup as she remembered from her distant South Carolina Low Country childhood. She loves this stuff! You can't see the waffle for it! It is very cleanly sweet, no bitterness or off flavor at all, no crystals. We pour this up into a syrup decanter. The only concern is the packaging is not the most protective. Mine arrived in good shape, though. I saw a similar product from England, but why not buy American? The quality is there and the flavor is marvelous.
AMAZING.  I don't know why more people haven't reviewed - but they will absolutely keep socks on your little ones.
I love Quaker oatmeal. My husband also likes the peach oatmeal. The single serving size is easy to take to the office for breakfeast. Can't be without it.
Hard to decide which is worse...the consistency or the flavor. It does mix well with other juices to help mask the flavor.

This is probably the most stylish drying rack I've ever seen . . .for baby stuff or regular dishes.  I hemmed and hawed about which rack to get for bottles and breast pump supplies and finally decided this one was worth the investment.  It's not all that much more expensive than other racks, and since I plan to breast feed and pump, I need something that works for both bottles and breast pump supplies.  Bottle racks seem to be only for bottles, and specific ones at that, so I figured I'd try this.  I also bought the twig and flower accessories to hold little items.  So far I've only washed everything in the dishwasher and then put it on the rack to dry and it has worked well so far.  This is cute, seems to hold bottles and breast pump supplies just fine, and wasn't all that expensive (the accessories are $5 in the store and the grass is $15 in the store, so comparable to Amazon . . .but if you have a Buy Buy Baby store and coupons for it you'll pay less overall) in total.  I like the look and the function.  Works great for me.

I used this for a cobbler recipe that called for a cake mix. It worked out very well and a number of family members liked it better than the version made with a regular mix. It is not cheap compared to conventional products but is reasonable compared to other gluten free mixes. The flavor seemed more like a white cake mix but was still wonderful. We will buy more to use according to the package directions but it is nice to have for recipes that call for a mix too.
Highly recommended to parents who want to transform their pram into a total travel system. It was very easy to fit and use.

Bought this pump mostly for it's battery-function and low cost for a "hospital grade" rating. Has proven itself to be excellent at both! I cannot recommend this pump enough! Features that I was surprised to find so helpful:
- night light and buttons with tactile feedback especially for those 3am pumps in the dark. I can just feel for the light and power button instead of groping around in the dark.
- time on the screen in case you forget to start your own timer
- how quiet it is-- especially compared to Medela FreeStyle battery pump. It's hard to be incognito when there's a very loud sound next to you.
- also "feels" less mechanical in case you mentally hate pumps

MEDELA vs. SPECTRA
I rented the Medela Symphony ($85/month) and insurance bought the Medela FreeStyle which I used since the beginning. I will also be using the Symphony which is provided at work.

The Symphony was great and had a strong suction. I was using 3 and 4-drop strength suction. However, I was able to get MORE milk using the Spectra L3 suction. The suction itself feels different -- more of a "wave massage" which has actually been much gentler on my nipples. I've also been able to shave off a few minutes which is always a bonus when pumping.

The FreeStyle pumped absolutely NO milk even after 15 minutes. I tried it repeatedly and would sometimes ink out a few drops as the suction just wasn't strong enough. The Spectra runs on battery and is lightweight so you can tote it around. However, it's not small enough to tuck into your waistband (like the FreeStyle). But then again it works fast so there's really not need to be walking around with it anywhere.

FEATURES
The Spectra S1 is phenomenal. Adjustable and programmable suction speed and strength which helped pumped even more milk than the Symphony. Super quiet and even comes with a handy night-light for those 3am pumps. Design is cute and friendly instead of a big ugly industrial pump. Lightweight and comes with a built-in handle.

TIPS
- I also used the Medela parts that I already had at home. Just snipped one end off the piping parts to plug into the Spectra and they fit perfectly. Since this machine is only used by me, I wasn't worried about milk backing into the system (and therefore having to use the fancier parts). Saved tons of money and time from having to buy all new attachments.
- So great for travel since it can fit into a duffle bag pretty easilyof a big ugly industrial pump. Lightweight and comes with a built-in handle.

The problem with this gate is it just not sturdy.  The extensions are too big so it does not give you many options for different sizes.  I had to leave one out and now I have the bolts sticking out about 4-5 inches.  Since it works on tension this is not ideal.  We have a different brand for another room and that one is solid and sturdy and makes this gate feel cheap.
Its a bit pricey but its worth the extar cost.Its much better than Starbucks. I recommend any coffee lover give it a try.
Loved this for my two year old. He started using it quickly just to listen to it sing. Perfect product.

The only reason this doesn't have more stars is the size. I wish it held 6 oz, other than that it is great and my daughter loves it. Nice soft spout. She was having issues taking a bottle and by using this we were able to reverse train her to take a bottle. Now she happily uses this and the bottle.
The monitor has great range and the picture is very clear both at night and during the day. We especially like being able to talk to our kids through the monitor.
Easy for my 6 month olds to hold. Easy for mommy to clean. Great for teething. My twins hate eating from a spoon, however are very receptive to this, where they can feed themselves.

I looked at a LOT of monitors and talked to many moms and what they use. This was the best one, I was worried because some people in other reviews talked about false alarms, but I have not had an issue at all, if you read ALL the instructions it comes with it is VERY helpful! The only \\"false alarm\\" I get is when I pick up my baby and forget to turn off the sensor (via the receiver) which has nothing to do with the product but my forgetfulness! (My husband was not happy when this happened at 3am, he cam rushing in the baby's room and just stared blankly at me, and then went back to bed.)

I am OCD and a nurse who knows too much about what can go wrong, I am constantly worried about is my baby breathing? and is he ok? The sensor feature is what I wanted the most, the sound system is also a plus, it only turns on when the baby makes noise which is nice. It's pricy when compared to other monitors but I could not find one that compares to it =) I sleep great and have peace of mind.

Side note: The sensor pad needs to be under the mattress on plywood (or something similar), and you do have to set up the monitor before you plan to use it. Also to get the right angle of the camera which can be tricky. Some say this is a con of the product because of the wires and what not, but it does its job and a few extra minutes to move a mattress is not a problem in my book.
loved the convenience of the shipping and quality of the product due to the economy and reduced income we have had to cut back on certain items and this was a victim.
I use these for my bathroom and my livingroom for storage. It's a great way to add some color. the quality is good. very sturdy.
these are great for lunch or a quick snack. Just the right size so you don't over snack everyone should look into these
I love strong coffee and these K-cups were a good selection.  This is a great way to find the ones you want to buy in bulk.

My husband and I were very excited when we received this car seat as a gift for our first baby. In fact, we were so  excited ( because it just came out at the time and my husband did all the research on designs) that we returned our Maxi Cosi light weight car seat the same day. I wish we would have kept the Cosi...see below Now that we have been using this car seat for 17 months, I think I can give it an accurate review that will be helpful for other unknowing first time parents.  First this car seat is heavy. My daughter was 6lbs and it was difficult for me to take the car seat in/out recovering from birth in the first couple of weeks. As she gained weight it got progressively more difficult to take the car seat out and lift it enough to perfectly align with the UPPAbaby  Vista adapters. If you don't click them in just the right way you may walk around with the car seat half attached. Once my daughter was about  16lbs I was no longer able to lift her without help.... and if you are carrying anything else along with car seat ( i.e. groceries, diaper bag...) forget it.  Second, the buckles and soft pads on the shoulder straps are not comfortable and the material is really harsh on baby skin - especially in the summer as in our case. My daughter would frequently have strap marks on her neck and thighs from being in it.  The actually buckle is even harder to unlatch. If you have an arthritic grandparent, they wont be able to squeeze the red button hard enough to unlatch it. The buckle was hard for me to unlatch and I often found my self with a screaming baby wanting to cut the straps open to free her. While we are on the straps- my daughter is now 17 months and 31.6" long... the straps are too tight and if you add a winter jacket its downright choking to her.  Yes, there are studies saying that you should take the child out of the snow suit before putting them in the car seat, but I would like to know how many parents voluntarily undress their squirming toddler ina freezing car every single time they go for a drive to the grocery store, after spending 45 minutes dressing them....Anyone? Didn't think so...  The weight max does say its 35lbs but doesn't really specify length of child... the way my daughter is positioned now, her feet are almost touching the backseat she's 31.6"  tall and 21lbs,  so now we need to get a new car seat.  So in conclusion, its a great design with hook up/latch system... but the actual car seat is garbage. The material is rough and a pain to clean..... the straps are not comfortable, the buckle is impossible to unhook.... and potentially unsafe, if you need to take an infant out of a burning car... this might be the reason you are not able to in time.  Hoping that this review will not only help parents, but maybe the UPPAbaby team will have a read...

Golden Mountain Sauce contains high levels of known carcinogens. It has been recently banned in Europe.

\\"Explaining the delay in publishing the findings, the FSA said it had to run a detailed analysis, contact importers and trace the history of consignments. The chemical 3-MCPD is considered so dangerous that the EU will not allow any more than the tiniest amount in food - just 0.02 mg per kg.

Yet one of the products, sold under the brand name Golden Mountain, contained close to 5,000 times that figure. Just two teaspoons would be equivalent to 20 times the acceptable daily intake recommended for a woman.\\"

I got a box full of mayonnaise packets, and there likely are about 200 in there (I'm not going to count them) but they are NOT the Heinz mayonnaise packets pictured. They are a generic 'Mayonnaise' packet (blue lettering on white background) - the same kind I used to have in my office's break room in the early 1990s. I don't doubt they'll taste fine as far as mayonnaise goes, but it's not what is advertised.

Another issue is that there are no expiration dates, either on the box or the packets themselves. This would be helpful information to have as we are storing these for use with canned chicken and tuna for emergency food storage. There is only a production date, so I will have to use my own judgement on how long mayo is likely good after being produced!

I read the reviews about how the songs were too short, I don't think so.  This isn't designed to use as a lullabye toy, it's just for music exposure.  I think the classical musical pieces are just the right length for a baby toy--enough to catch their interest and give a feel for the piece, not enough to use as a going to sleep aid or to drive you crazy when the baby puts the toy down.  Two volume settings and an off setting (so it's not going off randomly when it hits something in the diaper bag).  My 11 month old has no trouble holding it or pushing the buttons, he's able to play with the toy by himself.  The beads don't move much--if you look you can see there isn't much extra space on the handle.  The whole thing is plastic and seems pretty sturdy.  A nice preloaded mini-song classical music player.

This is the original BBQ sauce we grew up on. Was looking to buy a barbeque sauce for the summer and noted the ingredients. Check out the first ingredient:

High Fructose Corn Syrup, Water, Distilled Vinegar, Tomato Puree [Water, Tomato Paste], Salt, Food Starch-Modified. Contains 2% or less of: Soybean Oil, Sauce Blend (Water, Hydrolyzed Corn and Soy Protein, Salt), Spice, Onion Powder, Dehydrated Garlic, Natural and Artificial Flavor, Caramel Color, Colored with (Yellow 6, Red 40, Titanium Dioxide, Blue 1).

Nutritionists recommend that you stay away from high fructose corn syrup. So will be looking for something healthier. It would be great if Open Pit would come out with a healthier version of their BBQ sauce which didn't involve high fructose corn syrup as a primary ingredient. Like the flavor of their sauce and would buy a healthier version of it.

We were told to have white noise when our baby first arrived to help him sleep.  Most sleep machines only lasted for 45 min before they turned off, but we wanted one that would last all night long. One of the worst spill proof sippy cups we've tried. Fill the cup up, and squeeze a little too hard screwing the top on and it spills out. Your kid knocks it over on the floor and it spills out. Also if the cup drops on the floor the vent pushes out, then the drink pours out. I've even seen the drink push up out the straw just sitting on the table.

My kids love shaking the cups too, sending milk flying everywhere. Another great trick is they bite down on the soft straw and chew off the end, hence the choking hazard.

Save yourself some time and just dump half the drink on the floor, chair, table, etc.

This is a great travel system.  First, the price on Amazon beat all others by FAR.  Also, the black/white/red is very classic and gender neutral.  It just looks really nice!  Installation was not hard at all.  It took me about 20 minutes....I READ everything to make sure I'm doing it right.  The stroller folds down very easily.  However, the product description on Amazon says 'self standing fold..no bending'.  That is not necessarily true.  You do not need to bend to fold it....you flip the handle and gravity does the rest.  BUT, it does not stand when folded...it lays on the floor.  So you do have to bend to unfold it or move it.  There are some strollers that stand when folded so you never have to bend.  But those were heavier.  This stroller is relatively light - for a full size.  The car seat is small and lightweight as well.  We wanted a lightweight car seat for when we're taking the whole seat wtih the baby out of the car.  This seat only holds up to 22 lb babies.  So you will have to buy another seat sooner than the ones that hold 35 lbs.  But the car seat weight being lighter was worth it.  You'll have to buy another car seat anyway, so why not be better to your back and arms during those first few months!

I spent hours researching double strollers and finally narrowed it down to two- the baby jogger city mini double and the Joovy. I ended up going with the Joovy bc of the price and the accessories. The baby jogger is twice the price and comes with NOTHING. No cup holders, no belly bar, no pockets, nothing. The Joovy has two parent cup holders and pockets and also pockets for the kids to put their junk in. The storage basket is HUGE and can fit pretty much anything!
Most importantly, this stroller rides great. It's smooth, lightweight, and easy to push and turn. My 2 year old and 4 month old both fit comfortably in their seats and really enjoy our walks.
The only reason I give this 4 stars instead of 5 is because when you collapse it, it SLAMS to the ground scratching the belly bar like crazy. I suppose you could slow down and fold it with two hands to prevent that, but it would be tricky. Joovy needs to create a more controlled collapse so the belly bar doesn't get trashed.
Overall, I loooove this stroller and I'm so happy we went with this instead of the pricy baby jogger.

We have had great success with the Summer Swaddleme wraps but I wanted a bit more of a swaddle sack as those are pretty narrow in the legs. I also loved the idea of the snaps, since the Velcro sometimes wakes my baby.

Pros: love the material, as I knew I would. (I have the regular Muslin blankets from A&A.) Of course it's super soft and cute and plenty of leg room, in width.. Although my 8 week old, stretched out, was about at the end of the bag for leg room.

Cons: the button snaps. I love the idea of no noisy Velcro but this took quite a while to get everything snapped. There's snaps as the shoulders and then the swaddle snaps. I found them a little difficult to push together. Also, you have to wrap the swaddle under the baby to secure it.. I usually swaddle with my baby asleep, so it was more difficult to not wake her. As mentioned before, the size may run a little small.. My baby is 8 weeks, 10# and I was on the most loose setting of the wrap.

Overall cute and probably good for smaller babies who are heavy sleepers and enjoy some leg freedom. We won't be using this as our main swaddle.

I love this gate.  I have a Shih Tzu and a Chihuahua, and this gate is sturdy and secure. The only thing I am not crazy about is the fact that the gate only opens in one direction.  It would be more convenient if it opened in either direction, but I still love the gate.

Try Cook's Illustrated Best Chocolate Cake,...bet you can't stop eating it. It's super quick and easy to throw together. No sickening sweet sugary frosting and just perfect. I use this Frontier cocoa, of course.

BEST EASY CHOCOLATE CAKE:

Makes one 8-inch-square cake. Published March 1, 2009. From Cook's Illustrated.

We recommend using one of the test kitchen's favorite baking chocolates, Callebaut Intense Dark L-60-40NV, or Ghirardelli Bittersweet Chocolate Baking Bar for this recipe, but any high-quality dark, bittersweet, or semisweet chocolate will work. Instead of confectioners' sugar, the cake can also be served with sweetened whipped cream.

INGREDIENTS
1 1/2 cups unbleached all-purpose flour (7 1/2 ounces)
1 cup sugar (7 ounces)
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
1/4 teaspoon table salt
1/2 cup Dutch-processed cocoa powder (2 ounces)
2 ounces bittersweet chocolate , chopped fine (see note)
1 cup fresh black coffee, hot
2/3 cup mayonnaise
1 large egg
2 teaspoons vanilla extract
Confectioners' sugar (for serving; optional)
INSTRUCTIONS
1. Adjust oven rack to middle position and heat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray 8-inch-square baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.

2. Whisk flour, sugar, baking soda, and salt together in large bowl. In separate bowl, combine cocoa and chocolate; pour hot coffee over cocoa mixture and whisk until smooth; let cool slightly. Whisk in mayonnaise, egg, and vanilla. Stir mayonnaise mixture into flour mixture until combined.

3. Scrape batter into prepared pan and smooth top. Bake until wooden skewer inserted into center of cake comes out with few crumbs attached, 30 to 35 minutes.

4. Let cake cool in pan on wire rack, 1 to 2 hours. Dust with confectioners' sugar, cut into squares, and serve straight from the pan; or turn cake out onto serving platter and dust with confectioners' sugar.n pan on wire rack, 1 to 2 hours. Dust with confectioners' sugar, cut into squares, and serve straight from the pan; or turn cake out onto serving platter and dust with confectioners' sugar.

I purchased this bag because I needed a diaper bag that will fit not only my newborn's essentials, but also snacks and toys for my older boys. I needed something that can take a beating as this will be the bag I take to baseball and soccer practices and games, as well as swimming lessons. I didn't want to spend a lot of money, because I know it's going to take a beating and I don't want to stress out about something happening to it. So far this is perfect. It is surprisingly durable and it's large enough to hold everything I need and it is SO cute. Yes it didn't come with a diaper pad, but for this price, that doesn't bother me at all. There's plenty of room to put a changing station in the large zipped pocket in the back as well as plenty of diapers, which leaves the entire inside for all the extras. The front zippers hold the keys and wallet without a problem. So far I'm very pleased. I'll let you know how it holds up after a few seasons and a summer of beach and swimming lessons. If it can survive what I have coming for it, it will be a miracle!

Dear Sir:
As a person with Celiac Disease I am most upset to learn that your Good Seasons dry mixes (Italian, Zesty Italian, Garlic Herb) now have wheat added to the ingredient list. I beg you to change it back so I (and thousands like me!) can continue to enjoy this fine product line. It truly was perfect the way it was and for the life of me, I can't understand why you would change it to include wheat. -An allergen that is clearly on the rise -with more and more people trying to stay away from it!
I confess that I found out the hard way that wheat was added to my favorite Good Season's Italian dressing. I was so sick and I couldn't figure out what I had ingested differently. Thank goodness I received an email alert from the celiac organization warning us of the change to Kraft's Good Seasons line.
Please, please change this product line back to its original formula and remove the wheat so those of us with wheat allergies can continue to buy and experience this lines special taste.
Sincerely,
Donna Wittkopp

I initially thought the carrier would be useful only for errands and travel. Completely the opposite: in fact, I exclusively use it around the house at this point. While this is more portable than a stroller, the reality is that a stroller is easier. Put the baby in the car seat, clip it into the car, and then clip it into the stroller. Baby falls asleep in the car and stays buckled in and asleep the entire time, from car to stroller back to car. Pulling your baby out of the car seat to go into the Bjorn is basically inviting him/her to wake up and make a fuss. Additionally, although less bulky, you now have to carry your baby everywhere instead of simply pushing a stroller.

So why is this a necessity? Want to do some chores aorund the house, like making a sandwich or pushing a Swiffer? Good luck doing that with your baby in one arm while you try to wrestle everything with the free arm. A swing or bouncy chair might buy you 20 minutes, but might also mean a screaming baby that wants to be held when all you want is 2 free hands do do something.

Enter the Bjorn. It allows you to do most chores around the house, baby in tow, with your hands relatively unencumbered. Not only does it keep a content baby content (which a swing often fails to do) it will actually calm a screaming baby. As we hit the \\"witching hour\\" of approaching bed time, and the associated crying meltdown, we throw our baby in the Bjorn. We put on music and gently dance along or walk around the house. The walking rhythm creates a gentle bobbing motion for the baby, which completely eliminates crying. It's like the comfort of a bouncer seat or swing, mixed with the feeling of being held.

This is an absolute necessity to get anything done around the house and to calm a cranky baby.

To get it on easily, skip the directions. Put on the shoulder straps, clip the bottom clips, and let the carrier dangle. Hold your baby to your chest. Newborns face you, once they have head control (generally a few weeks) they will probably prefer to face out so they can see what's going on. With one hand holding the baby high on your chest, use the other hand to grab the carrier and pull it between your baby's legs. Clip the sliding clip on the same side as your free hand. Now hold the baby in place with your free hand over the carrier, pull your other hand out from behind the carrier, and clip the remaining sliding clip. The baby is now held in place. Clip the two top clips and you're done. No more hassling with trying to get a leg through the hole or weasel the baby into the carrier. I normally do this over a sofa, so if I were to slip, it would be a shorter and padded drop.head control (generally a few weeks) they will probably prefer to face out so they can see what's going on. Clip the two top clips and you're done. No more hassling with trying to get a leg through the hole or weasel the baby into the carrier. I normally do this over a sofa, so if I were to slip, it would be a shorter and padded drop.
