This Lindt chocolate and almond bar is an excellent combination of rich chocolate flavor and fresh roasted almonds. The package says that it is a dark chocolate bar, and technically it is. However, at just 46% cocoa it isn't bitter or even bittersweet, but is definitely a sweet chocolate. Someone looking for a more intense chocolate sensation will want to order one of the Lindt bars with a higher cocoa content. However, if you like a fairly sweet chocolate, and one that is smooth and really creamy, and enjoy the crunchiness that the almonds bring to the mix, then this is the bar for you. It's a high quality product.

It serves the purpose; the outlet functions well.  There are two main issues.  First, these outlets are slightly smaller than typical outlets with regards to the length and height.  In one room in my house where the walls are the original color, the contractor taped and painted around the "standard" outlets.  Upon installing these "baby safe" outlet covers, I now have an exposed unpainted border.  This isn't a major issue as it is easily remedied.  The reason for taking the time to review this item is the second issue.  Once again, not so much of an issue with the manufacturer but more so with the installation of the existing plugs.  About half of these outlets don't sit flush on my wall.  This is due to the fact that most outlets are perfectly square and level.  Standard outlets usually have a fair amount of wiggle and this allows a standards outlet cover to "mate" and sit flush.  The way that these outlets "mate" to the existing plugs doesn't always allow for nice, flush fit.  I believe this fit issue would occur at almost all homes. Both of these issues could be remedied, but the second one would take a significant amount of time and effort.  I probably wouldn't pay what these cost if I knew the fit was going to be so poor, or at a minimum I would only install these outlets at high use locations...I replaced every outlet in my entire house with them.

I purchased this bassinet after many nights wondering if our 8 month old daughter would be able to sleep in a pack and play on our holiday trip where we stayed at a hotel. At her stage (crawling) she would have to basically sleep close to the floor as the pack and play has one other option which she can easily crawl out of and seriously injure herself. I didn't like the idea of my daughter sleeping so close to the floor (possible SIDS concerns and she would not sleep well) and the only other traveling option was to get a co-sleeper in bed. We checked all the possible options and came upon the Brica Fold N' Go - mesh linings, easy portability (slid into the crevice in the car under her car seat) and fits just right (and comfortably) on a king bed in the hotel between my husband and me. My daughter was 26.5 inches at her 6 month check up so I imagine she's somewhere now in the 28\\" range. The bassinet is 30\\" long. So with great trepidation as this was the only best option for my big baby, I purchased this and was quite pleased! She's a bit of a tight squeeze, but she slept so well in it and would wiggle herself around until she found the right spot for her to settle. In the bed, we can easily turn to see her and hear her breathe, so it was not as concerning as if she was in the pack and play near the floor all alone. Although we will use this just one time, we plan on keeping it for future babies or passing it along to someone who'd find great use out of it. I didn't mind paying the price for peace of mind.

I LOVE this product!!! Have been feeding this cereal to my little one since he started eating. His favorite is the buckwheat.

When I had my baby I wanted to find a healthier alternative to the commonly used "single grain rice cereal". After much research I ordered the bio-kinetics buckwheat and bio-kinetics quinoa spouted baby cereals and after a few months I added bio-kinetics spouted brown rice baby cereal. In my opinion these cereals are an excellent product; they have been enjoyed and well tolerated by my baby since we began solids 6 months ago.

I have also tried this same brands "sprouted multi-grain living flour". It's meant for baking, but I have found that it can be used as a very healthy cooked cereal as its ingredients include such grains as barley, grits and brown flax. I added water and cooked it on the stove, adding cheese to taste before serving. To me it tasted allot like cheese grits.

Just picked up a bottle of this and am enjoying my first homemade margarita from a mix. I usually take the time to squeeze limes but decided not to this time. Anyway, it is pretty sour, maybe the grapefruit they add? I added a teeny bit of stevia (I'm out of sugar) and it is now the perfect flavor. Try it! One bottle should make you 8 margaritas. FYI - I paid $1 more for the 60 oz at Bevmo.

I love this crib bedding set!! it looks a lot better in person. It has bright colors. I consider it different and kind of unique for a baby boy's nursery. I think that it makes the nursery looks delicate, elegant and sophisticated.  Everyone who sees it falls in love with it and asks me from where we bought it. My  2 months old baby loves the mobile and loves looking at the crib bumpers. I repeat, I'm in love with this crib bedding set. I would recommend it a 1000 times if necessary :D.
Its a lot of Matzos! Buy it only if you are doing a community Seder or have a very large family. But they are well packaged and will keep for a while. They come out crispy and undamaged.

Two complaints about this unit are:

1) The quality of the battery is not very good. By that, I mean that my baby is 6 1/2 months old now and the battery may last two hours in noise activated mode if we're lucky. Early on, it would last through all of her naps during the day, so its charged capacity is degrading rapidly meaning it's a low quality battery, not like what they put in their cell phones where my phone lasts nearly as long as it did brand new two years later.

Unfortunately it is also not user replaceable, so once it won't hold a charge at all, you're going to be carrying the power adapter around with it.

2) The image quality is not that great. If you're wondering if your kid is breathing, you have to stare at the thing pretty closely to try and discern movement amongst all the pixelated edges. Perhaps a higher contrast in color between kid clothing and bedding would help.

Anyway, those are the negatives. Other than that, the range is great, it has functional two way audio, you can pair it with more than one camera, the pan tilt zoom capabilities work perfectly and the motor in the base that moves it is not very noisy so you can move it without waking up your child.

I love this product! They really kept in mind the age group they made it for! There are 5 keys each key is pretty sensitive and has about an apple size arm to press in order to activate the sound. A little baby kicking it easily sets it off... After a short while of not playing on the keys the piano will play a short tune. That tune will stop if the keys are played again. I've seen a 4 month old up to a 16 month old play with this and enjoy it! I can see a kid enjoying this toy up to the age of 3.

I did quite a bit of research on portable bottle warming options before purchasing this product and settled on this. I am happy with my selection. It is easily portable and convient. Warms a bottle in about 10 minutes just as advertised. You do have to do some anticipating of when your baby will be ready for a bottle but so far I haven't found this to be a major problem. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because one of the two units I recieved has a tendency to activate even when I don't want it to. This could be a major problem if it were wrapped around a bottle and I didn't realize it had activated. I have taken to not using that unit because of this but I do plan on ordering a couple more despite this as it is a handy little item.
not what i was expecting, very hard until you soften it in your mouth and then its just super taffy like with little to no flavor except burnt sugar

It's nice and thick and keeps baby warm.  The only thing I would like different is that the top is held in place with elastic and it would be better if it fitted more snug to the top so it wouldn'tg slide down.  But would recommend this product to keep your toddler warm.

\\"Healthy and delicious? You've got to be kidding.\\" It's absolutely true. Assuming oatmeal isn't going to do you under, you shouldn't miss trying this out. Personally, I love this stuff. I have a small bowl of the Quaker Oatmeal Squares nearly every morning and add in some of the \\"Nut & Berry Mix\\" from Trader Joe's and it's a perfect breakfast. (The Trader Joe's mix has dried cranberries, raisins, blueberries and raspberries + a variety of nuts.) I'm anxious to wake up tomorrow for my next breakfast. It's that good!
Yum! I made coconut truffles that are so healthy for you and the vanilla bean powder made them taste fantastic. Healthy and yummy are the best combination!

The video quality is great in daylight and at night.  My only complaint is the sound.  It seems like the sound cuts out as though it is background noise even when it is my child.  As someone who is used to the constant "on" sound of a non-video monitor, the silence of this one is a bit unnerving still...
this went really well in my garage over my drill press.. perfect light and i feel like I'm somewhere else when i look at the light.. cool
i like to cut flowers from my garden and make an arrangement. however, my arrangements usually did not last more than 3 days. after i use this crystal clear, my arrangements last more than a week.

This is our fourth baby out of seven children, so we have used several different infant car seats over the years. When I first opened the box, I noticed how cheap the fabric of this seat is. It is very similar to the feel of chintzy outdoor furniture and is rather stiff. There is almost NO padding in this car seat compared to similar infant car seats. We will have to purchase polyester batting to go under the cover in the back or our baby will continue to be VERY uncomfortable in this seat with her little backbone up against the ultra-hard styrofoam. I don't understand how one reviewer said that this was a very cushy car seat?? Also, for a 6-pound baby, the straps cut into the sides of her neck, so we'll be needing some strap covers, which we have never had to purchase for any of our other children.
The straps were super-easy to adjust from one set of holes to the next, and also to adjust the length of, but the interval between the holes is just a little bit too long. The lowest setting is too low, even for a small newborn, and the next setting is simply too high, even for an average newborn. I can't understand why they have the lowest setting where it is, because it's too low even for our daughter's 15-inch doll! Our last infant seat had 4 settings, which was perfect. This seat leaves a lot to be desired...

The canopy is cute and does the job it is expected to do, the seat is very easy to latch and unlatch out of the base to get it in/out of our 12-passenger van. The handle is basic and easy to carry. The color is adorable and very unique compared to most infant car seats out there, but I really dislike the feel of the cover because of the cheap fabric used. Overall, I would not recommend this car seat to a friend, and I'm on the fence as to whether I should return it or not.

UPDATE: Our littlest is now 8 months old and 17 pounds and she is still using this car seat. The handle is comfortable to carry, it's not heavy at all,and it is easy to get in and out of the base. The straps are still super-easy to adjust and taking the cover off to wash it is a breeze, unlike other car seats we have had. The cover and canopy still look new after all these months of use. I added extra padding to the back but she seems uncomfortable in it now, so we are looking for a new car seat. We are still using strap covers because the straps are just too close to her little neck and would rub her skin if we didn't have the strap covers on. Her shoulders are at the top of the highest strap slot, so I wouldn't see this fitting her until she was 22 pounds. She loves to reach above her head and pull the canopy off to play with it... I think she enjoys the rustling sound it makes. This hasn't posed any hazards, as there is always someone sitting next to her, but if a mother is driving alone with her infant, I could see how this could be a scary situation. We were hoping to use this until she was ready to be rear-facing in a convertible car seat, but it's time for this one to go now. I still do not think I would recommend this car seat to a friend.
could not fine  locally, st.  louis, have used foor years  inn chocolate  recipes makes for a tender  deeper chocolate taste
Very flavorful and aromatic, will definently reorder! Using much less with this higher quality oregano too, so getting a decent number of meals out of the jar for the price.

Poorly shaped, therefore too hard to remove wrappers. Flavors not evenly distributed. I originally purchased a few of these treats at my local pharmacy - they were in perfect shape with wrappers easily removed. I was disappointed.

I bought these because I was worried about the reports of bumpers being a suffocation hazard.  I like these but don't love them.  I really don't think there is a better solution though.  My daughter is 9 months old and now that she's mobile when she's throwing a tantrum in her crib she takes her anger out on these poor things.  She's able to slide them down to look over them (apparently she thinks we're hiding on the floor or something).  They are pretty durable after all she's put them through.  One complaint I have is that I wish the ties were on the top AND the bottom.  Mine only have the ties on the top which doesn't hold them in place all that well.  They were easy to put on and the velcro is pretty strong.  She is still able to put her arms and legs through the slats above the bumper but she doesn't do it often.  She hasn't figured out how to get below the bumper yet.  Overall I would recommend these bumpers and I would buy them again.
I highly recommend this toy. It keeps my daughter and busy durng her car rides. She enjoys pulling on the bugs.
Quality of the fabric is awful and the color looks old as soon u put them in the wash machine. I like it because they are tick but that's all.

I love Larabars because they are a great Paleo snack. They aren't very filling, but if you take your time eating them, they definitely stave off hunger for at least an hour or two. These aren't cheap so when you can get them on sale they are definitely a catch. Of the flavors I've had, I'd have to say that Blueberry Muffin, Apple Pie and Key Lime Pie (if you like this flavor, they've pretty much nailed the taste) are the best of the bunch. I was not impressed with most of the chocolate flavors, but then again I am not terribly partial to chocolate.

I love pancakes and I love these! Paleo pancakes are had to find that actually taste good! I mix in blueberries along with this mix and they taste insane!! These pancakes are unbelievable good...made with 1 egg, 1/2 tbsp Ghee or olive oil or cocnut oil. Drizzle on pure maple syrup and you have a mighty tasty breakfast! Just be sure to watch them when they cook...2 min per side depending on the heat level and pan is all you need. They seem to cook pretty quick so don't leave them unattended.

This is my first time trying peppermint loose tea. I wanted to be sure I did it right so I got my kitchen scale and measured the 2g per cup. I made 3 cups in my French press. After steeping for probably 10 minutes (I forgot about it) I poured myself of cup. The peppermint taste isn't too strong, but I like the taste. There's way too many health benefits to name but the one that stuck out to me was that it has 3x more (found that on Google although the description says 9x) iron than spinach! This is great news for me since I'm anemic and hate taking iron pills. Not saying that I will stop altogether but it's good to know I can drink tea for iron and not have to eat a bunch of spinach. This tastes a whole lot better lol. I received this product free of charge for my honest review.
This a repeat purchase for me. Good, refreshing taste without the garbage chemicals. Sweetened with Splenda. Quality product and easy to take along anywhere.
I ordered these to put together gift baskets and they are sturdy and the perfect size.  The color was just like it was represented online.

We bought two of these rockers for our grandchildren who used them from about the age of 6 months. They are very comfortable for the child to sit in and help in getting the child asleep quickly with the rocking motion.  They are now using the extended legs recommended for toddlers.  The chair is sturdy, comfortable, light and easy to use with safety straps and the fabric is washable. We recently purchased another chair for the newest member just addded to the family.  We highly recommend these chairs for everyday use.
My son loves it. He uses it for nap time at daycare. Good quality and very cute. No complaints here.
My Kids love it, using it to add some extra calories to my sons diet since he is really picky.

The shape is great for my daughter, but the tiny opening is really difficult to drink out of.  I tried it myself, and you have to suck really hard to even get a drop of water.  Not my favorite sippy cup out there
I really like the coffee but found that the whole bean version was nearly half the price. Not sure why there's such a large difference in prices but happy to have found the whole bean.

If you have a toddler in the house, and you buy this for the newborn . . . watch out! Our toddler, of course, is perfect, but whoa, when he gets ahold of that little swing and his sister is in it, it becomes a ride at Great Adventure (not good).  Also, to our tastes, the flashing colored lights -- so close to her head -- were a little much.  Our baby girl looked up at them with something like panic in her eyes. The good old-fashioned bouncy seat is just fine.

I thought that this would have been a rocker that rocks itself, and it is not.  This is too small, so you would not get too much use out of it.  You are better off getting the pack and play.  I used this for around 4 wks if that long, and had to put the baby in the bed until i got the pack and play.  Totally waste of money.
This is the best bottles  available. Tried couple of different types but this one's just great. Ones with wide mouth  gives the most natural way to feed my baby.  Would recommend to anyone.

I have been using this pail with cloth diapers for some time now, I also use a cloth liner and that works well with this pail. I did however remove the plastic flaps from the inside of the pail as they were just in the way and with out them there is more room for diapers. It never really stinks unless the diapers need to be washed any how. The only complaint I have is that it should be bigger.
These are great.  My baby enjoyed manipulating them with his hands.  I loved that I could throw them in the dishwasher and that they are made in the States.

H2wOw is awesome! I'm a runner and I have to keep myself well hydrated throughout the day to ensure I am always running to my potential. H2wOw makes ordinary water fun and gives me an option to stay away from all of those sugary energy drinks that in the long run are not good for my health. It's a great product and I recomend it to anyone that wants a healthy alternative.

Not only would I recommend Lalabu to a friend, but since total strangers ask me about it every single time I go out with baby, I've been recommending it to them, too! At a birthday party last weekend, three moms whose kids are older but who are going to baby showers for other mamas soon asked me all about my cool baby wearing shirt. I really need to print out some tags with the name and website to hand out when I wear it. Amazing. I love it, my baby loves it, and everyone who sees it loves it! All my baby wraps and slings are sitting on a shelf getting dusty now. :)

I use this for carrying my Bpump attachments. I don't know why I never thought of this bag before, I was using ziplock bags. Using ziplock for the parts all day, not only was I wasting money (a new bag every day), I was worried about mold because the parts were wet in the bag. This bag, it seems to suck up moisture. After an 8hr day of use and storing wet parts, removing the parts for washing, they come out dry. Since it's reuseable, I'm no longer wasting money constantly using a new ziplock bag every day. Would def recommend and would buy more. This size is perfect for your pump parts, if you use the bag adapters, not bottles. I'd go one size up if you pump into bottles. Word to the wise, the large is extremely large!! I use that for wet clothes and it's still to big (for infant clothes, toddler or older, the large may be a perfect size)

I never used a nursing cover with my daughter but figured with having a second that I would not beable to always be at home or go into the car to nurse.  I got the Bebe Au Lait nursing cover after great reviews from friends and I find that the opening that allows me to see my son while nursing doesn't stay propped open like it shows in the pictures, so that is frustrating to me.  I love that the sides are weighted down so that the wind doesn't pick it up!

These little trays are great!  Many uses after the baby stage too!  -Use them for super large ice cubes, take salad dressing's to work  -Throw spices in the container to mix them up - close the lid and shake vigorously.  -Do you cook with wine? Use these to make little ice cubes of red wine, chicken broth or marinades to easily pull one out and thaw for meals or stew.    (Take a half cup of red wine -OR- two cubes of red wine, let them cook in with a beef roast for several hours and the added taste will be incredible)  -Cram cut up fruits or veggies and put them in the containers for your young kids to take to skill    (These cups are a little smaller than the typical fruit cup)  PROS  -BPA Free (Bishpenol-A)  -1 Ounce portions / 30ml  -Versatile  -Silicone button on bottom (to help push the cubes out)  CONS  -If dropped on to a hard floor while container is frozen with contents, the container will crack or shatter.

This bottle is not what I expected. Unless the child has swallowed all milk they pulled through nipple it runs right out the bottle when the release suction. For a newborn learning this is not a great product. Pretty disappointed, contacted Medela.
This little teether is expensive, but I think it's worth it. The long legs will even reach into the back of his mouth to his molars when my ds starts getting teeth back there
Nice product but it falls of the wall about once a month, generally in the middle of the night which sets off my ver sensitive four footed alarm system

This is he worst product I have ever purchased on Amazon. It is CHEAP, CHEAP, CHEAP!  The assembly is terrible. The screws are not the right size (it splits the wood). The hinges are useless. The paint came out of the box chipped all over. There were parts missing (I had to go to the hardware store). Worst $100 dollars I have ever spent. Ever.  I feel like I have been ripped off like never before. Amazon should not sell this item.

These are great and I do order them on subscribe and save, but they are still crazy over priced. The quality of the dried fruit is good, but not amazing.  There are always going to be some partial pieces and dust (I eat that too) its yummy. I always feel a little silly buying these for $12+ and they are often over $15 full price.
This is something I've been looking for.  Contains nutritional yeast which is a healthy food.  The best egg substitute.  .

My husband likes this coffee (he actually blends it with Nescafe Classic), however, you used to be able to buy it from Amazon for $24.91 (3 in the pkg.) with free shipping and now a 3rd party is selling it for $49.99 plus shipping.  That's simply ridiculous!

Baby is currently sleeping in the bassinet portion at nights. It's a very basic pack n play that meets our needs. One thing I can say is that the bassinet portion is a bit higher than our other pack n play that comes with a diaper changer and bouncer. So when we add the Dream on Me mattress, the bassinet portion is raised considerably higher. Still low enough that baby can't roll out of, but it's making me want to just put him in the lowest portion to ease my mind.

I love this carrier. It is much more comfortable for me than the other carriers.  Unfortunately, my son doesn't like it. Also be aware that you cannot use it for small babies without the newborn insert.

I brought this chair for my grand daughter after finding restaurant booster seats lacking.  My daughter keeps it in the car and uses it all the time. The booster has come in handy when they are out visiting.  They use it for meal time, art time, anytime her toddler needs a boost.  Its easy to carry and attaches to most chairs easily especially with the leg extenders.  The storage compartment is great, there is enough room for a few snacks and a change of clothes, much needed items for a toddler on the go.
Other brands can't compare to these classic Arcor strawberry candies. They are delicious and just like you remember from childhood.
My granddaughter loves her new Elmo dinner set it encourages her to eat! Colour is bright and washes fantastic! Little Elmo fan!!!
these rich dark truffles are good for a  mature pallet, don't give them to young children because they are not overly sweetened. I did receive truffles, unlike some other people.

Keep in mind that the liquid you add it too needs to be heated up to nearly boiling for this stuff to gel.  I wanted to use it to help stabilize ice cream, but it's annoying that I have to scald the milk in order to use it.  Also, the gel seems to be relatively unstable when frozen, so probably not ideal for ice cream.

The design of the item is nice. I have been looking for something like this for a while. The size is a little small for my chico carseat and it does not cover the side well so I am returning it. Also the color is really really pink pink not so much red, and the green is super green almost neon green, not like the picture. And the cotton fabric with the pattern is not really soft either. Great idea, but did not work out for me. If I have to get it again, I would just order black one to be safe.
Tastes great. I've been sharing this with friends who have never tried it. Everyone  LOVES it.

Title say it all. About 90 percent of the content is just the little bit salty messy tasteless tiny crab meat. I can garantte even water boiled chicken taste better than this. Avoid at all cost since they come with Pack of 12, and I think I will never touch the second can.
Most users said that they could not taste the chemical flavor of this sugar free product but I can tell the difference and was not a fan.

I got addicted to Sahale's snacks from the Tully's Coffee that was downstairs at work.  After pretty much buying them out they didn't restock in enough time so I decided to take matters into my own hands and buy in bulk from Amazon.  My 3 favorites are Socorro, Ksar and Soledad.  If you want a healthy snack that tastes like you're indulging in sinful goodness then this is the snack for you.

This is a very nice gate and matches the decor perfectly. This is the third one that I brought for my daughter who has s spiral staircase. We secured with zip ties from Lowes which makes it appear as part of the railing. Very safe too.
They say you could put it on the wall alone but it's tedious. I needed 2 other people for help. It took me 45 minutes to do but totally worth it. Looks great! I would order again.
I'm always looking for something different... These are surprisingly good, and my health-food-nut friends would eat them too (and also liked them:)

I'm french so I literally grew up with this salt, I don't even know how to cook without it. What a nice surprise when I found out I can easily order it here on Amazon in the US!
Basically this is 2/3 real sea salt and 1/3 herb salt (like celery salt and such) so you can cut on salt without even thinking about it.
The taste? So much better than dumb salt, it adds a wonderful but subtle herb/vegetables flavor (kinda like a bouquet garni?).
Everybody loves it, husband, friends, grandma and brother in law, everybody.
Best way to enjoy it? Fresh bread, butter, sprinkle the salt on the top of the \\"tartine\\" and eat with fresh radish! Yum!

My mother always insist on sending me some from France \\"But Mom I can just order it from Amazon here!\\".
It's hard to believe that 50 years ago, this was just a local product and now it's sold on Amazon in the US. But it totally deserves it! Thank you Alfred Vogel for offering us healthy AND yummy products since 1963! Way before organic products were trendy.
This is a true 6 stars product.

Update: Amazon just stopped carrying the brand... :'(
Just made the new blue raspberry cookie mix from pillsbury! Wow! Everyone who ate one wanted another! If you try it you will too! You will love it
My son who has celiac disease reacted after eating this product....buyer beware for those looking for a healthy gluten free chip

Best bibs for drooling!!  We are storing all the other bibs we have; these really keep clothes dry underneath.  Our son is 6 months, and a medium-heavy drooler (he's not the worst out there, but much more than just a touch, here and there).  The outside of the bib can be soaked, and the under layer still dry.  There is one that matches almost any outfit we have for him.  Easy to clean, velcro holds tighter than some other bibs we had.  I've ordered another set; this is all we use, now!  Oh, and the neck hole works for a 2-month old through 22 months (fits both our boys).  They have medium thick necks... if your baby has a thick neck, this would probably fit fine as well, but maybe not at 22 months.  Though, we don't use these bibs on our 22 month old, per say, he has tried them on, and they fit him just fine.

Has a cute design; seems well made. Unfortunately, it does not fit larger carts like those at SuperTarget....and since I shop there most frequently, I had to return it. Wish they made one that worked well with all size carts.

we have a keurig coffee maker , tried it in there- it does not fit.

we also have an other coffee maker that brews ground coffee, and takes k-cups - it does not fit. I had purchased them to

make it easier for me instead of having to clean out the grounds just before that, I purchased the mini filters that are

made for them . now I am stuck with 2 purchases I can't use.

Tasty little things. A very compelling chewiness. However, go slow at first until you know how many you can handle or you will be your family's flatulence champion (or villain, depending on your family).

So far, I have really liked this baby monitor. It picks up the slightest noise so it is very easy to detect if your baby may need you. The picture is clear, even at night. It does take some adjustments to get the angles just right but you also learn the best position to place your baby at in the crib in order to get a clear picture. I have taken the baby monitor outside and had no problem getting picture and sound. The picture does not stay on the entire time, about 2 minutes but It has a button at the top that you can quickly press to see a picture if needed.
The backpack arrived with holes in the bottoms of two of the interior pockets.  I'm quite disappointed with that. Otherwise, the backpack is great.
We like this a lot. Initially, we purchased it at Sam's Club and they stopped carrying it. It's very easy to use and it makes a great marinade for chicken.
when I forgot to make the cake of Mcqueen I got these and save me but its hard to cut the cake with this on it
It is not safe and does not fit properly on all airlines. After learning lap babies have died from not being on a car seat on the plane i will no longer attempt to use any device like this.

The hazelnut I've never been a fan of, but its good. The caramel, raspberry and hazelnut all go good with white chocolate! But, I'm in love with my white chocolate caramel breve! Its delicious ( make it the same way you do a mocha, but instead of milk. Steam half and half!)

Product came nicely packaged!
Great taste and texture. Would definitely buy again. Love that it is organic for this price.  Have recommended to friends.

I got these at Target, and they are my go to candy!  For me, they are addicting.  As they are healthier alternatives, they are still full of sugar, so I try to not get them often.  They taste great, though, and I find them better tasting than Milky Way.  I love that I can get these for birthday parties or holidays, and not feel as guilty eating them as I would other candy.

I have experience with other brands of flat diaper cloths. I needed more, so I bought a pack of Gerbers and I was very disappointed. They are as thin as gauze and spit-up runs right though them. The edges are finished with some kind of cheap polyester felt that lacks any absorbency and frays easily. The Gerber cloths shrank so much that I can't possibly use them as diapers even if I tried.     If these were named \\"utility cloths,\\" I could understand. But calling them diapers is a joke. Gerber used to be known for quality, but these are junk.

This stroller is awesome! You can use it from infancy though toddler years. It's convertible to use an infant car seat, the regular base seat, and you can even add another seat to the stroller! It's a big stroller but not heavy, folds down neatly and stores easily. I highly recommend this stroller to anyone who plans to have more then one child. Definitely worth the money.
thank  you very much finally my daughter can wear the necklace i really appreciated for the new necklace

It's easy to use and i like to have my own belt so I don't have to use the ones provided by the supermarket, which are regularly very dirty. However, it tends to be a little lose and a wiggling baby can stretch it easyly. Supermarket straps are normally attached to the upper part of the cart so they restrain the baby's chest. This tends to fall to the baby's lap, which gives him more mobility. Therefore, it aids to secure the baby but it's not bulletproof, you definitely should not leave your baby unattended when using this.

It is great that it has night vision, it's helped me be able to walk away from my baby and know that if I turn off the light, I will be able to see him pretty clear. The only drawback is that the battery for the receiver doesn't last too long.
My baby loved this jumpy jumpy!  Doc said to put her on this instead of a walkers she wouldn't get lazy. So she ended up walking before a year.

Mix this with dry vegetable soup mix and you have a yummy side dish for any meat.  Add more broth and you have a soup.  Follow the directions but add sweetener and cinnamon, and you have a delicious breakfast.  The last time I made it, I added agave, diced prunes, finely chopped nut mix, cinnamon, and the grains and suggested water.  When cooked, I put it in the fridge.  For breakfast I put some Greek yogurt in a bowl, added a couple of spoonfulls of the grains, and some fresh raspberries.  Yummy and nutritious. The possibilities are endless!
Loved the sandals and how they fit only the squeaker fell out of one shoe after only 3 days of wearing them. Not really worth what I paid for them.
Appreciate any reviews of alternatives which taste similar but are less expensive, or recipes for roasting wheat bran.  I tried Pero extra dark roast  -too bitter.

I had the original Matcha Green Tea & LOVED it!!!  When I went to reorder, this was an option.  I'm so glad I did.  Same instant tea as before, but even better taste.  I add a little all natural honey to mine and VOILA, healthy energy and stamina to get through my toddler's tantrums without having to nap when she does!  Thanks again for an amazing product <3

I bought this for a friend as part of a gift for a friend's son's first birthday.  It was a little large for him but still worked well for great pictures while he was eating his first piece of birthday cake.  It would probably fit a 2-3 year old better.  I actually paired it with a stuffed bear that I bought on Amazon and had the bear wearing a bib.  It was a cute idea and my friend loved it!

I had a similar version of this when I had my first 2 son's years ago.  When I got pregnant with my 3rd son, I knew I would get another Medela pump!  My first pump lasted through daily use for two children that were on breast milk for a year.  I only got rid of it because we thought we were done having children.  So when we decided to have a third child, there was no doubt that a Medela pump would be in order for my pumping needs.  I use it multiple times a day and it works just as great as my first one did!

This is the best car seat and stroller! I had to get a new set for our 3rd baby and love this! The color is not as light as pictured, but is still very nice, darker. The strap release/tightening mechanism is very easy and smooth, unlike our previous car seats. I am extremely happy with this seat. I just got the stroller last night, but am pretty certain I will love it as well.

I bought this tub with my first daughter 2 years ago and I had her in until she was 8 months old.  It worked great.  The tub never leaked and was comfortable for her.  The only thing I did not like was the sling has a mesh cover on it and it get's dirty quickly because when you have a baby they go pee-pee in the tub.  I had to wash the cover every time before I used it.  I now have another little girl 3 months old and I am using it again and after a 1 1/2 of sitting in the closet it still works fine, no leaks or anything else, except that I still have to wash the sling frequently.  The tub is great though they can use as a baby and then when they sit up.  I do recommend this bath tub for the money and the short period of time they will be in it.

We bought a new van last year and unfortunately, it has tan seats. With three kids, you can just imagine the damage! It's really hard to keep the van clean and the seats are even harder. With two in boosters and one in a car seat, I've placed towels under their seats to try to minimize the damage. While it is better than nothing, it certainly doesn't compare to the Cruisy Kids Car Seat Protector I got to go under Jax's car seat.

With three kids, you would think I would have known these existed by now! I have actually seen the mat that's just a simple mat that goes under the seat but nothing as extensive as this.

This covers the back of the seat as well as the bottom and even has a flap that goes under the front and one that extends between the back of the seat so all those nasty crumbs won't get wedged in there.

The other thing I really like about it that is a huge upgrade from a towel is the no slip surface on the bottom. One you put this on your seat, it clings to it and it isn't going anywhere!

Jax just turned one yesterday. While legally I can now turn his car seat around, I'd like to leave him rear facing as long as he'll fit for safety reasons. I like that this can adjust from being a protector for rear facing to forward facing.

The other feature that I love is the pockets on the front. where you can stick things in like bottles, spare diapers, toys or anything you want quick access to. When I'm driving and the baby's fussing, I can now just reach behind me to grab his bottle out of the pocket without having to dig for it or even turn around and take my eyes off the road.

The Cruisy Kids Car Seat Protector ensures that my van's seats will stay nice as long as possible. It keeps food off the seats, pressure points from puncturing my seat and gives me added convenience with it's pockets. Now I just need to get a couple more for the other two boosters!

We love these "fruit strips" (as my 2 year old calls them).

What a great snack! They are delicious and wholesome. Just fruit, so you don't have to worry about feeding your kids junk. They are really tasty--mom and dad like them too! Buying on amazon using the subscribe and save option saves $$ compared to buying similar options at the store.

These are my daughter's favorite snack and we are happy to give to her!

RLR works like a charm!! I buy RLR to use on cloth diapers, but I use it on all other laundry as well! Every now and then my clothes, sheets, towels need a RLR Treatment. I tend to overuse detergent at times so this is a easy economical way to fix the detergent build up vs buying new or having faded worn out things. Even if you don't overuse detergent, over time your clothes get a build up on them, even with normal detergent use. If you don't get the residue out, your clothes become worn looking, the color begins to fade quicker and they can at time just look a little dingy. You've found your fix! RLR!

I was very pleased with my purchase and will buy again when my supply runs out!

Looks so cute and adorable in my nursery but they will not stay stuck to the wall, every time i go in there at least 2 have fallen on the floor.  Not sure if I got a bad batch or they are all like that
Can't go wrong for the price. The quality is great! 4 stars only because I feel like the headband is a little on the tight side. My daughter is 1 And she doesn't like wearing them.
Get this before it gets discontinued. I found it very hard to purchase due to running out of stock. GRAB it while you can.

I appreciate the great price for quantity and the quality is most excellent.  I have shared with many of my friends and recommend this to anyone who is looking to improve their health.  Even my dog is getting a more shiny coat.
Taste good and mosit not dry up or hard.  They are smaller than I expected for jumbo raisin.  A bit too expensive  for me.
This is the worst purchase ever! These are tiny and I only received 24 pieces for $9.77. DO NOT BUY this product. I'm very disappointed in the price and the items once I received it.
It is the closest to the original pate as far as spice, so far that I tasted when I lived on the island.
Love, love, love this! Bought 2. One for us and 1 for the sitter. Great price too.

Pros - All pieces look like they do in the pictures. The blanket has good padding, and works well on the floor. The diaper stacker is a good size and can hold 100 diapers.

Cons - All of the pieces shrunk in the wash. The sheet and dust ruffle now no longer fit. The valances also shrunk, and now barely cover the window span. The crib bumper is padded, and not breathable. We didn't use it.
I got this to help boost my b12, wasn't sure it would taste good. It tastes like some kind of health food I tried when I was little. Blends in well with the taste of oatmeal or groats.

I BOUGHT THIS AS A GIFT FOR MY NIECE AND HER HUSBAND. THEY RECEIVED IT IN 4 DAYS AFTER I ORDERED IT, AND SHE ABSOLUTELY LOVES IT. WE STUDIED SEVERAL MODELS, AND THIS IS THE ONE SHE THOUGHT WOULD WORK FOR HER.
VERY STURDY AND WORTH THE MONEY. IT WAS A FANTASTIC SALE PRICE AND FREE SHIPPING FROM AMAZON.
I ALWAYS TRY TO BUY EVERYTHING THROUGH AMAZON....NEVER DISAPPOINTED.

Huge fan of Boon products!  I had high hopes for this teething tether, but my son easily pulls it off his clothing.  He likes to try to chew on the piece that clips on his clothes but has pinched his mouth doing that.  I use it sometimes with Sophie the teething giraffe.  Her leg fits great and he can't seem to pull her out of the mesh yet.  I have not had good luck putting teething biscuits in the mesh.  It creates a giant mess almost immediately.  Not worth the money in my opinion--better off spending your money on a different baby item.
All packaging was neat and the product came exactly as advertised, maybe better than advertised. Simple and easy to use.

For the money, this is a great product. Just a bit of spice, but very well done. I would recommend this if you are looking for an alternative to the boring salsas offered in the grocery stores of the northeast.

We have a new puppy and want to keep her confined to the kitchen. There is a 5' wide opening between the kitchen and the living room. I bought this gate because I didn't want to have to attach hardware permanently to my walls and I didn't want to pay an arm and a leg for a wood gate that would span 60 inches.    It's a little tricky to put up at first but once I got it up I was impressed with how securely it stayed in place. Once I got the hang of putting it up, I can do it pretty quickly. Once I figured out the 'secret' of folding it up (get the vertical bars unhinged before undoing the horizontal bars), taking it down was a snap. I also love that it folds so it can be easily stored out of sight when not in use.    For the price, I couldn't ask for a better product. I'm a bit concerned about my puppy tearing the mesh but so far that hasn't been a problem. But it's something to think about if you want it for a pet.

My son loved the plush ball - it was soft enough to grab, fun to roll, and has a nice soft bell in it.  He's 15 mos now but will still roll this around once in a while.  The plastic ball I did not like and threw out; I thought that the inner edges were too rough/sharp, so I got rid of it!  I'd give the plush ball alone 5 stars and pay the same price!

Our little man just loves these chimes! They are cute, well-made, and easily rattled. I love that the noise they produce is sweet and lovely instead of just a shakey sound like most rattles or maracas available! I don't find the noise annoying or too loud. We use these all the time. They hang well from his car seat handle, swing toy arch, and play mat. In that sense, they are great to sort of increase the "fun factor" on any toy or seat that he finds a little under-stimulating. He also loves to chew on them or snuggle with them. We've gotten a ton of mileage out of these, so I consider them a great value!
The cheese sauce flavour in the package is very salty and has a plasticy texture.
My case was busted and 2 cans of product missing. So I paid for a full one got 10 instead. I let amazon know and no one got back to me. For shame.

Yes the chex calorie pack did meet my expectations and more. However I was surprised that when I went back to order more they were out of stock that quickly, and this is the only place I can find them I've looked all over. I am on your wait list for when you do have them back in stock.
I tried soy protein instead of the brown rice protein that I had been putting in my hot cereal.  I don't care for the taste of the soy so I plan to go back to rice.
Fisher-Price never disappointed me as a Mom and doesn't disappoint me as a grandma. So, easy to attach to a chair. I love the wide tray.

I really love this Monitor! It has a really clear picture, the night vision is great. The sound on this this is very clear as well. I like the fact that when your baby makes a noise the screen turns on. Great value, great quality for a great price!

When I was living and working in Italy, I always flew home with the best Espresso from the local market. I can't say that this is as good. But, hey, I put the K-Cups in my newfangled machine and it spurts out real roasted, Arabica bliss. In a medium sized coffee cup!

Wow! This is good, rocket-fuel coffee and the closest to "Instant Espresso" as I've found.

If you like Espresso, try it.

Best Thai sauces out there! Perfect balance between sweet and spicy. These sauces made a perfect gift for my in laws who are food connoisseurs. They were amazed by the richness of the flavors and enjoyed trying out the different recipes available in watcharee's website. I highly recommend these sauces!

i have twins and bought two (pretty sure i paid much less so i think they were on sale)
anyway, worked great with wide mouth dr. browns
got many comments on them
made bottle feeding SO much easier once they got the hang of it
i think around 6 mo or earlier
for the narrower bottles i think you can use the hole on the other end? just turn it upside down right?

For an instant disc/pod espresso, the Gevalia espresso for Tassimo is very good.  It is the best of the espressos offered for the Tassimo line.    I recently discovered a trick for making it even more delicious. For an extra rich and full-bodied espresso, combine 2 t-discs into one cup, with each one's brew shortened halfway to increase the strength.  On the original Tassimo machine, this is accomplished by pressing the button and releasing it after the drip has been going for just a few seconds.  For many people, a regular brew of a single t-disc might be fine, but it was tasting a bit weak for me (maybe I've been spoiled by too many Peets espressos, which really pack a punch).    Yes, it does use up the t-discs more quickly, but a 2-disc cup of espresso costs only about $1.10 - which is still far cheaper than a double espresso at Starbucks ($1.95) or Peets ($2.20).
Of us 3 I think these are a nice snack to satisfy a cookie and/or chocolate craving.  My husband and daughter say no way.

I really love this sleepsack. It is 100% cotton and very lightweight and breathable. This was important to me because my baby was waking up all sweaty in a different brand (the material had stretch in it, so I don't think it was as breathable). I got her the small, and there is room to grow. I haven't had issues with the zipper breaking as other reviews suggested. I wash and hang dry, and it's held up fine.  UPDATE: My daughter ripped a hole clear through the fabric with her foot. I noticed other reviews that said the same thing. What a shame. I liked this sleepsack so much.
My son loves biting on Jacques wings while in the car and out and about. We have it clipped to his infant carrier so he has Jacques everywhere we go.
Works very well in bread machines. So far I have had great success with the loaves that I baked in my bread machine.

I had the classic Graco SnugRide for my 1st child. The SnugRide 30 is definitely a step up in quality. It has better padding. It's easier to adjust the harness straps. It has a higher weight limit. And I love the Metropolis cover!

But, holy cow, this thing is HEAVY. It's much heavier than the classic SnugRide. I felt strained carrying my baby in it much earlier on than with my first child in the classic SnugRide. He's about 20lbs and 7 months old right now and I've already switched him to a convertible seat (still rear-facing of course). (My 1st child weighed about the same at this age).

I miss the convenience of popping him in and out of the car in his infant seat, but I love babywearing too, so it will work out ok for us. I just wish this thing weighed a little less since it's meant to be carried. We have both kids in Diono Radians now, and those are definitely heavy. But they aren't meant to be toted around so I don't mind the weight.

I have been having such trouble deciding what I can feed my Celiac step-daughter.  This product is not only as tasty as the regular soy sauce, but opens up a lot of my favorite recipes to use when she visits.

Vegan soy-free, chunks. Work great in baking, melting, or just adding to some trail mix.

We often have a difficult time finding the chunks, so when we find a good deal we buy in bulk!
It makes a wonderful sour cream raisin pie but it is more product in the jar that is  needed for one pie.  I feel I waste some of it.

My little one absolutely loves these.. they are already gone! They taste nasty to me and my husband, but she loves them. I guess it's a good thing they taste bad to us otherwise we might have eaten them for her.

They should have provided more description for the product.

I just had it yesterday while shopping at a local grocery and seeing Bob Marley's face I had to buy it. After coming home I started looking more closely and here are 2 things that made me happy about my purchase:

1) the shortness of ingredient list - it's really just Jamaican coffee, milk, sugar, natural flavor, and pectin (not sure what the last ones are for, and I'm typing this from memory so I could be off)

2) a portion of the profit from the sale of this product is going to non-profit

As for the coffee itself, it's a little bit on the mellow side (that's what Jamaican Blue Mountains are, right?), not too sweet, but other than that, it tasted like real coffee (that's a big one for me). It's not something I'll drink for pulling all-nighters, but it's something to enjoy on a hot summer afternoon.

I can imagine the palm tree and the sea breeze brushing through my face.

These are awesome! They fit my 4 month old, who drools like crazy, perfectly. She is in a size 6 month clothing and almost in a 9 month to give an idea of her size. They are a soft, terry material. The waterproof lining in the middle is not that hard, crinkly material; it is softer yet protects her drool from soaking through. I have washed each of these 4-5 times now and have had no issues with the edges raveling. The embroidery is cute too. I hope these come back in stock soon; I absolutely love and recommend these!

I tried the pumpkin in this and was in love, thought it was worth the big price tag to have a HFCS free caramel, but it does not taste like caramel at all, taste like butterscotch and a chemical one at that, don't discount the brand, but I am scared to try any of the others and I was just going to order gingerbread and creme pumpkin, but with amazon not allowing for a return on my 3 pumps used bottle, I am reconsidering, too expensive to taste test at $12.00. High cost for a small amount of terrible tasting food. If you want to invest in survival food, this is definitely not the brand to go with. I suggest wise food.

The Ekobrew Cup looks like it should work after fitting nicely into my Keurig Coffee Maker (model B-70) but push the brew button and the  Ekobrew Cup considerably slows down the flow rate to your coffee cup taking 2-3 times longer to brew and doesnâ€™t fill the coffee cup as high as a standard K-cup on the same setting. I followed the directions carefully to make sure I did not fill the Ekobrew Cup above the fill line. I also experimented with different fill quantities with no improvement. I should have only bought one Ekobrew Cup and made sure it worked before I bought a pack of four. The Keurig My K-cup works fine but is more cumbersome to use. Although the Ekobrew Cup is easier to use, it just doesnâ€™t work. Very disappointed.
My kids love this potty, but it does leave a red mark. It doesn't seem to bother them and it goes away rather quickly. They like this potty better than sitting on the big potty.

This product has been amazing. Our baby is picky that she won't take a bottle cold so when we have dethawed breast milk, we put it in the warmer and its done in 2-3 minutes. She drinks it right up and there is no risk of hot spots, the bottle is evenly warmed. We haven't tried heating food up yet but I'm sure it works fine.

This Mulberry Tea is one of the finest tea's I have ever had. It is smooth tasting and no bitter after taste. Great!  We use it about 20 times per day for our twins and we have no complaints!  The covers fit well enough.
We use this as a room divider and it works great. It's sturdy and I like that I can adjust it to fit our space. I plan to use it as a play yard in the future too.
Glad I heard about this product and tried it. Helped put me right to sleep drinking 30 minutes before. I'm Army so the sooner I can get to sleep the better. Loved it!

Could not be better. I felt like I was at the cafe that told me about the brand to begin with.
Rebecca.
I buy this on a regular basis- good for iron which is why I bought it to begin with- but nice flavor, too!

I love this glider, overall. It is pretty comfortable, was fairly priced, and will be functional after I'm done breast feeding. I love the side pockets where I can store the remote, my water bottle, cell phone, etc. Also, any breast feeding mama will tell you how important positioning is for a good latch-- I am able to get the PERFECT positioning for the cradle hold when I use the boppy in this chair. It just works out perfectly for my height! I do wish I had purchased the darker color, but it raised the price significantly, so I went with the beige. I keep a blanket over it to prevent it from getting stained with spit up and the other fun things that come with babies and kids. It also makes the occasional creaking noise, which makes me wonder about it's quality, but it's been fine so far. Overall, I'm very pleased with this purchase and the value!!
This bread is really sad.  Not a real sourdough and the taste is not good. I would not recommend spending money for this mix. Try the 9 grain instead.
Backpack diaper bag it's such a great idea so comfortable and practical. The designs it's nice and material A well it doesn't look cheap at all.

I was very skeptical when first trying the Iced VIA, particularly since, as another reviewer noted, the addition of sugar (NOT Splenda, alas) to the mix is clearly stated on the package. Howver, this product turns out to be a huge win for me. First of all, unlike the regular or decaf VIA which I also love (see my review of [[ASIN:B00451WLYI Starbucks VIA Ready Brew Coffee, Decaf Italian Roast, 3-Count Packets (Pack of 6)]]), a single serving packet makes 16 oz., not 8 oz -- in other words, you get twice as much. Second, if you just add a little milk or half and half (I use 4 Mini-Moos for one 16 oz. serving) plus a squirt of your favorite chocolate syrup, it's better than a Mocha Frappucino, and at a fraction of the price for a larger serving than even the large size bottles. Even though it's now no longer summer, this is still my favorite way to start the day. I'm saving a lot of money by no longer buying Frappucinos, not to mention the effort of lugging a case home from Sam's Club every week. And the sugar content is LOWER than that of a Frappucino -- even if you add your own chocolate -- which pleases me. In fact, a Mocha Frappucino out of the glass bottle now tastes too sweet to me.

Amazon is apparently getting ready to offer a 50-pack case of Iced VIA, which is fabulous news -- I can't wait! :)

P.S. To make it easier to prepare, I keep several recycled 16-oz. plastic water bottles in the fridge. Each time I want a new 16 oz. cup of Iced VIA, I use one bottle, then refill it with tap water and return it to the fridge. No need to use a measuring cup or fuss with ice -- the chilled water is always waiting for me and makes a perfect iced coffee each time!

P.P.S. I have a new \\"best way\\" to make this: take a \\"Working\\" glass [[ASIN:B003LL83X6 Luminarc 3053195 Working Glass jar 21oz, 12 PACK.]], pop the contents of one packet of iced Via into it, fill with skim milk up to the top of the highest indentations in the glass (exactly 16 oz!), and stir. Done! I used to then plop some chocolate syrup into it but now find I no longer need even that. Behold, in seconds a frappuchino that is bigger, non-fat (as opposed to \\"low fat\\"), and lower in sugar than the commercial bottles. And if you need to take it away, put the matching lid on the glass (search \\"working glass\\" -- all lids fit both sizes of working glasses). My new, 8-second method of preparing a marvelous frappuchino to start the day!!! (almost as fast as just grabbing a bottle out of the refrigerator, and both cheaper and lower in calories, too!).

Thought it would be a little more distressed. But it is beautiful, and heavy. I fell in love with it the first time I saw it. So deserving for a first grandchild. Amazon's price with free delivery was a steal!!! Arrived fast, in excellent condition. VERY, VERY happy with purchase for our new arrival!!!

These Wildflower honey sticks are an extremely sweet, delicious delight for those who love honey. It's enough for a cup of tea for me, yet may not be for others. Each stick is approximately a teaspoon of honey. This is also a great snack for you kids because it's much healthier than the sugary, high fructose chemical junk in most snacks these days. LOVE that it's a 100 percent USA product as well and not made in CHINA. My only beef about AMAZON is price. Sometimes their prices are very reasonable. I just bought a few days ago for $10 and now see they are $12 for 50 sticks.

I am a Cote d'Or addict and was long waiting for someone to import these Lait Leche. Alas, whilst perfectly edible, this is NOT the same recipe as the one available in Belgium. The packaging has Arabic writing (or some such) and seems have have been "downgraded" in quality for this export market. It lacks the depth of chocolate and caramel undertones i am used to. Pity. I will wait until someone import the original before ordering again.

WOW!! Okay, I have been an avid Starbucks Espresso roast fan for at least 12 years. I have tried a few other brands but never more than one purchase as they did not compare to my beloved Starbucks. :-)
Well, I have purchased my last bag of Starbucks! This coffee is absolutely amazing!! For my espressos I no longer have to grind my own, thus taking out the did I over or under grind equation. The crema is FANTASTIC! I have never had that before!! The flavor is outstanding! Strong, hearty and consistent! I have been making my own lattes for quite a while and by switching to this they are at least 50 percent better!
I have not tried this as an every day coffee as from reading reviews on here it is suggested you must have a certain type of coffee maker, but as soon as my stockpile of Starbucks is gone I shall give it a shot. If indeed it does not work I will be purchasing the type suggested for this grind. Yes, it is that good!

Product is really lightweight and really works great.  I've been used to hearing mostly hiss on baby monitors, these are how things are supposed to work, just what you need to hear no noise.

Fits our Cruz stroller well. A little bit bulky when not using it and sticks out when folding the stroller, but it's easily removable, so can be stored in the bottom basket. It's sturdy, and holds most cup sizes, including my glass water bottle.

Gin Gins are the perfect gluten free candy ! Order in bulk...you will not regret it...
the best ever made!

I've had fresh coconuts from every continent they grow on, and as it doesn't taste as good as a fresh one, it is hands down the best packaged coco water I or my wife have ever had (we have tried at least a dozen different packaged ones).  They go down too quick for the price; maybe 3-4 good swallows when your thirsty.

This has helped us potty train our girls in our small house with one bathroom, without having to keep a potty chair or removable training seat that gets peed on.  This is easy to install and is low profile enough that it stays clean, even when the kids are just learning.
Wasn't what I ordered, and the Web site conveniently crossed out what I originally ordered after I complained. I can get this style anywhere. Very upsetting.
I believe this salt makes me a better cook. It makes everything better, just sprinkle a little on top of each plate. Perfect.

I have had this for nearly 2 months now, it works perfect for my needs.The best feature I love is it has good reception even when I have to walk over to my neighbors front yard where my son plays during her afternoon naptime.The picture is nearly perfect but this is my first monitor so I don't have anything to compare it with.Even if she squirms or makes the tiny bit of sound or movement I can hear it immediately.About the Talk back feature, we have tried it and it works great, but I really haven't used it on my nearly 5 mth old yet.The battery life on the monitor lasts quite a bit, I just plug it back on even if its down a bar.Pan and zoom is also a great feature we love on this monitor.
The only downfall is the start up tune on the monitor , but after reading the earlier reviews I just always made sure to switch it on after I leave the room.
All in all I would recommend this product to family and friends.
This is a great mattress for the Graco Pack N Play that we purchased. Fits perfectly and is a great travel bed for my 1 year old.
This is a great price and just the right size.  I carry these to work to drink in the afternoon.  The taste is good too, really lemony.  I would recommend this product.

I ordered two batches and they arrived on time, the packaging had no blemishes or rips and the cookies were all in one piece, none of them had crumbled. I was very surprised and pleased that they ended up being the highlight of our get-together! Everyone loved them and loved the design, shape of each of the cookies and they tasted delicious! I can't wait to buy a few more batches of these cookies for our next get-together! I definitely recommend these cookies!
