I love that the ingredients are included in the single pack, instead of having to purchase oil and popcorn separately. I did add Flavacol and Butter Flavored Popcorn Topping as well to get even closer to that movie theater taste.

I cook mine in a Whirley Pop and it works well. I think to get true movie theater flavor you have to cook it in a true popcorn popper with the kettle that dumps the popcorn right after popping it. I think that on the stove you lose some flavor as the popcorn stays in the kettle and is subject to additional heat and moisture after it pops.

All in all the packaging is nice and easy to use. I just wish they had an easier tear option at the top. Usually I cut open the oil side with scissors and dump it in the Whirley Pop first to melt it. Then I cut open the remainder of the package and dump the contents in when the temp is good. Generally I get a consistent batch, but every now and then I get a batch that is either too crunchy or a little too sticky. I am not sure if that is the fault of this product or my cooking methods.

Beautiful! Colors are more pink than photo. Very surprised how lovely this is! Soft and satin fabric. Delicate and dainty. Very happy. I am very excited to be able to get this discontinued item. My daughter will love it! I am happy to be able to help her set up the nursery for her baby girl.
Item was exactly as described. It's nice to be able to find and buy the latex pacifiers at a reasonable price. My daughter prefers this pacifier to others.

I was pleasantly surprised by the freshness and quality of Community Coffee's Cafe Special. Nice aroma when you open the bag, and brews up well either drip method or French Press. The medium-dark roast is so typical of the New Orleans type with just a hint of acidity and none of the bitterness you find in the chicory blends. You really can tell that it is 100% arabica beans, not Colombian or a blend. Very good quality!
I received this cute comfy looking chair ,only to open the box to a strong toxic odor! I am returning it.
Great tasting honey! Mine is a very solid consitency, but it is the dead of winter.
because it was an excellent buy, the product arrived on time and in excellent condition also helped us move our children to all the places we go

I did not get the design pictured but my daughter still loves it. It is well made and has survived her dragging it all over the place. It is very easy to wash and the pillow is removable. It is a little thin if that is a concern for you I recommend getting another mat to go under it. It rolls up very easily so easy to travel with.

I bought these because I have trigger points in my legs that have made it impossible for me to use tampons or conventional pads. These looked like a great option, but instead of the soft seams in the photo above, they are the multicolored thread shown for different vimse imse pads. The seams are hard and uncomfortable,  and hit right against where my trigger points are. I bought these hoping to make it so that I could walk with reasonable comfort, and they have not delivered.
The coloring is great and it is made really well, but the only reason I didn't give it 5 starts was the edges were a little ruff when it was really cold. It didn't hurt the babies mouth though.
It was a lot smaller then expected. I do not think is big enough for a toddler like they show in the picture.

These are wonderful blankets and they serve many purposes in our home. They are large enough to swaddle a baby - even a 7 month old! They are thin enough (and breathable) that I don't mind covering my child with it at night. I also use them to cover his legs when out strolling around. This is light enough that using it as a cover for breastfeeding is also a plus! I just tie two ends around my neck and it doesn't make either of us sweat, even on hot days. I will be purchasing more of this product.

bought this for my better half and ended up consuming most of it myself... . although a bit of a small serving, it is smooth, rich, and chocolatey. great for a cool evening. i wish it came in a 12 oz size. i will definitely repeat purchase of the milka.

I lived in japan for 5 years, this is the stuff I remember. Flavor is amazing, not as good as a corner rmane shop in japan, but 10x better than the maruchan style garbage we eat in the states. Cut up a bunch of thin sliced chicken or beef, brown the meat, then leave it in the broth to soak up the flavor, its delicious. I am so glad we can finally get this online.

I use these everyday with no issues.  I've made both coffee and tea with these.  The build quality seems nice.  My eco-brew mesh came apart after a while so I decided to try these. We'll see if these stand the test of time.  The price can't be beat for the two pack.

I'll slit this into Pros and Cons.

Pros: The flavor is great. There's even two flavors you can't get even with the assorted Swedish Fish. Blue Raspberry, and Grape. They taste great, and I wish I could get them included with the Assorted fish. It's interesting to see the different shapes they gave the fish too, adds some variety to the same old shape. The whole bag lasted me about 2 weeks. (Assorted lasted 1 week, I'll explain in the Cons)

Cons: The consistency is way off. They are very chewy. Not like the chewy you usually get from Swedish fish, but more like chewing very sticky caramel. They stick to your teeth, and its really annoying, even if they do taste good. I've done a side by side comparison with the Assorted Fish, and the Aqua Life seem to be thinner, and the consistency is harder. The Assorted, and regular Red fish, while still a bit chewy and sticky, are much softer, and barely stick to your teeth. And because they are easier to bite, they seem to taste almost better. Also the non-Aqua Life dissolve faster just from being in your mouth, which I think is why they taste better, since the flavor spreads throughout your saliva. Personally, I don't think I'll be getting them again, the Assorted and regular are just much more enjoyable to eat.(this is why the Assorted 5lb bag lasted 1 week.) It's a shame really, I was hoping these would be really good.

My dad loves these meat and cheese bundles. I purchased him one for Christmas and he loved it. He especially liked the sausage. I snuck in a few bites to see how the product rated and I found the cheese to be extremely plastic-y in texture. The crackers and mustard were not really huge standouts either. What was nice was the cutting board and cheese knife that came packaged. It was a nice touch and certainly classed this gift up.  My dad had no complaints about the gift so I would recommend it!
This stroller is great but the cup holder is needed as well as more space for the diaper bag. My granddaughters will use it for years.

We modified our cloth diaper pail to take filters and these work great.  They work so well that once removed they smell bad on one side but not the other.  The mesh material continues to allow the free air movement necessary for the diaper pail.  We f replace the filters about once a month sometimes longer.  When replaced, they don't usually seem like they aren't performing anymore, but  new ones seem to perform better.
My husband & I and are not finding out the sex of our baby so we refer to the baby as Baby \\"B\\"..I fell in love when I saw on the site and even more when it landed on my door step. We love it!
This is a great sheet, neutral color, extremely comfortable for my baby to sleep on. It also washes nicely. I definitely recommend this item, its a classic.

We ordered these buckeyes to add to our hospitality hotel bag for a wedding we were hosting in Ohio. Besides the obivious Buckeye connection, they are a perfect addition to any treat basket! My only warning is that they can melt, so dont leave them anywhere warm. Enjoy the sticky delicious chocolate peanutbutter yummy treats!!!
Toast it for 1 min. perfect breakfast. I wish it was a little less sweet though.
I ordered these thinking they were the shields that go on a breast pump horn. I was wrong. Not sure what to do with these now.
Loved the looks and all but biggest problem is its belt. Don't know what material have used. Very hard for the babies.
Again this is not available in my area, if it is, I have not located it.  Thanks Amazon for providing all the things you provide.

I got it from a friend, brand new, never used, and it performed well until 2 snaps ( on one side)  broke. It have been used for a month, and can not use it until I figure it out how to fix it. I emailed the company, never got an answer.
Best Coffee on Amazon! This stuff is amazing! I love it and drink it every day:)
This is so easy to use and the taste is great.  I hope that Duncan Hines will come out with other flavors like strawberry, Orange, Mint and so on.  While they are a bit pricey, they are so worth it.

My baby girl started teething around four months old and drooled like crazy. She would develop little rashes on her chest because the drool would soak through her bibs and down through her clothing to her skin. I searched high and low at our local stores for bibs but could only find the regular bibs (not water proof) or the ones I found were huge - much more for like a toddlers size. Anyhow, when I found these I thought I'd give them a try. Though they are somewhat plain they are great. They have a plastic backing so that drool, milk, or food can not penetrate and get onto clothing or soak through to skin. Since we started using these my daughters skin stays dry and we are not constantly changing her clothes throughout the day. She is now 7 months old and we couldn't be more pleased with them. One suggestion - for longer life, do not tumble dry. Hand wash after each use and lay flat to air dry. The dryer may burn/melt the backing or actually shrink the bib. I would recommend these to all.
Kids love these and they are good for them!  They think of these as a treat so I'm a very happy momma!

I have twins and I wanted to use this to carry them around together but it is way too difficult to do that and time consuming. With one baby, I might see things  differently, but id rather use two ergo carriers (or similar) for my twins.
This good quality, fragrant Piment d'Espelette is a nice complement to my kitchen and my Basque cookbooks. I like that it's packaged in glass, too.
I know this is supposed to be safer because it is foam, but my children find it hard to write on.
This helped us get through the tough nights when neither my husband or I could leave him alone as we almost lost him during childbirth!

I bought this when we moved to our new apartment because I didn't want to trip over a huge high chair.  My daughter loves this seat and can't wait to sit in it for her meals.  It comes with 2 trays so when one snap out tray is being washed you can use the main tray for feeding.  It also comes with a cover so that the trays don't get dusty or gross when not in use.  The seat also has 3 height settings so that you can adjust it to get baby closer to the table so s/he can eat off the table.  The seat back also folds for compact storage.  It is also very lightweight and you can move it while holding baby too.  This chair is VERY easy to attach to the chair and when both straps are tightened the seat stays very snug.  There is no need for non slip rubber feet with how tight the straps stay.  This chair is a best bet for small spaces or when baby gets too big for a high chair.

This is the only sleep sack I could find that fits my nearly-two-year-old daughter with room to spare. She is big for her age, but still sleeps without a heavy blanket, so I needed something to keep her warm at night. It is soft and roomy.
i ordered the sushi one and i got the burger one >:( i was really looking foward to this alot
Great product. Non-gmo. Mix it in to plain organic nonfat yogurt with some local honey yum - great peanut butter taste without the fat!

As a long time grind your own beans and manual pour drip coffee maker, the #6 filters are essential to prevent over filling the #4 filters and creating grounds in your coffee. The Melitta #6 is not available in the stores in my area, only the #4 filters. This is the second order of a box of 10 packs with 40 filters each for about $25 total. Shipping very fast with Amazon and filters are good quality and work fine. Five stars for quality and service at Amazon. I am a frequent customer and very satisfied with the product and service.

I'm a great believer in soaking a fruitcake.  A little brandy, rum, or bourbon soak provides excellence.  I normally don't imbibe, but the fruitcake tossers don't know what they're missing.  Gramma's is gooey good.

I bought 2 of these (one for each grandparent's house) because I thought it was similar to the Pack'n'Play Rittenhouse minus the cuddle cove rocking seat that I had. According to the pictures, I thought this P'n'P had the vibration feature because it looks just like the one I have but it doesn't! My son loves the vibration feature so this was a complete let down. And the other letdown is the changing station which sags with the weight of the baby in it. Please fix this issue Graco and make the entertainment station the same in all your Pack'n'Plays!!!
Good stuff, flavor is not overpowering. The smell is a bit off, that's why it did not get 5 stars.
Honestly, one of the best natural candies ive tasted. I will be recommending this to friends and family
This carrier is great.  I used it when I had a lot to get done around the house because it kept my hands free.  My husband really liked it because it was one size fits all so we only had to buy one.

I got this with the chocolate mocha coffee house shake free as part of my Bzzagent.com campaign. Let me say vanilla is not my thing, and so I didn't care for this one as much as the chocolate mocha. It doesn't have a bitter taste though, and if vanilla is your cup of tea, or in this case cup of coffee, give this a try. It has protein & caffeine to get you through your morning. Especially great if you are busy & on the go early in the AM.
I was very happy with this purchase. These are amazing cherries! However, because of other issues with using Amazon, I will not be ordering these again.

Having grown up in France thanks to my Francophile \\"mamma\\". We had a cook named Pepita. She was French Basque. She introduced me to olive oil.
Every infused oil is totally delicious. My favorite is the basil. On pasta just plain, nothing else but some fresh grated Parmesan. Simple, elegant and good.

Theses are awesome.  The only thing I bought in order to make baby my own baby food.  No need for fancy baby food makers, just steam on the stove, toss in the food processor then scoop into these.  Very easy, cubes slide right out.  Product was exactly as described and arrived on time.

I bought these because they are portioned in 100 calorie sized packs.  There doesnt seem like a lot in each one but it does keep me full until mealtime which is what i wanted. They are perfect to throw in your purse for times when you can't get to a meal on time or just need a pick me up. The flavor isnt overpowering either. It is a light cinnamon taste. Delicious. I wish I could find them locally.

Like all things Diono this is a good product at a good price. Build quality is above average as is utility. We have the unit next to a rear-facing Radian and our son can reach into the bin fairly easily. The cup holders can't be accessed when the car seat is rear-facing. They are the only part of the product that seems like a throw-away feature - added to check a box but not really intended to be used.

Overall it's a good product.

Not only did this arrive UNdamaged (always fishy when ordering a liquid!), but the seller was FABULOUS!  They included a sample pack of tea that they make and the nicest note as well!  I really just had a GREAT feeling when I read the note.......and after ordering LOTS AND LOTS of things from Amazon, it feels like a factory sometimes.  THIS was anything but!!!!  I would absolutely order again from this seller!

I hope this has all the nutrients it claims it does, cause I am so happy with the taste. Its great with fruit! I use almond milk, ice, whey protein chocolate with any fruit.  The smoothie shake is delicious when I mix assorted fruits to sweeten it up.  I am hoping it will keep my immune system strong

I would recommend this product to anyone that owns a Keurig K cup brewer.  It performs well, is half the price of the same or similar refillable K cups at places like Bed Bath and Beyond and I no longer have to buy expensive K cups and can use my own coffee.
I got them and wasn't sure what to expect. They ended up tasting amazing! You can taste the coconut and it doesn't taste synthetic at all. It's nice and crispy too! Will get more soon!
This product cooks well and stays firm in soups/stews/salads.  I appreciate the nutrition profile and use this pasta often.
this stuff is great for a packaged gravy just add a little pepper and it is really good country gravy
Arrived in cardboard box and not the container pictured. I wanted to display them on my desk and now have to buy a container to put them in,

My grand-son was 2 months old when I bought this for him and he immediately fell in love with it.  It's the first thing he could focus on and it entertains him a lot.  He kicks and throws his arms around when the mobile moves so he gets some good exercise with this item.  The music/sounds are soothing, there is a lot of color, and the movement of the animals is a lot for a baby to watch. Also, the remote allows you to "renew" play so that the 20 minutes of uninterrupted play can be extended without entering his line of sight and distracting him.  There is no boredom when we engage this mobile!

This little piggy is a great item!  She's cute in her tutu and the painted face is very sweet.  The package is worth saving too! Item is listed as a baby item but my four year old grand daughter was thrilled with it!  A good value.

I'm the worse baker ever.  as a kid, I once made cake and where it said "egg whites" I used the shells.  my baking skills haven't improved since.  I've tried DIY pizza in the past and the animals outside love it as that's where it gets tossed.  so I was leery about trying this.  add half cup of water and salt, what could go wrong?  despite everything I did wrong, the pizza came out perfect tasting.  it sticks together very fast so I had it stuck to my fingers.  when I got it off I didn't have a rolling pin so I used a wine bottle and it stuck to that.  I finally flattened it out with my oiled hands.  I used my pizza scoop and it stuck to that and was a pile on my hot pizza stone.  so I quickly pressed it out in some bizarre shape and cooked it.  I was very pleased with my creative mess.  I will be buying more of this stuff and in some century will learn how to make a perfect pizza.
The ducks are always popular.  They are enjoyed, but I didn't order enough to give them out, so I will use them at a later date. They are fun to sort and play with, and very durable.

This product is excellent! It smooths on nice and easy, it almost seems to melt on your skin. Which is very important when your nipples are sore and tender. A little bit goes a very long way so the price is good.
The seeds are tasty and bigger than average. Great quality product. Size wise, it is a medium size and priced very reasonably. It is a great and healthy buy.
Fast shipment, great quality and a great price. The local grocer wants about $6 for a 4oz bag, which would equate to over $90 for the 4lb bag here.

This mix makes really tasty pancakes. I used it while camping and cooked over an electric griddle and they came out perfect. I like that you just add water and shake - however some of the batter did get stuck in the corners, so I suggest adding half the water, shaking then adding the rest of the water to make it the right consistency.
About 1/3 of the almonds in the pkg were broken into pieces.  The almonds were supposed to be part of a gift basket.  They are going into the garbage instead.

I first discovered this wonderful little vinegar about 3 years ago, and have used it for green salads ever since.  It is rich in a sprightly, \\"red-winey\\" way, full of zesty aromas reminiscent of the Corinthian grape, used to make it, a grape that is renowned for some of Greece's greatest wines.  Lettuces, especially Belgian endive, radicchio, the delicate, pale yellow hearts of bitter escarole and \\"baby\\" romaine are enlivened and somehow magically made sweeter with a vinaigrette of extra virgin olive oil, Terra Medi Red Wine Vinegar, a flakey sea salt (such as Maldon), freshly ground black pepper, and ultra-thin slices of red onion. Toss in slivers of Bosc pear and enjoy with some torn chunks of crusty bread to soak up the dressing.....Who needs croutons?  Enjoy!  Oopa!

I love my coffee in the morning.  The Dark Roast and the Espresso are my favorites.  I am a coffee fan, and have had blue mountain, Cuban, Arabic, and Costa Rican coffees, as well as others. I have had a Flavia and other coffee makers.  The Senseo are quick, easy and as clean as you can get, with a very good coffee.  Little or no waste. Cost per pod runs around .25 cents. Travel mugs take about four pods. A cup of coffee is two pods. The pods are available in stores, but easier shipped by the sleeve, especially when on sale.
Great salts, wonderful presentation. Interesting to look at, taste, and discuss with guests while entertaining. Very high end condiments.

I hadn't tried canned clams or oysters in years because I remeber sort of liking them and also eating sand or shell or something, so I was afraid to try them even though they supposedly are healthy to eat.

So, I summoned up the courage to try canned oysters again and bought a can of these, and I was pleasantly surprised. I'm not a huge oyster fan, but I could see buying these again sometime. So, the guy who doesn't like oysters a lot liked these, and that's saying something.

These swaddlers have been a lifesaver with my last two babies. I didn't have them with my first, and they really make all the difference! I have babies that love to be swaddled and require it to sleep well. Just using a blanket is fine when they are newborns, but as they get older and stronger, they break out of the swaddle a lot more easily. This means I have to get up in the middle of the night and rewrap, which ends up really waking them up. Any new mom knows that sleep is a precious commodity! The Velcro is nice and strong, just make sure you stick it down when washing them to avoid gunking it up! My only complaint is that it can be a little hard to get everything wrapped and velcroed correctly with a squirming baby, so it might take just a little practice. Overall, can't live without my swaddlers!
Tastes great, is easily carried during training, satisfies during workouts.  The only drawback is the price.  I will buy it again.
The rain cover does not fit the SnugRider Infant Car Seat Carrier Stroller Frame and the monkey is not washable.

We used these with our son and they were the only thing that kept him swaddled all night.  We tried all the other swaddles and he still managed to kick himself free of them - but not these.  Because of their use, our son was sleeping through the night at eight weeks.  We are excited to use these for our baby girl, who is due any day.  Highly recommend these to anyone looking for a swaddle - we have given these as a gift for EVERY baby shower we have been invited to since the birth of our son and we honestly cannot say enough good things about them.  Worth every penny, work as described, and wash beautifully.
Great sturdy gates but the entrance is a bit narrow and they can be hard to put into smaller door openings. I now have two and really like them.

Honestly I'm not a fan. The material is thick stiff and hard to work with. It's not easy to adjust and I'm probably going to sell it since I've washed it and probably can't return it. Not for me. Pretty colors and pattern though

First tasted real Spanish chorizo in a local bodega.  When we asked where could get some, the owner said that, as far as he knew, none was available locally.  Amazon came through again.  The chorizo is smooth, mild, and flavorful.  Sliced very thin it is the perfect companion to a good Manchego.  We strongly recommend it.
I love the temperature reading on the screen but I'm returning this today!  What's the point of a video monitor if you have to search for the baby thru a grey grainy mess?

My little guy was crazy nuts about this playmat.  It was handy and compact. We love to use this when we go out to the camper and makes changing diapers easy as the top unsnaps so you dont have to move your little bundle of joy somewhere else to change.  It also is easy to clean up any spills on it. There are plenty of different spots to put the different toys at to keep it interesting. The music was nice but my little guy was more interested in what was dangling!

They arrived promptly. I'm completely satisfied with these. I have the K45 and they fit great. ((Box says they do not fit some of the "B"models.)). I too felt the kcups are rather expensive/overpriced, ( thou we do love the Barista Prima!) and I feel like I'm saving some money this way:-). Makes a good cuppa java.

Last year I had another Tur-duc-ken and it was great.  This year our market brought these in and I will never buy one again. The instructions state to cook 3 hours and 40 minutes frozen.  It took over 2 hours more than that (which I could have lived with) and when we took it out it was so dry on the outside and still raw in the middle. Trust me my market has heard several complaints this year.  T from PA
I use this everyday when I go for a walk with my son. It's easy to put on the stroller and it folds very easily

As always, Amazon prices beat any other place. Loved the 1 lb bags of this and great price on it. Don't know what we would do without Amazon to give us these great offers..especially on Subscribe and Save..wow!
Switched my 7 month old to these level 3 nipples a couple weeks ago. They are working great?

We've been using this baby gate for the last month and it's good for the price. Our little one is at the stage where she wants to go around and get into everything and the one gate we had was not enough. This helps keep her in the area that we are in without her disappearing and getting into something she shouldn't be... The gate is simple to put up but you may want to check the measurements as the other gate we have had two add-on attachments while this had one. Additionally, when your little one starts getting bigger you may have to use the secondary lock on this gate which is hard to undo with one hand. Our other gate you could maneuver with one had which is a plus when you are carrying the child in one of your arms. If you don't have it locked you can easily get in an out but our little one is starting to understand how to open it when it's not locked and she's only 18 months.

Pros:
* Low Price
* Sturdy
* Easy Set Up

Cons:
* When locked hard to open with one hand

We also use this to keep our dog on the side of the house where he is supposed to be. Check the size you need as there is only one attachment. We can't put this to the opening of the kitchen because it's not large enough but it works in the other area we need to block off.
rubber balls pinch the hairs on the back of my neck and daughter wasn't so interested anyway.  Wanted to love it...  Too expensive.
I really like it, but it wasn't as big as I thought it would be. But I do like it.

My baby never slept well in the pack n play with the crappy folding mattress.  Traveling was a nightmare for everyone. I wish I had bought this mattress sooner. On the first night, he slept wonderfully.  I will never travel with my pack n play again without this mattress. It's a must-have for our family.
24 glass bottles of the best root beer ever made arrived well packed and in perfect condition.  I only wish other food items from Dog n Suds were available for purchase on-line, like coney sauce.
strong, hearty, delicious tea with just one teabag, just right fo a cup.  I definitely intend to purchase this product again.
This product is very good. Have not used real sugar for a long, long time. Thank you
I've been using this brand of tapioca for years. It's sometimes hard to find in local stores, so I buy several at a time online. It's a family favorite.

The base is for our granddaughter, who is 5 weeks old today.  The Orbit car seat and bases are awesome.  We don't have to switch car seats and go through the hassle of reattaching the car seat.  It is also very easy to put the baby in the car seat because it swivels.  We also feel that this is the safest car seat/stroller on the market.  It is pricey, but how can one put a price on a baby's safety?  I strongly encourage any parent to use the Orbit!

The sauce tastes like it looks. Delicious!

Pros
- Hot
- Spicy
- Cheaper than buying 8oz bottles

Cons
- Need more
This is my favorite tea.  I am not a connoisseur, but I do drink a lot of tea.  It has a wonderful flavor and smell.

[[ASIN:B001UDLZ9G Pitted Dried Plums by Kirkland Signature & Sunsweet Gold Label - 50 Oz.]]This is just what I was looking for.  This quanity at a good price.  When I steam up a batch of prunes, I like to do this size and the price is better than buying a bunch of small packages.  Prunes are tasty and soft.  Wish I could buy them in my city.

My infant got a cold and I wanted to find something to help relieve his congestion. All the mucus buildup that wasn't easily making its way out was interfering with nursing and his sleep at night. A friend of mine highly recommended the NoseFrida aspirator. After reading the many great reviews and comparing that aspirator and Baby Comfy Nose, I decided to go with the latter, solely because of the fact that I don't have to commit to buying filters, which seems a lot more cost effective. I must report that the Baby Comfy Nose did not help relieve my baby's congestion. Yes, it sucked some boogies out of his nose, but those were close enough to the surface to easily come out on their own after I sprayed his nose with saline spray. All the mucus that was inside remained there and continued to bother my little guy. I don't know if perhaps I'm not sucking the air hard enough but I'm doing it to a point where my head starts to hurt, so this shouldn't be it. Also, when I called their customer service number about a question I had, the representative was extremely rude and condescending (way to treat your customers!). I am going to try the NoseFrida, after all that aspirator has over a thousand reviews, whereas this one only a couple hundreds (many of which might be questionable per one reviewer's feedback that the company was offering free aspirators in an exchange for five star reviews on Amazon). If I ordered this product to suck out boogies, I may have been happy with it but, since I got this for sucking out mucus to relieve congestion and it did not help a bit, I do not recommend it.
I love these bottles . My only complaint is that the silicone stretched out pretty quickly even though I don't take it off frequently.
Delicious and reasonably healthy for cerial.  At 5 for $35 though you've got to be kidding.  It's 1/2 that in the supermarket.
This glass noodle is great. I lov the broth and the texture of the noodle. No wonder why its almost out of stock when I bought it

I bought this mattress for a Delta Portable Crib.  Do not expect an incredible comfortable mattress, it is just what you paid for... My baby likes it, but I would not recommend this mattress for the primary baby crib... It is great for taking short naps... And to clarify, it is too small for a Graco Pack and Play...
This is part of our taste testing. The consensus is 'We need more'. The Taste is Great. Excellent Texture.

I wasn't sure how it worked because there was no picture showing it being used with a child on Amazon. I was a little nervous when it came to put it around my Childs neck, but gave it a try. It works really well for my little girl when she is asleep, but if she isn't asleep it drives her crazy because she can't get to her hands, and her pacifier doesn't stay in good with it on. So I give it 3 stars, it works under certain circumstances.
The spoon always tips and falls out of the baby's bowl...food goes everywhere. Opt for something with a lighter handle.

Few things to be weary of:

If your baby can stand, or likes to wiggle, or move at all... be careful because it can tip over easily!

If your tub doesn't have a flat surface... be careful because the suction cups won't stick!

Yes, they do include this little sticky things that you can stick in your tub, but I don't want to permanently have these in my tub.

So basically if you have a small, sitting up, immobile baby, this thing is for you.

Because of the high price of the Baby Bjorn carriers, and the Miracle ($120 at Amazon, $180 elsewhere) in particular, we vigorously looked for alternatives. We tried on about 9 other models and purchased a Chicco Ultrasoft Magic - Rattania ($69). The Chicco was okay but in the end we returned it and went with the Bjorn Miracle, which simply is awesome and well worth the price (difference).

STYLES
Many models only strap over the shoulder and under the arm pit, connecting again in the lower front. We found these to be very uncomfortable for our backs and not worth considering.

Then there are \\"cross-over\\" designs forming an \\"X\\" in the back, like the Original Baby Bjorn and others. These are better, but still not comfortably supportive for any length of time. If you're going to buy a carrier you want one you can wear for extended periods when necessary (think shopping or watching a parade).

The most comfortable and supportive models are those that have both a \\"belt\\" and a connection *in the back* between the belt and the shoulder straps. This connection distributes the weight from the shoulder harness to the waist belt for much better support and less back strain. Both Chicco Ultrasoft Magic - Rattania and Baby Bjorn Miracle have this design.

COMPARISON
- The belt for the Chicco Magic straps around stomach level rather than waist. This puts more strain and makes it less comfortable for longer periods of time (more than 15 minutes or so). The Bjorn Miracle straps around the waist - and it very adjustable to fit the waist of different size people. The comfort and support difference is huge. The baby feels a natural part of my body weight when in the Bjorn Miracle.
- The straps on the Chicco Magic are also ridged and difficult to adjust. The Bjorn Miracle straps slide easily when needed but hold firm otherwise. Bjorn Miracle has 4 straps, all easily adjusted, the baby \\"compartment\\" strap to maximize baby's comfort, and 3 levels of \\"snaps\\" at carrier waist, at baby's midsection, and at baby's shoulders. They are easy to put on and off without help and quick to use.
- The Bjorn Miracle shape supports inward-facing baby's head well but is cut in a way to allow the baby to look side-to-side and not feel smothered. Many other models didn't allow for this.
- Our baby was VERY comfortable from the first time in the Bjorn Miracle. Less so in the Chicco (but okay), and not at all in many of the models we tried in the store.

We wanted to avoid the price of the Miracle, but in the end we chose it as the best for a comfortable carrier. There's no comparison between the quality of the Miracle and all of the other models we examined. A more expensive model we'll actually use is a better bargain than a less expensive one we give up on due to discomfort.

And the blood orange Dry Soda doesn't taste like blood orange San Pellegrino.  They aren't meant to.  If you want something sweet but not as cloying as normal sugared drinks, then these are great. These are just fine for my purposes.  I use a lot of mushrooms in my from-scratch cooking.  These, from Mushroom House thru Amazon.com are a wonderful bargain. Recently (I think it was their cookie show) ATK voted Lurpak as the #1 butter in their tasting. And unlike Rach Ray who doesn't think twice about recommending the most ludicrous ingredients that cost the most, I have tremendous respect for Chris Kimball because he actually knows what he's talking about.

The taste of Lurpak is very similar to Land O' Lakes, which IMO is truly the standard of butter. I have only tried it a few times since I do not have any recipes that call for butter, but I wanted to try Lurpak since it was so highly recommended. On a piece of toast it is fine and it melts very well.

It comes in a little block and it is extremely firm (the sign of all fine butter).

I am not certain if I will purchase this again since I was not overly impressed with Lurpak and because Land O' Lakes comes packaged much nicer and is a lot less. Nevertheless, Lurpak is still a good butter to try and to use if you have any recipes that call for a high-fat content butter.

Anyway I found this at Shop Rite (don't you dare buy this online unless you enjoy paying more than twice the price - it is stold at all grocery stores) for two ninety-nine for 8 ounces (which is the size of 2 Land O' Lakes sticks).

Remember, you don't have to spend a lot to be a great cook.

I had a horrible, terrible taste in my mouth 2 days after eating this. I thought it was because of some junk food I got from McD's or Dunkin, but no ... it was this pesto; because I ate some more of it a day and half ago, and I'm experiencing the same disgusting, gross metallic puke taste. It's too bad, because I loved the way it tasted so much that I bought more. I had some chicken, bowties, Pesto alla Genovese, and some TJ parmesean the 1st time; some spaghetti, walnuts Pesto alla Genovese, and parmesean the 2nd time. I've eaten the parmesan many times on many different things. So, the only new product, both times, is this pesto. Looking at the ingredients and Googling, I believe it gave me something called "Pine Mouth" or "Pine Nut Syndrome." The complaints associated with this condition point to "cheap" pine nuts. I have no idea what that means or if that's the case here. The bottle says this is a "Product of Italy." I never had a problem with pine nuts before, but the description of a overwhelming horrible taste and nausea are exactly the same as what I've experienced twice after eating different bottles of this product. I've never heard of "Pine Mouth" before, and I'm not saying it will affect anyone else like this. But it was a terrible experience for me. It tasted fine going in, but a day and a half later -- yuck. UPDATE: I accidentally had some pesto on a turkey sandwich, from an Italian restaurant, after I posted this review. I had the same delayed belly pains. So, I shouldn't target this product alone -- maybe other people will have no problem with it. Something has happened to the pine nut industry -- allegedly a Chinese species being mixed in with other types, causing "pine nut syndrome." I go to the store and see pasta with pesto, and I think, "That'll taste great." But then I remember -- no, never again pine nuts and pesto. All I can say that I personally felt bad after eating a jar of this brand, period.

I currently owned the Sleepy Wrap carrier before purchasing this product. My newborn baby absolutely loved the Sleepy Wrap, but it was kind of a pain getting her in and out of it as well as breastfeeding (I'm large breasted). I decided to give this carrier a try as it looked like it was easy to get her in and out and would make for more discreet breastfeeding (plus I am a fan of Dr. Sears). Anyway, it took forever to get this product in the mail (2 weeks), however, delivery aside, the product is subpar, especially for the price. My baby can only stand being in this carrier if I am constantly walking around. If I am at a sit still she hates it, whereas with the Sleepy Wrap, she falls asleep immediately sitting, standing, walking, whatever.     Anyway, I guess there is no such thing as a perfect carrier, and my daughter prefers the Sleepy Wrap carrier over this one. She is only 7 weeks old, so time will tell. I will hold onto this carrier and try again in the future, but for now, to me, it's definitely not worth the money.

After years of eating oatmeal for breakfast, I got burnt out. Since I know there are lots of warm grain cereals out there in this big ol' world and I do love me a hot bowl of grains in the morning, I decided to shop around for something different. That's when I stumbled upon this gluten-free hot cereal. I'm not celiac, nor do I have any kind of gluten-intolerance but I liked the ingredient list of this cereal (brown rice, corn, buckwheat, white sorghum). The taste reminds me of [[ASIN:B004VLSWFY Bob's Red Mill Organic Kamut Grain, 24-Ounce (Pack of 4)]] which is to say it reminds me of grits--both in texture and taste. I like that it's not sweet on it's own and could be served savory or sweet. I personally enjoy it with chia seeds, a spoonful of nut butter and a sliced up banana (very much like I eat my oatmeal). All in all, great product. There again, Bob's Red Mill never seems to fail me!

One more note: I cook mine per the package instructions (10 minutes on low for 1/4 cup), but I also like to let it sit for 2-3 minutes after the 10 minutes are up. The texture becomes thicker and it's easier to scrape out of the pan. Obviously if thicker cereals don't appeal to you, I'd use a bit more water (1 full cup + a bit more) whilst cooking.

I don't bother with other caramel sauces anymore, even if it means going without :)

My daughter refused to hold her bottle even at 9 months. Now she will because of these handles. They fit perfectly on the Avent Classic Bottles and also in her little hands.

I usually prefer my own homemade version of commercial gluten free products, but not so with this mix. It is by far the best GF yellow cake mix I've eaten. I haven't found a recipe yet that I like better. Even my great-aunt, who is a tremendous baker, loves it.

Love these diapers. They are so easy to put on (though my baby hasn't figured how to do undo the velcro yet...so ask me again in a couple months!). I like that I can put prefolds, snap inserts, and disposable inserts in them, they all work well.  These diapers happen to fit my baby very well.. (would say the "BEST" shell is the one that fits your baby the best, there really isn't an overall "BEST")

They are soooo nasty in a good way lol good for pranks and family fun time. I got a great laughter out of them. You might a handy dandy bag near you they are pretty disgusting but thats exactly what you are looking for, at least this time around l

This popcorn is yummy! Pops well in my counter top Elite popcorn machine. not many kernels undone. I am cooking with peanut oil as coconut oil leaves too sweet of a taste.  Update - 10/17/2015 - This product did not stay fresh long enough to use it. Made some last night and it tasted stale. Made it exactly like last time except this time it was chewy, not crunchy.

This is a very tasty medium roast coffee.  The flavor is fairly rich but not as dynamic as coffee-house coffee.  Basically, this is what you would expect to get from a good hotel but not the quality you can expect from Pete's or a specialty brew at Starbucks.  The grind is fairly course so you will need to use more than what you would burn through from a major coffee house.  Overall this is a satisfying good reasonably fresh mix that is worth a try if you are not expecting coffee-house blends.

I got this for when my daughter and my new grand baby come to stay with us. it is easy to put together and well built, plus it is so cute. I have a feeling this will last into out next new grand baby.
Sweetened Wheatfuls taste as good as Shredded Wheat brand, but cost a lot less and are healthier.  No artificial ingredients.  But the taste is still there.  Great way to get fiber in the kids.

Being Italian I am very picky about my porcini's for pasta sauce.  I have used many brands but the mushrooms get lighter and lighter in color and the porcini taste is weak.  Alissi's porcini's are perfect in every sense of the word.  Great Porcini taste, consistency and a great price.  My gravy (pasta sauce, my mother always called it gravy not sauce) tastes like my mother's again.  Thank you Alissi
These are cute, and seem comfortable.  They are a bit wider than I think they need to be though...so it doesn't leave a lot of room for our son to move his head...but he doesn't seem to mind.
The peach is not there for my pallet. BUT the spiced part is excellent. Disappointed that it seems to have NO peach flavor at all....Still on the hunt for a great peach tea...

I make all my own salad dressings and my favorite is this one.  Therefore, I always keep it in stock and the price for this can't be beat.  Just compare a store individual packet and see for yourself!

My husband and I purchased three of these units to use as an added level of security throughout our home. The first downside we noticed (compared to the Sony brand we had used previously) was that you couldn't pair multiple "baby" units to a single "parent" unit. However, we set them up anyway with two of the "baby" units downstairs near our entry doors and two of the "parent" units in our master bedroom. We also had the third set up in our son's room to use as a true baby monitor.

These units didn't have the constant (and surprising) loud static noise we had experienced with our Sony monitors. However, they would often "unlink" and lose connection at random times throughout the day and night. This essentially made them useless to us as they weren't helpful if they weren't linked! We ended up returning the two "security" units and keeping only the one in our son's room. The one being used as a baby monitor is great and doesn't seem to ever unlink or lose its connection now that it is the ONLY one in the house. I really appreciate the "talk" feature so I can talk to my son when needed rather than go into his room.

I bought these as burp cloths for my newborn son. They are cute, well-made, and super-soft. However, the prints were not at all what I was expecting, and I was never given an option to choose. I received: 4 dino prints (cute!), 4 striped prints (also cute, but much more pink than I would have liked), and 4 bubble-gum pink ice cream cone prints (not gentle at all on the eyes, and I would be embarrassed to use these in public for my little boy). I don't mind that colors vary, but at least an option between masculine or feminine colors/prints would have been nice.... or a gender-neutral assortment.
Loved this thick padded knee rest. It makes kneeling at the tub to wash baby so much more comfortable. A fun design too.

Disappointed by the product. The pillow is inflatable like a beach ball and clear. The picture makes it seem as if there is a creamy color on the inside of the swing. It's the same color as the outside. There is no pink in the pillow. Decided it was not a good value and returned it.

I purchased this baby gate for the main staircase of my house, so it had to be relatively attractive. The construction is solid, the item was exactly as shown in the ad, but the hardware seemed a little cheap, hence 4/5 stars.

I have another gate by Munchkin, and had the same issue with the hardware. Baby gates are notoriously awful to install unless you're hard-mounting them, and I didn't want holes in my walls, so I don't blame Munchkin.

Would purchase again

The top of these S. F. Bay coffee cups appear to be K-Cups, cause the foil top looks exactly like every other brand of K-cup for Keurig makers.  The rest of it is extremely unique, different than any other type of K-cup,  There's no plastic below the top ring (where the foil attaches), just filter.  I was really concerned that the puncture tip on the Keurig would penetrate the filter, and there's be coffee grounds everywhere.  Not the case, the SF Bay cup is 1 cm shorter than other K-cups - the filter doesn't reach the puncture tip.  The only issue I had with the coffee is the taste.  It's very strong, and too dark for a French Roast, even set with 10 oz of water.  I've never had \\"Non-Keurig\\" S F Bay French Roast, so I can't comment on whether it's similar or not.  IMO it's just stronger than any other type of decaf coffee I've tried in the U.S, also has a burned smell to it.  I really like the cup packaging, a great saver for our environment.
As a fan of GoLean Crunch cereal, I wanted to try GoLean Crisp.  It is delicious and plan on ordering it again.
My daughter loves this backpack! We were so happy with it we ordered the same one for her cousin. It's the perfect size for 2-5 year olds.
Love this flavor! I find it too strong if you mix with 8oz of water - I use one packet for 32oz and think it's perfect! Will definitely re-order!

OK so I LOVE Quinoa... much to my 8yr old's dismay but for me, it beats rice anyway. Secondly, I love Bob's Red Mill... (I don't like their gluten free muesli as much though)
Anyway I have to say that this is the BEST Quinoa I have tried. I have tried all sorts of 'brands'. Trader Joe's (One of my favorite stores by the way, so nothing againsnt TJ's) but their Quinoa just doesn't compare. There are some other brands I've seen at Kroger, Publix etc (can't remember the names) and still none comes close! I just got two packets from the Whole Foods store last night and it was a whopping $17! SO really $18 and some change with tax, UGH. No wonder my friends call it 'The Whole Paycheck Store'

So going forward, I shall be buying here- yes the price is still up there but any time I can save a couple cents I'm happy.
I usually add the Trader Joe's Asparagus, Onions and Mushroom vegetable medley and oh so delish! I use cultured ghee, some garlic, tomatoes and I'm good!

Enjoy!

Thought this was discontinued since my country doesn't have it anymore...

Bought it for mom who loves to collect useful baby stuff.

Thanks!
Very tasty and a good substitution for people who cannot, or choose not, to eat wheat products.

I have tried these with a lot of different foods many times.  Aside from lemons, grapefruits, and oranges.  There is hardly a noticeable effect.  The novelty is cool for maybe five minutes once.  I could see these being a good replacement for sugar in order to help diabetics.  However, I don't see them really taking off for much else.

This stroller is great. It was love at first site when I first saw it. When u push it, it glides like butter over toast! The hood of the Pliko almost completely covered my daughter which is great because it protected her from dust and germs. What did disappoint me though was the instructions on how to put the Pliko together and break it down. My husband had to play with it for abOut an hour before he figured it out. And it only closed well when we completely removed the seat from the frame. All in all even though the Pliko is sleek, I can't wait for my daughter to start walking!

I really enjoy my coffee, especially a coffee that has a wonderful flavor, and with the K-cups I can count on each cup tasting great!  I really like the packaging, this package has  a 24 count, which makes it much more convienent than the lesser count.  The cost is more reasonable also, I really feel I couldn't  go wrong!

I buy the Itzbeen for every friend of mine that has a baby. It's the best. In the middle of the night when you haven't slept in weeks, no more do you have to ponder whether you fed the baby, thought about feeding the baby or just dreamed about feeding the baby. Also, you hit the button so you don't have to worry about what time it was, FINALLY! There's a nightlight so you can check on the little bugger, too. A nursing switch will remind you which breast you nursed last, as well. There is also a lock on it so you can't accidentally hit a button and throw your whole game off.

The best part about the Itzbeen for me is:

1. I learned my baby's schedule without having to make one up and try to have him accommodate my assumptions about him. It got down to a science. For instance, At one point, I knew that my baby could stay awake between 1 hr and 14 minutes and 1 hour and 21 minutes and after that, it would be much more difficult for him to fall asleep.

2. I learned my baby's cries very quickly. Because of the ItzBeen, I knew what was probably bothering him since I could assess what had or hadn't been addressed with some serious accuracy.

3. When my parents would babysit, I wouldn't have to give a long explanation about what's been happening. Just handed over the ItzBeen.

The ItzBeen is way better than the iphone app. It's simpler and only addresses how long ItzBeen since the last act, so you don't have an account of every single thing you've done with your baby since he's been born. Believe me, you'll never need that much information! You just need an ItzBeen.

This is worth it for the safety but Im going to warn that it dose NOT work on rock fire places.  They only way I could get it to stick to the fire place was with gorilla glue and then still, it would fall off.  Now its off completley it it was hard to get most of that glue off, my fire place looked like it had dung clung to it.  Too bad it didnt work for me.

The main ingredient should be SALT! 750mg per serving and there are 2 servings per can. Come on, we usually sweat or need more salt in the Summer, but we tend to eat more soup in the Winter. My first impression was \\"boy this is salty\\". It would be great as a gravy but so is a much cheaper Cambell's cream of mushroom.
Deluxe one can't go inside standard dr brown bottles only good for wide neck ones but this one is too good.
Wonderful jerky. My son loves them more than slim Jim's.perfect small gift, stocking stuffer, etc.
Decent cup of coffee. Tasted strong, with very little bitter after taste. I will probably buy it again, depending on the price
Triple dose of salt.  Way too salty.  Needed to shake off salt for the nuts to be eatable.  Also the nuts are unnaturally huge, surely they are not organic.  Not recommended.

I've purchased this product for years.  Due to some physical limitations, there are days when I just can't mess with meal preparation.  The reduced fat product is still tasty- and I actually like the flavor better, as it's not greasy. The protein content is very important, and with 21 grams per serving, this makes for the base of a decent meal.  A side vegetable, and I'm good to go, and don't end up with a lot of pain from repetitive motion.  If you like canned hash, this is a good bet !!

There is nothing like a great cup of coffee to start your day. However, when it comes down to great coffee, there are very few and far between kinds. But, one of my personal gavorites is French Roast Coffee, because the taste is so lively in the morning. When it comes down to it, I've tried from so many companies, but Folgers definitely made the best for its value. The aroma and taste is do delightful, it makes desire for more. One single cup in the morning, and you'll definitely feel the same way too. I really recommend the great buy of Folgers French Roast Coffee for your morning cup. Taste it, and enjoy!

Price: B

Taste: A-

Overall: B+

We love this stroller. We have twins, and ended up with a few strollers (one was a hand-me-down, one was purchased) but this one FITS THROUGH DOORWAYS! Oh yes. Also, the foot muff is wonderful, I took the babies out during a snow day and it really starting blowing. When we got home the stroller was covered in snow, and my little ones were nice and toasty inside. It folds up and opens easily. It's not too heavy for me to fling into the back of the car. And it may sound silly but I also love the cup holder. Everything we need fits in the pockets (2 bottles, diapers, wipes, etc.) so I don't need to bring a diaper bag for short jaunts. I always thought a stroller had to have air-in-the-tires wheels to be \\"nice\\" but this one is awesome.

There's a reason this item is #1 on Amazon. If you want raw, unprocessed honey, get this. The only better honey I've had was harvested by a beekeeper from bees who moved into a relative's home. This is less chunky and more waxy than other crystallized raw honeys I've bought in stores, which is good because it dissolves faster and more reliably in hot water and cooking dishes. I don't use or miss white sugar;instead I grab for this or coconut palm sugar.

Whole bunch of "mini chips". I have ordered these twice now (9 bags each shipment). These chips are prone to breaking up into smaller chips unrelated to shipping in my opinion. Additionally, these chips are not as good as many others such as On the Border, Xochitl, and others that I have tried elsewhere. Since it was available on amazon I thought I would try them but I will switch to a different brand.

We first found this soup in a small oriental foods market and my family loved it. Very easy to prepare and they love the taste. Although it took a bit longer to arrive (came from Hawaii) than other amazon products, still is excellent

We bought this little doll for our 5 mo. old granddaughter and were very pleased with it.  It is the perfect size, so soft and cute, and is washable.  The first time she held it, she studied it for about 2 seconds and then her eyes lit up and she formed this little \\"Oh!\\" with her mouth as she recognized it as a playmate, and she loves it!  I am so glad I chose this doll for her first doll.  Thank you Amazon for the excellent service you provide.

I bought two of these for my at the time 9 month old. Bought with room to grow into them.
After several washes and lots of playtime in the, they hold up well, the color stays and the zipper is holding up to being chewed on and my son "helping" me zip him up. They are super cute. I like the colors and the lack of adornment and / or characters. I would buy these again.

I tried these out on my 7 year old and two of his friends.  I didn't say they were any different from the usual juice boxes, just put them in the fridge as normal.  They all liked them and drank a few of them throughout the day.  I did try a sip of one and didn't think it tasted that good, but if the kids drink it, then that's all that matters!

I love Starbucks iced chai tea latte, but can't stand all the calories, even when it is made with no-fat milk. This is the next best thing. The taste is as close as you can get and the zero calories and no sugar make it just as good. It's a winner!

We are from the southwest, as a family we don't eat Thai, but I bought this to expose my daughter to other flavors.  I don't know if it tastes like Thai, but the smell is strong and I pair it with bananas.

Many nights we do not feel like a heavy dinner so I make up various appetizers for a munch-a-thon around the TV. This is a flavorful product that can be used in so many ways. I will definately buy more!
Simple design, easy to use, keeps odor contianed very well. Much better choice than others out there.
Perfect for my needs. It doesn't have to be removed. i can still fold stroller with stuff in the net. greaty buy.

My newborn daughter was given several pacifiers, from the Avent ones to the Gerbers. She prefers the Gerbers, so we bunched them all into this pacifier tree to steam them up.
First off, when I received the box, I thought the tree was too small. We put about 6 pacifiers before it was stuffed.
Because it's small, they don't fit the Avent pacifiers too well since they don't have rings. Heck, they don't seem to hold any pacifiers if it doesn't have rings.

The steamer seemed to work fine, but the tree was too hot out of the microwave. The drainer didn't seem to work well either, so I just had to tip over the bottom to spill the water out.

It seems fine, but I wouldn't consider the tree a necessity.

Great mustard! have been eating it for over 50 years and have had it shipped to me all over the world while I served in the United States Air Force and ever since. Great stuff!

I now must change my review.....I have loved Nance's Sharp & Creamy mustard since the 1950s and had it shipped to me all over the world throughout my Air Force career and for 35 years since my retirement. I cannot tell you how disappointed I was with the last case I received. The new formula has lost that taste that made Nance's so special!

5 stars says it all, I just wanted to comment here for others to know that when you receive your pillow, the first thing you should do is put it in the wash.  I set mine to "handwash" cycle, although I'm sure delicate settings works just as well.  After it comes out of the dryer, it puffs up and fills up really nicely.  Really like the fact that it is washable, it can get drooled and dirtied fairly quickly even with a cover on.

I love this product except that it is approximately 3.5-4\\" too short! Thankfully my twins haven't chewed on the exposed portions yet. I have had it a couple of weeks and it works well. It washed up well also.

Sliced very thick in my opinion, one thick slab. If you like Spam you will enjoy the convenience. They have since discontinued this version????Less waste than opening whole can, but we can use a whole can so guess it depends on your own usage.

This butter like topping is very good.  I did read some reviews before purchasing which did sway in my decision to buy this topping for my home popcorn.  Most of the reviews were positive, some negative but the positive outweighed the negative, therefore, I decided to buy some.  Some reviewers said it tastes just like at the movies and some said it does not, but more said it did than not.  In my opinion this topping is not an exact match in taste as the butter topping they use in the theaters, or at least in my area.  I live in the suburbs of Los Angeles and go to the movies in various locations in Southern California.  It is possible that the other reviewers who say this taste just like at the theater visit theaters that do use this or one just like it.  I go to the movies at either Edwards Cinema (Regal) or AMC theaters.  This topping is good but not an exact match.  Someone mentioned Mor Gold is creamier and just like the theater.  I found that Wabash Butter Flavored Topping actually is creamy too, at least compared to that at the theaters that I go to the movies.  The butter topping at the theaters that I visit is very thin and very liquidy actually, which makes this stuff seem to be creamy and thick.  I think people are accustomed to \\"movie butter\\" topping and anything less or different is not acceptable.  For awhile I was melting real butter and putting in on the popcorn but honestly, even if real butter is higher quality and the real thing, I can't get used to butter on my popcorn and went on the quest of this synthetic like topping that is used at movie theaters.  Although this is not an exact match am I happy with this product?  Yes I am, is the answer.  This topping actually does taste like butter but not exactly. If it was exactly like butter taste I'd not use it any longer but it is not just like butter but has some taste properties.   It falls somewhere between real butter taste and that synthetic stuff from the movie theater that I like so much.  HeckI might use this on corn on the cob and see how it is.  I have no complaints about this stuff at all and a little goes a long way.  I just purchased this recently, came the other day and I tried it out on some popcorn.  Tasted good.  So this will last me a long time. When it's all said and done I might try some of that O'Dell brand, I heard good things about it.  So bottom line is I rather get an exact taste copy as the kind I am used to at the theater but I can say this is very good stuff.  Would I buy it again? Yes I would but I'd compare O'Dell brand first and after comparing the two I'd go for the one I like best.  I think that Amazon actually carries O'Dell also so you might want to look into it.
I decided to purchase this from Amazon because you get more for you money.  They are way to much money in the store and I go through a lot of it so it was a win win for me.

The ends are rounded, which is great but they're small enough that I'd imagine they still won't feel great if you accidentally poke your baby.  They are sharp, cut great and the rounded blades are a nice touch.  They work great for us!

LOVE our homemade lettuce wraps with this exact packet!!! Organic butter leaf lettuce, skip the extra sugar, & mix up our own side sauce with chili oil, lo-so soy sauce, spicy Chinese mustard & Sriracha. Blissfully decadent!!!

I found this hot chocolate to be excellent and really didn't have any problems with it not staying together. In fact, I added a bit of coconut milk and was very happy with it. It tastes a bit on the dark chocolate side, but I loved it!

My daughter has eczema and normal shampoo can irritate the skin on her back - that's where it gets the worst. This shampoo is free of everything that gives her flare-ups, so I don't have to worry about being careful when I rinse off her shampoo.
I love these pouches..... They are very convienant for pumping on the go or at work because they don't take up any room!!

I was introduced to this bread while giving out food to families struggling with addictions in Lake Huges California in the 80's. There was a Seventh Day Adventist commune there at the time and they would give me huge boxes of the bread to pass out. I became known as the \\"bread lady\\" and I was only 24.

This product, I believe has saved my life for the last 30 years. Most of my siblings and all of my parents had cancer and passed on because of the cancer. Not one of them ate this bread. I wish we had known about this bread growing up, thier lives could have been spared. I sometimes eat up to five pieces a day with no weight gain. I eat the slices raw and untoasted, but made into toast or french toast it is delicious too.

The price has gone up, but I got a bunch of loafs on sale for $3.99 each at \\"Down to Earth\\", in Kapolei Hawaii.
If you write the company they will send you coupons.

If you want to be regular, energetic, and disease free eat this bread and none other.
Deb
We love these with morning coffee and yogurt. We keep ordering them every 6 weeks or so.
Granddaughter enjoyed getting it for her birthday, just what she asked for!  There is no substiute for Galileo when it comes to dry salami.
I really like the flavor of this tea. Been looking for this taste for a bit.

Worked great for the first year. Once it was 2 months outside of the 1 year warranty, the baby and parent units stopped linking up. The parent unit just beeps and says "not linked." I tried resetting both units and followed all instructions in the manual. It's dead. I understand this means one or both of the transmitter units failed. Going to go find a replacement now and it won't be this one!

I love macadamia nuts and I love chocolate. But this particular formulation is less than the sum of its parts. As other reviewers have noted, the nuts are generally quite small, and they are surrounded by a much-too-thick coating of not-so-great chocolate. Ultimately there is no discernible macadamia taste at all.

As noted in the questions, the nuts are not salted. The chocolate has a waxy texture and is way too sweet.

These come at a premium price. I would be willing to pay it if they would reformulate them with sea salt and a thin coating of a better quality chocolate with a good snap. And slightly bigger macadamias!

But as they are, I regret the purchase.

I was very excited about ordering this.  my 5 month old son has taken to pinching, slapping, and pulling on my face while he nurses. My immediate thoughts upon opening the package were that the chew part was way bigger then I thought it was going to be, but it ended up being ok. My son took to it instantly! I had him in his carrier and he grabbed the chew bead and chewed it! this is the best thing ever!
Easy to put together and Henry is already loving it! Keeps him busy, so I can get my checklist completed!
Hands down my favorite coffee for KCups. So delicious this flavor is awesome. I drink my coffee black so I love strong flavors in dark roasts!
I love this product!  I enjoy all of the flavors. Having it delivered to my doorstep, even before promised, is even better.

It's been a long day at work.  Finally home, still feeling a little frenzied.  Take a walk to start putting things into perspective, starting to feel more relaxed.  Not feeling like tea, but I still enjoy unwinding the rest of the way with the newspaper and a beverage.  I've found that Solixir \\"Relax\\" does the job very nicely.  All natural, no added sugar and no cafeine.  With all of the things my body needs to relax the natural way, I see this as a perfect addition to my active lifestyle.  Enjoy!

I got this for my 6 month old's Christmas, and so far so good. He loves being in it, and walks backwards sometimes. The bouncer part of it doesn't give much, but that's not much of an issue. I gave it 4 stars because when we put it together (which took no more than 10 minutes), the plastic windshield broke also the side mirrors sit straight forward and don't turn. Since that's my son's main entertainment on the car, its a shame they don't move or aren't turned inward bit since he spends more than half his time in it leaned over as much as possible with both hands on the mirror and starts getting irritated with it. But overall, almost a month later, it was a great pur
chase, and I don't regret spending $100 on it
Good tasting but the value is terrible. Try another one where youll get 5x the amount for the same price. I didn't pay attention to the weight and made a big mistake.

Just got this carrier and I'm very pleased with it.  It is very comfortable to wear, I don't feel any weight on my shoulders at all.  I love how soft the interior fabric is.  the carrier is very light weight and much less bulky than the original ergo.  I found the shoulder straps less irritating too.  I particularly love the front pockets and the fact that the chest binder strap can be \\"slid\\" up and down for a custom fit.      Only con for me is that it isn't as easy to breastfeed in as my AngelPack carrier.  The reason for this is because the straps are contoured so \\"sliding\\" the pack down a bit to get my baby to the right height for nursing means I have the straps sitting funny on my shoulders.  However, it is much easier to put on than my AngelPack and more comfortable to me.

These a very good. The taste is different than the prunes I buy locally. They are less sweet but with a much richer molasses taste. They are also much more moist.

Out of the five bags I've eaten so far, only two prunes have had pits left in them.
These tidbits cost way too much $ for the quantity. I went to BJ's and bought 6 pound bags for 5.99 ~to me, the 5 favors are plenty. cold Mountain in green 6 pound bags.
This is good coffee but I liked the Highlander Grog flavored coffee I bought previously. I guess I just like flavored coffee better.

I've been looking for a good teriyaki sauce for a while and, occasionally, I'll buy the sauce from a restaurant.  Honestly, I can't believe some of the stuff they try to pass off as teriyaki at the grocery stores.  Some of it is just plain nasty.  Make sure you get some nice sticky rice....Jasmine rice to go with it.

We had been struggling with getting our 3 1/2 yr old to want to try and potty. I looked at all the potty chairs possible and read reviews and this one sounded perfect. So I got my boy excited about this one and let him pick the color out. He was so excited when it came and wanted to sit on it right away (this is what I was hoping for when I bought it) he probably wasn't on it more then 10 seconds and said it hurt his bum. We tried several more times and same thing. He is an average size toddler so I am not sure what size of kid this would be comfortable for. I ended up getting next the babybjorn toilet trainer and it is awesome. He loves it, it doesn't hurt him and the splash guard is great for a little boy.
Cookie was good - a little bland, but excellent source of protein - helped to ease my guilt. I don't konw if I would purchase again at regular price, but maybe if on sale.
Indulge and feel guilt-free! Great taste and good for a Holiday treat. Enjoy yourself while others eat sugary items.

These do not work for the symphony pump or the pump in style! They are too thick & rigid. They provide absolutely no suction! It's quite the shame!!! So disappointed as this price was much better than $1 a membrane for medela ones, but that is the way to go!

Everyone (husband, trainer, mom, doctor) is always on my case about drinking more water.  I don't like to drink water.  Then, I found Metromint and that changed.  I love Metromint.  It is so refreshing but doesn't have sugar or strange chemicals added to it.  I keep some in the car, too, because even when it's warm the mint makes it taste cold.

Smooth, aromatic and tasteful. You will enjoy this coffee. It is not bitter. Would put this up against any other brand out there. I had been getting this coffee for almost 2 yrs now, it auto ships every month. I prefer to grind my own beans (easier to control the boldness) I promise you will never buy "Brand" name coffee again!!!

Love this product. As soon as baby learned how to kick, I would lay her on the mat and watch as she "played the piano" with her feet. As her eyes grew more focused, she enjoyed looking at the toys swinging overhead. Soon she began reaching for them. Now, she is in the tummy stage, and pulls the little toys attached to the bar. They have different textures and keep her interest.
Would like it if the mat was a bot softer. I usually lay it on top of a soft blanket as the mat is extremely thin.

My daughter loves this toy.  She is 5 months old and I've had it for a month or two.  She gets so excited even when she catches a glimpse of it.  She especially likes to use it as the piano while she is in her Johnny Jump Up.  The stars are cute when they light up and the orange dome is really neat when it reflects the lights.  Great toy.
If you like coconut flour its great, but I found it is hard to bake with.  it absords moisture.  I have switched to almond flour.

I love Nut-Thins! These boxes make for perfect dorm snack food. Healthy, crunchy, and now available bulk... It's a dream come true :)

With five years between our previous child and our latest baby, we decided to get a new and improved car seat. After reviewing many different brands, we decided on the Keyfit 30. We love it! Its quality is much better than our older model and you really have a confident feeling that your baby will be safe within it. When we took our little one home from the hospital, the RNs there stated that our seat was great, especially since it came with a small-infant insert. Our little girl was premature, so she only weighed 5 lbs 14 oz by the time we were allowed to leave the hospital. Since then, she has grown quite large and still seems very happy in the seat.

The base is also great. It's so easy to install with its single pull cord and adjustable foot. We have a 2012 Honda Odyssey Elite and it fits perfectly in the middle row in the middle seat which is designed for an infant seat. Our older 5 year old has her large Britax Boulevard seat next to it and the two fit just fine without needing to slide the side seat over closer to the sliding door (which the Odyssey supports). We can still let the one remaining seat stay free for a rider or to get access to the third row.

It's big, which makes it hard to shop with, but then safety comes first. Also, you really have to lift on it after putting it in the base to make sure it's secure as it doesn't click each time without pushing it down and wiggling it a bit. Last, I wish there was a way to adjust the carrier arm by only pressing the release button on one side. Moving the arm in the middle row is kind of tough given you have to put your hands on both sides and press the buttons before the arm will move.

P.S. Our little one had an accident in the seat and with some patience, we were able to take the entire liner out and all the straps. This made it easy to clean in the washer (front load on gentle). Of course I took off the metal buckle parts, the chest clip and didn't put the buckle button strap in the washer.

I believe the taste and quality of the product is good.  It was the shipping of the product that was the problem.  They were not packaged well enough to prevent at least 10-15 % from being broken.  It was important I have them in good condition.

I purchased a jar of Laxmi Tamarind assuming it would taste more or less like all the other brands i've had over the years. When i opened the bottle however, it tasted horrible, with a bleach/metallic taste. I looked at the label and it listed corn syrup as an ingredient. None of the 10 other brands on the shelf at my local spice store listed anything but pure tamarind, certainly no sweetener, and no CORN SYRUP.

There is clearly something wrong with this brand. My guess is that they are somehow diluting the tamarind or using rotten ingredients, and then adding sweetener to disguise it.

It tastes horrible.

STAY AWAY!

I consume whole cranberry sauce year round. Whole cranberries were a year-round source of vitamin C for my extended family. Cranberry harvests got us all together to make many things and can this tart fruit. In addition to the Turkey Dinner side dish or relish, craisins, slushies with just crushed ice or smoothies with the help of a blender and a few preferred ingredients. I thoroughly enjoy the taste of this brand with it's minimal ingredients.

My first order looked like it had been in a really bad warehouse rumble BEFORE packaged for shipment. I didn't use them, I'm dented-can-phobic due to a couple of BAD childhood experiences. I must say the replacement was in great shape as was this most recent order.
It's a little different from the original picture posted here. It was missing a branch, but had extra hearts and leaves. Still pretty good.

I got this as a gift and it is the most used baby item in my home.  My son is six months old and we have used this as a bassinet, changing table and storage since his birth. With a two story home, most of the day is spent downstairs.  I can store diapers, wipes and change of clothes underneath, while he sleeps and plays in the bassinet.  The style is very elegant and blends in with our home decor.  I have definitely got every penny's worth out of this item (can't say that for a lot of baby items)

I love this swing.My 2 month old daughter has calic and this swing has saved my life.I put her in it and she passed right out.
Good size, shape, colors, delivery. My grandson isn't AMAZED by them but I also got him a trampoline. What toy can compete with that!

Absolutely awful!! Total ripoff. First of all the box was completely ripped open. Inside there are only 8 \\"Twinkies\\" not the 10 that it says on the box. This is our second carrier. Our daughter does not like the first one at all. We tried this one at a friend's home, she seems not rejecting it, so we bought it and give it a try.
