Although this is a good product after you finally get enough in your liquid I would think for the price of a SMALL CAN I would just be better off to go get one already made and save the money.  The can I was sent was 3.38 oz and the can says I will get \\"about\\" 25 drinks out of it.  I am thinking more like 10 drinks. (IF I am lucky that is)  SO......I will keep looking for that perfect iced coffee product and pass on Inventi.  **sorry to be the droopy one here at the party but this is not worth the money**

Got a Kuerig for Christmas. K-cups are handy but EXPENSIVE and it doesn't take long to use up 24 of them. This little gem does EXACTLY what it says. Your own coffee, less trash, easy to use, allows you to adjust the strength. You will have to experiment a little to get the strength you like. Yes, you have to remove it and empty the grounds and rinse it out. The openings in the side do allow a little coffee to remain in the holster. Just pop the holster out, rinse, pop back in. Don't need to do this every time. These minor steps are all it takes to reducing the cost and waste, getting exactly the coffee and strength you want, AND (extra bonus!) no storage problems with all those K-cups!

These are the BEST figs I have ever eaten and I am in my 50's, so that is saying something. Delicious and such a beautiful product. Perfection! You will not be sorry to try these. I do hope they continue to offer them just as they are 100% Natural with no additives.

we had this for my 4 yr old when he was a baby, but now his baby sister inherited it. i honestly like the fisher price (we had the ocean wonders) better just because it was bouncier, thus, more fun for my baby. This bounced a little less and it also had that battery/sound compartment that hits her thunderlegs. On the maximum weight recommendation, this can accomodate my giant baby- it's max is 30 lbs- fisher price ocean wonders is at 25 lbs. (she had broken that already, as i did not know FP's max weight).

take note that using this (and all other bouncers, i guess) i still need to put some sort of barrier (like a cloth diaper) as is squishes the diaper area a bit and i end up washing the whole thing almost everyday if i did not put a cloth diaper. and this cannot go in the dryer (needs to be haung dry) so i have to wait a full day (or so during winter) before using it.

also take note that the angle of the seat is good if she is awake and bouncing, but not so good when taking a nap- as her head falls down on the sides. i had to put some blanket or little pillow to prevent her from having a (if this exists on babies) a stiff neck. the fisher price has a better angle, both for playing and napping.

i am still looking for the perfect bouncer for giant babies (over 25 lbs) and seems like it does not exist :(

This diaper bag is pretty great. It comes with a thermal bottle sleeve and changing pad. It also has two small inside pockets, two medium sized pockets and a large pocket inside that snaps shut as well as two little zippered pockets on the back of the bag. It's nice and big and I can carry a lot in it. It also comes with a little clutch which I don't ever use but is a nice idea. I typically carry a bottle, a change or two of clothes, wipes, the changing pad at least two disposable diapers as well as my cloth diapers for the day, then I carry my essentials, chap stick, wallet, sunglasses, and keys. So it get pretty packed but stays decently organized. It also comes with a cross body strap and stroller straps. I really like the stroller straps and use them frequently.

I think that for the price I would have liked the changing pad to be better quality. I would also like to have the inside pockets have the option of being zipped, but the elastic at the tops does a good job of keeping things put. Overall, this is a pretty good purchase and is still stylish enough to be used after diapers and I don't feel like I'm carrying yet another baby accessory when I'm out and about.
This is the best invention for cloth diapers. I use these with prefolds and a diaper cover on top. Great product!

This was a cake mix that we always had around the house when I was growing up. I liked eating it for breakfast, dessert, snack, whatever. My family was very familiar with it and we loved it. Over the years, it became harder to find in stores. I think the last time we had it was about 7 years ago. I felt like having coffee cake recently, so we tried another brand. It was pretty awful. I came on to Amazon, found this old favorite, and ordered.

It arrived quickly and I made a box that night for my family. It brought back a flood of memories for me as I mixed it up in the familiar plastic bag, poured it into the cardboard tray and added the crumb topping. I liked to mix the batter in that bag when I was a child. Now, it seemed a little difficult to get all the lumps out. I had to use a fork to break some up before adding the topping. Other than that, the cake is as easy to make as before. It turned out well. The cake had the same flavor and texture as years ago.

We all agreed that it still tastes the same as we remembered, however, it is a little saltier than it used to be. But, it is hands-down still the best coffee cake mix.

This tea is similar to Earl Grey but with less bergamot flavouring and a nice hint of citrus. I actually prefer it to Earl Grey, which was a favourite. It's also cheaper here than in the grocery stores.
It's Hershey's chocolate at it's best. (But I did put on weight!) I love Hershey's chocolate every kind, any time!
Pretty good stuff and in my opinion is better than the Swiss Knight brand to be sure.  Makes a really delicious quick dinner.
I like this blend, not to harsh first thing in the morning!  I like being able to purchase the large quantity at a good price and it being delivered to my door.

My wife and daughter enjoy this tea in the evening; the chamomile flower has a noted calming effect and helps to relax.  Great with a little honey.  The German, Swiss or Austrian teas seem to be of the best quality.

the mom loves these and the bowls. the colors are fun and bright and easy to keep clean and fresh

Talk about a chocolate overload. For anyone who really loves chocolate this mix has about a double dose over regular hot cocoa. The flavor is genuine Ghiradelli... You won't go wrong on that cold day...

It's very gentle on my baby's skin and it smells great! It would've given it 5 stars if the bottle had a pump so you could use with one hand while holding the baby with the other hand. Not a big deal though, great product!

love coffee, the stronger the better so when I was offered the chance to try these Organic Espresso Beans by Findlay's Finest I was psyched. The smell of the fresh roasted beans is intoxicating and the each cup tastes as fresh as the first. The beans are easy to grind and work perfectly in my refillable Keurig filter. This coffee has one of the best overall flavor combinations and you can taste each note individually. Would definitely purchase again.

I received this product at a discounted price or the item was supplied to me in exchange for the purposes of a product review. All opinions are 100% my own and they reflect my honest & unbiased opinion.

This has long been a favorite - it's organic, pure maple syrup.  Strong flavor - not watered down.  Great for pancakes and for baking.    Higher price?  Well, the cost of shipping everything has sky rocketed. Processing costs go up as well.  Family farms have higher fuel costs for harvesting as well as processing from raw-to-refined.  Labor costs also go up.  Free shipping also costs someone money.  And consider the weird weather the whole country has been experiencing this year.    Use less, waste less.

I can see that others were able to assemble this successfully. Not me - after an hour of attempts, circling it in frustration, and a little swearing, I returned it. Very attractive, but since I wouldn't be mounting it permanently and might need to remove it and put it back up from time-to-time, it was too much for me.

Don't waste your money, even if you follow the directions, it still leaks.  I ignored the reviews and registered for it anyway because I thought that it was cute and practical.  In the beginning, we read the instructions and did not have any problems at all.  My son is 5 months old now, and by the time that we finish with his bath, he's sitting in an empty tub. Take heed!!!!  If not, you can't say that no one told you.

We discovered this tuna about a year ago. What a difference from the tuna in water,no flavor stuff. All of a sudden it is off the shelf only to be replaced by Starkist gourmet creations . The new one is 40 or 50 cents a can more and does not taste as good. I emailed Starkist and they just said it has been replaced. I told them...bring it back. Maybe if you all email them they will bring it back. When I think of what they have done to the tuna over the past 20 or so years I shudder.
My baby loves the Lamaze mirror! It's just the right size and surprised me with its many different colors and its flexibility of how you can use it.

I work in a large hospital and give these out to who ever I come in contact with everyday. I buy two boxes at a time which come out to about 1050 pieces and last about 3 months. If you have people you contact all the time and like a hospital everyday, is not perfect, give em a candy. You'd be suprised who speaks to me now that would'nt even make eye contact before. Small things makes peoples day!
just switched over to Paleo several weeks back. I love this almond flour, it has a great texture, and is great for baking... very sad that price went up about $10 overnight..

I got this carseat as a shower gift for my daughter. I absolutely love it. The only downfall is that it is big, and rear facing will not fit in all vehicles properly. For those saying that it doesn't recline enough. There is a line right on the carseat saying how far it should recline, and if your seat doesn't recline it far enough, which it probably won't, you must put pool noodles under it to make it recline, or it isn't safe. It reclines much further than my evenflo, and my daughter likes it far better. As for taking it apart, there are a lot of steps, but the manual shows you step by step how to do it, and it isn't too tough. I love it. The reason it is so big, is because it works until your child is 100 pounds. If you want a carseat that will last that long, you have to deal with the size. Also, I have never had a problem with the staps twisting.
Between this and their stove top popper anyone can make great popcorn. Oh, and don't forget to put a little melted real creamery butter on top.

Do love this pillow! Wish that it was a little more stuffed the further along I get and need a little more support both front and back at 8 months now. It is large and wouldn't fit well with both my husband and myself if we didn't have a king sized bed. But worth the money and very comfy! My 3 year old loves to take naps on it and has claimed it once I have baby ;) He just got bunk beds and it actually will add to my peace of mind when I allow him to sleep on the top bunk! Multi-purpose pillow!

These are the only Chia seeds I'll ever buy.  High quality and clean!  Nothing in the bag but organic seeds...no twigs, leaves or other unwanted stuff.  They absorb water really well...all good!  An exceptional product!
I love these little lunch containers. I use them for dips and stuff. They are really cute and very durable. They are kind of small though...
Someone told me to buy a small but for some reason I thought I'd be safe and order a medium. Not a good idea. Sent it back and got a small.

I read the reviews prior to purchasing this seat.  It is true that the seat does not offer much cushion, but I am not worried about that.  Overall it is a good seat which will grow well with my child.
I grab these for play on the go and my baby was instantly attracted to them. She folds them in half and chews them. We always have one on hand.

I have owned Britax products before and love them! I think my favorite has been their car seats; they are by far the safest out there.

I have been using this stroller since early fall for walks around the neighborhood. I live in a quiet area that with no outlet and am able to take long walks. I have only used this stroller for one (my daughter); I have not purchased any of the attachments that you can add to it. However, the stroller alone is incredible!

I thought the stroller was going to be a bit more compact than it was but it is a decent size and weight. It sits up at a comfortable height for my daughter and also me. My step father who joins us on walks finds the height comfortable as well, not adjustments are needed. My daughter usually falls asleep on walks and the fact that you have 4 options for reclining comes in so handy! The wheels are whisper quiet so if she is asleep you do not hear much noise coming from the stroller itself, it is really smooth. I like the fact that it does not have a snack tray on it like some of her other strollers had. I find they get messy and also the tray is usually one height and gets in the way. The storage area is big enough for a diaper bag or for putting your coat or umbrella in it if needed. I like that you can get into the storage area from all sides, a lot of them you can only get into from the back. Even though the color is black it did not seem to attract a lot of heat. However, I did use it when it was not very hot outside but milder weather.

I have received a lot of compliments from neighbors about the stroller asking what brand it is. The minute I tell them the brand they shake their head like they knew it could only be Britax.

I have not had to store mine therefore have not had to fold it up. I keep it open in the garage since it is big enough for everything but fast enough just to grab for daily walks. I keep another one (different brand) in the trunk of my car for trips out.

Last but not least, I love the harness system. The stroller I have in the car for travel has a terrible harness. Britax has always made great harness systems, I love the one in my daughter's car seat, and it is very secure and holds your child in.

So far I have not had any issues. This is being used weekly and I cannot think of one thing I dislike about it. It truly is top of the line. The fact that you can expand this for the use of a second child is great for growing families. However, I just have one and plan to keep it that way but it is nice to have the option to add to it.out.

Last but not least, I love the harness system. The stroller I have in the car for travel has a terrible harness. Britax has always made great harness systems, I love the one in my daughter's car seat, and it is very secure and holds your child in.

So far I have not had any issues. This is being used weekly and I cannot think of one thing I dislike about it. It truly is top of the line. The fact that you can expand this for the use of a second child is great for growing families. However, I just have one and plan to keep it that way but it is nice to have the option to add to it.

Bath pad did its job but by the time I got him undressed and on the pad the water it had sucked up had turned cold and it was horrible : ( I would recommend just sticking with a bathtub, in fact I am going to go buy one today! One thing I did like about the pad though was that it only took a few mins to dry after I hung it up.
My three years old love to ride on this. Very sturdy, easy to open/close. Happy with purchase.
This NOT a "Product of Italy", as advertised. This is false advertising! Or bait and switch... unreal.

Yeah, these were awful. Listen to the people who said they arrived stale and inedible  :(  They had a weird dusty taste and at first, I thought it was just me.  So I thought I'd roast them and see if that helped, and it didn't.  It was as if I was trying to like them but something was just 'off'.  At this point I had roasted them and wasn't sure if I could return them after cooking so I just trashed them.  Next day went to Walgreen's and bought Macadamias there and upon eating a few, realized how terribly old these were and that they were probably rancid.  The date on the package for these was mid 2015, so I think the company must have gotten an old, bad shipment and repackaged them in their facility for sale.  Avoid!!!  Waste of $15!!

This idea is really great especially for small strollers without a lot if storage. If you do have some storage on board it helps save room for other items when shopping or in trips. It keeps certain items like wipes accessible so you don't have to go digging if you have a mess on your hands.

My daughter had thrush and so the doctor recommended sterilizing her bottles. Reading through the reviews on this one I was kind of concerned since a lot of people say it started to rust, but I can safely say after five months we have not had that problem. I think the mistake people are making is that after each use you need to wipe off the heating element in the bottom. Letting standing water sit on metal is going to produce rust, so just wipe it off.

The only negative I have to say is that it doesn't fit Dr. Brown 8 ounce bottles well. If you sterilize them you need to also use the top part and then balance it on top of the dr brown bottles. It's not ideal but I think it works well enough.
Works great as a rain shield, but also for keeping wind and cold air off your munchkins! I love it and use it whenever it's cold, keeps my little ones cozy

My wife and I are the proud parents of an 8-month old little boy and have been successfully making our own baby food since slowly introducing solids at around the 5-6 month mark. The Infantino Squeeze Station came highly recommended from a friend who specializes in early childhood development. We also attended a baby food making class (free at a local grocery store) where again the Infantino was recommended and actually used during the class. We were impressed enough with the product to order our own immediately.

--------------------
SETUP:

There is not a lot to the Squeeze Station, in fact after using the device it quickly became a, "why didn't I think of that" type of scenario. The entire station is made from a nice durable plastic; the top and bottom are coated in a rubber-type material that makes it easier to grip and less likely to slip on counter-tops and tables. There are four major components; the squeeze station stand, the plastic screw-on cylinders, the push plunger, and the food pouches.

The entire system is pretty straight forward and extremely easy to setup and start filling pouches with food that you make right in your kitchen!

--------------------
USE:

Having made use of the Squeeze Station for several months here are some general tips and guidelines:

â€¢ Make sure to properly and thoroughly puree whatever food your making. I cannot stress this point enough as it will save you frustration and potentially a large mess in you kitchen/prep area. The opening between the plastic screw on cylinder and the food pouch is very small to guard against large food chunks passing into the food pouch. This serves to help ensure your baby won't be introduced to large pieces of food that could pose a choking hazard.

â€¢ Certain foods are harder to process than others and thus end up clogging the food cylinder. Sweet potatoes (one of my son's favorites) requires a lot of steaming and then pureeing to ensure the correct consistency. Others are super simple, particularly apples, pears, banana and other soft fruits and vegetables.

â€¢ We've found that peeling fruits & vegetables is a must before attempting to puree and using the Squeeze Station.

â€¢ The plastic cylinders have a fill line, be conscious of that or you may overfill the food pouch only to have the food ooze back out once disconnected from the squeeze station.

â€¢ The plunger forms a very tight fit inside the cylinder and after squeezing the food in the pouch be sure to unscrew the cylinder before removing the plunger. The vacuum seal will pull food right back out of the pouch if you attempt to remove the plunger first.

â€¢ Despite your best efforts you're likely to make a mess when using this product. It's to be expected and part of the process and fun of making your own baby food. The entire system is extremely easy to clean so that's a huge bonus.

â€¢ Have several large bowls on hand - we have one bowl to catch the food peeling, another to hold food that's prepped and going in our steamer, another few bowls to pour food into after pureeing.

â€¢ The pouches have an area on the front for writing the contents and date. We generally freeze anywhere from 20-30 pouches of food at one time and write the expiration date rather than the prepared date. We generally make the expiration date 3-months out from the preparation date, less for proteins. The pouches are marker or Sharpie friendly but should be completely dry before attempting to write on them!

â€¢ Defrosting is very easy, we use a large coffee mug with warm water and place the food pouch in the mug. Defrosting varies by the food but generally ready to eat in about 15-minutes.

â€¢ The squeeze station only comes with 10 pouches and caps in the box. Be sure to pick up an extra box of pouches and caps. It's handy to have a lot of these on hand when making a large amount of food as pouches tend to fill quickly!

We have successfully made a large variety of foods for our little boy using the Squeeze Station including: sweet potatos, peas, apples, pears, banana, avocado, plums, butternut and acorn squash. We've even started introducing some proteins including pureed chicken with herbs like parsley.

--------------------
WHAT I LIKE ABOUT THE SQUEEZE STATION:

(+) I like knowing exactly what my son is eating. I've never been comfortable with store bought baby foods and have avoided them entirely for my son.

(+) The entire system is easy to clean and is dishwasher safe.

(+) The system is inexpensive and the pouches while not reusable are recyclable.

(+) Extremely easy to store and transport the food pouches for when you're on the go.

(+) Squeeze the food directly from the pouch to a spoon thus making less of a mess at feeding time.

(+) My son absolutely loves the food we make him. Combining different foods from pouches is also a hit, e.g. sweet potato and chicken.

--------------------
WHAT I DISLIKE ABOUT THE SQUEEZE STATION:

(-) Can be frustrating at times when a food chunk becomes stuck in the cylinder several times and after repeated pureeing.

(-) You will make a mess in your prep area.

--------------------
CONCLUSION:

If you're looking at making your own baby food this is an easy recommendation. The entire system is inexpensive and very easy to use and clean. If the pouches seem expensive be sure to shop around. Many local retailers such as BuyBuy Baby and Baby's R Us carry this line of products and coupled with coupons/sales you can easily find great deals!e amount of food as pouches tend to fill quickly!

Great deal!  Love these bottles seem to actually make a noticeable difference with colic and reflux.  Ordered girl version and received pink instead of purple as picture shows not a big deal though still a great value would definitely recommend product.
Love jalapeno stuffed olives, they are the best.  Great with cheese and crackers, late night snack.....or great  with a nice glass of red wine.

Within a few weeks of purchase, several of the toys started to break. The breaks were largely due to the baby throwing the rattles around the house. Some of the toys had glue that failed to hold the parts together, another of the toys had very small pieces on the inside that are a clear choking hazard. The bottom line is that this rattle set is very cheaply made and potentially dangerous to babies.
This stuff is good on anything! Scrambled eggs, potato salad, deviled eggs, your favorite roast or steaks and vegges on the grill. You name it its good!
Item exactly as stated, I just wish the postal service could provide a more rapid delivery service across the pond.
This is great food, I bought it here to have it shipped to a vacation location, but it is much cheaper in stores.
Read the reviews and some were mixed but decided to try it anyway.  Very authentic taste - almost feels like I have gone to my favorite coffee ship.

We bought this stroller after having seen it in Barcelona, where it's widely used. We live in an urban setting and we decided to buy it. We are very pleased by the purchase and we would recommend it because:

- Our child loves riding it. Although it looks narrow, the seating space is wide and the multiple adjustments for the reclining seat are great.

- It is very light and compact, yet with enough space at the bottom.

- Extremely easy to maneuver. We tested other strollers and we are still amazed at how easily and smoothly it rolls.

- Compact and easy to fold. We bought the travel bag for easy storage when traveling; makes it very easy to carry.

- Although some reviewers complain that the seat covers are not washable, this is not a problem for us, since we don't feed our kid snacks on the go on a regular basis. We did have a little chocolate ice cream accident, and the material cleaned up easily with a damp cloth.

Overall, we would recommend this stroller to anybody who appreciates smart, minimalist yet functional design, and does not want to feel like they are pushing a truck when taking baby out for a stroll.

I recently discovered this cereal and wow, do I love it! It tastes great; it fills me up; and this will be the cereal I now eat most frequently!

PROS:

* It is organic and there are no genetically engineered ingredients.

* I like knowing that it is relatively healthy for me. It has a lot of whole grain in each serving.

* As of this time the price here is less than what I pay at my neighborhood supermarket.

CONS:

* It also contains a fair amount of sugar--in fact, it has more sugar than a well-known brand of sugar coated corn flake cereal! That's a disappointment.

* It is a bit expensive if you consider that you only get 17 ounces in each box.

Overall, despite a drawback or two this remains an excellent, comparatively healthy and delicious cereal. I recommend it.

I used these with my Medela Pump In Style for two months until I noticed mildew in the tubes.  I had one set of tubes that came with the pump that I used with two babies and never had this issue (I just bought a new set since I figured they were old and should be replaced due to age/storage).  Also, they frequently come detached from the pump .  Going to order a different set now.
I've used Amazon for over a year and have yet to leave a review for any product--but THIS, this is delicious!

I have been mixing this with the Yogi Blueberry Slim Life. Using 4 bags of each I make it into iced tea. Drink about 40-48 oz/day in that fashion. Has really helped me cut way back on Coke Zero's (doen to 2 from 4 a day). Not as much of a caffiene as I would like or need, but it does seem to be effective on all other aspects. I have lost 5 lbs in the last few weeks while drinking this blend, alnog with taking Omega 3, CLA, watching what I eat, and exercising 3-4 times per week. Tastes great too!
I'll probably buy it again.  It is not paper thin, but the taste is the same.  Puts out the wasabi fire, nicely.

Super cute design on both sides. We purchased it for his giraffe themed birthday party, and it looked adorable!
It has material that is liquid resistant, which also makes the bib a little stiff.
Easy to clean by throwing in the washer / dryer.
The only part I didn't like was the style of "Velcro" they used. It's not the traditional hook and loop style Velcro (which admittedly can scrape up the back of his neck if we're not careful when we take off that style bib) but this newer style of "clasp" that is softer than Velcro. Unfortunately, our son also figured out if he tugged his bib, the "clasp" came undone and he could take his bib off. Not great when you're trying to prevent him from covering his clothes in food!
This makes a really good meal. It has a mild flavor, portions are a little small, but enough for 2 people.

This is one of my most used seasonings. Whenever I feel my recipe or meal is missing that little something this usually does the trick. I was so happy to find it in a giant size like this for a very good price. I originally bought it in the smallest size container, which I keep refilling with this one.

This is a great product in theory but my child has used this product for 3 days and every time we made a turn he would say he was sliding and when I checked sure enough his bottom had half slid off of the seat despite being strapped tightly into the seatbelt.  It is also relatively small in size - it is rated up to 100 lbs. but if your child is 70 lbs. or heavier, I would think it would be too small of a seat.  I like the idea of the cushion for long rides so may try sitting it on top of his current booster seat for cushion but he definitely cannot use it on its own.

I recently went to a gluten-free diet and this cereal is one of the few I can eat that also has added psyllium. It has a great flavor. Not at all sweet, so don't expect any sweetness, which I think is a nice bonus. VERY crunchy even in milk or soy milk. Recommended. Fast service too.

Bought this camera back in January and was so pleased with it I bought a second add on camera!

We have three children and I never thought about getting a Video monitor until our two daughters would be sharing a room.(ages 2, newborn) Our biggest concern was the newborn's crib. I was worried my two year old would want to climb in with her or try to throw things in with her and I wanted to make sure I had an eye on them! This works great and I'm able to see exactly what I set out to see. Now we have one for my sons room as well (age 3)

The Monitor is light weight. Picture comes in clear both daytime and night time. Settings are extremely simple to use. Now that we have two cameras I can switch back and forth between the two very easily. The Camera picks up the noises I need to hear(kids) and I don't have any interference! (we had been having issues with interference on an audio monitor we owned previously through another company.) Love the power save mode where the video screen turns off until there is activity. You can do the same with audio. There is a warning for low battery too. Easy to put up!

I would buy this monitor again! The price is right and it does exactly what I need.

More importantly the Infant Optics Support Team is AMAZING!
About a month after having our first camera, it stopped working. I emailed the Tech team and was so surprised and pleased to receive and email the same day back! From a real person! Turned out to be a faulty cord. They sent me a new cord in a matter of a few days. They even checked up on me after I got it to make sure things were up to speed and working well! Let me tell you how pleased I was to have a company who cared about their product and their customers! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
This bowl is cute. I like the light color. It was just bought for future use. Hope the heat preservasion effect is good.
I would recommend this item for any child 8mos to 24 mos for the younger child do not att legs.
Hmm.  Not bad, but more of a "punch" than an orange drink!  I would choose something else if the orange flavor is important.
They truely tase like watermelon! Wonderful for a lite snack that packs a lot of flavor.

So glad they sell these things separate. I always lose them.
I do feel like they could be better quality. They wear after a few months (get a hole in them and pump will not work).
On time and tasted yummy, nice to have a bite of home. Even though you pay so much more it is worth it.

I use a French press for enjoying this coffee.
Of course, I drink it black, with no sugar.
Keep milk and sugar for over-roasted coffee (like Starbucks' ones) with terrible taste.

This coffee has a sweet taste, and does not end by a bitter taste.
At the beginning, you can feel a slighly sour sensation.
Kind of fruity, as you can expect from a columbian coffee.

It is not a very suprising coffe, but is really quite enjoyable as an everyday coffee.

This toy seemed to have the most toys on it- I was so excited for my son to play in it...My son is 6 months old and already is at the tallest setting- that is the first issue-there should be more room to grow.  The biggest issue is the toys are hard and some are pointed...my son in 1 second ( quicker then I could grab him-I was right in front of him) smashed his head into the book and the spiral part of the book left an imprint/welt/egg on his head-he cried and I wanted to :(...the phone could do some damage too- He i sokay- just a minor boo-boo- but a big scare.  Needless to say I am returning this item.... I much prefer the Delux Jumparoo....
It gets the job done and its simple and does not have the bells and whistles but i have no complaints.
I am using this for a facial product that I am making. I will order again. Very fast shipping. My package was nicely sealed. Thank You again!
This tastes quite nicely!  I really enjoy it and it came quickly.  I have only used it in my coffees at this time- will bake with it soon!

After less than a year of use, this thing creaks and groans so bad I'm convinced it's going to fall apart and splinter at any second!! Very sad at my purchase and wish I could have gone with a higher quality wood frame. The padding is VERY easy to clean though!

This is an expensuve product so I did a lot of research before buying to make sure I found the genuine honey. I was able to trace the supplier from Newzealand, from a close up of the lable. I emailed them and they responded very quickly to comfirm that this is the real deal, supplied by them to Pacific. I take a spoonful a day for medicinal purposes. My nearly 1 year old daughter loves this seat.  I have it rear facing in a 2008 Rav4 and even fits front facing in a 2002 RSX coupe.  It's slightly smaller size has worked out perfectly.  Installation is easy with the LATCH system. I'll have to wait to see if the 40lb limit Vs. the Marathon's 65lb limit will make a difference.  At that point I'm thinking a booster will suffice.
Packed well, shipped fast, excellent product, easy to work with and has a great taste. My grandkids love the treats I make for them.

Things not to like; it's made of pretty thin metal, easy to bend. It's kinda smallish, probably could have used the larger one but not at nearly twice the price.

Mounting holes are good but I used some black painted screws to mount so that plain silver screws wouldn't be staring you in the face. my kid loves kim possible, so this cup was of course a big smile from him!

These crackers have apparently been re-engineered and now resemble the previous product only in geometry and the presence of (assumed) rosemary.  They are dense, hard and dry as dust in the mouth.  They taste overcooked.  The old flavor that we liked so much is completely absent.  Badly done, Suzie.  Very badly done indeed.

I purchased this sling when my daughter was 4 months old. This sling met all my expectations, cute, affordable, and durable. It is fairly easy to use and matches with all of my outfits. We just got it about 2 weeks ago. And I love it. My son used to sleep in a travel bed and is now curled up in a corner because its so big for him. I truly can recommend it cuz it come with all the quipment to transform it into a toddler and day bed. But besides that I love that crib....

Delicious! I am able to buy this in my local store for $5.39, but if I couldn't I would pay the online price to get it.Slice some pork shoulder or boneless country style ribs (or use pork belly from a Chinese store). Marinate in this sauce. i add sliced onions, garlic and green onions to mine. I cook it fast and hot on a griddle. We eat it wrapped in lettuce leaves with a smear of tasty Korean paste (soybean paste, red pepper paste, dash of sesame oil, dash of sugar). This brand's bulgogi marinade is excellent, too. I don't bother making my own Korean marinade anymore - I just use these.

My family bought these from VT and it was very good. The online purchase, however, was VERY salty (and that's coming from a person who's always adding salt to their food)!!! I don't know if I got a bad batch, but it definitely was a disappointment.. I also got the honey flavor and that was okay. I don't mind the hard, chewiness as that's my preference.
Great product.  Fast shipping and product as described.  This is adorable and will be used very much to keep the baby safe while sleeping.

both of my boys have loved the summer swaddles starting with the pods, then the swaddle and now, for my littlest guy, the wrap sack. these didn't exist with the first one. love that i can swaddle him with his arms out! i have already recommend this product to several friends and to a few mommas on a group that i belong to.

I thought this was going to be a life-saver, but it is too flimsy. I think this is a great product, but wish there was different levels of firmness you could select from. Personal preference really....
I am a big fan of Tassimo, I have been ordering latte from amazon. there is nothing I can complain about. Awesome
i purchased the peppers so i can put it in my home made sausage there is nothing else to say.

You can tell that they were not stirred with a fork because the color is so even. And you can tell before you blend them with something that they are actually powdred. But those are the only ways. If you like raw eggs in a drink such as egg nog, here is the way to have that without worrying about some disease in the raw eggs. Cook them any way you like, combine them in any recipe you want and they are good eggs. I keep some around to use in recipies and in case we run out of eggs.

If you like eggs and your fridge occasionally runs out, get some of these. They are an excellent backup source of eggs around the house. Or campsite. Or RV.
The best smoke additive I have found, however it is not as concentrated as I had expected from other reviewers.

We purchased this and the first monitor we received would not retain a charge at all. We returned the monitor and received a replacement. The replacement maintained a charge, but only worked sporadically after charging. I would not suggest this monitor.

if it keeps the baby happy, and quiet, who wouldn't love it? Babies are picky about their binkies, and I found mine like this kind so more is better because they're always hitting the floor, falling inside the sofa, under the pillow...
Looks really good.  Have re-packaged it in smaller amount in Mylar bags with oxygen absorbers for long term storage
Whem I got this there was loose coffee everywhere, at least 7 out of the 50 k-cups were busted open and coffee was all over the place.  The coffee is good but the packaging needs some work.
I use these to make Blondies; they're amazing. Look up a recipe for "white chocolate brownies" & use this specific chocolate; you won't regret it.
Great little straps... BUT i need to use both together to get the desired length. So buy a few packages of them.
Well rounded tomatoes with a slight sweetness. They have a smoother taste then most canned  whole tomatoes.I will be buy more.

I love this projector when it works...over two kids we've purchased at least five of these.  Unfortunately, the projector stops turning within a few months every time we buy one.  This last stopped working already and my son is only two months old.  I really don't understand it.  I'm curious how everyone gives these great reviews when we've had five go bad.  One or two you could just say it was a fluke, but five?  Luckily we've been able to return them every time so we've only ever paid for two.  One is still in my six year old's room that is used more as a night light since it won't turn and the other one is in the nursery.

Um you can see inside the babies mouth, also the baby is expecting food as it is the same shape as a regular bottle nipple, babies mouth is wide open when sucking on this, I'm not saying, I'm just saying its weird and the baby didn't like it, go to Walmart and get any of the other 100 kinds, same s#!t

Ordered a few rosehip and rosepetal jams to find my favorite. This one is great!
It's a larger size as well.
Came quickly and was wrapped up well.
I sent these over to my husband when he was in Iraq and he absolutely loved them!
Great wet bag, holds a lot, keeps in the smell, and easy to wash. One of the better wetbags I've had.
Our snowflake sugar cookies looked so pretty with these sprinkles on them.  Almost too pretty to eat.  Awesome to find something unique for our cutout cookies.  Saw them in the real simple magazine.
Loved the size for only 3 net carbs. I made quesadillas all the time. Yum,  I love these things. Thank you mama lupe

My 5-year-old son was thrilled with this lunchbox, and immediately decorated it to his liking with the included stickers.  That is about where the delight ended!    Even though we read carefully the included instructions on how to put the top on the lunchbox and practiced faithfully, he could never get it on himself, despite working really hard at it.  I had a difficult time myself, and his teacher at school has never been able to get it on, despite my trying to teach her how.  He carries the lunchbox out of school flat, with the lid just resting on the top because no one at school can get it back on after lunchtime.    After the lid (mistakenly) went through the dishwasher once (with NO heated dry, only wash), the lid is now impossible for even me to seal.  It warped on one side.    We are disappointed in this purchase, and my son just gets sad every time he sees that cool lunchbox that he will never use again.  He had been so excited about it.    I recommend that you do a little more research and purchase a different item.

I searched for quite a while to find a unique and useful baby gift.  This blanket is perfect!  It is so versatile and the new mom loved it.  I chose the red Wallaboo and the color and material were great.  It did not come cheap, but I feel that it was worth every penny.  This will be one of my 'go-to' baby gifts and I will definitely buy it again when the need arises.

I ordered this for my Hyundai Sonota.  It was very easy to install.  The holes for the seatbelts were right where they needed to be.  I put two car seats in with no problem.  Now when the kids spill their food or drinks my seats will be safe.  When I took my Golden Retriever to the groomers it was easy to remove the car seats and put the dog in.  She had stepped in a puddle before getting back in the car.  Great!  No doggie prints on my car seat.  I LOVE this product!  Would highly recommend for parents, grandparents and pet owners!
The best thing since honey and sugar..taste great, I can watch my weight and enjoy in my teas, coffee or foods! Love it!
This is simply great coffee. I was never much of a coffee guy until I was spoiled with this. If you're a coffee fan you should definitely try this.
Was described as an inscribed plaque. This was nothing more then a piece of paper in a clear plastic picture frame.

I am a Salt-aholic but because of all the hoop-la out there about how bad salt is for us, I cut it out. Then The Salt Revolution caught my eye. I did some research & it opened my beautiful browns. Is there anything out there that Big Corp hasn't ruined?
When my 1st order came, evidently the packaging had not been sealed correctly & there was salt all over the place. I contacted the company & they graciously sent me a duplicate order. No charge. No questions asked. Meantime I gather the salt & begin my adventure. Oh my, I had no idea salt had a flavor! I couldn't stop tasting it. Aztec Sea Salt is a GORgeous addition to my spice table. I cook w/it. I finish w/it. I bake w/it. I dry some to put in my salt grinder & to have some available when I bake which I grind w/a mortar & pestle. It lends such a brightness to food without that dusty saltiness. It's not just...salt: It's substantial & has weight & I love the fact that it's fair trade. This company has the kind of integrity that I can support & a product that I can feel really, really good about. Will I tell my friends? I do.

My 2 month old grandbaby was mesmerized looking at herself in the mirror.  She could do this from either her back or her belly.  She also liked looking at the ladybug.  It was also useful in the car when propped up in her car seat (at the right distance of course) when she was getting fussy.  This is a great product for babies who can't yet grasp things but still need some visual stimulation for development.  I am really glad I bought this for her.

A friend of mine gave me this white tea of four flavors and I love it.  So I'm buying more!  Delicious and refreshing.  I've tried a lot of other brands over the years and this is the only tea that absolutely wowed me.
Too cute is all that I can say. I did not expect this item to show up as a crib set, including a t-shirt. My son now has a complete puma outfit and I am one happy mommy.
Maybe it was me but I could hardly get the ink on my child. And my son was rather large at birth and the pad was rather small compared to him.
GREAT product, tastes great. But it's available at Sprouts and other grocers for less than half the price! (As of this writing, Sprouts charges $2.99.)
Baby s face adorable but was badly stuffed and it's arms were huge look looked like a apes arms

This monitor worked great for just over the 2 years we've had it. Liked the "walky-talky" function, and the normal monitor function worked fine for listening to my daughter when sleeping. Right before the two year mark of using it, one of the receivers/parent unit quit working. It acted like it was trying to connect, but no sound came through. I still used the other unit for her naps so I could do yardwork and be able to hear if she was awake, but now the second unit has gone kaput! This time all the lights light up but no sound or anything. We've taken it apart, detached the battery, and still neither one work.
The base unit has a blue night light feature, which is helpful when needing to see in the dark, and my daughter now likes it as a night light for under her bed. It was too bright to have out in the open though, would keep her awake when she was a baby.
Bummed this did not last longer. Good monitor if not planning on long-term use!
I like it. I don't have anything to compare with but my buddy said its nice that you don't need to refrigerate after opening.

No matter how you might feel about this tea, think twice before you order it on Amazon.  I ordered this tea (net weight 1.65 oz) with two others.  I was charged $9.98 for the tea, AND $4.99 IN SHIPPING CHARGES FOR EACH TIN OF TEA!!!  i have uploaded the picture of the box (with missing 3rd tin of tea) as well as a copy of my invoice.  I made the mistake of thinking I could use my Amazon Prime Membership to move into supplying more of my home groceries over to Amazon.  I thought I could find brands that I liked.  Now I'm going to provide unwitting Amazon shoppers with a warning so that they don't spend $43.39 for three  tins of tea.  By the way, My order page listed these teas as costing "$0.00 (ZERO)" dollars until AFTER they were delivered.  It seems like the sellers have figured out how to rip off the Amazon customers.  By the time the customers figure it out, they're out hundreds of dollars.  Be forewarned.
It's totally worthy of the splurge and has held up like a dream.  I get compliments everywhere, and no one think it looks like a diaper bag!
this baby arrier is excellent, it is of good quality and very comfortable. the item was deliverd very quick for international delivery and well packaged

I bought two sets of these clippers. One to have in the nursery and one to take with us. They work great. They cut well and I feel I have good control when clipping little nails. I've only used the magnifier a few times but it's easy to fold it into the clippers and does not make them bulky.
We bought this for our daughter. Came quickly. Very easy to assemble. The music is so sweet. It is very pretty and well made
This has a great chipotle flavor kinda spicy but not to spicy. A 5yr old ate it and loved it. Product arrived in great condition maybe even better than local store.
So I think it's cheap, because the quantity is more than what I have expected. the candy is delicious. I have eaten a lot after I received it.
Made the switch from honey to this rock sugar for my tea and WOW!  It really makes a big difference.  You can actually taste the TEA, whereas the honey would cover up many of the more subtle flavors.
On a cold winter day, there is nothing better than a cop of steaming Apple cider. It's even better when there is no guilt about calories.

Was amazed at this product, read about it on the internet, but couldn't find it in my area.  When I started on the HCG diet, I was afraid that food would get boring in a hurry, but Bragg Liquid Aminos Marinade really adds to flavors.  It reminds me of a mixture of soy sauce, Worcestershire, and liquid smoke, all rolled into one.  I put it on everything, and I mean everything, from salads to meats.  The large size was perfect for me, since I shared with my daughter-in-law who also went through the diet with me.  Between the two of us, we have really experimented with tastes, and this one was a hit.  This also works well with the Miracle Noodles.

Great product, perfect blend of popcorn and butter and seasoning.  Very easy to use in our popper.  Individual packaging makes it easy to make just the right amount at any time.  We have used other brands and this one is consistently the best.
I brought it for my 8 months old but she refuses as the bristles are hard.
The candies melted when they arrived. I could feel the heat on the box. I think at least the box should be placed somewhere cooler on the truck (if there is any cooler place on the truck).

I am so happy with this product!  It is so much easier than boiling bottles and accessories.  I don't have to worry about leaving things in for too long, or getting things too hot and melting them like stovetop sterilizing.  I also don't have to fish things out of hot water.  I just easily load it up, pour in the water, and turn it on.  8 minutes later everything is sterile.  It is big enough to fit a lot of items at once too.  Its larger size is the reason I chose it over the microwave sterilizer from Avent, although I'm told it is wonderful too.  I highly recommend this sterilizer!  I also use the Avent Isis breastpump, the Avent bottles, and the Avent bottle/baby food warmer and am very happy with the whole product line!
My cats love them as a nutritious treat,  In fact they beg for them!  Makes their coats shiny and healthy.
This is the best white chocolate I have ever had. I made in a puff pastry with raspberries, it was delicious! Definitely recommend!

These are THE BEST to take with you ANYWHERE when you have kids.  Forget taking those portable potties with you to the park or on tripsâ€¦.  Too much to deal with.  We used them at first on the airplane but now I have one in my purse at all times for my 3 little kids.  They are so convenient and boys and girls can use them with ease.  I can just roll it up and put it back in my purse for the next kid.  I'd much rather use this than have them going into some of those disgusting bathrooms that are out there!!!

There is no way I would put my baby in there to sleep to inhale whatever chemicals were causing that odor - it smelled like strong adhesive.  Very disappointed.
We love this carrier, light and ready to go. Cheap for the use. Our everyday wear. Simple, and gets the job done.

I thought this looked like a cute stuffed animal from the Disney movie Lion King. I've been buying a movie and then a stuffed animal that's in the movie for my grandson. My grandson is 8months old so I've trying to find some a little smaller but not to small and very soft. This lion is perfect size and very soft and a added bonus it has a rattle inside the body that make's it perfect for a 8 month old. But it is not to babyish for him to love as he gets older. I'm very pleased with this purchase.

Very cool looking mat. I bought it for my friends' baby and they loved it.
Absolutely a gift of choice for a small baby !!

I love this peppersauce as it is very tasteful and is good to the last drop

This is the first decaf coffee that I have purchased that I actually enjoy.  Purchased on sale and with a $1.00 coupon, so my price was $8.00.  I was hoping to see this available on S & S at a discount.
Love the look on a mirror.  It's hard to apply because you have to lift it off the back paper and place on the surface.  With the cursive writing it can get difficult to apply.
These are amazing. My favorites. They are so good, my twelve year old is hiding them from me and giving me one per night because I can't stop eating them, if left to my own devices.

This is terrible coffee. When I received it, there was no packing slip or return address. I couldn't even send it back.
It's terrible coffee at an outrageous price.

I never thought I would use the word \\"Divine\\" to describe Beef Jerky. This is so good it's almost not jerky. Because it's not all dried-out shards of \\"stuff-posing-as-meat\\" like all of the other brands I've eaten. It's so juicy and succulent it is way beyond any Combat-Boot Jerky I have ever tasted in my life.
