We absolutely love this seat! The straps make it a perfect on the go booster seat for restaurants and other locations. Easy to clean and easy to use! Perfect for home and on the go!!

This gum is really good, tasty. I was a little worried about some of the other reviewers saying the gum lost its taste fast. I didn't notice that at all. It seemed to last about the same as any other gum I've had, They are ridiculously expensive though.

there is way too much "give" in this foam mattress. I would definitely not use it for an infant. ( I purchased this to use for a toddler to nap on)
The mattress is a bit too big for the play yard, even though it specifically indicated that it would fit an Evenflow portable Babysuite 300. the foam is encased in an ill fitting plastic/vinyl cover, which will make it a pain to wipe down. I would look elsewhere for a better mattress

These are pretty much the exact same as our 5 year old versions of this but...They used to have 5 point harness in this model but Graco in their wisdom got rid of a) 5 point harness b) rear cup holder...now just a bar c) tinted visor at the front of the canopies. Our 5 year old duo gilders have these features while these new do not. I guess they figure customers are to stupid to notice.

While they still remain good strollers the gouging by reducing features is not acceptable especially when a 5 point harness is a safety feature. Now they only have it on the more expensive Quattro version.

Only advice for this product is to be sure that your dog cannot fit through the bars if they are small. The bars are about 3" apart and our 4 month old puppy just slipped right through. She was 7 pounds and didn't look like she could fit, but she did. As she has grown this gate works really well! We love the easy access door and it makes it easy to leave up wherever we need it. And it makes it tough for our puppy to jump up because they are all vertical bars.

My mom first bought me the version that was by Queen City Coffee Co at TJ Maxx and it was so amazing that I had to repurchase, but couldn't find it under the Queen City name. Then I found La Crema. La Crema either acquired the previous company or revamped it, but with the name change came the flavor change and not for the better. The Queen City one had a soft vanilla, nutty flavor to it while the La Crema version was just had an overpoweringly sugary undertone. I didn't like it and I'm sad I'm stuck with it.

I purchased these cookies for my elderly loved one to treat diarrhea.  I had read this is a natural remedy through readers of Peoples Pharmacy.  Thus far, it works!  To top it, she's happy to eat these tasty cookies.

I have been buying Stoneridge dried blueberries for a long time and have not been able to find them locally, so I decided to try amazon.  There I found many different fruits that I had never seen dried, including the strawberries.  They are big in size and very good.  I love them on my oatmeal.  The Stoneridge brand is the Cadillac of dried fruit in my opinion.  Every product I have tried has been a winner!!
Hard to sharpen. The little badge fell off in two days. You get what you pay for. I was hoping to see if I liked shaving with a straight razor before I ordered a more expensive one.

If I could give this product six stars I would. I have been through a lot of carriers. I have tried tie on ones, slings, free standing backpacks, and more. We go on a lot of park hikes with our now two year old, who just can't make it the whole way or up the steep hills. We bought this carrier to try it out in hopes it would do better than all the others we had tried. It's fantastic! My son loves sitting in it (and he's a busy boy who'd rather be running). His weight doesn't pull on my shoulders like others because it's designed just like a backpack with a strap around the hips where all the weight is distributed. I was worried that my figure wouldn't allow me to snap the buckle across the chest, but it isn't even needed. I haven't tried washing it yet, we've only used it four times. Hopefully it will hold up in a washing and cleaning, but I might even dry clean this just so it will last longer. I love it.
So nice to have two bases. One for my car and one for my husbands. Makes taking either car easy and simple. Super easy to install.
Saved the day when I couldn't find this stuff after hitting 6 different local stores! A necessary addition to my holiday pfefferneuse, and these were nice and fresh.

This chair is meant to be a lower cost alternative to the popular tripp-trapp chair. It is close, but the design just does not cut it. In fact, at times this chair is unsafe.
The lower foot rest portion of the chair, when placed in position for a larger child is only held loosely into its groove, causing the foot rest to fall out all the time. Seldom is one of our mealtimes not interrupted by my youngest daughter's foot rest clattering to the floor. The seat is better, but prone to the same movement and she has fallen a couple of times as the seat has become displaced. I guess the seat portion moves less because of the added weight on the seat (as opposed to the lower weight, but greater movement to which a foot rest is subjected).
Overall, nice idea, really poor implementation. Spend the extra $100 and get the Tripp Trapp.

I bought this bedrail a couple weeks ago after looking around at different retailers. I could not find an Extra Long bedrail for under $29.99. This one was very simple to set up. There were no tools required just plugged the ends of the metal frame together and thats about it. Took me about a total of 10 minutes. Would also suggest reading instructions or at least giving them a glance over. The bedrail is very easy to use and swings down that allows me to change the sheets and make the bed. This thing is sturdy too and has held up to some pretty wild kids. So far it has done it's job, was easy to set up and use daily and was the lowest priced extra long bedrail I could find online or in-store. In my book thats a winner. I would recommend.

Nice concept but the product was only okay. I don't love it but it works. My daughter finds it fairly entertaining and it works well as we introduce solids. However, the tray can be a pain to get on and it's difficult to turn. Not bad for the price but I'd probably go with a different version next time.
I like the taste.  It is good for blending.  Take the cheapest coffee at Walmart and add a little bit of this and you have a good coffee.

I looked at 20+ high chairs and loved the Peg-Perego; my sister used Peg-Perego with both of her kids so I decided to get this chair (due to it's solid, will not flip even if you lean on it and easy to move around the house). The day I got the chair I was so excited! Took it out of the box and put it all together (took just a few min). I started playing with it and boy was I disappointed; to recline the chair you pull this plastic lever in the back of the seat, when I was pulling the lever it was sticking and the chair would also stick reclining, I did it a few more times and the plastic lever totally broke off. Honestly to pay 200 bucks for plastic that sticks is a big disappointment! I returned this chair, Amazon was great got my money back really fast and purchased the new 2012 Peg Perego Siesta Highchair.

I absolutely love Starbucksâ€™ VIA products but the two I love most (VIA Mocha and VIA Vanilla) seem to have been discontinued. I was pleasantly surprised to find the peppermint mocha VIA although the price has increased significantly over the last year or two but in light of it not being offered in Starbucksâ€™ stores in my area, it was well worth the money spent.

I ordered 2 boxes (24 total) and 2 of the lollipops were not working properly: one had a very blurry image and the other was not working at all.  While the other functioning lollipops are truly great and I'm sure the kids would really enjoy them, I am disappointed that I got short-changed in my order.
Very dried out. They breakâ€‹ apart when trying to remove them from the package. I may have expected this towards the end of the box as it will take time to eat them all, but not from the very start.

As a long time (heavy) coffee drinker the switch to decaf (nevermind the reasons) was tough, but the worst part was the almost complete lack of quality options. Sure there's the swill level decaf (Folgers, Maxwell House, etc.) but what does a coffee lover do when cafeine is no longer an option? One choice might be SBC's Twilight Decaf, which is actually a pretty pleasant coffee that brews a rich, smoky but not burnt flavor. Some folks swear by Starbuck's Decaf Verona which I do not like as much as SBC.     Then this came along...    I've had other Jeremiah's Pick coffees... my wife still drinks the real stuff... and found them to be well crafted. But this French Roast really hits the mark with me. It's roasted well and carries a full deep flavor. Better yet the price is lower than many of the alternatives. I liked this so much I now get it on subscription.

These are fraudulent Starburst. I bought a package, thinking that they would be tiny unwrapped versions of the originals. They are nothing like the original Starburst. They look like Chiclets, and they have a strange texture. They don't taste anything like the tangy, gooey candy that I love.
They are much harder, and in the end, I think Starburst has made a big mistake. They won't be on the market long.
Perfect car trash can! Some reviews say it's a bit small but I was looking for something that isn't so big that it gets in the way. Haven't had it long but it appears to be well-made.

We bought this for our son when he was about 2 months and he still loves it at 6 months. At two months he enjoyed looking in the mirror and kicking the piano. Now at almost 6 months he can bat at the toys and hold onto them. It has been endless entertainment for him. Great purchase!
We returned this puppy. The picture is cute but the puppy isn't the same as the picture. He's long and cheaply made.
I love these Werthers sugar free candies, they're so delicious but as with all the sugar free candies if you eat too many you'll have lots of gas and other stuff.

If you had asked me to rate these before, I would have said 5/5 because I really do like these bottles but after noticing today the bottles and caps are made from different plastics (bottles are 5, caps are 7) I have to give them a 1/5 (and I would give them a 0/5 if I could). 7 plastics are not safe. I will no longer use these bottles.

Spectrum canola oil is the best!  It is not genetically engineered, and it is expeller pressed rather than extracted by Hexane.  This is important because I have allergies (one is corn) and expeller pressed oils are pure 100% oil.  Therefore, no allergy problems unlike the hexane extracted oils.  I also cook, quite a lot, and I find the Spectrum canola oil to be a wonderful all purpose oil that does just as well in the frying pan as it does in my other dishes that require a bit of oil.  The seller which sold me the 6 x 32 oz bottles was also nice to deal with, sending me my order promptly and it arrived in perfect condition, nicely packed.

My twin girls were having terrible gas pains since they were a week old or less. It prevented them from sleeping, or being comfortable in general. It was painful to watch them screaming and squirming unable for find relief. I decided to try these bottles on a whim. What did I have to lose? It was an expensive investment, as I said, we have twins. But it was totally worth it. We saw a difference in them within 12 hours of starting these bottle, and there's been no looking back.

The parts are a pain to wash, and refilling the bottle can be a hassle, but that inconvenience is totally worth it. I willk say the bottle do leak if the neck gets wet. So it's important to keep the collar and neck dry. This can be a real paing in the ass once a leak does start. It's difficult to stop sometimes. But then I just switch the contents to a new bottle. It's a relatively minor inconvenience compared with what we were dealing with before. And since bottle washing can be so time consuming, we have 25 bottle that we use for our twins, and then run the dishwasher once a day.
My wife wanted a thin blanket that would allow our young daughter to breath and not get tangled. My daughter love this blanket.

Holy cow. People use one of these packets per 2 cups of water?! No way. One packet lasted me about 6 drinks, or 12 cups of water. If I dumped a whole packet in my drink it would be way too sweet. Maybe it's because I'm not used to stevia but man... These things pack some flavor.

On the plus side, the 5 pack lasted me a couple months.

The colors in the photos are not the same as the actual color of the bedding. I was hoping for the muted colors in the photo, but instead the colors were bold and cheap looking. The fabric is scratchy and similar to fabric used in $30.00 bedding sets from the large discount chains. I was going to keep the set and wash it to see if the colors would fade, or if the fabric might soften, but it is too expensive to keep on the hopes it could improve. I am going to pick up one from a discount chain at a third of the price and save my money for when I find one that I really like. My son will be disappointed. It is hard to find a good looking set for boys.
This particular sauce in great for many different foods not only pasta.  If your looking for a jarred sauce with great flavor this is the one to buy.

Love stroller from the first time I saw it. I have another stroller at home (at the same price) but this one is way better. The quality of the stroller is apparent that you can immediately realize it. I feel the sitting space should be a bit larger.
Very flimsy. No shape to the product and the aluminum lining for the cup holder has already torn.

I'm finding that a lot of these products share an "instant coffee" flavor.  I don't think there's any way one would mistake this for a demi-tasse of freshly-brewed espresso.  Handy, though - you might use this to bump up a cup of regular instant, mixing part this and part regular stuff.
Really love the taste of this brittle!  Hard to keep on hand, seems  to go so fast, but very pricey, but worth it

These were satisfying if you've got an urge for something salty and crunchy. Having said that, my first mouthful or two tasted like styrofoam but after I had half of a small bag I started to get that need for crunch and salt urge satisfied. I wouldn't buy them again as they weren't that noteworthy but in a pinch they were okay.

I received a 3 ounce package of these for free and did not realize that they were $30 for 10 packages.. I consider that expensive for snack food and would not buy it.

Having said all this, people vary. The fact that they are air poppe, lower in fat and low salt may be attractive to some people who enjoy snack food. The only way for you to know for sure is to try it.

My 6 year old loves it. But, it already has a rip in the material by the front zipper. I want to send it back to get a new one. But, my kid will not part with it. So now we have a new ripped backpack.
Thanks for letting me vent.
Stacy

I can't believe how amazing these bibs are! They are so easy to wipe clean and they never develop that icky moldy smell that other baby bibs are so prone to. The easy snap-into-place fastener at the neck is creative and looks pretty cool too. And the pouch can literally catch an entire bowl of cereal and milk, we tested that theory this morning. This is one of the very best baby/toddler products I've ever come across and I highly recommend it!

I'm not the type to write reviews but this product warranted one. I also wanted to clear up some confusion. As another reviewer previously stated, please do not rate this product badly when you clearly are using it wrong. As with all Avent nipples, there is a fine, almost invisible line on the edge of the nipple. The proper way to position the nipple on the white screw ring is to make sure the fine line lands between the gap of the three screw lines under the white screw ring..got it? So if you're done cleaning the nipple and you're ready to put the nipple through the screw ring, make sure the line on the nipple lands in the gap of the screw lines under the screw ring.

After you position the nipple, place the adapter bottle ring on the bottle and then tighten the screw ring on top. If you do this properly, there will be zero leaks. With this mouthful said, i do agree that Avent should make it easier to use their bottles without leaks. They should also tell you how to do this (i figured it out after doing a Google search because the packaging didn't say this).

On to the variable flow nipple...

My son has severe reflux and the doctors at the hospital where he went after a scary incident said to add rice to his cereal and to cut the tops of the nipples so the breast milk would flow easier. This worked for approximately two months until the holes became so wide because of the cleaning that my son started to choke on his milk. I found these nipples and they work great! The flow (when the III mark is towards his nose) is fast enough where my son doesn't get frustrated when sucking but not so fast that he chokes on the milk.

My gripes? They're expensive.

I love this crib. I have twins and purchased two of these because I don't have the space for two full-size cribs. They really are ideal.  I highly recommend them.  I bought them at Babies R Us, where I also bought the portable crib sheet and portable crib bumper (at the recommendation of the store employee).  The Koala Baby porta-crib bumper is TOO LONG for this crib.  Some Babies R Us stores will recommend you purchase the CRADLE bumper set by Koala Baby instead.  It's TOO SHORT!  I am so furious. I'm planning to write a letter to Cosco complaining that their product doesn't come with a safe bumper for infants.  The sheets fit fine, btw.  This wouldn't be a problem if your child is older, but for babies I would be cautious about choosing this crib without a properly fitting bumper.

I ordered this when the price was really low, and I figured I'd give it a shot, despite the reviews that claimed it smelled like cat urine.
I'm glad I gave it a chance! Now I have 6 boxes of this tea that has become one of my favorites!
Most of the complaints are about the smell, but honestly that's what I like about it most. I always liked the smell of french vanilla coffee, but I never liked drinking the stuff. The vanilla smell from this tea reminds me of that, and is pleasant to me.
The flavor is subtle and smooth. It is easier on an empty stomach than some of the other green teas I've had (I didn't get the urge to throw up as I have had with other flavors).
I can see how it might not be for everyone, but I would give it a shot. If nothing else, it's something different to try.

When I took the first taste of this salt, a flood of energy came down through the top of my head and I became instantly enlightened.

Actually not. It just tastes like overpriced salt.

So first of all I LOVE AMAZON...I ordered this bag Wednesday night and it was at my door Friday afternoon!      This diaper bag is perfect!  I had been looking for another diaper bag and am SO glad I decided on this one!  It fits everything I need and So much more!  I love how much it DOESN'T look like a diaper bag...it looks like a big purse!  It seems like it is VERY well made!  I cannot tell you how much I can fit into to...and how well everything is organized in it!  Stop thinking about it and ORDER it!  Well worth the price!  I ordered the pewter dots and love the color and design thinking about getting the black one as well!
The product was top of the line....awesome. I would recommend to anyone. It arrived on time in great condition. Satisfied me.
Husband assembled it easily, looks promising and we're excited for our little one to use it.
This is my favorite Keurig coffee. I have trie ALOT of flavors and this one is smooth, light and has just a hint of sweetness. It smells amazing while brewing too:)

Great quick way to make Jerky.  Yes, I could probably mix all my own spices but this makes it easier.  Good sweet and spicy flavor though I often mix this with the Mesquite flavored seasoning (half and half) to give a little smokey flavor to the jerky.  This seems to work well...I also add a little Soy Vey Very Very Teriyaki  to the mix to add a little more sweetness.  I don't follow the directions to a tea other than the quantities of spices to use.  I mix everything in a bowl and then either put the bowl in the refrigerator or put it all in a zip lock back for a day or two to let it marinade....then I put it in the dehydrator on the highest setting for about 8 hours...the result...Mouth-watering jerky....
Absolutely love this stuff!! Delicious, refreshing and so much better for you than a lot of stuff out there. Fan for life!!
I have found this to be the best tasting Balsamic vinager for my homemade salad dressings. The price is a premium compared to store brands, but this tastes so much better.

Emerald nuts are delicious!  These have a dry light chocolate taste that fools you into thinking you are having something forbidden.  But instead it is just as healthy as can be.  My son is on the Paleo diet, and he loves these for an occasional change.  I would suggest, however, you have a beverage handy because the dryness seems to call for a drink...  Even so, I love them for an energy boost or treat.  ....I've convinced myself!  I'm reordering tonight!
These hazelnuts are extremely fresh and taste awesome. Really good product hard to find anything of this quality in stores
I purchased this to contain the many lids and tops that find themselves in the dish washer.  It does a fine job.

they are great for my cooking, even as coffee sweetener, lemon drinks and for rmy oatmeals and barleys. Just a teaspoon is enough to make a difference in my drinks. even in baking the taste is greatly improved and makes candies easy to make and tasty. I love the fact that this is made from pure honey.It is mild but with a very distinct nice flavor. It is great for me for it has no cholesterol and trans fat.1 bottle last for amonth or so.
i love this product. Thank you.

I was at my local health food store the other day and saw these. They seemed interesting so I thought I'd give them a try. Wow! I just loved them! The avocado oil gives them a more deep, well-rounded flavor than the regular potato chips that you'd get at the store. The chips are also of a decent thickness so you get a crunch without it being too much, but also without it being just a slight crispiness. I haven't eaten Lay's in a long time but I remember them being thinner and Terra Chips being a lot thicker -- these are in-between. In my mind, it's the perfect thickness. They aren't too salty, but also aren't lacking in salt. I've bought bags of Beanitos wherein some of the chips didn't seem to have salt at all -- I didn't have this problem with these chips. Another thing -- and really the selling point for me -- was that I just felt better eating these. I don't have a problem eating the occasional junk food so it's not that. I really think that maybe the avocado oil might just add some mineral/vitamin aspect to things that just makes my body feel better -- that's my theory anyway. I can't say that everyone will feel this way (my body is certainly not what I'd call "normal" in its reaction to foods), but I felt it was important to mention that these just make me feel good to eat. That's why I purchased a giant 12-pack. Please note that, the chips have a different package than the one shown (see here for the web page which shows a new package style: http://www.goodhealthnaturalproducts.com/good-snacks/categories/all-snacks/item/5-avocado-oil-sea-salt.html). When I purchased them in the health food store, the image shown in this listing was the style of the packaging, however, when buying them on Amazon, the packaging was different. They're still the same, delicious chips, but just in a different bag. Also, though I'm not sure anyone will care about this, but when I ordered mine, the box used to ship them was a box which read "Good Health Kettle Style Potato Chips" -- so if you care about others knowing what you're buying, be warned that it's possible that this will be right out in the open. I didn't mind but I realize some people do.

Overall, I'd say that these chips are really my new favorites. I don't think I've ever purchased a 12-pack of chips before. I'm more of a sweets person than a salty snack person, in general, but these I just fell in love with. I wouldn't just recommend them to others, I'd buy them for parties, keep them in the house for guests, and gladly share with friends. They're fabulous! -- And, on top of that, they're non-GMO verified! Just wonderful! :)to Chips" -- so if you care about others knowing what you're buying, be warned that it's possible that this will be right out in the open. I didn't mind but I realize some people do.

Overall, I'd say that these chips are really my new favorites. I don't think I've ever purchased a 12-pack of chips before. I'm more of a sweets person than a salty snack person, in general, but these I just fell in love with. I wouldn't just recommend them to others, I'd buy them for parties, keep them in the house for guests, and gladly share with friends. They're fabulous! -- And, on top of that, they're non-GMO verified! Just wonderful! :)
Absolutely the best crab cake mix ever.  It's got a little bit of zip to it that makes it so flavorful--you won't be disappointed!
The container is small, and also, its screw-on axis is short, so you cannot make a lot of coffee with it. If you just want to make a small cup then it is fine.

After trying this coffee, I have changed my mind about my favorite k-cup. I thought Sumatran reserve was the best, but I know different now. Double black diamond is really really dark, has great flavor, and seems to have a pretty good amount of caffeine.

I was given the Boppy as a shower gift and found it totally worthless for nursing! I ended up using a bunch of pillows instead, until I discovered the Luna Lullaby! The lactation consultant center has about 10 of these for use during their consultations; the second I tried it, I knew I had to have one. I ordered the fabric with the pink owls and it is adorable. By far the best nursing pillow out there. It's great for women of all sizes, too.

Very good candy. Only lasts me a couple of days (I've already bought 2 twelve packs because they are so addicting). If you enjoy this candy, then don't be afraid of buying in bulk. Maybe just try to limit your intake of them a little better than I did because mine were gone within the week.

This is the only diaper cream we use, my son has only had a couple minor diaper rashes and baby butz makes them disappear in a day. We use it every night to prevent rashes as well. Love that it's scent free/all natural and created by a mom. Great stuff, I highly recommend it!
A decent product but not what I was expecting. I was hoping for a more traditional flavor of Apple and cinnamon.
I use these to clean out reusable straws and other hard to clean kitchen stuff. Works great, and it's helpful that they can stand upright to dry.

I like the Teriyaki beef jerky as it's usually a little more tender than the 'original' one. This was a relatively good batch with only a couple pieces in two of the packs that were a little extra tough. Jack Link's is one of the decent jerky's that I've had over the years.

I definitely will buy it again, as making your own between the price of the sliced meat, the liquid smoke, seasoning, dehydrator and mess is more trouble than it's worth. So thanks for a good product!!
My son is almost a year old and still loves turning the mobile on and watching the projection.  Much better than other mobiles I've owned in the past since it still works a year later!

The design for this no-drip pitcher is good, allowing my maple syrup to drip down the spout and back into the glass jar, rather than onto the outside of the glass jar.  However the plastic top is flimsy and is difficult to screw tightly onto the glass jar.  I have found that cleaning out a small olive oil bottle and using that bottle, which has a similar spout design, works better for my maple syrup.

You have to develop an acquired taste for this product.  I grew up in Thailand and it was very common for Thais to add a few drops of this product to their ice water to create herbal, earthy, and refreshingly minty taste (plus it masks the taste of bad water).  I've grown nostalgic and found this product on Amazon so I thought I'd give it a try.  Same product as I recall from my childhood although with more modern/updated packaging.  I add this to my ice water to give it a nice minty 'kick' plus it turns the water pink so my 3-year-old daughter is intrigued.  However, both my daughter (not surprised) and my husband HATE the taste.  (My husband claims that it taste like dirt.)  Anyway, I truly enjoy it and it always bring back the taste of home so there is a nostalgic value to this for me.

Tully's \\"House Blend\\" has become the coffee I always have on hand. It has a  rich, deep, full bodied flavor without being bitter. I have a delicate stomach so occasionally I do notice the slight acidic content, but typically have no issues with this blend.

The Momâ€™s Collapsible Water Bottle is identical in shape and function to their Kidâ€™s Collapsible Water Bottle-which I have previously reviewed. The difference is in the size and color. I love that cute picture of Mama and Baby together. Everyone knows breastfeeding Mamaâ€™s need to drink lots of water to help their body make the best milk for their babies. This water bottle helps you do it in style. It has a pop-tab lid that closes tightly and doesnâ€™t leak which is great, especially when you live with kids. I love the handy clip that comes attached (but is detachable) because you can clip it to almost anything- pockets, purse straps, stroller handles! This way your hands are free but you can still grab a drink when needed. My three year old really enjoyed this, too, because she loves when Mommy and her have â€œmatchingâ€ things. Our matching water bottles were all the rave for the first week or so.

*I was provided with this product free of charge in exchange for my honest review. I was not paid monetarily for this post.
Good except for slimy green bits that slide down my throat causing a choke! Tastes good, need to strain out the bits.
We love re-play. These have been the best utensils for our daughter thus far. We started using them at about 1 1/2.  I wish we had tried them sooner.

This stuff is great!  It tastes good and is easy to work with.  I had only ever used Wilton brand fondant and there is a world of difference.  This is a much softer product that is very easy to work with.  It was enough fondant to cover a 16x16 square two-layer tier, a very tall four-layer tier that was a top hat and the brim of the hat.  It does need a little bit of drying time to be stiff enough to hold it's shape, but that was not really an issue, just a note. It was a true black.  I was very happy with it.

This product has made me extremely happy!!!
I like the variation available in this pack, the flavors included are some of my favorites-extremely happy with this purchase.
Fast delivery and as ordered and expected they fit the cups perfect and are in great condition, I only wish they were less expensive.

Love this so much. Getting another one and returning a glass bottle I tried as well because this is so much better. After reading a few reviews about the tweaking the silicone top, I made it into a straw cup using a steel straw. The silicone tops (Pura brand) and straws are sold separately. See picture. This is definitely worth your money. Will be getting smaller bottles for baby on the way for any bottle feeding we might do.

As advertised, but didn't arrive as scheduled meaning we couldn't use it for the "big event" we'd scheduled.  Our homemade alternative was great so have put this in the freezer awaiting the next "big event"...we'll see which we like better ...  ours or theirs :-)
My 6 month old daughter loves this exersaucer more each day. The toys are adorable for a little girl.

This is without question the biggest hunk of junk ever.  I really wish I had paid more attention to the reviews here because everyone seems to be in agreement.  It is impossible to open.  It kept falling down in the doorway.  It basically needed to be adjusted every time it was used.  it is packed up and sittting by my front door waiting for UPS to come get it tomorrow!

I'd only give this product 1 star for taste, it's not very good and it's gritty; however, it deserves 5 stars for the improvement to my IBS symptoms.  It's the 1st thing I've ever tried that has consistently - day after day - made a difference and I've tried a lot of different things!

I received a small box of Ahmad Tea Mango Black Tea in a gift basket. It's not something I would have thought I would like. When I tried it, however, I fell in love with it. I've hardly used the coffee pot lately because I keep wanting more of this tea.

The tea retains it's black tea character but is made really special by the bright, but not too fruity, mango flavoring.

If you like flavored black teas (particularly if you drink tea with milk, as opposed to lemon), you may just find this as surprising, delightful, and delicious as I did.
These are the only pretzels I will eat and they are great will always order these when I can do so

Very expensive, but excellent product! If you happen to be of the slighter build you may need to place something around your waist to relieve pressure on your hips/buttocks since it can dig into you a bit. Don't lean too far back or you may topple.

This is great tasting, moist jerky, with a great flavor.  I give it high marks.    I cannot say enough good things about the service of this company.  Everything arrived ahead of schedule, exactly as I ordered it, in great shape.
Great product, received in only a few days after order. Great buying experience. Will do business again.Great taco seasoning for Mexican low sodium night.
I wouldn't drink this stuff again.  Years ago I had Jamaican Blue from Gloria Jean and you couldn't beat it.  This stuff is something that should be beat!
The Crispy Wheat crackers are my favorite.  They really are crispy and taste great alone or with soup, cheese, etc

I just recieved this bra and I was scared to order a xs-m size because pre pregnancy I was a 34DD and I have no idea what size I am not but at  7 months my size has really gone up. This bra is really adjustable and fits very well. It has a velcro adjustable piece in the back and an extra add on piece in the front if you need it also comes with straps if you need that extra support. Personally I made the back piece smaller and added the extra piece up front with the straps and the openings for the pump are in the right places.I haven't pumped with the bra on yet as I still have 3 months left in my pregnancy but the bra is very comfortable thick and holds the pump in place with great security.

I bought this 2 months ago. I LOVED it, at first. The opening is wide enough that I can carry a sleeping baby through it without banging my hip on it. I didn't think it would be secure, but it really was! My 3 and 4 year old figured out how to open it within a few days, but it wasn't an issue because it was to keep my baby from climbing the stairs. It was nice that the older kids could operate it so I didn't have to come running every time they wanted to go to their rooms. The reason I only gave this 3 stars is because of 2 reasons.
Within a month of having it, the auto close feature stopped working. It wouldn't slam shut after opening. I don't know why this is. The second reason is because after having it for 2 months, my daughter opened the gate and hung on it. It snapped at the hinge. I know this is my daughters fault, however I feel it is Munchkins fault too. The entire gate is metal, and the closures are plastic. If you look at the picture, the top right hinge (the side that doesn't open) is plastic inside, not metal. Therefore wasn't as sturdy as it could have been. I think if they replaced that plastic with metal (on the inside) it would be near indestructible and worthy of 5 stars.
Nice blend of spices but I'm guessing it's not fresh because I didn't get a lot of flavor from it.
Great tasting oil, I just use it as a dressing without anything added to it on romaine salad with a diced egg.

This is the worst sippy cup out there.  It leaks with every single use.  I originally thought the one cup I had was defective, but the second one did the same thing.  I spoke with other friends who have used this cup who report the same thing.
I am in Southern California and these grew great for me.  I grew some in the pepper plant hangers and some on the ground.  Both did fine.

My daughter LOVES alligators, and I struggled to find a toy alligator for her to carry around that didn't look super-scary or have sharp plastic "spikes" all over it.  Though she's a big old for this toy (she's 3), I'm excited to give it to her for Valentine's Day.  I bought this toy for $9 on Amazon which is half the price it's available on the maker's website or at Books - a - Million where I saw it last week.

Wow! Wow! Wow! We got this just in time to head out on vacation. A 10+ hour drive with 4 kids meant that having cold drinks (like milk, no drinking and driving!) was a must! I put a quart of chocolate milk into this and set off on the road. What was left when we arrived (about 11 hours later) was still cold! Call me impressed! I imagine that this would also be perfect for wine or other cold items! Having received this item at a discount in exchange for my review, I'd have to say it's better than I thought it would be! I love having this on our trip. It's also helping taking my iced tea to the beach and keeping it COLD!

I like to use it with red pepper, hot paprika, and cayenne to give some character and complexity to my dishes. This spice was fresh and flavorful, no complaints. Chipotle is an expensive spice. This is a very reasonable price, maybe half my local grocery store price.

This product is USDA Organic. It has the following ingredients: Organic green beans, water and sea salt. I would recommend this item to anyone wanting to eat organic green beans. I would be hesitant to order them online for fear of damaged cans, as I have already experienced. For those who like a variety of beans, Libby's offers organic black beans, garbanzo beans, kidney beans and pinto beans. I have tried each of them and would recommend any of them. Some Kroger stores have their own variety or beans too, but they have yet to offer a green bean.

Seaweed in general, no matter what product, will taste a bit fishy, but i LOVE fish, so the taste is on point for me.  The chipotle seasoning adds a great flavor and a bit of spice, which is a delightful change to the traditional seaweed.  What separates seasnax seaweed from other seaweed snacks though is the fact that they use OLIVE OIL, which is clean and unprocessed, rather than your traditional processed and cheap canola oil.  To me, that makes seasnax a far more superior product that i will continue ordering on a monthly basis. not sure why other seaweed snack companies won't follow suit.

I'm a BIG chai drinker . . . a local bakery makes their own chai and I think it is absolutely the best. However, when I'm at home I have to buy a commercial product--and nothing has equalled what I feel is the best. Until now--but the David Rio folks are not going to like me . . .

I had a little Big Train spiced chai left (which is generally too sweet for me), so I bought the DR chai and combined the two. Now I have pretty close to perfection. The DR chai is not as sweet as I would like (on its own)--but with Big Train, I highly recommend it.

My son hated the thickness of the mesh, I think. He couldn't get over the texture of it to even bite into it for the juices of its contents. Plus, they sent me a boy color and a girl color when I purchased 2 boy colors.
My aunt who is 99+ loves this product.  It is a warn memory from her childhood.

I can't believe how horrible this so-called cheesecake was. It didn't taste like cheesecake, caramel or apple. I don't know what it tasted like other than very sweet. I couldn't identify the flavor. And I feel so cheated that I paid $25 for it! Don't waste your money.
better price than grocery store.  This is my favorite flavor but it can be a little sweet.  there is also a reduced sugar version i get sometimes too.
It is really very pretty but I should have paid more attention to the size - it was much smalled than I expected
I have been looking for a wonderful coffee to use in our drip maker & stove top expresso.  This is perfect & great taste. Not bitter.
Very good almond flour. The finest grind we've found so far. More like actual flour. Really great for Atkins lifestyles like ours.

This hat arrived within 2 weeks, all the way from China, on free shipping, so I can't complain.  The hat is actually more of a purple (instead of blue) and green, but it is still adorable and the price was great.  I paid less than $4 for the hat, so I'm pretty happy.  I ordered a similar hat at the same time I ordered this one, from another company, and it still hasn't arrived, and that was 5 weeks ago!!  Big mistake!  Just stick with amjimshop, you won't be disappointed!
The scent is not as strong as Wet Ones and the dispenser box dispenses one at a time more easily, too.  Great for hospital stays, travel, and daily cleanliness.
I love everything about this booster seat.  It straps in easily and supports my child very well.  Also, gives options of other ways to latch to be compatible to our other vehicles.
I absolutely love this carseat and stroller. It's just perfect for my daughter. I love how easily it is to stroll.
The box was a nice size, my children all got plenty of them in their Easter baskets, but the best part was there was some left over for my husband and I.

My son loves this! It's an easy distraction whenever we go out somewhere and even though it is a little big for my taste, it does match a lot of my outfits. My boyfriend even wears it, probably even more than I do. I would definitely recommend this to every mom and/or dad of a teething baby.
Like this. Gave it to my daughter for my granddaughter. Looks great in her room.
My daughter loves this and it's perfect for travel. It fits perfectly back in the bag and provides a nice shaded area for my daughter to play or nap.

I wanted a liner I could wash with our cloth diapers and needed several for home and daycare.  So happy I found this one, it's affordable (comapred to the other options), closes making transporting dirties from daycare easy, washes up nicely, and is just pefect.  I even take it to the pool for wet clothes/towels and when traveling as a dirty clothing bag!I bought 3 since I already had a different pail liner, but having 4 liners is plenty for using cloth diapers full time at both home and daycare, I could have just 3 and be fine, but like I said, I find plenty of uses for these!

I've been an avid FTL buyer for some time now, and the last batch of poppy seeds i received were nasty, bitter and had a toxic taste.

I have I.B.S, Celiac Disease and daily diarrhea. . . I use poppy tea at the request of my holistic doctor and Rabbi.

I spent around 182$ on two orders which i were awful and did nothing like they usually do, furthermore . . .
I was recieved no compensation or refund. . .Alexander asked me to return the item, yet i told him they were wet ( since i already said i used it as tea, i told him i'd send him back the wet seeds after drying, yet he said No)

He gave me a one sentence response, i'm shocked, i've spent over a thousand dollars on FTL and was treated with no respect. . . very hurt,

I will change my review if i ever feel respected or he helps me genuinely. . . i asked him to check my history, and this was the FIRST time i've complained. . .
My 6 yr old daughter love's this it made her frozen bedroom that much better.  It is nice and easy to hang.

These are good cups overall, the best we have found to stop leaks.  Withholding 1 star because they are hard to dry due to the shape.  Also, the value inside that is removable is a little hard to clean if you've had something like chocolate milk in it.
This turtle keeps invading my child's bath and even has the audacity to complain about the water temperature! I hope they aren't all so ill-bred.

I really wanted to find a substitute for the Nespresso cups .
I usually drink the caramel of Nespresso but I wanted more cool flavors , so when I saw here the coconut flavor oh my g!! I had to try it :-)
But I guess nothing can replace the rich flavors and aroma Nespresso have.
DONT BUY IT
Remember I told you so ...
People who say it's the best prob like average stuff . Not me. Kill me.
It's VERY watery and soooo not tasty .
Even if you like to drink latte with lots of milk/Sugar it won't help making it better!!
I threw everything to the trash immediately after one try.
I have lots of friends with Nespresso machines but this capsules are so bad that I couldnt even give it to them as a free gift to try it .
Let's hope Nespresso will add more new flavors.
Im staying faithful and loyal . Im done with trying other stuff.

Delicious. Good and strong but slightly less bitterness than Tully's French roast. Out of all the dark roasts, this is the best K-Cup I've had yet. Just hoping these things get a little cheaper now that the patent's up!
I use this in my Vi-shakes and love that it gives me the same great taste of peanut butter without the extra fat and calories! PLUS I get extra protein and it tastes chocolatey!!! YUMMMY!
I accidentally got this not realizing it had coffee in it, but if you like or love coffee, it will taste pretty good
I bought some of this locally to try as the Pad Thai was great. Disappointingly, the sauce has a sort of weird chemical taste--not at all pleasant.

I recieved my Bedding and cried when I saw my Baby's name on the pillow, it was just beautiful! I would definitely order with this company again. My daughters room looks like it's right out of a Magazine, and I got plenty compliments on it.
Thanks Happy Mommy

I have eaten this spaghetti mix for as long as I can remember, over 20 years.  I have always bought the mix at the store and I would buy like 30 packets to last over a year.  When I ran out this past time, I ordered it from Amazon a couple months ago.  It does not taste like it used to at all.  I don't like it.  I am so upset.  It's not expired, and I got a shipment after amazon got a reshipment, (it had been out of stock) so it should have been fresh.  SO bummed.  Haven't eaten spaghetti in like 2 months.

I just ordered more of these cute little bowls because I liked the ones I bought earlier so much.  They work great for feeding our cats.  The quality is great, and they clean up very easily.  I find that I am less apt to over-feed my furry friends with these little bowls, and they are cheaper than the bigger kind I used to buy.
Horrible! Bought this for a trip to Hawaii and it was already torn when we arrived there. We had to reinforce it with tape to for the trip back home. Needless to say it is headed for the trash...

My tastebuds have always preferred the salty and savory, so I suppose it only makes sense that I would like this; it contains MSG (which the tongue actually registers as the lovely umami flavor), so it's consequently a guilty pleasure... I must begrudgingly admit I like these slim jims of the sea.
has more salt in it than I need. But I do eat tuna every week. So I buy in bulk. The shipping cast makes it less of a bargain.

Since I bought my Keurig I felt the coffee wasn't as rich as coffee you slow brew. I bought Starbucks, Caribou and many other brands. It wasn't that I dislike the coffee but I did not get the same satiisfaction.  The first cup of the French Roast I really felt it had such a good flavor.  I'm hoping they start selling more flavors.
Ina Gartens book recommended Rancho Gordo and they are the best beans! I ordered the sampler package and they are the best beans I have ever cooked with.
These are really delicious, however, I really wanted lightly salted and I thought that these were. DARN!!!

Works the first few times.

Out of the package, these adhere wonderfully. Pulling them off the first few times is painful on tender nipples.

Adhesion is quickly going away. Can wash with dish detergent to refresh them some, but these do not seem to last long.

The person who recommended them to me told me after I bought them that they only last two months - wish I'd known that before I dropped $40 on them! Not worth the cost.

The best sleep sack we had yet. I've used halo and aden anais and so far this sack is our favorite. It's very high quality fabric and workmanship. Holds up nicely with wash after wash. It's larger and roomier than the other sacks so baby had lots of space to sprawl out. I also love that it had some thickness so I feel comfortable knowing that my baby is warm and cozy at night. Highly recommend.

I've tried a lot of things in the name of lower calories, but I couldn't even finish one spoonful of this stuff. Definitely better to eat a regular serving of low fat frozen yogurt that is tasty and satisfying for 100 or so calories than an entire pint of this for 150.  Maybe I picked the wrong flavor, but it was horrible.

The coffee was not what I always got from Amazon. After I poured the coffee out, I read the package. It was in French and was from Canada.  I guess French Canadians like a different taste than Americans. For my taste, it was horrible.  I couldn't drink it and returned it right away.  Thank goodness Amazon is so easy to deal. I ordered good old Green Mountain Nantucket and even though I really enjoyed the Wolfgang Puck, I don't want to take a chance again.

This product delivers what it promises. It provides crystal clear reception throughout the house and even as far as 1/4 mile down the street. It does not interfere with a wireless network or cordless phones. The two-way function is excellent and we are thrilled overall with the quality.

Using only 4 sides for now and working great for our new Lab puppy. We expect it will be just fine to grow with him. Easy enough to resize. Could use some more bulk maybe, it sides on the wood floor but not bad.

After ordering a Bubble Tea in CT restaurant, I was anxious to try this at home.  They were just as good. The only drawback is making them is a bit time-consuming, since they must be heated/boiled, then allowed time to cool before adding to the tea. They also come in large bags and I feel like a lot of them go to waste unless you use them often or try placing them in smaller bags and storing (unsure if they would retain freshness). They tasts great and have that addictive chewy texture. Will try storing them differently, perhaps in freezer to extend life of extra.

This is a very weak coffee. There are so many better k-cups out there. If you're looking for a medium roast, I think the best one is Caribou. [[ASIN:B000TK6LBS Caribou Blend K-Cup Single-Serving Coffee 108 ct.]]
This is a high quality coconut oil and it has a nice light taste and pleasant aroma. It is reasonably priced and arrives quickly.
Thick, very sweet, very orange-y and aromatic, and a little spicy.  When you're in the mood for sweet, this does it.  I've tried a many bottled orange chicken sauces and this is my favorite.

The picture shows two green silicone teether, and the description even says 2 count, but buyer beware it only comes with 1 green teether and one blue holder pod. Not worth the money for one and too much of a hassle to return.

We really like this product.  It adds body and that "meaty" type texture to all veggie dishes.  We put it into everything too including dishes such as Spaghetti Bolignaise, Sheperds Pie, Veggie Pasties, salads, pizza's and everything in between.

I wear these while I'm at work so that I don't have to pump or wear wet pads all day. They help keep me from leaking into my bra, but they don't stop from leaking by adding pressure as it suggests. When I get home and remove, there's a puddle in the center which sometimes spreads outward which could cause a rash. These might work better for others, but I think this product is designed to be work for maybe an hour or 2, but not a full shift or daily.

I've owned the UBBI pail since January of 2013. It's now on its second child and I've been pleased with it.

I am a cloth diapering mom and I use it with a planet wise wet bag and it works perfect. No smells and holds around 2 days of diapers. I also like the locking aspect of the pail. The major perk of this pail is that it doesn't need special bags and also that it's stainless steel. It's on its second child and still doesn't stink.

The bag holder did recently break and my daughter "helped" the rubber gasket fall out. I contacted the company to ask if I could purchase a replacement part and their response blew me away. They provided me with a brand new pail. Seriously A+ customer service.

I'd recommend buying this pail over cheaper models. It will pay for itself with durability and bag savings.

These are perfect. We decided to try these and started with one on the stroller and ended up buying a 2nd and ordering 2 more to go with the Travel System that was a baby shower gift for my sister. We considered them a must have at that point. She is every bit as in love with them as we are.
They are very sturdy, priced just right and hold quite a bit. It is nice to be able to add shopping bags without taking up the cargo basket.
This is a nice, smooth coffee.  I buy several kinds of SFB coffees for our business coffeemaker and have found this one quite popular.  The hazelnut is certainly present but not too overpowering.
works great for my need and the price is great, they last a very long time. I bought these to use in my ecobrew filter.
I don't know why they put so much sugar in these. Can't taste the pumpkin or coffee!  I prefer a two step method like Gevalia's!

Look all over for this garlic sauce Walmart publix winn Dixie's very hard to find my father introduced me to this sauce I've been hooked ever since.. I thought 12 was a little extreme but when I thought about it I'll have about a years supply and won't have to worry about hunting this sauce down for a very long time. This is one of best tasting hot sauces I've ever had.

I have gone through many different spoons as a mother of four. I can wash these in my dish washer with my other silverware. The scoop actually holds food and they are a wonderful texture for baby's mouth. When I rest the spoon on the baby bowl or food container it does not tip over. The spoon is very comfortable for me to hold to feed my daughter. I love the design and not to mention the colors. They are well worth the money!!  I am going to buy another set soon!!
My wife really likes this tea and it is hard to find locally. It is great that we can get it on Amazon.

Due to a skin condition our son has had to have a bath nightly since he was 6 weeks old. The infant tub we had was hard to use and uncomfortable for him so we tried the duck as a less expensive alternative to buying another over priced infant tub. We LOVE this thing!!    -AMAZING for travel - just deflate, roll up and pack away. We've taken it on many flights and road trips    -held up very well to every day use. The 'squeaker' in the beak went out after about 7 months of daily use. At 11 months we are finally on our 2nd duck, but only because we did not use the patch kit included and decided to buy a fresh one.      - keeps our son safe and comfortable in his bath. one of his first words is 'duck' he loves this thing so much. Even at 22 lbs he still fits in this thing with room to play. The temperature indicator on the bottom is a good guide to ensure safe water temps every time.

Well, these sounded so great they are all natural with several chewing textures but our baby hates them. They must taste funny because he will put everything in his mouth except these. My advice is get something else.

I have used several Better Batter mixes/flours before and found that they make a great, high-quality, gluten-free product.  Their cake mixes are probably some of the best I've ever had.  So, even though I have a pancake mix I'm happy with (Bob's Red Mill), I tried this one because I've yet to find a good g/f biscuit mix.  You can make lots of different things with this mix, but I did actually make biscuits with it first.  They were really good!  I was shocked, however, when I glanced at the nutrition facts.  Those four little biscuits I made contained over 2,000mg of sodium!!!  So, if you're going to cook with this, be aware.  I wouldn't recommend this for anyone who's watching their salt intake!

I loved this little sleeper.  We'd been using the bassinet in the bedroom and it just wasn't working for us.  With both our sons (6 years apart) there was one point or another that I wanted to chuck the bassinet out the window.  they just hated it.  AMA (against mom's advice) I bought this little sleeper for the middle of our king-sized bed.  It was absolutely perfect.  It actually helped to form good habits in my son because after feeding him, I'd lay him right back down (in the middle of the night).  So, when we finally did move him to his crib at 4 months, he was used to falling back to sleep on his own.  With him so close, we'd rub his belly if he cried rather than picking him up.  It was better for all of us.  I never used the light, we slept with an indirect bathroom light on so we could see him.  I'm not sure if it would've worked for us in a smaller bed but in a king size it was absolutely perfect.

Love this changing table. Good quality and perfect if you're not looking for a full dresser and you are limited on space. Had a really strong smell at first but we aired it out for a few days and the smell went away.
Good quality made cups. Purchased for our 4- year old nephew for when he visits.

This is my first taste of Unsweetened Creamed Coconut. I'd been taking coconut oil for over a year now and know the benefits of it, but had never tried this version of coconut product.

This comes in six small boxes. Each box contains a sealed plastic pouch of creamed coconut which essentially has hardened to a small brick, the size of the box. This organic coconut is from Sri Lanka.

It took a while for the brick to soften up in hot water (still in the pouch) but once it did, after lots of massaging to get it to flow, I tried it straight out of the bag. Delicious! I can describe it like smooth peanut butter if you replaced the peanuts with pure ground coconut.

To use it, the directions state that you take 1 Tbsp of the Creamed Coconut and you mix it with ~2 Tbsp of hot water and then add it to all kinds of regional dishes from Thailand to Jamaica, but it will go into my smoothies too.

This healthy, delicious product is going to be part of my lifestyle, for sure.

I followed the directions (2.5min) and very few kernels popped before everything started burning. It just burned.  And I tried 2 boxes before I threw everything out.  No more Orville for me. Back to Pop Secret.  Nice idea, epic failure in execution.

I started with a generous supply but in the past couple of months have had to resort to multiple natural supplements to improve my flow.

Suction in this device is terrible and now I'm going ot have to shell out more to buy another better pump. My recommendation - if your going to buy it, then use it only when travelling for short periods. It does impact milk flow.

This is the third monitor we've owned, and it is by far, the best. It has many of the typical features: clear, great range, long battery life, and compact size. It also allows the parent to communicate with a child (parent unit can broadcast to the baby unit (walkie-talkie style). Of course, many of the features are common to other monitors, and are all advertised/included in the product details.

However, what makes this a great unit are two features that aren't emphasized/included in the product details.

1. The loop on the baby unit can be set to serve as a night light. When enabled, any noise causes the loop to light up, providing a soft light for your child. After some time, the light dims off. What is really nice, is that this feature can be enabled/disabled remotely from the parent unit!

2. Probably the BEST feature of this device is that the baby unit will return to \\"on\\" following a power failure. We have frequent lightning storms (Texas) that sometimes cause power outages. With most monitors we've used, you must go into the child's room to turn on the baby unit following a power outage. The VTech Safe & Sound Digital Audio Monitor returns to the on position following a power outage. This is my favorite feature, and I only discovered this after a power outage. I am surprised that I could not find this feature in any of the online descriptions, and I will only purchase monitors that have this feature in the future.

Overall it is a solid product that, for the most part, is very similar to other products on the market. However, the added benefit of the parent unit controlled nightlight, and the \\"return to on\\" following a power outage set this monitor head-and-shoulders above the competition.

They packed the block in tons of bubble wrap and related materials, but it needs something more or different.  The block weighs a lot and salt is fragile, a terrible combination for shipping.  So I would be shocked if almost anyone receives an undamaged block (at least with the packing used on mine).  The block itself is pretty nice.  It has the general colors and patterns you see in the photos, but since you will use it laying on a counter, there's no light source behind it, so it looks very flat and uninteresting compared to the photos shown on Amazon.  It looks a lot like soapstone or alabaster do when they aren't illuminated from behind.  So you should expect that the corners will be smashed up and not very attractive, but other than that it should work fine if your primary purpose is to cook on it.

My baby is 5 months old.  When I was pregnant I bought a regular/standard diaper bag, with winnie the pooh on it, from a department store.  At the time I just thought, \\"oh its so cute for a baby!\\".  That diaper bag is big, but with hardly any pockets.  I've quickly realized that I needed something better.  My main goal when setting out to shop for a new diaper bag was that I wanted something that could double as my purse, so that when we go out I do not need to bring the diaper bag AND the purse.  I have 3 kids in all, so the less I have to bring the better!    When I opened my package today I was pleasantly surprised at the size of this bag!  I wanted something smaller then the diaper bag I have.  When we go out I bring:  change of clothes for my baby, 5-6 diapers, wipes, 2-3 burp cloths, a couple bibs, 2 bottles, can of formula, and his jared food if we'll be gone near mealtimes.  Also: a couple of toys and his \\"bankey\\". We don't bring a ton of stuff, so when I was debating between this bag and the bigger, more expensive skip hop bag (the 80-90 dollar one), I chose this one as I wanted one that was smaller, but (hopefully not) too small.  Being too small was the only thing I was nervous about when I ordered this bag.  When I opened the package I was very impressed that it was actually bigger then I was expecting!  Not too big/huge, but not so small and compact that you can't put hardly anything in it.  To test it out, I filled it with all of what I listed above and it fits great!  It also has pockets for mom stuff - In addition to the baby items I was able to add my wallet, keys, cell phone, lip gloss, pen, and my Kindle and could certainly fit more if needed.  Inside one of the pockets in the front of the bag is a clip for hooking a set of keys too - very nice extra touch.  everything is so much more organized! I've seen people complain about the magnetic closure- by Idk why?!  There is two rows of metal discs....if the bag is fuller, you use the one closer to the top of the flat - and its stays shut very securely.     I also tested out the clips to hook this bag to our stroller. We have a Graco snugride infant seat/stroller travel system.  Hooking this to the stroller was so easy, and still does not get in the way of the handle bar.  I absolutely love this feature!  Also, the should strap has a very nice and comfortable pad on it and the strap is adjustable.  The material the bag is made out of seems very durable and of much better quality then cheaper/other bags out there. Oh, and the bag includes a changing pad that folds up/and velcros shut.     Overall, I am absolutely THRILLED with this purchase. I looked here on amazon for what seemed like hours before finally choosing a bag and I am very, very happy with it.  I'm already very happy with this and have not even really used it yet.  I will def. be recommending this bag/company to others.

I am not one to write a review, but the Evenflo high chair is so dangerous and the company so negligent, that I had to let others know.  The Evenflo Majestic Highchair has recently, finally, been recalled.  We had issues with the screws popping out of the recliner section of the chair when we used it with our then 6 month old, I called Evenflo last March, they sent me a repair kit with longer screws, still didn't work. Customer service had told me then this was not a common problem and that even with a screw missing, highchair was safe to use, not dangerous. I'm so furious they lied about my son's safety!!!!! Our longer screws did pop out a few times, we put them back in, I called back and since the highchair still held up fine and they told me it was okay to use, we wrongly trusted Evenflo and continued to use the highchair (my husband had checked it and felt is was okay). I just called in response to last weeks recall and they said they do have a record of me calling, sorry that happened and would I like a new set of screws? They won't give a refund and the new screws (which they will ship out in approx. 2 weeks, and recommend we don't use the highchair in the meantime) supposedly work better than the original replacements. I am returning this to the store, and if they won't accept the return, I'll have to eat the cost and throw out the chair.  We've had so many of our kids' things recalled, it's infuriating that these companies only have to send screws that may or may not work and before their belated recalls, our kids are at risk and to boot this time they assured me there was no danger. Please do not buy Evenflo and know that you can't trust the info you receive from customer service.     I'm am so thankful my son wasn't injured. We've had other issues with most of our Evenflo products not working correctly, but all involving bells and whistles not structual. I just can't understand how these companies put more money into their impossible to open packaging thaninto their product safety.

This Heinz tartar sauce, luckily, is sold at local supermarkets here in South Florida. I decided to compare as many tartar sauces as I could find locally in supermarkets; there were 4 major brands: Heinz, Hellmann's, Kraft, and McCormick; a couple of off brands: Bennett's and Louisiana; and Whole Foods Market 365 tartar sauce. The McCormick tarter sauce has a slightly more mustardy taste than the others, which I like, sort of like a mayonnaise-based non-sweet honey mustard sauce with pickle undertones; it is fresh tasting, and comes in glass bottles (Amazon seems to only offer the fat free version which I haven't tried, nor do I care to). Heinz has a nicely balanced pickle relish taste that doesn't overpower the mayonnaise base; I put it in a tie with McCormick for first place; 365 has a less mayonnaisey, lighter flavor that highlights the fresh pickle taste--I rate it in the top three. I didn't care for the Hellmann's, and the two off brands mentioned were gross, and I don't mean I brought 12 dozen of them. The Kraft seemed to have an artificial flavor, and it does list artificial flavor as an ingredient. By the way, the Heinz tarter sauce includes alum as an ingredient; alum is an aluminum containing compound; research indicates that, supposedly, very little is absorbed through the digestive tract, but those concerned about this might, well, be concerned. However, as far as taste, Heinz tartar sauce is one of the top two or three, in my opinion.

Update: 5/24/2016  Last bag of Davidson's I recently ordered labelled as "So African Green Rooibos" was received and contained the standard "Red" Rooibos. Just a heads up to others who might be caught by this. Hopefully this was a fluke as if it happens a second time I may be forced to switch brands, <sigh>.  Original review:  I am a huge fan of Rooibos, and Davidson's does not disappoint. I have both their red and the green. Sometimes I will blend them together to vary the taste experience and antioxidant properties. I have tried the Tega brand, also on Amazon, and while it gets great marks for value, it doesn't quite match this brand.  I enjoy it out of a stainless steel quart thermos. Approximately 3 teaspoons of tea with a quart of spring water fresh off a boil. I'll nurse it during the day straining it into a cup. The tannins are low so the leaves can sit for long periods in the liquid without imparting an off-taste.

I purchased the bugaboo bee for my son (now 2 months) in the hope that I could get away with only one stroller. Unfortunately it has been a disaster. Nothing about the bugaboo bee works as it should.   Regardless of the cost (and this thing was expensive, particularly as I bought all the bells and whistles), these things should work...  - front wheels constantly jammed (not sure when I will get replacements) and given this is a known issues, why the company doesn't automatically send out a fix when you register your product is beyond me.  - because of the issue with the front wheels it is very difficult to steer one handed  - sun canopy is small and does not cover baby well. I also bought the parasol, which is one of the most annoying and inconvenient attachments of all time.  - I find it difficult to fold the bugaboo bee up and the instructions are confusing. If you are using the car seat attachment, this needs to be removed before folding, which is annoying for plane travel.   I'm in the market for a new stroller. I have been absolutely horrified that they can charge so much for the stroller and all the accessories and then nothing about it works well. DO NOT BUY!!

The problem with these candies which I love, is that somewhere in the process of production and shipping some of them melt and it becomes difficult to unwrap. Sometimes small little chips fall out during the unwrapping and the consumer being unaware of this, finds pieces sticking to clothing which are most difficult to remove. They stick like glue. Secondly, the espresso especially, never tastes the same as a previous order. Sometimes they have a wonderful, slightly strong espresso flavor,other times almost flavorless.
This is probably mostly the manufacturers fault. Do they change the recipe for making this stuff?
I think most of the complaint is with the manufacturer. Someone should let them know.

I have only been able to find this product at Sams club, but dont get there as often as I would like. I love Skinny POP!! It took awhile to get to me because the mailman wouldnt leave it at my door, thankfully I had a day off from work and was able to pick it up at the post office. I definitely will purchase this again :)
So glad I got these. They work perfectly with the Medela pump- I never use the Medela shields anymore, only these! Definitely recommend.

this is the best tasting chai tea I have ever tasted I am very pleased with

Generally works very well. Doesn't keep all food from falling onto the baby's lap, but it keeps our counters clean. Depending on how the chair arms shift when you tighten the clamps, it can be a little hard to get it into place, but with a bit of fiddling, you can get it to fit.

It does cause some pretty deep gouges in the plastic of the arms, but it's just cosmetic.
high quality, nice looking, good price and comfortable for the baby. I will buy more for my baby in the future.

We gave these as a gift to friends who are new parents and they love them!  They are soft and cute.  We also got a pair for our own baby and they were perfect to protect herself from her razor sharp nails that needed to be trimmed often.
