So after spending about $150 on a huge gate that blocked off my kitchen, we moved and I bought yet another gate, then a third, all looking for a way to keep my kids safe. The problem was, we all kept tripping on the gates and slamming our toes into the bars on each side. We had a small step ladder, but when both boys fought to use it at the same time, it was time to finally get the learning tower. Both boys can use it at once, and the nice thing is, between hanging on my leg, or climbing up here to watch me, guess which they choose, EVERY TIME? Yep, the tower. I have a small kitchen, so the real estate loss is a bit tough, but I now have a two year old that helps me make coffee, smoothies, shreds lettuce, and likes to help set the table. The gate is gone, and all of us are so much happier. It holds 500 pounds, so my husband even uses it to reach the high shelves. My biggest regret is how long i waited to get this. I should have had this on the baby registry.

Unfortunately, the fillings need more of a coconut taste, and adding tiny bits of shredded coconut would improve both the taste and the mouth feel, making them less gooey to deal with. Four Amazon stars for this package of coconut creme filled chocolates.

The Nutrition Facts, and Ingredients, as listed on the package, are as follows:

Nutrition Facts:
Serving Size 3 Balls (36g); Servings per Container about 4.
Amount Per Serving:
Calories 230 (Calories from Fat 160).
Total Fat 18g (Saturated Fat 13g, Trans Fat 0g).
Cholesterol 5mg.
Sodium 35mg.
Total Carbohydrate 15g (Dietary Fiber 1g, Sugars 14g).
Protein 2g.

Ingredients:
Milk Chocolate, ((sugar, milk, cocoa butter, chocolate, soya lecithin (emulsifier), barley malt powder, vanillin (artificial flavoring)), vegetable oil (coconut, palm kernel), sugar, cocoa butter, milk, skim milk, coconut powder (coconut, maltodextrin, sodium caseinate), natural coconut flavor, soya lecithin (emulsifier), artificial flavor.
MAY CONTAIN PEANUTS/TREE NUTS.

After reading "The Fruit Hunters"  and learning about the miracle fruit (and it's history as well as bizarre reasons why it has not been mass manufactured for the general public for decades) I was very pleased to discover these on Amazon. Even if they are a bit overpriced for what they are it was an amazing experience to suck on a tab and then try a dozen or so familiar fruits, vinegar, condiments etc. for what felt like the first time ever.  Wow, it's like psychedelics for your taste buds! Very fun and also a great way to eat sour yet healthy fruits etc and a great way to drink lemonade without any added sugar. I hope they become more widely available and at lower prices, as this stuff might help some people (diabetics especially) get into a more healthy lifestyle without missing their sweets. We found strawberries to be the overall best taste but it was all good. The tabs we got in this shipment,  Mar 2014, were splitable / scored down the center (I read some reviews that said some were not scored in the middle) but we went ahead and ate whole tabs anyway and the effect seemed to last 2 to 3 hrs.  All in all they were a total hit and I'll likely be back for more in the future.
These are really delicious and a fraction of the cost of more highly priced 'Irish oats'. I highly recommend this product.

I just got 2 jars of Roland Mushrooms, Dried Sliced Cepes - Bolets from Amazon.com at $16.35 for a 1lb jar. I thought it is deal to good to be true, but I bought it anyway. Right after opening the jar I realized I made a big mistake. Mushrooms, and especially bolets should pleasantly smell and not stink. The content of the jar stinks. I am not sure if such mushrooms are appropriate for human consumption. Of course, I paid for it and I will Try it. However, I think I discovered the reason for this stink. You see, I purchased some other Roland products, like sliced olives, roasted paprika, etc. On sliced olives for example it says \\"Packaged for 2010 Roland Company...\\", and on Roasted paprika it says \\"Packaged for 2011 Roland Company...\\" But on the jar with Roland Mushrooms, Dried Sliced Cepes - Bolets it says \\"Packaged for 2001 Roland Company..\\" Is it possible that Amazon.co is selling Roland Mushrooms stored for the past 10 years? Unfortunately, there is no expiration date on the jar. Anyway, a freshly opened jar of dried bolets with clearly defined expiration date I purchased in a local store (1 year before expiration date) smells a lot different.

We introduced this toy to our 5 month old and he really likes it. His little fingers can grab the ball easily, he shakes it and throws it to hear the rattle and it has nice bright colors. My husband and I bought this in anticipation of our son's birth.  We wanted toys that hang down for him to play with but really didn't want to spend a fortune.  There are just a few points I have to make:    - The mat is very skinny. HOWEVER, we solved that by simply taking the mat off the arches and placing it on a blanket.  This caused the arches to stretch apart, giving our boy actually a pretty good amount of room to play, twisting, turning, and rolling. This also made the toys lower, so it's easier for my son to get them in his mouth if he works at it, which he enjoys.  (I find it quite funny to see him licking the ball on the seahorse contentedly, causing it to spin.)     - The outside edges are \\"hard\\" plastic, I suppose, as another review stated, but my boy didn't seem to notice or care, even when he hit it.  He's four and a half months old and has only hit his head on the plastic edging with any amount of force once that I've noticed (and he plays with it a lot of the day).    - Number of toys:  Yes, it only has three toys.  However, you can remove them to wash them or turn them so they face whichever direction you want.  I have simply added another toy with plastic toy links in between the octopus and seahorse.  If I feel like adding something to the ball side, I usually add plastic toy keys or something else by clipping it around the ribbon holding the ball up so it will make more noise when he hits it.  I do wish they'd throw in another toy or two just to attach to the mat so the baby can't push them away by accident--they made the upper toys attach to the bottom if you want, but I don't want to move them because I want them to hang... the purpose of this toy.  I want toys to hang and be on the ground, so he can be entertained as he rolls between tummy and back, so I just put a few other toys on our blanket.    - The toys are also \\"hard\\" plastic.  My boy really whacks them with all his might but has never seemed even slightly bothered.  I think the fact that they are like that is actually really good, because they're easy to wash down if you need to and they make a satisfying sound when they clack together, which our son adores.    - I know the ball is for the feet, supposedly, but I just switch which side I put his his head on.  He really loves that ball, actually, even just by itself.  He hits it with a lot of excitement, pulls it toward his mouth to try to eat it, etc.  It's nice to change up what his hands get at and what noise his feet make, I think.    - I'm glad I bought this because he is learning a lot from it.  First, he just stared at it.  Then, he accidentally hit the toys.  Then he started working on his coordination and being able to hit the toys on purpose.  Then he could single out one toy, sweep his arm and make them clack together, and use different arms.  Then he could grasp the toy, and practiced that quite a bit.  He does all the above still, and also rolls around and plays with toys I also put on the blanket.    - This has helped entertain my baby while I try to scarf down breakfast.  At the very first, it gave me only a few minutes, when he could just look at it, but as he's grown, I can now even make a warm breakfast, eat it at a leisurely pace and do dishes.  Then I go and play with him, so I'm not saying it makes you not have to play (and good thing because it's fun to!) but it does help give you a little time and baby learns he doesn't have to have you there every moment of the day.    - I will admit that other Fisher-Price mats are much cooler and bigger, but at the same time, I am really glad I bought this one.  It was affordable and has provided an amazing amount of entertainment and enjoyment through (four and half months so far) and I am sure will continue to, as we haven't even tried to change it into the tunnel or anything yet.

Disappointed in this drink. I chose Zevia because I wanted to get away from my diet coke consumption and I love carbonation. Well, no. This isn't the answer.

First off the taste -

I've tried Zevia, Dr. Zevia and the gingerale. All of them have this artificial sweetness that can't be overriden by the different varieties. It's nothing like Diet Coke or Pepsi, Dr. Pepper, etc. I thought I could get used to it but after a couple of weeks, it's just nauseatingly sweet. The other varieties don't change that.

Second, the ingredients -

This is the listed ingredient list. I have a sensitivity to sugar alcohol (zylitol, splenda (sucralose), etc) so I use stevia in my coffee. No problem. With this drink, I started having gastrointestinal issues common to sugar alcohols. I didn't know what was causing it so I changed some things in my diet to no avail. Then I looked at this ingredient list. Stevia is NOT the primary sweetener. Ingredients are listed by the most prevalent first - erythritol is a sugar alcohol. Um.. no thanks. I wanted a naturally stevia sweetened drink - not another sugar alcohol one.

I feel this company is being dishonest in its product. I've discontinued use of this line of beverages while my system settles down from the sugar alcohol and will not be drinking them again. The taste is inferior and artificial and the ingredients cause me to have problems.

Ingredients
CARBONATED WATER, **ERYTHRITOL**, CARAMEL COLOR, TARTARIC ACID, REB A (STEVIA EXTRACT), FUMARIC ACID, CAFFEINE, LIME OIL, LEMON OIL, NATURAL FLAVORS, CASSIA OIL, NUTMEG OIL.

The price was decent for the amount of servings. The product seems fairly high quality as far as i can tell. 2 spoonfuls is a serving. The flavor, i assume would be strong if your smoothie didn't have "stronger" flavor profiles. My protein powder i use has "artificial flavor" which helps mask the taste a little (and bananas too). I can tell that it would be an overwhelming "green" vege taste, which might be a problem for some. I usually chug my shakes/smoothies, so the taste wouldn't really matter that much, but be warned.

I did notice a bump in energy on certain days i use it, but that might be a mental thing. I have no adverse effects/reactions taking it so that's always a good thing. I'll see how i feel when i switch back to raw kale for a week for a comparison.

This monitor works fine. I'm happy with the range and that there isn't any interference. The VOX setting is great, but doesn't always work. For instance, when the unit is turned off and then back on again, it doesn't always remember that VOX should be "ON". So if you want it on, you have to make sure it's actually on every time you turn the unit on. The other problem with the VOX setting is that sometimes it doesn't turn itself back on when the baby is crying. I've had a handful of instances where I wake up in the middle of the night to my baby crying from his room, but my monitor is still in the VOX "sleep mode". Overall, this monitor is okay and it does what I need it to do (most of the time). It's worth keeping though as I don't feel it necessary to go through the process of finding another one that may not work any better (have had issues with Lavana monitors in the past and won't ever buy one of theirs again). One more thing is that I wish there were indicator lights on the monitor that registered the baby's cries so that the sound could be turned all the way down and you could still see whether the baby was crying.
This is a little sweet but its great when you want a treat. Really hits the spot.

I love Bob's Red Mill products and this oat flour is no exception. However, it is not quite as versatile as some of the other flours from Bob's (for example, their whole wheat pastry flour).

Pros:

*long-lasting (I bought 4 packages of this more than a year ago; it's been sitting on top of my refrigerator at room temperature, and it's still good; open packages also last a long time)
*the pancake recipe on the bag is quite good (and a wonderful way to get away from white flour in pancakes)
*can be consumed with minimal to no cooking (e.g. mix some with your oats to thicken your oatmeal in the morning, or put a little in a smoothie)
*works nicely in combination with other flours
*doesn't clump

Cons:

*the pancake recipe, unlike most pancake recipes, can most definitely NOT be used to make waffles (tried it yesterday, ended up completely stuck to the waffle iron despite the use of copious amounts of nonstick cooking spray)
*can't do much with it on its own; 2 of the 3 recipes on the bag, for example, require the use of large amounts of other types of flour (this is likely due to the lack of significant amounts of gluten and this flour's inability to absorb liquids -- try pairing this with coconut flour or tapioca starch and you may get better results)

Please note that this particular flour is not gluten-free. While oats do not naturally contain gluten, they become cross-contaminated due to having been processed on equipment that is also used to produce wheat. If you have celiac disease or a gluten sensitivity, Bob's does make a gluten-free oat flour (but it is not this product).

Highly recommend this, I tried out several other strollers before purchasing this one and I am so glad that I ended up with the Maclaren. It's my favorite stroller by far!

We have been trying to transition our now 15 months old daughter from a bottle for the last 2 months. She finally forgot about her bottle within just 2 days with this sippy cup. Now we use sippy cups with hard spouts during the day and this sippy cup for naps/bed time or when she is fussy. It was cheap enough that if it breaks in a few months, I would buy it again. After my friend absolutely raved about this chair (and because admittedly I'm a brand snob), I bought this chair for my third child without doing any real comparison. Big mistake. Like other reviewers said, the gap between the tray and the baby's belly is HUGE. At least half the food falls into the seat. The tray is huge and does not fit into the dishwasher. It is ridiculously hard to clean---a flaw I think all these type of high chairs share. There are places in this chair where I can see food piling up---and there is absolutely no way to clean it without literally taking the chair apart (gap is too deep and small even for my vaccuum cleaner attachments). I had a $50 Evenflow high chair with my first two children  that had all the features I do like about this one: wheels, easy fold, good recline, adjustable height, and extra tray top. Like all these traditional high chair designs, it is huge and takes up a ton of space. This one is very heavy, and probably is well built (Peg-Perego is a great company), but if you're going to spend this kind of money, I would suggest springing for a more innovative high chair, like the Stokke Tripp Trapp. Otherwise, just get the cheapest high chair you can find. This one is not worth the money.

Shows the temp and humidity
Features we don't use but some may: microphone to talk to baby, light, and music

Cons:
App is constantly buffering and often shuts down leaving your baby unattended. (Isn't this the whole point of the monitor????)
Expensive for what you get...other brands are much better and cheaper
Unless you have a 1\\" crib there is literally no way to mount the monitor. We have ours dangling on the side of the crib, but will have to move it soon since our son is about to crawl
Drains your iphone battery within 2 hours if you have the video monitoring
Unlike other brands you cannot use more than one monitor at a time

I would not recommend this to anyone.

This coffee is delicious!  It is the equivalent of high priced cappuccino with the added benefit of customizing for your needs.  I use lactose-free milk and make it as strong as I like using less milk or 2 packets.  I have even used half a packet for a short one!  It's helpful to have a shaker to blend it well.  It's a great product for summer coffee lovers.

The Lindt Lindor Truffles in Extra Dark Chocolate is truly a bit of heaven.   Each one is a treat, and delicious, but this is our family favorite.    The package comes well protected, and delivery time is not excessive.  I have ordered more than one time.

Maple Brown and Sugar used to be part of my morning breakfast routine everyday.  However, they recently changed the recipe (again) and the new recipe is terrible.  Before, I would eat 2 packets and by the end of the bowl, I'd be wishing my bowl was full of oatmeal again.  Now, I often have trouble finishing my oatmeal.  They really need to stop messing with success.  The old recipe was great.  New one? Not so much.  They did the same thing to Cinnamon roll a year or two ago and I can barely stomach that new recipe either.  I'm done with Quaker & Oats oatmeal until they go back to the old recipes.

This mat has been great so far, we are using it with the Britax Chaperone car seat. It does not have any residue that is left behind on the seat as some of the other mats similar to this product. It covers the whole back and bottom of the seat. Would definitely recommend.
This bedrail was purchased for a visit by a grandchild.  It works like a charm; it is durable and will last for many years.  The shipment arrived sooner than promised.

It does taste a bit different.

Rather than spicy this tastes a bit mild...in a strange way.

Anyway I don't think this taste deserve that much money.
These are not big almonds. Nice, crispy and small. Definitely great for snaking and for cereal uses. Almonds are healthy so snack up!
This is the best child safety gate that I've seen.  I would order more of this brand if I needed it.  Easy to set up and use and stays in place.  My 90lb puppy gets up on it and it doesn't budge.
Very fast delivery. This is a healthy and delicious drink. I'll be ordering more soon.

I really did my research before making such an expensive purchase and I thought that the Ergo Performance would be great since I live in South Carolina and it is so hot.  I am 5'2 120 pounds and my 15 month old is about 25 lbs, so I really needed to find something to help lug her around in.  I tried the Ergo Performance on in a store and only used it as a front pack and thought it was great.  However, once I got it home and used it on my hip I realized just how uncomfortable the performance straps are.  Also the straps are conformed so when you wrap the strap behind you back in the hip carry hold it does not sit comfortably on your back. Not only that but I then put her on my back and once I got everything adjusted correctly the chest strap was almost across my throat and it was pulled down as far as it would go.  I thought maybe it was just me and that it wouldn't do that to my husband who is 5'11, but it did the same thing to him.  Needless to say I brought the Performance back and tried the Ergo Sport and it made a world of difference.  Straps are soft and very padded for comfort and the chest strap adjusts further down so you don't feel like you are being choked.  I almost gave up on the product all together, so I am glad that I gave the Ergo Sport a try.
This is a nice, sturdy high chair. Removable tray makes cleanup easy. Decor neutral. Only downside is that it takes up a lot of space--but still highly recommended.
does what it's supposed to do.  I use it to keep my dog out of certain areas and works like a charm.

I bought and it was delivered to Brazil very fast. The product is really good, you can see it working. Although that part in the middle looks really fragile, but it is still good. Very easy to clean as well.

Very, very good but easy to eat too many. They are wonderful as
a pick upper any time of the day.
The only thing I don't like are the tote handles because they don't relax down when not in use. When carrying messenger style they stand up all perky and kinda get in the way.

I bought this brand of the \\"pregnancy pillow\\" because it seemed to allow the most flexibility in shape. My wife tells me that she would give this item 5 stars primarily because it is flexible, firm but soft. She has no complaints and sleeps better with this than without.     ADDENDUM: It's now been 7 weeks after my wife has given birth to our son, and my wife still prefers this pillow to our Tempurpedic $200 pillow! In fact, I actually have stolen it from her and find that it's pretty comfortable for anybody, pregnant or not!

It works okay for a few days. But it leaks. The milk also somehow gets into the reservoir and makes the bottle smell like wet dog poop. Had to throw out the bottle. My husband wants to throw out the whole warmer and I think we will. What a waste!

The chocolates ( Orange and Rasberry) are wonderfully delicious. The "Gift Box" is a complete joke! The other end of the box that is not shown in the photo contains a huge white label with lots of retail package info printed on it. The box is retail packaging that holds 8 boxes of chocolates, NOT a gift box by any stretch of the imagination!
The Almonds arrived right on time and we are thoroughly enjoying them.  I would recommend the Superior Nut Company to anyone.
I have received the Viva Labs Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil and I am quite impressed with it.  I will order it again!

I recently added this bottle into my child's rotation and found it no different from his more traditional glass bottles in terms of flow, leakage, or grip. I have nothing bad to say about this product, and Similac is a trusted name, but I see no reason to praise the Simply Smart more highly than any other name-brand bottles. Three stars.

Gluten free baking often results in hockey puck baked goods that feel like saw dust in your mouth,  Fine textured almond flour makes a world of difference.I have used this flour in many gluten free baked goods with excellent results.  My muffins are soft and moist.  My bread can be used for sandwiches and does not crumble. I have another brand of almond flour that is a much coarser texture that will be regulated to "breading" in non-baked goods.  I store this flour in the freezer between baking days and it is "clumpy" straight from the freezer but returns to its floury consistency when it reaches room temperature.

This stroller is lightweight and easy to set-up. It is narrow so if you have a big baby might be a little bit uncomfortable. My baby is small and having a narrow stroller is great for traveling because I was able to use it in restaurants, subway, and crowded places and small elevator without having to move anyhing around. I seriously love this stroller it is practical, lighweight and is not bulky for my car. My baby can take a nice nap with the reclinable seat.

CONS:

-It doesn't have a window where you can see the baby.
-The bag space it is too small, you can't put a diaper bag there but maybe a water bottle and a donut.

I have found a similar stroller that includes the car seat from a different brand (infanti) at the same price but the stroller is wider. The reason I liked Inglesina is because is great for traveling to big cities. We used this stroller to go to Mexico City.
My favorite honey!  Perfect smaller size containers, only wish containers were glass instead of plastic. Excellent customer service and speedy shipping to Maui.

I ordered this sauce because we used to use it on all our meat. I love the taste. It's not sweet but offers the tang you need. I use it when I make meatloaf and I use it on chicken, Great tasting sauce. Not sure why the stores start to carry it down here in the South and then quit.

My little one watched me cook from this chair while I had it clipped to the island and then joined us at the table for dinner. I love the versatility and not being limited by a big footprint. The only downside to this chair was I felt although she had quite a bit more growing to do to reach the weight limit by 14 months I felt It was a bit precarious for my little climber even fully strapped in. Totally worthwhile investment though!
This has been one of my all time favorites! The package arrived before expected, the chocolate was fresh, and I couldn't be happier! Will reorder!

It's good quality, feels like a cozy duvet, keeps baby warm and you can't beat the convenience of having the shoulder snaps! There was another review that said the large does not come with shoulder snaps...mine did. I received my order September 28, 2011 in Cookies & Cream (Large) and it has shoulder snaps. This color option just become available so it must have been recently added. Having the convenience of shoulder snaps was one biggest reasons why I chose this brand. The other reason was because everything that has shoulder snaps cost way over $100 bucks!

My son is tall for a 8 month old and I just switched from the Medium to a Large. He is 30\\" long and weights 22 lbs (96% in height & 85% in weight). He still fits in the Medium but I wanted him to have extra room. The large is a bit big but he can wear it without any issues.

Medium Label States: 6-18 mos 25-32\\" 16-26lb Shell: 100% cotton, Filling: 100% polyester
Large Label States: 18-36 mos 31-39\\" 25-35lb Shell: 100% cotton, Filling: 100% polyester

Update: My son is now 1 years old and I had to retired this sleepsack. It's very restricting at the bottom and my son cries/screams because he cannot stand up or move in it. Such a waste! It kept him so warm! Overall, I love that it's warm and has shoulder snaps but wish it had leg holes!

The item is much, much, much smaller than it appears in the picture, the plant doesn't even fill up the palm of my hand.  I had to place it on top of a dresser with other items because it is so small that you can't even place it on a plant stand by itself.  The size is not worth the cost they are asking for.

I now own a total of 4 Nautilus 3-in-1car seats. I am very happy with this product and have been since I purchased the first 2, going back 4 years ago now. We have them set up in each stage in the mini van. My children enjoy having their very own cup holder, and have never complained about a sore backside on long trips. The construction is very solid and it is fairly easy to prepare for the next stage. The material has held up great as well. The new buckle design is very easy to use.

I would highly recommend this product to anyone.  The mat is nice and soft; perfect for little babies.  The mat has all kinds of different things to grab, touch, and explore while babies are on their tummies.  The hanging toys are fun, colorful, and \\"do\\" different things (vibrate, rattle, etc.)  The whole thing folds down, so it can be put away.  I love this product and would buy it again and even give it as a gift.

We tried to get away with using a very a cheap and very small suction cup mirror device and it was a complete failure - difficult to see anything and constantly falling off the window. So we decided to bite the bullet and spend a little more for a better product and we are so glad we did. I drive a honda accord and the install could not have been easier. With the smaller mirrors you can spend hours trying to find the right angle to see your baby, but with this one you can't NOT see baby, it's huge. I also appreciate the subtle design, lots of these have kid art and I didn't really want that in my car permanently, I do drive around adults from time to time. Just note that if you live a sunny place, like I do, the car seat sun shade pulled down can block your baby's face from both the sun and the mirror.

Well, it's supposed to be dry, but even when hydrated in ambrosia, for example, it left a prickly feeling in the mouth. I probably wouldn't buy this again, but  someone else's applications might be different.

I love the sleep sacks. They help keep my daughter warm at night. I use the fleece year round (even though I live in NC) because we like to keep the house real cool at night. Sleep sacks are a great option for babies so I don't have to worry about her getting stuck in a blanket but still being warm. She hates socks or footed pjs, so this product is a lifesaver.

I have tried these and  the orange  slices.  The orange slices are my favorite.  I love the packaging of these fruit cups.  Great for lunch boxes, the spoon/fork is neatly stored in the top.  Delicious juice in both types of fruit cups.  I recommend these to anyone looking for a packable snack.  Prime membership is great!

Since chores have very little to do with watching the TV, my wife won't clean anything. Anything includes this chair. I clean it about once a week, and I am amazed by how easy the F-P Space Saver High Chair is to clean, so long as you've wrapped it with cellophane and duct tape, and your baby uses a bib made from a 55-gallon trash bag. Seriously, the arms on this chair must be designed to collect and store enough applesauce and avocado mush to keep your LO (that is mommy-blog-speak for \\"little one\\") alive through the next zombie apocalypse.

Running beneath the armrests of this chair are six semi-circle cut outs and a long grove. Inside these little semi-circles and the long grooves is storage for 27 lbs of food. My LO weights 27lbs. Clearly, no zombie apocalypse would last long enough for my LO to eat his own weight in applesauce and avocado mush. I have cable TV, and most zombie attacks last one season, the equivalent of a month. The food stored in this chair would last approximately two months; much too long.

I write this review for the benefit of the Chief Fisher-Price Furniture Design Engineer: This chair is nearly perfect. Eliminate the zombie apocalypse food storage feature of this chair, and I will buy thousands more.

Arrived promptly and in perfect condition. The seller even added a little extra treat. I love these bars and wish that that were sold in the US. But I guess if they were sold here, someone would find a way to make them out of cheaper ingredients to save money and increase profits. Then they'd just be another so-so US candy bar.

Yes, they cost more than what you can buy in the store. But they taste so much better!

I like to know that I'm drinking jasmine tea, so this is the brand that I choose. I've tried others that I consider decent such as Pete's and Misty, but this has the smooth prominent jasmine that I look for.
I have purchased different corner protectors.  This one is the most good-looking and it works well.  I put it on counter-top corners and table corners.
Poor cheap quality.  Color looks much darker than advertised.  Color of target is also different.

Simply the best there is, however I read that you have to be careful because of the fallout from Fukushima.  These are simply the best pistachios I have ever tasted. You can get 10 pounds and maybe not even find one bad nut! In addition, the people who own and run this farm are most helpful, always... I have ordered many times and I have never been disappointed...I mean they are so good I could eat 5 pounds in one sitting, but I restrain myself...
Like several other reviewers stated they bend very easy and do not give you much support.
I love this addition to my diaper bag! It fits perfectly inside of my diaper bag, and is a very convenient way to carry extra clothes for my kiddos.

Great little potty chair.  This is at grandmas house and unlike some others this one seems to be very comfortable for grandson to use.  It goes up in the front so pee doesn't splash all over it goes right in potty.  I would recommend this!

It was shipped by USPS and left by the front door on a day when the temp went to 96 degrees. This $36 box of chocolate was like chocolate soup when I got home. It hardened after a few hours but the results are
The flavor is rich and delicious. The ingredients are ideal ( with no corn syrup or artificial flavors). I only deduce a star because I think it's a little overpriced.

This hot sauce is awesome. I have no idea why they don't sell it in my state, but a local biscuits and gravy place buys it, which is where I got my first taste. It's the perfect amount of light spicy, goes well with gravy, eggs... Similar to Tabasco without the vinegar flavor, and a bit more actual pepper flavor. I would highly recommend this.
We really like these bottles.  My oldest had no trouble switching back and forth between [...] and bottle with these!!  Great Product!!

We never leave home without our Simba Twist-Lock Stackable Formula Dispenser! We love it so much more than the Munchkin one. We have a large tote as a baby bag, which can get cluttered easily. We love this one because it can stand up on the side of our bag and we don't have to push it around to find something underneath it. It's secure and we haven't had any issues with spills! Would definitely recommend.

I gave it a 5 star rating because of the toughness and comfort of this stroller. I would have given it 4.5 stars (if I could) only because of the lack of cargo space. The netting below the seat is a nice feature, it just doesn't fit that much. However, we put a small backpack over the handles against the manufactures recommendations (we must be terrible parents) and made due.  Anyway, we bought this to take on a 14+ day multi-destination trip and wanted a stroller that would pack easy yet be comfortable for our 2yr-old.  It lived up to expectations.  I drove this stroller off the curb (fully loaded with backpack and child) every time we left our hotel in the first week (many times a day) and this thing is still working great.  For an umbrella stroller, it seemed to be comfortable as our daughter slept in it many times for full naps while we were out on excursions (the reclining is a nice feature). The stuff sack and carrying strap are handy; the strap can be used on the stroller itself and the bag.

Works great, much better than mesh sacks. Handy when out at a restaurant and you want to toss in banana or apple slices.

Don't give up if at first your baby doesn't take to it, it took a couple tries before our baby got on board... now she loves it.
Haven't tried them yet but your other products have been excellent!  I like the idea of salting the beans to my taste.

I bought this set for my soon to be here son. It washes well, though needs ironed afterward. My biggest complaints are 1. It is made in China, and 2. Geenny charged for seperate shipping on each item purchased (I got the crib set, lamp shade, and mobile) even though they were all shipped together. This made shipping very expensive! Overall, it is very cute and colorful..perfect for an aviators baby boy!

Eh...save your money and buy something steardy.  This is already falling apart.  One of the wood dowels slpit into two - not sure how bc our little one doens't play in his room.  The other dowel at the top keeps coming out - probably due to the lower one being split.  I am sure this is an easy fix with some glue and a new dowel but for the price - I would order something better.

I wanted heat (which is there) AND flavor but these jelly beans just tasted gross.  After months I still have 3 jars left and they will end up in the trash.  Live & Learn.  AVOID but review if you try them for another viewpoint.
We enjoy this all the time, but we really enjoy it during the summer when we are outside. Great taste.

This product is great for birthdays and special occasions for those that are distanced apart.  I recommend this due to the classy appearance and the consideration with cold temperature applications upon delivery.  The recipients of this gift will find not only find it appetizing, but also appreciative of the quality and care put into the box.

This blanket is very soft, and the embroidered lamb is very cute. The color is different than pictured, though; it looks sage in the photo but it is actually lime (think bright rather than muted pastel). Also, the edges are hemmed on the side with the lamb. This creates a \\"rough\\" look. None of this is functional, of course, but it might pose problems if you are trying to match or coordinate decor.
Trekking in heat at high elevations, this definitely helped me keep my energy and pace.  Not as chalky nor as chewy as others claimed.  Will order the big container!

Machine-wash safe, super gente on baby gums, great shape so the food doesn't stay on the spoon, also very great to handle while feeding baby.  I've tried different spoons from different brands and these are the best.  Really worth paying a bit more for more confort for baby and you!
I had my mouth all set for some good toffee and what do I get, hard toffee that I can not even chew.  I wasted my money on this junk. I like the silver tray it comes in.

These are easy to cook and taste great.  I put leftovers in an airtight container and they are still good the next day.  I doubt I would keep them longer than that but you can at least make the night before and enjoy them with your lunch the next day.
I bought my first canister at T J Maxx and wasn't able to find them after that. These are so delicious!

At first when I opened this i was super disappointed. It looked cheap and flimsy and like it should go right to the trash....
However, I have now been using it for about 6 months and it's holding up well. I do place a towel over it to absorb any water from my sons splashing. For the price, its probably worth it! Much cheaper than the designer ones and it does the job. I would make sure to be more careful with it and it definitely cannot be washed. You can wipe it down though and as long as you have a towel over it there shouldnt be much to clean anyway. Its basically a thin foam board, dries pretty easily if it gets wet. You get what you pay for, and i would probably buy it again because its so cheap and it has worked just fine.

My sin luvs this toy while he is sitting in his high chair however parents beware...it usually does s header into the food, takes the brunt of most coughs and sneezes (easy enough to clean except water can get into the bobble head and then leak into the eye area which takes about a week of sporadic shaking and drying to completely get dry), and the duction is awful! Once your little one figures out how to pull it off the table top good luck getting it to stay again without many tries. Our toy usually ends up in the floor before he gets his first bite.

I couldn't wait to put my daughter in her papasan chair. Unfortunately, she didn't fit into it well until she was about two months old (about 9 lbs.) I wish it had different reclining positions, it just sat too upright for a small baby. But now, she loves it. She can sit and watch her videos or take a nap. It also has the perfect setting of vibration and the music it plays is just beautiful, not like cheesy, cartoony lullaby music.

Sanalac is superb in using it as a binder in making sausages, non better. Also I use it as a substitute in recipes calling for whole milk with good results. Cannot find it on the open market. Now I purchase Sanalac from Amazon. I recommend this product to all users of powdered milk.

We purchased this dresser to match the Graco espresso crib set and it goes perfectly.  My husband put it together with no problems in about 2-3 hours.  For the price, it's perfect and appears that it will last just as long as we would need it.  We had no problems the other reviewers had related to putting it together, mismatched drawer sizes, missing parts, and scratches.  It looks much more expensive than it actually is.  SO glad we purchased it!

This is definitely not cerimonial grade. This is low quality matcha. Matcha should be bright green with a nice earthy smell. This smells more like Tabaco! Here is a picture of TRUE ceremonial grade matcha (left) black label (right). Can't say I am surprised since it is a lot cheaper. Like the saying goes...you get what you pay for!!
I already ordered a box of 12. We ate them all in 2 weeks. They tasted amazing. They are my favorite of all time

Our little guy is just getting strong enough in the neck to use the bumbo but does like it (we still have to guard his head from floppyness a bit.  It does a wonderful job of keeping him upright and is fun fun fun!  lots of giggles and smiles!

Claims to be Made in the USA. Completely false. The package and the bib both say Made in China. False advertising to say the least. Much better ones out there if location of manufacture didn't matter. But it does.

Linked in from the Made in the USA website, so I will be leaving them with my impression as well.

Unsatisfactory and unacceptable.

My hope was that these would be a simple and organic waterproof pad that would protect the co-sleeper.  This pad is pretty soft and cushy.  I would have liked it to be less fluffy.  I'm using it anyway since the co-sleeper mattress is pretty bumpy and we have noticed that she sleeps a bit more soundly with it on.  I just wanted people to be aware that it is not thin.
This has worked well for the task we purchased it for. I grind it into flour for waffles. Would buy again when needed.
The Dulce de leche got here right on time. We use it a lot for baking and I'm super happy we were able to buy a pack of six for a great price.
Great for those days I do not want to drive 25 miles to get a fresh pepper and my garden is not in season......

I was disappointed in this product. I thought I was buying thai peppers and although they are mildly hot they are not what I thought I was buying.  I have found the right ones locally and will not buy this product again nor do I recommend it.

We were looking for a lightweight, inexpensive stroller.  What a piece of junk this is.  The buckles are so hard to work they practically took off the ends of my fingers.  The wheels are flimsy, and the steering is a joke.  The part of the 3-point harness that goes between the legs pushed right up against my son's privates, and that was the only thing keeping him in this thing.  He screamed the last time I tried to take him shopping in this, so it went back to BRU.  Buy something else.  Anything would be better than this thing.

I LOVE this tea.  It's very yummy.  The Chai flavor is very light and it has more of a cinnamon flavor/taste to me.  I can drink this in place of coffee in the morning and it still gives me energy.  I do not like sugar in my tea's or coffee at all.  Not even one drop - this has stevia in it so I was worried it would be too sweet, but it's not overly sweet at all.  Just a hint of sweetness that compliments the spice.  Good all alone, but for a treat a splash of unsweetened vanilla almond milk with it makes a yummy latte!
We really enjoy this star car as my little boy says. Great idea for bedtime.
Love this tea (and other Honest Teas)! Not too sweet, but still delicious. Very refreshing. Totally recommend this tea.
Love this stroller. Great handling, easy to push one handed, easy fold compact, love the bright green color.
This hazelnut chocolate is delicious!  It's not quite as sweet as some of the other jocalat bars - the hazelnuts temper the sweetness just right.  Mmmmm!

Cans came super dented and messed up but I didn't care about that. The tea tastes like water and sweet n' low with raspberry syrup. Cheap and a decent drink to give guests you don't need to impress but over all not even worth the $1 per can.

WOW!!!!!
This Coffee is AMAZING. By far the absolute best that I have had & WITHOUT any of the extra calories !!!

It should be called Guiltless indulgence!
Calling this "Iced Coffee" is like saying Picasso was just a Painter.

Keep up the Great work!
I can't wait to see what you think of next!

You loyal customer,

Excellent product at a good price. The chocolate and the peppermint bark meld together to make this an exotic taste experience. I find it goes  especially well with coffee, and I like it as my first gustatory combo of the day.  It is of course a pleasure to indulge in lightly at any time of day. In addition to all this, it is dark chocolate that this product includes; so there is a healthful dimension to its consumption.

We have been looking for this everywhere and I am thrilled to find it! My husband makes the best steaks with this seasoning. We have tried alot of other seasonings and nothing holds a candle to this. You should try this product!!!!

This is the bomb!! I bought it at Wallmart, I can't imagine why they no longer carry it!! I have turned my whole family onto this product!!
As long as they make it I'll buy it!!
Purchased for my daughter to have in her dorm room. Easy to use and makes a good brew--so she says!

The Baby Manual

This Baby Manual comes with two discs.
â€¢On the first disc is the following chapters; Welcome, Baby Gear, Getting Home, Early Weeks, Breastfeeding, Formula Feeding, Diapering and Bathing.
â€¢The second disc chapters include; Reduce Crying, Health/CPR, Sleep Routine, Fun Activities, Out & About, Finding Childcare & Adjusting to Parenthood. Also the checklist review at the end of each segment is beyond helpful !

What is so different about this set is it has real life parents with real babies. Not some dolls like most baby films have. You are watching REAL families. And they have actual baby care experts in this particular movie. In the two discs they cover almost everything you need to know about having/raising kids. And also a lot that most parents don't think of ! Because, it isn't something that pops into your head. Like the finding childcare, sleep routine, adjusting to parenthood and things of that nature. Those tend to be overlooked with choosing how you will feed your baby, where baby will sleep, baby doctors and etc.

I personally learn better by watching real demonstrations. Rather than reading endless chapters and forgetting what each one said once I got to the next. I purchased this for my younger sister. Who is expecting with her very first baby. She is like me and would rather watch real life demonstrations. Rather than read. She has so many baby books. And she's not getting anywhere with them.

This is a really well put together movie. It isn't poorly filmed like a lot that I've seen over the years ! This is perfect for new moms. Or even parents with kids. You can never learn to much when it comes to kiddos. I am very pleased with this. And so is my sister. She is very thankful I was able to get it free in exchange for a review for her ! What I will say is the only con about this movie is the price. The price is kind of on the steep side. But, then again it may be worth it to a lot of parents because of all the knowledge that is in this movie. From real life parents/families. To real life baby care experts ! Though this is something that can also be passed down to other family members when they're expecting. we have a baby book that has been passed around to the women in our family for years. And I think this would be perfect to do that with as well.
**Like stated above I did receive this free in exchange for an honest, unbiased review. Whether good or bad. All opinions stated above are mine & mine only ! And the only reason I give it 4 stars is the price. Because, it is a little on the high side. All the contents on the DVDs are 5 stars ! And if it wasn't so expensive it would be a full 5 stars...arents because of all the knowledge that is in this movie. From real life parents/families. To real life baby care experts ! Though this is something that can also be passed down to other family members when they're expecting. we have a baby book that has been passed around to the women in our family for years. And I think this would be perfect to do that with as well.
**Like stated above I did receive this free in exchange for an honest, unbiased review. Whether good or bad. All opinions stated above are mine & mine only ! And the only reason I give it 4 stars is the price. Because, it is a little on the high side. All the contents on the DVDs are 5 stars ! And if it wasn't so expensive it would be a full 5 stars...

I like to use pimenton in a wide variety of foods and my first contact with this smoked sweet pimenton De la Vera, was because a friend give me one can about 3 years ago, and I felt that he was giving me that can even with pain, like if he was loosing something very valuable. When I tried the first time in an omelette I discover that: is not an excellent product ...is a treasure. There is no dish or preparation that don't get better using this product. I highly recommend to everybody who likes flavoful dishes . It's really amazing, even when you only smell it. Thanks for this product beyond all expectatives

Very easy to use just wear it like a bag, pop open at the side and you can put baby inside easily. However, I cannot use the carrier more than 1-2 hours as my back will start to hurt.

Adjust the location where the shoulder strap meet properly at your back because if it's too high, it will make your back hurt. Even with me making it as low as possible, still make my back hurt. I think this is because of the carrier design where there is not enough support for your back. Should include another strap that go around your back or one at the waist as currently, only the shoulder strap is at your back and I don't think that's enough support.

Other than that, it's so easy to use so when I go out with my baby, I will carry these (although I may have back pain after coming back home).
I am by no means a coffee expert, but I have tried several brands and flavors of the coffee pods and this is by far my favorite.  I buy this one over and over.
I like this bag, but it is VERY small for a diaper wetbag.....it will hold ONE diaper. I gave it to a friend to use for her Mama Cloth - a much better use. IT is a good bag though.
My daughter loves to look at herself in this mirror! It's great since it stands up on its own and is easily portable, as well.
Wow this is a great curry mix, the spices taste great quality and freshly ground. This is the real mcoy.

This storage hammock is exactly what I needed.  It holds a lot of stuffed animals, is durable, and really easy to install (I put it up in about 10 minutes including time to collect the tools I needed).  One note, it is VERY stretchy so make sure you hang it high enough if you need clearance below it.
Had something similiar almost 40 years ago. Loved Them But To Expensive to buy on a regular basis. No Local stores carry them in my area-Almost 4.00 per 5 0z.

I recently had the opportunity to review a little girl's HALO SleepSack Big Kids Blanket.I was not really sure what the blanket was all about.If it was going to be just like a swaddling blanket for infants or what? I wore swaddle blankets all the time on Amelia when she was a baby.I started looking around for a blanket she could wear when she got to big for the swaddle blankets.When I was offered to review for the HALO SleepSack Big Kids Blanket I was so excited.This blanket is nothing like the typical infant blankets out there.HALO Innovation's SleepSackÂ® is a wearable blanket that Unzips from the bottom for easy diaper and/or potty time.This blanket is really soft,comfy and my daughter just loves it.Her arms are free to move around.When it gets chilly at night we wear it over her pj's and she is very comfortable and warm.

I bought this toy and was happy with it for about 5 minutes.  It started making weird noises and crackling and shorting out. I tried a second one and it started to do the same thing. I'm not sure if there is a problem with the wiring or if the batteries just don't last but I was not about to have my baby playing with something that made god awful noises every time he played with it. I took the second one back and bought a new toy.

I bought these thinking that using bamboo was a great idea as it's highly renewable.  But these filters do not do a good job at keeping the grounds in the filter, which obviously is all important.  I tried using these four separate times and each time the filter leaked at the seam.  And it wasn't just the seam splitting.  They actually deteriorated at the seam's edges.  The combination of bamboo and paper pulp does not seem to be able to withstand the flow of hot water.  I use a pour-over method when making coffee, and I never have a problem with paper filters, so I'm confident that it's not what I'm doing.  It's the composition of the filters.  Maybe I got a bum batch, but maybe not.  I won't be using the 76 filters that I have left.  It's back to all paper for me.
I like strong coffee and I like to have a decaf option for friends and even myself on days I want more than 2 cups...this is perfect.
Used these for 2 years for all kinds of soups and stews. It's my secret ingredient.

I wasn't informed about Buckwheat Groats at all. The only thing I knew was that they are good for you. I thought there was some sort of soaking or growing or something confusing. But NOPE! Cook these little nuggets up and you will be HOOKED! Good grief they are so good! I always use the directions on the back of the box and they turn out so good every time! I eat them as a side dish, I make sure to make extra, and add them to egg bakes or soups, or casseroles. YUM! Don't let the "groats" word scare you. It's just like making rice a roni, but so much better for you and they taste SO good!

excellent product ,I buy every time I go to trader joes ,but we do not have one here
apreciate you so much ,saved me a trip to charlotte, nc .thank you

These chocolate covered espresso beans are wonderful!  The chocolate is very dark and rich and the \\"bean\\" inside is a very delightful blend of flavors with just enough caffine to really give it a zing.
My son loved this costume. It kept him nice and warm. It's a little challenging to get on but we got it.
I LOVE this product.  It is so delicious and satisfying.  I am so glad I tried it.  I like to think of it as the Greek version of sushi (without the meat of course)!

When putting this thing together, it might be wise to leave off the pink sleeve on the main arm.  The mobiles tend to hit the sleeve, stopping the rotation.  This can be quite frustrating, especially for a baby that enjoys movement.    Pros - Music volume is great, and a single windup lasts a few minutes.  Cons - The figures get stuck on the arm sleeve when passing, freezing the mobile in place.    Would I buy again - No.  For the price, I would rather get a cheaper model that worked as designed

Great on just about any veggie or meat, especially chicken and pork. This is our favorite cooking sauce with a kick. The Rothschild Cherry Pomegranate Habanero is just as good. Costco also carries both just not all the time, so it's good to have Amazon as back-up. We make most meals at home, including a lot of slow cooking, so we go through a bottle of this every month.
This is a great way to be hands free and pump. When I went back to work, this was a life saver!

Bought this for my 3 yr old for a Disney trip. The straps are easy to put on the shoes and very difficult to remove (which is great, so the kids can't take them off). There is enough space to write relevant information (names, phones, etc.) and my kid liked feeling special with his shoe tags. Really good buy and would defiitely recommend.
Outstanding! they make shopping much easier for someone using a walker to hang shopping bags on... plus those instore bags because a cart isn't an option
Great Oreo fix on the go. Also great for portion control - I can't be the only one to eat the entire bag once it is open...
My whole family loves this snack. We found it while on vacation and had to order some from Amazon. Much healthier than chips.

Whoa.....now this is nice stuff! It is probably the best all around honey I have ever tasted, with just the right amount of sweetness and body. It is the first time I have tried tupelo honey.

I did not like dealing with the supplier and will not order again from them but will get the tupelo honey from elsewhere. They said they had the items in stock (4 jars) but after I ordered I was informed they had only 2 and the rest would be sent to me later....which I am still waiting for.

[...]

very interesting design - looks simple, yet sturdy with a metal frame top, very elegant and fits a ton of stuff.  Velcro loops are heavy duty, so the bag will easily hold a heavy load if needed.  We got it to hang on our UppaBaby umbrella stroller.  full disclosure - we have another stroller organizer that we have hanging on our full size Quinny stroller - purchased it recently for $15 - but it looks and feels like a piece of rag compared to our new ZenKid organizer.  This organizer is definitely a MONEY WELL SPENT!  Thinking of returning our $15 buy and purchasing another ZenKid organizer.  I wouldn't hesitate to give it as a baby shower gift either - it is one of those "must have" items for an active parent.  Thanks ZenKid folks - perhaps you can make an extended stroller sun visor next?

I was leery about purchasing a mix that had canned seafood. However, I decided to add garlic, sausage, olives, jumbo shrimp, bell peppers, and onions. I ended up with too much liquid, but it looks beautiful! I probably spent an extra $10 on other ingredients, but still came out ahead considering how many servings it made. I can't believe how easy this was to make. For that reason alone, this is a keeper in my pantry.
I'm too poor to own a car, but not too poor to order wheatgrass on the internet. Is that irony? Depends!
I like it, it does the trick and it's large enough for every cart we've used, no regrets buying it!
This is a must for me as I am on a regime to gain weight.  I add it to my daily Ensure shake and since it has no flavor it does the work without an unpleasant taste.  Thank you.

We have a similar product for a BOB stroller, and it locks in much tighter.  This works fine, but wobbles a bit.  Easy to use, though.  You'll want to use the little extenders that come with the B-Ready if you have that model.  So don't throw them away!

I bought this product in bulk as I use turmeric in my Nutribullet for its anti-inflammatory quality.  It is a lot better bang for your buck.  The color is brighter than the turmeric I buy in the store and it was packaged well.
These are great chia seeds at a great price!  We love to add chia seeds to yogurt and jam for a dessert treat, and these chia seeds are the best!

We received this swing as a replacement to our defective Snugabunny.  This one is amazing.  The seat has two settings, one that lays baby almost flat and one that's inclined a little more.  They can rock side to side or rotate the swing to rock front to back.  The mobile spins, there's a mirror, and multiple sound options.  There is both music and nature sounds.  As he got heavier we had to up the swing setting to the highest level but it is still working great at 15lbs even though he now doesn't care for it as much.  The first 3 months of his life though it's the only reason I ever got chores or cooking done.  Be sure you always physically start the swing and you shouldn't have any issues with this model.  If you do Fisher Price's customer service is amazing.  Go to their online chat and they are quick to resolve any issues.
Sturdy gate with a high-quality finish. Looks much nicer than the standard wooden baby gate you find at most stores.

Like the distributor. They are good on shipping and I am a regular customer for about a year. Wish I could get a discount for reordering over and over... Mark-up is a bit high because I have been getting local "deals" at $1.00 per bottle through CVS and sometimes Riteaide. Whatever...

Thanks!
This works well and keeps the carseat raised up a bit so it will fit in my car. Rear facing in a subaru impreza hatchback.
FAST DELIVERY AND A GREAT PRICE. GOOD DEAL ALL THE WAY AROUND. BOWL WORKS GREAT,BUT IS A LITTLE SMALLER THANK I EXPECTED. THE KID HASN'T SPILLED ANYTHING YET!

This is a very good product. The ingredients are simple and contain nothing of concern- no sugars or substitutes and no preservatives. The taste is good, but not sweet. This should be good for children as it doesn't indoctrinate them into our sugar based society.

The texture is smooth and the oats have been cut finely. This is undoubtedly because of its target audience (children) but the adults in our household liked it also.

All in all a very good product.
I have taken these for about 6 months and have not been sick with a cold or flu at all.  When I hear someone sneeze in my vicinity I pop two of them and I'm fine while others around me get sick.

I bought for my sister and she told me this was good stuff that she will be ordering again. Thanks so much.

This little kit provides everything you need to make breastfeeding more comfortable. The pads are soft and comfortable to wear in my bra. The ice packs are effective and the perfect shape. The carrying case provides a discrete way to store the pieces.

My daughter loves these. We did get doubles, but that was fine. They come in a bag and not package as shown (as others have stated), but honestly it wasn't a huge concern as they were still brand new.

Got these for my bro-in-law for his bday because he's been obsessing about them lately. I kept 2 boxes for myself and have to say it's pretty darn good.  If you're into the organic bit and love cheddar snack mixes, this is a good way to go. Sizable boxes as well!
I took a sip, so sorry I did.  Awful taste, kind of a Clorox undertone.  I am praying I don't get sick from the tiny amount I swallowed.  No coconut tastes like this.

I have had one attached to my nappy bag, and another attached to my ergobaby carrier. It fits a single dummy nicely (I am using the Avent Soothies).

Its a bit tricky to open it one handed, but I have managed to do this with a little dexterity.

It does exactly what its supposed to, and looks nice as well.
I love this product and usually get it around Valentines from Costco.  The bag from Costco is ALOT bigger.  These are about 3 servings..

taste is ok, once you scrape the mostly crumbs of what used to be jerky into your fingers; there are no strips, biggest piece about an inch, as though run over by car, so someone has to be doing this better than snackmasters

easy to install and have had no problems with them. Protect my daughter in the harsh summer sun and can see them lasting years to come. Even after I've had to move them around to find the right spot they instantly stick again with no trouble.
I use these solofil cups all the time and love them. I have one for home and the other one I took to use at work.

This tea tastes good, and our cat loves it too. (contains catnip among other things)
It is bedtime ritual now.

Loooooooooooove this tea and brand.  Some other brands just don't seem to have the same rich taste and health food stores vary with their brands .  Oolong tea is suppose to help with weight loss and I have found that it does work.  I will always have a reserve now when the health food store is out, waiting for a delivery. this is a very good, refeshing tea.  it's green tea, plum and pomegranate.  80 calories which is good.  21g carbs which isn't that good and only 16% juice which isn't that good either.  but, all-in-all it is nicely flavored and quenches the thirst.  highly recommended.

This manual breast pump is definitely my life saver!  I purchased this pump 5 days after my son was born and it is a must for me right now.  It is cost efficient and it saved me a lot of time.  My son refused to suck my nipple a few days after he was born, I decided to try this manual breast pump to pump the milk and feed him with bottles.  This brand was recommended by the hospital and I just tried it.  It works very well for me! I will strongly recommend this breast pump to new moms!
We often go to Olive Garden only to get salad and bread sticks.  So when I found these at Amazon for a great price I couldn't pass it up.  My kids even have a bowlful for a snack.

The first time I made this tea, I brewed it hot- the scent and flavor was so strongly vegetal that it tasted like roasted corn and I just didn't have the stomach for it. I left it to sit on the counter for a few days, not sure what I would do with it, when I decided I should give it a try iced.

WOW. What a difference! I first brewed the tea hot in a standard size french press, then drained the brew into another pitcher. I added a generous squirt of honey (perhaps 1.5 tbsp) and left it in the fridge to cool overnight. The result is absolutely fantastic. That sharp corn taste has been muted significantly by sweetness of the honey, leaving the tea tasting so much smoother with a slight grassy flavor. If you enjoy Honest Tea's Honey Green bottled tea, you will ADORE Majani Tea's Faraja tea iced with a dash of honey. Honestly, I can't even go back to buying Honest Tea after this. Great job Majani!
I have tried a couple other reusable k-cups.  This one is the best.  It is easy to use and the coffee tastes great.  Minimal clean-up and pretty cheap.  I paid $10.50 for mine.
This is a great, easy manual pump. Just make sure you get the right flange size. The one that came with was too small.

I use to work in Germany and I fell in love with these hazelnut chocolate wafers.  So far out of all the gluten free chocolate covered wafers these are the best.  The wafers have the just the right crunch and chocolate is yummy.  Plus the hazelnut filling is yummy too.  I've tried glutino chocolate wafers (chocolate outside and vanilla inside; chocolate outside and chocolate inside) and they do NOT compare and other brands.  These are soooo much better.

this is a great second choice coffee. i live out in the boonies and cant get to a dunkin donut store very often (the only online source is a bit pricey )so i buy a lot of this product.this is the only other k-cup that i care for.

this is the best nursing pillow i've found. love that it wraps all the way around, has a large surface area for me to rest my arm w/baby and that it has a mechanism for securing it around me and tightening/loosening it as needed. a must have for us long waisted nursing moms.
Teething baby LOVES it and even likes to do it herself. Great way to help with gum pain/discomfort without always medicating.
Even though this product said 12-36 months it crazy how it was too bif even for my 4 year old son.

I've used the Millstone brand in the past, and have always enjoyed their good-quality, and their accurate-flavorings. When this arrived a few days ago, I used it to brew my morning java, and I could tell from the brewing aroma that Millstone "got the flavor right" again. I then added some vanilla-caramel flavored creamer (by CoffeeMate), .... and yowzah!, another homerun! ... I do loves me some caramel. : )

P.S. I see (sadly) that the price for the 12-pack of 1.75 oz. packages has tripled, compared to Amazon's Warehouse Deals sale I purchased it from, ... so I recommend you stock-up when you find it on sale.

Our daughter gave us a Dilmah tea chest upon returning from Sri Lanka.  We were so pleased to be able to purchase Dilmah tea at Amazon.  Now that we have tried it, we like it better than any other tea.  Every other tea seems insipid.

This takes the frustration out of breastfeeding when babies have latching problems, or if you have a heavy let-down. I have used them on both of my children successfully. It really helps save the day when discouragement makes you want to quit. It allows you to nurish your baby the best way possible stress free. HIGHLY recommend.

We have been doing Elimination Communication since my son was born and started using this potty when he was around 7 months old. I have the Little Potty as well. Right off I can say that for ECing under 12 mos, you want to go with the Bjorn little potty or the Thermobaby Anatomical potty.

Con:
-This one is a little too big for 6-10 month olds being that its a little higher and wider, making it more difficult to get into the natural squatting position that is most effective for elimination.
-Bjorn is pricey.
-Since there's no lift on the back, as with the Themobaby, it's sometimes hard to aim when helping him sit, I hate when he's too far forward and pee spills over the front.

Pro:
-The bowl is easier to empty, the front is easy to lift out and secure to hold. I like that the contents go out the back instead of over the front like the one piece potties. This feature also makes it much easier to clean.
-It has rubber lining on the bottom so it doesn't scoot around. I really like that, it makes it so much more sturdy.
-At 13 months this thing is great for him and he's around the 50th %tile in height and weight.

I ordered what I thought were the full size gummy eggs.  Everyone else that is selling the "MINI" size eggs, list them as such.  I ordered 5 bags of the full size eggs and received 5 bags of mini eggs.  When I tried to contact the seller through Amazon, they state that this item can't be returned.  Not a happy camper !!!

Gave this as a gift to my great grand-daughter.

She is one month old. We will have to wait about a year to get her review

I have little regard for reviews where people take the product and soon after feel great. Changes take time. If a person is already eating a healthy diet the changes may be so slow as to be undetectable.

Why did I buy this product?

1. It is certified organic and kosher.
2. Olive leaf is said to be effective in repairing damage to joints.

An aside: eating prunes has been shown to increase bone density-GOOGLE IT

I ordered several different instant coffee type items from powdered Starbucks, to squirt from a can (this item), to concentrated coffee. This ranks in the upper middle of the items I tried. It's convenient to just squirt into water or other concoctions. It does not need to be refrigerated, so you can easily keep this at your desk to squirt into some water color water. The taste is ok. It helps caffeinate me without being too sweet. It does have a slight saccharin aftertaste. The price is the best compared to the other two options I mentioned. They even had a buy one get one free special going at the time so the price was even better. Overall, not bad.
This was absolutely the best creamer they have made, I just don't understand why out of all the different ones they have they had to do away with this one.  I wish I could just make it myself.
I know these are for kids but I got them for my elderly mother who pees every time she laughs, sneezes or sometimes when she is just setting there. No more wet spots on the furniture!

I bought this for my son at BRU because he loves to have the water running during his bath non-stop.
This is a great concept he can put the star and get water out but when he does this the whole toy comes off.
It did detour him from playing with the faucet but was a pain to hold it up. Save your money.
We love these! I use the German Pancake recipe on the back and serve them with strawberries and a bit of powdered sugar. This is a Saturday morning favorite.
I just returned it. I order by mistake, had returned.come, but the pillow case pillow knowingly order has been re-sent.

If you want to know what a pound of parsley looks like, imagine a gallon container... Then add a little bit more. This is *a lot* of parsley. I bought this for making parsley tea as a diuretic so I needed a bunch and this is a large quantity of good quality parsley at a very reasonable price.
we need to be able to see the nutrition and ingredient section for all labels.

Hubby ordered it for our new baby daughter for Easter. Love this blanket! It has various colors and goes well with the nursery. The colors are richer in person than in the picture. It's a good size and very very soft. Holds up very well to repeated washing. My daughter was sick and it's been washed at least 18 times since we've had it and no issues. No pilling,no  loose threads, and has held together firmly. Very nice. Price is stellar! Free shipping is just a bonus!
Flavor is still good.  However, the unit price is more expensive than the price buying it from vending machine.

These are very tall bottles and after the first time storing the bottle sideways in the fridge a good bit of the very sticky juice leaked out in the fridge.  I tightened the cap and put it back in and it happened again.  So you have to lean it up on an angle.

This has to be the best decaf I've ever brewed at home.  I was a little scared of the darkness of the roast, but the flavor is incredible.  Absolutely not bitter at all and full of flavor without tasting burnt or harsh.  Being VERY caffeine sensitive, I was concerned about the name being \\"Jazzed Up\\" decaf as sometimes names like that mean half-caff, but I had no reaction at all, even after multiple cups.  I enjoy this coffee very much, and I will have this in stock at home as long as I own a Keurig.
I ordered this crib set for my friend's baby shower. It exceeded my expectations! Very good quality, great design and colors. I plan to buy one for my sister's baby shower, too!
Great taste and add a depth to dishes that regular diced tomatoes lack. We've used them mixed with corn, queso and sausages for a quesadilla filling, and plan to make Mudajara with them next.

I really enjoyed this product. Mixed well with ingredients. This is the first time I have used this product.
It met all my expectations.

I have a great northern popcorn 5oz popcorn machine and have been using it for years along with their popcorn.
This compliments their stuff so well.
For me it's just like eating movie theater popcorn.
The prices fluctuate a lot which is why I made this purchase, amazon was the cheapest by 50% at the time.

I have 6 bottles of this in my cupboards and will order more when I run low for sure.

I like the frame, but I did not receive the pen as the description stated.  Also, I only received the pink and blue reversible mat and not the green.  Since I bought this frame for a gender reveal party - I needed the green mat.  Not including the pen with a signature frame seems to be a flaw as well - especially when it's clearly stated in the description. These are exactly what I was looking for. I can place them in a few of my darker areas to only be illuminated when I enter that area. They are plenty bright and can be stuck anywhere. I'm a tad disappointed in the motion detection distance (wish it were larger) but it's not bad by any means.

Tasty salt, though sometimes a little TOO salty. The natural moisture content makes it stick inside the grinder a bit, so you kind of have to shake some down and then grind it. But the mineral content is great, definitely worth it.
Love this shampoo for my baby. Smells wonderful and leaves his hair soft and clean.

This is a must have!! My daughter is just over 4 months, and was swaddled up until she got too strong. We purchased the SleepSack and its only been a few nights, but it's working out great! She's sleeping through the night, self soothing, and not moving around so much. I love that the SleepSack is so soft, comfortable,keeps her warm, and that i don't have to worry about her safety because it's a wearable blanket. I bout the Large because she is a fairly long baby and there is still a ton of room. She can probably use this for the next year! Affordable, comfortable & safe!

It's great to see this cereal available on Amazon - it's impossible to find in the stores.  it's similar to Special K but less sweet and more light and crunchy.  It's a multi-grain product and even better, one single serving pack is 1 Weight Watchers Point so that makes it easy to use as a snack.

We originally registered for this cradle due to the style & size. Upon closer examination we discovered a warning label about the possibility suffocation...scary! The sides are not ventilated. Ultimately we decided against it due to safety concerns.

These are excellent.  We got hooked on them at Costco, and like so many things there, they are no longer available.  Was a nice surprise to find them on Amazon.  These come in 4 bite size pieces, which I like.  Often, I'll eat 2 and save the other 2 pieces for another time.  Just enough chocolate on the bottom, to make it taste more like a dessert bar instead of a breakfast bar.  Wish they were more readily available.

If you are like us and you love having friends around and cooking BBQ for everyone, then one of the things in your mind is that you always want to cook the best and most tasty food for your friends. Freshest nutmeg and so convenient and easy to grind. One of my favorite kitchen products. I add it to my smoothies, oatmeal and even my homemade mac & cheese. So yummy!

It really does taste like a frothy mug of root beer with ice cream in it. And it is nice and chewy. I reccommend! Also try A&W Root Beer Barrel hard candy, and root beer candy sticks, and Jelly Belly root beer candy all at Amazon. See my list of root beer products if you like root beer.

These are a pretty good alternative to Oreos. And they work well for all the various food allergies we deal with in our family: wheat, egg, tree nuts, peanuts.
