I expected to receive a mix of the four cereals advertised, but I received eight Special K (advertised cereal), eighteen Special K with Red Berries (advertised cereal) and twelve Smart Start Healthy Heart (advertised cereal).  This comes to a total of thirty eight of the cereals that I can eat.    The balance was twelve Special K with Fruit & Yogurt (NOT ADVERTISED) and ten Granola with Almonds (NOT ADVERTISED), which I cannot eat due to serious allergies.    Additionally, there was no Smart Start (my favorite) and the carton looked like the bowls were dumped into the carton.  I had purchased this item before and received product as advertised and the carton was properly packaged.      I had originally subscribed to a case every three months, but I have canceled due to this unadvertised product mix.  I am deeply disappointed that I paid for sixty cereal bowls, but will only be enjoying thirty eight.
Grandson loves it the first toy he has been able to grasp and lay with unaided he loves the crinkles noises
Love these bottles,  I got both the plastic and the glass ones.  I prefer the plastic because the glass gets scalding hot in the bottle warmer.  Severly cuts down on gas for my newborn.
I got this for my sister's baby shower and she loves it. I'm waiting to see how my niece looks in them and recommend it

I bought this as a possible health tea, for cutting down appetite. It comes in a round hard disk.
I break off a small piece ( 1 gm) this makes about a quart of dark tea. I experience a slight nausea, after drinking this tea.
I don't know if that is goal, thereby cutting appetite.? It does have a slight stimulating effect. I understand the brewing method is to take the second brew, for drinking. ( see reviews) Directions and benefits should be included in the packaging.
This lunch bag is super cute.  I have used it to keep breast milk cold and it has worked everytime.  Love it!
Got this when my daughter was almost a year old, and wish I'd gotten it right from the start! We still use it now at 17 months, as the backpack.

It's pretty good for the citi mini single. I have to lean over to not kick it, but it has come in really handy at times when I have two of my kids and they both don't want to walk. I usually wind up walking next to it and pushing the stroller side by side. Works even better on the citi mini select with the handle extended.

I bought a box of these Sharkies in the organic section of my grocery store a couple years ago and fell in love with them but they promptly disappeared and I only recently have found them again! These are the \\"kids\\" snacks which are quite different than the adult Sharkies snacks. The adult chews have a lower sugar content, and are very dense, and have a lot more snacks per bag (actually more than I usually like to eat) so are much more suitable for an energy snack. These really aren't much better than candy, as the top ingredient is organic cane sugar, but I do like them much better than most fruit snacks - as another reviewer mentioned, they are very reminiscent of those candy fruit slices, soft and chewy with good flavor. At least these are a bit healthier though than candy with good ingredients and vitamins, etc. but they are still best kept as just a special once-in-awhile treat. If you can keep the kids away from them, they are so tasty, I have a hard time only having one pack! I like the Berry flavor best but the Tropical mix is good too. Right now as I am writing this review, these are only available through a 3rd party seller for much too high a price, but they've been available on Subscribe-and-Save for around $12 so I would wait for a price more in that range to buy them again.

My daughter received 2 hematomas from attempting to extract during childbirth. These later hardened and I believe made her keep her head in one position too long while laying which cause some flattening. Anyway, it is VERY soft and my daughter reaches to feel it when I lay her on it. I can't say for sure that it's working as she is at a stage where she moves all the time anyway, but her head is getting rounder and I have a bit more peace of mind. I wish that the Pediatrician or anyone would have told me about it maybe during one of the trillion times they mentioned \\"back to sleep\\". Just seems like a logical thing to use if your baby is always on their back.

I like the product. I have purchased this at the supermarket before.  Buying from Amazon is alot easier then having to go to the store.  Also getting two at a time makes it alot easier for me.  We love waffles and pancakes  so we use alot of this syrup.
I love this, it's fun looking and does the job it was meant for, I would highly recommend this to my friends w/baby's

Seriously what s great tea.
It didnt work as fast as other people described but on the third day my husband and I visited the bathroom as never before. Not kidding! I used to go only 1 time a day...4 to 5 times now.! I which i could drink this tea everyday but the maximun is only seven days. Buy it and get ready to feel lighter and fresh. Awesome tea!

My daughter loves this and it is perfect size too for traveling as it is about a hand size. She is 15 months old now and still loves playing with it, pressing the buttons, hearing the sounds in 3 languages and seeing some flashing lights. I just wish it had even more songs. It is a great distraction for traveling and educational too at a great price.
I am very pleased with this transaction and would buy from this Seller again.  Glee natural chewing gum in the "Triple Berry" flavor is my favorite!

I bought this car seat originally because of it's safety rating, but it is the best car seat ever.  It was easy to install, and it is easy to get my son in and out of, plus he is comfortable and rides in style.  I don't have a complaint about this product and high recommend it to new moms.
I bought this for my teenage daughter who loves these Jelly Bellies but it was even too many for her. She ended up taking them to school to share.
I love these kitkat's. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to try a new flavor.
It was as advertised and worked nicely.  Works great in the oddly shaped opening I needed it for.  Thank you!
Even though my bub is on formula, she preferred these bottles over others we tried

I received the Quaker Banana Nut Bread Flavor from Influenster. I should have asked for several. Before I could say a word my kids had pilfered it and it was GONE!! Then they came back asking if I had anymore. If my kids eat it I will buy it. Plus it is a product I can trust to be safe and healthy for my kids. Definitely on my grocery list.
Treats are a wonderful find, especially in Afghanistan. We all loved these, since the exchange was out of any chocolate, mail order was the only way to satisfy the chocolate urge.
Lost a few because of leaving in water too long.  An hour or so is plenty.  Let drip dry and put them wherever.  They are fun little plants.  They arrived very healthy.  A good purchase.

Packaging states no added sugar yet second ingredient is maltodextrin, which is highly and chemicaly refined sugar made from corn.

Your newborn does not need sugar!!
Mine tasted stale and overly salty, gross man I wish I could get the good large Iranian ones again.

We had the BOB holder and it fell apart with very little use. We replaced the BOB with a new BOB holder which also tore.  Then we purchased this Jolly Jumper version. WOW! It has held up amazingly! I recommend it over the BOB because it has a better zipper pouch and slightly bigger cup holders.

This sounded healthy by the name but why not save money and stir shredded coconut in off the shelf pre-stirred PB?.

Months later: 0 of 8 people found this review helpful -- mystify me. Save your money and mix natural unsweetened coconut flakes or shredded coconut to healthy Adams Natural Peanut Butter. I'm a health conscious eater and I love it.
I bought this as a first pillow for my 23 month old to use in her crib. It is a perfect size and she loves it!
The tin is great and reusable. The tea went in the trash. Tea Forte makes other teas that I love. Not this one though.

Absolutely love this stuff! Been drinking it for 20 years. The original "cowboy coffee" with a cellophane-wrapped peppermint stick in each bag, just as it was 100 years ago. It is said that the trail cook used the peppermint to bribe cowboys to help with some of the chores (sugar being a rare commodity). Full-bodied, just good, solid great-tasting coffee. Sitting out on my deck, in boots and my old Wranglers, watching the sun come up, nursing my cup of Arbuckle's, I close my eyes and I can smell the sagebrush and saddle leather! This is not one of those fancy-dandy coffees for wusses and "pilgrims" from back east; no, sir.  Arbuckle's is straight-up, "with the bark on", and  it'll open your eyes and get you back in the saddle, pronto, amigo! You will NOT be disappointed.

This mattress came separately, but was recommended by amazon when I chose the crib.
the size is perfect for my beautiful round crib and it is very cushy.
This crap was a waste of money! The manual one is better and much more powerful smh

Make dessert with this rice. It's sticky and, on its own, just faintly sweet. Mango rice, rice pudding, or whatever rice dessert you like. I think it would also work well, barely salted, in sushi, but I haven't tried yet; the stickiness and texture at least are perfect for sushi and rice balls.
If you're using a rice cooker, find the places where the steam condenses on your cooker, and clean those areas extra thoroughly after making this rice. Like all sticky rice, this rice has a starchy steam that will make a mess if you don't clean it up.

I really like the hat that came with this set and it fit my 3lb preemie nicely.  However, I have not been able to put the onesie on him because it's not NICU approved.  The sleepsuit however is NICU approved but I was not crazy about the fit.  I did not like how the feet part is straight down.  I think it should have a foot part for the feet to fit in it comfortably.  The sleeves were also too short. It's a nice set idea but could use some adjustments.
These are eaten up faster than the less healthy treats in our house.  We had had to buy several boxes now.  Much better than the Cliff var for adults.  These actually taste good.

I think more products need to be in smaller containers as there is less waste and left over Spinach is not so great. If your single its just enough. I try to buy other Veg's in smaller cans, also don't take up a lot of room in storage, with pull tops its real easy to use.
I enjoy the beans & franks very much, I've been eating them for a few years.
I first purchased this yummy treat during Christmas but was unable to find it anywhere after that.  I found this wonderful site where I can order as much as I like.  Hooray for me!

Very cute, good quality, fits a tub of wipes, a receiving blanket, and about six diapers.  I wish it was a little bit bigger, and that was the only thing that kept me from giving it five stars, but it is big enough for what I needed.  Great to keep downstairs for diaper changes so we don't always have to go upstairs to the nursery.  It will also be great to use for other things when we are out of diapers, which was one reason I chose this instead of a regular diaper caddy.

I wanted a lemon pepper seasoning. I thought this product would at least have a nice lemon zing to it . It did not. However, the other spices in this lemon pepper seasoning made it a good general seasoning. I found I could use it in foods where I did not need lemon but some seasoning. It worked good as a general seasoning but not for seasoning foods like fish or chicken when bold lemon  flavor is needed.

I give this a 5 star because it is worthy. Very good KONA and it has all the Bells and Whistles a good KONA coffee contains to pleasure the pallet of the coffesuier!!!  Yes, I made up that word I am a Coffeesuier!!!!! Are You??

I really like these. You can taste the dark chocolate. It's sweet & gluten free. A bit pricey however. But MUCH BETTER than the super hard & sticky regular kind bars that have way more total fat, too. Not that that's an entirely bad thing; for me personally, I have plenty of healthy fat options in my diet, so sometimes I don't need the overkill. But yes I think these are better for your teeth!
This should last you a long time i use this for my cast iron oiling .. The price is great you have nothing to lose.
I think this is cool for my gf. She really loves it. If any more chance in the future, I will definitely take the service again!!
Keeps the bed dry at night! My son has no complaints and loves the blue color. Washes easily without need to touch soiled area.

These were wonderful. Because of the reviews I decided to get 3 brands and compare. No connoisseur, however, you still know what is good and what is not. I found these to be tasty, crunchy and fresh with a very nice flavor. I did not find any significant difference between the 3, to tell the truth. They were all organic and raw and to me, they were comparable. None of the 3 stood out as being that much better or worse then the others.  I would buy again, these were shipped fast, as described, great tasting and I just love finding new ways to use them.

I got these set to avoid the snap marks on the skin from using G-diapers. Originally I was attracted to diaper covers I did not need to wash with every single change, however, they tend to leak, the velcros don't work so well after a month, and for it to leak less you need to put it tight which hurts my baby's skin.
I guess it is an ok option if you run out of other diaper covers and are at home able to change your little one every 1 to 2 hrs.
I would not travel with these at all!

I was able to try this out for free through Bzzagent and I have to say that the vanilla cappuccino is definitely better tasting than the mocha.  It actually has more of a vanilla as well as a coffee flavor to it.  It did however taste a little chalky to me and that is why I'm only giving it 2 stars.  I would prefer it to taste a little better and not so much like a diet drink.  I believe a lot of people will like this flavor, but it's just not for me.

I used these with my first so I bought some more for this go round.  I'm still pleased with them.  They aren't as soft as the more expensive brands, but they are more leak-proof.  The softer side is placed against your body while the rougher side (which you never feel) prevents your bra from getting damp.  My other pads are the same material on both sides so I've had seepage from all 3 other brands I have-but not these.  They are flat, but that doesn't present a problem-and I'm a 38D.  The seamed \\"coned\\" pads don't do anything for me that these don't do.  They are a little smaller than the more expensive pads, but that hasn't made a difference, either.  If your nursing bra is lined, they don't show through-I'm not sure any pad would be invisible with an unlined bra.  I don't hand wash-I throw them in a lingerie bag with my bras and then air dry.  All in all, they do the job and I'd buy them again.
It does the job.  It's white so it blends in well and doesn't compel our toddler to play with it.  It stays in place and works well.  I appreciate that it has a hole in the top for the shower pull.

This chair is great!  I sit my son in it when I feed him his baby food.  We've been using it for about a month now.  My 4 month old still needs a little assistance when he's sitting in it, so I can't leave him alone in it.  It's easy to clean since it's all hard plastic. I wish the tray was easier to put on.
Quality of the cheese was very good, much better than what I can buy locally. Will definitely buy again.

We use these with our Wee Gallery Mobile by Kikkerland. It looks great a year later! My son loves to look at the cards. The mobile only holds 5 cards and the box came with 6. The sixth card that he gets to carry around is creased, but still intact.  It's just not in as great of shape as the other cards.
Nothing is more uncomfortable than to sleep on a sheet, when man-made products make you stick to them.  These pads prevent contact with making contact with the mattresses and get cozy.
purchased for a friend.  she was over-joyed to get them since it is difficult to find grocery sore where we live.  she was completely happy with the gift.

Who doesn't like Skittles?

I had the unfortunate mishap of getting my bag and it being left out in the sun which then caused there to be even MORE mashups as everything melted together! I can tell you that the each bite from the big blob was delicious....sugary and fruity. Any individual pieces I was able to break off was just as tasty and I could tell the distinct flavors.

Very glad we got this one. Love the drawers - keep extra diapers, wipes, ointments, q-tips, etc very handy. The laundry compartment is great too. Very easy to change my son and just toss out his dirty clothes right there. When it's time for laundry, the basket just slides right out and goes with me -although I DO wish it stood on its own outside the table, but that's not a real problem. Great height. Lightweight and easy to move, but very study. I have no real complaints about it. There's even enough space on the top to change my son and still keep the wipes warmer and a bottle of hand sanitizer right there. I'd definately recommend it. (Plus I bought it at Amazon.com cheaper than  the company sold it. Always a plus.) =0)

It's a great idea for parents of newborns. It makes night time feedings in those early weeks easier because you aren't getting out of bed, you just roll over and tend to your baby. But if you think you'll get a lot of time with this product, you're wrong. The inside is short which greatly prohibits the amount of time your baby will be in it. It would have been better if the little yellow bar could be moved to provide extra length for your fast growing baby.
I've tried Goji berries from a few different sources. I've been consistently happy with Sunfood's quality. Great packaging too. Will buy again.

I bought these assuming you had to use only Dr. Brown's nipples with Dr. Browns bottles. Well, the Wal-Mart brand fast flow nipples work slightly better for half the price! Too, it sucks that you only get 2 nipples in a pack when you have to buy the bottles in 3-packs!

Easy to apply. Provides very good sun protection.  And I love that I can roll down the window as much as I want to. My grand daughter has pulled the shade off several times, but not a problem because it goes back on easier than the 1st time. I spent less time putting this back on than I would trying to make the suction holders stick to the window.  Great buy!

These glazed apricots were very disappointing.  They had a distinctive chemical taste.  We bought them for an extended hiking trip and dumped them the first chance we had.  Generally glazed apricots (admittedly purchased at a higher per pound price) are a great treat and it is hard to stop at eating just one.  The four of us each ate just two and those we ate three days apart, thinking it might have been something other than the WE Go Nuts product that made the first one so disappointing.  Unfortunately it was the product itself.

I did a search to find the best coffee in the world. This one came up so I had to try it. It's good, but I've had others I would count as better.
I have to use a lot to brew as rich as I like.
My wife and I were quite pleased with the speed of the the delivery and the quality of the product. We would certanly recommend to anyone to feel confident about purchasing.

My 6 year old begged for this and I finally found his size here. It arrived quickly and exactly as described. The feet are a bit big which made for some awkward walking (but again it IS Tweety bird). The velcro that attaches them to the child's shoes is definitely not strong enough, but I was able to tie and untie them instead without difficulty. My son wore it to school and had a great trick-or-treating with it. It also helped that it's nice and warm so he needed very little underneath and didn't add to the bulk. I highly recommend the product and this particular company.

There was nothing I disliked more about the Plan diet than the flax granola.  I could barely stomach it.  I tried really hard to like it, but nothing I added to it made it better.  I don't fault the makers of the product, I just personally can't stand the taste and texture of flax granola.

Excellent product.... only issue is when you sterilize you have to worry about the plastic. Not so easy to remove. But way better for baby's in my opinion. Try not to boil the water to long and remove the bottles as soon as possible.

I bought two boxes to get me thru the winter. It's just me drinking it as it's too rich for my wife to drink(rathers Nestle crap lol). This is top cocoa for me as I wish I could travel the world to find the best. If you like chocolate intense, you'll love this stuff. Gonna try it as an icing for my moms homemade turtle cookies soon.

I was so satisfied with my first Paci Plushie that I ordered two more, one for back up and one for grandma's house. My 5 month old loves her kitty. It is the cutest thing to see her going to sleep cuddling it.

Perfect size and at 90 calories it's a hit with me for my 3 o'clock pick me up! I also will pair it with a few almonds and I swear it tastes just like an Almond Joy candy bar and tons better for you!Hint...they melt easily so store in a cool location.
After all this is just kikkoman's soy sauce and I already know I like it. The vendor was quick to deliver, the can size is very handlable.
It is very good quality fabric and it has very good design. But because of its shape it has limited usage area.

I've bought this product a few times and have been very happy with it.  It is a little cheaper on Amazon than it is in most stores.  I use it for regularly for baking and it has a good taste.  Love that it's organic and fair trade!
Like these bars when I am wanting a sweet but better for me snack. Has good flavor without being too sugary.
Not enough capacity for long cords. Doesn't keep cords securely attached to itself. Too high priced for a piece of plastic.

We got these for our twin boys! The seats are large. We luckily have a mini van so we have the space! I love how easily it adjust as they grow! Would check measurements if you have a smaller car or more than one child. Other than that we love it!!!
Love this Quinoa product by Bob's Red Mill.  Received fresh.  Very tasty and nutritional grain.  High in protein and easy to add to meal planning.

I ordered (and received) the aqua/yellow/green combo. All I wanted was the green cup and it's perfect. It's the exact color I sought for a long time (matches the photo) and it holds a good-sized beverage (about 12-oz). It's comfortable to hold and to drink from. I usually like a thin-rim on something I'm going to use for water, but the thicker rim on this cup works nicely, so no complaints.

These cups are sturdy and sure-footed. A good product, all around.

The other two colors are true to the picture, too.
If you want avoid bad odors in your house, you have to buy this product that its perfect for dirty diaper
It was inexpensive compared to other walk thru gates. Quality is good and suits the purpose of coralling our 20# Puggle. It was easy to install !!!

We walked buy this store in New York City and subsequently ordered the hot chocolate on a stick variety pack. They come in three favors (white, milk and dark chocolate) and taste great!  We love good chocolate (vahalrona, Godiva, Jacque Torres, etc.).  These are very tasty, fun to use, and unique. Kids especially enjoyed creating their own chocolate drink. We also emailed the company for rush delivery and they were excellent in responding and following up. Highly recommend!
First had this coffee while on vacation and was very happy to see that it was here.  It arrived at the house as promised and is as delicious as I remember it to be.  Will be ordering more soon!

I use this cocoa powder for my choclate cupcakes. It is rich, velvety and makes a wondeful dark and moist cake. I have tried various other brands and the difference is night and day. Well worth the expense!
Love them! Not every whole wheat pasta tastes good, but I personally love this cheddar shells. I usually add chicken or shrimps.
These are great! My 14 month old son loves to feed himself and I love that I can determine what food is in these pouches! Also easy to clean, which is very important to me, great product!

NOTE: This is a review for 1( one ) box of Goldfish Mac & Cheese Cheddar. I did not buy a 12 Pack. Also, this is a review only for the Cheddar flavor. I was eating the product while typing this.

First, it takes 16 minutes to cook. I don't mind this.

Then theres the texture, look, etc.. The color of this meal is the average Mac and Cheese color; yellow. Its not too yellow, which is good. The liquidness( yes, this meal is somewhat liquidy ) of this meal looks a bit disgusting. The smell is also a little stinky.

Finally, the taste. First, try a Cheddar Goldfish Cracker( I ate the Colors version of a Cheddar Goldfish Cracker ). Yum! Now try the Mac and Cheese. It actually kinda tastes like a Goldfish Cracker. The texture of the Goldfishes also feels good in your mouth.

Other good things include the ''Comix''. They just tell you how great this meal is.

A small complaint is the size. Depending on how much you eat, it can be a bit big.

Great product! Will buy again! I also recommend the Cheesy Pizza flavor.

Our son loves his soothies. These are easy enough to manipulate in the unsteady hands of a 4 month old that he can pick them up and put back in his mouth.  We have recommended these to all of our new parent friends. My wife does breastfeed and these have not caused any issue with latching, we were given the ok to use a pacifier by a lactation specialist.

This Gatorade flavor tastes just like the non-energy-drink fruit-punch-that-shall-remain-nameless.

There isn't much I can say about the product; it's Gatorade, and it does exactly what it's supposed to do. I drink it when I'm working outside for long periods of time on hot days, and it keeps me hydrated and helps me tolerate the heat.

One nice thing about this particular product is that the three small containers make the Gatorade stay fresh longer. I've bought large containers before, and the powder began absorbing moisture from the air and solidifying before I could use it all. That hasn't been an issue with these.
These folks come with great reviews and I trust the name.  Have not opened and tried due to keeping them sealed until needed.

I was skeptical of buying scissors to cut my baby's nails. I have been using clippers but they are not easy to use and have had a couple of minor, but upsetting mishaps. These scissors, however, are the best! I wish I had these from day one! Easy to use, safe, and they do a much, much better job then stupid ol clippers!!!! You have to get a pair, you wont be disappointed! This is my new favorite shower gift!!!

I got these for my 2 year old grandson who was reluctant to take a bath.  As soon as he opened them he wanted to take a bath so he could use them!  He is quite the artist.  Anyway, they have worked well, the colors are bright and wash off the tub easily, but stay until you want them gone.

I've been looking for salt & pepper peanuts that are as good as the (now discontinued) in-house brand sold at Target stores, but unfortunately, these fell short, in my opinion. Too much salt for my taste, and the pepper wasn't very "peppery". That said, they're not "bad", per se, and some people may find them more to their liking. As for me, I'm still searching. 2 1/2 stars out of 5.
Not as good as decribed. Kinda pricey. Slow shipping. Regretted for buying it. The price was too high and I thought they would come in with like 10 bags but it was only one

Low quality. Three lights were real dim; green was strongest. It's not an actual laser, but rather a miniature flashlight for your finger, which you cant utilize much since its dim, but I used the white one as a book light until it broke. The actual ring part is a wide rubber band that easily slips out of place. Great seller who offers inexpensive, cool products, but this is a "meh" product.

My 17 month old son likes it, but it takes a bit of effort to get him to eat the whole thing in one sitting.  I usually give this to him over the course of a couple of meals.  I love Sprout meals because they're organic, and have nothing added to them that I wouldn't cook for my son myself.  When I don't have time to cook for my little one, or I feel like cooking something spicy that he wouldn't like, it's great to have some of these toddler meals on hand to fall back on.

Now that our little one is starting to roll, we have started to move away from the swaddling products for her to sleep in.  The wearable blanket is a great transition for this.  It is made of 100% cotton to keep her warm but not overheated while sleeping.  She loves being put in this (when she isnâ€™t completely resisting a nap of course).  She sleeps soundly and comfortably.  We usually have the A/C on most of the Spring, Summer, and early Fall so I wish that it had longer â€œsleevesâ€ to the product to keep her arms warm as they can get cold sometimes as she sleeps, but she tends to like the movability.  It is VERY easy to take on and off and washes up very nicely in the washing machine.  Not to mention the pink flower and butterfly print is super cute.  Great product!
Easy to use and it's rated number one...great for large babies. Easy release and all adjustments are easy to use

my daughter is now one and has been snacking on these since about 9mths.  we stick to the green puffs as the other flavors are of foods that she eats regularly anyhow.  the auto ship is the best price that we have found.

We bought these for a new grandbaby, a first born, and his mommy was very happy.  There is some kind of 'crinkle' noise in the material of the ladybugs for added interest.  Plus, they might even keep the tootsies warm.  Can't go wrong.

I bought this because I liked the idea of the handles and I thought... well... we have two different shaped toilets in our home... it'll at least fit one.  Other reviewers mentioned that it worked on round toilets but it didn't fit any of our toilets.  Our oval toilets are new, and we also have one round toilet from the 80s that it doesn't fit on, either. Bummer.  We ended up buying the Prince Lionhart weePOD, Basix and it is such a better product!  It fits on both of our toilets, is easy to clean, lightweight, secure, and super cushy/comfortable.  My daughter loves to sit on it.  [[ASIN:B005ZBHZDO Prince Lionheart weePOD Basix, Ash Grey]]
They fit excellent and look very comfortable! I also like how they have writing indicating which is the front and back. I just wish it was a lot more clear.

I decided to try out several different brands of bottles to see what worked best with our newborn and this bottle worked the best for us.  I never tried the older type of Avent bottles, but the natural worked great for switching from nursing to a bottle for us.  I really like the simplicity of the bottle with minimal parts and no leakage as of yet.  We will continue to use these when we use a bottle with our newborn.
Lightweight, cute, easy to push, cup holder, and can be taken on airplane. Just what we were looking for at a great price.

Capers look and taste very good. They have a very vivid green color. Much better taste than the ones in vinegar.
These are salt cured. To use the, rinse them for a few seconds with fresh water, and then, place them in some cold or warm water for a few minutes. You might need to change the water 1 time, to help eliminate the salt faster.
Hole process shouldn't take you over 10/15 minutes.
I also use the ones cured in vinegar, but I love these. Size is normal, nor the large or the very little ones.

This is the first Stevia I ever bought. I liked it when I got it...until I tasted other brands. It's OKAY. But I prefer the stuff in the packets (dry.) I especially LOVE the crystals that are made out of a stevia/cane sugar mix--and they're only 5 calories per packet and I only put one packet in my coffee....I guess I need to find that product and review it-ha!

But this is definitely worth a try. It's cheap and lasts a LONG time. I think it tastes much better in tea, than coffee though.
I purchased this changing table pad on Amazon.com and i absolutely love it!  It seems to be very sturdy and is the perfect size.   [[ASIN:B001U9OUYC Summer Infant Contoured Changing Pad]]
These chocolates are to bring back memories of yesteryear with the taste of forever in our days. The packaging is perfect for a gift and elegance is an ideal.

These baby toddler beads come in very handy when your child gets fussy when teething.  Most teethers get lost but not this stylish teething necklace.  It conveniently hangs around you neck so you always know where it's at.  It looks like a real necklace that you can wear with any outfit.  It cleans up easily also.  The teething necklace really is great for those teething babies.  I received this product for a discounted price for my fair and honest review.

These side cargo nets are so useful. Our City Versa already has a big basket but I wanted to keep smaller items handy so I got this side cargo net. It's so useful. I need extra socks, grocery bags and snacks in it. We use the stiller everyday for walks so we keep it stocked with extra things. The cargo net is so useful if you like things organized instead of just at the bottom of the basket.

It will fit any stroller since it attaches with two wide Velcro strapes. What a great product!
A classic healthy snack. Great with cheese and wine, sprinkled in a salad, or chopped on chicken. I keep a bag in my desk and car for mid-day munchies.

I used to buy this at Sam's Wholesale Club until they discontinued it.  While is is pricey now that it is sold through Amazon it is still the best decaffeinated coffee available in my humble opinion.  The flavor is bold and aromatic and I mix it with the Member's Mark regular Columbian Supremo Whole Bean coffee to make a half caff. blend.  I will continue to buy this as long as it is available.  The flavor is the best in decaf coffees.

After spending two hours in the store checking out all the other systems, we decided on this one and can't be happier. It is lightweight, easy to use, sturdy and easy to clean. The car seat installs into the key fit base and stroller with the ease of one hand and the key fit base is just as easy to install. Just enough storage space for gadgets and bags. Highly recommended.

I'm very much concerned about the authenticity of these boxes that came in from abroad via DHL. I didn't notice this until I tried two packs. I felt a little dizzy after taking it. And I found out it is not from Florida, but aboard. So I put it away, and wanted to know if these are the true products.
PB2 is fantastic! I love the concentrated peanut flavor, the low calorie and fat content and the ease of using this in recipes like protein shakes, smoothies, desserts, and Asian-style sauces.
It was a baby shower gift for a friend who is doing her nursery in the Tinker Bell theme.  She loved the color as it is going to match the nursery perfect,.
The product was tasty and easy to prepare.  It is just overpriced.  You can get similar side dishes at fine eating establishments for less than what Amazon is charging.
The escargots were fine but the packaging was horrible. Received the escargots can with several dents because it was not secured in the package.

I found this product featured on [...] and the members there spoke highly of this brand of organic tea.     When my package arrived I could smell the yummy Earl Grey scent waft out of the box as soon as I opened the standard Amazon packaging. I immediatly put on my copper tea kettle to boil water so I could taste this heavently scented tea.     I made my cup of tea with a bit of honey and a splash of organic milk and sat down to drink. I was very happy with the flavor of this tea and will purchase this brand again when I run out. I normally drink Bigelow tea purchased in the grocery store but as of this writting I have not seen an organic Earl Grey tea in my local grocery stores.     Choice Organic Earl Grey Tea + Honey + Organic Milk + Toasted English Mufffin with butter and marmalade = the best breakfast in the world!

After struggling for hours with the Fort Knox worthy security seal on the top of the container, we finally determined that it was NOT NECESSARY to turn the cap to remove it. Another reviewer referred to the cap as red and "twisty" but "twisting" the cap only causes it to REVOLVE around and around, not allowing access to the product inside. Finally my daughter found a video online that demonstrated the opening process, which involves peeling a tab from the base of the cap, which then SNAPS off the container. Some simple directions would have been most HELPFUL to my family. Additionally, there should be a WARNING LABEL to advise consumers that the milk can POUR from the container with excess volume. I can see why customers often purchase paper towels along with this product.

I love this calendar.  I have the baby book too, but I like this better b/c it is easier to keep up.  I would give it five stars, but as some other users mentioned, the milestone stickers (which I love) are as big as the squares, covering up the date and you can't write anything.  I get around it by cut around the edges to make them smaller and stick them on.

I'm a bit disappointed in these truffles. Looks like Amazon sent an old batch. The shell is not dark and shiny like the ones I bought at the Lindt store. The chocolate is kind of white. The chocolate looks expired but it's not. The expiration date on mine are 11/2015. It tastes fine but what I received is not the Lindt quality I expected.

This swing is wonderful and we love it.  My only complaint is that the slowest speed still seems a little fast for my newborn.  I wish it would go a bit slower.  But, overall, this is the ideal swing!  Our baby spends a lot of time in it and I love that you can have it go side to side or front-back.

This is an outstanding coffee.  I like a flavorful cup of joe in the morning (or anytime) and this one is rich without being too dark. I usually drink Peet's Cafe Domingo or Tully's house blend and find this to be in the same neighborhood.  Glad I took a chance on this coffee.  I've ordered it a couple times now and have never been disappointed.  Great quality.  Thanks!

Some bags are perfect and deserve a five star rating and some are so fatty that they leave your mouth coated in fat. So I find sometimes I have to throw an entire bag out. Not cool at the price. I love love love droewors. I have missed this favorite treat from my childhood so I was so happy when I could order it here from Amazon but the hit and miss on quality is a bother.

My bamboo arrived in perfect shape. It's low-maintenance and thrives in an office with no natural light, and seems a lot healthier than the alternatives I've seen in stores around town. The holder has a bit more space for the roots than the picture shows, and the vase is a really pretty chocolate brown. I may pick up a few more in different styles as gifts for friends who have complimented on how nice this one is.

I was looking forward to the great deal I got on these chips, until the box arrived. Three bags were deflated. When I looked more closely, the middle seam along the back was completely unglued, so the entire contents dumped into the box. I opened a puffy bag and over the next few days my wife and I consumed the whole bag. Our consensus? Really stale tasting.

The worst part was that the 12-pack of chips, and these are LARGE bags, expired in 25 days. Are you serious?

I complained to Amazon and got a refund. I will never try this again. I'll pay more and buy locally one bag at a time.

How hot a sauce is quite relative adjective; all depending on users capability to take it..

To me, this sauce is hot hot hot, but, not way too hot to force you jump into cold shower...it leaves a very pleasant and torturous after effect that last no more than 15 minutes...it actually tastes too..

I highly recommend this sauce to hot sauce aficionados..
I love this coconut!  I don't buy sweetened coconut because of all the extra sugar.  This is the best coconut - sweet enough with no sugar added.
Surprisingly sturdy.  Great that my 2 year old cannot work the folding up function, though it is still easy to fold up.  Very pleased with purchase.
These were really brittle. 3 of the 6 I bought had the long plastic piece break off within the first 24 hours.

I picked one of these up at a oriental store to try it and it was delicious but mine may be different. It says Pho Bo Beef. The product description on Amazon is a little lacking so I'm not sure.   There were 5 different packets to go with the rice noodles: Dehydrated herbs/veggies, Regular Seasoning, Beef Packet (actual chunks of beef, packet reminded me of an MRE), Hoisen Sauce, and some kind of chili sauce.   This is a far more substantial meal than what you normally get from an instant noodle. You have to add hot water and microwave it so it takes slightly longer but it's well worth it. I highly recommend and I would like to try other flavors.

This is my new favorite blanket.  I got the giraffe print which is one side giraffe and the other side white with a yellow edge.  I have washed and dried it and it just gets better.  It's huge (it can be wrapped around my 2.5 year old) and lightweight but warm enough when it has to be, breathable and lovely.  I looked at this for a long time (I have the swaddle muslin blankets for my newborn that I love) and will probably get another one for the baby when he's bigger.  I was hesitant because of the price but it is worth every penny.  Wish I had a blanket like this in an adult size!!  Editted to add--just purchased my second dream blanket.  Can't say enough good things about this blanket.  My son is now 10 months and sleeps with it covering him in his crib--it's big enough that I can drape it over his lower half and as he wiggles around he still stays partially covered.  Really worth the price even if it is spendy.

I don't hate the coffee, but I hate the fact that these are MINI-pods (2" diameter), and don't work in m Hamilton Beach pod coffee brewer like the larger 3" pods do.  The photo shows how much smaller they are.  They don't seat properly and won't form a good "seal" in the drip basket, so the water flows around them, instead of through them.  I've tried pressing them in hard; using two at once... but nothing works.  It you don't have a pod-maker with a SMALL opening (no larger than 2" diameter) don't buy these.
Excellent coffee if you like a bold tasting coffee... rich, not bitter.  I like strong coffee and this one does the trick for me!  I would buy it again.

Bought this lightweight booster to use while traveling, and so far we've been pleased with it. It's compact, pretty basic, and you can remove the fabric part for washing.  I wish it had cup holders, BUT for $12 it's a pretty great booster. Plus, my daughter loves the color. We're now using it in our second vehicle as a back-up booster.

These are simply the best hot dogs anywhere! They have an angus beef version also very good. Great seasoning and flavor; grilled, the casing gets nicely crisp and isn't too thick. I don't know why these are so hard to find. D&W makes superior deli meats as well- superior to national brands such as Boar's Head.
These dogs are better tasting than Hebrew National and Costco's own make; better than Nathan's by far, as well.
You will not be disappointed.
Currently use this brand daily, but the price has nearly doubled in the past 2 months, so I will be looking for another brand.
This product was shipped quickly.  The texture was very good and the flavor was more sweet than spicy, which is fine for my tastes.  These items are low calorie and low fat.  Great buy.

These work well for my daughter. I've used all the  different nipples by 5 phases up to this point.  Faster flow for this nipple hole can get a little tricky & messy if she takes the bottle out of her mouth mid feeding. Other than that I have no complaints.
The best coffee we have had.  We have been ordering it for several years.  It doesn't bother my sensitive stomach. We love it!
This stuff is hot! Used in very small quantities it is flavorful and adds a nice chili warmth to whatever you choose to use it for. Its very easy to over apply.
These are fresh and delicious! I strongly recommend them and we'll be ordering more.  Much sweeter then other brands I've tried.

Love these products!! I hated giving my son artificial, high fructose corn syrup-filled drinks after playing sports. Didn't make sense to me. My son and husband like this flavor...they say it tastes like lemon-lime sports drink. I prefer the berry fusion. (But I never liked lemon-lime Gatorade either...I'm a fruit punch girl.) Either way, I highly recommend these Twisted Water drinks for your kids!! I just have to stop drinking them all...

My son is one and this monitor seems to be dying.  It never worked well in the first place as the battery doesnt stay charged very long (like 3 hours).  But now it keeps cutting out and my house is only 1500 sq feet! Wish I had gotten a better monitor.  I thought this had good reviews in Baby Bargains book, but they were wrong!

Love the wide neck as it is easier to clean than the slim version. My daughter seems to get a bit more comfort from the nipples - I think they are a little softer for her. The only reason why I took a star off is because the blue middle pipe doesn't stay in place and I think as a result of that, the bottle leaks.

We saw all the positive reviews and added this to our registry.
The baby likes the carrier and is snugged nicely .

However, this product seems to a major flaw. It provides no mid/lower back support. Both I and my wife have gotten severe backache after using this product.
It nicely straps the baby but might give you severe back pain. We both spend more money on chiropractic treatment.

I will recommend to buy an alternative product... something with lower and mid back support
They taste just fine but I found them cheaper at World Market in person... didn't realize I could get them there. Still good tasting cherries.
As close to the South African stuff as I could find! Very delicious and will definitely be purchasing again!!

Very cute.
My daughter hasn't attached to it yet as she's more into dogs,but its very colorful and her size
Love the little animal shaped door Jammer.  Definately protect my little daughter's fingers (and she loves playing with the doors). Highly recomended.
Dont buy this online as you can buy this at any local store for $1.09 a gallon. Someone's trying to rip people off.
Easy to operate like the dual spouts direct towards you either direction. Low to zero noise and nice mist.  Easy cleaning.

This tea is one of the few decaffeinated K-Cup teas available, so it's a good thing it consistently makes a delicious cup of tea.  I also have used it to make iced tea - good for that, too.    I'm not a tea snob...I just know what I like

These are tasteless and No Ginger. Will not buy again. Do not recommend !
Try grandma's old fashion instead. I don't care for them at all.
Great flavor!  Love this gum! Only problem is I need to use 3 or for pieces to get a nice "chew".
Unfortunately we'll be returning this. It took me about 10 minutes to install onto the table, but my daughter screams her head off in the chair and it tips her forward making her uncomfortable.

My experience with they product is: packaged well.  Beans appear as expected.  Even received bonus pack.  Grade B beans, thus, they are drier than grade A.  Using to make vanilla extract so it will be several months to rate the overall taste of the beans.  Would buy again.

Definitely get this kit if you're considering getting a bonsai. The tree comes in great health, and everything you need to get started. Packaged very well. I had the tree living in my dorm for about 3 months when I first got it. Now that I'm home I let the Juniper live outside. It wilted a little inside, but now it's back to full health. For all beginner Bonsai enthusiasts, start here!

Very cute idea but the mirror is poorly made.  It was delivered with scratches all over it and reflection is very distorted.  Still, the toys are cute and fun for baby but my little girl has quickly lost interest in it.  Not worth what I paid--around 12 I think....

Nice honey with a light, pleasant, distinctive flavor. I have a number of different honeys and I will keep this in my rotation.

Jim
We order these Sugar Free Vines a least once a month, and every single time the product has been fresh and tasty.  Have not been disappointed yet.

Same as what comes with the sippy cup. These are not available to buy at stores without purchasing the cup too.  The cost for two replacement nipples is more than replacing entire cup with new nipple,  but we did not want more cups. We needed only the nipples.

We love this seat! My oldest is 2 and we use it at home without the tray for every meal. We have a 2nd one for the car now for restaurants that don't have safe chairs and for grandparents' houses. It folds up so compact and we have been using the first one for over a year and haven't had a bit of trouble with the retractable straps. My son did not figure out that the tray could be removed by him until we stopped using it. Our first tray did finally break. One of the little tabs broke off, but we really don't need it anymore anyway.
If you are looking for a compact, easy to set up and take down chair for travel...this is it!!! And you may just love it so much you'll replace your highchair at home with it!

I really wanted to love this pillow. First of all, the fabric is scratchy. When you're pregnant and already tossing and turning, to have your face against rough fabric is really...frustrating. Also, the multiple pieces are attached together with velcro. When you (again) are tossing and turning at night, the velcro comes apart, leading to further frustration as you try to hold all the pieces together or reassemble the damn thing IN THE DARK without waking your husband. Does this sound relaxing and capable of producing happy pregnant lady sleep? No.

The parts, when assembled, are awesome. There's a little wedge under your tummy (last pregnancy I had to buy a separate one), and it's big and snuggly and fits right. But I gave up and ordered a snoogle.
Got this for my daughter (9month old), she seems to like it but she finds it hard to chew on the chunky pasta pieces. No complains., I tasted it and it tastes pretty good.
I've been eating this cereal for years so when I happened across this offer I went for it X2. Good deal with FREE SHIPPING. Thanks, Amazon.

Purchased this because I fell in love with the regular (yellow bottle) version of this and was buying it in a convenient store at $3/bottle.  This version tastes almost the same with no noticeable \\"sweetener\\" flavor and saves many calories (due to the lack of sugar, but NOT sugar-free).  You may find cheaper in the store (locally was $5.99/4pack while amazon is $22.71/12pack), but the convenience cannot be beat.  And my last purchase (March 18, 2012) was good until Jan 2013.

I've tried two other coffee substitutes and this one is the most like real coffee of those I've tried.  It has the consistency of fine powder.  The package has several recipe suggestions.  One is a cafe-au-lait drink.  Another is a flavored ice cream made by simply stirring the Dandy Blend powder into some ice cream.  (It was a nice treat.)  A very good coffee substitute with hearty flavor.
I used to bring a tuberware of formula which would get everywhere and now that I use this dispenser, there are no messes and no powder everywhere.  I highly recommend it!!

The entire pack came moldy with a soft white mold. Not sure if where it came from can avoid the US food regulations, but this was bad. Just tossed the bag out. Numi seems to be a pretty popular tea brand, so not sure what happened here. I'll probably try them again in the future, but this was not a good experience.

I recently received a roll of this jerky chew, and will say that THIS is what jerky chew should be like! I have previously tried and reviewed the [[ASIN:B001IZI0RG Jack Links Chew, Original Flavor, 0.32-Ounce Units (Pack of 24)]]. That stuff tasted like ground up cardboard and pepper that blows away when you open the can. Buffalo Bill's chew is has plenty of flavor, but also is actual shredded (not ground) jerky. The only fault is that occasionally you might get a little chunk that's too big for your lip, which makes it kind of painful. But I usually just chew those right up anyhow. This chew is neither too dry nor too moist.    I like to use jerky chew when riding horses or working in dusty conditions, as it helps keep my mouth moist. And though it's not laced with caffine or nicotine, it does help keep you awake because it keeps your mouth and mind busy.     I will say without a doubt that this is the best jerky chew I've tried thus far. Even my kids like it!

These are handy, because they fold into a little circle, and they stick pretty well to the window (unlike some of the "roller" style shades.)

However, my main gripe is that they don't block that much sun! If bright sunlight is present, the baby still cries when it shines through this shade.

We've resorted to simply hanging a blanket from the handle above the door.

These may work for you if your baby isn't that sensitive to sunlight, but I'd probably look at other options...
Excellent quality. Full, quality grains with wonderful, nutty flavor. Good value for the money. Highly recommended. This is the real deal.

I am not a fan of these gummy bears. They have an odd outer coating--something like vegetable oil that prevents them from sticking to each other. The taste borders on chemically but what do you expect from gummy bears? They have been a hit at work so I assume most people like them--just not me.
My 3 year old hated pillows till we go this... now she won't sleep without it!
I read some reviews of this product that said it had too much sault.  I try to limit my consumption of sault, but I did not find this to be too saulty.

I didn't buy this product from Amazon, but Dr. Pepper 10 is ah-may-zing!  It tastes just like regular Dr. Pepper for only 10 calories per 12 oz serving!  I use it to make floats with vanilla ice cream or drink it by itself for a minimal-guilt treat.  You should just look for it in a local grocery store because this online price is ridiculously high.  I bought a 2L bottle from my local grocer for $1.69.

This collection is fantastic! You have almost every kind of brush you would ever need. They are great quality, and best of all Vegan! They are synthetic and unbelievably soft. They are full with tons of bristles, not cheap or flimsy feeling. Plus they come with an awesome case that snaps together to keep everything safe if you are traveling or the two piece case can act as holders for you brushes on a vanity. Love love love these. At just over $100 they are well worth the value, and they definitely stand up to MAC brushes in quality. $109 for the whole set with holder vs at twenty something up to forty something dollars each with MAC or Sephora brushes. Get them!! :)

This highchair is awesome!! We simply love it. It is easy to clean and to install. The different height adjustments are great and it is beautiful too. My mom says it is our little king's throne.
The only reason I gave a 4 star rating is because I think it is missing a bag of some sort so we can put bibs, cloths, cleaning wipes, etc.. I also think that the 2nd tray should cover the sides of the big tray as well because my baby holds on the sides with dirty hands EVERYTIME.
Other than that, it is great.
HIGHLY RECOMMNENDED.
What a disappointment. There are two plastic pages, very cheaply made. Certainly NOT worth 8.99. This is the first product I've bought on Amazon that I have not been happy with.
We love this coffee.  It has a smooth taste with a bit of chocolatey after taste.  Forget those other band names, the best on the market, unless you can roast your own!!

This salt smells like \\"real pop corn\\" should smell, but it is so salty that by the time you get enough on the pop corn to give it that wonderful, comforting smell, it is too salty. I would like a product with more smell and flavor and less salt.

I bought it for three dollars less about a month ago, my toddler liked them, but I personally loved them. cae back to order again and they're even more expensive now? so no, i'll pass and make our own at home

We love this!
I wanted glass, but with a 13 month old, that didn't sound like a good idea, so this was my compromise. So far its perfect! The sippy spount from my Green Sprout water bottle fits on this, too.

This is an adorable bear and is also functional for learning fasteners.  Our 2 year old loved the fact that he has overalls and also a sleep shirt in a backpack.  The fasteners are large enough to be usable for little hands and the bear is cute enough that she likes it as a doll, not just when she wants to practice changing clothes.  It is very durable, and all of the fasteners look like they will hold up for awhile.  The only items that seem a little flimsy are the sneakers.  They are difficult to get on the bear's fat feet, and our daughter pulls them a lot.  They look like the seams might start to tear.  But overall a great product.

I have not yet rec'd the toddler sling, so I am not able to comment on its quality. However, I ordered the sling on Feb. 25th and just realized that it isn't due to be delivered until April 8th. And it's currently in transit. So be forewarned; if you need a baby sling/carrier asap, do not order this one.

This is a very good seat, especially for the price. My daughter has plenty of room to grow into it. She also enjoys all the little compartments she can put her sunglasses, toys, drinks, etc. I think the drawbacks are that it has a \\"pull cord\\" tightener (her last seat had a knob), it the arm rest doesn't go up so it is hard to get her in and out of the seat.

After making 3 batches with care regarding kitchen cleanliness and hygiene: I'm still seeing small dark hairs floating in the milk. I wanted to make certain I was really seeing this before writing a review. From what I can tell; no one else has had this problem, which makes it rather mysterious. Before we discovered the hairs, we actually enjoyed several servings...... My husband is a soldier and I'm a former farm girl so, we're not easily grossed out. We all ingest stuff every day that we're unaware of that would otherwise gross us out. So, I alerted Amazon & they issued a refund immediately- great customer service. I wouldn't necessarily tell someone else not to buy it but, still wonder about conditions at the Nestle factory in Mexico.

I purchased this because I need cheap and easy creamer for my coffee. Rest assured coffee mate is a cheap enough and tasty enough brand of vanilla-ish creamer that will suit your coffee needs unless you are an elitist. If you've used the stuff in the stores or at the office like this then you'll find it to be exactly identical.

The stuff came with a reasonable use-by date, and the packaging was simple enough. What drives me nuts is that EVERY SINGLE BOX has broken creamers. I wish there was a better way to put it.

I've purchased products that were liquid / fragile from Amazon Prime before and this is the first I've encountered with this dissatisfaction. This is probably because of the cheap plastic used by Nestle (who owns Coffee Mate) that lets it, while in individual containers, break easily and leak everywhere.

This will bother you in three ways. For one, the smell will drive you nuts (no matter how much you like vanilla.) Two, the stickyness is a disaster given how cramped all the creamers are in the box. Finally, you're hard earned money is wasted by poor packaging and delivery.

Next time I'll just buy the creamer by the bottle!

These are fantastic.  I thought I might need the bigger size but our child is 10 1/2 months old and this size still works great.  We used it for pureed baby food at first but now we use it for cut up steamed foods.  I also use it in the freezer and it freezes and defrosts very well.
This is a very good quality product, the flavor and texture are awesome, would buy mora before this one is gone.
Bought for my daughter's bedroom that has been decorated in Zebra. It's a hit and the service was quick.  Thanks!
There are no words!! COCONUT OIL RULES, AND I LOVE THE SIZE OF THIS ONE! USE FOR EVERYTHING!! BEWARE YOU WILL GET ADDICTED TO IT!!! THANK YOU!!!
Great Thermos. We have use ours for about four years and it still stands the test of time. I bought two.

When my sister had her children she had the original baby bjorn. I had never heard of it nor seen such a contraption. It was so handy and made her life easier. When it was my turn to have a baby I registered for the baby bjorn active. I've only used it once so far because my baby is only 4 weeks old. It took a little while to figure out the strap adjustments because the directions weren't very clear. It may look intimidating when you take it out of the box, but it isn't at all. It's great to wear around the house while doing some chores like laundry or vacuuming. My baby loves to be carried and cuddled all the time and this allows me to do just that and get some things done around the house too. A must have for this first time mommy.
For diabetics or others needing a replacement for sugar and who use Splenda often, this makes more sense budget wise to buy in bulk!
Very cute. Arrived sooner than expected. We are having my son's birthday party at LEGOLAND in Chicago and these are going to be perfect for his cake.

I am really enjoying my order of Golden Grahams. They arrived in perfect condition and fresh and crispy. Even in milk
the golden graham floats and will stay crisp for a little while. I like parking a box in my office drawer for quick and
easy "dry food" snacking.
One of the best I have tried. I love the pecan one as well. Worth, it for sure. Took 3rd in, an amateur comp using both these rubs and the taste was fantastic.

Having been spoiled drinking Gevalia Popayan beans I bought this hoping for a somewhat similar experience but unfortunately this was not the case.  It's not bad but most other Popayan beans I have purchased have been better.

Finally long after penrose just seemed to vanish of the face of the earth came this product that no others can even compare. These are what real pickled sausages supposed to taste like. I would recommend these to anyone.
kids can handle it quite easily and it holds more weight than I expected. will support any of the adults in our house. stays in place nicely.
Every piece had a scratch or mark on it. Did not look acceptable for a new piece of furniture.

Just got back from a Christmas party that had these out. They are absolutely the best gummis I have ever tasted and when the host told me she purchased them here, I couldn't believe it. They are juicy and have good flavor. Not too much of a sugar taste. If you enjoy gummi candy, try them.

some of my friends are what i call crazy baby stalkers and got video baby monitors while i decided to splurge elsewhere and just get a sound monitor.  i love it. it works perfectly.  volume controls are great, even plays sounds and has a little nighlight that is very handy when traveling. you can adjust the sensitivity as well as the volume with ease. all in all i'm very happy with it.

Why would a manufacturer affix and advisory label with glue that is EXTREMELY difficult to remove.  If you look at the picture you can see it.  Think it will rip off easily.  No way.  This is not meant to be left for all time so make it easily removable.  I have a problem with manufacturers who affix such items so that they cannot be removed without marring the finish.  Hopefully, this one will eventually come off.  Otherwise very happy with the product.
Fresh ground and freshly brewed Southern Pecan coffee every morning.  We have always loved Southern Pecan coffee and this brand really does it right. Awesome!  And a great price!

I'm trying to cut down on added sugars and a lot of dried fruit has added sugars. (I like to add dried fruit to my oatmeal.) So, I decided to try freeze-dried fruit instead. Freeze-dried fruit is just fruit, with nothing else added. I loved the strawberries from this brand, so I just had to check out the mango.

I put a couple of tablespoons of these (they're diced into chunks maybe 1/4 inch on a side) in my oatmeal, then add hot water from the dispenser at work. (I also add chia seeds and walnuts and cinnamon.) The mango chunks rehydrate pretty quickly and end up with a texture that is quite similar to that of frozen mango that has been thawed. (I love that texture!)

These definitely have a good mango taste, though you won't mistake them for fresh fruit. They're light and a little crunchy (but not too hard) if you just eat them on their own. At any rate, if you are looking for an alternative to traditionally-dried fruit, these are a good bet. (Also, the current unit price on Amazon is competitive with Whole Foods prices for the same product.) I think I like the "Just ..." strawberries better, but I like these as well.

DO NOT BUY THIS limited edition Green Mountain Golden French Toast, do not even take it if it is given to you for free! When it started brewing it was horrible, it literally smelled like burned toast! I thought \\"There is no way this coffee can taste as bad as it smells!\\" I WAS SO WRONG! I took a drink and gagged! My fiancee loves strong coffee and he spit it out! No amount of sweetener or creamer can fix this! I would like to say that I am a huge fan of most Green Mt Coffees, but this one is the worst I have ever tasted!
My baby is about 7months old, and he doesn't really use this thing because it is too big for his mouth....and he is not a small baby by any means (20lbs).   I would've preferred something smaller

We use these with my 3 month old to slow her down eating so she doesn't spit up as much.  They seem to work great for that - definitely slower than a level 1 nipple.  I prefer these to the ones I got at Babies R Us because they are clearly labeled "Preemie" right on the nipple - helps to make sure I'm grabbing the right one. These seem to sit in the rim that screws on the bottle more firmly and do not leak. The 6 pack is perfect for daycare.

The 20 month old loves using this to turn the faucet on, though he hasn't figured out yet how to turn it off.  As he gets older it will become even more useful.  We use it with the Aqueduck faucet extender, which is also great.

This is the third car seat that we've gotten for my son and I wish we'd had this one from the start. It's much softer and cushioned that his two previous seats ([[ASIN:B005DQ569Q Graco SnugRide Classic Connect 30 LX Infant Car Seat, Metropolis]] and [[ASIN:B004OEPLJ8 Safety 1st All-in-One Convertible Car Seat, Scribbles]]) and seems much safer. I don't like how other reviewers are saying that you \\"get what you pay for\\" and complaining that this seat doesn't fit their car. This seat is expensive for a lot of people, not everyone can afford to buy a $300 or more car seat. And if the seat doesn't fit in your car, that doesn't make it a bad seat, so that shouldn't affect the review. We have a 4-door Pontiac G6, and this seat does fit rear-facing in the center of the back seat, and it also fits behind the passenger seat. Yes, the passenger seat had to be pushed forward, but in my opinion it wasn't so far forward that it was unusable. We're having baby #2 in a few months and we plan on getting another Safety 1st Complete Air Protect seat. My son will have to be scooted over from the middle to the side, and so will the new baby, so the \\"wings\\" next to their heads and the over-all safety rating of the seat make me feel much better about them being right next to the car door. This seat is lightweight, safe, soft, and allows baby/toddler to remain rear-facing longer than a lot of other seats. I have no complaints and I'm pretty picky! I'm so relieved to feel like we've finally found a great car seat.

My only suggestion, not really a complaint, but something you may want to purchase with the seat, is strap covers (We had [[ASIN:B004L2JJ6Y Brica Cushies Button Up Strap Covers, Gray/Blue/Green]] that we purchased with his first seat) because this seat doesn't come with any. And an insert, like [[ASIN:B0045VA3SO Kiddopotamus Snuzzler Complete Head and Body Support, Ivory Terry]], if you're going to have a newborn in the seat, or else you'll have to roll up receiving blankets around the baby.

Been using these necklaces for almost a year now and needed a new one. This was a great buy!!! My son loves it and it really seems to buckle down on any of the pain, especially with his molars coming in.
Protects our seat from car seats we love this product. Bought a second for our second car.

Based on other reviews, I bought the Beefaroni, Ravioli & Chicken-Rice microwavable bowls made by Chef Boyardee. They've been a huge hit with the guys. They're Easy & taste Great.

I like the Sixlets, not only do they taste great, but they are wonderful as gingerbread decorations.  I love buying the candy without the wrapper; there is nothing more time consuming than sitting around unwrapping this candy.  But Candy Direct is NOT the company to buy Sixlets.  I bought 5 lbs of the candy for $21.00, and paid $18.00, for shipping--regular 7 days later delivery!!!  Unacceptable!!!!  Never again Candy Direct.  It doesn't cost $18.00, to deliver this candy via the United States Postal Service.  For heaven's sake--$18.00!!!  $3.00 more and I could have had another 5 lbs of Sixlets!!!

I have been searching for the fruit slices that I missed as a kid(in the 70's), when "Fanny Farmer" candies were king and my mother would bring home those delicious "fruit slices". I've been sadly disappointed trying other imitations through the years until now.
Wockenfuss delivered the flavours I've missed since childhood. I bought the two pound box and went through an entire "row" of these delicious slices. I found my fruit slices again. I shared them with my family too, of course. =) I'll buy again.

Had a hard time getting this particular salad dressing for awhile but it's back and I am a happy camper.  It has a nice delicate flavor that compliments lots of different combinations.  It goes together so easy and quick and always fresh tasting.  Love Good Seasons Salad Dressing mixes!

This is an excellent stroller.  I did so much research on umbrealla strollers before this purchase.  Even though I was weary of the back bending, I went ahead knowing I could replace it.  The back does not bend.  It is very sturdy.  I desperately wanted something smaller for quick trips.  I love my quattro tour stroller, however found it exhausting on errand days! The complaints about this stroller are ridiculous.  As I stated, the back has never bent for me.  It is super easy to recline the seat (which is a wonderful option) and the whole stroller is a snap to fold up and set up.  I do it with my daughter in my arms!  The complaint about storage - again it's great to have the option! Most umbrella strollers do not have this option.  The stroller itself is a breeze to push and just a total time saver. I am 5'10 and my husband is 5'11.  We have no problems pushing this stroller. I highly recommend it.  Please if you are looking for lots of padding, storage, and cup holders - umbrella strollers are not more you!  I see what others are saying about the price, but the money is so worth not having to push one of those dinky $20 strollers.
I bought these beans for my sister (who is an avid vanilla bean user) and she said these were the best beans that she has ever had! We will be buying these again.

We received one of these from a friend at our baby shower and didn't get to use it right away, but now I'm happy to report it works great!

Pro's
Cleaning: I treat this like a regular cup and lid, top shelf of the dishwasher. Glad to be done with the bottles, clutch, et cetera.There's also only the lid and cup.
Childproof opening: Our son has figured out a startling number of ways to get into things he shouldn't but hasn't figured out the squeeze/twist which feels almost akin to pharmacy bottles but just slightly easier.
No leaks: So that childproof seal has an added benefit of not leaking water all around the edges of the lid.
Hydrating: The spout actually allows an easy flow so baby can get sufficient water without struggling.
Durable: Not sure what it's made of but it is thick and has taken quite a few falls from the high chair.
Visual: My son recognizes it as HIS cup and seems to like the picture.
BPA free. I know all the pediatrician pamphlets we get say to avoid BPA so I'm glad that is advertised though to be perfectly honest, I'm not sure what BPA is/does.

Con's
Not really and I can think of, but it does say 8 months +. Every baby is different and my son needed cups with handles (not included) at 8 months and has only been able to use at about 10 months old.
The \\"spout\\" piece was difficult to get in the first time but if you watch the instruction video it said to add a little water and when I did, it slipped right in easy.

Conclusion:
Great cup to have, at the appropriate age.

It's a decent cup. No spills, but the plastic is hard to suck from. That's right, I said plastic. IT STILL HAS PLASTIC!!! The cup itself is steel, but the part your child puts their mouth on is plastic, not silicone, don't be fooled. It's a bummer because I liked it except for the plastic. One for the donation bin...
My 18 month old is only 50th percentile for height but he is already way too tall for this potty and he hates trying to squat down to sit on it.  Won't even be able to use it.

HOWEVER - when she was 7 1/2 months old, she managed to FLIP IT OVER (while strapped in) and land face down on the floor!!! Thank goodness she was fine - but the seat promptly went out the door! Great handling  2. Extremely light weight.  3. well balanced.  4. The best sun shade I have used to date.  5. nice shock absoption for using lighter, plastic type wheels.  6. The cooler accessory works well too once you figure out how to get it on correctly (it took me 5 minutes).  9. Deadman's Reach from Raven's Brew is world-class for those preferring a strong but very smooth coffee.  As with most Raven's Brew coffees, the packaging graphics add to the romance of the brand.  The only reason we rated it four-stars and not five-stars was because it is pricey for a mere 12 oz bag.  If only Raven's would plop two more ounces of beans in the bag and hold the price-point we'd be buying a lot more often!  That said, you simply cannot argue with the quality of their coffees.

Mother's Rolled Oats are thicker cut, premium oats for those who REALLY LOVE OATS! Finest quality, cook up loose and flakey, or creamy and smooth, if you prefer. You just can't find better rolled oats! Makes awesome cookies, too, and grind up in your food processor (or blender) for meatloaf or baking!
The quality was like I used to get when I bought a similar product at a "high end" department store!  The price was right and the product was far more than I expected.

I absolutely LOVE this tea. In fact I ordered two cases after my mother tried it and told me she must have some because she can't begin to think about going through a cold hard winter without it! It arrived safely and before I expected to arrive. I often will hand a bag to coworkers who are having a tough day or to show my appreciation and everyone raves about how delicious it is. You must steep this for at least 5 minutes.

My favorite nearby Asian food mart is closing with plans to reopen months from now in a new location. I need this stuff badly as a staple that must always be in stock, but I don't need it badly enough to pay nearly twice what it costs in a retail store, plus nearly double that again to have it sent to me. I love Amazon so I hate it when Amazon is the worst possible place to buy a product, but there it is.

I will look around for other sources because this stuff is AWESOME. It has more fire than the relatively wimpy chili oils in the ethnic sections of mainstream US grocery stores, but you can control the burn factor by choosing how much to use in your recipe or as a condiment. The flavor is subtle and isn't overbearing even if you load it on to increase the heat. Very versatile and very good.

I love Harney & Sons, Earl Grey tea, and Marcus Samuelsson, so I was so excited to try Ambessa: The Earl of Harlem! I read other reviews and prepared myself for a rich and smoky experience. The product arrived and right away I was pleased with the colorful tin, which looks so nice on my shelf and stands out next to my other tea tins. When I opened the tin, however, I got very worried. I did not like the smell. It was TOO smoky, and I thought I could detect notes of tobacco amid the more familiar floral/fruity Earl Grey. I brewed the kettle and prepared myself for disappointment.

Well, I couldn't have been more wrong! The smell that was so strong when I opened the tin diffused in my mug and became the light, smoky, barely-fruity aroma that other reviewers here have described. I like my Earl Grey with some sweetness, so I added a few drops of Trader Joe's Liquid Stevia and a splash of cream to my cup before tasting.

All I can say is...WOW! The flavor of this tea is just incredible, and not what you would expect from the smell of the dry tea. It's like The Right Honorable Earl Grey went to a speakeasy jazz club (and made a few friends).

For fans of traditional Earl Grey the flavor is familiar enough to satisfy your expectations, but the deep smokiness transforms that familiar flavor into something exotic. Other reviewers have described it as a smoky earl grey, and that's not wrong but it doesn't go far enough. There's a lot more than just the flavor of smoke -- this tea has a very complex flavor: smoky, floral, fruity, oaky, and even a bit "spicy" (not as in hotness, but as in there are spices in this tea I can't quite describe because I don't think I've tasted them before). Earl of Harlem definitely kicks it up a notch! You can definitely recognize it as an Earl Grey but at the same time it's its own thing and strongly distinct from any other Earl Grey out there. So if you're a bit adventurous but still appreciate tradition, this tea is for you.radition, this tea is for you.

I was expecting a more robust vanilla flavor but even 3 drops don't add much flavor to my coffee. It will take some trial and error to determine how much to add. At this point, I doubt I will buy the product again. Oh, and it has to be refrigerated after opening so it probably doesn't have a long shelf life once opened.
