This is a nice pacifier clip, however it only works well until the baby learns how to use her hands.

The pacifier tip is very easy to pull out for the baby. It requires force, but no complex movements. Once she learned how to pull hard, this clip is no longer working for us.

Fortunately we have another clip. It is not as fancy as this one, but the mechanism has a small plastic lock, and the baby cannot pull that out. At least until she learns complex movements, by then she won't need a pacifier.

I cannot recommend this clip if your baby likes to pull stuff.

I looove this stroller. This is the second double/tandem stroller I've owned among the numerous ones I have tested. I have a 9 month old and a 2 1/2 year old and they love it as well, with all the different seating options.(my youngest likes to face me, and my oldest facing the other way so he can see.) It is a heavier and larger stroller, but I don't have a problem with it. I actually like it, because it makes our strolls more of a workout:) This stroller fits through standard door ways, and if in a store I keep the seats so they are facing each other to make the stroller a bit smaller. One last thing, this is a very durable stroller! I live in a city with a lot of old railroad tracks (raised up with the wood and metal) crossing over our streets and sidewalks. None of my older strollers made it over them but this one went over them very easily for a stroller. It also does very well on our unpaved trails. This is a wonderful stroller at a great price; paid 200 for mine at the baby depot.

I received the product an several part were demaged, some had cracks other were just presenting dents. Looking at the package you can see that it's not robust enough to support all the bouncing and shaking of transportation. i would strongly recommend that the package is reinforced and changed, since I believe that's a recurring problem from previous reviews.

Compared to desitin, this is way more pleasant to have on your hands.

I like that it is natural, I can apply it liberally like it's pampering baby, instead of medicating. I apply it every time to prevent rashes.

Con: It's pretty solid so you have to press hard with your finger to get some, or rub the pad of your finger in a circular motion several times to get enough product on your finger. If you have any nail at all, you'll scoop some right into your nail, needing you to dig it out, which is kind of icky feeling.

Five years ago, I purchased an Evenflo highchair similar to this and I loved it. My son spent a lot of time in there, because as our house was wheelchair accessible, it was a breeze to roll him from room to room or even up and down the wheelchair ramp outside. The adjustable height was a huge selling point, as we didnt always eat at the dining room table so we could raise/lower depending on where we were at the time. Also, REALLY easy to fold up and stick in the car. With a stroller in my trunk, the highchair would fit in the front seat of my Subaru Legacy and those have a smaller interior than most sedans.    Fast forward five years to my recent purchase of the Evenflo Right Height. I searched Amazon because my local stores didn't carry Evenflo highchairs and I loved my first one so much (lasted about 1.5 yr with us and is still in use with my younger cousin) I wasn't going to waste my time with another brand. When the box arrived and I saw all of the pieces I was a litte overwhelmed- but the instructions are clear and it only took me 10 minutes from opening the box until my girl was sitting in it.    I love the pink/greyscale print of the cushion and the one handed tray attach/removal- perfect for the bottle mixing parent on the fly :) The cushion is easily removable, washable and more cushiony than others I've seen. Definitely not the hard rubber/plastic pad that was on my highchair when I was little! My daughter loves sitting up like a big girl, but if she happens to fall asleep while eating the 3 position reclining seatback (also one hand operational) will make sure she doesn't hurt her little neck. I also like the removable tray 'liner' which makes clean up a little faster/easier.     For how much use I expect to get out of it, the price was right too. I'm always happy to pay more for quality, but in this case it was superb quality with a reasonable price. Would definitely buy again for our next child in five years :)
Add some "zest" to your biscuits or toast!  Crosse & Blackwell will never let you down.  If you have yet to discover the taste of Currants....do not wait any longer!
This is my favorite out of all the flavors Underwood has. I don't know why the chicken is so salty though.

The Shop and Play Shoping Cart Cover is wonderful.  I love the convenience it provides and the roll-up/store feature is great - it is always in the car without taking up space and being cluttered.  My granddaughter loves it!!!

So far, the best solution we've found for keeping the water out of our two sons' eyes. It works best when it is worn upside down as the picture shows, with the visor facing "upward" (if it's worn down, like a poker player, the water still cascades down in front of their faces, making them freak out). Also, our older son's head is narrow, so we have to tilt it up a little, in order to create a better seal around his head. And when it comes to our infant son....he HATES hats, so for now, this doesn't work for him, but in time, when he realizes the benefits of keeping this hat on in order to keep the water out of his eyes, I'm sure he'll want to keep it on too. Overall, 4/5 stars because it works most of the time, and we have about 80% tear free nights of washing hair. :)
I am still trying different condiments; sugar,honey, ect to be able to stomach the taste.

this thing is useless. the plastic is to tough to be snug on the faucet and the "tightening" feature doesnt hold! you tug on the fins to make it tighter, however the notches just slip back into the body. its cute and thats it! do not waste your money
This is our FAVORITE! We buy it by the case. Perfect by the directions, and a great base mix when we want to change things up with fruit or cinnamon.

I purchased this baby memory book for my friend who is expecting, but wants to be surprised by the gender of the baby. I was having a hard time finding a gender neutral book until I came across this one!! The cover and inside pages are perfect for a boy or a girl, and the yellow watercolor on the cover is just perfect with three little rhinestones at the top. The baby book is absolutely beautiful! There is so much detail put into it that the pictures do not even do it justice! It's the perfect baby gift and I would definitely purchase it again!
I bought these for some cups that I purchased at Target and they are to small... These must be for the old style cups
i bought these as a joke for my friend and not only is it actucally a good sucker but it looks so funny when baby is wearing it!
My niece has one of these and they are awesome so I am giving one as a gift.  I know she will love it for her firstborn

We've tried MANY wheat, whole grain, granola variety of pancakes, and we think these are the absolute best.  The kids love them too!  Thanks Amazon for carrying them, we haven't been able to find them locally here at the grocery stores.

these are by far the best treats a mommy can keep in purse or diaper bag the kids can eat them to their hearts content and they will only get a chalky mess on them that is super easy to wipe off I love that they don't make the kiddos sticky
After warming it up it tasted great and goes down nice and smooth. Be careful with great Cock comes great responsibility Cock should be enjoyed in Moderation.
This is my favorite in the Quaker Real Medley line. The banana taste is great and it fills me up! Most stores sell these as a single cup so you can try one before you invest in a box.. :)

Bag was exactly as described and arrived quickly. It's big enough without being too big. It's super easy to find things in it because of the light grey lining, and the bag itself is very flexible. I previously owned a Petunia PB bag and found the material to be very stiff. (More difficult to stick a toy into a pocket for example!) The outer magnetic button seems to have a hard time staying closed, but it's not a huge deal to me.
Good quality for the price. This tastes complex and not too sweet---suitable for salad dressing.

The product was NOT like the product image. It wasn't vacuum sealed, and was a different brand. Buyer beware.

My seller was "Kiwi Bazaar", the cashews were "Spicy World", and they were rotten. Unroasted cashews spoil easily and quickly, they should not smell fishy or like smoked meat.
this is my favorite cereal EVER! i cannot even understand why local groceries no longer carry it. So worth it buying from online. next time I'm getting a larger quantity.
Love this! We had the same one for my daughter in pink and I liked it so much I sought it out in blue when our son was born.
My two year old loves this pillow!!! He even uses it in the car for his nap.

I bought the entire Kidsline bedroom set, mobile, lamp, valences,etc...everything. I ran into a problem with my mobile and I wrote them a email (not really expecting a response as customer service with big companies are not always great.) But I received and immediate reply and resolve... SO simple and pleasant! More companies should treat their customers this way. I'm now a big fan of this company and will continue to buy their products for my baby's room. Feel good purchasing from this company...they stand by their products and have excellent customer service.

This arrived well packaged and in good shape; all the plants were healthy and the pot was an unglazed square brown affair, sturdy and handsome for its type. Two things to remember, though:

1) The colors won't be nearly as dramatic as in the product picture. I got a nice variety of shapes, but they were all your basic green succulents. No red, no yellow, none of that. Don't expect it.

2) The pot has a drainage hole in the bottom, but does *not* come with a tray. You'll have to find some kind of reasonable match on your own, which I consider a significant failing. That's what took the star off.
Best unsweetened coconut on the market. Use it in my fruit and yogurt breakfast parfait. I cook with it.  It's fantastic!
I was raised on grits in central Virginia and these are perfect.  In fact, they remind me a lot of what my grandma made years back with a mix of white and yellow corn.  Very good!
I bought them several months ago and I still have them, they're so fresh and green, I am very satisfied with this purchase.

I use one heaping tbsp of this, plus one heaping tbsp of crushed flax seed, plus one heaping tbsp hemp protein and then 2 heaping tbsp of Metamucil in a glass of water.  It makes me solid and regular.

We bought this glider/rocker to put in our 2nd baby's room.  When looking to purchase, I was attracted to it's dark wood finish, the fact that it is hard wood, that the ottoman in included with the purchase and that the chair has settings to allow it to recline and not rock.    First of all, the chair is really attractive.  I got it in Espresso which matched perfectly with my Black/Cherry Simmons baby furniture.  Upon trying it out, I was a bit disappointed.  It is definitely a smaller rocker.  I am 5'2\\" and weigh about 127 when not pregnant.  My husband is 5'7\\" and about 160 pounds.  This rocker fits us very snugly, but if we were larger people, we would not be comfortable in it.  Also, even though it's supposed to have extra plush padding, the padding is very firm, although it is thicker than some other rockers.  Additionally, it is lacking in lumbar support so it doesn't have the best shape to the back pad.  I've found that adding a neck roll to the lumbar area or putting a pillow behind the pad on the rocker helps this a bit, but still isn't the most comfortable.    Baby is still not here yet, so I've yet to try it's effectiveness as a nursing chair.  I think it'll work fine, but I don't think I'll be falling asleep in it like I did with my daughter's rocker/glider chair (for which I paid less in a local furniture outlet store).

Great taste!  Yes, it's green - green is good. I buy the large bottle of this and for 4 days straight, I'll drink a portion of this while I'm lifting weights.  I like this add in along with the bottles of water I drink right along side it.  It fills me up so that I don't crave soda, cookies, candy, etc.  It does hit the sweet spot due to the varieties of sugar in it.  Since I'm eating healthy and working out - I don't see a negative with allowing this in my diet.  Would love if they offered coupons

I got my coffee at Big Lots marked down to $5.50, apparently not a big seller in the south. First off the coffee is not white. That is the name of the brand. However with a name like "white" and being a breakfast blend light roast I didn't expect a robust coffee and I didn't get one. The taste was almost nonexistent which means whatever flavored creamer (white chocolate this time) I used, I could taste fully without the coffee interfering with the creamer flavor...for what that is worth.

The biggest problem is the packaging. The coffee comes in mesh K-cups with lids that hang sloppily over the cup as if they are to be pulled off. They are not. Also the inner package is not resealable so your coffee is exposed to air. I have a Star Wars popcorn tin I use to seal the coffee box. Did they not test market the product?

New England brand coffee also uses the mesh K-cup, but has a resealable pouch inside the box. So it is not that hard to do.
Koffee Kult is my new favorite brand of whole bean coffee.  The medium roast has a great flavor with low acidity.

This car seat is great. It is huge and it was a pain to install, but it seems secure, safe and comfortable now that it has been installed.

My only complaint is that the seat only goes up to 53\\" but it is recommended (and will soon be required in my state) to have children in a booster seat until they are 4ft 9 inches (57\\") or 8 years old. I had hoped this would be the last car seat I would have to buy, but it seems as though it isn't the case. None of the other toddler seats with a 5pt harness went any higher so I certainly wouldn't recommend another seat instead of this seat, I just wish Britax had designed this seat a little differently.

Its good, but I prefer the regular over the natural.  It says that it doesn't separate, but it does separate some - however, not as bad as other natural peanut butters  I only bought the natural PP because at the time, no one was selling a case of the regular creamy.  Still tastes good though, and I'm not sorry I bought it.

All Seitenbacher Products are unique but as breakfast goes, their Mueslis are the best, regardless which number you prefer.
It is the best way to have a healthy breakfast.

I usually purchase the freeze dried pineapple chunks.  I love them as a snack but could not find any at a good price on Amazon.  I decided to try these, but they are tiny pieces.  The chunks are better, and the flavor of the pineapple is much stronger.  You barely get the good flavor when you eat several of these tiny pieces at one time.

These are sturdy and well made. The shape is great for squeezing in tight freezer spots. I am also purchasing the two ounce since baby is a new eater and is only eating a couple teaspoons of food per feeding.
Totally disappointed very flimsy and arrived cracked.. Wouldn't advise anyone to order, don't waste your time or effort to order.. Upset, in Cali..
This tea works very well I had to take pain pills for a while on several occasions and this tea solved the problems that pain pills cause.
This tea is excellent as a digestive aid. I combine it with ginger tea at times.

These are puffed, not fried, and use real cheese with no "funny chemicals".  My only problem with them is that when I get a large bag, I can't stop eating them :-D  Getting this this way, in individual packs, really helps.  Utterly delicious!

We discovered this at a local Fresh Market over 10 years ago - after trying other non-refrig. canned crab meat (all major disappointments), this is the one to use for perfect crab cakes. Fresh tasting, large full pieces of real crab, superb flavor.
Some really good tasting stuff. Not so good that the price has more than doubled since the last time I ordered the stuff.

Please note that I received this product at a discount in order to provide an honest review. The product arrived on time and in good condition. I like the very compact size and the carrying case. I like to take my children's temperatures 2-3 times in rapid succession to ensure an accurate read. And of course having 3 little oned, taking one's temperature means all will want to get checked. My biggest issue with this product is that it is slow to reset. Kind of tricky. And with 3 under 5 vying to get checked NOW, one or more, likely I'll that is a bit frustrating. However using it multiple times on myself and each child it seems very accurate and consistent if used according to directions. And that is the most important thing.

This is labeled: \\"Great River Organic Milling 100% Organic Bread Flour Unbleached Wheat\\"  This I evidently mistook to be ordinary bread flour made from wheat. What I got was 20 pounds of Whole Wheat Flour which I have no need for and can not return.   The label should have read: Unbleached Whole Wheat Bread Flour.

Yummy...just watch your tummy.  They are as delicious as sugared gummy candies but they will wreak havoc on your GI tract (i.e. cramps and gas) if you eat more than a few.  The 5-lb is much more cost effective than the 1-lb.  I've frozen them and they thawed fine.

These chips are delicious as a simple snack. We eat a low carb menu, no sugar or starch and have been using nuts as our basic household snack. It was great to find an alternative which is wholesome and fits our lifestyle. My husband really loves them and I do too.
My son adjusted to it easily. It is very inexpensive and has side cups for snacks. I will be using this for a few years

Came a day early. Very firm mattress for my dear little boy. Great quality. I have had other Moms over and they were shocked when I told them the price of this awesome mattress. Exactly what I was looking for. Very firm!! Easy to clean as well. In a month my son has a beautiful nursery to come home too. I bought everything off of Amazon!!! So many compliments. I couldn't be happier. I know my precious son will be comfy. This mattress even at bargain stores would have cost us alot more. There are no uncomfortable springs. Another satisfied customer
This is a very delicious espresso for your espresso machine.  It is also sure to wake you up.  It's great!
This really works.  Helps to more quickly dry the poison ivy areas. Just follow e directions to create a paste over the afflicted areas.  I like it!
So far the puj snug spout cover has done it's job! My son loves to try to stand up in the bathtub and this has kept his head bruise and bump free!
Was disappointed in the lack of flavor from this coffee. Expected more intense flavor from a peaberry coffee.

I wasn't sure exactly what to do with Maple Sugar, so I just started adding it to my everyday baking items. It adds a nice warm flavor to cookies/pancakes/breads, etc. Blends well and tastes great on top of oatmeal.
My son sleeps with this every night. He can find it in his crib easy. He does not use a pacifier but he cannot sleep without his doggie. love it
Great absorbency. Will order more! We use them with prefolds at night for extra absorbency. We also use them with pockets when going out.

these coffee pods are horrible.  When I make them in a average size coffee mug I can clearly see to the bottom through the mug.  it is supposed to be a dark roast but when is made is more like a dirty colored water.  Was a total waste of money and will never buy these again.

I rated this a three because it has a very sour flavor. It took quite a bit of doctoring, including the use of sugar. I usually like Muir Glen products, but this I will not buy again. I would have been better off using the sour tomatoes available at the store and creating something tastier. I also is very watery so you will need to add paste or simmer for quite some time.

Let me paraphrase Marlon Brando in \\"On the Waterfront\\": \\"Vietti, you could have been a contender, you could have had class . . .\\"

It's not that I hate the product, I'll eat the remaining 7 cans, but when I open each one, I'll be thinking of how good a slow cooked pork shoulder roast with almost any kind of barbeque sauce and bread can taste.

The Vietti BBQ pork comes in a can about the size of a condensed soup can. Open the lid and you will be greeted by a disc of orange colored fat about 3/16 inch thick. Pry that out and ditch it and there is the pork. It's not the tender strands of pork that I was hoping for but relatively hard chunks of ground pork in a sauce that reminds me of sloppy joe more than BBQ.

I had read the unfavorable review and still I had to order it just in case they were wrong, they weren't - I won't be re-ordering.

note: the cans shown have an easy open top, the ones I got were the regular top, so be prepared to get out the old can opener.

(Same review as 1.2 Ounce package)
I have only had real pineapple orange juice, like Dole. This does not taste as good as that. I'm a HUGE fan of crystal light, but I don't like this flavor very much. My wife seems to like it fine though. I strongly recommend...

Fruit Punch/Raspberry Ice/Strawberry Kiwi/Raspberry Lemonade

I have been using the Ameda Purely Yours for over month.  The carryall case is good quality and unassuming. The outside pockets come in handy.  The pump is not too loud.  The dial for speed gives the impression that there are more speeds than their are, but the available speeds are fine, and this is just a suggestion for improvement.  What I like the most is that the milk does not travel into the pump unit or through tubes.  The parts are easy to clean.  Their customer service is great!  My pump started acting weird about a month in, and they replaced it.  For any mother going back to work, I recommend buying an extra set of parts if you won't be able to wash your parts easily on your break.  It takes a little strategy, but I was able to get the extra set of parts in the bag with everything else.  Another tip: I learned that the cooler is not waterproof, so if you forget the freezer packs (like I did on my first day at work), do not put loose ice in it.

I did not purchase my pump through Amazon. It was covered by insurance and purchased through a medical supplier; however, this thing is so bad I feel compelled to write a review. It is not an exaggeration when I say my hand pump works better. In fact, I have resorted to using my hand pump while I wait for a replacement from a different brand. Iâ€™ve been using my pump regularly for about 2 months and after ongoing issues it is no longer working. I have replaced all of the parts with the exception of the pump itself to no avail.

- One of the flanges cracked at the base within the first 2 weeks
- Iâ€™ve gone through about 4 sets of pump valves, two sets in the last two weeks. They are very delicate and get little micro-tears in the bottom, rendering suction useless.
- Sometimes milk does not flow through the valve into the bottle. For whatever reason, the milk pools in the valve and eventually gets sucked up into the tubingâ€¦.yes, sucked into the tubing. The exact opposite of what Ameda advertises.
- The diaphragm sometimes gets sucked into air input/output hole and clogs it up
- The writing rubs off of the storage bottles with only hand washing
- The pump makes a horrible beeping noise with every suction. I could live with this if the pump actually worked.

Not cool Amedaâ€¦very poor quality.

After having highchairs that were hard to clean I wanted to find a booster that was easy to clean and move around from our house to g-parents and restaurants. This seat has worked great! Since it is one solid piece you only have to wipe it down and not all sorts of crevices and pieces. The foam material it is made out of is comfortable for my boys to sit on and it hasn't stained. The straps are easy to remove and wash in the sink or washing machine when needed. As for traveling, it is easy to remove and attach to seats, it's compact and even comes with a sturdy traveling case. I highly recommend this booster for any parent looking for a quick cleanup and ease of use.

We have a half dozen of these things.  They are great for keeping your child in his room without making him feel banished or fearful because they allow you to keep the door cracked open.  Brilliant.  We also use these to keep the little one out of bathrooms, closets, etc.  The guy who invented these deserves a Noble.

The ingredients for this juice are: water, reconstituted vegetable juice blend (water and concentrated juices of sweet potatoes, carrots), reconstituted fruit juice (water and concentrated juice of white grapes, cherries, pomegranates), contains less than 2% of: natural flavoring, citric acid, malic acid (whatever that is), vitamin C.

The Nutrition Facts for this juice box states that for the whole box (6.75 oz), it had 70 calories, 0g of fat, 75 mg sodium (3%), 160 mg potassium (5%), 17 g sugars and 0 g protein (surprise). It has 20% Vitamin A, 20% Vitamin C, and 2% Iron.

For comparison sake, Koolaid has 60 calories in an 8 oz serving, 16 g sugar, no Vitamin A, 10 % Vitamin C, no iron and yeah, no calcium. The Koolaid also had less sodium (5 mg) but the sodium amount doesn't seem significant (it seems different varieties of Koolaid have different amounts of sodium). It should also be noted that Koolaid does not have any potassium.

Well, the first thing I did with this drink is I drank it myself and for an adult (ignore the cartooney dinosaur with the guitar) it was quite good. It went very well with my sandwich and chips. The next thing I did was give this drink to my 2 year old grandson and he drank it (all) but not as enthusiastically as he does other boxed juices. He often joins his parents for a cup of pretty sugary iced tea and this drink I think was not as sugary as what he was expecting from a boxed drink. But, he did drink all of it. That, I think, is saying a lot. If you do not commonly give your children sugary drinks, then they will probably like this. As it is, my grandson does seem to drink it down to the bottom, even if sugary iced tea is a possibility at home. In response to those who thought that this juice had a \\"funny\\" taste, I didn't find it so and I think if my grandson did think it tasted funny, he wouldn't have finished it.

Changed review because the owner is not in love with it:-(. My baby's vote is a resounding 'hate it'!
The vibration irritates her from the start. Trying to manually rock it using my foot.

Don't be fooled by the "sourdough" label -- this stuff is not noticeably sour at all. I'm sure it's a quality product, but the bland communion wafer flavor is definitely not what I expected from something labeled "sourdough".
I sent as a gift. so since they said they got it and the price is right i would recomend.

I came to amazon looking for info on whether this product was true vanilla because I put 1/2 teaspoon in 1 cup of coffee and could not taste it at all. I wanted to see if I had a counterfeit product. Closer inspection shows that it is clearly listed as being a blend when you read the ingredients. The flavor is weak and flat. I strongly recommend trying real vanilla extract. Kirkland has a great product.

Definitely tasty and fresh when they arrived. Not as good as bassets brand but very tasty and they were a hit when I took them to DnD. My boyfriend took the rest home with him haha. I'm going to order again soon. The red ones were my favorite.

I bought these at our local Sam's as well on a whim trying to find healthy snacks for my 1 and a half year old daughter.  SHE LOVES THEM!  Unfortunately, I can't find them at Sam's anymore (or anywhere else right now).  They are a great snack for me too when I want something a little salty and crunchy.
I love this potty seat because it makes your child fell safe. They know they won't fall off toilet or in the toilet. I love, love, love this seat!!
Very stylish and a great size. I would recommend to anyone.  Could use even as a normal bag.  Easy to wipe clean, and easy access to every pocket.

i agree with all other posters this is a big peice of garbage. i was so excited to have this thinking it would work through toddler hood. wrong. i only have found two stages. tub and seat. in the seat position my daughter was so uncomfy and ahd a mark in her lower back from the hump. it was hard to clean her. and then on top of it it was a fight to get her out. and there is so little room that i was glad she was a girl little boy parts would have had some damage. and the sad part is the only reason i bought this was because it said 4stages umm yeah can anyone tell me what those are?
These suit their purpose...spoons easy for my 2.5 year old to use that aren't plastic. Love them and would like to buy more.
The tadbit I ordered was great, but I thought this was the full size and was disappointed that it was a travel size. He does love it though and I can use it if his regular lovey is in the wash.
Theese make a room look great. It doesn't take a lot of effort and it was very simple. When you decide to redesign all you have to do is paint over them.
Awesome quality and decently priced, but not good for long trips as the chair provides no head support for when your toddler fast asleep.

Sugar, like wine, offers the savor of terroir. 'Demerara' sugar from Mauritius used the same methodology as real Demerara Sugar (grown on the Demerara River in Guyana, South America) but the taste is not quite the same. This India Tree is a vast improvement over refined white sugar, but I wish I could find some sugar from Guyana.
I like the wholesome ingredients, organic and sweetened with fruit juice instead of sugar or artificial sweeteners and my family loves the taste!
My household has completely replaced butter with this amazing natural antibiotic. I was buying the 29oz container from the grocery store for 21.00, so this saves us a ton!

These pads are good because they are thin and the material is soft and non-irritating to nipples.  They fill up quickly though if you are having a lot of leaking.  My baby is 3 weeks old, so there are still times when my breasts get really full.  I think a thicker pad would be better to use early on and then the thin pads once your milk-supply is more stable.  Overall these pads are nice to use and I am happy with my purchase.

This is a great hamper, good style, keeps dirty clothes hidden. I keep it in a small bathroom space and it works great.    Delivers perfect and it's priced great even with shipping cost you cant get a better price anywhere else.

I love these. They are sufficiently cinnamon to satisfy me completely. Near the finish of one of these you can pick up hints of watermelon and anise (pretty consistent but faint hints show up - it could just be me and over cinnamoned taste buds by then...)

I have deducted one star because... there is ALWAYS wrapper stuck to the INSIDE of every sucker. It's as if they wrap the candy in the cellophane and THEN shove the stick into the still warm candy, thereby pushing wrapper deep inside. So when you get about 1/2 way through, you begin to notice the little flaps of wrapper - which break off here and there as you eat - making you have to keep picking (or spitting it) out of your mouth. Kind of destroys the experience plus, it doesn't look cool when you're with others LOL!

Like I said, I LOVE these suckers but that wrapper is quite annoying. Which they'd fix that. Product: 5 stars, Packaging: 1 star

The concept of this is awesome and the portability is great, however the quality of the fabric is poor.  Mine is only a month old and already has lots of sign and wear and tear and I used it on my little baby who is 9 months old and 6% for weight!  It is sagging already and has torn on the corners.  It is still usable but for the price I expected much much better durability.
A monthly treat for my hubby, he loves these. I love Amazon's subscription service, now a monthly treat arrives just for him.

My twins didn't like being in their stroller and I needed something to make going to the store easier, the Buggy Bench was my answer! It attaches so easily and quickly to any shopping cart that I have used and the twins love to both be sitting in the cart looking around! Worth every penny to make shopping a little easier!
Doesn't work.  I couldn't find the brand that I bought for my son.  This one is not working at all for my daughter.

I love this for my coffee creamer. It is sweet and delicious. This packaging is perfect. I always throw out half full cartons, but this size is great. They all stayed nicely sealed until I need one for a few days. I couldn't be happier and will be ordering again.

I just purchased the Nosafrida booger sucker and it lives up to the hype of all of these glowing reviews.    My 6 month old daughter has been battling ear infections for the past two months and I believe they are aggravated by sever congestion that just won't clear up.     Using baby Benadryl, saline sprays, humidifiers & bulb aspirators my baby girl was still congested most of the time. Then I tried Nosafrida.     The first time I was impressed with how much mucus was extracted.  It was gross, but she could breathe! And that night she slept a little better without as much coughing.    I'm so glad I finally have a tool that actually clears her nasal passages! Yeah!

My daughters have loved this horse.  My only concern is that the yarn seems to come off pretty easily.  I am not sure if this is just my kids' picking at it, or if it isn't well secured.  Assembly was quick and the horse is nice looking.

If you are looking for a straight up cup of coffee, without flavors or anything, this is it. Its nice and mild, but not weak. The taste is amazing. I am currently sipping with International Delight's Cinnabon flavor and its just an amazing taste. You can taste the flavor as a subtle after taste, and when I am drinking it, I tend to take big long gulps as its so good, I don't want to put it down. It makes a lot too. A nice big cup of coffee that is bigger than most of the other tassimo cups. Rainforest Alliance Certified means I can feel good that I'm drinking something that goes to help our planet. I am going to make sure I stock up on these as they last a while and make a big cup. They are a great normal coffee (other than an espresso latte or machiatto)

I'm astonished at the quality of the craftsmanship! The wood is sturdy and the color is gorgeous! The product arrived in 3 days, which was a surprise given the shipping was free of charge. The crib is for my little grandson's visits; my husband says it is going to be a family heirloom. By far this is the most beautiful crib I've had the pleasure of owning and it is worth far more than the price I paid.

This is great to start when the child just kicks. However after only a couple of months the child gets bored and the structure starts to breakdown. The whale tale that the toys hang from start to sag pretty easily. If you have another child then it becomes very difficult to maintain it's structure. Not so great for tummy time as the baby can only face direction and isn't encouraged to turn which is important. I'd suggest one of the mats with activities on multiple sides and a better variety of toys on the hanging mobile for the growing child to interact with and respond to.

Looked nothing like the picture.  very very small, not much green.  I give the company credit, when the first one died, they did send a replacement.  The replacement is even smaller than the original - puny -  and when it arrived many of the few branches already were turning brown.
First experience with matcha. Very good taste. I have used a small whisk to mix, no problem.

Arrived on time and undamaged (thank you Amamzon). And set-up was a breeze. In, fact it only took me about 10 mins and the instruction booklet was clear with lots of graphic examples. I want to tell the manufacturer though- please consider that someone needs to remove the stickers from the tray that you needlessly put on there. It took me longer to remove the stickers in the tan inset of the tray, than it did to set up the entire chair! darned stickers! But other than that (a minor issue really), awesome set up.

Trial run: I put my 20 month old in it and it seemed to hold up very well. Sturdy, attractive, comfortable for him. The design is simple and to the point. It makes much more sense than the Evenflo that was handed down to me and broke very quickly with my son squirming around in it. I like the idea that I can move it to a dining chair and use it as a booster with the belts to keep my son seated at the table for meals. The transition between the highchair and putting it on a regular table chair seems simple and safe.

UPDATE (almost 2 months of daily use): Everything on this highchair is easily washable- very few nooks for food to gunk up. The tray insert can be put in the dishwasher- so that's nice. I have not used it in the dishwasher (only handwashed) - but the tan insert snaps in and out easily. I have to say THAT is a life saver. It is so easy to clean!!!! The dark brown part of the tray and leg divider are all in one piece. That is nice because you can lift it out as well so food does not get gunked up around the legs. Once you can take the tray out, it's to easy brush off any dropped food from the seat. The dotted back insert also comes out for older children and washes very nicely on a gentle cycle.

Overall- I love this highchair and the ease of operation it provides. It has made meal time much easier. And my child is much more comfortable in it than he was in our previous chair. I highly recommend it.
This brand of instant polenta is very good. It is well priced too.Since polenta is Gluten free I make it often. Not as coarse as mixes in Italy, but good.

I absolutely LOVE this time of year when these delicious popcorns are availble! The product arrived right when I expected, and Will definitely keep them in mind for holidays to come! I was so pleased that the popcorn was fresh, and the white  chedder bonus in the huge tin of four flavors was WELL worth the price!

The photo on Amazon is of the old, pre-bankruptcy Hostess, which I wanted as a novelty gift. This seller sent a box of the new ones, which you can buy at almost any grocery store or supermarket for 1/3 the price. False advertising.

I love this bouillon because it's gluten free (for my husband) and vegan (for me and our daughters), so I can do it all with one product. And it tastes great! The chicken & beef flavors are also good.

This works out great for double strollers!  I bought a second one for the double bike trailer. The middle "cooler" section works great with ice packs.  We can walk through a theme park and it keeps our drinks cold.
Our grandaughter came to visit and my daughter commented that this sheet was so nice and soft she wanted to take it home for their pack n play, but I won't part with it-need for next visit.
We drink them daily as our breakfast. I even will drink 1/2 as breakfast... then drink my coffee & have other 1/2 as morning or afternoon snack. Plus with me being GF it helps! We love them.
They are easy to put down and does the job.  My son was slipping around in the tub without it.  It's not scratchy or rough surface.

Purchased the Cheddar Cheez Powder, hoping it would work with popcorn.  Well! let me say, it not only made good cheese popcorn, I also added it to soups, casseroles and eggs. If you like a cheddar cheez flavor in your food try this cheez powder.

This is a great stroller...Originally I had purchased a joovy, but my 3 year old still likes to sit in the stroller and face forward, so I got this instead and I love it...It is easy to push  even one handed which I have had to do many many times.  Plus it is not too much bigger than the quatro system which I have used for the past three years.    There were a couple of things that I didn't like...First, with a baby seat in the back, it is virtually impossible to get any storage, which I definitely need.  Second, my daughter is tall so when I lay the back of the front seat all the way down so my daughter can sleep, her head hits the tray that is used to lock in the car seat.  And lastly, you need to angle the car seat to get it in the back.  these are all minor issues.  Over all I am very happy that I got this stroller and love taking my daughters out in it.

New to the Quinoa craze that seems to have been happening, I was excited to try out the [[ASIN:B009M5178S Side Mates Quinoa with Rice, Black Beans and Corn]].  The directions were very easy and within 15 minutes it was ready to eat.  The smell was pretty good and when I took the first bite I was pleased.  The texture was firm, but not crunchy and the flavor was very nice! I was somewhat worried that it might be a bit bland as I had found a couscous side dish from the same brand, but this was flavorful, spicy and seasoned very well.  Overall I really enjoyed this and will be buying it in the future.
These are the best plates for my gkids!! They love their food in different divides.

This sausage tastes fine.  It tastes a little like spam but without the yucky .  I'm using this as a cured meat in veggie dishes that call for a pork component so it is fine but it doesn't have a delicious sausage flavor  to it but a milder salty pork product taste. A 12 ounce can of spam is about Two Dollars so this clean tasting product is a much better choice.     This meat was excellent in a heated baguette with cream cheese smeared and a generous amount of cilantro/coriander.  It hit the same notes as a Vietnamese Banh Mi sandwich without the concern over what zactly is in that inexpensive pate.  I don't eat sausage very often and I probably won't buy any more for a long time.     This sausage is at least 50% fat nubbins. The other sausage I bought is also very fatty so these are good to have around if you need lard in a recipe.

Although pricey, this gate is exactly what I was looking for. It fit perfectly across the opening on our deck, and is great for our dogs. I love having a baby gate you can open, versus one you have to climb over. It was also fairly easy to set up.

Love this mat! We just got ours in the mail and so far it is actually better looking and feeling than I had expected! We bought this for our sons small playroom and it covers a good portion of play space. I love the material and that its double sided. I also love that I won't have to worry about it absorbing liquids and that I can easily use a steam mop or just wipe it down easily If there is any kind of spill! Planning on getting a second one down the line for our living room area as well!

I don't consider the usual Hershey's cocoa above average, but this is the worst chocolate I can remember ever eating. And that includes chocolate in African countries, where the have to modify the recipe with ingredients just stop it melting in the heat. The label suggests it's some exotic blend, but this is exactly the opposite of expensive varietal chocolate. It has peculiar and uninteresting tastes. There's nothing to recommend this product at all. It's  amazing Hershey let it get to market.
To the Dad who stated the car seat will not fit it any shopping cart...that is because car seats are not supposed to go in shopping carts. It is a safety hazard.

Works great!  I use it in my hair for fly aways and also as a lotion for my skin.  My elbows have never felt so soft!  I don't use it on my face because it does make it feel a little greasy and shiny but its great for legs arms and everywhere else.  A little bit goes a long way.
This makes a tasty, low-calorie soup.  I often add extra vegetables and even a few noodles. Love this product.
I love these K cups - Lipton is the best tasting tea. I will definitely be a return customer.
My husband makes Sun Tea with 8 bags in a large mason jar. Very good

Oh God! The best bags I have ever used. They are safe, durable, true self-standing bag! Good price as well.
I used them to store my milk in the deep freezer, some of those had been stored for 3 months or so, and the milk doesnâ€™t smell or taste funny at all. I also have been using it to store chick stocks, soup, and any pureed food I made. I always ignore the value indication line. I just fill it up like 80% full and it still holds well. Sometime a full bag fell out of the freezer door without breaking the bag. I had 0 leakages in the past 3 year, yet it is easy to tear apart by hands to get that big chunk of frozen liquid out if you canâ€™t wait for it to defrost.
Itâ€™s very impressive quality. Absolutely love it.
I ordered this item as a gift for my mother.  I believe she likes it, and is getting good use out of it.

High quality, great flavor, you can taste the Pear.
The Best that we have tried.
The choolate is smooth and rich.

The package arrived very quickly.  However, the product is not what I would describe as fresh.  Cotton Candy tends to shrink over time, unless the bags are completely airtight.  The candy within the bags I received has shrunk to less than half of its original size and was not at all fluffy.  Very disappointing.

We were trying to decide between a few jogging strollers and decided on this one over the others because we want to take it on trails and feel like the big wheels are a little more rugged. This thing handles great! We also love that you can switch out the seat for a few other options for infants.

In each airport during our last trip, we had people mention what a great idea this was.  I agree with them.  This makes it easier to have more carry on baggage while traveling with a little one, which has already saved me enough checked baggage fees to justify the cost of the strap.  It is hard to have a full size carry on if you're pushing a regular stroller.  Besides, if you're lugging along the car seat for the child to use on the plane, then you may as well put it to good use in the terminal.  Even if you are travelling with an infant on your lap, you can just check the car seat planeside.  And, in either case, you can still check a stroller in your checked baggage for no cost.  So I really didn't see any downside to this product.

Summary: Outer "PUL" fabric does not repel moisture, it absorbs it; resulting in a soaking wet outfit and bedding. Leak starts from leg and radiates outward within 90 minutes of putting the diaper on the baby. Snaps are VERY hard to snap (could be a good thing if you've got a crawler).

Details: At the time of review, my daughter is 10 weeks old, and all 6 of my GoGreen diapers leak within approximately 90 minutes of her wearing them. The leaks always occur at the leg, never over the top or back.

I am a scientist, so I have been extremely rigorous in my "experiments" to prevent these diapers from leaking. Since they were first purchased, they have always been laundered according to the instructions (dry stored in a wet bag, washed at the correct water temperature, chlorine/dye/fragrance/enzyme free detergent without fabric softener, and always INDOOR line-dried). The PUL is not de-laminating, and there are no stitching flaws. I have been extremely systematic at ensuring they fit my baby snugly properly, without allowing the inner gussets to be twisted or the liner to bunch up inside the shell.

Despite my best attempts to prevent leaks, all 6 of my gogreen diapers systematically leak in the exact same way. The leak starts at the leg and the moisture is absorbed outward from the leg in all directions. The outer fabric of the diaper is always wet to the touch, which should not be the case for a "waterproof" fabric. Like my Gore-tex rain jacket, my other PUL diapers never feel wet to the touch because they do not absorb any moisture: they repel it. This is not the case with the outer fabric on my gogreen diapers. I thought at first my daughter was just too small and they did not fit properly, but she has gained six pounds, filled out substantially, and the leaks are still occurring in the exact same fashion.

This moisture absorption by the outer fabric is a design flaw. No amount of proper care and usecan compensate for the improper material chosen to construct this diaper.

This is not pure honey. There are 4 methods of testing pure honey, and this failed all 4. Here's a link: http://permaculturenews.org/2014/02/08/shocking-differences-raw-honey-processed-golden-honey-found-grocery-retailers/  It dissolves quickly in water, it doesn't burn, it runs all over the place, and it didn't crystallize over time. Will not buy this honey again. Who knows what it is diluted with.
A beautiful bed that I wish I could have had for my children.  This one is for a great granddaughter.

I actually received the Eddie Bauer ITS Travel system as a baby shower gift (HORRIBLE) I tried to use it but it was the worst product out there and it's the same price. I also like other parents did my research in looking for a GOOD travel system for my baby, when it came down to safety and quality this travel system is the BEST. I also recommend that you make an appointment with your local police station to have the car seat properly installed they are trained and you will have peace of mind that it is installed correctly.

This is the best coconut milk out there. It's almost close to the real coconut milk.  What I like about it is that each container comes in 8oz, it makes it easier to use. It has also a short life in the fridge, I would say three days max. Anyway, I have already order another one.
i can not figure out how to use it. My baby was not comfortable in it. The price is too expensive. Returned it in the end.

This is an excellent tub for an infant.  PROS: the little sling that attaches to it is perfect for the sponge baths you will need to give your newborn while his/her belly button stub is still attached.  I filled the tub with just enough warm water so that when I placed the sling over it, my baby's bottom would be submerged (to keep him warm). After he was able to get full baths, the rubber padding on the \\"newborn\\" side helped keep him from sliding down or to the side.  CONS:   The \\"Infant-Toddler\\" seat on the opposite side is a little awkward.  My baby out-grew the bathtub at four months (and he is a little baby- in the 40th percentile). I seriously doubt that any toddler can fit in it.

Well, not quite PARADISE, but very nice.

I do not know what happened with the other reviewers, but their complaints appeared to be packaging issues and delays. Did the former order from Amazon, or another retailer? Because mine arrived just fine, and I found no problems with this product. In fact, I am glad that Amazon offers 100% UNSWEETENED Grapefruit Juice. Yes, it is in a can, but I found it to be quite tasty and just the right balance of sweetness and tartness. I will definitely order this juice again, provided it is not too pricey--Amazon has a habit of skyrocketing prices, suddenly.

You see, the \\"bad\\" reviews do not really address FOR what this \\"Customer Review\\" page is intended--REVIEWING THE ACTUAL PRODUCT. Again, the taste was good. The cost could be better, but there is free-shipping, so I suppose we really do pay for that convenience. This is a long-time, respected brand, too.

If you are formula feeding, you need this bottle.  I bought for nighttime feedings and when we are on the go, but I use them all the time.  My son drinks his bottles at room temperature so there's no need to heat the bottle.

the package arrived earlier than expected which was great because it was part of a gift for a baby shower that following weekend. The mother and father both loved it! however the packaging of the actual product was somewhat crude as if someone just threw two things they had no more further use for in a box and shipped it out. Made it seem like it was from ebay! that's the only reason I took off one star!

The picture is not what you are going to receive.  I also received red white and blueberry.  It is really annoying because the fusion red and white is really hard to find so I was excited to pay a little extra to get what I wanted. I don't even want to go through the hassle of returning and waiting for my refund. Ughhhh. If I wanted the red white and blueberry I could have easily ordered it. I am def not satisfied.

I finally broke down and bought this boppy total body pillow and I slept so great last night.  I used to put a pillow behind me and in front of me.  This is such a great pillow.  I does the work of two and you can manipulate it to do other things.  Love it!!! I would definitely recommend this product.
Specialty dark chocolate with nice touched of liquor. I recommend to anyone who crave that special treat. Downside was, they were gone in 60 seconds. Yum.
I purchased this lamp as a stand alone item to go with the Geenny Sea Turtle bedding and it matches great! Would recommend this item!
got them based on the other deployed review. i have never seen sunflower seeds in any PX overseas but these are great everything is as it should be.
Now we don't have to run out of this great enhancement to almost any meal. Not on my cereal but almost anything else

A perfect little dish set for our Little Monkey.  Nicely made, easy care, just the right size for his little hands and will last so we can pass it down to the next precious treasure that joins our family.

i've had this for barely three months and one is broken and the other two don't seem to far behind.

pros: very easy to use

cons: after opening for a few times, they simply and easily break.

i won't really recommend. not for a heavy traffic area anyways like kitchen.
Love the machine, love the coffee!  We saw them everywhere in Europe and were glad to find them at home, although not in every grocery store like in France where they dominate the market.
This is a terrific dark roast coffee: rich flavor, smooth, not too acidic. Outstanding value. Drink it all day long.
Tasty walnuts that were very fresh.  A few of these equal a capsule of Omega 3.  I have a few a day to get my Omega 3's.....

I was so accustomed to the smaller air plants that I was actually surprised by the size of this one! I am very pleased with the size of this plant & it fit very well into my living room decor! The packaging was good & the condition of the plant was excellent! I have gotten many compliments on this plant! it arrived just as it looks in the picture!
Absolutely love the bow! Cannot wait for her to be here to wear it! It was every thing I had expected and arrived right on time!

Great product and great ingredients - nothing but cherries and a little oil. I like to eat tart cherries for their nutritional value and for their health benefits. I've found tart cherries to be very beneficial for relieving my arthritis aches and pain and other inflammation-type problems. And the best thing about this product I think - no added sugar! No added chemicals or preservatives.

One would expect Amazon to be more careful especially during Valentine season. I had access to this before I moved from San Diego to Oklahoma. I cannot find it in any store in OK or in Texas, and I do NOT understand why not!
The flavor is fabulous, and works perfectly with Bearnaise sauce. I am ordering more.

Don't be fooled by the picture and description, it is nothing more than a cheaply printed poster. Very disappointed.

This unit is a nice, portable addition to a little one's nursery. A listing of pros and cons:

Pros:
1) neutral color scheme
2) soft fabric
3) removable cover and inserts for the inevitable mess or accident
4) twenty minutes of music that is pleasant for baby and adult
5) straps are easily adjustable
6) Light and portable
7) cover is machine washable

Cons:
1) harder than it needs to be to put together
2) There is a noticeable low dip in the front, so parents have to bolster the area with additional fabric

This product is made in China.

I bought this exact pack of Happy Fute diapers off Ebay 2 years ago and the diapers are still going strong. I have another pack of diapers I also bought off ebay under the name sun baby (or something like that) and they don't even compare to the quality of these ones and were practically the same price. The inserts are thick and very absorbent. I use two inserts at night and 99% of the time there are no leaks. During the day I find that one insert is sufficient. I am on here today because I'm pregnant and am buying the happy flute diapers once again for my next little one. The value and quality is just too good to pass up. I can have peace of mind knowing that my son (and next baby) isn't sitting in nasty chemical filled disposable diapers. Sure it takes a bit more effort on my part, but once I got my routine down I couldn't imagine diapering my children any other way!!!

This is a terribly designed product.  I am going to throw them out because:  1. the screws are so bad that two of the first three broke as I tried to use them, even though I was screwing into wood using a hand screwdriver.  They seem to be made of the softest metal imaginable.    2. It is quite difficult to install the other piece in exactly the right location so that they fit together well.  3. Even once I installed it with my own screws, the drawer could not close all the way.  I will use rubber bands instead and look for something better designed.

I bought a book about home brewing soda pop. Several of the recipes call for this.  We tried them out.  The flavor is new to us and we still don't know if we like it.  We will try a few more batches to see if we get use to the flavor.  We don't drink regular soda very often.  I usually drink seltzer water with a splash of lemon in it so soda drinking isn't really on our menu.  We thought we would try home brew soda because we like the idea that soda originated healthful \\"tonics\\".  This made the batch of root beer taste medicinal.  I am not saying it is \\"bad\\" just not what we imagined.

I've used this Vanilla Bean Paste in place of Pure Vanilla Extract for years.  Used to spend $10-14 for 4 ounce bottle.  This is my second purchase of this size; I'm just finishing up the first one, that I purchase more than 2 years ago.
you'll love this chocolate. it's super dark, barely sweet, not at all bitter. I love it with coffee or fruit.

Little Keepsakes Baby Safe Ink Print Kit is an easy, mess-free way to make beautiful keepsakes.  The kit comes with everything you need which is makes it super easy.  One major concern when it comes to using ink on small babies is how safe it is.  many inks are not suitable for infants or even young children because they are not non-toxic.  The ink that is included with this kit is non toxic, non staining (another big concern), and is completely safe for newborns.
So far, we have enjoyed everything I have made using this product. Much better than the high protein mix I had previously bought locally.

Warm, soft, and stylish.  We ended up taking the cover off though and just using the mat because it is easier to clean.  We can just wipe up spills on the mat, but we were constantly having to wash the cover.

I like the fact that this pack 'n play is square, not rectangular.  Though it takes up a little more space, it gives my son more room to play.  He loves the built in toys, especially the mirror and crinkle butterfly.  I have one permanently at my Mom's and my Grandma's, plus the one I use at home and take to other places.  The price is very fair, which is a bonus too.  I'm very pleased overall with this product, and highly recommend it to any new Mom.

I bought the Keurig because when I wake up in the morning I'm a zombie that runs into walls and can't see past my nose, so I wanted a machine that would take any possibility of brain power needed out of making coffee for that oh so needed caffein punch in order to wake from my stupor. I have found though that the k-cups tend to produce watery and bland coffee at best, which is why it was such a nice surprise to find these dark magic extra bold k-cups! These things actually taste like decent coffee and aren't watery or acidic. Thanks green mountain for an awesome product and for curing my morning zombie woes! Oh and although a small gesture, I noticed that they shipped me 51 k-cups, thanks for the 1 extra!

I bought these Orchids for my sister. I didn't see them but when she thanked me she told me that although they were very beautiful she was very disappointed that they only lasted 2 days,  and they do have a cool air con house..

Very mild flavor-if you are trying to include seaweed in your diet (it has so many trace minerals that our soils are void of) this is a good place to start. When hydrated, it quadruples in size, goes good in soups.

We LOVE Zoli cups! We originally got one from a local store but my son loves this cup SO much, we had to order a second one. He has been drinking out of it since he was five or so months old. The straw is great for teaching them to drink from a straw and the cup can be turned any way and they still can get water out. I haven't had any issues with leaks. The soup itself is very good tasting, and I would not hesitate to order it again EXCEPT this is not the first time (including other products) I've received some very dented cans. What's up with that Amazon?!

The first two cans of this soup I've used so far were both more than a little dented, and the second one could really be considered dangerously so since it was very difficult to find a way to get it open (almost gave up on it).

all flavor is gone-no taste.  very watered down.  The dulce gusto version is much better...or just getting some chocolate shavings and steamed or boiling milk.

I bought this pillow because I was using so many pillows on my bed, they kept moving in the night when I would turn over and then I would have to start the process of getting comfy all over again. The first night I used this pillow, i felt I was supported all around! I am currently in my 20th week carrying twin boys, so Im already showing big time, and something to support my back and tummy was a must. I do use my memory foam pillow on top of this because I need to be elevated when i sleep otherwise I have trouble breathing at night! It doesn't hog the whole bed, so my husband can enjoy the bed too (on nights Im not snoring like a freight train! LOL) I thought that the exposed zipper would bug me because I didn't purchase a pillow case for it. It hasn't at all even touched me in the night, so no worries there. If I need the pillow in between my legs I can easily grab it. Also I know us prego's should sleep on our sides, but I was having issues of major cramping in my hip after a period of time sleeping on my side without the pillow. Since using the pillow, I still get the cramp at night, but I can enjoy a longer sleep than before. I usually just turn over and sleep on the other side. I love the all around support, I can turn over and not have issues of moving the pillow into a certain place, cause its already there!. I am sure i will continue to use this pillow even after my pregnancy is over with. I will be have a scheduled c-section, so I do hope this pillow can be used to help in support of my recovery as well. I know the price is higher than most pillows, but totally worth it! Even the pillow itself is very plush with that not too firm, not too flimsy feel and the fabric used around the pillow is pretty nice too. I'd recommend this pillow to pregnant women or anyone that needs all around support of your body!
Found this at the grocery store.  No heat, and I mean zero spice, flavor was ok, but I would not buy this again.
the Chai Amore is not the same but tastes better than the other products that I have bought.

Mild, smooth, no caffeine, and makes a fantastic batch of booch! I use this exclusively for brewing my own kombucha and it works wonderfully. Makes for a great first ferment, no bitterness, even when brewing the starter tea for 8 hours or more.
This is not just low sodium, it is almost resistant to trying to give it ANY flavor.

I purchased this tub for my 8 month old because it was bio plastic and seemed a good size for storage. The tub I received was not the same color as the picture and had scratches in the plastic making an extremely sharp surface, WOULD NOT PUT MY BABY IN THIS TUB. Needless to say, she also did not fit in this tub, at all! She is 16 lbs but not sitting up yet. The \\"non slip\\" surface is one textured picture of a baby on the back. Would NOT recommend.

Very cute and light platter!!
My baby is getting more interesting to eat since i've bought this platter.
This product is made in KOREA. It is well made. Love it!!
These are absolutely delicious! They are roasted very nicely with a good amount of salt.  Love them!

Use to get this syrup when visiting my grandparents in Slapout, Alabama.  Made a definite impression on me, but have never been able to find it in the Carolinas.  So pleased I was able to locate it on Amazon!
These are excellent. Much better to have two of these than a package of poptarts. A bit pricey, but worth it in my opinion.

I am a BBQ chip fanatic and have tried every chip in almost every state. These are in the top ten, crisp, real potato flavor, taste home-made. The only suggestion is they could add a little more of the bbq flavoring, that would move them up to the top 5 category and at this price they can't be beat. Thank you Route 11..for your little slice of heaven
We get them all the time and the kids love them too ! Great pasta replacement when you are trying to cut it out

This is an interesting flavor addition.  I tried it in a yellow cake and I quite liked it.  It adds a flavor I can't actually identify as "nut" but it is a complex and pleasing addition.  I also tried it in whipped cream but it had a bit of an artificial taste....better in a vanilla custard.  All in all, a worthwhile purchase.

Just amazing, perfect dipper, love it with apple. Very creamy is like a melting Reese's in your mouth.
I received this for free but this is my own opinion went to target to get another jar.

Although this bulk two-pack of 34.5 ounce bags of Quaker Natural Granola Cereal can be considered slightly overpriced, by comparison, it's still less expensive than the standard-sized retail package. So long as Costco no longer carries this exact same product, then you won't be able to find it cheaper anywhere else. That's where I first became addicted to this granola and have since tried many sub-par substitutes when Costco decided to discontinue my go-to favorite.

The cereal has just the right amount of sweetness and crunch without being too hard in texture like Kashi's break-your-teeth-but-stay-lean Crunch. Surprisingly, a 1/2 cup serving contains only 5g of fat. The high fiber as well as the protein from the almonds definitely helps to keep the appetite satiated until lunchtime. As for the flavor, it can be described as a delicate blend of coconut, honey, raisins, and oats.

Let me just say to all the people looking to buy this candy that most of them ARE NOT FIZZY. Maybe one or two are like the energy drink ones but not all of them. Also the bag of candy you get will more than likely not the bag in the item description pictures. There are many different variations of this mix of candies so you will more than likely get something else than what is pictured. So with all that being said this is a wonderful candy to buy if you are looking for something new to try. All the flavours are interesting and fun and like me I'm sure you'll enjoy them too.

I got this multiple pack of toys so that I could keep a couple for my daughter and use a couple as shower gift decorations.  One of them in particular sounds like a cat toy, but my daughter loves it.  Glad that I was able to get 4 in a box... made it way more cost effective than if I would have had to buy separate toys.

Perfect for my kid!
I guess if my child falls asleep confortably every now and then in this booster then it means shes confy.
The armrests with bottle are suitable.
We don't use the lighting, though.

I have been using this coconut oil for several years and keep coming back for more.  Fantastic taste, easy melt and very healthy.  Only negative I have about this oil is I cook on a Viking cooktop with a downdraft (that's a story for another days) but I live in Maine where the temps can drop to -20 degrees in winter and my downdraft has some cold air blowback so guess what happens with oil splatters on the downdraft?  They get solid!  Always a fun job to clean off, but easy enough using Awesome Degreaser spray and a few paper towels.  This oil imparts a lovely taste to eggs, shrimp, chicken and just about anything you decide to add it to along with the added benefits of being one of those healthy oils we need for artery cleansing and brain function so how can anyone go wrong?  You can't!
These steel cut oats were great for my daughter. I appreciate the selection of gluten free products available on amazon!

First of all, Starbucks Sumatra blend is one of my all time favorites. However, to buy this at package for $1.04 per ounce when Starbucks sells it for $0.87 per ounce is not how I like to spend my money. I'm surprised that Amazon send me an email touting this offer.

I read some of the other reviews saying that these cans are mostly sauce with very few tomatoes in them, but I figured I'd try them anyway. Well, I got some cans that were packed full of tomatoes and some that were mostly sauce. When I buy a can in the supermarket, I can cherry-pick the cans that have the most tomatoes. When buying online, I guess you get whatever is next on the shelf. The taste was good - but just know ahead of time that you will get a random assortment of full cans.

Great if you plan to travel with your kids!!! Also, you can check it in and because it has hard base nothing will happen to it! No need to rent kids carseat during holidays anymore!!! Kids love it too.

This diaper bag is AWESOME! It stores much more than what it would appear to hold and it is so nice because it doesn't slide off of your shoulder. When you are carrying a carseat,purses,bags,etc.it makes it much easier, you just throw it over your head and it stays put!
My favorite go to Oatmeal. It is a little on the pricey side but always reliable and has a good taste. I use some of the cans to seal the Bob's Red Mill in after they are empty.

I've had this highchair for over a year and a half now, I still love it, and it still looks like it is new! I read some of the reviews and wish to agree that the only downfall of the chair is it is not convenient to take the baby out by sliding the tray out. HOWEVER, this chair reclines in three different levels and that is how I take my son out. It's easy to do (A big red handle near the top, that you pull up to recline the seat ) I haven't needed to remove the table top except for cleaning it. The diswasher tray is holding up after a hundred washes! My 17 month old still plays with the removable toy since now he can push the bigger buttons for the bubbles and twirling around the fish. When he was 6 months he listened to the music from the removable toy and loved to chew on the side bar toys. At least this allowed to get some of my chores finished. It is very easy to clean and wash. It does do well to fold up and travel. I do recommend this to all moms!

These noodles are easy to prepare.  I like them best drained and tossed with coconut oil, I then spread them out on a pizza pan and bake for 20 min to slightly brown. (It kind of gives them that stirfried flavor.)  I then serve them with a small amount of butter or Thai Peanut sauce. I can make 3 meals out of a 14 oz package.
I love using this!! I use it for cooking, oil pulling & doing my hair!!
This is THE best candy ever!  The only thing that would be better is if you could buy only the red/blue lollipops.
I got this at a really good price. It's great when used as an addition to a non stick pan instead of butter or margarin for grilled cheeses and such but not the flavor I was hoping for.

We bought an 80 count box of this coffee when another popular brand increased their price by about $20.  First observation was that the k-cups were physically lighter than other k-cups I've come across.  Second observation backed up my first observation, which was that the coffee was very weak looking and there was very little resistance as the water was passing through the k-cup.  Ever notice that some k-cups brew faster than others?  That's because they're using less coffee in their k-cups - lame.  End result was a cup of bitter water that tasted like it had been messed with to increase the caffeine content.  Only way to get bold coffee out of these k-cups is to use the smallest cup setting and use three or four of these k-cups, in which case the end result is only marginally better and I wasted more money on my cup of coffee.  I tried so hard to get through that 80 count box... I really did.  I just got fed up with ruining my morning routine by drinking this stuff.  What's left of the box is going to work to be given away.

This particular brand of pineapple chunks has an amazing taste.
I make my own fruit bread and this candied pineapple just seems to take the bread to a whole new level of great taste.

We've had a couple different brands of these and I was skeptical that these would be as good as the others considering how inexpensive they were but I've been pleasantly surprised (have been using them for over a month). They have a little bit of plastic/rubber odor when you first open them but they're cute and durable and do the trick. Bonus - they even came wrapped individually so I could give some away with baby gifts if I wanted since 5 is more than enough for our house.
If I could give these zero stars, I would. I have never thrown chocolate anything in the garbage before, till now.  Absolutely awful.

We bought this with the expansion pack for our 9-month old. It has given her a huge area to play where we know we can leave her and she'll be safe!! Between having a brick fireplace and a class entertainment center with lots of sharp edges, this "baby jail" is awesome!!! During the day, I set this up in my office and then come evening, move into the family room. It's fairly easy to collapse, transport and reset up-the only tip is to make sure to slightly losen the screws at the hinges to make it easier to fold-then retighten when it's all set up. Also, w/the expansion, the "handle" that's used to secure the standard play yard doesn't fit now-but that's what bungee cords are for
These work very well with the Lifefactory glass bottles as long as we remove the plastic valve.

I enjoy this product.  With my first child a winter baby I bought the original bundle me and now with my second child a summer baby I had to have the bundle me lite and am not dissapointed.  It is durable, washable and comfortable (meaning I would crawl up in it if I could)The only down side is that I still have not mastered the art of keeping the back panel secured behind the carrier, I often hold it in place with the environment protector. use them as snacks .. most are tasty and can be opened with just fingers - which is a big deal in my view.

I once reviewed a Taster's Choice instant coffee on Amazon. I thought it was pretty good. Then, we happened upon this product. I take it all back.

I really find this one of my favorite instant coffees. Now instant is not going to be as good a fresh perked, I know. But for instant, this is pretty good!

First, it easily dissolves into a smooth coffee, without bits of the instant as clumps (which happens with Taster's Choice). It looks nicer, but I can't help but think that it also makes its taste smoother.

Second, the taste is, in fact, smoother than other instants that I have tried. A nice rich taste.

All in all, this is my favorite instant coffee to this point. . . .

While I haven't tried 'every' raw cacao powder on the market (who could?), I've tried many, some of which were of good quality and others not so.    The Organic Nectars Premium Raw Cacao Powder is the best I've tried yet and I'm very pleased with it.  It has a very fine consistency that mixes extremely well with hot water and just a bit of stirring.  The taste is quite chocolate-y and smooth, being both clean-tasting and rich, to paraphrase another pleased reviewer.  I generally throw in just a touch of chile pepper, cinnamon and a natural sweetener and the result is a delicious drink that gives me all that I expect from a quality raw cacao powder.    \\"Two thumbs up!\\" is obviously my assessment of this product.  If you enjoy true cacao powder and are looking for a premium product and taste, I say give the Organic Nectars powder a try.  Based upon my experience, my strong bet is that you will like it as much as I do.
Purchased these as a gift. Although priced high- the quality vs others is much better. Gift recipient was very pleased!

So instant noodles aren't healthy for you, we know that. Get over it.

Nongshim currently is my favorite, TRULY instant noodles. Cup Noodles, while infinitely cheaper, does not have the taste and the deceptively low-sodium feel to it as Nongshim does. Don't get me wrong, sodium will always be an issue with these soup bases, but at least the packet inside will allow you to decide how dense the flavor you want it to be.

I use a water heater with water at 195-205 degrees, and in 3-4 minutes my noodles are set to be eaten. You can fluff it up by adding a fried egg, meats, veggies, etc. But if you're like me and only use them for emergencies when you have zero time to cook, four minutes is all that's necessary.

I checked out a lot of gates and settled on this one. Good price, great functionality and easy to install. A few times I caught my little one grabbing and banging on it at the top of the stairs and it's held it's own just fine. Take the time to make sure you install it right and you're all set.

Wanted to know what the ingrients was for the natural flavors because it can be 1500 different toxic things including MSG. Yummy earth refused to answer the question on many attempts. If the company is reading this, I would love an organic option. Thanks! ;)

Absolutely tasty. Pomegranate is a good anti-oxidant fruit. These seeds are not bitter after you finish melting the chocolate in you mouth, but they are not chewy either. I would buy these again.

I obviously feel better about using the organic one, but it is no where near as soft as this! This one is lovely. It is quiet--it doesn't make that unpleasant plastic sound with every move. Note that this basket is almost a foot long and 4 inches by 4 inches. I was a bit surprised by the size.
