This does NOT taste like lawn clippings!!! I've tried others that do. Mixes well with iced green tea. G*C wanted $27 for 8.5oz. this was $34.34 for 17oz. and made it to jersey in 2 days using FREE shipping option. DO NOT FORGET: Freezer or Refrigerate after opening.<3

Fits my doggie Jogger/stroller perfectly!! I love it! am able to securely hold 2 large Starbucks plastic reusable cups OR 2 large Sport bottle style water bottles. The material is fantastic, in that, it actually is as if the cups/bottles are in there own cookie's to keep them cold. I can keep my keys and dog treats, or running aids like Gu, or gels, in the center pocket that magnetically closes and on top of the closure is a zippered pocket that would fit individual keys or ID's, or credit cards, etc. I LOVE the removable pouch (by zipper) on the front that fits my iPhone 6+ with room to spare. It definitely could easily become my purse to run in and out of stores with room to fit all that I normally would keep inside a purse. There is also a great mesh netting large pocket that hangs from the caddy down the back side of the stroller that zips up in the middle. It's perfect for those smaller bags that you have to store while shopping in the mall or at outlets, etc. There is a smaller mesh pocket next to the removable pouch, that could fit the average sized cell phone. This is my second stroller caddy for this stroller, and THIS one by far is working out much better than the first. more storage and the fact that it holds large cups and water bottles securely is a huge benefit to those that use running/jogging strollers.  I love this product! Very glad I found it!

This is a Great coffee . It is the same or better and
A lot cheeper than the ones at coffee house.

Because I enjoy a large mug of robust, fresh coffee to begin my day at home, I usually freshly-grind my 100% Colombian arabica beans immediately before brewing my morning pot. However, when I travel in my RV, I don't take my burr grinder with me. Therefore I try to duplicate the fresh-ground taste with pre-ground coffee while on the road. I have been successful with only one other brand, which is pricey, so I decided to give Community Coffee a try.

That this coffee is produced from 100% arabica beans in Louisiana was, in my opinion, a good start. My brews of this coffee have given me similar robust flavor as I get from my beans without bitterness or what I deem to be an \\"acidy\\" taste from Starbucks coffee. The advertised cost per pound of this coffee from Amazon is similar to what I pay for my coffee beans, but less than I've been paying for another brand of pre-ground coffee that I've been brewing.

The reason that I've given this coffee only four stars is that, to get the same strength I usually enjoy, I must use a rounded coffee scoop (nearly two tablespoons) to get the same strength that I get from my other brand with a level scoop. Apparently recognizing this strength issue, the producer of this coffee recommends using two tablespoons to brew each six-ounce cup. Although I haven't done the precise math, it would seem that having to use more ground coffee to get the same results negates some of the price advantage that this coffee offers over the more expensive coffee I've been using.

Nonetheless, after making adjustments for strength, I've been able to brew some very tasty, satisfying cups of coffee with this brand. If you choose to try this coffee, you may wish to experiment with the amount that you use to achieve maximum satisfaction.

The gate looks nice and installation was pretty easy, however, it does not have auto shut door, and the design could have been improved for easier closing of the gate manually. You have to have 2 hands to do it, and with a baby...well, that's not easy.  Whomever designed the gate portion has never had to multi-task apparently.
They taste very good,but I wanted they for baking a pretzel treat. After they were in the oven for 90 seconds and cooled,they turned white. Still tasted good but not pleasant to look at.

The tea is very flavorful, smooth, not bitter and I like the hent of orange.  Highly reccommend you order some.  I will be purchasing two bags on my next order - drink several cups a day without getting tired of the great taiste.

I love PG Tips and have found it hard to buy them locally.  I happy to find them available via amazon.  I received them in a timely manner and I am stocked for a couple of months.  I will be buying more in the future.

You wont regret having this organizer for strollers that are lacking one.  It keeps my phone, my keys, my water and credit cards all secure so I don't have to lug my purse plus giant diaper bag around in the stroller.

Don't try drinking this without mixing in with a good coffee, especially if you're not used to the taste of Chicory coffee.
Mix with a basic good coffee and the ratio is a case of trial and error, which may not be worth the effort.
I don't see the need to use this in addition to regular coffee grounds if you buy a decent coffee to begin with.

Not bad, just not what I expected. Very earthy, I enjoy a good cup of coffee and was hoping this would be of better quality but it wasn't. Awesome name though so it does get props there.

Apple Cinnamon Cheerios Cereal, 12.9 Ounce (365g) (Pack of 4), by General Mills Cereals.
The Apple Cinnamon Cheerios have been around since 1988, and make a nice change in taste from the regular Cheerios, where after a week or two of having them at breakfast, you feel like you are eating bland pieces of cardboard. The only thing that I don't like, is that the Apple Cinnamon Cheerios have 10 grams of sugar, versus the 1 gram of sugar in regular Cheerios. That makes them too sweet for me to snack on, but I do like the apple and cinnamon taste. Processed foods in general contain far too much salt and sugar, and are having a negative impact on our overall health.

We are very happy with this playard! It is very sturdy and appears like it will last through many kids. The mattress seems comfortable and it is easy to put together.

This is by far the best RRL tea ever. Traditional Medicinals uses the best herbs and this particular tea helps me very much. Not only that, but it tastes good, too. I drink three cups a day and don't have to add anything to it. This is an excellent product and I order it through the Subscribe & Save service and I really do save a bundle! Each box only turns out to be like $3 and change. In the store they are $5.65 each. I absolutely love this product!

This tea is never bitter ( cheap bad teas are ) > Clear clean taste....beautiful balance of delicate jasmine overtones....not too flowery. Just a real high quality product. Great ICED! This brand is the best and I am a 35 year veteran of teas.

I thought this was a great product for the price--nicely constructed. My one complaint is that my dog quickly learned how to open the gate. If you pull on the gate, the pressure mount is released and the door easily opens. I am going to try to install the additional wall brackets to see if it makes it more effective.

Where do I start... lets just say if they made one big enough I'd use it.  First and foremost it's amazingly secrure when used on wood or leather(pretty good on fabric, it's like a suction-cup, it ain't going to budge.  It's nice and cushy, which usally means it would not be that durable, however this(actually our older one we've had for years, but this is the same material) can take anything the kids can throw at it...Magic Marker: no problem, wipes right off - Forks:bounce off even with the meanest of tikes - Fluids(even the nastiest): shed right off, won't absorb fluids(or the scents that come with some of them).  I've used everything from diaper wipes to bleach(I haven't found any normal household cleaner that could damage it so far), whatever my preference at the time may be.  Very light, we take it with us where ever we go(even on the beach as they can sit on it while playing with the sand to substantially reduce sand in the bum), just throw it in the back of the vehicle.  And the price is good too!  Enjoy!

The product is exactly what it claims to be - a portable crib sheet in t-shirt material.  The fit is quite tight and when you place it on the mattress that comes with the Delta Portable Crib, it is too tight and prevents the mattress from lying flat.  We replaced the Delta 1\\" mattress with the 2\\" L.A. Baby Portable Crib mattress and the sheet works great.
Was curious as I love everything gingerbread, so I ordered.  It's OK, but will never reorder.  Easy to fix, but...
Easy to stuff in a diaper bag for on the go. And, dries very quickly if hand washed & hung above the sink once home.
Didn't like it at all.  Kind of flimsy and cheap feeling, and hard to put the seat up and down.  Also our 7 month grandson hated being in it.  We returned it and went with a Graco.
Keeps my girls extra warm in cold temperatures. Great buy! I even got one for my sis it was that great.
very smooth and good, glad it tastes similar to a medium roast versus a light roast.

I love this sleepsack. I use it every day and night. Whenever I put the baby in it she automatically knows it's time for nap or sleep. Get a bigger size than what you need. Our baby used a medium size from 3 month and she is very comfortable in it. I got this velboa one instead of cotton or fleece based on the reviews. But I've seen the fleece one in the store and it looked not as nice. So I really recommend the velboa ones.

I am editing my review three months later. I still love this sleep sack and so does my baby girl. All I wish is they make X-large ones with this velboa materia.

Exactly as advertised - easy to install and delivers a customizable spray that varies from a trickle to a really forceful blast. The nozzle openings are aligned so that the streams roughly converge (at least at higher spray settings), and this focused power is great for cleaning off dirty diapers. Convenient hanging mount for wall or toilet tank keeps the sprayer out of the way but handy.

Be careful, though, the strongest setting is REALLY strong. Probably a bit much for a close-quarters cleaning job...
Great system for keeping the kiddos out!  Sturdy and pretty easy to put in if you have even a little bit of handyman knowledge.
This was very nice for an Easter gift for my grandson, who is an infant, and my daughter and son-in-law liked it, too.

I was looking for toys that could help my baby develop her motor skills. This toy has it all. She spends long periods of time with it and puts on a big smile when I bring it to her. She is able to use her fingers and hands to spin the different parts and loves to shake it and bite it. It has it all. Highly recommended.

There are so many colors of this Disco Dust, I was having a hard time deciding which to get...especially at this price. Given the recipe for these unique cookies, I wasn't sure if the colors of the dough would swallow up the effect. I wanted to add a teenie tiny sparkle to the top of the Wilton's Sparkle Gel. Here's a warning: Don't let your kids handle this stuff! Take the tiniest amount possible between your fingers and gently dust it over the top of your subject, letting only a fraction of the dust settle. It gives a great little sparkle...but it's an insignificant amount so there's no texture or flavor.
This was our little one's first favorite toy. Very helpful during changing time, kept him happy and busy.

This review is about a year after the fact but I purchased this for a family vacation. Each couple was responsible for a meal and I wanted something unique so bison burgers it was. I was careful while grilling to be sure they didn't get dried out. I used a pound of grass fed 85/15 beef to four pounds of bison as well to help prevent drying out. The only seasoning I used - none. I let the flavor of the meat do its thing. Nobody in our group had ever had bison and everyone was raving about how good it was.

I used a pound in a batch of chili and it was just as good in there. Another pound was mixed with a pound of fresh bratwurst to make bison brat burgers. Quite excellent. The bison brat combo was made a year after my original purchase. It didn't have any freezer burn or anything, even after being stored for that long.

It was packed well for shipping (shipped during July and all was still frozen when received.). The price is about the best I've found on Amazon and the quality is good as well. I don't have anything to compare to as far as other brands being better but this was so good I likely won't bother trying another seller.

It works well and is cheap, which is nice.  It is also nice that it is so compact.  Be careful though.  It hooks onto the stroller but can be easily hit off.  We left it on our stroller when left the stroller at the gate at the airport and when we reached our destination it was gone.  I am guessing it fell off during all of moving it probably did under the plan or in transition.

I bought these for my 2 1/2 year old daughter to wear. Her brother is having an UNO themed first bday, and she will be wearing the WILD card outfit. These match perfectly with her red tutu skirt! Very cute. Perfect size to wear as leg Warmers for 36in tall toddler.

We received the Wide Opening Genie as a gift.  It was a pain in the neck right from the start.  The refills were a pain to figure out and we ended up wasting a large amount of the refill trying to get it working properly.(Now that we know how to use it, it is easy to work.)  The refills are expensive and you end up paying a fortune to keep the Genie in \\"working\\" condition. My son is two months old and fills the diaper Genie up in a day or two. I can't imagine how quickly it will fill up when his diapers are bigger. In my opinion it would be nice if it were a bit bigger. I think a diaper pail that uses regular bags would be much easier to take to the trash than the stupid sausage.  THIS WHOLE SYSTEM IS A PAIN!!  The smell is ok and hasn't been a problem, but then again his diapers don't smell yet!  I would definitely check into other diaper pail options before wasting your money on this system.

We love these noodles. I have three kids, ages 11' 7' & 4,and all like these noodles with anything or nothing on them. They are prefered over corn and rice pastas. Bonus is how fast and easy they cook up with just a hot water soak. Subscribe and save makes for a good price too.
As grandparents in need of a quick and safe car seat over the holidays this seat was perfect. For one thing we were able to install it easily  we r please to have it for future visits

This sparkling juice is really good. I am trying my best to quit drinking soda so I subscribed to this . No one in the town I live in carries it anyway! It is JUST juice and sparkling water! That's all! It's good for me and gives me that fizzy I am so addicted to. I get the apple and it tastes JUST like a sweet green apple! Not at all sour. I LOVE it so much I ordered 2 cases of it! I no longer drink Dr Pepper all day every day
My favorite tea, hands-down!  I start every morning with a cup of Awake and take packages of it with me when I travel.

they do smell a bit fishy but they do not taste like that. These are yummy not too salty and really delicious I bought these for the first time and am really pleased. The bag was kind of small though I guess I was expecting more but still I would purchase again!
I loved all of these - great sample variety  - I looked forward to a new flavor every day.

One of the best Inventions for mom and child!  I'm an \\"old\\" mom and \\"new\\" mom.  I have an 18 yr old and a now 3 yr old.  I found this gem approximately 16 years ago for my first son at the Right Start Store. (back then they had stores in the mall)  He potty trained early but had a small bladder.  This saved me from running to all the bathrooms anywhere we may be at the time.  I also used to have to pull over when driving so he could potty.  It really saved my little guy from peeing his pants and being ashamed or embarrassed for something that wasn't his fault.  It's small enough to fit in the stroller basket and it has 2 pockets for storage. (gallon zip lock baggies & wipes)  After each use, I wipe the potty clean and throw all the waste away.  I SEARCHED for this and was soooo happy they still sold this somewhere!  Thank you Amazon!  GREAT PRODUCT!!  PLEASE don't ever stop selling this!

First of all, I LOVE the taste of Cafe Bustello coffees.  I am diabetic, so when I saw the cappuccino  at my local Torino's supermarket in New Rochelle, NY, I decided to try it,  I liked it so much, I would buy a box every time I went shopping.  Then Torino's stopped restocking the sugar free style. I spoke to several people at the store.  They never got it back.  I enjoy a cup or two in the afternoons about 3:00 for a pick me up.  It tastes like a rich dessert,  When I saw Bustello's online, I decided to order it that way.  Thank you for the availability of on line ordering.  I never have to miss  my cappuccino!

These taste great and look very cool. I scored big time by getting a fresh case at Marshalls for $15.00! I was over them in pretty short order due to the overabundance that I purchased.
Still they are delicious. Don't expect Jelly Belly bean texture and, unlike other Jelly Belly products, they do not taste like actual peas and carrots, but rather apple and orange. They are more like candy corn or pumpkin consistency.
CHOKING HAZARD - The back wheel is held on with a wooden dowel and a 1 year old was able to remove the wheel and dowel.  The dowel is about 1.5" long.
It was all right and perfect, ir came to Panama On time and perfectly packaged

The Online Candy Shop was awesome because the candy was not only fresh, but packaged with care as well. The shipping was very fast and reliable and I did not have to wait long for the product to arrive at my door! Thank you all at the onlinecandyshop for your honesty in the item description and for providing fast and speedy shipping and fresh boxes of candy, not old and stale like other places that I have shopped at!

I was researching on this tea for a while. I've been drinking it for a while too. But as a cautious consumer, I also like to know about the potential risk factor that came along with it. Dr Weil isn't sure about the long term benefit of this tea drinking daily and he has written that there are further research to be published. Various studies published in the journal Epidemiology in 1994 concluded that drinking yerba mate regularly increased a person's risk of respiratory or digestive cancers(Lung and esophagus cancer)  by 60%. It seems like too much of everything is not good after all. They've suggested that even though it has it's benefits, it equally poses higher risk to those suffering already from diseases.  I'm gonna drink this probably once or twice a week for it's benefits.

I have ordered this item several times, and up until my last order I was always delighted.  This last box had over half damaged...i.e. Melted at one time, flat and whitish.  I was very disappointed this time.

I first got this cup about 3 years ago, when I was transitioning my son from bottle to cup.  It worked great and he loved it, but I sadly returned it when all the BPA concerns started to crop up.  Fast forward 3 years and this BPA-free version is now available -- hooray!  I got it for my daughter and she took to it like duck to water.  It doesn't leak, the handles are separate so you don't have to worry about lining the spout with the handles, and it's super easy to clean.  Love it.

I wasn't sure that I'd pay one buck for a small package of instant noodle, until I turned it into a real meal in 3 minutes! Just crack an egg after the water starts boiling, and add anything you might feel like, sometimes I throw in a few meatballs as well, veggie too. It tastes nothing like the 20 cents ramen noodle kind find in grocery stores. On a busy day, it is a quick and real meal. I'll make sure that I always have some in my pantry from now on.

they tasted excellent even for snacking once in a while.

I relied heavily on these and other variety KIND bars over the last two years in which i lost forty pounds.  A combination of these bars, Lara bars and whey protein shakes with fruit as smoothies did the trick.  A smoothie for breakfast, a few bars throughout the day and a nice dinner led to the weight loss and they have helped me keep it off for over a year.  there are too many varieties to list here but i prefer the fruit/nut combinations.  I'm not big on chocolate or peanut butter so don't take my word if you like those, especially since i didn't even bother trying them but the pistachio and blueberry/pomegranate varieties are outstanding

I love this! It clips on my BOB stroller easily and come off easy too. The only thing I would like to change is the ability to collapse the stroller with this adaptor still on. Having to take it off every time is annoying but I know I would need it for very long anyway.
Green Mountain is my favorite, although all of the k-cups I have tried have not disappointed me yet.  Rich, mild, warm and cozy.  I just love Green Mountain.
After reading all the reviews, and listening to a neighbor, I thought this was it!  It just doesn't do it for me.  I think it is too spicy for my family's taste.

Originally, I bought this size and amount, and I was extremely pleased with the taste (just like sugar with no after-taste), and I was also pleased with how long one bottle lasted.

I tried the smaller, more concentrated size, and there wasn't the same quality in it...so I re-ordered the original 1.5 oz. with the 400 servings in each bottle, and I'm just as pleased as I was when I first ordered it. GREAT STUFF!
Excellent car seat carrier for travel - enough room to add other necessities that you need for traveling with a baby.  Durable and kept our seat dry during a rainy flight!

Just like it says, they are jelly and babies. if your expecting gummy babies read the name of the product, it says jelly not gummy. if you're vegetarian or vegan be aware the jelly is bovine jelly meaning cow. you know the jelly looking stuff on roast when it cools, that's bovine jelly. perfectly safe, a bit different in taste.

I am American and had no preconceptions. "Amercan" jelly candies are neither "American" nor jelly They are based on black forest gummy candies which i believe are german. they are also gummy.
This item was great while it lasted.  5 months.  Now it won't turn on at all, even after hours of charging.

After reading a few of the one star comments, I almost didn't try this coffee. For what its worth, the MFD date on my bag of coffee was from August 2014, and I'm writing this in November - perhaps that makes a difference. Also, everyone has different tastes, for perspective I'm a fan of a thicker coffee like some from Coffee People, Starbucks and Peets, NOT a dunkin donuts coffee fan.

In any case, this is the best espresso I've had in this country. I've had the Jura Impressa E9 for years and it is hard to find a bean that is not too oily and yet has that complex taste.

I'll be buying this again and I'll update this post if I see any quality issues.

I have always used McCormick seasonings but I have not used the gourmet. I was lucky to have received a free sample of this in my FrostyVoxBox to review. My favorite Clam Chowder recipe calls for Thyme, but all I had was ground. I am always trying to perfect my recipes, and my clam chowder was pretty close, but adding McCormick Gourmet Thyme leaves pushed it to perfection!
I love this oil. I use it for oil pulling, a bit of cooking, and my skin. I can't imagine any better (and I've tried others). Other brands were not terrible, but this one is wonderful.

it is not fancy but we used it on the stroller and a baby backpack and loved it.  eventually it broke or we lost it and now we are about to buy another one for child # 2.  it's only 10 bucks, what do you expect?!  it was VERY handy.
Received in excellent condition.  The roses opened and stayed fresh for about 10 days.  We received good reviews from those who saw them.
My cousin loves K-cups and the variety pack is great because she can try out different flavors and purchase more of the ones she likes.
Very cute but cheap wood glad I only paid 9 $ for it other wise it's not worth the original price.

I LOVE this sling! I have tried almost every sling available-Bjorn, Ergo, ring slings, Maya, front carriers, and other crazy get ups. I definitely had my doubts when it came to this one. It looked so darn comfy in the pics that I had to give it a try. I admit that when I first unrolled it out of its tiny packaging, I was intimidated. I read the book, looked at the pictures and tried to mimic such positions as the \\"hug hold\\" and \\"kangaroo\\" with not much luck. This wrap was clumsy, way too long, and hard for one person to put it on. Yes, this is a positive review and I told you that I loved it so...then I figured out that because it is the perfect length and width of fabric you can make up your own positions and \\"tie\\" your baby into place however you want them! I learned this after my 2 week old DD went to sleep in an upright position on my chest. I eyed the Moby and wrapped her in place immediately. Sure, it was clumsy at first and I didn't know where to tug and tuck all of the fabric, but that was the beauty of it! The fabric has just the right amount of give and is not too slippery and is breatheable. By the third try I had Moby in my command and I have wrapped my DD to me in all sorts of crazy positions. On my chest, on my side, and even while she was breastfeeding one time. LOVE THIS WRAP!

I just had to put this review to help people like me who count on these reviews when buying big ticket items. Although this bottle isn't a big ticket item, everything is relative, and the cost for this particular bottle is waaaaaaaaaaaay overpriced. I bought it because mommies here are raving about how the baby takes to this bottle and then never needs their bottle again, and how this thing is a great way to wean the baby off of the bottle. I just don't think think so.. it wasn't my experience at all. My baby can take or leave this bottle. She's 17 mos old and would much rather have her normal bottle over this one any day. She loves the picture but you can buy a bottle for half the price with a much better picture without having to look to far. Final vote: skip this one unless you can get it for what it's worth which would be about $3- $5 tops.    Best Regards,  Dan

I am disappointed in this stroller.  I like it because its very lightweight which I wanted and the 5 point harness is great.  BUT its ugly! I have since given up on trying to latch it closed. I'll keep it since I don't need it that often and I already tossed the box, but if you're looking for a stroller, keep on looking! I didn't know what to expect when Viva sent me a free sample of their coconut sugar as I never even heard of this product. I agreed to try it because my husband is borderline diabetic so we are careful about his diet and sugar is definitely not part of it.

We've used it in oatmeal, smoothies and other dishes that called for sugar. It adds sweetness without being cloying. It's definitely a different taste but we find it very pleasant.

My husband takes his blood sugar throughout the day and there didn't seem to be much difference in his levels after using coconut sugar. We've finished the sample and have purchased additional bags. This will be in our kitchen on a regular basis from now on.
Very easy to put on bottle and take off. My husband elbowed it off the table by accident and it protected the glass bottle.

My daughter loves these!  Her eyes light up when she sees me bringing her one.  My husband like them too. I tried one and they have an energy/power bar texture to them, which I didn't care for.  She is 2 and able to eat them well.

I love this olive oil SO much.  I am addicted.  I pretty much drink it, using dipping bread or mozarella and tomatoes just as an excuse to have the oil.  I love what it does for cauliflower and Brussels sprouts as well.  I will miss this if I run out and have to buy something else!  It almost has a spicy or peppery finish, which is shocking. I received it as a shower gift. I had the same problem as everyone else. It worked great for 1 year and then stopped linking right after the warranty expired. Unless you're a fan of buying two for each child, skip this one.

I received a free pump in style by Medela from my insurance.  It was great until I realized that I needed something to take on my trip to Europe.  I decided to purchase a manual breast pump to make it easier to pump while in the airport, the plane and on train rides.  I have to say that I was pleasantly surprised!  I prefer this pump to the electric because A. it's actually very quick, 5 minutes to fill 4 oz after let down and B. it's less painful than an electric since I get to control it with my hand.  The only thing I would recommend is that you buy two so that you don't have to wash the parts when on long trips where you may need to pump more than once.  And also the O ring is more expensive to replace than the actual pump and isn't very strong.  Otherwise do yourself a favor and buy 2 of these and have a life!  Enjoy the beach!

I have been buying from this particular company for quite a few years, and their products are delicious & always arrive promptly. My favorite is the crabapple, which no one else seems to carry, so I am very pleased that they have it. Definitely worth trying!

I'm sure Littlelife had every intention to be kind to toddlers by preventing parents from overloading them. From that standpoint, this pack fits its billing.

The dimensions listed (9 x 7 x 2 inches) are mostly accurate, except that the pack is slightly hump shaped, so the two-inch interior depth tapers down towards the top.

For an 14 to 18 month old who wants to help, this pack would be perfect: padded \\"just right\\" on the straps and back, quality materials and durable construction to survive a little rough handling and dragging, plus the leash...

However, for our 34 inch tall, 30 pound, not-quite 2Â½ year-old, it was obviously too small as soon as we opened the package.

What will the Littlelife hold? We were hoping he could carry his knit nap blanket in it, but it's necessary to literally stuff it in (the blanket is about 2x3 feet). Two or three board books, or a small lunch, or a hat and a pullover all are about the ideal sized load. And actually, that's not bad for day-tripping. But is it smaller than a bread box? Definitely -- it's too small to hold an average sized loaf of bread (cut me some slack -- trying to think of some common frame of reference).

I'll next try a [[ASIN:B004N8C0RG Wildkin Pack 'n Snack Backpack]], which has roughly twice the capacity. Undecided if the Littlelife will stick around (possibly in anticipation of our youngest son using it once he's of the right age and ability), or if it's going back. I definitely like everything about this Littlelife except for the capacity.

I ordered this necklace after a friend recommended it to me. I couldn't be happier. I had bought an orange looking one previously but lost it and replaced it with the one I ordered from here. The natural colors are more appealing and look so good with all the outfits my baby wears. Shipping was honestly so fast it's unreal. I ordered and got the product within a few days....during Christmas season. Absolutely pleased. No complaints!

Quality-build & easy installation, it's s smart design, much better than I expected and have seen from other manufacturers. I recommend them for child-proofing any rooms where items are stored that little kids shouldn't touch. I was so impressed, I bought another 16 after the first 8 locks purchased. The vendor offered them at a reasonable price. I'm sure they could be broken, but the arms are tough plastic. When installing don't use a drill bit too large for the screws, otherwise they won't fasten securely. By adjusting the mounting screw tightness, they can either rotate easily or require firm pressure to move. The detent notches in the mounting hardware locks the arms in position - a nice touch. On drawers, I find them a little annoying when folded to unlocking position, as you usually can't fold them pointing down, unless your drawer is virtually empty or a deep drawer. For cabinet doors, they are excellent.

It is hard to tell from the picture but this table is short.  My daughter is average height for a one year old and she has to hunch over to play with the toys.  On the activity table side there is a rolly ball, a gear that turns and moves balls in a circle, a shape sorter with 3 shapes, a sliding monkey, a switch that makes a roller spin, a small flip book, and a phone.  The phone is about the only toy my daughter is interested in.  I only has 3 sounds, all LOUD and there is no volume control.  We have not played with the gear side very much but we noticed that the gears do not stay in place very well when you try to spin them. Also, this activity table comes with a lot of pieces and there is not a good place to store them, especially when the activity table side is up and the gear side is down.

Not sure why but the bag always feels wet on the outside. It hasnt leaked or gotten on anything else that I know of so far, but i cant tell if it is actually wet or not when the wipes are in them. Its very odd. They are the perfect size for wipes though.

I'm an alkaline water hunter :) real and natural (nothing added) alkaline water tastes good and helps relief some stomach problems. I checked out lot of brands, and they actually fail acidity simple test PH strip shows the same under my tap water. I've heard this morning on the radio about this water....looked up online... and everything looked good on their blog except \\"Evamor's great taste comes from the alkaline rich mineral blend infused in the water.\\" INFUSED into the water....why would I buy it??? I can just get this \\"infusion\\" and add to my regular water.....

I used to live in the place rich in lime soil and i know how the alkaline water tastes. Evian and san benedettto are only two brands I found int he States that taste good and ph is about 7-8...do not know if they add something to water thought...

The duckies are awesome, really. But when I bought it, in June, it was advertised as if there wouldn't be so many of the same duck... What a disappointment! There came a few different \\"collections\\" (or categories?), which I think are of ten or so, and sometimes there are NINE of the same duck. So not cool. I would rather have bought the collections separately, and have paid a bit more, so I'd have them how I wanted it at first place. Having 2 or 3 the same in each collection is one thing, having NINE out of 10 is... Really? So, for my daughter's b-day, it was a success. Everyone loved it. For our collection, not so much. Ok, my collention. My little one loves them anyway. Hehe. Still, depending on what you expect from it, it's pretty cool.

This product is very disappointing. It is designed so badly that it barely rocks. The two bottom wooden pieces that are curved for the purpose of rocking do not serve their purpose. Instead, they create a lot of noise during attempts to rock it and come to a halt within 3-5 rocking movements.

When I was stationed in Germany many years ago we discovered these brandy filled cherries; and even though I am not a fan of chocolate covered cherries, these were wonderful. It was mainly because they were not the cloying sweet cheery candy that one finds most of the time - the brandy took care of that.

Our paycheck was not very big then, but we usually got one box a payday and ate them for a treat - holding them upside down , biting off the bottom to form a cup, savoring the chocolate and then eating the rest... what memories these bring back and still worth every penny or Pfennig as the case may be.

My almost 19 month old does great with this set.  The fork works really well for him and the lip on the plate really does help him scoop up the food.  He's not that great with the spoon, but that's just him.  We got him 2!  He was very excited when the box came and played with them on the floor right away pretending to eat.

I've used this carrier for both kids and have no complaints. It's really soft  and I sure comfortable for them.  Since they were just a couple months old, this has been in use almlost daily. Its held up really well. Adults like wearing it too!

I don't use the Dr. Brown bottles, but I needed an in-between nipple for my 3-month-old.  I use the Playtex VentAire bottles and nipples.  It was taking forever to get through 6 ounces with the slow-flow nipple, and the fast-flow nearly choked him.  This level 2 nipple is just perfect and fits any standard bottle and ring.  Definitely recommend if your baby is in that in-between stage.

Sprout fasttt...grows amazingg....no bacteria at ALL...and I check w food grade h2o2. I will alwaysss buy from todds seeds..always. No wasted seed..I swear all mine sprout..even other seeds I get from them..great sprout rate. Veryyy happy!
I purchased these for a friend. He said they we're very fresh and enjoyed them very much. I would purchase these again.
This books are great, our 4 month daughter loves them and really plays with them a lot. It's a must!!!!!!!
FULL of worms and no list of mushrooms on the page. Contain shitakis which I'm allergic to. Wouldn't take back.

My review is based on my own experiences and because of that, I rate it 5 stars. However if you are looking to purchase this item, then take into consideration my review before you pull the trigger.

According to my research, I had a choice between Solo & Ekobrew. At the time of purchase, I saw that the Ekobrew seemed more favorable and that is the reason for my purchase. Now that I actually own two of these and have used them, I am going to stick with this brand just because I'm used to it. If you really want to know the differences, you can scroll down to some of the helpful reviews and that would dissect the differences between Ekobrew & Solo.

The obvious advantages to this product are that it reduces waste and it saves money. But with those advantages aside, I purchased it mainly so we (my wife and I) could use up our supply of ground coffee that haven't been used for several months. You see, we used to have a traditional coffee maker but I don't drink coffee that often and my wife only drinks 1 cup in the morning. Since we got a Keurig for our wedding, those bags haven't seen the light of day. Yes I know you can scoop/brew a certain amount and store the rest away but since having had Keurig, that has become too much of a hassle. The Keurig has introduced laziness to our daily routine.

With the Ekobrew, you reintroduce \\"work\\" to your coffee routine (measuring, filling, emptying, rinsing) but it's much less effort than that of traditional coffee machine. In fact, once you get the hang of it, it really doesn't add but a couple minutes to your morning coffee routine. Plus it at least gives us a reason to use up those bags of coffee (especially the ones we got from the Dominican Republic during our honeymoon) and save us money.

With that, I recommend this product.

I suppose I should have figured this bar would be crunchy considering this is the Nut Delight variety but I didn't expect this much crunch! Crunch factor similar to Gobstopper hard candy (I think it is the syrup that holds the nuts together that makes it so hard). There was also a type of nut that is included in the mix that I did not care for, (not sure which one). If you like exotic nuts and are looking for a snack that is super crunchy than this is for you. Unfortunately, it did not suit me. On the up side, it is a good source of protein and antioxidents.

Bought as a gift for a new mama friend.  Her comments so far have been all positive so it appears to be working well for her infant!  I had the Ergo with my son and absolutely LOVED it because it distributes the weight so well, so anything that makes the Ergo usable earlier, YAY!
Love it so much! You can't beat it for the price. We've had it for several years and have never had issues with mold. We have two now!
The flowers arrived timely...they lasted a long time...receiver loved them..one down side was not able to provide a card and the receiver was very surprised because they weren't signed.

These suckers taste GREAT... but after opening the wrappers, the 'last inch' is nothing but a thin sheet of candy like it was a bubble with nothing on the inside but air. Also, some other suckers have had the top inch cut off accidentally. I could tell this company (which sold it to me), got them at a reduced price because we only get about 3/4 of a sucker and there are 24 suckers in each box.
I love the taste of these suckers so in the past I've bought boxes from other companies and have never had this happen before. (as far as the product being under weight)
the SD slot works, but the usb doesn't:( which it was the main reason why i bought so im a bit dissapointed..
These are half size bags. The popcorn is good but due to the small size it's about double the price

These little gummies should be made with little horns on their heads. These bears look so sweet and innocent, yet they have an evil side which is equivalent to eating 100 EXLAX tablets!

To be quite honest, I read the reviews, and after reading about someone else needing a seatbelt because they gave you so much gas, or about the guy that said to eat these and go on a long road trip if you want to break up with your girlfriend, I had to try them!! :) The guy that mentions NAPALM, I have to say is exaggerating a little bit. He must've had a few Jalapeño's, or some Mexican food before eating these, because they don't put off any heat at all. They do however do everything else others say they do!

I really purchased these bad boys to give to a few CHOICE "Friends", and some fellow Co-workers!! I handed these little guys out like they grew from a tree! I made sure not to give them any more than 15. If you give someone a handful of 30 or more, they may eat only 5 or 10 of them, and save the rest for later. If you give them 15, they are practically guaranteed to eat all 15! So, after handing them out, I sat down at my desk and waited!! ;) These little devils got hold of my co-workers after 45 minutes to an hour and a half, and I have to tell you, I've never had so much fun at work before! There are 5 restrooms in my entire building. There are about 60 people in the building. 1 co-ed restroom, and 2 male/ 2 female restrooms. There was a line of people using the restrooms, even after the guys decided that it was ok to use the female restrooms for EMERGENCY use only!!

BELIEVE ME, THIS WAS AN EMERGENCY!!

My Boss decided he couldn't wait in line, and took off at 10:00 for an early lunch, just so he could use a restroom I think! Let me just say, we have flexible lunch schedules, although we typically limit them to about an hour. He didn't come back until 2:30, and he was not happy! He asked me what I gave him, and I told him that I had just received the package from Amazon (I showed him the box), I showed him that they were Sugar Free Gummy Bears! I asked him if he liked them. He said he thought he had a bad reaction to them, but I told him I doubted it, since I ate several myself, and nothing happened. (((I hadn't eaten ANY - Im so EVIL!!!)) I was in for it though, after he talked to several other people that had the same reaction! They all came into my office at the same time, and confronted me about the gummy bear incident! I thought for sure they were going to shove a handful down my throat to see if I had the same reaction, but gladly they didn't!! I have to say I was a bit worried! They all came to the same conclusion, that the gummies were evil, and that they needed to be destroyed!! They took them from me, (even after some pleading from me) and destroyed them! By destroying them, I mean of course that they flushed them down the toilet, to send them to the horrible place that had just claimed 4 days worth of bowel movements from each person!!!

So, after going through only about 10% of a 1 lb bag, I have to say it was worth every bit!! Needless to say, I have now ordered a 5 lb bag, so I can give them to my "Choice" friends, (seeing as I wasn't quite able to distribute them after the first incident) and post another fun bit in the 5 lb section! :)

If you are looking to eat these as treats, take my word for it and just buy the regular sugar gummies. A few cavities wont hurt as bad as these little devils will! If you want to put the HURT on to a couple of "Choice" people, by all means, these are the gummies for you!! :)

I got these as a replacement item when the Lucky I ordered was out of stock. They arrived quickly, in great condition and taste pretty good. I would have liked the filling to be as thick as the surrounding cookies (individual cookies not both together), but they're still very pleasant and I would definitely get them again.
So much more comfortable for my grandson than the  rubber pants I used on my kids.
Can't beat the price.  My son likes the latex nipples, these fit the similac nipples perfectly. I haven't had any problems with leaking.
Love, love, love these! My go to, out the door breakfast when headed to the gym! Enough protein and nutrients to get me through an hour workout! Perfect and super easy!
My 20 month old has started using a pacifier, since the new baby was born. She loves these the best!

My son, daughter in law, and grandson were flying to my house. I quickly needed baby equipment. This high chair is stable, easy to put together, and folds for storage. My grandson was very happy. It's stored now but will be getting more use over the years.
Fits great over our Colgate Classic I foam crib mattress, but still needs a little more padding for my purposes.  Haven't had an accident on it yet, so I can't rate how waterproof it is.

I purchased this monitor about a year ago after reading good reviews here and deciding it was the best for our budget. It has been a great monitor. The picture is very clear, infrared works well and the sound is good. The beeping noise it makes when out of signal or charge is really loud and can be annoying, but I always hear it (which I guess is the point). It's simple to operate and has no unnecessary bells and whistles.

About two weeks ago I started having issues with the battery not charging. The connector for the charging cable seemed faulty so I replaced that, but the unit still wouldn't hold a charge. I contacted customer service through email and received a reply back in less than 24 hours. They had me run a few tests, then offered to replace my unit (even though it was a couple of weeks out of warranty). The response time was great and the customer service representatives were very friendly and helpful. I have a new unit now that is working great and plan to buy another camera for baby #2 in the coming months.

Thanks, Infant Optics, for a great product and great service.

After thoroughly researching our baby monitor options, we selected the Infant Optics DXR-8 based on features, price, and customer service reviews. The monitor works great- I like the different zoom lens options, night-vision and temperature reading. We have the camera mounted on the wall, and it works out great. The motor in the camera is quiet, and you can pan around the room without waking the baby. We have no complaints about the reception capability, as we have a big house with tall ceilings, and we are able to get reception in the baby's room when on the lower level of the opposite side of the house. Occasionally we will lose reception, but it is rare, brief and not unique to the Infant Optics monitor- as it occurs with a back-up monitor system we have as well. We had a small issue with the port in which the monitor gets plugged into for charging, and in less than a week the issue was resolved and we were good to go. The customer service for this product is fantastic, and that trumps all of its other features. So many monitors out there have similar features and capabilities, but what you really need is a company that will stand by their product in the event that something happens, especially for how much video monitoring systems cost. The Infant Optics customer service is responsive and effective, and seems genuinely concerned about the satisfaction of their customers. I would definitely purchase this monitor again, and would recommend it to others.  UPDATE: This baby monitor is made extremely poorly. Typically I don't bother to edit reviews, but the exasperation I have felt from dealing with one faulty monitor after another, along with seemingly confusing correspondences from the company (which makes me wonder if they are actually reading my emails and concerns), I feel compelled to edit this review. We have had to replace our monitor 3 times (thanks to an extended warranty provided by the company), because the port that plugs the monitor into the charger keeps breaking. Yes, it is nice the company would replace it, but our first one broke after months of using it. I suspect the company knows how poorly made these things are.  The monitor indeed has some nice features, but no amount of features can make up for the time, return costs, and hassle that comes with constantly replacing the monitor because it can't withstand daily use. We have since purchased a new monitor from a different manufacturer, and when you take into account the $219 we spent on this monitor in April, 2014, that's $500+ in baby monitors alone. If you have that kind of money, time and energy to waste with a monitor, than this monitor is for you. If you don't, then chose something else.

This product was delivered in a timely manner.  My whole family enjoy this product - both taste and texture are very good.  The only reason I have not given the hot dog buns 5 stars is that one pack has gone mouldy - several months prior to the exparation date and within a sealed pack!  A review of packaging perhaps?

Blue Agave sweetner is a very good product that is easy to use in place of most sugars.  We purchased a 6 pack and shared it with our friends and they have also enjoyed using it.  It is a product recommended to replace sugar usage for cancer patients.  It was delivered quickly and I would recommend it for anyone needing a sugar replacement.
Reversible for gender, easy to apply and safe for the baby. I would recommend these to anyone! Great appearance and safe!

This is a fantastic product, I just ordered my second tub.  The seeds smell very fresh and keep well.  The protein is primarily edestin, which is a native protein to the human being and is the ideal protein for anti-body and immunoglobulin production.  There are also no enzyme inhibitors on shelled cannabis which makes it very easily digestible.  Also,  the fat content is literally a perfect source of essential fats, with the same ratio of fats as are found in our brain!  Of course they are short chain omega 3 fatty acids, as with all vegetarian fair, however the human body produces the enzyme delta-9 desaturase which transform them into long chain fatty acids, like those found in fish.  It is this process of the human being developing the long chain fats that Rudolf Steiner hints at as being one of the real spiritual reasons to consume vegetarian foods, is that our body becomes a factory for certain fats, which has a certain alchemical effect within the individual.       I thought it would take me awhile to go through these but I finished the tub within 2 weeks.  Excellent to sprinkle on salads, steamed veggies, base in smoothies, additive to yogurts and oatmeals, mixed with potatoes, pretty much mix it with anything.    I was showing the tub off to one of my friends who eats more of a mainstream diet and I put it up to her nose to smell it and she said it smelled like dirt - it really sort of does, it smells great.  It is very earthy and almost bitter in taste, however it is very mild when mixed with other things.  The seeds have a robust character of tremendous value to the human species, anyone committed to the development and future of humanity would be wise to befriend and defend this plant of nearly unequivocal value to the human species.    Hopefully there will be hemp farms in America soon - If we had eyes to see this food would be a staple in all hosptials, schools, and other major food institutions.  The plant is easy to grow and extremely useful in a multitude of ways.  Word to the wise: Keep your eye on hemp.

The Large on my two year old fits fine around the waist, however leaves horrible red marks on his thighs from the elastic and this kid is far from chubby.  It balloons out so much in the front I turned it around thinking I had it on backwards, but nope.  Is it possible for something to be too large and too small?  Looks like a shower cap with leg holes.  Not sure why it's designed to poof as it doesn't seem to add to efficiency.  Doesn't hold much, so if he releases his entire bladder before getting to the potty it's not just wet, but his pants are, too.  He has a hard time pulling them up and down because of the design and how tight the leg holes are.  I would NOT recommend them,.

I love that this product protects against UVA and UVB rays. It has only the good stuff like zinc oxide and none of the bad stuff that has been known to cause cancer. I feel safe using this on my whole family and I know it is protecting while not harming our skin!

I was looking for an organizer for a while as the Uppababy one seems to get poor reviews.  This one ended up being absolutely great with my Vista.  It's pretty deep, so any containers are very secure and don't tip/spill over.  The velcro cover in the middle makes the random items like keys, phone, cash easily accessible.  The organizer also collapses, allowing me to folder the stroller with no issue.  Overall, a great organizer!
Excellent sauce, fairly hot with a strong tabasco taste but not vinegary like Tabasco brand sauce.  I recommend as a refreshing alternative to Tabasco.

This is mostly very fine salt. I use a salt grinder if I want salt, I don't want fine salt. I was hoping this was more herbs than salt. Nope, it is just overpriced salt. With all the rave reviews I was expecting more. It was completely overprice and a total waste of $$. Wish I lived close to all those here that love it, I'd give it to them.
Just used this as a finishing touch on the gumbo - yum! And as a person of few words I know I have to write 20.
Would not recommend if you like coffee flavor. Very sweet and little coffee taste. What is there is bitter. Would not buy again.
This product should not be branded V8 it has less then 10% juice, does not contain a serving of fruits or vegetables. It's basically un-carbonated high fructose water.

One of the reasons this liquid smoke is so good is that it has no added fillers or coloring.  Read the label on Stubbs or Colgin.  They contain molasses and spices and other stuff.  This just waters down the smoke flavor.  You end up needing to use less of Cedarhouse because you are getting more smoke flavor in each drop.  I had to come to Amazon and order online because, here in the deep south of Columbus GA I could not find a single store selling pure liquid smoke.
I love receiving this product every month. It tastes wonderful. i use it as my main snack food. Receiving it each month is wonderful. It saves me some shopping. Thanks!

Sure you can just eat them, they are terrific.
So good in fact just imagine them chopped a bit and used as chips in cookies , or melted ever so in pot de creme.
Superb chocolate flavor, you deserve these. Lol

Removing the plastic piece at the bottom to extend the gate is impossible.  It's so tight that your flat head will break the plastic apart.  Just terrible.  Then there's a maximum distance that it'll travel before you have no leverage left to try to pull it out and it's too tight for just your fingers to remove.

I received so many wonderful gifts from my baby shower that when my little Sarah arrived I didnâ€™t have to purchase anything. One of my friends gave me a state of the art baby tub that I love and my other girlfriend gave me this cute Lilax Baby Bath Sponge that make my experience bathing my little Sarah a joy. After using them I had to search online to purchase more. When I found them I had to leave a review. These are so cute and easy to use. I love pampering my little Sarah and these help me do that during bath time. Nice Baby Gift.
A friend had gotten this tea and recommended it, she was right. It is delicious and refreshing... Amazing taste.  I would recommend it for all tea lovers out there.
So little peanut butter on them you can't even taste it above the overly-salty crackers.  Maybe I got a stale pack, but any other brand of these I've had was 100x better.
my granddaughter sleeps really good on this new mattress and it fits nicely into the crib and crib sheets fit nicely

After the 3rd bowl my toddlers have destroyed I wised up and decided to buy something that is more durable.  I haven't noticed any deficiencies with this product.  I haven't microwaved anything in this for very long, but so far it seems not to have developed any cracking or white film which would indicate an inferior product.  It is also constructed just right for a toddler to handle without tipping over by accident.  My kids have small appetites so it's not too small.  If your child eats a lot it might be a bit small.  It fits about 5 ounces of food comfortably.

Great product. I put a tablespoon or so in every smoothie I make to add a bit of nutritional value to them. The flavor is plesant, a little on the earthy side, but very subtle and enjoyable enough for me to reuse over and over.
Highly recommended!

Had needed some kind of extra beds that didn't take up a lot of space.  Wanted something that was comfortable too.  We bought two of these for our grandkids to use when they spent the night. These were perfect.  I like how the fitted sheet can be secured to the bottom and also the sides which keeps them on the mattress.

This is my favorite cereal, it's so delicious.     Pros:    It's delicious, full of whole grains, no preservatives or artificial sweeteners, it has fiber and Omega-3.    Cons:    Too sweet and expensive.

I use a lot of cinnamon both for the taste and for the health benefits and this is the first time I have tried true cinnamon. The flavor is far and away superior to even the Vietnamese cinnamon I have been using. I use about a teaspoon full in power shakes along with frozen bananas, frozen blueberries, vanilla protein powder and oat milk in my Magic Bullet. Amazing dessert or meal replacement. Recently I bought stainless steel popsicle molds and pour the frozen power shake in them to make awesome pops. I also use cinnamon in my macro reds and greens drinks for added flavor and benefit. Not to mention in banana oat sesame seed cookies! Thank you for this amazing product.
the way they come won't work in a Keurig but you can use a Keurig top (i tape one on each cup i use and the next and the next......

I registered for and received this as a shower gift.  I thought it would be great.  However, I could not get a clear picture.  Mind you, I was not looking for crystal clear, but clear enough to see my son.  I returned this and bought the Safety 1st monitor.  We had the same problems with that one.  I believe we have too much interference in our home.  My husband is very big into electronics and we have 4 cordless phones.  Although a wonderful idea, this one just didn't work out for us.

While this is a great coffee and flavor (I buy it regularly), you're actually paying more here than at Walmart.
The shipping eats up any discount you would have seen. Highly disappointed. Heading back to Wally-world.
Very thick and durable. They fit my 2 mo old now and will for some time. Great price on these as well.

These are awful in the Gerber Nuk Sippy cup/bottles. They are nothing like the clear silicone ones that come with the cups/bottles. They don't wash well, the paint chips off in kids mouth, they pull right out if the lid through the top while my daughter is drinking them, the opening in spout leaks horribly and tears easily. My advice...don't waste your money. It will actually be cheaper to just repurchase the entire cup/bottle with clear silicone spout for $7 each than to buy these because you will be lucky if they last 2 days.

Our coffee table is low and it is made out of stone. The edges are super thick even this does not cover the edges from top to bottom. But only about an inch. left over so not awful. Our table also does NOT HAVE SQUARE edges ours looks like the corners have been cut off. Its beautiful but made looking for edge guards hard. This worked out for us perfect. Since we kept it all in once piece and simple wrapped it around our table. We needed two to go completely around our table with a few inches to spar in the back but since its up against the wall this was not a problem. It is super padded. Our son will stand holding onto the table and bite the edges since thats where his mouth is. I tried it just to make sure he would not feel any hard edges and I did not feel anything. Its so soft and he has yet to cry when hes hit head on it , many many times.! Like other people have said the double stick tape is joke. So when you order this just go to store and buy some heavy duty tape yourself and you will be fine. You will not regret this purchase I promise. If you have an oddshape table, strange edges or the girth of your table is thick this is for you.! all of those other products seem to be for those skinny glass tables or something! THIS IS THE PERFECT PRODUCT

Update! We've had this for a few weeks and I had to duct tape it to our table it looks awful but my son kept pulling it down since the double sided tape it comes with us a. Joke . He chipped his two front teeth in our table when he pulled it down. So duct tape it is. . Its still a great product. I have yet to find an edge fairs like this with tape that's actually sticks. So that's a given when you buy baby bumpers the tape will not stick!

We were introduced to these chips when traveling on Southwest Airlines. I was surprised by their pleasant crunch, but both my husband and I found them a bit too salty. Actually it was nice on the plane, given that we were in a bumpy situation, but for home consumption, these are salty like potato chips, not like crackers.

I do suggest buying these locally so that you don't have to pay for shipping. Would be nice with a ranch dressing for dipping, particularly for a party.
Very cute rattle, except for the fact I'm not really sure what to expect from organic stuff made in chinaâ€¦?

I put these in my shakes (chia seeds, hemp seeds, banana, dates, rolled oats, almond milk, matcha) - great price!  I've tried soaking them in juice too for 20 minutes and it gets a nice jelly like texture.  Very filling!

Both grandsons learned early on to take the lids off other snack cups. I take care of them 50 hours a week, and this little cup with the twist on lid has saved many a mess! I wish it had a closed snap on cover for keeping snacks fresh and carrying in a diaper bag.
We will be ordering more of these.

This is a great bowl for baby food. It's got three division so you can give your baby variety in foods. We also got one with two slots, but find that we often give her three foods at a time, so prefer this dish. We feed her from it still, she doesn't use it, so I can't comment on the training rim. If you wash it right away and don't microwave to high temps it cleans out well, though if you make a mistake and overheat carrots, say, it can stain the plastic, which dropped it a half star for me. Otherwise, it cleans up easily and you can use it for low temp microwave heating no problem (I like 20 seconds at power level 40%).

I also don't really like the icons showing meat and veggy and some attempt to tell me what a "balanced meal" should look like based on the partition sizes however. I wish they'd just left the sections blank and let me decide what to feed the baby and in what proportions. I dropped them a half star for this as well. I prefer simplicity and don't want to have to see the little chicken icon every time I feed the baby vegetables in that slot. That said, the three sizes are useful since there's probably one item you will have more of as the main meal, then two side dishes for variety. We will do a meal like puree salmon, peas, and applesauce. Our bowl with only two slots makes this much harder since you end up putting peas next to applesauce in one partition and it all mixes up.
too bitter too hard to get open not very crunchie would not suggest any one buy again very disappointed in this product
Does the job, but a little annoying to put together.  it could be a little more plush.  make the strapping process easier.  took longer than putting the crib together.
I like to drinks this instead of coffee and it keeps me awake about the same. I like my coffee but the side effects I don't care for.
This is the only brand pacifier my nephew will take so I'd say he loves them! The only downfall is that a pacifier clip will not attach to them; at least not that we've found.
Very pleased with this, inflated easily and not a problem deflating it.  Liked that it had side rails.. My granddaughter loved her bed!

I really like this concept in coffee. That is, smaller roasts so beans arrive frensher. I was alittle worried in that this was a bigger bag but it stayed good to last drop: if i can borrow that phrase.

Pretty rattle, my daughter likes to look at it and hit it repeatedly, but it's too difficult for her to hold on to. Also, this only works if your baby is teething in the very front, it's impossible for them to chew on it with their side/back teeth/gums.
These are great for EVERYTHING, we keep a pack in the car, in the diaper bag, in every purse, in the kitchen, the bathroom, the dining room...etc.

I give it three stars because my wife and her friends love it. I think the chocolate flavor is way too overpowering. If I brew it again I'll probably cut the chocolate flavor in half.
Jasper's gets 5 stars for customer service. My order got lost in the mail and they shipped out a replacement right away. I love all the other beers I brewed from them.
Great product. Tastes like sugar but is healthy for you. Great customer service. Fast delivery.

I haven't used this with my new baby yet (as he's not expected for 3.5 more months), but I can already say I like it a lot more than the regular cotton cover I used for my Boppy pillow when my 2 year old was an infant. It is so soft and plush and I can't wait to use it for nursing. I ordered the \\"blue\\" and its a very nice soft blue (a little on the aqua side, but I'd still call it light blue), perfect for a little boy. I'm very happy I decided to spend a few more dollars on a velour cover instead of another plain cotton one.
we've been looking for disney babies to decorate our nursery.  This is a wonderful set.  Shipping was very fast and good quality!

We got these for our baby at around 10 months since our bath mat didn't quite go to the edges of the tub and she would try to stand and almost fall in those areas if we weren't there to grab her.

She thinks these are the best bath toys! She pulls them right up at the beginning of every bath and now uses them as bath "appliques" for the side of the tub. She loves to pull them off and on. I've tried to buy the Boon bath appliques that are intended for this purpose and she likes those, but still pulls up her little whales from the bottom of the tub. I'm still glad I got these all rubber, non-PVC tiny mats. By the way, they are about 5" by 3" each. Hopefully she'll start to lose interest in pulling these up soon.
I really like this backpack and its very cute. Its big enough to use as a diaper bag as well.

K*I*D*S Relief (pain and fever) was a wonderful find! I really didn't know what to expect before purchasing; However being a Naturopathic Medicine Doctor, I am always looking for products that truly work as well as recommend to my patients. I believe the best way to recommend something to others is to first use it yourself. Well, not only did I use it on myself, before using it on my children, but I also gave it to my husband for headache relief and I gave him a little more than prescribed on the bottle. It worked great without causing sluggishness or sleepiness. I gave it to my kids as directed and it still gave fast relief.
One of my favorite baby products.  Its pretty heavy so its hard for baby to move, and no more toddler accidentally throwing this off the table.

I bought this carrier for the moderate-very cold winters in Philadelphia. It fit our carrier perfectly and seems to be high quality. I like that it's not overly padded since I can control my baby's temperature based on what kind of blanket I put inside with him. We have used this in autumn with no blanket beneath and when it got bitterly cold I put a more substantial blanket inside. If you live in a frozen tundra you may want a heftier cover, but this should really do well for most moderate-very cold winter climates.

The fabric does not look cheap to me (as another reviewer mentioned). I really like the color scheme and the plaid detail. I also love that the flap velcros both closed and open. I have had many people ask where I got it since using it.

This works well for us and doesn't cost a ridiculous amount. Perfect!

This is cleverly designed infant seat that attaches to the table and does not require a chair. It is simple to set up, and easy to fold and store in its own bag for carrying. When it's attached to a table, it is sturdy and allow the sitting infant to be close enought to be fed from the table.

It requires a sturdy table (rounded or square)and that the child be able to sit easily and meet the weght requirements. Within those parameters, this is a very useful piece of travel or eating out furniture.
I buy a lot of sugar free products, I loved these candies, very fruity flavor you would never know they are sugar free!

This hammock seems to hold an endless amount of stuffed animals from the teeny tiny bears to larger ones. Looks cute in the corner of the room and I like that it bends, isn't stiff so it really sits like a hammock.

Cons:

The con kills me because I bought this for introducing solid foods and for frozen soft food and breast milk (for teething purposes) but neither fit in this. So I can out frozen peas in there or small miniature chunks of ice. It's not that practical in all reality. I wouldn't buy it again.

I recently sailed on Queen Mary 2 and was served these delicious biscuits, which a Scottish passenger told me are McVitti's Digestives.  They are like shortbread with a graham cracker flavor.  Unfortunately they were shipped without packing protection and several were broken, but I still love them!
I love my Keurig single cup brewer.  I am always trying new k-cups.  So far, I'd have to say that this is my favorite.  Great coffee, one of the best!!!

I thought coconut oil was the awful smelling stuff in sun tanning oil. Wow, was I wrong! This oil smells wonderful and I recommend it to everyone. I'm sure it's great in food but I can attest that it is heavenly on the skin.
Fabulous kit for labeling stuff for daycare.  I put the bottle labels on my sons Pura Kiki silicone bottle covers and they stay on great.

I purchased an old caste iron baking dish, 1920 Krispy Korn Kobs, and it bakes 7 corn cobs at one time. This cornbread is very light and easy to eat. Usually I eat two or three as I am taking them out of the caste baking dish. One box of Buckeye Cornbread will bake 2 batches of corn cobs or 7 each. I used to share them with neighbors and friends but not so much any more. They are that good. My recent purchase of a case of 20 ounce boxes is my third case in about one year. You can't go wrong.
This was a waste of money. It doesn't fit on a water bottle that well and it has no ventilation so you have to unscrew the lid every time your little one takes a drink. Point-less..

Everyone makes a distinction between the odor control needed for babies before and after transitioning to solid food. Our baby is four months old, so we'll have to update this in about six more months.

So far, it works fine. I wash a load of cloth diapers every day and a half or so and we have a re-usable liner in this that we wash with the diapers. There isn't any locking mechanism, so if you have curious toddlers that may be a challenge.
I like the convenience of having this as a juice box. It's nice to have them for lunch boxes or car trips.
It's very cute. Holds about 4 diapers. No issues with leaking. The zipper works perfectly. Overall pretty happy with this wetbag.

A great and easy way to add a punch of protein to almost anything. I was expecting something like sunflower seeds and this is more like a couscous texture so it really won't work as a nibbling snack but sprinkled in a salad or added to a smoothie its great. I'm a believer!

I gave this product a 4 out of 5. Honestly, it was the some of the best chocolate I've ever tasted. I didn't give it a 5 out of 5 because it was melted when I got it and I couldn't read the ingredients and after eating it my eye starting swelling and I had a lump in my throat but overall this is some pretty good chocolate I'd recommend it to anyone who wants a unique tasting chocolate that melts in their mouth. :)

I have tried different types and brands of curry powder in cooking various dishes such as rice, veggies and Indian cuisine.
So, far The Spice Hunter has been the best of all the brands I've tried.

What makes this brand superb is that to get a quality curry flavor. I don't have to use half a jar to taste the curry, nor are the spices
too strong.

Furthermore, I also like that it is salt-free, which enhances the curry flavor instead of tasting salt.
For those of you who like a saltier taste, this probably isn't the brand for you, unless you want to add salt youself.

For me, this curry is perfect for my taste and at a reasonable price as well.

What would I do without these?! These live on our changing table as an extra line of defense against poop and pee explosions. They are soft, easy to clean, and just perfect. When my son was younger we used them in his crib as an extra line of defense as well. It was great to just be able to pull it out of the crib after an accident in the middle of the night. No harm done to the crib and no need to change his sheet at 4 AM! Woo-hoo! I highly recommend these!

They look pretty in the picture but when you get them at home they are not the same I don't recommend them

totally addicting and i should'nt buy anymore because they are not going on top of any salads or soups....just in my mouth from the bag.
delicious

We had this same SleepSack in Small for our daughter and when she outgrew it we immediately bought the same thing in a larger size.  We alternate between this one and a couple of other styles.  They hold up well and keep our baby warm.  I've bought this for baby shower gifts too.  Great buy!
Nice, thick splat mat that's easy to wipe clean. I have Fisher-Price Spacesaver highchairs strapped into two dining chairs, and I can put the two dining chairs side-by-side on one of these mats.

Love all the different compartments.  Easy to keep things organized.  Also love the stroller straps.  Only downfall would be that it could be slightly wider in the main compartment.  The main compartment is tall but not very wide.

When I was little, my grandfather always made me braunschweiger sandwiches with this mustard.  When I tried to make braunschweiger sandwiches myself, they were never as good.  I just revisited Heinz Spicy Brown mustard and it's exactly what all my sandwiches have been missing!  I thought brown mustard was losing its appeal to me over the years, and I'd leave it off kielbasa and other sandwiches, but trying this one again made me realize the other mustards just aren't as good.  Pap-pap spoiled me :D.

I have been using this cushion for two months. I had seen another mom using it, and I thought it was a great idea. After using it for a while, I wish that I had shopped around and tested other cushions. I think an item like this is a good idea, and I like mine when it's positioned correctly.

As other reviewers have mentioned, the cushion rotates so that the side without cushioning is on the top, so it requires constant repositioning. If in the correct position, it does have enough cushion to help aleviate the arm pain from carrying the carseat, but it seems that it is more likely to be rotated the wrong way, meaning that the cushion is unusable unless you reposition it. A note on repositioning: I find that trying to rotate it back is only marginally effective, and usually I end up undoing the velcro and fastening it correctly again, only for it to rotate back to the wrong way after carrying the carseat from the house to the car. (Yes, it has these little gripper dots on the inside that supposedly grip the carseat handle and try to prevent rotation, but they don't really work.) The rotating is just frustrating!
Bright colors and love that it has different patterns on the rings. The rings do have a small hole on them, so water could get in the ring in the tub.

I'm glad Steel City mustard is still being produced. I always liked Heinz Spicy Brown mustard and it is a very good mustard but Steel City mustard seems to go beyond Heinz's excellent taste by having just the right ingredients in perfect proportion to fully accentuate but not overshadow the taste of what Steel City mustard is applied to.

This was a great purchase for us! It is perfect for our family. We don't really have the room to set up a high chair in our dining room, but we have a big enough table to add this onto. It is light and easy to assemble. I was able to mainly do it without directions (I did have to check one thing). And it is sturdier than I gave it credit for. baby girl bounces around and I don't worry one bit. She sits at the table with us this way, & she seems to like that set up as opposed to being off to the side. We like it too. And the "cushion" comes out to wash so that helps a lot as well.

My only complaint, although small, is that this wasn't necessarily made for tables that have that nice sized decorative under lip like ours does, so it was a bit of a effort to set up to get the arms underneath that lip so ut sets up correctly. But it really only added a couple of minutes, nothing major.

Overall I am quite pleased with this purchase.

UPDATE: After over quite literally a year of daily use, I can easily say I am very pleased with this chair's performance. The padded inner lining has not made the final cut, however, as it has given out. BUT, that took several washes in order to finally be put out of commission, and the baby is quite comfortable in the chair at mealtimes without it, so it was no huge loss overall. My little girl is getting bigger now, and is reaching the point in toddlerhood where a booster seat is more in order. That is the only reason we will be taking this down. So, if you need an extra seat to take with you, this is most definitely the one, because it more than passed the test
