I bought this for my baby before she was born. The newborn sling was pretty good for a while however it had to be on the biggest fitting for the sling to fix to the other end of the tub and then when I placed my baby in the sling her back rested against the wedge at the bottom of the tub.. I was happy with the sling for a short while but then my baby squirmed too much for it and was half out of it most of the time. I decided to take the insert out and just use the infant position for my baby. However she wriggles and ends up with the wedge at the bottom of the ramp sticking into her back. If  your baby stays completely still for their bath then great but one little kick and my baby's bottom is no longer in the dip where it should be. I have to continually scoot her up to a sitting position so she doesn't hurt her back. Yes the newborn sling is a help but the rest of the tub is useless. Very disappointed.

But then I started craving something sweet and nothing was around so I took another piece and amazingly, this time, I got hook. I realized that the first time I had it, the thing was "half frozen" during transit since it was snowy in my city, but if you left it melt a bit, the chocolate will blend into the cookies and the coffee will be a lot softer. they taste like a those Nestle Crunch bars. Turned out GREAT for the "construction" themed bday cake.
I purchased these when my son was around 3-4 months and wasn't quite great at holding the bottle on his own yet. They worked perfectly with the Dr. Browns bottles that we were using at the time.
My son and I both enjoy this tea as our first cup in the morning.  It is not so strong as other teas and has a smooth flavor.  I add milk or cream.
It's hard to go wrong w/ pretzels and cheese :)  The kids at camp enjoyed them.

I am a very picky eater & to find something I truly enjoy is rare. Eat Natural bars was one of those rare finds in Lodon I was hooked on it on the first bite.  The bars are all natural and very filling. I can honestly say i enjoy eating it more then a candy bar.

I tried finding a sell by or expiration date, but couldn't find one on any of the packages.  I tried using the lowest temperature I could.  I tried allowing the popcorn to release steam when it was done popping and transferred to my popcorn bowl.  I've never had to work to help popcorn come out crispy and fluffy. After using this I will never go back to the bulb aspirator again. This aspirator has great suction and it's not dangerous to the children. That was one of my concerns it being attached to a vaccum and having incredible suction that it would harm the kids.  But it's actually regulated that it has suction power but in no way will it harm the kids. Already have a few of my friends who will be ordering this. I give this 10 star if possible.

The dried pears are the best of the dried fruits.  I couldn't find an expiration date, but they taste good.  The box was heavier than I expected, so be prepared to share because it make take some time to finish these off by yourself.
Best value for those of you using cloth diapers. I flush these with no problems.

I fell in love with Garrett's cheese popcorn over the summer and have since been looking for any reasonably-priced gourmet alternative that might be similar in taste. The first thing you should know is that Mike's tastes absolutely nothing like Garrett's.

It may not have been what I was looking for but it's unfair to judge it for what it isn't, so how does it stack up objectively? Well for starters, I disagree with the occasional claim that it has no flavor- on the contrary, I felt that the flavor was sharp and strong. In fact, that's the main reason why it's not the popcorn for me. One of the reviews mentioned an overpowering coconut taste, and it's true that coconut is the first ingredient. I'm not sure if that's quite what I thought I was tasting, but whatever it was is definitely the main flavor. The popcorn is cheesy, definitely orange finger cheesy, but it doesn't quite TASTE like cheese. The other ingredients come together to create something of an exotic kind of tangy flavor that I wasn't expecting and didn't find altogether pleasant.

The bag was tightly sealed and the popcorn itself was fresh and crisp, and there wasn't an overabundance of hulls or crumbs. The quality seems perfectly fine, I just couldn't finish the bag because of the strong flavor. If you've ever been to an inexpensive grocery store and grabbed a relatively unknown brand of air-popped cheese popcorn then you're probably familiar with the weird \\"cheddar but not really cheddar\\" taste- that's the first thing that this reminded me of.

The popcorn doesn't taste bad, it just doesn't have the creamy cheddary flavor that I look for in a gourmet cheese popcorn. Try it if you're an open-minded popcorn fan in the mood for something a little different.

Pros:

Pocket is very effective at picking up food
Dries quickly
Can unsnap pocket to make a long bib
Large chest cover, so you great greater coverage than a round bit

Cons:

Something about the texture of this cereal... once it's in the milk, it quickly becomes so soggy and mushy that it feels and looks like cat food. it is also very lacking in taste- it's VERY slightly sweetened and lacks the toasted aroma of other \\"honey toasted' cereal.  Granted, this product is probably a lot healthier.  I wish I liked it since I bought the Costco pack... and I usually LOVE other the other Kashi products (go lean crunch, energy bars), but unfortunately this cereal is not one of their best.
My son wasn't a big fan of getting anything sucked out of his nose but this worked much better than what the hospital gave us to use. It's easy to clean.

I saw that this company is with Amazon Prime. Thought I would take a chance and try the candy. This is soooooooooo yummy. I do not want to share, but will have to. These are very helpful for small babies.  Especially babies that can't hold their head up on their own or when they fall asleep. fast shipping and great product thank you very much and I hope to place an order with you again soon.

This soup had a strange, gritty texture in my mouth, like when you get a mouthful of sea water, and it left an unappetizing residue at the bottom of the bowl.  It also came out darker than most mulligatawny I've had in the past, with a bitter ingredient I didn't recognize, a flavor that lingered in my mouth, and not in a good way.  I can't say I hated this soup, it was palatable, but I won't go out and pick up another pack any time soon.
We purchased this as a gift for some friends on the birth of their newborn. They really like it and it does what it does. Nothing earth shattering. But it is really cute!

I liked the simplicity of this thermometer compared to the other gadgets, but, it is nearly impossible to keep the water temp to a tenth of a degree, so as a result, the thermometer always says that the water is too hot or too cold.  A range of degrees would be better.  The product itself seemed durable and easy to store and clean, but, it was no help at all in telling me if the water temp was ok for my baby.  Pass!

This stuff is really good quality. My wife has tachycardia and chicory root made in a coffee pot is really really good for that. Through the years we've bought various different kinds of chicory root and the USDA organic Frontier is really good stuff. While all chicory root helps her condition, not all has the same texture and taste quality. This stuff is good.
This stuff was a big hit as a Christmas gift!  Anyone who likes spicy bread in sandwiches will love this stuff!!
Bought this for a daycare and the infants love it. I love that it has it's own jumping pad underneath so their feet don't get dirty or cold from the floor. The toys are very engaging.

I am a self-confessed bread lover but I have never tried and Gluten-free alternatives, so naturally I was curious how they compare.

For the record, I am not on a gluten-free or Paleo diet, but that didn't stop me from buying a variety of gluten-free 'Paleo' food to satisfy my curiosity regarding the taste. And this intriguing loaf was one of my choices.

The loaf looks like a perfectly normal loaf of bread, and as an added bonus, is low in carbohydraytes, which is useful if you eat a lot of bread like me.

I wasted no time in smearing two slices with strawberry jam for a simple test sandwich. And to my delight, it was delicious! Of course it lacks a certain flavour that only 'real' bread can provide, but I would even go as far as saying that this bread is better than some normal bread complete with gluten.

The only minor niggle for me is that you must store the bread a the fridge (unlike normal bread) otherwise it will go stale at record speed.

For people on a Gluten free diet real wheat bread is out of the question. But this loaf is a perfect alternative, you can use it for sandwiches and toast while still sticking to a strict Paleo or gluten-free regimen. But for a regular bread-eater like myself this is actually pretty tasty.

I would recommend that you ignore the overly-negative reviews and try it for yourself, you will most likely be pleasantly surprised!

We hated the bar looking window covers but knew we needed SOMETHING since we were moving to a second floor apartment.  This was perfect!  Easy to install, easy to open, totally worth it.  Highly recommend for peace of mind!
This is one of my favorite cereals and I'm very happy that Amazon offers it!

My son loves this book!  I got it for him when he was about 5 months old and he still loves it at 1 year.  I change the pictures of him in it every few weeks and he loves to look at the "babies".  He's recognizing  the pictures now and thinks it's great.  It's fun and entertaining for all  ages.  Highly recommended toy!
My husband is a meat lover of any kind. So we tried this one. He loves it, so I just ordered more.

Very happy with this product.  Britax has the best Latch connectors out there.  I didn't have a problem tightening it as previous reviews mentioned.  Very comfortable car seat, my son loves it and feels like a \\"big boy\\".

Baby has spent a lot of time in this seat and is very happy. Held him in place and kept him supported starting at around 2 months, and we still use it now at 7 months. We did cut the strap off as it seems useless (I would never use this on any kind of elevated surface and don't see why he needs to be strapped in while on the floor) and I'd rather not have stray straps flapping around my baby's play area as a general safety precaution.

Overall we like it. However, do you know the feeling of a feather pillow when the quills kinda poke out and it itches? Yeah, that's the back of this chair. I use it for breastfeeding so I've got my bare skin on it and it makes my back itch. We're going to put a thick cover on it. : /
I do like this gum HOWEVER it could have been a whole lot better !!! I'm getting the bacon gum next but that's going to be around christmas time

I saw this mirror in my friends car and asked her about it.  She said it was the best kind. Bought for my best friend.  They just had twins.  Both parents love it.  They can't imagine life without it.

I generally dislike flavored coffee since it tends to have a weird aftertaste or artificial smell or flavor. This one was remarkably smooth and had no weird aftertastes. I bought this as a gift for my 2 year old daughter and she loves it.  She really loves the Bachyardigans and the size of the dishes are perfect for her.  I also love that the plate has two separate sections since kids are really fussy and often don't like their food touching other food.
The peanuts were overly salted. Could not taste the almonds for the salt. Should've been dark chocolate but was more like milk chocolate. Was disappointed because the reviews were so positive .
WAY overpriced for what you are getting. Not the highest quality.  However, it does the job of at least holding a few water bottles and my keys on my citi mini double stroller.

I really like the idea and the pumping part works great. I pump directly into the bags with the medals adapters. Bags go straight into the freezer - no transferring into bags later. However my son will not take the Kiinde nipples. I've tried slow and medium and he just can't get a good latch. We ended up using the Tommie tippee adapter to use those nipples -- which seems to be working OK.

What can I add that hasn't already been said? It is something to get accustomed to but once you have this powerful stuff in a little can for over a week, it'll be hard to go back to those over caffeinated \\"energy\\" drinks. Well worth the money you pay and much more healthier for you as well.   If you don't have the time or patience to brew your own tea, this is one of the greatest drinks for those on the go.    If you do have time to brew, I recommend buying the 100 pack Matcha green tea box from Costco, it is from ItoEn as well.    If you feel that its too bitter, try it with some pellegrino or perrier mixed with lemon or whatever fruit you like to add that splash of flavor.     You won't regret purchasing unless you are those people that got some dented cans in their case.    Enjoy and cheers!

It makes great coffee, but using this filter can burn you.    The directions tell you to pour hot water in the top, then reach in with your fingers and unscrew the (now) boiling hot metal plate.  Other models have a slot so you can use a screwdriver.  The best don't use screws at all.  Try finding one of them before you buy this one.

Love this!  I've got 9 month old twins.  I'm looking for another soother as good as this one, so I can swap them from one crib to another (just to keep it interesting for them), but so far can't find one that does what this does.   I like that the music is soothing, not loud or annoying like some other toys.  The colored panels behind each animal light up as the music plays (again, not too bright or fast).  When the babies were younger, they drawn to just watch it and listen.  Now that they are much more active, they really enjoy playing with the interactive parts of the animals.  The lions mane rotates, the monkey slides up and down, the gator clicks back and forth, and the ball in the flower spins with small balls inside.  They have yet to get bored with it, and it entertains them if they are not quite ready to sleep, or just woke up and are looking for something to do.  Now that they can sit, they enjoy playing with it from a new angle/height where they can more easily reach the animals.    The only thing I would change is to have the piano keys play individual notes.  You can hit them individually, but this just starts the music and lights.  I would also like to see a setting that plays a longer run of music.  As it is, though, it is long enough to get them relaxed, and now they can hit it to start it again if they want.  Overall, I still give it 5 stars, especially considering the price!    I like some of the other soothers out there, but they are not interactive like this one.  Too bad, as it would be a simple thing to just add some moving parts to what are otherwise really neat toys to watch and listen to.       For now, one twin gets this toy, and the other gets a cute mirror and whatever other toys I dangle from the rail.  If anyone knows of another as good as this one, let me know!
Cutest leggings! Always getting compliments. My girl is 4 months and she has been wearing for awhile.  They fit great and I think they will for quite some time. Happy with these!

Trish Kowalski

OMG....I love this sucker!!! I saw the snotsucker and read the reviews and said what the heck..lets give it a try. Im sooo glad that I did...this little sucker gets everything out! I never in my wildest dreams thought that I would enjoy sucking out my baby's boogies out by suctioning with my mouth :0 but you dont get any boggies in your mouth and it ACTUALLY WORKS!!!!!! I will be recomending this to all my mommy friends! LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT!!!!!

After doing a lot of research I found that there aren't a lot of reviews out there for this stroller so I thought I would help in explaining how wonderful this stroller is! :)    We had a chance to use our stroller for the first time this past weekend.  I have to say that I am VERY impressed with the maneuverability, style, and the look of this stroller.  It was very easy to assemble; it literally took 5 mins.  It did take a few try's to close it but once you figure it out it's a cinch!  Keep in mind that when it does close it is still bulky (very similar to your standard stroller - definitely not your umbrella stroller) so those with small cars this might not be the stroller for you.  We have an SUV so we don't mind.  The basket on this stroller is HUGE and is easy to access from either side regardless of how the seat facing, has a very nice cup holder and the canopy is absolutely amazing.  You can't get any bigger than this to shield your baby from the wind, rain, etc.  Yes, there is no \\"parent tray\\" on this stroller but there is a pocket on the back of the seat so you can store your keys, phone or whatever and it's out of the way.  I am so glad we got this to replace our Chicco stroller (which we absolutely hate).  Once our baby was able to sit up we didn't like that we couldn't see and interact with her; with the Mia Moda you have the option and that is a BIG + for us.  There is nothing bad I can say about this stroller.  Overall, we are very glad we bought this stroller and would recommend to anyone!    PS: the video that someone provided as a review is awesome!  I had already used that to base my decision as to whether or not to buy.  Great video :)

These things are great. My 2.5 year old loves helping by turning the lights on are off. I would return them and get a new set, but my kid would freak out if we took down the two we've already put up.

I'd love to figure out how to get more screws!
this was a gift for a couple whos daughter has so much toys in the tub you can hardly see the bottom. I thought this would help and it has .

I was really disappointed with this tea as there was something about the taste I could not tolerate. I don't add sugar or milk to my teas because I believe it depletes the benefits of the tea. So I let my daughter try and she had almost the same response I did. Then I asked my son and surprisingly, he loved it. He finished the whole tin. So I guess it depends on your sense of taste. I gave 5 stars on his behalf. It's really healthy so it's worth a try. If you don't like it, someone you know might!

I received my kit in the post yesterday and immediately began cooking the Boba. The tea powders are delicious but there isn't nearly enough of any of the products in the kits. The kits says it's enough for 30+ drinks. Well, it's absolutely NOT! The powders can MAYBE make 15 drinks and the Boba can accommodate 7 if your very stingy with the Boba I made 3 drinks and the Boba is half gone already. I was hoping this would be a cost effective way get my bubble tea fix but if I keep this up I'll be paying FAR more than if I went to the store regularly. Do NOT believe that this is enough to make 30+ drinks. Also, the kit comes with 5 cups, 5 lids and 5 Boba straws. For a kit this expencive I would have expected better quality cups and straws. I will need to wash the cheap plastic cups and straws if I want to continue with this kits. It's just not feasible. I will not be buying this kit again. Doing the math, I now realize that buying the ingredients separately from a different vender is a FAR better way to go. The only reason it got 2 stars is because the powders are delicious and everything came undamaged and in a relatively appropriate time. Also, I never received a tracking number at any point which I wasn't a fan of.  I just feel misled and ripped off.
Yes, it does get thicker as it sits unless you drink it right away.  The liquid congeals as it cools,  My husband does not finish his coffee for this reason.
Very cute! It looks like a very well made set! Everyone at the shower loved it! I would recommend it to anyone looking for a nice cute set!
It became an essential instrument in caring for the twins. Would not have made it through the first 9 months without it!

I has the raspberry hibiscus at a restaurant one night and had to buy it. Saw this selection and figured I'd give it a try. I love them all, except for the lemon ginger, but just because I don't like ginger. They are great both hot and cold.

Been using  for about 6 months and still in good shape.  Better yet, the back of my car seats have no marks from little feet.  If fussy about looks, the strap does show in the front passenger seat, but does not interfere with anyone sitting there.

I love this newborn starter kit! It has all the things a new mom will need and would make for an excellent shower gift. The bottles and accessories are well made and the blue is a really pretty shade.
This thing is awesome when it works right.  When it isn't in the mood, it spins slowly when mixing formula.  Great at frothing up a drink though!!
Yes, I mean sweet. It is good when drinking coffee, but for eating alone it's kinda too sweet for me.

Best crisps I've ever had. A delicious flavor and one taste you will enjoy. First tried them from vending machine, passed them around for everyone to try and got the same results. A must try! Only found the best deal on Amazon.

We really like this ketchup.  I live in Oregon and a local chain of restaurants serve it.  It has a good flavor but is not as smooth as something like heinz.  It's still very good though and does not taste like nasty school cafeteria ketchup even though it has a similar texture.  Also it's in a glass bottle unlike a lot of other organic ketchups which come in plastic.  Tomato acid can leech the chemicals out of the plastic and into the ketchup.  So the glass is nice, has a large opening so the ketchup easily pours too.

Not at all bad for the price. BUT, for my family of 4 - one of whom is an 8 year old girl - I need to use 2 boxes. That kind of whittles away on the savings. Easier and cheaper to buy Mac n Cheese and add your meat to that.
Just a step above the standard caramel flavor.  I find that it is not as available locally as the other flavors.

this makes a great food jar that keeps food warm for hours. However, I think its a bit too pricey for its purpose.
