Haven't had the chance to transition it into a bib, I'll update the rating and review then.
My kids really enjoy playing with these bubbles.  They are well-made, colorful, and clever.  They stick to the tub without being too sticky for a kid to pull back off.
This item description is incorrect: the boon grass is 9.5x9.5 inches not 13.5x11 inches as stated!
This brush set is very useful.  There are times when you need to get into those hard to reach nooks and crannies.  This is the brush set.

This is my first protein powder I ever bought when I started working out. I mix it with a banana and soy milk,the smoothie turns out delicious,but holy smoke,it makes me gassy!!!! I need to open the window or to burn a scented candle. Thank goodness my husband is out of town right now because I would be really embarrassed around him! Don't know what I am going to do once he is back...At first I didn't even know what was causing this issue till I decided to read some feedbacks. I have only had that smoothie for 2 days in a row,so I still have a damn full jar left. I guess,I will see if taking some activated charcoal can help....crossing fingers.

Was not expensive, but the time wasted baking was not worth it. Boooooo!..... they were hella stale, not at all as advertised, tasted like they were chemically treated. And FYI, their disclaimer notes that they've been 'steam sanitized' or something. So you get just mild a flavor. If you want your muffins not to taste like poppy seeds, and to just have those little specks for decorations, then go ahead buy 'em! Trust me, they're washed and treated, (not to mention pre-cooked and dried again!), no matter how they describe it. No nutrition. Waste of time + money.
I am delighted with this classic Baby Spoon. It will be my new go-to baby present.

I used this liner in my Baby Jogger city elite. I had had issues with my daughter just being completely drenched in sweat (along with the seat back) before using this product. This fixed it. She now rides comfortably. I'm not sure it's needed here in Georgia but it was perfect for our trips to Disney. It really helped fight off the Florida humidity.

Usually you have to go to a store you trust to bins you know are replenished regularly to find the good stuff. This product  takes the guesswork out of getting fresh tasting dry fruit. The fruits were all remarkably moist and all tasted as they should have. The apricot, instead of the radioactive orange of the supermarket stuff, is brown, as it should be when dried and was my favorite out of the pack. The fig was lovely as well. Great snack!

I loved this product. I usually get it a the supermarket and it cost quite a lot. But I got it from here the 3lbs bag, it saws cost effective and of great quality.
Very moist. I froze them into little packs and ate it for weeks. Have ordered it twice and I am thinking in subscribing to it.

I love this juice and know that the benefits are due to its purity and lack of unnecessary processing.  It is a bit pricey but how can one put a price-tag on disease prevention?  Cranberry is great not only for urinary tract health but also for dental and gum health.  As far as I'm concerned, the less I have to see of the doctor, the better!

I have purchased several other American Baby Company products in the past year and have been pleased with the quality. So I was very disappointed to open the package and find such a skimpy piece of material. Sure, the price is a \\"value\\" but you get what you pay for I suppose. Still, I thought I could look past the cheapness of the fabric if the sheet fit the mattress. Wrong. I have to fight to put this sheet on the [[ASIN:B004JU0H7I Dream On Me 3\\" Foam Playard Mattress, White]] because the tight elastic makes the side seams pull up over the length of the mattress, causing it to bow in the middle. It's just not worth the hassle.

Yet all is not lost. I found a new purpose for these sheets - changing table pad covers! They fit like a glove on the [[ASIN:B001U9OUYC Summer Infant Contoured Changing Pad]]. Here's to silver linings.
I highly recommend this for your first bonsai tree, all you need is in this kit.
Yummy goodness all wrapped up in a package. Best cocoa powder I have ever tasted. So rich and smooth, especially in hot cocoa! You won't be sorry with your purchase of any Rodelle products.
The aroma made it smell so yummy, but as soon as it was in my mouth it made me gag. So gross!

Works great with Spectra Pump. Very adjustable. Literally would be one size fits most. (Both sides velcro onto a large strip in the back.) Mine came with the middle zip-in part for the more well-endowed.
This is a nice mix of coffee and I love the extra strong blends for those mornings you need a little extra kick!
I love a very strong coffee, but dislike any trace of bitterness. This coffee has a very delicious, smooth flavor. I highly recommend for any true coffee lover.

Easy to install, easy to use.  Keeps little ones inside, keeps the bad guys outside.  I have installed this on my daughters doors and my mothers and on my daughters girlfriends house and apartment doors.  It has made every one of them feel more secure.  I would recommend these Door Gaurdians to every one.  ( Note install them above shoulder height and or below the door handle, it will make it harder for any potential intruder to put leverage on the door to break in.) Measure carefully. Dry fit them in the closed position so that the rubber door protector just closes on the door.  Carefully mark with a pencil the best fit location.  Open the door, place the Gaurdian in the jamb. Mark the holes that you are going to fasten it with.  Grab an drill and bore an 1/8\\" pilot hole for each screw about 1\\" in depth.  (The screws are about 3 1/2\\" long and you dont want to try to hand twist these screws in.  You could split the wood if the wood is old hardwoods.)  Also the screws are thick heavy duty and your wrist may not be that strong. Once they are installed you will sleep better at night.
The elastic on the sheet stays in place and the color hasn't faded in many washings.  The cotton is thick and I'm happy with the purchase.

This is by far the best gluten free gravy brand I have tried!  I have used this one as well as the mushroom blend.  Both cook up quickly and taste great!  I was surprised at how nicely this thickened up when compared to a leading brand packet of "normal" gravy.  Buying in bulk through amazon surly saves quite a bit as well.

nothing against the seller, it was quick shipping,
the Tea just wasn't how i remembered it and didn't taste like i expected
i ended up throwing it away

Why do manufacturers insist on putting HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP, corn syrup, and fructose in their products?  I really wanted to buy this cake snack but refuse to decimate my body with these dangerous additives. I hope that some day they will realize that the public is becoming aware of the toxic effects of these additives.  It's up to us...Joe Public...to make them aware that adding cheap ingredients will hurt their bottom line!!
Love this salad dressing, but I don't understand why it's so expensive most of Ken's Steakhouse dressings are between three and four dollars.

I love this mirror! I am able to see my little stinker trying to chew on her hand or take a nap when I am driving. I have not had any issues with the mirror's straps loosening or the mirror tilting by itself.  I tightened this puppy down tightly and it has only moved when someone accidentally bumped it. I highly recommend this product!.

This is a very cool, cute and funny one piece. I bought it for my niece`s baby. Some of the family looked confused. Those that know the rock group AC/DC thought it was hilariously cute. It's well made, the lettering looks like it will hold up, and the size was right.
I've had one before. The quality was so much better. Now it's very cheap made material. Poorly executed. Button broke on a second week of using. Very upset

I bought this because we are HUGE fans of swaddling. But, although my son did fine with a tight blanket, my daughter got out of everything! And, once out, she was awake. Got this, and solved the issue. One thing I would notate though, she has not reached the top of the weight limit for the newborn, but the woombie is pretty tight. Still fits her, but she probably won't wear it until she's at the weight limit. So, if your baby is at the top, consider going to the bigger size.

I'm a major cheese lover, so naturally the original Cheez-It became my favorite snack cracker. I couldn't imagine them topping the original, but they did with these crackers.

My favorite type of cheese is cheddar, so it actually makes sense that I would love these. They have a very strong, sharp cheddar flavor. It doesn't taste artificial at all, but tastes like the cheddar I buy for my sandwiches. I can sit down and eat a box all by myself.

Unfortunately, they have lots of calories. 25 crackers contain 150 calories, almost half of which are from fat. So, while I can eat an entire box, I try to pace myself.

Don't get me wrong, I still enjoy Cheez-Its. But if I have a choice, I go for these any day of the week.

This is a cheap thing to do to someone since most of us -- have two breasts.  It was labelled Symphony Double pumping kit. Picture did not reflect -- not what I received. I would have went with another place that was cheaper since it is cheaper on the medela site to buy together. A SCAM.

I purchased this at a local chain called Fresh Fruit and Produce and fell immediately in love. I vacillate between European grinds that have a slightly bitter after taste and the Cuban coffees that are rich and smooth. This one is the best of both worlds.

This coffee has a subtle acidity that gives it the slight and highly desirable (to Italian palates) bitterness. But it has the body and richness of a great Cuban coffee. For folks like myself who love both this is a perfect bean. If you are more of a Cuban or Puerto Rican coffee aficionado you may find this to be a little rough. However, if you love European espresso, but have always wished for a deeper and richer cup this is pure heaven.

One thing I love is the aroma when this is brewing. Itn fills my house. The grind is perfect for my [[ASIN:B000CNY6UK Bialetti 6800 Moka Espresso Maker]], as well as Melita style brewing. It's just a little too fine for French Press pots in my opinion.

In fact I am enjoying a cup as I write this review and it's fantastic to my palate.

I've tried this ghee, Purity Farms and Organic India.  I'd rank Organic Indian the best, followed by this and then Purity Farms.  I've heard good things about Ancient Organics but never tried it.  The problem with the ghee is that it is way overpriced.  The cost is just unreasonable.  And for something this expensive, you'd expect the absolute best quality but that is not the case here.  And yes, all of the above brands are both organic and grass-fed.  I am also bothered by the fact that this company chooses to manipulate the customer review system.  Whether through soliciting positive reviews for a gift certificate or posting fake ones, these methods are deceptive and unscrupulous.  Two stars because the product is OK.

These crepe cookies are out of this world! I believe everyone should try these cookies at least once in their life.

My first experience with these cookies was in a high end grocery store. Found them to be more expensive in the grocery store, but i decided ill try them once in my life. Now these cookies have become an obsession.

The cookies have a flakey texture and have this lightly sweet taste that just makes my mouth water. These crepe cookies are neatly packed into a golden wrapper with two crepe cookies. The exterior has a wonderful golden color with a slight glaze to them. Once a crepe cooke is in your mouth you can bite but the sweetness, which is not overpowering, just melts into your mouth. I would recommend these to anyone who loves flavor without the crazy overpowering taste of sugar.

I am a true believer when it comes to these cookies. I will purchase them over and over again. I wish there were more cookies per package. Makes it hard to share because these cookies are so good!

I bought this product for a baby shower gift. I wanted a basket to place various baby items in, and this looked like the perfect basket. When I received the item, I was shocked to see that I got a basket LINER, not a basket with the liner included. I realize now that the item says \\"Lambs & Ivy Basket Liner\\" but this is very misleading with the picture of the basket included. I hope this company changes the title and picture so no one else makes the same unintentional mistake I did.
so cute in girls room. wish my husband would go for a girly look in ours and I'd use it too. doesn't have much light but looks so good!
Great concept, but has torn on us a few times. It's expensive for such low quality. I bought two trash cans and now stuck with it. Booooo.

I bought the 42 pouch pack and when they arrived they were all hard as a rock. The expiration wasn't for another 7 months so I'm not sure if that is how they are supposed to taste or if I just got a back batch. I tried to eat one but couldn't even chew it and I didn't allow my 4 year old son to even try one. Very disappointed.
Haven't used it yet, bought it for a visiting grandbaby who hasn't arrived yet. Very easy to set up, very light weight and portable.

Superb monitor.

Eight years ago when my wife began to fail, we installed a rather complex monitoring system that required Ethernet cords, a booster for the WIFI, and fussing around. It so greatly relieved my anxieties while I was shopping or walking the dogs -- the ability to see her from miles away -- was priceless and worth all the fussing.

This monitor is so much easier to set up -- literally five minutes -- the color feature is wonderful, the tilting -- the systems have improved so much since my first experiences -- I can't really see how this one could be improved.

I am using it at the moment to monitor folks inspecting my house while it is on the market. Not worried so much about them, but I want to be sure it looks nice in the main entrance where first impressions are so important.

It will find a good home when this duty is over.

Robert C. Ross
June 2015

This is very good, and quite similar to something I regularly make from scratch. It's very easy, as well, because it doesn't require supervision. Simply get it started and walk away (maybe stop to check on it every now and then).

I have never had freeze dried corn and beans before, but the texture was fine in these. I think having freeze-dried beans instead of plain old dried, uncooked beans, sped up the cooking time while keeping the texture of the other ingredients appropriate.

Since I'm vegetarian, I used one quart of vegetable broth plus two cups of water instead of chicken broth and I used soy-based imitation chicken. It worked quite well. I also added shredded queso melt cheese and sour cream. It was quite a good meal like that. The taste was great, it had the perfect level of spiciness for me, and it makes great leftovers (nice if you're cooking for only one or two people).

The sodium of this mix is low, but you can greatly increase the sodium levels depending on how you prepare it. That's one reason I used a little water instead of all broth; I also used a low sodium broth instead of the regular kind. I still thought this was quite flavorful. Additionally, this has a lot of fiber and is very low in fat, if you are looking out for either of those.

I'll probably still cook from scratch most of the time, but it's great to know I have this option now, especially for when I am in a hurry.

We purchased this bassinette mattress pad because of the name Therapedic. When it finally arrived (3 days later than indicated)we discovered a \\"Cub Club\\" bassinette pad, without the word Therapedic anywhere. In favor I will applaud that it was made in the USA. The pad appears to be fine, claims microfiber and mite resistance, etc.
Just do not expect to see the promised Therapedic brand name. Also, as you may notice, this item is labeled as \\"toy\\", whereas at http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B002AWROL4/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_title it is sold as an infant bassinette pad.I find that a little odd....

Blueberry coffee...sounds weird, right?    This is the best darn coffee out there.  One try and you are hooked!  It tastes like coffee in your mouth with a blueberry muffin aftertaste.  The flavor is not strong, just a hint of bluberry!  The smell when it is brewing is delightful!  I encourage all people with a Keurig to try it once.  I am the pickiest eater I know and I love it!!!

I've been meaning to write a product review about this toy for the past two months now, and time just flew by! My baby had this for just one week when I noticed that the Bendy Ball looked like it had some film stuck on it. My soon loves to put everything in his mouth and he'd appreciated the novelty of playing with this as well and not only seeing his O-Ball (I HIGHLY recommend the O-Ball). Well, I always wash his toys, and upon washing and seeing that the film was still there I realized to my great horror that the plastic was peeling off! Very dangerous!! My son could've choked on the this plastic. I'm also worried about the chemicals he ingested. I plan to contact Baby Einstein about this, and will definitely be very wary about Baby Einstein products from now on.

Incidentally, my son got some hand-me-down toys from his cousin a few weeks later and the Bendy Ball was included as well. To my surprise it seems like the older models of Bendy Balls do not have this problem. Baby Einstein must've changed the construction of this toy over the years.
My students and family loved them.  I like that they are Kosher...am afraid to ask if they are made in a factory with nuts!
This is one of my favorite dishes, and Knorr Fix makes this much easier.  Making the schnitzels takes time, but the sauce in this mix is a breeze.  I serve it with spatzel.
I get these are for cutting small delicate nails but does the seller expect the baby to do his own?

Wow, I was super impressed with this item.  I wanted a cool party favor for my sons' birthday party, and boy did I get it.  I purchased them for around $40 (this includes shipping costs) here on Amazon and couldn't be happier.  I got 36 lollipops and they all arrived unbroken.  They are enormous, colorful, and well sealed.  The kids at the party are going to be thrilled.  At around $1/party favor, this was a great deal for something so different and festive.  I'm sure all the parents will hate me for giving their kid such a big sugar boost, but I'm still thrilled with my purchase and can't wait to see the happy recipiants.  I will even double the value by using them in my centerpieces.

Still on the hunt for the perfect hands free bra/tank. Pretty sure it doesn't exist but this comes the closest. When the bottle is getting full , it tends to lose suction and then you have to hold it anyway. The tank is very thick, which is both nice and cumbersome, when wearing under clothes. However, the company is wonderful! Offered me a coupon for ordering again, but I just don't need it. I would order true to size, I ordered it too big as well. If anything go smaller.

I was expecting a jar of toffee and caramel chocolates but what I received was the candy that's normally in the tin. I prefer from Quality Street the  caramel and toffee chocolates.  It's a good product and I should've scrutinized the description.
Love it. I will never go back to buying US supermarket brands of tea. Beautiful color, clear and flavorful.

I love to cook and thought I would use this as a time saver.  Yuk, it has a chemical taste that cannot be hidden.  I made a big mistake in buying this and if I wanted to try it gone to SurLaTable to buy one, not the large quanity required. My oops, not a cheap product.

Ronco Pasta is a family favorite for years.Was pleased with the cost per unit.Child Unit loves the larger shape(Holds MORE cheese Mum,yum.)Lovely al dente.Can use for endless recipes.Use in Minestrone,gives great protein texture/flavor.As a Southerner,well,we love Ronco best.After 100+ years of products,its hard to beat.We would recommend to all.
This powder is perfect for adding some low cal protein and flavor to shakes & smoothies! Love BetterBody Foods!
Works pretty good! Came with 2 different sizes and I feel the larger is more comfortable!  Not expensive either and much better then using a pillow for support and flipping sides all night!

Love these wiggly gigglers. Bought my first one 12 years ago for my son's 1st Christmas. I was delighted to find them on amazon, they are the perfect gift for infant and toddlers to play with, because they fit perfectly in little hands.

I use this for duel reasons. One, I have a low b12 and this keeps me in the normal range and secondly, it makes me feel alert and focused without a crash.  Plus it forces he to drink water first thing in the morning.  Definitely, my favorite of the options on the market.

I was expecting a grinder with the salt like my original purchase. Fortunately, I kept the old grinder and was able to use it with this bag of salt.
The grinders seem to wear out quickly. I can not find a grinder on the spice lab site.

This is the only bottle that my breastfed infant excepting at 5 months. I used the Tommy Tippee occasionally at the beginning but when my daughter turned 2 months she decided not to like it anymore. After researching I purchased it from Amazon. We had to wait for delivery for a month but when they came and we tried it with her, she took the breast milk right away from it. The nipple shaped exactly like a breast so I am not surprised that she likes it. You have to screw the bottom on really tight, I saw some reviewers complaining about it and happened with me once, but as soon as I tightened it, the leaking stopped. You can't see the numbers very well, that's the only drawback, but as long as she taking it that 's the least of my problem :-)

Happens with most variety packs you like maybe 1 or 2 out of the pack.  There was a bold flavor that i liked but really it would have been better to just buy that 1 type of coffee.  The rest of the types weren't that great and could have lived without.  Just buy what you like and leave the rest for somebody else.

I have been buying these for years, for myself and as gifts. They are great, and if you like biscotti, which we do, then buying them in this big container is the way to go. Thiey are the exact same biscottii sold by many trendy cafes and coffee shops; the only difference being these cost you about a third or less than what you would pay there.  That said, if giving as a gift better make sure the giftee likes biscotti, which is basically a thick, dry, hard cookie! Around Christmas time you can buy these at SAMs Club (more money) in a really pretty ceramic jar. I gave one to a friend, only to see it in her July garage sale, still full. Seems they only like soft cookies, which I don't understand at all. Obviously they are not into dunking!
Tasted as good as I expected, good product. Will probably order this item again. keep the good stuff available, thanks

I am a health food nut. I discovered dried mangos in my local nature/organic food store. They were bulk quantity by the scoop around 9-10/lb. I LOVED THEM so much and soo much healthier as a substitute for a sweet snack, that I wanted to find a better price. After reading reviews about this brand I went to Costco and bought the 30 ounce bag... HERE ARE MY THOUGHT  IT CANNOT EVEN COMPARE TO THE NATURAL literally RAW pieces of dried Mango in the organic store WITH NO ADDITIVES!!!! We are talking about DRY pieces of real fruit  This AS I SUSPECTED (but nevertheless bought the bag) IS MORE LIKE CANDY!!!!   Ingredients list: Dry Mango, SUGAR, Sulfur Dioxide (for preservative)  The pieces of mango are COATED with something like powdery SUGAR!!! It is very sweet. 31g of Sugar per serving of ~42g. ALSO the inside part is sort of still juicy EXACTLY LIKE A CANDY. And dont get me even started on the Sulfur Dioxide. I bought grapes that said: \\"Treated with SO2 PLEASE RINSE THOROUGHLY!!\\"  SO HOW DO I RINSE THIS MANGO!!!  SUMMARY: If you want candy-like stuff, buy it. GREAT PRICE. If you want REAL RAW amazing dry mango with no sugar and no chemicals go to a organic health store. My store recently had a sale I got 3 pounds at 7$, which is just as low as the costco one. I will finish this bag that I bought from Philippines and never buy it again.  P.s. My first amazon review JUST because I knew that I will be tricked into getting this candy but went ahead anyway to prove my initial worries.

this is the best saucer on the market!!!!!!! i have twins, they are almost a year old(they first used it at 4 mo), and still using and loving this saucer. toys are great, i did remove the rattle(because of the sharp edges) on the begining, but i reattached it back when they were about 7 mo old. thank you EVENFLO

I work as a pediatric nurse and let me say this product is far better than the mainstream Nose Frida. To start the tip that inserts into the nose is soft and very flexible which is great for dealing with a angry baby. Secondly after using both products on my new born this winter I can say I feel I can create more suction with this device than with the nose Frida. The only con to this product is the filter. In my use I found it very difficulty to keep the filter in the device after cleanings which are often with a sick child. Eventually I lost the filter and was inhaling boogers on a daily basis. Even with that I still preferred to use this to the Nose Frida or your average bulb syringe.

THE best mint tea of its kind. PERIOD! You can tell they used high quality tea and also the mint is high quality. NO this is NOT Benny's Bargain Basement special tea. It's high quality and like me you'll REORDER IT. (PS: I'm a tea fanatic and have lots of loose tea and bags. I KNOW my tea)

This water has a very strong taste for me, but my sister really likes it.  If you freeze it, make sure to drink a least a 1/4 of it or you will get a science experimental explosion in your freezer.  Make sure, you check on it and release the top to let the gas out of the bottle. Being frozen, it is like a slushy.  Now, the price is really*really reasonable.  Make sure you click on the standard shipping (I think it says 5 to 8 days) takes longer, but free shipping. Saves the consumer lots of shipping cost!!!  With that saving on shipping, the consumer can spend more on the products.
The description it is unclear as to which style this is and gumdrop makes many

This is very good coffee. Sumatra has long been my favorite Starbucks blend, and this compares favorably but at a better price. Bold but smoother and without the bitter acidity typical of many other darks such as French or espresso roast. I brew it with the [[ASIN:B0000CFSS5 Bialetti Moka Express 9-Cup Stovetop Percolator]] for a great, rich way to get going in the morning.

Annie's rice pasta has a firm, toothsome texture that semolina pasta can't match, and the cheese is mildly sweet and tangy (the instructions say the cheese will stand up without butter, but use it anyway to cut minor Cheetos-like overtones).  Though pricy, it is nutritionally rich and has a good flavor, unlike regular macaroni, which is mostly filler and serves to deliver the cheese.    This product has the advantage of being gluten-free, but even if you're not on a restricted diet, I recommend it.  Both healthy and tasty, it's a step up from the garbage that got most of us through college.  You need to eat less of it to feel full, thus offsetting the greater price, and it's so tasty that you need to eat WAY less of it to have your taste buds satisfied.  Savings, nutrition, and good flavor... what more could you ask for?
Was a bit pricey with the shipping costs, but it is nice.  It's a gift for someone who hasn't been given it yet but I'm sure she'll love it since she's into anything with elephants!

My boyfriend had used up his last little bit of this product and could not remember where he bought it. Luckily, Amazon had containers at a very good price! The flavoring of this chicken base could not be better. We use it for everything. It's also nice that the product is in a jar so that you can take as little or as much out as you need. Thanks!
I've used these beans for extract several times, and they are great.  I give the bottles as gifts at Christmastime and they are always a hit.

I just received and installed the thing. We haven't used that yet as the baby is not here yet but the product looks strong and easy to install. Its worth the value as compared to the price in stores like babiesrus etc. Moreover there was a price reduction on the item after i had made the purchase (within next two days). The customer care rep immediately refunded me the money when I notified.
My grandson naps in this swing. It is doft and snuggly. Seings from side to side or back and forth.

Love the fabric and look of this, but not the price. I still haven't figured out how this sling works..I really haven't tried either. I give this product an okay, cuz I think it should have came with instructions.
-Megan
I LOVE THIS !!!!!!!! IF I CAN'T BE IN NY I CAN AT LEAST ENJOY IT HERE , IN COLORADO!!!

My son (2 month old) loves this mobile.  The leaves move around and up and down and the little animals that hang down are really cute. It was pretty easy to put together. I like that the music changes as well.

This stuff is great! I got it way before the arrival day and the packaging was good too. I always liked Hanna tattoos so I really wanted to try to do it on my own and I have to say I'm pretty satisfied with the product.

I have come to enjoy my Keurig coffee/tea brewer. And I have come to enjoy experimenting with different coffees and teas, to get a sense of what my preferences might be over a range of products. Among coffees, I have discovered that some products are really a cut above. I also have another preference: bolder rather than less bold.

Black silk is advertised as \\"uniquely bold and exceptionally smooth.\\" And I can taste that (I have a cup of black coffee next to me, to test out my description, rather than doing this from memory). After swallowing, there seems to be a lightly acidic bite, but it does not take away from my overall very positive perception of this coffee.

I had purchased a different kind of K-cup as my family ran out of this recently (this was not available then). The replacement was not satisfactory! I have gone back TO Black Silk and am pleased to have done so.

An absolute hit with my fiance. Keeps them in his office and they're the smaller ones- good for a quick snack. Not my thing, but he LOVES them! Oh, and you save a significant amount of money buying them from Amazon in bulk like this. That's always a good thing!

I would not recommend this for anyone.  it was really difficult for me to use.  My son is big enough to fit it but because this product is so complicated, I do not use it.  It was a complete waste of my money.

Had these for a while and thought they were a decent novelty until my daughter started teething.  We would stick a piece of frozen fruit inside and it was an instant 15-20 minute reprieve of watching her cry in pain helplessly ... for that, they became indispensable.

I ordered this kit for my best friends children. Small children. It was a gift and sent to the recipients home. I was embarrassed when the children opened it an the house pieces had been crushed. They could not build a gingerbread house and were saddened. I was saddened too because they were disappointed.

I USE SIMPLY ORGANIC GARLIC POWDER EVERY DAY IN MY COOKING. I AM VERY PLEASE WITH THE POWDER..
I USE ONLY IT..

I absolutely LOVE this stuff! There is nothing that fries better or makes food cook so evenly, I love it even more than olive oil. I would buy more of this if it was available for Subscribe and Save, I can't recommenced this enough! Nothing in the world fries a corn tortilla better for tacos or tostadas. NOTHING!

I hand grind my own espresso and make my morning brew in a French press. Sure, I'm using the \\"wrong\\" implements. But I'm the only one who has to love my coffee.

This espresso is pretty darn good, and it's fair trade coffee. You can't go wrong. The only difference I can really tell is that these beans don't seem to be as oily as the beans sold in the 12 oz Starbucks bags from Starbucks. But if you're going to be a picky hipster, just go back to Stumptown ;) I'm on a budget.
The options are wonderful. The music is nice to have.  I love the colors also.
this is a great popcorn variety.  it is nice to enjoy a different salt each night.  it makes making popcorn more fun

I purchased the Britax B-Nimble to have as an alternative to our large/ heavy BOB stroller (which I love by the way!). I researched & read dozens of reviews for the best lightweight stroller with all the bells & whistles I was looking for. If I had tested the B-Nimble out in a store - I would not have bought it. It is NOT nearly as Nimble as it's name! And for the price/ brand, it has a poor design (this is a simple Umbrella stroller being marketed as something more). In summary, the Con's outweight the Pro's for this stroller. I wish I had returned right away :-(

PROs -
- Fabric is nice & durable, I think you can also remove the cover to wash (haven't had to do this yet, since I avoid using this stroller due to the Con's - see below).
- Lightweight
- Shoulder strap is handy
- The extendable footrest is nice
- the center lock for the 5 point harness is nice & easy to use.

CONs -
- Handling/ manuverability is terrible. Maybe it's the two front-wheel design, but it's not easy to steer forward on simple ground surfaces - the wheels get caught easily & if they aren't parallel at all times, one will \\"flip\\" around and stop any forward movement until you re-align the wheels.
- Canopy is awkward & flimsy. It also doesn't pull down low enough to shield the sun/ rain/ wind from my daughters' face.
- The rear \\"step-down\\" lock that holds the stroller open is broken, and the plastic piece spins around under my foot while trying to lock open the stroller.
- The mesh basket underneath is way too small. But I guess that's what you get with an umbrella stroller.
- You need both hands to open & close this stroller. And in both cases, it is just awkward to do.
- Doesn't recline to a flat position.
- The parent cupholder is constantly falling off - between opening & closing, and moving the stroller from place to place. It's just doesn't stay put, so we end up leaving it off, and not having a placeto put bottles/ cups.

New mom here, and one whose milk, when it came in, came in HARD. I was (and still am) leaking like a faucet! The first night I wrapped myself in a swaddling blanket but still woke up soaked. Now that I have some good nursing bras, I added my new Bamboobies pads and am in LOVE. They're super soft on my new mama nipples, absorb well, and are discreet under my good quality bras. I've seen other reviewers complain about them being visible or bunchy but I haven't had this problem at all! Total 5 star review- my only regret is that I didn't buy enough to start with!

Like all things Lindt, the Chocolate Lindor Truffles are wonderful. I cannot really think of anything I'd recommend they improve except to maybe put more chocolates in each box! They are a little expensive, to be sure, but if you are going to consume the calories, Lindt is the way to go.

If you have a specific location with solid sides and don't plan on moving it around then it'll do OK. It does work and it seems well made.

It does not work well for what I wanted.
I have a couple of locations and would like to move it between them as/when needed. Not often, but occasionally, maybe 3 times a week. It is not easy to move once set. It is just awkward and you need 3 hands to install it.

It will not do well on sheetrock. The top takes too much pressure to "bend" the gate assembly together to make it work. It also does not work well against a heavy desk and against the wall. It will slowly move the desk (even a heavy desk) due to the pressure needed.

Thank God Mike shares his genius and food with all of us!  He's the reigning all-time world champion of BBQ for a reason.  A great man and even greater cook - I WILL NOT pass through Murphysboro without stopping at 17th St. Bar and Grill.  Even though I'm stationed far away - I can still get Magic Dust and Mike's bbq sauce wherever I land.  Praise the Lard & Peace, Love, & BBQ!!!
Barry Farm charges insane shipping for poor quality goods! King Arthur is very responsive and will rectify any customer issues promptly.

I purchased the variety pack because I wanted see which one I liked best.  I love all of them.  The black pepper one was the last one I tried.  I really like it just as well as the other ones.  Some of them are spicy hot but soo good. They look like a potato chip but not greasy.  Once you start eating them you can't put them down.  There is 100 calories in each bag and each bag is .8 oz's.  You have to try them, glad I did!  I gave them 5 stars because they are so very good.

This is for people that like ...... coffee! Not for those that like coffee flavored chocolate, or taramisu, or french vanilla, or any number of other fru fru flavors - just coffee. It is a good, strong cup of Joe that tastes like it should.

One of the best black teas on earth. Significantly better than Twinings. Also try their Yorkshire Gold.mI actually drink it half green with Yogi Organic for health. It still tastes like a great black tea when you do that. Enjoy, however you use it! (I take it with lemon and a good local honey.)
Another baby gift which was much appreciated by the new Daddy and Mommy!  Was in such lovely condition and can be used for years.
We buy this product on a regular bsis and it never disappoints. If you love cooking, then you will find this product useful in hundreds of situations, especially if you love to invent.

My 4 month old is a fussy little guy. He has taken to Mam bottles for colic babies. The bottles are awesome and have helped with spit ups and gas. He has used other brands but none have been as good as Mam. He took to these nipples with no fuss. I would never change now that he is doing so well.
These are milder than the hot peppadews, but still have a bite to them.  They are perfect in recipes and dips.

I am a huge nut-lover and this really grabbed my attention. I really liked it, mostly because unlike other bars of it's KIND, (no pun intended) it wasn't loaded with sugar. I did, however, feel it was too expensive to buy again. I hope to come across a nice coupon!

Does the job and looks pretty.  We actually use it to put on the floor and change diapers on.  Great price, and it's actually a fairly sturdy piece of plastic - it does not bunch up when babies are rolling around on it.

I bought this along with a few other things to give as a gift.  Out of all the other items shipped, this is the one that was raved about the most. I received several texts saying "Can. Not. Stop. Eating." And "Marshmallow fluff everywhere." And finally "Where can I buy more?"

This ginger root is wonderful; aromatic, tasteful, finely ground, and natural color. It mixes in our lemonades, prepared dishes, and teas perfectly.

The taste is fresh and vibrant. In fact, if you are not used to real ginger, use sparingly at first as it can be a little strong (ginger is a bit like pepper in that it can give a hot sensation upon tasting). Ginger is also great for digestion and the immune system - just 1/2 to 1 tsp. per day can make a difference!

I love the Frontier line of herbs, roots and seasonings and consider them to be one of the best. This is really good buy for the amount and price (huge savings over purchasing smaller amounts in retail stores such as Whole Foods). I only wish they offered an organic version of this ginger.
Awesome for all kinds of entertainment, from teething to making other toys easier to reach by using these as extenders.

Best K-Cup tea I've found and better than most of what passes for tea in the bags. Much more flavorful than the Twinings Earl Grey which I didn't care for. Comparable to the Irish Breakfast Tea but cheaper. I buy it by the cargo container. :)
I love this stuff, very convenient, and I love the value.  Getting it as a subscription makes it more irresistible.
My dumbs paid 13.00 for one can of cheetos?  I thought this was a case?  According to the only other review on this product, it was by the carton!!!

This is a great tasting cereal, but it is NOT gluten free. It took me months to figure how my family kept getting gluten because I trusted the \\"family\\" owned Erewhon brand.  Guess what?  They are no longer family owned. The corporation who makes Skinner Raisin Brand owns them and processes raisin bran in the same plant as the supposedly gluten free Crispy Brown Rice cereal. If avoiding gluten is important to your family's health, then avoid this cereal. It is definitely cross contaminated with gluten.

So let me start by saying my son loves this seat. It's stable, comfy for a little bum, and no hard plastic cups some little boys have issues with while training. We liked it so much we have two of them. One in our downstairs bathroom and one is his bathroom upstairs. Well, after some use I noticed earlier this week our downstairs one developed a crack in the inside ring, and the split has progressively grown larger (mind you, this down stairs seat is the primary used). What a shame. This seat prevents him from having to hold the sides of the potty for stability because he doesn't have to worry about falling though/in and now I'll have to discard it due to the split pinches his little bum when he attempts to use the seat. Hopefully our second one holds up better/longer than this first one.
Works pretty well, but loses suction sometimes and I can't figure out why. I am pumping about twice per day, so maybe it's not meant to be used that frequently and is wearing out?

Though I am not great with putting things together, with a lot of patience it was accomplished. It's a good sturdy changing table and can be used as shelving as your child gets older. My daughter loves it for the new grand baby!
oh just get one, any one.  even adults could hit their heads but if u have a kid its really a necessity.
This pad was just what I needed for my nursery for my grand daughter. I wasn't sure it would fit on the small wicker desk I wanted to put it on, but it was just fine. Great price too!

Awful! I wouldn't feed this to my dog... Here's why. For 1, the "meat" in this meal is hard as a rock. I tried to cut it up and my daughter choked on that. It tastes awful. 2, There is an inconsistency in how hard the vegetables are. Some are soft and easy to chew and others are like eating raw vegetables. My daughter also choked on the vegetables even though I went through and removed all the meat snd pieces that seemed too hard.

I love this brand but this was a really big let down. I'm hoping to get my money back or at least offered an exchange.
This stuff is terrible, for what I paid Id expect it to be edible...

it's milk.  no big deal.  my only gripe is that the adhesive used to affix the straws to the carton suck and the straws fall off (which means i have to tape it to the carton so my daughter won't lose it during lunch time).  not a huge problem...but an inconvenience.
These were wonderful and now I need to order another bag. I ate the whole bag in two weeks all by myself! They were fresh and easy to chew.

Will clean you out, but don't overdo it.  I started out drinking 4 or 5 cups a day, and I can tell you that you will hate yourself if you drink that much.  I won't go into ugly details, but trust me, 1 or 2 cups a day is all you wanna do.

We do like the flavor of this honey.  The price was better than we could find researching prices.  We eat it in oatmeal with a spoonful of peanut butter.  I also cook with it and sweeten my tea.  Good stuff, folks!

I tried drinking Green Tea because people say that Green Tea is good for your health.  However I could not find any that is good until I try Batavia tea.  Most of the Green Teas taste bitter, smoky, burn and leave an awefull taste in your mouth but not this tea. I like to brew[[ASIN:B001G8WXJ6 Batavia Black Tea, 50-Count Boxes (Pack of 4)]] both of their green and black tea.

These were my first attempt at cloth diapers ever.  LOVE these so easy to use NO LEAKS yet and we are on day 9 AMAZING!!! If I knew it was this convenient I would have done cloth with all my babies!! No problems with these diapers all snaps are secure, super cute prints, very absorbent materials provided, no leaks, very adjustable, no weird smells and the baby loves them as much as me.  Just about to order another set!!!
They are okay...I had to doctor them up a little to make them my liking...but for the money...I guess they are good.

These are hard to get around the bottles, we have both. And we wrote my child's name in a sharpie and it doesn't stay. So if you want a really tight band that you can't properly label then this is for you.
The 'Use By Date' was Mar 2013.  I guess the short shelf life is caused by the 'natural fruit juice' content.  This was a very disappointing purchase.

No seriously tho.. I couldn't have made it if it wasn't for Flavor God Seasoningz. I can't thank Chris enough for his product! I only use these four seasonings and I have metamorphed into one of the most divine "cooks" on this planet.
quality is cheap, breakable, not loud enough to wake anyone up, I purchased 1 about 2 months ago within 2 weeks it stopped working.
The picture doesn't give the bib justice. The graphics are actually sewn in, I thought it was just a screen print. Very cool thanks!

I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 because I feel that Mountain Buggy could have made a universal connector similar to other buggy boards. That being said, this connector comes with several different adapters to fit the cross bars. I was able to toggle between the rubber adapters and the different drop angles to fit this to a Britax B-ready, Combi Flare Twin and a BabyJogger City Mini GT Double.  Haven't had time to figure out if this would work on a BabyJogger Summit XC single, but I'm so cheap I will try to avoid spending $60 on adapters for a $100 scooter :)

I love these seats because they take up almost no room, and are portable.
I didn't like the \\"padding\\" as it's not much and gets dirty way too easy.
I didn't like the white waist straps, seriously who puts white straps on a baby's seat that's meant for eating???? All these companies that do that need to get colored straps!
It would also be nice if when it's folded down, that the tray would snap on like the fisher price ones do.
Overall, it's a great seat!
Purchased as a gift and was mortified when daughter called and advised it stopped working after about 20 minutes.  Should have heeded warnings from other reviewers about same issue.
Works well. the spinner works fabulously. We did not use the steam much. We use it purely for the spinner.

I love this baby snack.  It's cheaper to buy it in amazon compared to nearby supermarket.  I got my second order today and found I got 1 box, instead of 6 boxes... it's such a pain to contact Amazon and get a refund... (and tihs item is non-returnable which makes it more difficult to solve this problem). Maybe I'm the only one who had this problem, but just wanted to let you know.

I have purchased several different  cocoa powders for baking and beverage making. I usually use Van Houten or Bensdorf but was eager to try something new. The first Valrhona batch I received was in a plastic jar but the inner seal was open. The cocoa had a decidedly smoky taste and smell--like powdered ham stock. It was truly terrible. The company was quick to respond with a second jar, but that too had an open inner seal and smelled like smoked ham. Not good. It was pricey, so one should expect packaging that would protect the subtle flavors. The possibility of tampering is scary too. I seem not to be able to get a decent product. Very disappointing.

The preserves were fine but the amount seemed quite small for the price plus shipping costs.  I do know that harvesting these tiny berries may be labor-intensive though and this may account for the higher costs.
I love this candy. I ordered it for my grandson, he is a big fan. I also love that it is shipped quickly and I get it much sooner than expected. Love it.

After reading some of the reviews for this product, I was a little wary of purchasing it. Anyway, I decided to give it a try as I could not find anything else like it.  At the time of travelling, my daughter was 6 months old and about 18lbs and we were travelling to Las Vegas.  We needed something that we could use as a carseat and a stroller without having to mess around with both items.  This was the perfect product. We travelled down to the airport with her in the carseat and within a few seconds of arriving at the airport it was a stroller.  She sat on my lap on the plane so we just put the carseat where the strollers go when you get on the plane.  I definately recommend this product to everybody who is travelling with a young child.  There are just two negative things about this product and they are:  1. The handle can feel a bit flimsy when you are pushing it around  2. It can be difficult to transform it from carseat to stroller with your child inside.  Overall, I love this product and my daughter liked to be in it also.

The product was misrepresented. It was paste but not cascao. It contained no pieces of goiaba. The mailing system was very poor. the product was put into an envelope and mailed. It got smashed and lost its shape and appeal. Straight to my garbage can.
Cascao implies pieces of the fruit. This product should have been mailed in a box to preserve its visual appeal.

PG Tips to my mind is the single best every-day tea in the English-speaking world. It's not Twinings, Taylors, etc. There is no pretense about it. And it is certainly not Lipton's which sadly is the American equivalent because it's the most popular supermarket brand. It's just perfectly full-flavored black tea which satisfies deeply.
I use these for everything!  In my car, off the stroller, in the kids closets and even in the pantry to hold used plastic bags.
This is great baby item that I glad I got it. It keep water hot for more than 4 hrs, and still warm over 12 hrs. I am not use as a warmer but use as a thermos warm bottle.
Unless you are blending curry ingredients yourself, this is the next best thing. I prefer the hot over the mild.
Field Roast Vegan Grain Meat Celebration Roast is absolutely delicious!  The texture is awesome too. Really great to eat anytime.
These are very thick, and not ideal for helping the way it should. The only reason it got 2 stars instead of 1 is because the plastic case is nice. Dubon shields are way better.

The order of chocolate covered peanuts came in one big, stuck-together glob.  This was during winter....not the heat of summer!  Was going to use them on my Super Bowl Table but ended up putting them in a plastic bag and banging them apart w/my rolling pin.  Didn't look very attractive when finished.  Ended up putting them in cookies.  Wouldn't order again.

This is a great tasting tea. It is definitely of good quality and not bitter at all. The description really fits the taste. I just boil the water, add a little honey and this in a tea ball and it comes out great. And the tea does have a somewhat cocoa flavor! I highly recommend buying this!
Theses breast pads are super soft and wash very well they stay in place well also. They have so far held up to multiple washing's without pilling and adsorb well.

I bought these bottles a few years ago and got the style pictured, the ones that came when I ordered last month were different, more sippy cup looking but my kids didn't complain and they seemed to work OK until my daughter chewed on the sippy cap and chopped off the top - she knew to spit it out but I would be concerned for a younger child. I also had all kinds of complications with the seller that I won't go into here but I would not buy this item again.

This swaddle is cute but if your child moves in the night, the wrap around part ends up around their neck and face.  Aden and anais should fix the design of this.  If theu added a set of additional snaps, the material would not ride up but this product as is is just an accident waiting to happen.  Skip it!

When I read the ingredients, I thought we would really like these shortbread rounds.  Unhappily, they were just OK.  I do normally love shortbread, and the kinds I've tasted have a wonderful, sweet, buttery flavor.  With only a few ingredients, and butter being 35%, how could these not be great?  Well, I don't have an answer to that, actually.  We couldn't taste any buttery flavor.  No complaint about the tin, it's well made and beautiful, but if I were going to buy shortbread cookies again, I'd look elsewhere.

It's one of those situations where I keep asking myself, "Why didn't I listen to the reviewers before I bought it?"  But the answer I arrive at is simple.  My crib looks similar to the crib pictured for the product.  I don't have one side that's higher than the other, in fact, I have the <a href=\\"http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005FCEMCU/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=390957&creativeASIN=B005FCEMCU&linkCode=as2&tag=iheamon-20\\">Pali Imperia Forever Crib, White</a><img src="[...] width="1" height="1" border="0" alt="" style="border:none !important; margin:0px !important;" > which I purchased right here on Amazon.  The elastic doesn't even fit around the top.  It's short by at least five inches.  My super-capable, super-handy, build-things-from-scratch, macguyveresque hubbie couldn't even find a way to make this work.  So, we're returning it.

My baby loves this!  We fixed it to the wall next to her changing station...she talks to it all the time!  She's had it for a month and she's 3 months now.  She hasn't really handled it and we haven't washed it so I can't say much at this point about durability.  But she's definitely attracted to it!

These crackers are rather bland, but have a very nice texture.  Unfortunately they are very fragile. They did not fair well in shipping and be sure to use a gentle hand in attempting to spread anything on them. I also do not care for the packaging...they are bundled in packs of four crackers, plastic rapped. I do think they are the healthiest organic option I have tried so far, and I have tried three others so far. At this point, I will be reordering these regardless of the crumbling for health reasons.
So convenient for those gotta go moments when you're in a public place, or visiting someone who doesn't have kids.
Great toy for the bath! Love how the light changes color and keeps my son interested.

Some of the one-star reviewers said this product doesn't work well with glass bottles, but I don't agree.  I've been using mine for four months now and it works just fine.  I do have to hang my glass bottles opposite of each other so the stand doesn't tip over from the weight, but that is easy to do!  This product is well worth the price, and if you are like me and watching every dollar these days, don't spend more money than you need to.  I definitely recommend this product.

I'm disappointed! I don't drink coffee, but love hot chocolate. My husband has the Kurig so I thought I'd get some. 60% of this sampler \\"chocolate\\" pack was chocolate flavored coffee. The picture showed a few. I was looking forward to the salted Carmel which I have tried before and there were none, even though 5 or 6 were pictured. My husband is happy with his new flavors, but not really for those of us that don't like the taste of coffee.
lots of room and very nice colors for a baby girl. Totally satisfied with the product and price!! definitely recommend this to everybody

The color is random, so we got blue and it matches my daughter's backpack.

I got this container after seeing a similar one at pottery barn kids. This one is less expensive, but actually looks better in person (and more functional). It doesn't look childish in any way and can easily be used as a lunchbox insert or on it's own. The container perfectly fits inside the standard lunch box (it's easier for my 1st grader to carry around and lunchboxes are insulated too). One of the departments has a leak proof lid though I have never tried putting liquid in it since I prefer to use the Thermos Foogo for soups and such. It works good for pasta with sauce though. I've made a mistake by putting in hot pasta once. Don't do it. The lid \\"sucks in\\" and it's impossible for little hands to open.

P.S. Dishwasher safe, BPA free and lead free
my granddaughter had outgrown her carseat and I needed to replace it with one larger.  this is much bigger and nicer than the old one.  lots of room and seems very sturdy

Bought this for my grandson. I bought it a little to big, because it was my first experience with this brand. Just so you know don't size up. I AM NOW A NEW FAN OF BUNNIES BY THE BAY. I wish there were more items.
I watch my six mo. old grandson and his big sister, my 4 1/2yr old grand daughter,
and we got their pictures for His First EASTER in this HAT and cloth diaper and blue bunny head diaper pins.
His sister wore a pale pink float dress smocked with blue and white bunnies. From(carriage Boutique)Brand.
The CUTEST HAT I've seen in a long while.

It's just a small plastic tweezers but if your baby doesn't have snot but instead harder little boogers you are able to pull them out so baby can breathe better. Baby doesn't like it and you have to be very gentle of course when sticking anything up baby's nose but with a steady hand and a warning to the baby (even tho they will probably still get mad despite an audible warning) it gets the job done
This seat was easy to install and our baby loves it. It looks super comfortable for the baby.we also love the color. Very easy to adjust he straps, height etc.

This stuff is the bomb. I wish they sold it in large cans. Perfect for going out in the woods and having an awesome cup of espresso in the morning, but you have to mix powder milk separately if you want a latte. Time for me to reorder!

I brew an Italian Roast K cup in the morning and put 2 of these guys in it and I'm off to work with an excellent cup of coffee. Each one is 25 calories, so my coffee is 50 calories. Sigh.....it's the best I can do and still get the flavor I crave.

*Revised review*
After cleaning my bath tub, letting it dry and leaving it there to set for 10 minutes before adding his mountain of toys to the mesh bag, it actually stayed! I was so shocked. He has so many toys! I will be buying a couple of these and getting the adhesive strips for around the house and his Montessori learning time. I absolutely love Bubble Baby! They make sure that everything is 100% satisfaction or they will go above and beyond to make sure that you are happy! Love! Love!
*received for free for honest review.

The prizes suck now but these were a great money saver over the baseball season.  They are very small but the right size for small kids.  I brought 2 or 3 to every game and saved versus paying $5/box from the vendors.

I would give it a zero if I could.  The package itself was open so it spilled in the packing box.  I did taste a piece and it had no flavor at all.  I needed it for a cake I was baking and ended up not being able to make it for my out of town visitor.
Very cute bedding for a baby girl. You can put lots of different patterns with it. Not great quality but definitely worth the price :)
good price for a great taste and I would recommend this product to anyone based on the flavor alone. I will order more in the future.

I've been ordering Zico for over 3 years.  I participate in the Subscribe and Save so I receive 1-2 boxes every month.  I am so disappointed in my last 4 shipments.  Every time Zico tastes spoiled.  What is going on?  I keep thinking it may just be that particular shipment, but I feel like it is the product.  I'm going to have to find a new coconut water because I can barely tolerate the taste anymore.

This soup is rich, tasty, and filling. It is very easy to make in the microwave; no stove necessary! It thickens up beautifully into a thick bean soup that provides more than half of your daily recommended value of fiber and a healthy dose of iron, too. It's appropriate for vegans and vegetarians, of course, but this omnivore enjoyed the soup and didn't miss the presence of animal products at all.

The "mattress" that comes with a pack and play is just too thin.  I can't imagine it's comfortable, so I ordered this mattress.  It has inner springs, and it feels very supportive and fits the Graco pack and play perfectly.  I am very pleased with it and would highly recommend it.  It would be difficult to take along when traveling, but it's perfect for my home use.

we have had multiple problems with this pail giving off too much odor.  we have tried to wash it out multiple times, use lysol, baking soda, and even put the diapers in a powder scented bag prior putting them in the pail.  when calling the manufacturer they said it was probably a bad seal.  they then sent us 2 brand new seals for free-which was wonderful. my husband replaced the seal which didn't solve the problem...so we placed two seals all together and it still continued to smell. we have since then moved it outside which is not very convenient and now the pail doesn't get used very often.
Gave this as a gift.  Was told that it works as advertised.  Setup was incredibly easy.  Would recommend to others.
These are actually pretty good. It's not super over the top like weird Mexican chocolate. It's a very subtle version that is pretty nice.
Love the blanket, great protection to use on grass I don't get wet at all, good size, nice quality.

I buy it for backpacking. I didn't have the expiration date problem, but I DID notice that now, in the first week of February, I have until late June to eat 24 boxes of Rice-A-Roni before it expires. I'm sure I can handle it. One issue that concerns me, though, after poring over the ingredient list, is the use of the already mentioned disodium inosinate. The package doesn't tell the source of this salt, and much of it used in food is sourced from genetically modified organisms. I'm not paranoid about genetically modified salts as much as I despise companies just putting stuff in my food without telling me and letting me decide if I want to buy it. Genetically modified corn is a different story for another discussion. I love the taste of beef Rice-A-Roni, and I doubt that I'll throw any of it away. All the same, until I can find an answer about the makeup of the product, I probably won't buy any more, which saddens me. I've been eating it since I was a kid. I hope it doesn't turn out to be The San Francisco Genetically Modified Food Alternative Treat. If anyone already has the answer, please let me know.

Update: I received this from Rice-A-Roni when I asked if any of their ingredients were genetically modified...

\\"We appreciate the opportunity to respond to your concerns about Rice-A-Roni. Disodium Inosinate is sourced from dried seaweed or dried fish. It can also be isolated from mushrooms.\\"

I was hoping for more of a \\"Yes\\" or \\"No\\". The fact that they didn't respond with an emphatic \\"No\\" leads me to believe that the answer is really a \\"Yes\\". My search for answers continues...

My baby has loved this seat since he was about 2 weeks old. Now he is 5 months and still loves it. The toybar works well as he can now grab the toys he has been staring at. The vibrator is a nice option to have when baby gets fussy.  He loves to kick his legs to make the chair bounce. Its also great to sit the baby in while watching a video.  A must have!

This is the original raisin bran; none compare.  It is not sweetened...YEA!  It stays crunchy in milk...YEA!  Do not try to compare it to the raisin bran found on most grocery store shelves; it is a different \\"animal\\".  This is nuttier, heartier and not sweet.  It is closer to the earth, with less processing, less of a carbon footprint.  It is a squished wheat berry; you can tell by looking at it!  The wheat berry is steamed, flattened and baked.  You can't get more \\"whole-grain\\" than that.  Wheat products can be of concern, but for me, not this one.  I wish it were still sold in southern California.

This rain cover does not smell have that awful cheap plastic smell. It's very simply to install and goes perfectly with my blue and lime green iCandy Peach stroller. It keeps my little guy dry when it rains and protects him from the wind.
Highly recommended.

I don't like this product mixed with water as a peanut butter substitute.  The flavor is ok, but the texture isn't to my liking.  However, it's wonderful as an additive to low-fat milk, ice cream or yogurt for flavorful smoothies and shakes.  It adds an excellent peanut butter flavor for a fraction of the calories.  Also, a little bit added to light whipped topping makes a tasty, relatively low-cal apple dip.

I've only had this baby monitor for a day or so and already I love it. We bought this because I had the bad habit of checking on my son too early (I wanted to make sure he actually fell asleep, but whenever he saw me, he'd think it was time to stand up and play - or, I'd hear him cry and I'd walk in to give him his binky, even though he'd have just grabbed it himself and didn't need me, which again, would make him think it was time to get up when he saw me).

We had tried an audio monitor before, but didn't really need it. I could hear my son throughout our really small apartment, and it didn't stop me from walking in on him too early because he'd often be quiet for several minutes before actually falling asleep. For moms like me who like to check on their babies, this monitor is perfect. I can see the entire crib, and I can click it on or off whenever I'd like to take a peek. The image is clear enough that I can see when my son is asleep/awake/has his binky/doesn't have his binky/etc. Sometimes my signal blinks like it's too far out of range, which has me worried a little bit for when we move into our bigger house. I'll be sure to update my review if the range is affected.

***Update***
We've now owned this monitor for over a year or so? Anyway, it still works great. The range is completely fine even for our new larger home. In fact, it might seem weird, but our monitor actually works better in our house (probably because there's more open space?) than it did in our small apartment. Go figure.

The only problem we've had with it is that the antenna casing isn't too strong. We've broken it off and glued it back on several times.

Other than that really small complaint though, I really love this product. It works so well for the price and has all the features I need. I've now purchased another camera, so I have two and they work perfectly together. I love having one handheld monitor with multiple videos, which helps when I need to watch two rooms at once. You can't beat this price for a video monitor.beat this price for a video monitor.

I've tried to use these a few different times and I've never had any luck.  I've never been able to wear them for more than an hour or so without leaking a lot, which isn't good if you're out in public.  I really wanted to use washable nursing pads with this baby, but these have been a total waste of money.  Guess I'll stick with disposables until I can find something better.

This crib is great! It is smaller than a standard crib (more like the size of a Graco pack and play) but still plenty of space for baby. We use it for our tall and strong 18 month old girl and it has stood the test of time with her and remains quite beautiful for me.

I highly recommend this if you're looking for an additional crib (we put this extra one in our office attic) or one that is smaller to fit in tighter spaces.
This is absolutely the best granola I've ever had.  But that's just icing on the cake, given the proceeds go to such a wonderful cause.
this is by far the best coffee I have ever had.  I Look forward to getting up so I can have just one cup

My only complaint is that the wood seems a little soft. A couple times while assembling the crib, I bumped the wood with a tool or another part of the crib. This left scratches and a big dent in one spot. Baby has not arrived yet to test durability. I recommend two people assembling it together.

According to recent tests by ConsumerLab, to which we subscribe, the Saigon species of cinnamon is not as healthful and safe as the Ceylon species, notably Frontier Natural Products Organic Cinnamon (also sold by Az). However, Spice Hunter's Saigon cinnamon has a delightful sweet flavor which goes splendidly with such offerings as cappuccino. Frontier, on the other hand, tastes like a mix of cinnamon and nutmeg, making it ideal for many desserts, eggnog and the like. The problem with Saigon? Relatively high levels of coumarin, a toxin which should not be consumed at more than 0.1 mg of kg of body weight. Thus for light use Saigon is plenty safe, and for years we've cheerfully sprinkled it atop foamed coffee two or three times a day. Great stuff.
I feel very stylish carrying this bag. It's very well-constructed and beautiful to carry around.
Great product. I've bought coconut oil before but this one smells so good, so fresh, and real.

I love this tea. The bag makes many, many cups of tea. This is loose-leaf, so you need an infuser. It is of high quality and has a refreshing taste in addition to the many health benefits of hibiscus.
I had back surgery and cannot bend like I used to. This is a great helper for shaving my legs! I'm shocked at how much pressure I'm able to put on it and it doesn't fall off the wall.

I have never written a review before...that's how much I LOVE LOVE LOVE this sauce! I have never liked red tomato sauces of any kind and I've tried many. I usually make a white alfredo sauce for my pasta which is not exactly low fat and not the best choice for my slim down program. I was excited to find and try this sauce because I really like the taste of butternut squash. I didn't tell my husband what is was before he ate it because he's not a vegetable kind of guy and hesitates to try anything new. After I knew he liked it I told him. This is a great way to eat healthy (only 4 grams of fat per serving) and sooooooo tasty with just the right amount of sweetnesss. Amazon also has the best price on this sauce. Don't hesitate to try it...you won't be sorry. It's really a treat for me when I find a new food product I like. It's even more of a treat to find out it has good quality ingredients so it's good for us too!

When we brought our baby home from the hospital we had been spoiled with the easiest formula solution, the pre-made bottles! You just open, put a nipple on and throw it away! I loved this, but part of me didn't like all of the trash I was making, and a bigger part of me didn't like that i was paying for all those wasted bottles. So I bought this thing, it lets me buy bulk powder, but not have to deal with getting water the right temp, measuring anything, getting power everywhere, cleaning that crap, etc..  Setting this thing up is complicated, not because it has a lot of parts, which is does, or that the instructions are complicated, they aren't, it's because they covered the thing in "DID YOU READ THE ENTIRE MANUAL BEFORE OPENING!!!!!" labels everywhere, every dang piece of plastic, hinge, everything these labels. I guess a lot of folks decided to just "figur'et out" and when it doesn't work go on amazon and say's it sucks.  It's not a complicated device, it has a button for making 2, 4, 6, 8, and 10oz bottles. Pushing the button results in an array of servo noises and then some formula comes out, pretty simple, and really, works great.  The issues i have with it are: - Right now, the little guy really wants 3oz, so a more granular adjustment would help me not waste money. - I not very happy about having 100f water laying around for that long, so I chuck the water daily and refresh it. Also the water will taste metallic if left for more than 24 hours, probably due to the large metal heating element on the bottom. They should use a non-reactive heating element and do a sanitize cycle. - Why not have a built in water filter? I use my fridges filter, but tap water is every easier! I would've payed for that. - I get cleaning the formula opening, but the having to clean and dry both dispenser parts daily is a bit of a pain, why not make it one part, and use less edges so make it easier to clean. Also change the plastic so it doesn't bead and hold water so easily. - The securing action on the bottle height adjuster is sorta flaky. People who buy this have disposable income, so make it low, and add another servo to raise the bottle to the correct height!  Overall, it's a great, but not perfect product that I would highly recommend.

No....it does not meet my expectations.  Not only  did I only receive  two bags of the metabolism  tea...when upon checking I  should have received 3...it has done absolutely nothing  for me. I grew up buying 50 cent chocolate bars at the corner store -- chocolate was something tasty, but nothing particularly special. In high school, a German exchange student introduced me to European chocolate -- wow! I was still a big milk chocolate fan, but the cheap American stuff never satisfied.

Now as an adult, I've become more concerned with the ingredients in my food and the way in which it is produced. If I want a treat, I'm a fair bit more discriminating now. The disparity between cheap chocolate candy and the good stuff (organic, fair trade chocolates) is very pronounced, and it took me a lot of research to begin spending 6x as much on chocolate bars. I believe I've come to the end of my research now that I've got Equal Exchange. Their methods are commendable, their ingredients are simple (chocolate liquor, cane sugar, cocoa butter, vanilla), and their chocolate is sublime.

I honestly don't know how they do it. The [[ASIN:B001HTKN7S Green & Blacks Dark Chocolate 85% Cocoa (10x3.5oz)]] is as smooth as this one, but it contains whole milk powder. Unlike the [[ASIN:B0063A656Y Sweet Riot Yum Bar, 85% Dark Chocolate, 3.5-Ounce (Pack of 4)]] (which basically has the same ingredients), the taste is not sour or acidic. I don't think the 5% less cocoa content in this bar makes that much difference. Chocolate snobs talk about the \\"snap\\" of chocolate bars, which I've never really understood, but this bar does have a nice snap (I think). I break the bars into individual squares and take them individually like vitamins (those flavanols have to be good for something, right?). This broke into even pieces better than any bar I've tried yet.

I was concerned about getting items that had sat around in a warehouse for a long time, so I picked up a 12-pack of bars directly from the manufacturer. I received mine in December of 2012, and the expiration date is July of 2014. Each bar is inside a plastic sleeve, which must account for the shelf life.

This is a fantastic chocolate bar. If you care about quality (both in the product and in the integrity of the company), you'll not be disappointed. That's something worth paying for, and having a luxury item like this makes eating it something special. Definitely not something you want to have on hand if you're prone to chocolate binges!

They did manage to charge me for the flowers they never sent, though.  So now I look like a jerk because my mom didn't get anything for Mother's Day, and also had to go through the extra hassle of calling to get the charge reversed.  Thanks FTD!

The Fisher-Price Woodlands Friends Space Saver Jumperoo is basically a scaled down, portable version of their Jumparoo series. We have a Rainforest Jumparoo and are on our second son with it and they both just love it. We got the space saver model as we are doing a bit of traveling and thought it would be handy to have somewhere fun to plop the 7 month old while we chase the 3 year old. In that respect, it does the trick- it is fairly lightweight, folds up easily and is portable, which if you are familiar with the full-size Jumparoo models, know is just not an option with them.

The product itself has the standard Fisher Price motif of colorful animals and bright patterns. This model has squirrels and frogs. One other positive is all the colors are gender neutral so there is no \\"boy\\" or \\"girl\\" model, so it is good for all children! As with most Fisher-Price products, we find the Space Saver Jumparoo to be of high quality that should last and allow you to use the product until your baby outgrows it and even for future children. It is sturdy plastic with plenty of support and balance and is easy to set up as everything just snaps into place. As with other Fisher-Price bouncers, it is adjustable, has several dangly things meant to catch baby's attention, and noises and lights that play when he is jumping.

Having said that, we do prefer the full size model. This Jumparoo is fine but we feel the bigger version gives him more movement- the chair swivels in a complete 360 to allow baby to follow things that are going on in the room. The full size model also has three posts with the elastic material attached whereas this model only has one. You can just tell, this model is a bit more of an effort to bounce in and he gets tired more easily. Of course we realize that you have to give something up for the mobility and space savings but if you can only get one and your space permits, we would recommend the full size version over making this your everyday bouncer. However, if you have the need and the budget for a mobile version- then this is the one you need.. However, if you have the need and the budget for a mobile version- then this is the one you need.
I ordered it untasted but I knew what I was looking for. Even better than I had hoped for. And at a great price. Will definitely reorder when the time comes.

Worst enchilada sauce I've ever tasted!!!  I had to check the can to make sure it hadn't spoiled!  It tastes like water with some cayenne seasoning sprinkled in it and a metallic taste. I have been drinking English Breakfast tea for a long time. I use Twilings mostly. On the advice of a British friend, I tried PG Tips. I was blown away by its rich smooth taste! I don't even need to add sugar to it! try it, you won't regret it.

Overall though, it does not detract too much for the intent of the toy and our little boy enjoys it a lot.
