My cat is of course not thrilled about me putting this on him, which makes it difficult to snap on, but that is no fault of the harness, so my review is not about that.  However, in order to have this tight enough that my cat cannot slip out of it with relative ease, I would have to make it choke him. If the leash is taut, and he backs away from the pressure, the harness just slips right off.  I've triple-checked the instructions to make sure I'm securing it properly, and I've had other animal-savvy people do it as well, and nothing will prevent this from happening unless I risk cutting off his airway.  I've never used a harness on my cat before, so perhaps all of them have this flaw and what I want is just impossible.

I love these stickers! They look adorable and are easy to apply!! They are quite larger than what i was expecting, the largest butterfly and flower is about 8-10 inches in diameter, which is fantastic for the amount of space i needed to fill!!

I love to drink water as soon as I get up in the morning. Drinking water is good but It does not agree with me in the morning, before meal, so instead I drink coconut water. I have tried different brands  and so far this is the best one for me. It taste fresh and sweeter not like the others.

The backs of my front row seats on my Altima have been destroyed by kids' shoes so when I leased a new Odyssey I needed to protect the seats. These mats are good quality and have been standing up to abuse for 6 months now. The straps haven't ripped like others I've tried.

When my wife told me we were going to buy a $270 bassinet I was extremely skeptical. I just didn't see a value for the short time we would be utilizing the bassinet.

Well, one month in and I am a believer. The ability to remove the bassinet from the base and move the baby to whatever room in the house with very little effort is a huuuuuge bonus. I know you can get this with other bassinets, but I doubt it as easy. The provided handles and grips make it trivial. We also have a large dog who loves his new little one and with this bassinet we can easily keep the dog from getting to the baby when he is sleeping.

The build quality is great. I don't worry about any components breaking or whether this will last us. I expect we would be able to resell this without an issue. You can buy replacement padding as well so if you have a spit up issue just swap them out and clean at your leisure.

Highly recommend and worth every penny.
This was supposed to be a variety pack but instead I received 12 of the same kind. The flavor I got tasted fine but it was disappointing that it was not the variety pack.
This looked so cute in the picture, but I did not realize this is very small, and made of paper.  I do not think this is suitable for a baby as advertised.

Tastes just like Chocolate milk but has more protein. I like the Chocolate Light version better than the regular Chocolate version. (And I would consider myself a Choc-o-holic...) :)

Highly recommend!

The flexible weighted straw is a brilliant piece of design and works really well.  The cheap plastic that the cup is made from particularly the rim around the bottom (which isn't even necessary) broke and shattered into some really sharp and easily swallowed pieces (See picture) the second time my son dropped the cup on the ground.  Sometimes I wonder if industrial designers ever test the products they make in real world situations! Anyone that has a kid knows how often the lease things get dropped.  If they redesigned the base so it wouldn't shatter into dangerous pieces when dropped I'd give it 5 stars, but given the cheap plastic and steep price for a baby cup it's no more than 3 stars.

I never had any problems with the bottles. I read a review where their baby had bad gas; remember that ALL babies get gas. It could be from what you are feeding your child not from the bottles. Try watching what you eat (if you are breastfeeding/pumping) or try another type of formula. Give the bottles another chance. I love them!
I buy it for my daughter and she is super happy and in love with her minnie mouse table set.
Fixed it in the microwave, super easy.  It came out creamy and tasty!  Surprised I liked something this inexpensive and easy...
Amazon grocery was fast and easy as usual and the mac & cheese is great, we can't get our five year old to stop eating it...price wise its a fairly good deal in comparison to the grocery store...

Finally a wipes dispenser that works. I was tired of changing my twins' diapers and wasting several wipes after each change. This is sturdy and worth every penny. I've never had an experience where more that one (ok maybee 2) came out at a time with this dispenser. Worth every penny especially if you're changing diapers for multiple babies day in and day out.

A few months back when I started working my office job, and went on a tea buying frenzy.
I brought almost every brand and almost every flavor that i saw go on sale over the course of a month at pathmark.
However, almost all the green tea brands i had brought from pathmark had a horrible aftertaste and made me want to throw up.

So far, Toasted rice green tea is the only one i have been able to tolerate without feeling like throwing up and it also has a really pleasant taste. I offered to my co-workers and managers and they all praised how great it tasted.
In a way, it is not too strong or too brunt but just right.

If you have gone to a great Japanese, it is most likely you have tasted Toasted rice green tea before.
love it used for protein shakes.  good price and speedy delivery.  I would buy again next time I need some

I became a fan for Dave's Gourmet Dave's Burning Nuts about 3 years ago.  This is a very addicting snack. A hefty dose of heat with just the right amount of saltiness. I've introduced them to a number of my co-workers who are now big fans.  I have tried the other spicy nut products on the market, but so far, Dave's is by far the champ!
This booster seat has worked perfectly for us. Even though I have a big boy, it fits great and is easy to clean. Highly recommend.

I purchased this for travel.

After reading all sorts of horror stories about pack n plays folding up on babies, I was really nervous about several upcoming trips we have. We have a standard issue Graco pack n play that is great for containing baby when we are close by. However, I couldn't get comfortable with the idea of her being in a room by herself sleeping in that now that she is wiggling all around the crib at night. The pack n play we have is the basic one with no bells and whistles.

On top of that, we recently spent 2 nights with the grandparents who have a crib for her, but no changing table. My back was screaming after 48 hours of changing and dressing her on a bed. OUCH!

So my search began. I am admittedly obsessive about purchases, and being a mother has made it much worse. I research products for weeks on line and check them out in store before buying anything.

Out of the box, the Joovy Room is impressive with its sleek design and quality materials. My den has been overrun by snuggapuppies. This is a welcome change.

When assembled, this thing is rock solid. Popping it into place is a breeze. Attaching the mattress & sheet, not so much. It takes time, but will probably get easier the more I do it. There's a lot of velcro strips to weave through holes. It makes the mattress very secure, but will take time.

The changing table is, by far, the best on the market. It's open at both ends if you have a taller baby. The height of the changing table is around 30" from the floor. A nice height to save your back. It is difficult to snap onto the side rails. I am hoping these loosen with use.

The bassinet seems very secure. I'm not sure what people are referring to about the mattress/sheet bunching up around their baby's nose. Not sure how that would happen if baby is sleeping on their back?? The bassinet is a few inches narrower than the lower play/sleep area. Because of this the mattress has cushioned side strips that fold along the long side. Instructions say to fold these under the mattress before securing in place. Maybe if they were folded up it would obstruct breathing? I'm not sure. My baby is already past the weight limit for the bassinet so we won't be using it.

The carry bag has a side pocket that is probably intended for the bassinet. Since we don't need the bassinet, I was able to get the storage shelves and the changing table (disassembled) into the side pocket. It's a tight fit, but it will go.

It would be great if Joovy made a changing table cover. The sheet that comes with it is a very, very thick t-shirt type material. Washed very nicely. I would buy a changing table cover if they made it.

Ask a Costa Rican ("Tico") what brand of coffee they have at home and the majority will tell you 1820. That support is well deserved. Normally I would buy smaller amounts (as do the locals) since the large packages on the store shelves sit unused for much longer. However since pricing on a kilo was advantageous and I have a vacuum sealer here at home I bought the full 2.2 lbs. A fresh grind of these whole beans is like returning to the patio overlooking the Golfo Dulce at sunrise...

Bigger than I expected which was a pleasant surprise...super cute...I keep all "wet" items such as my baby butt cream and my hand lotion and chap stick in here...basically anything I don't want to ruin my actual diaper bag if it were to open or leak.  It's adorable and made very well!
wish instructions were more specific on how far to space the 2 side hooks.  I didn't make it wide enough and it's sagging greatly.  I will adjust but now will have holes in walls from first try
It seem to be really good for my skin, I take it in couple times a day when I get sore throat, it even works as deodorant and so without harmful side effects. Try to always have it on my shelf.

I am not a seafood fan, and hate fishy foods with that fishy smell, and that is why I love this tuna, no fish smell, and nothing but good white chunks of tuna. The best canned tuna I have ever purchased, well worth the money!

Best Cocnut water I've tried. We have Amy & Brian among other reputable coconut water brands. This is one of our favorites by far. Its the right amount of sweet to be tasty, yet refreshing after a hard workout.

I love this soup.  I do not find it too salty at all as others have mentioned in their reviews.  It is a quick and delicious lunch or supper when I am just to lazy to cook.  Dish up with some sourdough bread and homemade butter; simply delicious.  So far this is the best price I have found for this soup too (at least when I purchased it).  I have checked other websites and my local stores.

I was looking for something special and unusual in the honey department. This was fantastic. The taste is so rich and unique, I feel that the price was well worth the amount (generous). I find myself loving this in stronger teas such as Earl Gray since it holds its own beautifully and compliments the classic taste.It will be hard for me to go back to more traditional honeys and I will keep this stocked in my pantry. I can't wait to share it with guests.

Nice Laksa taste here...on the shrimpy side smell-wise. No MSG or preservatives.

Each box makes about three cups of broth, enough for a big bowl of delicious noodle soup! However, the nutritional info on the the box says it serves nine. That's at a rate of 2 Tbsps per serving (510 mg Sodium or 21% recommended daily allowance) which isn't how Laksa has ever been served to me internationally in twenty years. Therefore, if one person consumes the soup in this box, the sodium intake is 189% RDA. That's almost twice what is recommended.

If this is correct, a big bowl of this soup is unhealthy. Too bad because it tastes great.
Good base of aromatics at a good price.  Beats the heck out of paying 6.99 for an ounce at the local grocery store.

I just received this as a shower gift, and it is -so- much larger than I thought when I registered for it. Looking at the pictures on here, it's easy to think that these are short bottles and the box is about the size of a tissue box. It is much bigger.

The bottles of soap and shampoo are full size bottles (five of them). After I took out the packing materials, I had room to add four receiving blankets, two hooded towels, and eight washclothes. The friend who gave it to me said that I didn't need a baby bathtub because the storage tote these come in is big enough to bathe the baby in. She's joking, of course, but it's is not much smaller.

I can see quite a few uses for this tote once the baby years are over. All in all, a fantastic gift.
Extremamente necessÃ¡rio em climas de frio e em meio a chuva. A capa protegeu minhas filhas com excelÃªncia. Fiquei satisfeito com minha aquisiÃ§Ã£o.

It is a shame that I can only purchase this item on line. The stores in Miami, Florida does not sell it. My husband was born in Rhode Island and remembers it from his child hood days. Besides it being good in milk it is excellent over ice cream. It would make a good adult coffee syrup for over ice cream or in a milk shake.

My newborn daughter is mesmerised by this toy and loves staring at it! I believe it is thanks to the high contrast black/white as well as the facial features - both of which are fascinating to newborns. She can't grab and rattle it yet so that part isn't helpful yet, but hopefully she will still enjoy this toy when she is able to grab it.
Used these candy rocks for my husband's "over the hill" cake.  They were exactly what I was looking for.  Not only did they look like real rocks, they tasted good as well.

Milk & butter.  That's it.  I've made this so many times I don't even measure anymore.  I think the easiest way to make it is the microwave.  Thickens up very nicely and quickly.  Is it as good as a homemade hollandaise?  No, but it's a great shortcut.  Tastes great on eggs bennie.
Lower calories and carbs.  Great Jelly Belly flavor.  These are my favorite jelly beans now.  The other sugar-free flavors are good too.

This chair rocks!  It is very secure, the rotating feature is awesome and it cleans up very easily.  This is the only review I have written about the things we got for our baby because I have been so impressed with it!  The only reason I have any issue with it is because the chair cover is a little hard to take out to wash, but no biggy compared to the ease of the chair itself!

Both my husband and I liked these noodles.  I rinsed them really well before I put them in a pan and "stir-fried" them with a little bit of sauce from the chicken and vegetables I had made.  Will buy again!

I love, love, love Tim Horton's coffee! It is the best. Everytime I go out of town I take it with me because it is the best coffee ever. The first thing that my relatives say to me when I get off of the plane is, \\"where is the Tim Horton's?\\" I am from Buffalo, NY and there are numerous Tim Horton's coffee shops here! Thank goodness! I don't know what I would do without my Tim Horton's coffee every day!!!! I even brew it at home. It is the best ever!!

We wondered about the stability of a fold away crib but this piece is extremely solid. Looks and feels considerably more expensive than it is. The drawer underneath is a great addition for storage. Very pleased with our purchase.

Battery stopped charging after 6 months use. Unit wont work plugged in if battery wont charge. I emailed for help with our 1 year warranty. Got a response 9 days later giving a long process of how to get the warranty fulfilled. Can't go without a baby monitor for that long. Bought another monitor that works while plugged in without batteries and runs off of aaa batteries so you can actually get a replacement if needed (graco brand). They don't have rechargeable batteries on their website for sale even. Wasted my money on this. Products may be ok for summer infant but without reliable customer service the warranty is useless. Need replacement parts available on a web site. Could anyone go 9+ days without a baby monitor?

For canned off the shelf chili you can't beat this stuff. Sure, I 'd love to make my own more consistently but I'm a busy guy and don't have time for that. This is a decent substitute. It works well with augmentations. I add chili powders, Mexican spice flavorings, various cheeses and rice depending on my mood. But standalone it tastes great as well. Excellent post workout meal, it fills you up at only 240 calories per serving.

This probiotic bar is so delicious! I love the minty flavor that stays in your mouth after you're finished eating it. And I must point out, as another reviewer mentioned, that there are little crispies in this bar. Delicious and you can't even tell that it is a probiotic bar! :)
These stuck very easily to my windows, but barely provided any shade.  Throwing them away and buying something better.

this can is not 32 oz as the title says. It is 23 oz. On the can it says 1lb 7oz.
16oz in a lb. Plus 7 ounces = 23.
Need to change the title of the product as it is 15% less product than is stated.

I have to agree with the other reviews at this point in time. As much as my son likes the looks of it, it collapses if tugged on. If you look closely in the picture at the clamps it shows you have to tighten them with a notch. It's not a simple clamp on/clamp off. The bar also can be moved forward or backward once on something so he can kick it from upright to down, or pull it into his face. He wasn't able to pull the string for music until he was 5 months because you have to pull pretty hard. I will say I love the look & I know he does too. I just wish it was designed better. The music also makes him smile because it's a different jingle then the one before. I don't recommend this toy bar. I wouldn't have bought it myself if I had looked closer at how this one actually attaches to objects.

This is the best! I love having this in the morning, it really helps. It does fall apart, but that gets me something to actually chew on during work. I think everyone who wants to stay awake should have a can of Major League! It's the bee's knee's!

This bathrobe and towel is simply amazing. This garment is so festive it will make your eyes cry golden rays of sunshine. By the time the baby put the robe on he was already singing "Nants ingonyama bakithi Baba!"  Now he just can't wait to be King!

This is by far one of the easiest sponges to use for bottles and nipples.  The only drawback is that they only last about a month before the bottle brush starts to rip from wear and tear.  But worth the replacement cost!!

I bought this when my son was just starting to sit up on his own.  We have hard wood floors, so I needed something he could tip over on and not bust his little head.  We've had it for 2 1/2 years now, and it's held up very well...we use it as the floor for our pop-up tents.  When not in use, it folds up pretty nicely and we stash it behind the toy box.

my son turns 5 months. he love to seat on it.
It is very comfortable to adjust the length of strap in the shoulder and hip. so both my wife and I can use together.
a back pad is a little bit high for my son but he feel comfortable and fall asleep when he is in it.
my son always bite a shoulder strap so I also buy teething pads.

These are perfect for kids. I now have three for my grandkids and always have fresh water for them when I pick them up from school. The three year old loves it and carries it everywhere by the lid and the lid hadn't broken, and he's tough with it. I will buy more.
Works well for kids to take hot food for lunch.  Both my 4 and 7 year old have had no problems with it.
This was a gift.  The receivers are enthusiastic! I would recommend this as a gift to lovers of special teas
Great idea!  My son tried it then spit it out. This product depends upon the child's preference.  Once in a while I'll catch him chewing on an end.

I found this broth last year in my local store.  I read the label and it was perfect, no onions and unsalted.  Our two cats, Vet, recommended chicken broth after dental work, and to add liquid to their diet.  Both cats love it.  The local store had stopped carrying it, so I searched Amazon.  They had a pack of 6 listed.  It was a fair price.  They were out of stock, but they let me know when it came in.  I ordered right away.  The Vet. confirmed it is still OK.  The cats are very happy, as I am.

Its blue food coloring. its hard to say anything about it really.
this container is very large , and goes a lot farther than you would think.
i have turned my 900 gallon spa a dark blue 4 times now and still have coloring left over.(sadly not a party, finding leaks)

I am the parent of 6 month old twins and have been using the Safe to Sleep for several months.

I absolutely love this product. It has provided my wife and I with total peace of mind and has been so easy to use that I can hardly believe it. There are no false alarms, no clip on sensors, no wires of any sort....just the most common sense engineering approach for sleep monitoring and the cleanest execution on the hardware I have ever seen.

The baby is simply placed to sleep on a thin padded mat filled with fiber optic filaments (which somehow sense the tiny chest movements associated with inhaling and exhaling) and every single breath is counted and reported back to either a hand held monitor or to your smart phone via Bluetooth. If the baby's breathing rate starts to slow, an alarm is sounded and sent to you BEFORE the baby stops breathing. In addition, when using the smart phone software, you can track sleep patterns over time and review them to note any unusual sleep interruptions. Somehow, the unit can even sense the difference between when your baby is lying quietly awake versus actually sleeping and report THAT back to you as well. It is super cool.

I had previously tried several different breath monitoring devices and these were simply not in the same league as this one...not even close. The very simple design of the sleep mat combined with the straight forward software makes this product incredibly easy to use and (again...unlike competing products) there is actually monitoring of every breath and virtually ZERO false alarms.

If you are concerned about SIDs and are searching for an infant breathing monitor, then this really is the ONLY product you should seriously consider.

P.S. There are some other bonus features which are kind of neat as well, including the presence of a small audio monitor which allows you to hear what is going on in the baby's room and even play soft music from your smart phone's play-list BACK TO the baby via a tiny speaker in the sleep mat, if you so choose !!! Just one of the cool engineering details from the maker's of this product.
Great variety, loved some, liked some, and it is nice to know which ones I don't want to spend the money on by buying a whole box. Would love to see more variety packs.

I like it, it's not the super roasted bean which smells sweet which you find everywhere... this, although not the best in the world, is the real deal. I either manually grind it and use a Krups pump Espresso machine or I use a Krups full Automatic machine and either way the results are good; if your espresso machine is better you should expect better results than mine.
After 7 months of use still like new is really easy to use and clean i have no problems i will recommend this item

Traveling world wide, I've come to much prefer good tea to bad coffee, and good teas are so much more common.

Yellow Label is one of the most popular teas in the world because it has a rich, clean flavor without bitterness. Its clear distinctive red color makes it also one of the prettiest. The only supermarket teas I've found in the US that taste similar are the \\"English Breakfast\\" labels. If you like these, or like strong black tea flavor without the bitterness or muddiness of overbrewing the usual black teas, you should try Yellow Label.

I was excited to receive this mobile.  My ds wouldn't sleep in his crib, and after reading the reviews I thought- this is it, lull him to sleep with this entrancing mobile.  I took it out of the package and quickly ran upstairs to attach it to the crib.  Unfortunately, it only fits in one direction, and because our crib is curvy and thick- and wasn't going to work.  But, I was desperate- "this was it" I needed my ds to sleep!  So... we crafted up a stand with 4x4's and up went the mobile (slightly tacky but for a good cause).  At first ds didn't care for it, the light was too bright for nigh time.  However, I worked it into the routine before bed.  Every night we push the same button, we rock in the chair, and then I put ds in his crib to watch the mobile.  Beautiful!  Then, one night we were rocking and I looked up to see the mobile frozen.  The music was going, but it wasn't peek-a-booing or spinning.  So I quickly assumed the batteries were dying.  After replacing the batteries and screwing it back together everything worked again.  Until the next night, yup- frozen again.  I guess the leaves are just to heavy to play peek-a-boo every night.  I purchased this mobile when my son was 3 months, he was 6 months when the mobile started freezing on us.
I use these small boxes when I travel to use in my coffee.  I cant have the guar gum found in almost all coconut milks, so this product is great.  Love the taste and creaminess of the product.

Purchased this for my 60 pound dog and it has held up wonderfully.  Is still as firm and sturdy as the day I received it which has been quite some time now  I know this was meant for babies but I think it's a great testimony that it will hold up fantastic with a 60 lb dog!!
This is probably the best raw hemp protein powder! I love how it sprouted flax and maca, raw! It makes my smoothie more tasty. ^^
Nice idea however we have a non rectangular bath and hence the scoop is too wide to fit due to the curvature of the bath. Nice idea just didn't work for us.

Because these wet bags were on the cheaper side I was very worried about the quality and figured they would leak after first use, but I went for it anyways and found that they were awesome! We have been using these bags now for several months and they have maintained the quality.  We have one in the diaper bag, one in the swim bag, and my husband uses one in his gym bag. In all uses that work great and help limit the smell from those stinky diapers and gym clothes! Also they are definitely sealed very well.  I just went through my swim bag and found a hat that had been in there for a week and it was still wet!

I purchased this pump when I was out of town and my electric pump broke! I was pretty disappointed but new it was covered under warranty so I really didn't want to throw alot of money into anything. Then I saw this one on sale at Walmart for 15$ and I needed it so I thought what the hell. I'm a first time mom and have heard pretty bad things about manual pumps however the reviews of this one were decent and for $15, I thought what the hell and I'm so glad I did! I have no problems or struggles with breastfeeding let me say that but this is perfect and better than I imagined, now I don't leave home without it! Its simple, easy to clean and actually works really well. We do a bunch of traveling and this is fabulous I just pump under my sweater and hand the bottle to my baby, I don't have to worry about a cooler or heating up the bottle or anything! Its been really fabulous and now knowing all this if something were to happen to mine id absolutely spend the full price and get the same one. Is it a little more effort? yes but you're manually pumping of course it will be! I don't normally write reviews but this product has made me want to try more nuk products. Overall like I said perfect travel pump!!

I'm not a fan of bottles, but because I have a very hungry little boy, breastfeeding alone doesn't do it.. so we have to supplement with formula. We started out with the playtex nurser system with the drop-ins, but they were so aggravating at night, so we switched to these and we really like them. They unscrew from both ends for easy cleaning, and so far haven't leaked. If you have to use a bottle, these are some I would recommend.

The product is mostly salt (290mg/tsp), with garlic & fake lemon powder made from corn syrup solids and other, unnamed ingredients.  Here's the thing- it contains no actual peri peri/piri piri) whatsoever!
I love it very much, This bag is big enough , And the bag looks very nice , love it , and seller shipping very fast , thanks.

Great stuff. I haven't seen it for sale anywhere else, but must admit that I haven't really searched. Just click and it magically arrives in a couple of days. Delicious. Silver tea is as different from green as green is from "regular" (sorry, I'm not a tea connoisseur).
Comes hermetically sealed with a near-airtight main cover (visible on the illustration) and an additional flat one on the inside. Looks like they don't want this to go stale.
Fat Chance!

The seeds they ship are dead and will not germinate. I highly recommend that you avoid this product.
You will be better off going a another company.
The straws were actually purple, and came in a sealed bag. They work fine with the boba I have used even though it is smaller than the interior diameter of the straw.
I love this product and plan on using it for as long as I can afford to.  It is a little pricey but worth it.

I love this gymini! My son was very easily bored with his bouncy seat and I needed something that would entertain him for more than 5 minutes. The gymini keeps his attention for a much longer time frame. I can easily change out toys so to him it is a new toy everyday. Also the attachments have been easy to find in a variety of stores and are not very expensive. The gymini stores simply and quickly by folding it, snapping it, and setting it against a wall, behind a chair, in his closet, etc. I have also had good luck traveling with the gymini as it doesn't take up much room and is lightweight enough to carry while juggling a baby and diaper bag. Another great feature has been the ease with which I can detach the mat and wash it - hasn't stained and comes out looking just as good as when I bought it.

I have recommened this particular gymini and Tiny Love products in general to several family members and friends.
I absolutely love these wild berries gummies.  Even better they don't hurt my teeth like most gummies do.  Now the question is do I want to get 12 bags because they could be eaten too quickly.

I got the owl bag, and it's so cute! I bought this for my Glad Rags liners, to keep in my purse. It's small enough to fit in my purse nicely, but big enough to hold a few liners, and I love that it's waterproof and holds the used ones nicely without contaminating the clean ones. Another reason I love it is I can grab it out of my purse and go to the bathroom, without feeling like I'm advertising what I'm doing.
The bag is high quality and very well made. I'm positive this will hold up for years.

I used to love Good Earth tea, they were my favorite brand. I love the use of fruit oils to flavor tea and give it a natural sweetness. However, now they added stevia to their teas. These new flavors are over the top sweet. I like to add honey or sugar to my tea, but this tea is over the top, tastes like cheap candy, sweet before adding anything. If you iced this tea and gave it to someone to taste I really don't think they would even be able to tell it's tea. It tastes more like an energy drink.

I also don't like the number of ingredients, and seeing weird ingredients. The pomegranate flavor has corn starch in it!

If you really don't like tea, like really sweet things, and want to drink tea because it's healthy or you just don't like coffee, then maybe you would like this. Otherwise there's nothing enjoyable about any of these flavors.
I tried a variety pack and this is the one I chose as my daily coffee, bold but not too bitter. Doesn't taste burnt

Is this good? Yes.  I like tuna, but I would make my tuna fish sandwiches with 1 part drained, canned tuna and 2 parts miracle whip.  Why? Because the canned tuna was so dry.  But this, on the other hand, is a dieters delight!  Not only is it not dry and pasty, but it tastes great and has your daily amount of 'good' fats!  My boss, who hates tuna, was about to vomit watching me eat it straight out of the bag.  I made her try a 'fork' of it, and she said, 'MMMMmmmmm!'  It's really that good!

My baby enjoyed this flavor when I purchased it at a store.   I ordered a case of it from Amazon.  the whole case arrived moldy.  Each jar popped when I opened it too, showing that it was properly sealed.  I contacted Earth's Best.  They said they would look into it but would not follow up with me.  Given what is going on in our food industry, I will not purchase any more products from this company.  It is to scary when feeding a baby.  Amazon refunded me but did not take it any further.  Be very careful and inform other families too.  UPDATE:  I was so disappointed with the lack of concern from Earth's Best and Amazon.  I contacted the FDA, they referred me to the USDA because the product contained meat.  They took it very serious and had also received several complaints.  They have come to my house and written a report.  If anyone else noticed this problem please contact the USDA (1-888-674-6854).  to report your claim/problem.  They will investigate the problem and the Earth's Best Plant to make sure they are following regulations.
The cases I recieved continually came open causing the pacifiers to fall out which was more inconvenient than having to dig them out of my diaper bag. Just not as durable as I had expected.

Not sure what all the hooplah is about.  bought these hoping it would be better and I would get more milk, instead, i found more milk "condensation" in the shield itself and no improvement in milk.  but I think these may really work for some people, for me it did nothing.
Couldn't find this in our home store. Enhances the taste of dishes. I use it on most everything especially meats.
I love this Oatmeal.  It's instant, I can take a pack to work, or have it at home.  You can never go wrong with Quaker oatmeal.
Didn't specify what size it is. My wife thought it was an adult size chair.

Same as all the other MAM pacifiers we have, they are great and our baby loves them.
Keep in mind though, the colors in the picture might not be what you get, took us by surprise, when we got blue male oriented drawings when we saw pink pictures in the image.

This gate is sturdy and keeps my three year-old out of the kitchen. It's very unfortunate that it has been discontinued; it was the only one I found that I didn't have to worry about him opening! He's thirty pounds, and can not operate the foot pedal. It can not be opened solely by hand, so if he wants to try to get into the kitchen he's out of luck.

If anyone knows of extensions made for a different type of baby gate that happen to fit this gate, I would appreciate a heads up. Since the product is discontinued, I can't find the First Years extensions anywhere, and I can't use this gate in my hallway without one.
looked all over for this, the perfect seasoning to put in our venison to make it taste just like sausage.  This is what our butcher uses for sausage and it has a great taste.

I love lemon.
I love green tea.
I love the fact that there is almost zero caffeine in this product.
No jitters, no crashing, just a great tasting product that mixes easily in my shaker bottle.
Yummy.
Light.
Refreshing.
Recommended.
Baby gift for my grandson who isn't here yet. The parents chose this, I know they all will love it.
These things are great but you guys need to rethink your distribution channels if you think anyone will pay $20 for a $3 bag of pretzels.
I am a coffee drinker, but use these in the afternoon in lieu of coffee. Good blend of green tea and chai.
It was easy to put up, it looks great. it arrived quickly. Packaging was good. It's a great value! We love it!

It is quiet and quite comfortable, gets the job done and make like a whole ton easier for a mommy. It fit perfectly in the baby bag and was really discreet when i was at work. It's been nearly a year and it's still going strong no break down no replacements necessary. I love this breast pump
This is a wonderful product,  not sweet and adds just a slight amount of flavor.
We love this potty!!  It goes everywhere with us.  Easy to use, easy to clean (now or later).  Recommend it to all of our friends with kids.

My daughter is obsessed w/her Wubbanubs (yes, we have 6 of them).  This one is SO CUTE and totally girly.  It washes very nicely too.  A couple others we have are covered in lint after washing and this one isn't.  Worth the price!
My husband was thrilled with this gift! It was perfect, kids got a kick out of it too. Fast shipping, arrived in plenty of time for Christmas. Great stocking stuffer!

These things are great! I got them after I went to the Doctor and she complained that I didn't have enough Good Cholesterol. She said either get more cardio and/or eat chia seeds. I knew I wasn't going to attempt doing cardio for a while, so I thought I would try chia seeds.

Chia seeds are fantastic. You just put a spoon-full in a glass of juice (Don't use a glass of water...), then wait about 15-30 minutes (or longer), then get a straw and drink up! It actually adds to the experience of drinking juice. It's like drinking the little balls in boba tea, just something you can eat while drinking. But definitely use a straw, or else it's not as good.

But why should you get this brand specifically? No reason, chia seeds are pretty standard, so if there's a better price, go for that one.

My boy loves this cradle swing.  He can kick his leg and it rocks him back to sleep automatically.  I had a bassinet for my first, and like this one much better.  No bells and whistles, but you don't need them at this age.  It's just a sweet, simple cradle.

I thought this would be a cute silhouette to hang up pegs on to give the allusion of a coat rack without actually having the space for one. It looks okay, I just really don't like it. I left it up for a few weeks thinking maybe I would change my mind or it would grow on me, but no. I like it less now than I did. It's not very tall, more the size of a coat rack for a child, which is a weird thought anyway. Why would a child have a coat rack, they don't care where their coat is stored. Anyway, the quality is good and I didn't have any problem putting it up or even reapplying when I got the angle off. I just don't like how it fits into my living room.

I bought these for my 2 year old and about a month later, I started noticing mold coming out of the toy when I would squirt the water out. There is no way for the inside of the toy to dry, so mold grows in there. I had to throw all the toys out. I do not want my child getting sick from this mold.
when i see the price drop again, i will buy many cases. in the meantime, whole foods sells the same kind for about $1.25 a can.

My 11 month old has been eating these since she was around 7 months.  She showed some sensitivity to all grains except for rice so we looked around for something for her to have as a snack - this product fit the bill.  She likes the puffs fine in this flavor - now that she has been able to tolerate other grains I have tried her on other flavors thinking she must be bored of the same flavor all the time - but so far she only likes this flavor.
Everyone found this so funny! Great if you want to draw attention to your baby.
A great way to save a little money and do a frappe from home.  I used some mini ice cubes to blend with and an espresso roast. It was delicious.

I was excited to see Green Goddess salad dressing on the shelf at the market today....
Could hardly wait to try it. Had it on my salad this evening.
Boy was I disappointed... and after looking at the ingredients there is no anchovy in there.
This flavor really is terrible in my estimation!!!
I will never purchase it again and will probably throw out the rest of the bottle.
I gave it one star because that's the least I could give it... save your money and look for a recipe for authentic Green goddess salad dressing and make your own

I guess it was my fault for thinking that the gum would actually have the flavor of beans and pork
But, as gum, it sucks all around. The flavor goes quicker than Fruit Stripe Gum :(
The best way to get Jelly Belly... a good price.. and you only get the flavor you want.

The product arrived on time, the quality of the material is ok and looks fine. Its something that you will be comfortable to lay on. Its very soft, and its cool to the skin perfect for hot weather.

**got this product with discount for my review

The place I usually buy my beans stopped carrying Starbucks beans and I couldn't find a good price anywhere nearby so decided to try this.  I was worried about the Best Before dates, thinking these may be close to expiring but they all are good till summer and will be long gone by then.  The price is a little lower then what I was paying.  My only wish is that I could pick a variety for the 6 bags but the French Roast is one of my favorites so am still happy.
Bought this based on the other reviews and really like it.  Soft blades, but creates a fairly strong breeze.

I'm so happy I found this product because it's a great alternative to regular peanut butter. It tastes amazing when you mix it with almond/coconut milk and banana. I've also found so many great recipes for protein bars and low fat cookies.

Wanted to get something interesting for my wife for Christmas with our baby due just after. Found this and love it.

Shipping was fast and came in just as described.

My 20 month old recently started climbing out of his crib in the middle of the night.  It was VERY, VERY worrisome and I was pretty desperate for a solution.  This was the perfect answer!  It keeps him safe (there's no way he can get out) and that's a huge relief for me - well worth th $60!  I just make sure to completely close the zipper so he doesn't figure out a way to squeeze his finger in between and open it up.  As a word of caution, I could see how some kids would hate it and maybe feel \\"strapped in,\\" so immediately after I set it up we played several games while he was in it - giving kisses through the mesh and pretending to grab him but not being able to.  My son loves it (he even tries zipping it up himself) but I think it's important to make it fun and special from the start!  I would definitely buy this again.

I have bought from this company before. There is a major change in the SIZE of their containers. The description states \\"packed in large\\" containers.  FOR INSTANCE...Garlic powder (granulated). The last container was also \\"large\\" and rightfully so as it was 18 OZ. Today, I ordered the same product...and the picture caused it to LOOK like a large container but it ONLY had 10 oz of the item. You would NOT know the difference just by looking at the PICS.  This is all true for many of the product I purchased...Not a good thing to mislead consumers like this.

This is easy to make and delicious! It's got just the right \\"zing\\". I've served it with tortilla chips, crackers and pita chips. All you need is the mix, cream cheese and butter to create a yummy appetizer.

I don't know why I am so enamored of this flavor of Kettle Brand potato chip. I buy at least 4 big bags of them every time I go to the store. They are delicious. They're sweet and salty, just the perfect blend. It's like crack on a chip.
The taste is not as good as i thought. The price was OK but it ship fast, i don't too long.

This is a short review. The reason for this is that I have these bars in my kitchen cabinet. Frankly, I want to eat them more than I want to write about them. So excuse me ( a cup of java and a bar ... it doesn't get much better.)

Bye
My husband and I love this dressing!  Tried it today on mesquite chicken sandwich and it was wonderful.  Can't wait to try it on other recipes and salad.  Would highly recommend.

I was looking for a good apple spice herbal tea and found it with this tea. The tea has a strong apple flavor and a great natural sweetness so you can easily drink it without sweetener for those looking for a good alternative to sugar-laden cider. And when I say it tastes like cider, it really tastes like cider. Also works great if you want to fragrance your home with the delicious smell of apples. Good job, Tea Forte, now you make me want to buy more of your slightly overpriced tea.

Oh btw, Amazon has great prices on Tea Forte's loose leaf tea. You can't beat 12 bucks and free shipping.

This is the only bowl that my son has not been able to pull of the table.  It has a 2 part system and can be difficult to get on and off, but once you have it on correctly, it really stays put!  Very handy if you have a strong little one that loves to throw everything on the floor from the highchair.

This carseat is light and easy to carry with your child in it. The base that comes with the carseat makes it easier to travel and get in and out of the car with your child. I would recommend this product to new moms. It's worked great for me.
My daughter loves huskies so I got her this one as a gift. Beautifully made and so realistic. She loved it. It was delivered in perfect time and was great value for money.
So dissappointed--buy these in the store often and they are delicious.  Every package was stale.

My husband and I really like these as they are super simple to get out and just the right size to not over eat.  Great for children and adults alike.  Just warm up some water and dip the one in that you want removed and it comes right out.  I've had some that never come out and leave half of it in the container.  Easy to clean and a great product.

This is the coolest-looking drying rack for my daughter's bottles and it holds both large and small Dr. Brown's bottles.
The 8oz bottles aren't as locked in as the 4oz, but it holds them enough that they don't fall over.

Love this little hummingbird! I keep it in my purse, take it everywhere with me. Even the packaging is adorable. The readings are accurate and the key is to pull the ear just as the instructions say in the packaging. :) Happy camper here!!

In the low sodium world it is hard to find products that you did not personally prepare that you can have and that taste good too.  I was happy to find these crackers and also happy to note they were gluten free because I have a family member who needs gluten free products.  It's nice to have more options.  It is everything I was looking for in a snack cracker.
I love to make thyme tea, and this is good quality and aromatic. A bit rough if you take it straight, but mixed with other herbs it's great.
the color is not exactly like the picture, it is a neon yellow and the middle part of the butterfly comes off by just touching it
My 6-month old grandson likes the penguin, and, of course, he enjoys putting the beak directly into his mouth. The squeaker in the handle is a soft sound that is easy for him to use.
I bought this for an unusual purpose, ultrasonic cleaning of small brass parts, when it is dissolved in hot water. 5# will last me my lifetime.

I am on chemotherapy which leaves me constantly feeling nauseous and feeling upset to my stomach. Peppermint helps with that so I like to keep these on hand. They're always fresh and soft. Love these!
I can't believe how reasonably priced these were. They were still fresh and pliable even a month after purchase. The homemade vanilla extract I made from these is amazing.
These are pretty average snacks for being gluten free.  I like how low calorie they are.  The taste can get annoying though.  I know that I won't buy these again.

But not really. As an Englishman living in the States, Amazon, and it's selection of yummy UK food is just a terrible, terrible influence on me, regularly presenting me with all of my favorite UK treats. These are among my favorite. Little crunchy rings with a nice strong hit of salt and vinegar. A bag (and I mean a bag that like this contains 7 bags) is gone in no time. I'm sure these are not healthy, but who cares, they are SO delicious :-)
I love green tea, I love matcha, I love organic. This is smooth and tastes great when added to warm milk, Price is better than I can find locally.

I purchased their popcorn popper and then purchased the 5lb bag of organic popcorn.  I love the popper but unfortunately, the popcorn is super chewy.  I kind of wondered if it was maybe the popper so I bought another brand of organic popcorn and it was perfect.  I love any company that is organic and it was probably just a random thing, maybe just stale, but I will probably try to get my organic popcorn elsewhere.
Soft and great fitment on crib mattress.  I used it to coordinate with a Yo Gabba Gabba fleece throw instead of buying a bedding set.  She thanks me for the sheets every night,

Found this EXTRA LARGE jar on Amazon.  This was a birthday present for my 28 year old son. This is an English staple, spread on buttered toast.  The taste is heaven although requires a taste adjustment to get used to.  Once you like it you have to have it around all the time.  Sometimes hard to find in stores, but very easy on Amazon. Get Some Today!!

This is really a tasty and moist cake mix!  This mix has just enough yellow cake mix and chocolate to suite your appetite especially if you can't decide. All you need  is vegetable oil (I used canola), water and 3 eggs. It was very easy to spread the frosting on the top without tearing the top layer off the cake! Give it a try! I bought mine for under $2!
Oh, the horror......  This idea does not work.  We pranked people with the finished product.  YUCK!

I bought a box of these at Ocean State Job Lot.

Unless I bought a bad batch, these chips do not have any rosemary flavor to them. They do have a very strong garlic flavor, and I like garlic, so I give them 1 star (and not zero). The chips are edible, but they are very salty and I can't recommend them.
They did it again...meditating while combining high quality fruit, nuts, and a fair amount of fine liquor is a noble pursuit enjoyed by the masses!

Best price I've found for goat milk.  When I have a litter of puppies, I go through a lot of goat milk.  I use it for both the mother dog and for the puppies.  I love the ability to purchase this product by the case to keep my costs down.

Been using these bottles for almost two months. After trying the Comotomo Natural Feel and the Lansinoh mOmma, my husband and I found this bottle to be the best. It really does a great job at minimizing air bubbles and it's standard shape is convenient. Our son is breast fed and had no problems with this bottle from the start.
These were a big hit at my house. We have to watch our sugar intake, so Sugar Free Cherry Cordials were a real treat. They were so good, we will order more next Christmas.
I am not sure I like the \\"truffle\\" part of this flavor.  Not sure I would buy this again.
Both my cats love this high quality treats and I feel good about giving them treats that are non-fattening!  Well worth the cost as a little goes a long way!

We have another Britax seat and decided to get another one for the other car. While overall this seat is OK, I am very disappointed that this seat is difficult to adjust. I often have to take my child's jacket off so she can fit in the seat.

sent this to my 1 year old grandson that lives out of state, my son said he moves kind of slow and he is not really interested in this, he likes to chase the rumba though, now if we could only make a toy that move like a rumba!

After weeks of researching stollers, we bought this one because it is cute, got great reviews and seemed to fill all our check boxes.  HOWEVER, what nobody has mentioned is that this stroller is always in a reclining position.  There is no way to make it sit up straight.  This means that my son is always sliding down against the single crotch strap.  He cannot sit up properly in this stroller and we wind up readjusting him every few minutes until he's had enough and starts screaming.  We have not even once made it more than 10-15 minutes with my son in this stroller, usually less.  And can you blame him?  Nobody wants to have a 1 1/2\\" strap binding your diaper.  I cringe each time my husband puts this thing in the car as I know I'll end up carrying my 30 pound son and pushing this bulky stroller around with all our bags in the seat to keep it from tipping over backward.  It does have good maneuverability, if you use 2 hands but it is hard to push with just one.  Not a good buy.
Works well if you have the time. THE AFFORDABLE CARE ACT provides, every lactating mom with a cost free double electric pump. Yup, every single one ðŸ˜Š

I tried to use this pump when my daughter was ~4 weeks old and it HURT so much that I wanted to cry.  Also, it took me 30 minutes to pump ALMOST 2 ounces.  At that point, I thought that pumping was just not for me.  A few weeks later we bought the Medela Pump in Style and it worked GREAT (I got 6 ounces in 5 minutes) and did not hurt at all!  Yes - it is much more expensive, but totally worth it.  After using the Medela for a few weeks, I tried this pump again and it still hurt and barely pumped anything.  I agree that the suction is just not right.  While I do love all of the other products I have from Avent - I really feel that this pump was a waste of money.

My daughter loves her new booster seat. It's lightweight but sturdy, as well as cute.  She says it is comfortable too. The cup holder/snack holder is extremely handy.  The snack holder is perfect to hold juice boxes or pouches.

First off the Jelly Belly Jelly Beans are great in taste and it is fun trying to guess which flavor you have. You could use the chart on the jar to tell you the flavor but what would be the fun in that. The price is great as I paid $10.00 at the local candy store for one pound. In fact they took them from the same jar that is pictured above.

There is only one thing missing. A candy dish for the coffee table. I check Amazon for a candy dish and found a real nice one shaped like a Hershey's Kiss. It was cut crystal and fit my coffee table well.

My neighbors come visit me more often now and don't leave till they hit the candy dish at least once. Now that could be good or bad depending what your neighbors are like.

So I guess all that is unanswered is: Will they ever come out with the 50th flavor? (my cat is suggesting Fish flavor but don't listen to him).

I purchased this along with several other brands when my daughter was about 6 months old as she was transitioning diaper sizes and I wanted one that would grow with her. We use the standard cotton prefolds with a GroVia liner to catch the mess. The incredibum has plenty of adjustments as well as flaps on the inside front and back that cover the top of the prefold. The fabric is pliable and soft and leg gussets are good, although we are mostly over any blowouts I think this would keep them in if fitted tight enough. We are able to reuse them for several changes, which is nice.

She is now 10 months old and on the tall and skinny side (29\\" tall and 17.5 lbs). The rise is fine (we are on the middle row of button) but she is in between the two snaps that affect the leg and waist closure. So either her leg holes are a little loose or the top has a bit of a gap. I prefer to keep the legs on the tighter setting to avoid leaking, and the inside flaps do seem to prevent any leaking out the top.

Overall, I think it's a good product and would recommend.

i got this tea at wal-mart. it does smell odd but it is a fruity smelling oddness and not a urine type smell however it is quite as intense. anyway, if u don't judge it by the somewhat pleasant and at the same time somewhat offensive aroma, it does taste really good.

Very, very good tea!!! You will have 400 bags for this little price.  I tried one in a metal bin (Bentley's Finest Tea Classic Collection, 120-Count Tea Bag in Assorted Tins (Pack of 2  and it was the worse tea.
Cute and soft. Have only washed once so far, but looks like it will hold up.
Absolutely love these juices...and only 5 calories.  Also they do not raise my blood sugar levels which is important for a diabetic.

I had signed up as a subscribe and save customer (every 6 months), but was recently notified it's no longer available as such. Tartufo Nero, or Black Truffles, are some of my favorite things on earth, and so when I found this, then tried it, I feel deeply in love. Excellent as a finishing salt on polenta, risotto, you name it. I seriously hope this comes back, and when it does, I hope the price stays as affordable as when I ordered it in early 2013. The perfect balance of salt to truffle ratio. A must-own for foodies. Highly recommended. If I could give this 6 stars, I would.

This bib will keep your toddler dry and stop a lot of the mess from reaching your floor.  Those other plastic pocket bibs are a waste of time.  Get this one!  You only need ONE seeing as they wipe clean instantly.  You can even put it in the dishwasher too.

Before buying the Britax Parkway I went into the local Babies R Us to see the difference between the Britax Frontier & the Britax Parkway. The Frontier was much bulkier & heavy, it kinda looked like a hybrid between a booster seat and a convertible seat. As for the Parkway it was lightweight and seemed easier to use.  After weighing the pros and cons with my husband we decided to go for the Parkway.  When we received our order from Amazon our daughter couldn't contain herself since she was so excited to step up from her Britax Boulevard convertible seat to her new booster seat.She was so proud to be a big kid that we could not get her out of the car & her new booster seat when we took her to the park.

Just finished a can of Del Monte's fruit cocktail. There was a ton of peaches (kinda sour)...what you wanna bet peaches are real cheap. I must admit I did finally reach some pears at the bottom. The grapes were mushy and tasted second rate. The cherries were OK but also mushy.
After I was done I drained the left over juice in the sink..it had a yellowish color to it...from all the peaches no doubt.
Now I must admit the pears were firm, and tasted good, my last can of pears from a "competitor" had tough pieces in it (hence an extra star).
The can of fruit as a whole just tasted lightly lightly lightly (3x) sour, just a hint.
Maybe I just bought this item out of season (Aug 2015) or it was a bad year for grapes...I am not impressed.
The straps for the bags are a little uncomfortable on my shoulders so I plan to buy one of those seatbelt covers to fix that.  Otherwise, it's good so far for the price.
Love this stuff! Perfect pick-me-up with a gentle stimulant that doesn't make you shaky like caffeine does.
Good to get a strawberry tea back, as I was missing the old one. This one is a little lighter.

My godson has been enjoying his monkey luggage. He carries his ukulele Leggos, and train toys inside of it. He's had it for two months and it still looks great however, when i received it, it had a screw or two loose in the inside of the luggage. Did not return it because he could not part from it.

The joint where handle bars connected has a plastic guard that bent in one time when were unfolding the stroller. Now every time we unfold the stroller, we have to adjust that bent piece of plastic. It's a tight fit, so it's hard to pull it out and set the joint at the same time. It's an expensive stroller, and this is definitely a flaw in the design.

This blanket is awesome. I've used it at the beach with my two kids and husband, in damp grass, on sidewalks... everywhere. I love how easy it is to fold and clean, and the color is fun. Have definitely recommended this to friends.

When buying this basket I was a bit sceptical about it. But after using it for a few months I've been very surprised as to how effective it is for getting teets and beaks cleaned in the dishwasher. It takes very little room and does a perfect job. I haven't had to re-wash anything and can't live without it anymore. No more hand washing bottles and teats! I would certainly recommend this product to new parents.

Quaker made their FAB debut in my 2012 Holiday VoxBox by Influenster and I am beyond happy it did. I loved the real fruit and great taste of Quakers original oatmeal, this quick breakfast food is easy to take on the go and handy! Would love everybody to try at least one of their favorite flavor from the four and get addicted!
Great way to get the fiber needed for my family and with a great taste. This was a great buy!
Exactly what I needed to hold the signs for our school's car line drivers to use at pick-up time. Great product. Prompt delivery.

This co-sleeper seems to be very sturdy, until you try to add risers on the legs to make the sleeper higher.  Then it becomes unstable and unsafe for a newborn or infant.  Also, the online product description does not tell you that you cannot use the sleeper with a platform bed.  We didn't learn that until we got the sleeper home, unpacked, and at the end of the instructions found a P.S. of sorts..."not to be used with platform bed."  So had to return this item for those two reasons.  Vendor gave a full refund, though, which was nice!

Love this stuff!  Spectrum offers excellent products!  They are very good about "vacuum sealing" their products, so that they do not loose nutrients from oxidation and to ensure optimum nutritive benefits and product freshness.  I will only buy their brand.

We were afraid this would not grip tight to the wall of the bathtub as my brother needs it for stability as he showers, but it gripped very tightly and has not slid or gotten loose since installed.  Love it.

This stroller is amazing. Tall, smooth riding, roomy and comfortable for the child. The canopy is the size of a full size strollers canopy, which no other umbrella has. Definetly better than any other high-end umbrellas Maclaren and Britax do not compare to the quality of this stroller. Joovy also has wonderful people behind it. From the VP Greg Gardner to the woman who took my order I was treated wonderfully. I am extremely pleased with my decision to buy a Joovy.

My boyfriend grew up in Rhode Island & said he used to drink coffee milk. I guess it's a RI tradition. I'm a Jersey girl and had no idea what it was until he explained it & said it had to be Autocrat. He is now enjoying it in his milk even though we now live in Florida. I like a little splash in iced coffee. It adds a bit more flavor without tasting too strong.
Doesn't taste right. I don't have picky taste buds at all either. I've used all types of sugar free mixes & soft drinks and never thought any had an OFF taste like this does.

This is a great little sun hat for a baby.  I bought it as I can not put sun screen on my little one yet.  It gives full protection to the back of the head and the neck because of the longer 'flap' in the back and gives nice protection for the face.  Material is UV blocking.  Hat fit my 4 month old just fine, not too big and not too small in the 0-6mo size.  I would definitely buy it again or recommend it to friends.
I like this coffee but t doesnt say anywhere the caffeine level.  I found this to be stronger than most.  Very good taste.

I was picturing an effervescent explosion of sweet cola flavor in my mouth. I love the taste of Coke, but I don't drink caffeinated beverages or sugared sodas anymore. So I thought this might be a pleasant way to get that delicious cola flavor every once in a great while.

What I got was a flat little jolt of sugar and a sour cola taste. Also, for whatever reason, this candy scratched the roof of my mouth. It has a very unpleasant texture. I don't know what I was thinking when I ordered it. I stumbled across it and thought, \\"hey, that looks tasty\\".

I was wrong. :(

I bought this product for taste, convenience and weight for backpacking. This product is so great to have on hand when in the outdoors, not only does it taste great and combines with so many other proteins. It's so easy to prepare and packs a lot of energy. SHOP AND SAVE really brings the price down and Prime adds no cost shipping. Whats not to love.

We purchased two, putting one on each side of the stroller. We went to kings dominions waterpark and one we stuffed with everyones wet bathing suits (there are 7 of us!). It held perfectly. This is the only dog spray that I will use! My local dog supply store first started carrying it couple of years ago but then abruptly stopped. I'm psyched about this!  The shipping was a bit long (3+ weeks), but that was the USPS' problem...  As soon as I got it, I took 3 tubs of stuffed animals and stuffed this bad boy to the hilt!  Cool! I bought this product to use in my cat's litter box!  Strange, but true.  I add about an 1/8 of a cup to fresh litter and it really helps keep the odors away.  Happen to read an article about different household item remedies and adding green tea leaves to the cats litter box helps control odor.  And it really does!  So instead of cutting open a bunch of tea bags each week, I decided to buy the loose leaf tea and where better to buy it than Amazon.  So, if you read this and have cats, give the green tea a try.  It really works.
Love chocolate.  Love roasted soy nuts.  Together it is quite amazing!  Best soy nuts I've ever tasted.  Don't mind the dark chocolate, I prefer it. Can't think of anything I would rather snack on.

After rave reviews from friends, I picked up a bottle of this exotic looking sauce in the supermarket. After using it in all three of my meals in one day (eggs, chili, and pasta), I am now a dedicated fan of this chili sauce. There's an initial garlic note, followed by a curious sweetness and then the wonderful, wonderful burn of chili peppers. It's as complete a hot sauce as you're likely to find. I recommend trying it on the tip of your finger first, and on its own as a condiment before mixing it into other sauces. It serves every purpose well, and is the only everyday hot sauce I'll need.    Those who appreciate spicy food will find this sauce to be something of a culinary religious experience.

Pretty good, except that I dropped one on the floor (it was straight out of the fridge and, full disclosure, we have a very hard tile floor), but I was shocked that the thing shattered when it hit the floor. The lid didn't come off-- the bottom of the thing actually broke off. I've never seen plastic do that before. So we are extra careful now not to drop them.
My seven year old son loves these, and I haven't been able to find them locally.  He eats them for breakfast or just as a snack, and they far surpass most kids' cereal for nutrition, including fiber.

I had someone visiting that requires a gluten  free diet . I make a mean marinara sauce so I ordered this pasta So that she could try it .  I personally enjoyed it immensely and could not believe it wasn't the real thing . Not only that, but I did not feel full or bloated after two bowls of it. I think I'm going to replace my pasta with this product because it taste so good and feels so good when I'm done eating.  It took exactly the same cooking time as regular pasta and my friend was surprised that the usual gluten free pasta characteristics did not exist with this product Like gooey and stickiness. I would highly recommend this product even if you don't Require the gluten free diet. Another point is as a leftover it was just as good which I understand is not true with Gluten free pasta.

This is a great gate.  I actually didn't mess up any holes during installation which was great.  It's very sturdy and an attractive wood that doesn't seem to be finished but it very smooth.  Slides nicely and my favorite part is, if you want to remove the gate, it just lifts out of the hinges.  You don't have to unscrew it or remove the hardware.  And then when you want to put it back, it just slides back in.  No complaints here. Swings both ways which is good, and it's help up to my 20month old banging it into the door, so I'd say it's sturdy

I've tried lots of other starters for Kefir and usually ended up buy LifeWay Kefir which is ok, but still thick and so far from tasting like real Kefir back in Russia. I was excited to discover this brand! It makes such a delicious Kefir in a very easy way. Good and healthy product to buy!

I love glass,chrome legs & drawer.  My kitchen is done with stainless steel, black and glass items. I also have a black K-cup drawer and a chrome carousel.  I think every one should have one, very professional looking. By far the glass and chrome drawer is one of the best in my opinion. I love it.

Of all the gluten free cereals I have tried, this is my favorite.  The flakes are crispy in milk (for a bit anyway) and very tasty.  I have it with almond milk, walnuts and fruit. It makes for a lovely breakfast.

This is a awesome cup. My daughter is in love and so am I!
All my girlfriends are amazed at it - easy to throw in the dishwasher with only 2 parts and no hard to reach places.
Excellent for travel. ..adapts well to different toilets. Secure fit, so kid feels safe & stable! I own 2 now!

I bought this for my daughter's 1st birthday. We have them at our daycare. The baby, 1 year, and my 2 year old room all have them. The kids all love to snuggle in them while the teacher sits beside them and reads. You wouldn't think the infants would love them as much as they do. My daughter has been crawling over to the flip sofa, sitting on it and grabbing a book to look at for several months now at daycare. Don't pay the $70 amazon wants, you can get it for $45 at your local toy store.

As first time grandparents, it was time to start thinking about an infant again in the family. Long gone are our car seats, baby baths, toys, etc. It is like starting all over again but this time, we get to give the baby back! :)

The Safety 1st OnBoard Plus Infant Car Seat is an outstanding choice for the baby's car seat. Not only does it provide comfort for the baby but it has some outstanding safety features and it is easy to install.

The name says it all. Safety 1st. And this seat is expertly designed for safety. It can be installed for both rear facing and front facing modes. The side impact is protected by what they call Air Protect +, where it puts the best protection around the head. This provides excellent peace of mind.

Most people cringe at the thought of installing a car seat but Safety 1st makes it very easy. As with most modern seats. you have the LATCH open which provides easy and safe installation of the seat. We had no problems getting the seat installed and secure.

The seat is also easy to carry. While having some heft to it even without an infant, it is quite easy to carry and the curve and design of the handle makes it so easy.

Your baby/grandchild is very important to you. Having the safety features and easy of use make this a no-brainer choice for your next car seat.
Gives amazing flavor to chicken or pork. My extended family is from Jamaica and if they recommend this then it can't be wrong!
Our first born is not here yet but this set looks beautiful in her room. the items arrived quickly and we are very happy with our purchase.
I made my best turkey dressing ever using this sage.  Fresh and fragrant.  This is a LOT of sage, so split an order with a friend, and you'll still have enough for a long time.

to see how many calories, grams of salt or anything else is in this popcorn.  It's not something that I eat very often, but when I do eat it, I enjoy it.  The corn is already popped, you just tear the slit in the bag on top as noted and put it in your microwave.  I have found that if I leave it in for the time listed on the bag, it does tend to scorch the popcorn, so I just put it in a shorter period of time.  Once done, I pour out just the amount I want and enjoy it.  The rest gets closed back in the bag and I enjoy it another day.  It's close to the popcorn that you just have to have when you smell it in the movie theater.  This is a hit and miss item in the grocery store, they used to have it all the time, now it's become harder to find, so I went to good ole Amazon and found it.  The company makes other flavors, but they are not ones that can be warmed in the microwave and I have not tried any of them.

I am so happy that I can order Cremora delivered to my door.  It has a unique flavor among all other powdered creamers and once I was hooked on it, I had to have it for my coffee.  I shall continue to order it online until I find it in the grocery store again.
Used this for my 2010 BOB stroller and my 2010 graco snug ride infant car seat. It works great. Feels very sturdy, especially when using the foam block that comes with it and the red safety belt.

I'm giving 3 stars because while I love the colors and the quality, they don't really help much with the excessive drool from teething. We first got these when my baby was 6 months old and while it's fun to coordinate, the bibs don't really protect her little neck and chest from all the drool. They just soak right through. I wouldn't recommend these as teething bibs - maybe just for mealtime and that's it.
Fast shipping. Great purchase. The jelly assortment is convennient for travels an snacks: in and out. The flavors and quality are perfects.

I LOVE LOVE LOVE this tea. It tastes divine, is caffeine free, and yummy both hot or cold. I've been using it only up until ovulation and then switching to pregnancy tea post ovulation in case of pregnancy, but as soon as I know I'm not, I switch right back to this!
Does help cup train. One thing I didn't like was how you have to slam the cup down to get the cap off. That's not a trick it's in the directions. So weird very loud.

Don't get me wrong we LOVE them!  My daughter won't sleep with anything but these which was a problem because something happened with her baby ones. First off, this is a great carboy for brewing.  Since you do not have to be concerned with head-space I use this as my primary.  Even vigorous fermentation of a 5-gallon batch does not reach the airlock.    What kind of sucks is Amazon's labeled shipping.  This says it is Prime Eligible in both the general search results and in the product description, but when you go to checkout nothing but standard shipping can now be selected.  I say \\"now\\" as I had ordered one a couple weeks ago and could select Prime shipping even though it did not show as such on the receipt.  I got the carboy on the second day.    When I went back to order a second the Prime option was nowhere to be found.  When I called Amazon the rep told me it was not eligible and she would have their programming team remove the indicator.  One and a half weeks later it still shows.    So to summarize, carboy good, Amazon weak.

I became addicted to eating these the first time I tasted them which was years ago. Once you eat one, you just can't stop until they're gone. They aren't too sweet and make the perfect snack. I love these things!!!

I love it! Great quality, very cute for little
Girls nursery or room. Its exactly what I wanted and the price is perfect!
My soon really enjoyed mawing on this with his gums, but as soon as his first tooth erupted, he bit a hole in it.
Absolutely adorable.  Had to buy two, because my grandson wouldn't give it up.  Absolutely adorable!  They should come out with a pink version for girls.

I purchased this for my daughter when she was 2 months old. I was exhausted because she just would not sleep in her bassinet. This thing is a life saver! I purchased two. The first one I purchased did not have a vibrating feature. This one does and she loves it. She is now 4 months old and still loves to sleep in it. My only regret is not purchasing one before she was born!

Vulli Sophie the Giraffe Teether is a classic toy!  I was skeptical but thought I'd give it a try and I am so glad I did!  My son loved it starting at about 4 months. The only thing is the squeaker does resemble my dog's toys. So on occasion a person may have to rustle it away if the have a dog that loves squeaky toys. Otherwise a great toy!
