Normally these are a favorite formy girls. Now I'm stuck with four boxes of jaw stressing lumps of gelatin. Bummer....

We received this at our baby shower, and when my son was 3.5 months old I got it out, put it together and started putting my son in it for brief periods. He is now 5 months old, and this toy NEVER gets old! He loves it! I love the Exersaucer because it is great to put him in when I need to cook, clean, etc...I don't have to worry about him rolling or crawling away from his blanketed play area while there are things I need to do. Its also great to use if you want to watch a movie...I just pull it next to the couch, and ever so often talk to him and help him play with the toys, by doing this I can enjoy a movie with my husband, keep my son entertained(the entire movie), and not feel like I am ignoring my son. It isn't as hard as it seems to put together, except for that rattle roller with the monkey's in it...It was a pain to get on, lol! I put it together rather quickly. The toys on it are all interesting...he loves when the Circus Tent plays music and I sing along. The little "book" is always interesting to him, whether I am reading it to him, or he's flipping the pages by himself. Sometimes, he gets really interested in the roller rattle...he'll spin it and spin it, and lean in close to study the monkey's bananas, and beads in it. The other toys are basically just teethers, he loves to move the balls on the seal toy, and the elephant is his favorite toy(he is always playing with it, chewing it, and holding it). The snack tray, which we don't use for snacks yet, is great for holding a pacifer. This past weekend we went to my mother in law's to spend the night, and I decided to take the Exersaucer. It is easy to collapse, easy to carry, and travels well. My son and I really recommend this toy! In fact, his granny(who will be babysitting when I go back to work) just bought the Wild Thing Exersaucer...which he'll probably love also.

I really like this monitor. The video and audio quality are great. The infrared LEDs/camera work flawlessly. It's easy to set up and does exactly what we wanted. We travel with it, and find it has become an essential part of how we take care of our son.

There are just a few nits that keep me from giving it 5 stars:
* I wish the camera used micro-USB as well as the handset so that it didn't need special adapter and cord.
* The battery doesn't quite last a whole night so you either have to plug it in before you go to bed or when it starts beeping in the wee hours of the morning.
* It sometimes loses signal when you put it near WiFi devices like your phone or computer, but you can usually just move it a few feet to fix things.
* Our handheld monitor stopped charging correctly after several months, but the process of getting a replacement was really easy.

I have used this product for 28 years since moving to Arizona from Ohio and when I discovered that my store stopped carrying it this year I paniced.  I tried the internet and I got it quickly and a slightly lower price than from my store which includes shipping.  My holiday baking is saved.
Very good coffee,nice alternative to regular k-cups...I feel less guilty,that so much plastic come from my house to landfilds.Oh,yes...It also a cheaper...

The only breast pillow I need! I can walk around with this while feeding my baby. She liked being so close and also like being able to see where we were going. Highly recommend, my only drawback is I wish they could make the sizing a little smaller.
My son requested this as a Christmas gift. They were very happy with it. His family goes on alot of outdoor activities and take this with them.

I didn't used this that much, but when I did, it really relieves the pain after breast feeding.
Also is a great help when the milk gets stuck.
Great product but it's not a must buy, but again, I didn't needed to use that much, so it's better to have it than not to have.

A simple product to embellish a drink with a sweet, attractive crust of sugar on the rim of the glass.

Very consistent granule size ensures that not much is wasted. The six pack is a handy way to buy and store for the long term.

I dropped this rating to 2 stars because even though the tins are large, the quantity of the sugar granules is tiny - you might coat 2-3 glass rims with the contents of one packet if you're lucky. Wegman's sells a similar product with 3 times the sugar for $3.
If you don't mind a few moments required to clean these they perform as advertised.  Pick your favorite brew and control the strength you desire.

I have always been a big fan of the Kraft grated cheddar cheese. The kind that comes with their macaroni and cheese dinners, and used to be available in containers. They vanished from stores years ago, and they used to sell it in small 3 oz shakers by the case here on Amazon, but that too has since disappeared. Unfortunately grated cheddar is very expensive as compared to the standard Romano or Parmesan. The Kraft was worth the extra cost for it was so delicious. But the others I have tried have either been way to expensive, or weak and flavorless. This Hoosier cheddar blend is not as strong nor as flavorful as the Kraft by any means in my opinion. But it is still very good, and excellently priced. Unlike many on here, I don't use it much on popcorn. I love it on pasta especially, and when making my home made pizzas. It is also very tasty in soups as well. It is indeed unfortunate that the Kraft grated cheddar is not available anymore, but this is a very worthy alternative, especially for the price. Not quite as good as Kraft, but still decent and recommended... : )

PS: At the time of this writing, the 1 1/2 pound size is a much better bargain over the one pound container. It's just around $3.00 more and you get another half pound of product. Also, I was originally sent a one pound container by mistake, but the seller allowed me to keep it and promptly sent me the correct larger size. : )
I bought this as a gift for my daughter and gave it to her at her baby shower and she loved it.  It was easy to assemble and easy to open and close.
Great coffee and you can't beat the price. I buy 3 different San Francisco Bay coffee flavors in the 80 count box every other month. Subscribe and save is the way to go.

Overall good quality. The orange ones have a couple snags but for $5 a pair I am satisfied. My 4-month-old and my very large 2-year-old can both wear them, so I am sure they'll get good use if they hold together.
Sheet is nice quality and the pattern is perfect for a space themed room, but it has shrunk quite a bit with washing. Hard to fit over the mattress now...

Hold up well to all diaper messes.  No sensitivity issues with my little one's skin.  My toilet did not take them down well, but I think it may be due to older toilet/plumbing.  My only issue is that when you are holding your baby on the table with one hand and trying to grab one of these with the other, they tend to stick together a bit and can be tricky to easily grab just one with only one hand.  They're not the perfect liner, but I keep buying them because they are a fantastic liner at a very reasonable price.

This skirt lays flat and looks good on the crib. Unfortunately, the bottom bar on my crib covers the top stripe so it just looks like a blue trimmed skirt. :( In response to the material quality concerns, this feels much like the dust ruffle on my own bed so I don't think this material is representative of the company's other bedding material. However, I did not purchase the other bedding items so I can't say for sure.

These rattles are absolutely adorable! I can't wait to give it at the baby shower. It is so soft and perfectly sized for even the littlest hands. I now the brightly colored sprinkles are going to be a big hit too!

This strawberry teether is huge and heavy. My 6 month old son loves the vibrations on his gums except he cant even bite down on it hard enough for it to vibrate, I have to squeeze it with my fingers and hold it in his mouth. Its so hard to squeeze even with my own fingers, how is a baby supposed to make this work with their gums if it takes so much effort!

We purchased this as a gift for our nephew's baptism. I was a little surprised at how small it actually is even though the description says it is 5 inches tall. It is a rattle and is a soft, white lamb that is a good size for a small child to hold. All in all, it's a great gift for a baptism or shower; just know that it is about the size of a very small plush.
I am disappointed that this seat does not have a lower level of seating on the underside, to be used with different size chairs.

We first heard about salt block cooking via a PBS radio interview. We cooked 8 shrimp on this last night. They tasted as good as they would have if we had hand-tossed them in a skillet. We won't bother buying a bigger salt block.

We are going to serve a shrimp cocktail to an intimate (one other couple) dinner party on this block. It will at least be a conversation piece.

Note....the included directions are very clear for cooking......as in getting the block hot. No guidance for cold presentations. So not wanting to freeze the shrimp I have the block in the frig pre-cooling.

I really wanted to like this stroller. And for the most part I have, but there are a few problems that I've had that I think those looking to purchase would like to know.
First of all, I've had the stroller for about 6 months now and I use it every day. It is very lightweight and easy to fold and put in a trunk. Now on to the bad stuff...
1. About three times now the stroller has become unusable and unsafe because a nut from a screw (not the same one each time) has fallen off. Once this happened while going through airport security. Luckily, the security guard found the nut on the floor and reattached it for me. The last time this happened I got out my screwdriver and proceeded to try and tighten all the screws. Because of the way the stroller is constructed it is nearly impossible to tighten them all the way.
2. The attachment for the canopy broke one day and I had to get it replaced.
3. My daughter never really seems to be comfortable in her stroller. She's always slouched with her legs hanging off the side of the stroller. And this causes the harness to rub her neck until it is red.
4. I have an overall complaint about the craftmanship and quality of the stroller. I can wiggle the handles of the stroller and the whole stroller creaks up and down. It causes me to wonder how long I will be able to use it before it really just falls apart.

These are really, really good. They do remind me a tad of Communion wafers, being unleavened and all, but obviously the crunch and the taste set them apart from those wafers. ;-) I bought these to try because they looked like the Trader Joe's multigrain thin crackers, and ended up liking them even more than the TJ version. I crunch them up and put them in my salads. Oh, and I say that as someone who likes and can eat gluten-based crackers as well.
These are great. Crunchy, lightly sweet. I'd eat them even if I didn't have to be GF.

I purchased this seat as a second one for my husband's car. I have the Graco Size4Me 70 in my vehicle. I definitely prefer my car seat for everyday ease, but this is a perfect second car seat. It was easy to install, however, as many convertible car seats are, it's kind of bulky in the rear facing position in my husband's car. I also like the padding and dual cup holders.
My package arrived on time and I've been enjoying the coffee. It has a strong flavor not watered down. I have already ordered another bag.

Baby-proofing is a total PITA! I've spent countless hours drilling and hammering gates, latches and locks to keep my baby safe as most parents do. So, the fact that I could install this in 2 seconds flat -- and it works great -- is a double plus for me. We bought this to keep our 11 month-old out of the trash can and kitchen drawers. Works like a charm! I've already ordered another set. Thank you Safety 1st!

This is the worst piece of s*** I have ever spent money on. This thing came in a roll. Which is no big deal. But it isn't one piece. It's in fifty billion flippin pieces. You have to look at a number and eyeball it to the coordinating number on the picture. Also good thing to know that it's the worst adhesive ever. So you have to try to stick it for hours but it'll never stick. So you have to sacrifice your hours of wasted energy to get it to stick. Then you go get water because of your exhaustion and come back and it's all over the floor. Who ever decided to produce this should be fired for incompetency!

We ordered this for our daughters first birthday. She is so high quality, and so cute, and soft.
Love love this!

I love my moby. It can easily be wrapped in several ways to accomodate carrying my daughter whatever size she is. The one downside with the moby is that it's pretty warm so I haven't used it much during the summer.

I ordered this thinking that I would get two sippy cup and I got one.  In the description it does not state that one will only come.  Expensive product with shipping costs.  The two pictures show two cups with two different colors.  I knew that the color vary but I never read that is was one cup anywhere in the description.  Oh but what description of the product there is none.  What a ripe off.
I bought this as a spare for our boppy. It's exactly like the picture with beautiful colors and nice fabric.
Not as versatile as the metal clips, but do hold quite well when pinched on thin material.

If you love intense fruit flavours you will love this. I have tried many brands including high end brands and nothing compares to this fruit flavour. Peach tastes like fresh peaches! There are 4 or 5 different kinds in the box. Lovely!

I am 11 weeks pregnant and have already developed sciatica. This pillow is absolutely perfect for side sleeping and easing backaches. It is obnoxiously large, but I absolutely love it. Worth every penny. Some of the reviews said the fabric was scratchy, but it is just fine to me. Maybe I'm just so happy to not have back pain that I don't notice it!

I read some of the other reviews about how much less cheese these puffs had--someone goes so far as to suggest the ones ordered through Amazon are the least cheesy. (And he meant that in a bad way...)

Since I had just ordered a box, I was a bit nervous. Perhaps they weren't as good as I remembered...perhaps the quality had gone downhill. It happens.

And the box arrived and I opened a bag and was practically buried in delicious white cheddar cheese. If anything, the quality was BETTER than I remembered. Not just chock-full-of-cheese, but baked perfectly and completely free of grease. Not painfully crunchy. Just perfect.

These are wheat and gluten free, too...which makes me believe I could go gluten free...as long as I had Michael Seasons White Cheddar Cheese Puffs by my side.

Hell, I could win a war with these babies by my side.

Okay, that's a bit of an exaggeration. But that's how they make me feel. Truthiness.

Yum.

This monitor worked out very well in my home. I never had any problem with this monitor as far as not being able to hear my child or having the vibration brake (my husband used it often with the vibration mode on). It did somewhat eat up the batteries if used remote frequently or with the vibration mode on (a cell phone will do the same if in the vibrate mode). On an occassion or two it did pick up whole phone conversations (when my neighbor used a cordeless phone)in my immediate area. We just switched channels. It is a monitor that uses frequencies so if you think about it, it really shouldn't be unexpected to have run into this problem a time or two. If it happened more often and you couldn't change channels I could see switching to a 2.4 or something. The only time it became a problem to own this monitor is when we moved. The only thing I could get was static. However, I moved to a new development where homes are still being built which may or may not have something to do with the problem. I also moved across country and had a moving company pack some of our belongings. It's very possible it just got damaged in the move. I would definately say this monitor is worth buying and trying out. It is possible it may not work out for you due to cordless phone or other baby monitor use in your area or that the unit could be defective when bought as with any monitor you buy.

If you are expecting Walkers shortbread then these will be a disappointment. But I have been enjoying these for a couple of years now and really like them.  If you are following a wheat free and sugar free diet but want a little something sweet, then these fit the bill - for me at least.  I have tried all of the Pamela's cookies and I like these the best -  in fact, sometimes I crave them and go out of my way to get them!
Amazing product make sure you wash and rinse well and you won't know the difference
These are so delicious like butter melting on a biscuit, yummy can almost eat the whole package in one sitting, chocolate is yummy.....will buy again

I don't know what I was expecting, maybe a little sweeter or something. We love cornbread and I've been using this in recipes that call for cornbread, and personally I can never taste the cornbread. I think I would switch next time I run out, unless they change their ingredients.
I didn't realize they were for babies !!!!  I needed them for my kitchen use !!  My fault not yours !!

Great for cleaning, which is the reason I bought them. I would not use them for diapers as they, as well as Gerber, do not live up to the diapers in the 1970s when I had a baby. I only wanted single flat-folded diapers for cleaning and not the double-layered ones.
These rails were easy to assemble and quick to install.  I think the bedrails are a very good product at a very reasonable price.
My mother just loves this. She is hard to buy for. I usually get this.
High fiber and vitamin C.  My son likes the flavor (age 2) when we mix it with yogurt and oatmeal cereal, or by itself.
Its amazing I love it so much! It's just as good as the ergo but you can't beat the price! Its comfortable my daughter loves it! I take it everywhere!

For all you guys complaining about how the chocolate pieces sink to the bottom... well, duh. More mass has been packed into those chocolate chips than anything else in that bowl. It has more mass than the milk and the flakes, so they sink. Anyway, it's actually pretty good in my opinion... I would definitely buy it again. And the chocolate is fake because it's Special K... You know, like the diet cereal. It wouldn't really be Special K if the chocolate was real Hershey's milk chocolate, now would it?

I've been so frustrated because I've been using these tea bags for some time and suddenly I couldn't find them in stores.  It's such a great product, I can't believe lack of interest by customers.  So one day I had a flash and went to Amazon.  I found my tea bags and mass ordered them so I wouldn't have to worry about it.  I love them.
My husbans and I love it! Add it to our oatmeal every day.  My daughter recomended it.  We will continue to purchase it!
My son is cheeze it obsessed. And only the "white cheeze its" will do. Which works for me as I like this flavor the best as well!

After our Diaper Genie broke, I really wanted a diaper pail that took regular trash bags, and that contained the poopy diaper smell better. Overall, this is a so-so diaper pail. It looks nice. But like other reviewers have mentioned, if the trash bag is too full, it will snag on the inner lip of the pail. This hasn't been a real problem for me. My major problem with this diaper pail is that it doesn't contain the smell of soiled diapers very well at all- poopy or just urine-soiled. For $79, I was expecting this to work a lot better than it does. I have to change the bag every other day just to keep the smell from becoming totally overwhelming. Also as others have mentioned, the stink is very potent when you first open the top of the pail to drop in a diaper. Unfortunately, the smell definitely lingers after the top is closed. I close the top as fast as possible, too, and the smell still escapes. And the can itself does absorb odor, or at least mine does. The empty diaper pail reeks of soiled diapers for quite awhile after I take out the bag.

I wish I had better things to say about this diaper pail, but alas I do not. I honestly think the Diaper Genie was better at containing the smell. And I didn't have to change the bag as frequently. A regular trash can would work just as well as this diaper pail. I've had this pail for several months now, too, and have tried everything to keep the smell at bay. I may just have to change the bag every day or multiple times a day, but then am I really saving money on bags???

Oh, and your toddler can definitely open this pail and get to the dirty diapers. The top opening on the lid does lock, but there is no lock for the actually lid, which you have to lift up to remove the bag. My 15 month year old figured this out after watching me take out a bag of dirty diapers.

At the end of the day, if you want a nice looking diaper pail, then this one is great. If you want one that indeed contains the smell & is completely child-proof, keep looking.

The first time I saw this product it was actually at a kitchen specialty store. I wanted to buy it but for some reason I didn't. I found it on Amazon and decided to give it a try.  I had to buy six, but I figured I could always give some as gifts (I like to make up baskets).    I am really glad that I bought it. While this isn't actually as hot as I would like it to be, it is pretty hot. I find myself using it on many different things like steaks, chicken and even seafood!

Very pleased with these hangars.  Sturdy and designed well for clothes with straps, etc.  Good price too.  I will be throwing out my cheap baby hangars and replacing with these.  Hopefully, I get white again in my next order!
GREAT BAG!  THE ONLY THING I WISH IT HAD WAS A WATERPROOF BOTTOM INSTEAD OF SUEDE.  THIS HOLDS LOTS OF STUFF FOR BOTH MOM AND BABY.  IT IS WELL WORTH THE PRICE.
Love this! perfect size for on the go, I use because it fits perfectly in my purse so I don't have to carry around a big diaper bag everywhere!
After two kids, those are the best brand of cup we found. Takes a beating and hold up really well.
This ghee tastes fine and seems to have an overly yellow color.  It has natural flavor added.  It needs to be refrigerated after opening which is new to me.

This thing could have lit up in flames and I would have bought more. It was a life saver! What could be better than not having to prepare a bottle at 2 am. Easy....pop in warmer while you change diaper and it's ready when you're done. We put in two caps for the 8 oz Playtex bottles with liner. Perfect for those who don't want to nuke their bottles.

I love this stroller because it is easy to push and glides over anything. What I don't like is the stroller is very big and heavy. I thought this would not be problem even after reading other reviews but if you have a C-Section it is very difficult to lift in and out of your vehicle and if you have a car this seat will take up your entire trunk of it fits at all. I may purchase a smaller carrier connect stroller and use this one for jogging, walks and when the baby gets older.

I had these for Thanksgiving breakfast and my whole family just loved these. I used milk instead of buttermilk,like the instructions stated. They were HUGE and I got 9 rolls instead of 8. I will be getting these again!!!
I bought this for my grandson for Christmas. He loves it, he gets very excited every time it pops up!!
Love, love this honey but this small tub is waxed cardboard. So, it was bent at the metal handle and we could not bend it back out. Honey still great though!
Great product reasonable price for a hard to find item in my small town store.

We love our snack happened mini snack bags and use them for lunches every day!  They are so cute and easy to wash by hand, dishwasher or in the washing machine.  I highly recommend the Itzy Ritzy snack bags with a zip top closure.  I have tried other brands that don't compare to the quality of these.  These truly are the best!
cute but doesnt catch the spit up, maybe they would be okay for drool wont buy again, dont like how they ride up on baby's mouth

I tried this product when I was in Florida on vacation, very tasty, slightly sweet ,nice coconut flavor. Wonderfully refreshing, I loved it.  However $139.99 for 24 bottles? That is $5.83/bottle  Definitly not a good deal.
These candies were a gift for my mom. She said they were delicious, and arrived before the holiday.  I would recommend them.

This product has changed and is not longer sugar free, nor low calorie.  I have ordered them three times in the past few months thinking I was ordering incorrectly.  Nope, whether it says sugar free or not, I get the same cups.  Very disappointing since my husband was watching his calorie and caffeine intake and loved to have this product on hand as an alternative to coffee.

This car seat is great. Every time I crash and roll my race car, my son is fine! It's great that this seat is pretty affordable, too, because you have to replace them after an accident. Thank god for free Prime shipping, right?
The last brand of seat only got 1 star, because of the incident. This one I would give 6 if I could. Cheaper (read: Chinese made) car seats would leave bruises and blurred vision on my baby after a weekend at the track. But with this one, not only is he snug as a bug in a rug (LOL!), but the visits from CPS have stopped.
It looked like something the grandkid would like. I don't know how durable or even if it is fun for her...Not a clue..Not really one of my strong points.......

positive
1. lighter than previous Safety 1st 65 LX convertible seat (this has been discontinued)
2. snug and head adjustment easy to adjust
3. sturdy... but......(see negative)

negative:
1. doesn't recline enough unlike the safety 1st 65 lx where that car seat had 3 different positions of reclining the seat. this doesn't. and the reclining adjustment is on the back side instead of a pull handle on the front on the previous model mentioned.
2. the car seat is sturdy all around, but one part i noticed that seems to be cheaper in material is the adjustment handles on the head adjustment.
3. the strap clip (with he red button) can be adjusted in 3 different positions but it seems like the farthest position you can adjust it to doesn't give enough room because i have the trouble of clipping the straps and making sure that i don't pinch my son's leg with it.

over all, the car seat is good. hopefully it doesn't need to be put to the test in real life. (crossing my fingers)

I purchased this set for my little one. It is gorgeous and easy to coordinate. However, a bit of warning, the discription here says that the border is brown/chocolate. It isn't it's actually a deep shade of plum. Still beautiful, but don't purchase brown accessories thinking that they're going to match perfectly. (Fortunately, I bought an item from the set to confirm the colors before buying coordinates.) I painted the room taupe to match the blanket, and I was also able to buy matching paint (I took the lamp to Home Depot) and used the dark plum color to paint Glenna Jean's wall circles and adhere them to the wall. It looks beautiful.

Awful. Just awful.    Purchased online for my 25 month old and my newborn. My older child didn't fit into the seat from DAY ONE (and we purchased from a site that had no return option). His knees were up towards his chest and the sunshade is so low that we couldn't put it up at all, as his head would be pressing into it. He was only 25 months old and 29 lbs! They say up to 45 lbs - to me, that's insanity at best and at worst a bad lie - no 45 lb child would be able to use this, seriously.  As for the newborn, you can recline the backseat all the way, but then the teeny-tiny sunshade doesn't protect them at all, so we had to spend MORE money on a separate sunshade that means we can't see him while pushing and it has to be untied to get him out from behind the front seat.     It's much heavier than it looks, and with the heavier child over the single wheel in front, it always wants to tip when turning corners.    The basket is virtually useless because you can't get to it. I have actually scraped the skin on the back of my hand trying to squeeze something in there.    PLEASE try and look at one rather than buying online sight unseen, because I really believe you will see that it's a waste.    We ended up going to a store in desperation and buying another $300 cheap-plastic combi double side-by-side that is flimsy and unsteady and I hate pushing, but at least the children can sit comfortably and recline and sleep in it.    p.s. we had the Bugaboo Frog for our firstborn and miss it so, so much, so for me it's not about the price - we were willing to spend more for quality. This is just a poor product.

Uniqueness of Liuan Guapian Green Tea
-------------------------------------

Liuan Guapian (Melon Slice) green tea is one of China's top 10 green teas. The dried leaves are a rich, dark green color, rolled slightly lengthwise, measuring about 1 inch in length. Infused the color of the tea liquid is yellow with a green tint to it. The smell is a green, vegetal smell, fresh and sweet, with a suggestion of seaweed (which to our minds means healthy). The taste is similar: refreshing, vegetal, healthy. The aftertaste is pleasant, lingering, decided but also subtle.

Liuan Guapian green tea originated in Anhui province in the early part of the Qing Dynasty (1636-1910 CE) and was a tribute tea to the emperor. After the leaves are picked, the bud and stem are removed, leaving the top two first leaves only, which are pan-fried over a low heat in small amounts (about 150 grams at a time). If you like Taiping Houkui (and we do), you'll love this tea. Provides 3-4 quality infusions (maybe more depending on your taste).

Brewed color: Yellow with green tint. Flavor: Refreshing, green, vegetal, sweet almost, with a suggestion of seaweed. Aftertaste: Subtle, lingering, but decided. Preparation: For best results, use spring or mineral water. Bring it to a boil, then, after taking water off the heat, wait about 10 or 15 seconds before onto the side of the pot or gaiwan (avoid pouring on the leaves directly).

Origin: Anhui province, China. Classification: Green tea. Processing: Machine picked. Package size: 150 grams (5.3 ounces).

This decaf coffee has just turned into my new favorite of the Keurig decaf coffee cups!!! It has a great aroma, but no bitterness and I like that the plastic cup has been replaced by a paper cup. Every little step helps...

Hey these chocolate covered cherries are very good and are bagain compared to many other options. The only problem is if you eat to many in a short time you may gain weight :-) A great product at a great price. Enjoy

I EC with my kids, so the little size is perfect....but the sides of the base aren't substantial enough to hold the bowl on if they wiggle around or get up....and you have to be meticulous about putting it together.  Better than IKEA's $4 potty (which is pretty huge and uncomfortable according to my first kid) but not as wonderful as the BAby Bjorn Little Potty I loved so much......overall-good price, great for in the car, would recommend if you have a petite kid

The best little blanket. I've used them as burp clothes and as car seat blankets.
Great for those of us in the deep south during hot summers.
Great for little hands to hold on to.
Great material for burp clothes as they don't slide off your shoulders.
Formula has washed out of these each time and they have already been laundered over a dozen times.
Colors were a bit different than shown as they were muted shades of blue and aqua....I actually liked it better than what was pictured!
I have been looking for this for a while now.  This is just great stuff on brats and everything else!!  I can't say enough about it!!

Hi everyone, they just arrived yesterday and I had the ability to eat these for breakfast today :)  Though when I opened the box and saw how much was actually in the bag, I couldn't help feeling a bit robbed.  After a normal bowl sized serving, there seemed to still be a lot left, so...at least appearances could be a bit deceiving in a good way. The problem of the flakes being too hard that I read about in other reviews thankfully I thought they weren't too bad, just crunchy. There does seem to be a lot of strawberries and raspberries which is good, and it does taste good and fills you up.    Edit: finished the first box within 3 days
Very addicting, is a solid form of the chinese sesame pudding dessert.  I would buy this again.

Recently my household received a free sample on smiley360, which couldn't of come at a better time.  Everyone was sick.  The youngest is currently five and doesn't mind taking most medicines.  However, this one just didn't seem to taste as good as some other to him, but that is not so bad. I don't want them to love the taste and fake being sick.  We will continue to purchase this, it has worked the best from brands we have tried before.  Children's Mucinex seems to have everything in it you could ask for; an expectorant, cough suppressant, and nasal decongestant.  It seemed to work for about four hours, the time between dosage amounts.  Just like all medicine it does take a little time for it to become active.  I feel this has been the best medicine for the kids. We just give the kids a chaser with medicine to help with the flavors.  I have already recommended this product to family and friends, now I'm highly recommending it to you.

The flowers came six days before Valentine day. It was in a box and with a vase but no card that tells who send it. My sister-
in law called me and ask if I send Mom flowers. But she love the Rainbow Roses.
I was a little worried about ordering a plant through the mail, but it worked out just fine.  The plant arrived healthy and in good shape.

This drip coffee is extremely smooth and as all lavazza coffees are - very high quality.  If you're a flavored coffee drinker and like to dose your coffee with sugar - do NOT do it with Premium Drip.  You don't need anything in this coffee to make it palatable.  It's a light roast which makes it very smooth so if you want a stronger coffee, you'll need to add a scoop or two to your normal brew process.  By the way, 'light roast' coffee has more caffeine so don't load up on this until you get comfortable.
The syrup lacks a pronounced sarsaparilla flavor.  The ingredients just list natural and artificial flavors so I would not buy it again.

Day or night it serves the purpose of being an interesting meal... very satisfying and nutricious when you don't care to eat cooked food. I give thanks!
Infinite blessings!
This pouch is a little liquidy for my now 19 month old son, but it is a good way to get vegetables in him when he refuses to eat the real kind.  He loves these and always asks for more.

My daughter loves this, and so do I (no more cleaning out little pottys.)  The only thing I dont like is that it doesnt fit well on elongated toilets.  It can slide around and probably could fall in.  I have to sit her on it, and gently at that.  If I had a non-elongated toilet seat, this would be perfect.

I had purchased a bag of Bear Naked's Apple Cinnamon Granola at my local grocery store about a year ago.  Ever since then, I could not find the Apple-Cin flavor anywhere.  I then checked Amazon and found it.  This stuff is great.  It can be eaten right out of the bag; as a cereal; or added into other foods. I find Bear Naked to have an excellent selection of fresh and great tasting granola's; but the Apple-Cin is my favorite.  Since I can never find it on the local grocery store shelves, I assume others have the same opinion.
Absolutely loved this carseat, it's a tad heavy but its so comfortable and she was snug as a bug in a rug in it from day one... No complaints at all!
I really enjoy the Top Notch protein shakes. The shakes are easy to prep and the chocolate cake flavor tastes fantastic!

I did what others have done, make 5 gallons instead of 6...Then I added 2 oz of oak chips for three weeks.  I bottled it just 3 weeks ago, sooooo....It tasted verrrrrrry nice, could't help myself....but I will wait a full 3 months before I try it again because it was a little green yet.  All of these wines from this company improve so much by 6 months, it is so much worth the wait.

I ordered this after reading the reviews about the pails arriving broken. I took a chance and it worked out okay. Mine was cracked a little on the lid but the salt remained in the container (for the most part..). This required me to swap out containers, but that was not a real problem either as I had a large food-grade plastic bucket available. So..I guess I was luckier than some.

I am immensely pleased with the salt. The quality is high and the taste is very \\"clean\\". It is a LOT of salt, but if you use a lot, it will work out well for you. I have given up on salt from the grocery for the most part. I much prefer this over the \\"table salt\\" available. I use this exclusively for cooking in place of \\"kosher\\" salt. I also put some in a grinder for use on the table. It has become my \\"everyday\\" go to salt.

Another great use is salt-crusting. This amount of salt allows you to use a couple of cups occasionally, moistened and packed over and around fish (typically..) before baking. You can also make a \\"salt dough\\" with the addition of a little flour and use it to wrap around chicken before baking. There are a lot of uses for salt and this amount and quality and price allows you to use some of it without too much guilt.

Shipping is the only issue. I think the product is packaged by the supplier in a manner that is okay if palletized and shipped by truck. When these pails are handled by warehouse staff and small-lot shippers (UPS, FedEx, USPS, etc..) is where the problems occur. Amazon needs to handle and package this product in a different manner to allow undamaged delivery to the customer.

Five stars for a superior product and great value. This is a great product Amazon...get on the ball!

first when i ordered their taffy i got the wrong kind. it needed to be the right kind or color for a wedding. when i sent them an email i received what i ordered. i was very happy because even though i got the wrong item at first, the are very easy to work with. the taffy shown is very good.

I was surprised at the price for just one package when the cinnamon-raisin or blueberry were a three-pack.  Other than that, these were really good.  I used my large cookie scoop and was able to make 18 scones out of one package.  Any of these mixes are great just to have on hand for a quick treat because all you have to do it add water, mix, form, and bake.  Because of the cost, I probably won't buy this particular flavor again, but I am enjoying the ones I just made.

I looked and several of these at Toys R Us but did not like any of them.  I love this one!  The side bumpers keep my baby sitting up right and don't let him flop around the seat.  I saw other mothers in the store with the one from Toys R Us googling over it.  \\"Where did you get that???? It works so much better!\\"  I told them to look it up on Amazon and if you have Prime, the shipping is free.  GREAT PURCHASE!

This is definitely for everyone. I use this as a moisturizer for my hair and skin. Great as a substitute for butter.  Adds a nice flavor in my healthy shakes or to my chicken I grill indoors. Gives me a boost of energy just eaten alone. (Just a tablespoon) It's great for you, me, kids, adults, babies, elderly. So many uses!

I got thoso in a very short time. The price is good. The product is excellent.
Highly recommended this Indomie

My 4 1/2 month old twins are mesmerized by this mobile! The projection is way better than I ever imagined. And I'm thrilled that I have the option of turning off the projection and just letting the mobile go without the lights because it can be over stimulating for them before bedtime. High quality product and great design for attaching to the crib. Will feet any width. Love it and highly recommend.

Had coffee at Greg Norman's Australian Grille in Myrtle Beach and we all had decaf coffee with dessert after dinner.  The coffee was fabulous so we asked the manager which brand they used.  It was Douwe Egbert Red Ribbon.  Found it on amazon.com and ordered some....it was as good as the restaurant's coffee.  Best full bodied decaf I have had in a long long time
My 5 yr old daughter loves this and the other plush characters, as the "Room on the Broom" book is one of her favs.
Our last name is Frost, which caused us to try them out the first time.  Since then, we have purchased them on a regular basis and we all love the product as well as the name.

I have been shopping at Diabetic Friendly online store for years. On May 21, 2013 I placed an order for Golightly sugar free strawberry candy, my standard order. My normal order would arrive in two or three days & really paid no more attention. I included in my order an extra 5 pounds of candy for a friends birthday. My order didn't show as expected. I contacted to owner of the company who responded like we were sitting next to eachother, just that fast. He explained that Golightly was discontinuing making of strawberry except for special orders. He also stated with his order of 150 pounds & my order they should run it. We stayed in touch not often but from time to time. Towards the end of June he sent me an email stating he thought the strawberry candy had shipped. It was just after July 4 I got confirmation that he had my order in stock, I paid for my order & it should finally arrive on or about July 14 This has got to be the best company to do business with. The owner stayed on top of the situation. I would highly recommend this company to family & friends.

I am in LOVE with this chair! It looks great, wipes clean easily and is adjustable to grow with your child! I got this chair right before my daughter's first birthday, originally I had purchased the Svan Anka High Chair which was horrible on so many levels, I reviewed it as well if you'd like to read that review, and only gave it 1 star. This chair has the best of both worlds in regards to from and function, I love the look of the wooden legs and that baby can't reach them to get them dirty! It is sturdy and durable but light enough to be moved into another room. The tray is very big and holds a good amount of spilled liquid. Though this tray is dish washer safe on the top rack I haven't found a need to do that, anything that hasn't come off with a wet paper towel I can clean in the sink with warm water, soap and a songe. The foam pads are velcroed on, stay put when you need them and can be removed easily for a thorough cleaning but most days all I need to do is spray the tray and wipe down the cushions! My old chair required some elbow grease to get it clean, not really ideal when you have toddler that runs away as soon as you take them out of the chair ;)  The starps are adjustable, as were the ones on my old highchair, but these shoulder starps come off to be washed if your child gets food on them (the middle lower strap is not removable however), my old chair the only way to do that would be to disassemble the chair, which is kinda rediculous! Yes this chair is more expensive than Fisher Price and Graco, but I compared it to Peg Perego and Boon which are even priceier and this one was the best choice since the other ones aren't functional for older childern. So far it has been worth the investment as I think it will last to be used with future children!

Love chocolate and orange flavor. Tried it with milk chocolate which is delicious. But as lactose intolerant in bigger quantities, decided to see if there was a dark chocolate version and was delighted to find that yes. Have enjoyed them ever since--just what I wanted.

Ordered this for baby Cason's crib at my house..he will arrive Nov 15 & I cannot wait to put him in there & turn on this beautiful mobile. And I LOVE the remote idea...so often with the older kids, just as they'd be almost asleep the music would go off & awake those little eyes popped...so now I will be able to click the remote from the door w/o him seeing me! YAY!

This is the best "store bought" Hot & Sour soup I have found. There is a tinge of sweetness to the soup and it isn't too hot or too sour. There might be a better one out there but I have not found it.
Wonderful flavor.  I love the coffee.  I drink about four cups a day.  It is my morning staple.  The price is good and it comes timely and on a regular basis so I am never out of coffee.
This is my first nursing bra and I love it! I love that I can breastfeed or pump. Its very comfortable and I like the fabric. It does everything I can think of.

I fell in love with this set when I saw it. Unfortunately, it came and the blue was more of a bright aqua. Since we don't know if we're having a boy or a girl, we had to return it as it leans more towards \\"girl\\" dÃ©cor. I loved the neutralness of the item in the picture, but that is not what you'll get. Aside from the color being off, the quality was great.
We really like this white hot chocolate! Rich and creamy, and great with a shot of hazelnut syrup!

I have a two month old who loves this bouncer! We bought a cheaper bouncer first and he seemed very uncomfortable in it. This seat supports him great and he loves the vibration feature. Sometimes when I can't calm him, 5 minutes with the vibrate on and he is asleep! I have even used it at night when I have trouble getting him down. I highly recommend this product to everyone with a baby.

I never even heard of this game/ product until recently, and i was blown away by it. its a disgusting, creative, hilarious, repulsive and awesome concept and game. This is game is fun for little kids age five, to grown adults in their sixties. Age doesnt matter, this is just plain fun to play. You dont even necessarily need to spin the wheel, you can just simply pick out any jelly beans you want and have a good time. I recommend this purchase to anyone looking for a fun time.

I grew up on this stuff in Delaware.  Surprised to realize it's not available everywhere cause it's made by a small local distributor.  If you've never had it, you will find it much thicker than store bought syrups.  It's also a little sweeter I think ?  It's very good I promise.  A favorite arond here is to mix it with a couple spoonfuls of peanut butter, and eat it with a spoon.  Better than any candy.
We love Atkins products. We've tried many different bars, and these are one of the best! Definitely recommend that you try these
My baby loves this walker. I wish the toys came off and it was just a tray. Also, back wheels don't move all that great. Besides those few things I'm happy if baby is happy!o
I researched and read all reviews before adding this to my registry. This is the ultimate best stroller around. Our evening walks are now complete. Can hardly wait to take it with us on vacation.

Does what it says it should do and is very angularly adjustable so it fits a variety of widths and odd spaces. The angle is great because it keeps it from being wobbly when baby is holding on to it. The squeeze latch is easy enough for even my 6 year old to operate it but not so easy that the baby or the 5 year old can manage it. Worth the price. Very easy install - maybe they could make the wall brackets out of metal instead of plastic - they flex a bit when the gate is being pulled on by my baby - but not a significant issue or concern.

I am loving the idea of both gdiapers have a deal right now of a new friend bundle 3 g diapers and 2 packages of disposables for 40% off. I was told the disposable/inserts are eco friendly and convenient for when I am sick, day care, and family/sitter. Check it out

So easy to install my wife could do it. That being said it comes with screws to replace your original house plate screws. Kid will be able to use it and they glow in dark.

Great coffee. Every batch comes out perfect. I use it with my espresso machine and after trying a lot of different varieties I think this one has the best combination of strength and flavor. Highly recommend.

Great fresh lemon flavor, easy to eat on the go presentation!
Infinitely superior to its Orange-Curry counterpart by Cat Cora.
I had to wait to buy them again, because they were out of stock.
Very good product. My baby has milk allergy(8 months old) likes the taste and eats it very well each morning. I recommend it.
This cup does not leak as much as others and keeps beverages cold. I put milk in it for my one year old son. Easy to clean and holds up well when it is thrown on the floor.

We use this gate to contain our 10 month old son. He likes to play in the hallway so we set it up at the end of the hallway and close all the doors. He spends a lot of time standing and pulling on the gate but it doesn't budge. It's easy to use and it's a design that has stood the test of time; I worked in a daycare 15 years ago and this is the gate we used!

I will say that this gate did not hold up well to our very active schnauzer. He could easily jump over it. When we stacked the gates, he destroyed the plastic screen and escaped in less than an hour.

Good choice for baby, bad choice for dogs.
Excellent full bodied coffee. Never bitter nor does it leave an aftertaste.I have tried lots of K cup, but this is definitely at the top of the list.    Sincerely, R.L. Schenck

I love the taste of this tea.  It's very smooth and not bitter as another reviewer stated.  Very mellow and soothing.    My only gripe is the packaging.  With all other tea I've purchased in 20 count boxes, the bags came individually wrapped in metallic packages. These bags are loose in the box without any wrappers.  They're all hooked together like sausage links, and as stated in the description they have no strings.  So you have to fish them out of your tea cup with a spoon.        If they were individually wrapped and had strings, they'd be 5 star IMO.  And if you use Amazon's \\"suscribe and save\\", not only will this be cheaper, but shipping will always be free.  And you can cancel at any time.  I love this feature!
HUbby eats the GF cookies. He said these are really good. He does like the extreme Chocolate mini better but will eat these again
It's great for potty training on the go for the germ a phobic mom like me!!

This is the best buckwheat flour to use for pancakes that I have tried thus far. You would think buckwheat is buckwheat, but for whatever reason, pancakes are fluffier & taste better with Barry Farms.

Unsure why the price gouging for buying this on Amazon though. Go right to Barry Farm's website & it's so much cheaper. Yes, you pay shipping on their site, but buy a few pounds & you'll save a lot!

Pros - baby loves the two handles, the straw instead of having to tilt the cup, and being able to get every last drop with the weighted straw.

Cons - must pay attention to put the lid on Just Right or it leaks, cold liquid bubbles out of the straw as it comes to room temp, 10 month old got frustrated at the slowness of the straw, black colored mold grew in the silicone ring on the lid where it touches the cup (no amount of boiling, scrubbing, or dishwasher has removed it), expensive for a non-functional cup.

It was great for room temp water for a couple weeks. But that is pretty much it.

This did not extend long enough for my garden tub, which is where my son takes his baths, but it works fine for the standard tub in the other bathroom.  I kept it because it might come in handy someday and I couldn't be bothered to return it.  My sister has one for her kids and they use it all the time.

Tuscan milk is the greatest drink on the planet.  When my house was robbed, it lept from my fridge, flexed it's calcium-enhanced biceps, and proceeded to help the burglars run off with my large appliances.  They would have never managed to lift that 1970s Magnavox all by themselves.    When the police arrived, it single handedly stole all their underware, and left it in a moist pile by my porch.    FUN FACT ABOUT TUSCAN WHOLE MILK:    From July 17, 1999, through June 18, 2004, there were 57 school-associated Tuscon Milk uses in the United Kingdom. Thirty-eight of these acts resulted in homicides, and six were regicides. Twelve of the thirty-eight school-associated Tuscon Milk uses involved pupils local to the incidents.  The rest of the atrocities were commited by gangs of asian catgirls, who were later run down by Maury Povich. These twelve Tuscon Milk uses are actually a small percentage of the total of thirteen-billion children ages 4-89 who were victims of first-degree milkings over the same period. Six of the Six school-associated regicides from July 17, 1999, through June 18, 2004, involved metal tigers. Not in the classroom, there were a total of twelve regicides commited by children rated 14+ by the ESRB.

What a great, homey cake!  Turns out more like a coffee cake or a snack cake.  It is not the kind of highly refined cake that you would present at birthdays, but it is a wonderful, simple desert that mixes easily and bakes quickly. While this is an organic whole-grain product, the end result is a delicious treat that doesn't taste good-for-you -- just good.    The only thing wrong with buying a pack of 8 is that it is too easy to mix and bake!  Will have to re-order soon.

Can not rave enough about this gate. The mechanism for opening is difficult enough that a child can't do it, although easy enough for a parent carrying a child to do one-handed without any strain. The height is great, my 18 month old is off the charts in height but this still stops him in his tracks. No lower rungs means he can't scale it, should he try. We've bought three of these.
Install is simple. Can be done by one but is made infinitely easier with a helping hand.
The extensions are sturdy, even when you have to use all of them (I was worried they might wobble, but they don't). We are in a rental and did not want to damage the walls so we only used the pressure mounting option and it's still great. We have one at the grandparents' house actually, that even fits at the bottom of a staircase.. huge plus!
Overall, fantastic. Have recommended this gate to all our fellow parent friends when they start looking into baby-proofing.
Delicious.  I like to use it a a spice base for some of my vegitable concoctions.
I was really happy with my purchase.  I was worried about the expiration date but I was pleasantly surprised that it wouldn't expire for a couple of months.  It arrived quick and was packaged well.
I haven't had to use any of these yet but I do have several on had so in the long run they will be fine hoping I won't have to use them.

I'm in love with ARCTIC ZERO, and I am lavishing a lot of money on this product. It's worth every dollar, though. The 6-pack comes encased in dry ice; it is so FROZEN that you almost cannot eat a pint straight out of the dry ice ... I say ALMOST because desperation produces creative approaches to eating even the most frozen pint.

I love this stuff, and I would eat any of the flavors. However, the CHOCOLATE and CHOCOLATE PEANUT BUTTER are the best-tasting.

Don't expect ARCTIC ZERO to taste like the 800-calories/pint ice creams. However, if eating a pint of Ben & Jerry's causes you to go into a deep funk over your excessive consumption, then grab a pint of ARCTIC ZERO and bask in the joy of a 128-calorie alternative that really will pacify your sweet tooth AND MAKE YOU FEEL VIRTUOUS AS WELL.

ARCTIC ZERO is my one HUGE EXPENSE, and I wish it were cheaper... but, well, I'm pretending that I'm eating my $7.78 confection instead of heading to Cheesecake Factory and gobbling down a slice of cheesecake for the same price. [It's a personal deception since I have long since sworn off cheesecake.]

ARCTIC ZERO, please stock the Whole Foods shelves in Ohio. PLEASE!!!

About 6 months back, I was travelling to a client site in Florida who had a Keurig machine and you had to pay $20 per month to be a part of the coffee club or bring your own k-cups.

Started scouting around for k-cups on Amazon and ended up buying the EkoBrew cup and some ground coffee from sbux and I had the best coffee which I would want - except for the making the lattes and cappuccino.

Couple of months later, I got the Melitta Javajig and was hoping that this was a slight improvement over the EkoBrew, but unfortunately no - this was worse.

The primary difference is in the fact that the Ekobrew does not use any disposable filter - you can directly load coffee onto the cups, while the Melitta requires a paper cup for each shot of coffee - which causes waste of paper, time and money to buy additional filters ....
Wasn't all that comfortable and the grey is more of a blue color. Returning it!

I love this pleasantly-flavored oatmeal that's not too sweet, especially when prepared together with a packet of plain (unflavored), great texture too - this whole line is superior to Quaker Oats instant oatmeal. Cinnamon Plum Spice disappeared from my grocer's shelves months ago, and has been out of stock on Amazon as well. Glad to see it's still available!
However, the price is unbelievable - if I am reading this right, these are $5.93 for a box of 5 *little* packets of oatmeal (1 packet is half a breakfast serving for a grown-up!) I buy other flavors of this brand in my grocery store on sale for as little as $1.50 a box of 5 packets. That would be 30Â¢ versus $1.87 per packet? Are you kidding me??

I bought this item for my son's fourth birthday.  He quickly lost interest in this.  Although the toy does come with cars and a few accessories, after a few laps around the track with the cars it went into it's original box and now sits at the top of his closet.

Very good for dipping in coffee or milk. Good flavor and not too buttery when compared to similar cookies.
I highly recommend them.
Glad the new version is GMO free, but the texture is more pasty. Liked the old texture better. Taste is still good.

The suction cup on the bottom for these bowls is great(only one is included, you have to switch it when you want to use a different bowl). However it is REALLY hard to put the lids on, so I don't recommend using them for anything but feeding.

Exactly what I wanted. I looked for over 2 years at local stores near me but they do not carry --even during holidays. Some internet prices were extremely high but these were reasonable for a smaller quanitiy. Good variety of colors and fresh. These are perfect size for cutting and creating designs (flowers..) on cupcakes and other baked items. Great taste as well.

It works fine, but geez why so expensive?  I live in Africa, and can do the same thing with the wrap cloths sold for $5 on every corner here  The padded shoulder is nice, I will admit, but not worth seventy bucks.  Still, I use it, and will continue to use it alternatively with the baby bjorn that we also like quite a lot.
I love this coffee. It's stronger than I can take just black, so I had half and half and it's wonderful! I'm liking it better than my usual coffee I take black.
I love the flavor of this salt. It is quite course, so I grind it with the mortar and pestle. It is delicious
Bought several of these as gifts and one for myself. Got it at a great price with free shipping. Everyone enjoyed them. They arrived in perfect condition.

Excellent product. I love the chocolate flavor and it lasts and keeps my dry mouth from being as dry. I use it especially when in traffic when water is not a good idea.  It is much better than Biotene dry mouth gum.

When my son was a newborn this item was great, we never really used the sling so that was kind of useless,but when he could sit up he didn't like being in the laydown tub..So I got him the safety first chair for the bath tub and he loves that! So yes I would recommend the tub for new borns, but not sure on infants who can sit up

The worst. I don't kniw if the other reviews are fake or what....but these were the absolute worst tasting things I have ever eaten. The texture was the weirdest thing andbthe flavor was so fake. I took one bite and immediatly started gagging ( which with no gag reflex is impressive). Stay away!!!

This chandelier is adorable. I use it as a display piece in a retail store and have had so many people want to buy it and disapointed that its not for sale! I did only receive 3 bulbs instead of 4 so I had to go out and buy all new bulbs since I couldn't find a single bulb locally that looked like the others. Easy fix and very pleased.
Got the wrong item. Very displeased and would not recommend buying unless you feel lucky enough not to be screwed over. The item I got was not inly wrong but $5 less than what I payed for.

This chili has GREAT consistency, which is not easy in a vegetarian product.  It's fantastic for you, and I always enjoy it.    That said, it's not spicy.  The previous reviewer might think it's hot in Michigan, but here in Texas, we would call this medium, maybe even mild.  You can resolve this easily with your favorite hot sauce.    I would give this five stars if it were actually spicy.

We have a huge collection of Playtex cups, and had one of these Munchkin ones given to us as a gift at the same time. After a year of use, almost 3/4 of the Playtex ones have deformed and have round bottoms and can't stand correctly anymore. The Munchkin one still looks as good as the day we got it, so we're in the process of swapping over to all Munchkin ones. We don't use the rubber stoppers anymore, so the cup can leak if turned over, but that is part of the cost of not having the stopper on them so our son can get the full flow of milk or juice, but when we did use the rubber stopper and he'd tip the Munchkin cup we'd get a very very slow dribble through the vent hole, nothing that was uncontrollable though. We do prefer the Munchkin over the Playtex now just because of the durability. And in case you don't know, when ordering these you'll get a RANDOM selection! If you choose Sponge Bob you'll get one of a few designs, if you choose Dora or Sesame Street you'll get a random one of those too.
all brands from sumatra as a wakeup to french roast as mellow were great but the number of decaf options should be eliminated and clumped with a decaf variety package

This is the first toy my two and half month old son tried swatting/touching. The blue ring on it made it easy for him to grab. I have hung this near the changing table to distract him. I am glad I bought this.

Love this high chair so far! Have only had it a couple months, but it is everything I needed thus far. We are only in the high chair stage right now but love that we will be able to use it for many years/ages. I was very surprised to see that there are negative reviews for this drink.  My husband and I were both pleasantly surprised by how amazing this soda is!  As far as orange sodas go, I don't see how you can do much better.  We definitely didn't notice any kind of weird aftertaste.  Also the price on here (don't forget the shipping) is ridiculous.  See if your local Walmart stocks this, because ours does and it was only about 5 bucks.

Not quite ready to write off some of the other sauces I like to use but this stuff was really good in the clam chowder I made the other day.  Tried it on pizza too.  It's an interesting sauce.  Not too much heat, sweet flavor but not too much of each.  Oh, it's really good on scrambled eggs.

They aren't kidding when they named this water \\"Hint\\". I ordered a case of this water in the pomegranate-tangerine flavor and it is really good! Hint is the perfect name for it, since the flavor is just barely there. It's delicious with a light breakfast, perfect for a hot day or just when you want something to drink just just a touch of flavor. I wouldn't suggest it for accompanying heavy meals, like a steak dinner or anything like that. The light taste would get lost in the meals bolder flavors. But I love having one of these with a bagel for breakfast or with a sandwich at lunch. The flavor is light, and it isn't too sweet. Nothing like a sports drink or juice. It reminds me of distilled water, with just a bit of a background taste. It tastes like if you had just been drinking a juice of some other kind out of your bottle, then went and filled the same bottle up with water and drank it. I really like it and definitely plan to reorder more!

Can't get a better tahini for the money.  Its organic, kosher and tastes awesome.  It tastes like halva...!!!  Its thin so can easily be spread or drizzled over anything or mixed into other foods...  :)

The Dumplings and Chicken used to be my favorite Homestyle Bakes product, but it looks like they've opted to go cheap and only include one can of the chicken and veggies and you have to add a can of water now. The result is a nasty unsatisfying meal that's runny when it used to be creamy good. I'm really not happy with the change.

I'd recommend the Homestyle Bakes Country Chicken, Mashed Potatoes and Biscuits. Now those are good!

Yuzu juice is hard to pinpoint in flavor: it's like lemon, tangerine, lime, and maybe grapefruit all together. It is truly unique and tart - so use as you would any citrus juice.  Great in so many applications!    Will definitely be ordering this again!

Here's all the timer simply does:  There are 4 buttons (diaper, feed, sleep and multipurpose).  When you do the activity, hit the button and it starts timing upwards so that you can tell how long \\"itzbeen\\" since the last time you did each activity.  There is a separate timer readout for each activity.  Hitting the button when you do the activity resets the timer back to zero.    But you will still need to record history! It will help monitor trends (at least in the beginning anyways)!  It will help you notice patterns and spot things out of the norm.    Feedings:    You will need to track history and record how many feedings (and also how long they breast fed or how much they bottle fed).  Then you can tell how much your baby is eating and average how far apart. Helpful to spot cluster feeds.    Diapers:  You will need to record if its a wet diaper or dirty or both.  The timer just records how long its been between a diaper change and not a difference with pee or poo.   (I guess you could use the multipurpose button for poo).      Sleeping:  Truthfully we didn't use this timer that much.  The baby usually ate, diaper changed, and then slept.  We didn't bother recording this and woke him up regardless (if he was sleeping) according to feeding schedule.    Other features:  Clock - just about the only feature we use.  Night light - too small to really do anything.  Breast tracking - a toggle switch to track which breast you last fed.  Somewhat useful. But not used anymore (after 2 months).    I might use this later on when the baby is possibly older and just monitor the last times of each activity.  But seeing its my first kid, I will probably track stuff on paper for awhile.      Overall, you're better off with pen, paper and a clock.  Buy yourself a nice clock instead.

I had to buy two for good coverage in a normal sized tub. It's survived three moves and has worked in both smooth and lightly textured tubs. In the textured tub, it does scoot about a little bit (one of the legs may come undone or buckle) but is still effective. After three years, the legs have started to develop some tears since I remove the frogs after every bath. They never got moldy or stained with soap scum. I just pull them up after bath, rinse them well in warm water, shake off excess water, and hang them upside down (suction cups up) on the curtain rod or the side of the tub. Voila, they are clean and dry for the next bath. They've lasted over three years with two kids so they've been a good investment for this mama. I'd definitely buy them again.
Awesome!!!  Love this mix - add some sausage & ham, add some onion & bell peppers and it's like you spent hours in the kitchen.  Will order again (and again, etc.) since I can't find it locally.

I switched from Bob Mill's TVP because that is processed with hexanes. This isn't. It has a wee bit of 'fat' that the other doesn't but it doesn't seem to be affecting my cholesterol numbers or weight...

I do think it tastes better, gets 'tender' faster (reconstitutes easier) and is a little less off feeling in the mouth (texture) than the TVP. I measure it with a 1/8 cup stainless coffee scoop, and consider 2 heaping scoops a daily serving of protein. Heat 1/4 cup of water to boiling, add a teaspoon of your boullion if you want to flavor it (1/2 to 1 teaspoon) then after that dissolves put in the TSP and let soak for a few minutes. Or add right into your soup or stew at the end of cooking. These are about twice the price of TVP but I think they are much better for me, and a 4 pack runs about two months at that size serving for one. The individual bags are a bit bigger than a similar bag of TVP as well. One will fit nicely poured into a 1/2 gallon sealed container. Subscribe and it is cheaper, I like that. The hard part is to figure out how much and how often to set up your subscription for.

They have also made good pizza toppings and taco and burrito filler. For pizza I will reconstitute and sprinkle across the pizza right after the sauce and before other toppings, so it's in there being a 'meat' layer. I have not found a binder that will keep it in burger or meatball form that I can eat (the binder) so I treat this as a loose ground meat fake. It will be a very light colored loose ground meat fake, is a drawback if you are really trying to fake 'meat'. As a 'protein source' instead, it's wonderful.
Stands up well to a toddler.  Shows minor wear after two years but no rips or tears.

A stunner was the Trader Joe's Yellowfin tuna in olive oil - deliciously firm, meaty, well seasoned, slightly fruity, AND reasonably priced.  Would buy again for special occasions.

I heard birds singing and violins playing.....a bread/cracker without added sugar....heaven.  Upon further inspection these little crackers also provided 5 g of protein and 4 grams of fiber and each cracker sheet is only 100 calories. Now were talking, plus they had cheese and I have yet to meet a cheese product I don't like.  I had one of these hefty crackers with my Cioppino for lunch and I was not disappointed.  It was hearty and tasty with just a tease of cheese.  Very satisfying and could see using them in place of bread with the some turkey or tuna salad. You buy them and eat 'em, so you can join the select few who have felt the wrath of sugarless Demon Bears - the food world's love child - a prodigy if Scrubbing Bubbles and RotoRooter had a baby.  Unlike the mainstream Haribo sugar-free bears - these gummy guys are much tastier - falsely leading you into a bottomless spiral usually resulting in many underwear changes.  Surprisingly, after eating only 10 or so - these guys unleashed a demon army on an intestinal battlefield.  The first wave gas attack that hasn't been seen since World War I (too soon to say Syria).  With only a small deployment of 5 more, the tidal wave flood that was released brought memories of Katrina and the New Orleans aftermath.  Picasso painted toilet bowls, abstract artwork highlighting white porcelain with 50 Shades of Brown.  Eat up and bring upon thee a stench worse then what Skywalker endured after opening the innards of the Tauntaun on Hoth.
