Ordered Fuggetabout it and while it is a decent tasting coffee, it is far from bold or dark roasted enough. I was looking for reasonable k-cups, but this is not an item I'd purchase again even at a lower price.

I was IMPRESSED with Brooklyn Bean Roastery's response! They sent an order of Cyclone at no cost...and it was a full order not a 6-10 kcup sample! They followed up to see if I was happy with Cyclone.

Cyclone was very good and I'll order more. The cups have brewed perfectly each time. I've seen some comments that weren't positive, but the company seems to be working hard and it's worth trying.

I'm actually sitting at my desk drinking my first cup of Baronet Decaf Chocolate Fudge Coffee and let me tell you, it's good!  It's smooth, rich and wonderfully satisfying.  If you like coffee and chocolate, then this combination is for you.  I started out drinking it black (not something I usually do) just to get an idea about the flavor and it was smooth enough to drink just like that.  However, adding a little hazelnut creamer notched it up to an entirely different level.  Order it on Subscribe and Save and save even more money.  Great coffee!

I ordered these bars for an upcoming work trip.  I can't say enough about how great they taste, with both the cookies and the bars being equally tasty.  Linda at Jumpstart was extremely helpful when I needed to accelerate the shipping, can't say enough about the great service.  I highly recommend you give these bars a try.
I bought this to tide me over until the US started selling them again.  This was the best deal on the market.  These crispy m&m's are also larger than the ones sold in the US.

This is a great product with a major flaw.  It is very inflexible in how it can attach to the headrest and the strap in the back is at the top of the mirror.  It was impossible to get the right angle with the mirror in either of my family's cars.  Basically, it is just a music and light show for us, because I can't see baby and he can't see me or himself.
This is the best natural cashew butter ever, I just love it... the taste is very good, creamy and tasty.

I use this for carrying my meals to work. It does not scream \\"DIAPER BAG!\\" but that is what it is designed for. Unfortunately, all the gathered fabric on the inside meant for carrying baby bottles takes up a lot of room and decreases the carrying capacity for my plastic bowls. It is very well constructed and can handle the weight of my extra water bottles but the clips on the handle are delicate and are bad about coming undone when the bag is tossed down so that I end up having a strap in hand instead of a handle when I pick it up. But they are easily re-attached. I do still use it but would not spend so much money the next time around.

I had never even heard of canned potato salad much less tasted it. However, I'm out here in the Arizona desert and things spoil even in refrigerators. I browsed through the Grocery & Gourmet section, found Read German Potato Salad and decided to give it a try. The taste is there but it lacks the mayonnaise texture. Other than that it's great.

after having one very good monitor for several years (which broke right before our 3rd baby was born) we had to go out looking for something new.  i purchased an expensive graco monitor that was on sale thinking i fell into a great bargain but was disapointed.  the volume was very loud, even on the lowest setting and distracting since i could hear all the tansmitter noise from it just being on.  it went right back to the store!  the sound and lights monitor allows me to turn the volume all the way down (which is not silent but very very soft) and just use the lights to keep an eye on the baby.  i can hear everything when i turn the volume up, including the whir of computer in my room where the baby is also.  it is so sensitive and clear that if the window is open in the room where the transmitter is i can hear what is going on outside through the monitor from downstairs!  but it's nice to be able to turn the volume all the way down and not be hit by a constant barrage of noise that i do not need to listen to, e.g.: dogs barking outside, geese honking (though the only interference i get is a slight static from my under-cabinet halogen lights -- moving the receiver away takes care of the problem)! as an experienced mom i can often tell by the lights if the baby needs to be picked up, and if in doubt, i just turn up the volume!  it's perfect and so is the price!

I think these are the original Gummi-Bear taste and feel of any I've found elsewhere. The small packages are just the right size for everyone, some even eat two to get that satisfaction they crave. I bought them for a co-worker girl in the office, but the Haribo's are more of a hit with everyone else. The package count seems to be about right for my monthly subscription. Amazon has a good program here.

I am a jelly bean freak. I buy these by the case and don't let anyone else have any. Ronald Reagan would turn over in his grave if anyone put a jelly belly in his mouth. Ugh. Jelly bellies are for kids who don't know any better. These are JELLY BEANS.
The walker doesn't steer well at all. Very hard for a little learner to use it. Disappointed in the money loss.

I completely love this. I get comments wherever we go. People want to know if I really have a frog attached to my sons paci. Yes! It holds it in place perfectly. He's 3 months old and he has started grabbing onto it and holding the frog. Very cute and well worth it. I also love that when he loses it in the car I can reach back and find it easily without being able to see.

I'm a big fan of \\"chewy\\" candy...and these are the best.  I like the regular gobstoppers, but making them \\"chewy\\" was genius.  Delicious and fresh too.  Not stale and hard like these can be if bought from a gas station.
I built a nursery attached to one of my guest rooms.  I had no room for a changing table, and when the kids were being diapered on the floor, I had to do something!  This is genious!

Just had my first grandchild in September.  This was recommended over any other product by anyone I asked.  It sets up easily, breaks down just as easily and quickly.  Its versatility is very clever.  It's been nearly 30 years since we've had a baby in the house and I'm amazed at the wonderful products available today!

This chair is fantastic. It's easy to clamp onto our dining room table, its easy to remove for cleaning, the cover is easily removed and machine washable, and it's easy to fold up and toss in the bottom of the stroller when we go out to restaurants.
However, like some other reviewers I've seen here, my daughter learned to put her foot in the curve of the support bar and push herself up. I'm not sure if she could actually propel herself completely out of the chair, but it made us really nervous and we wouldn't leave her in the chair without having our eyes on her and being within arms reach at all times. I was getting pretty fed up with that situation and we were thinking of sewing shoulder straps onto the chair, but I came across a novel solution on Ponoko. Search Ponoko for \\"Inglesina Fast Chair Safety Guard\\" or something similar and you'll find a plastic shield that snaps on and keeps kids from getting their feet inside those bars. It solved my only issue with this chair. Other than that, this is the perfect high chair in my opinion.

So, I used to drink a lot of coffee through the day and found it aggravating for a lot of reasons. Most of all getting a little jittery after having a few too many cuppas or cranky when I didn't. I tried energy drinks for a while which at least avoided the latter issue, but they're expensive.

Now I got this on the recommendation of a friend. I've had about 20 cups and still have more than half the bin. I'll let you do the math there.

It makes me bright eyed and bushy tailed for longer than coffee or a Redbull did and with none of the side effects. It's also easy to prepare and can be made into a variety of drinks with minimal effort. 'nuff said.
There are all kind of lemon drops, but these were exceptionally good, and all natural too. In fact I have to order more my husband loves them.

Several adult members of my family are race-car/MotoCross fans and their toddlers have been exposed to cars and motorcycles on TV shows. I think that contributes to their enthusiasm when first seeing this Prince Lionheart YoMOTO Ride-on bike. The sleek, low-slung, cool shape, accompanied by the design of the blue trim (comes in red too), resembles a racing vehicle. What kid could resist?    Looks aside, this is a sturdy toy that the kids enjoy. Aside from having a bit of trouble placing their feet properly and leaning \\"the right way\\" for balance, the kids soon found their \\"groove\\" and are now fighting over it. I notice the ones past two years of age have the least difficulty in maneuvering it, so it might be best to wait till your child reaches that age.    Fun aside, on the practical side, it's a great way to learn balance and an easy step towards learning to ride a two-wheel bike. Another practical thing I like is the easy assembly; just snap the handlebars on and your kid is set to go.    Some parents are suggesting a helmet, just in case, so that might be a good idea until your child is used to his new learning toy.    Highly recommended.    Reviewed by Betty Dravis, August 19, 2014  Author of \\"The Toonies Invade Silicon Valley\\"

These are really good with great flavor. Even my husband, who doesn't need to avoid gluten, likes them.
I would have given them a five but they need to pack them better. They came all crumbled - hard to make sandwiches that way.
Love this Matcha !!!!! I've used the cerimonial and the cullinary. This is the best !!!! It disolves great and taste better.  I make iced Matcha and it's never a residue at the bottom of the glass.

I used to raise Red Lake Currants and make wonderfully tart currant jelly.  This product is a little sweet for my taste.  I'd prefer a little more "zing."  It's probably okay if you're going to use it to make a sauce to be served with poultry, or if you simply have no reference with which to compare it.  Additionally, it's greatly overpriced.  I'm not likely to reorder this product again.  I'll look elsewhere for something closer to my taste preference.

Can't seem to find it any where any more. Hope they have it here soon.
Just the most delicious sauce, clear, and doesn't make me feel like I'm eating ketchup.
Good quality and flavor, but difficult for Amazon to ship without it arriving as powder.
The decal was fine but it did not come with any direction; I had to look back and forth between the online photo and my wall for help on what sticker to go where
I love these!  Strawberry and blueberry are my favorites.  They are a great on the go breakfast or snack and the best part is they don't taste gluten free!
Be sure to check the recommended age for this product , I didn't and thats probably why it didn't work well for me.

These Grove Square, French Vanilla Cappuccino's are delicious and I am NOT a vanilla fan.  I would be happier if they carried 'coffee' flavor, but I thought these would be good for the office and they are!
These seriously might be the tastiest lollipops I've ever eaten. They are decent sized as well, not like a little kid's parade candy lollipop, more like a candy store lollipop. A good value.

This thing was a lifesaver for me when my sleep apnea baby was little! Only 1 false alarm ever, fit perfectly on baby and baby could still sleep any way he wanted. I passed it on to a friend who had a child with medical issues and she's using it still.
Bought this as a gift.  I bought Buddy Dog for  my nephew and he has to have it to sleep and his lovie.  The fabric is so soft

I got this instead of the Sophie Giraffe for my teething son. He wasn't all that interested in it at first. But as he got older he liked it. He doesn't play with it much, but his older brother really likes it. If I had to do it all again I would've ordered Sophie.

I first experienced Maynards Wine Gums while visiting a friend who had brought them back from South Africa.  Since the South African version is not imported to the US, I bought the English version through Amazon.  It was very close if not identical to the South African variety.

Just the right balance of tart and sweet, these cherries are really good. I have a small handful with my breakfast almost every day. The quality of this brand is what will bring me back to order again.

Great value for the price! I love the two different sizes. One is a single trip bag to haul to diapers and such, and the other is overnight size for clothes.Together they are baby's luggage :-) Two reasons that I gave them 4 stars instead of 5. I wish there was a zipper pocket or two on the inside, and the fabric on the outside is wipe-able plastic (which I'm sure I'll be grateful for later, but right now I'm in a soft mood).

Although these toys are great and fun for my 1 year old, we have not had them that long and they have mold on the inside. We squirt the water out every time we put them away but it is the inevitable to not have the moisture stay locked inside the little toys. I would choose another toy :( sorry Munchkin
The bag looks nice, it is convenient and spacious inside. It's really easy to organize baby stuff and keep everything in order, so you can have fast access to bottles or diapers when necessary.

Pros
Space saving
Easy to open and close
Love the storage
Very maneuverable
Handles nice height for tall and short parents

Cons
Wish the shoulder straps came with pads...a little rough on the neck
one small bag for this much? really? rip off alert!  product is great, probably the best out there, but this is clearly a rip
Only the arms are crinkly I thought the whole body would be but its not. its very soft but my 7 month old lost interest very quickly

We have twins, and needed to find the smallest car seats available for our Subaru Outback, because one of the car seats needed to go behind the driver's seat, and still leave enough leg room to drive! The Chicco Keyfit gave us the most leg room (I'm 5'5\\", and my husband it 5'11\\", I have PLENTY of room, and my husband is a bit smooshed, but can easily drive).  I can carry both easily to and from our car (granted our girls are only 11lbs!), and they are very easy to put in and out of the car.      I wish the sun shade was bigger though, that is my only complaint! Otherwise LOVE this car seat!

I would have given it a 5 but the mattress support is wood and not a metal spring frame which I'd prefer. The crib is beautiful and I can't wait to lay my beautiful baby girl in it. It was easy to put together despite what other reviews previously stated. The color is true white. There was no odor like previous reviews had stated. I am satisfied with this crib.

I think we got instant polenta, which cooked very quickly.

This is from Italy, where I think they don't use GMO corn!

I've had the contents of this package in a 9" X 13" pan in the refrigerator for about 3 weeks! It is still good!

It has a lot of uses. We've served it at breakfast, and it's really good topped with salsa.

Yes, we will buy this again!
.... Best candy I've ever had... I'm almost sad I received it in my birch box, because I will need to buy this all the time now!!
I just purchased a loaf of this bread from my local whole foods depot. The sandwich version. Looked good and I was excited but it's like trying to chew rubber. YUK

My favorite hot chocolate. Origionally it was a christmas gift to my family from Landlord. I am no conesure when drinking hot chocolate. I prefer packaged swiss miss to homemade melted and mixed anyday. This tastes like delux, creamy, velvity hot chocolate and trumps even my all time instant fave swissmiss. Must try for the holidays
Love it...fast, tasty dish with a little spice. I drop it on top of jasmine rice and it's an excellent, quick meal. Go get it. :)

I think it is OK, but when putting this in the fridge, it tends to GEL UP on me, and it kind of has an apple cider taste to it. And
I'm not much of a cider fan, but maybe you do and I'll know you like it. Bye
Fresh, not too salty and wonderful smoky flavor of Tillamook. You will not be disappointed! Great for long drives, camping or late night snacks-to help you stay away from sugar!

I bought this mobile despite the bad reviews because it was so cute. I have had zero problems. It is annoying to keep rewinding the mobile, but I prefer that to buying and constantly replacing batteries. I had three different mobiles--one for crib, one for changing table and one for his crib at grandma's. This one was by far our favorite. I suspect that all the broken mobile issues were due to user error--probably over-winding to make the music last longer. I never overwound the mobile and never had any issues. We have been using it for over 7 months. I took it out of the crib once my son could pull himself up, but we keep it in a corner of his room so he can still look at it. I'm glad I ignored the bad reviews and took a chance with this sweet little mobile!

It is very useful and needed if you want to use the carrier with a really young baby.  The only downside is its kind of hard to use on your own.  You almost need two people to get everything in place properly and safely.

We purchased these straps to hold the toilet lid down, so the rug rat can't fall in. They don't work, the sticky pads pull right off with little effort AND the latching mechanism was much too difficult to open. So, I modified them by removing plastic from the raised portion of the latch using a razor blade, so they now open easier. Next, I removed the sticky tape that came with the latch and replaced it with some Scotch 4010 strong 2 sided sticky tape. I wouldn't go to all this effort to hold the toilet seat down, but the other mechanical arm devices are made so poorly that I don't like them - they are hard to use and subject to kids ripping them off. So, we'll try to see if this strapping hold down will work with better tape.
Overall, a good product idea, but very poorly designed.

After reading your reviews I definitely knew what to expect. Both the warming dish and the spoon set are practical and made well. After looking for awhile and seeing the dish at a well-known grocery store which charged more, Amazon was a bargain. My granddaughter is in the beginning stages of eating solid foods so we're using the spoon now. She likes the way the spoon feels in her mouth and bites on it between her little front teeth. I can use the spoon feeling confident because it won't hurt her. A really good buy!

I crush a couple of bars and add  it to the whole wheat thingie which are dull and listless. This one when crushed and added to the whole wheat cereal really puts a spring in its step. Use skim milk. I think this is my favorite of all their bars. The original is always the best.
These are super soft!  They feel so much nicer than the paper disposable kind.  I'm on my 3rd kid and wish I had gotten these the first time around!
This product is not sturdy enough. It is good up to about 14 months and then after that it wasn't as useful. Concept is great, but not functional for me.
This was a re-order of this great popcorn because we consumed the first one.  I will continue to buy this brand and flavor as long as they make it.

Much better than what I thought I was getting for the price! The back seat fully reclines, but the front seat only goes to a 45 degree angle. That is my only draw back about this stroller. I have twins and they can't keep their head up yet so one is always stuck in the front with their head all slouched. But they will out grow this. Fits in the back of my Mazda 3 hatchback. And is light enough for me to lift it easily.
I love this new diaper bag, although it took more than 2 weeks to arrive, the wait was worth it.

I ordered this mattress cover about a month ago. I have a 9 month old who for the last couple of months has been insisting on drinking a lot of formula right before bedtime (6 - 10 oz a night). We switched to overnight diapers thinking that that would do the trick, but she's leaking through her diapers when she sleeps 11 or 12 hours a night. Originally I was using a mattess pad that covered the majority of the mattress. I was using it also to work with the pack-n-play. Learned pretty quickly that the pad wasn't holding all of the moisture. Then I went to a big box store and purchased a mattress cover that I figured would work (for approx $11). When I opened the package I was surprised to see that the liner backing was explosed on the underneath and then in my pre-wash the lining was cracked in various places. I read the reviews on this mattress pad and decided to give it a try. I loved how the lining wasn't exposed at all, I could tell this product had quality immediately. But.. the big test was yesterday when I was changing my daughter's diaper in her crib. Before I could get a new diaper underneath her, she urinated on the sheet. I actually let her finish before removing her, as I wanted to test the cover (normally I would never do that!). I put one of those puppy pads under her to keep her dry and changed her clothes while she laid over the wet spot (so the spot sat there for about 5-7 minutes with baby's weight on it). After handing baby over to daddy so that I could change the sheets, I was thrilled to see that this cover passed the test with flying colors! Absolutely NO leaking through! I'm planning to buy more and will probably order more for baby shower gifts too!

***********************************************************

Update 10/16/12: I now own 3 of these pads to rotate easily in the week if necessary. My third pad ripped (the pad separated from the fitted side section). Ripped about 4 inches along the seam. I was disappointed, but it still was functional, so I'm still using it with absolutely no problems!
Didnt think this combo of my two favorite things would workout but I'm glad I tried it!! Couldn't put the cookies down!
I really couldn't trust this because it came off the wall very easily, once when I reached for it and oce just fell off by itself.
This is our second one - we gave the first one to the other grandparents when we moved away and now we bought another for when they visit!
WONDERFUL PEPPERMINT STICK CANDY. SOFT, GOOD FLAVOR. COME IN A NICE ROUND TIN THAT KEEPS IT FRESH TOO. WILL DEFINITLY BUY AGAIN.
I like it.  It is good and the quality is good.  However,  it is not $30 good.
Favorite decaf....does not taste watered down, its rich and bold.  No complaints from any coffee drinkers here. But it's not a cheap cup.
This all beef salami is the very best that I've ever eaten. It took me over 5 years in order to find this outstanding product. It's almost impossible to find salami that doesn't have pork in it.
water is ok, but the bottle cap is difficult to open and the plastic itself has a strong plastic odor.   The Pellegrino or Perrier sparkling waters are a much better choice.

What an adorable bottle. Love the frog on it!

This bottle is great for our little one that is little Mr. Independent. He wants to carry around his bottle and do it by himself. You gotta love that stage in life.

I like that this is a glass bottle as it doesn't stain when we offer colored beverages. The unit has a silicone base that can be removed for cleaning. The handles and top/ring can be placed on the top rack in the dishwasher but I usually just wash them and allow to air dry. I like running the bottle through the dishwasher to make sure it is clean and germ free.

Overall, this is a super cute bottle with an adorable frog climbing the side. The unit comes with an extra nipple and we have been able to get the sippy disks that fit jars to work too.

This would be a cute gift for a baby shower or new parent basket. It teaches the little ones how to hold their bottles and gives them some independence.

Promotional or discounted product provided for review.
Great little mobile. It is small and does its job. Not bad but not great either. It is great for the price and how easily it attaches to multiple surfaces such as a crib or plack and play.

Good Stuff!!  I was using the Honeyville for years and then one day went to order more and the price was outrageous. I found this one to be just as good if not better at a lower price!  However now they seem to be just about the same price.  Keep it in the fridge for the best freshness.  Awesome in paleo baked goods and especially delicious to coat your chicken tenders.  YUM!
I bought this for my baby's formula, and she has been doing well on it. I go through it pretty fast, so having the bulk savings and quantity has been great

The flavor does die very quickly. I mean like, 1 minute and it's mostly gone quick.

But hey, can't beat aspartame free.

Not a good high chair. It works for a very basic one, I guess. The screws are always falling out from the legs. My two yr old son bounces when he eats and once he bounced the leg out and the whole thing fell over! In the summer he gets stuck to the plastic. Very hard to keep clean too. Also when we were putting it together, the plastic started to seperate, should have returned it right then!

I very like this diaper bag!
It's so convenient for me when I go out with my baby.
And, the pattern is also very cute~

I adore Constant Comment Green tea.

Follow-up 5/4/2015 - I ordered a second case of this wonderful tea. Constant Comment Green is my "go to" green tea. I love green tea, and the spices and orange in the Constant Comment blend give this tea a wonderful aroma and light sweetness without sugar!

It was a pleasant surprise to see that these little refillable cups actually work. I really hesitated buying it but I'm so glad I did. It saves me a ton a money filling my own k cups. I would totally buy these again.... It reduces the cost of making a cup of coffee down to pennies!

Fits perfect came in a very short time...What else can I say except EVEN IF THE PRODUCT IS PERFECT AND SHIPPING IS GREAT I WILL ..TELL AMAZONE I WILLNEVER DO THIS AGAIN UNLESS I CAN US AS FEW WORDS AS I WANT

I have been fortunate to have tasted and cooked with the real thing, sent home by friends travelling in Greece, so I was more than a little disappointed when this arrived.  It was nothing like i expected given the many positive reviews.  There was just 1 reviewer who said "disgusting!"  Now I wouldn't go quite that far, but that should have been a clue, clearly the rest of you don't know what it's supposed to taste and smell like.   She seems to be the only one with discerning taste buds!  This stuff is going on the compost heap.

Highly recommended by someone who has spent a lot of time looking into and researching safe installation of car seats, which is shockingly more complicated than you might think. This was extremely helpful in getting our car seats to sit straight in our old car where the seats are very squishy. So much more effective than a pool noodle. It has saved me hours of installing and uninstalling to try to get a tight fit after the seat would shift and compress after a few days of being installed.
This bumper has good quality and looks good. Our son loves sleeping on it, and uses it as a pillow when he sleeps.
A great deal on my all-time favorite popcorn topping.  Works out to be about a buck a bottle cheaper than you can get it locally.
Always good quality from Stash. Foil maintains flavors, glad to be able to buy it in bulk.

These were great because they really helped slow the flow of the milk coming out of the bottle.  This was important because the larger nipples made it seem as though the baby was choking on the milk because it was coming out much to quickly.  The only downside of these is that from time to time the hole in the nipple can get clogged while feeding, but that is easily remedied by running under hot water and squeezing the top to clear the clog.

I guess I got the "lemon" this time, but I'm keeping it for now if customer service comes through. Pros first: the table looks sturdy and of good quality, in spite of the scratches and dents (probably from shipping? looks antique though, we'll say). It came with directions, which is always nice. It shipped to an FPO address! Thanks for that! Cons: one shelf support was split before I was even done putting it together. I had an extra #1 screw and was short a #2, not that it matters b/c three of the holes aren't taking the screws anyway. Getting the rigged out side into the empty side was simply terrible, but I was by myself. Ultimately, I wanted to set fire to it and had to step away, but hope springs eternal. I'm hoping we can make it work.
The inflatable tub was exactly what we wanted.  It keeps the baby safe. The drain is very handy. Very comfortable for the baby.
When received, I started taking the capsules on the suggested enhanced frequency. After taking all capsules from one bottle there was no difference. Just guess this does not work for me.
The nuts are very tasty - a good source of selenium - I enjoy them. The product is a two pound bag.
Have been eating this brand for along time. Was purchasing in the food stores, until we discovered it on Amazon. Since then we have been hooked, and pay a lot less.

My 2.5 month old daughter loves this bouncer.  With all the moving parts and colors, it can easily keep her entertained for about 20-35 minutes.  She squeals and coos at the moving lizard and monkey constantly and loves the fact that her knees connect with the hanging bird and monkey.  She doesn't seem to care about the vibration mode, but maybe she will when she's a bit older.  She's in it so much that the songs have haunted me at night and in the shower, I guess that happens to all parents though.  My only recommendation for the bouncer would be to add a mirror, I think she would really like that.  Unlike some earlier reviewers, I've had no issues with clicking noises from the moving parts, maybe Fisher Price fixed that issue recently.  Highly recommended!
Love it. I use it in my protein shakes and it adds thickness and awesome flavor.
Really liked the item. It is very simple to attach to any bags or purses and take with me anywhere.

This diaper pail is great, NO smells at all! When I had my first son I had a diaper genie and had to stop using it because of the smell and the whole process it took to take the diapers out.  Now with my third child I decided to give it a try and it has not disappointed me.  I recommend this diaper pail to all moms!
Used to replace another gate to keep our dog corralled in the kitchen.  Straight out of the box and installed in 10 minutes.  So much sturdier than our previous gate and looks better too.
LOVE LOVE LOVE this snack for my lil' ones and myself. Only natural sugar, no refined sugar, all natural fruit!
The arm holes are way too big, I wish there was some sort of adjustment with the snaps for smaller babies.

This tortilla and chicken soup has no tortilla in it.  It's also mostly broth.  Disappointing.  The flavor is ok and the broth has some body, although it seems more like a tomato-vegetable soup with some spiciness added.  I enjoyed Campbell's version much more, which has more solid ingredients in it including tortillas.

If you care for a stronger tea, Barry's is good. I have had the Gold, Irish Breakfast and the decaf but I actually prefer the decaf. There is no skimping on taste with this brand. Irish tea is the best!
If you are looking for a great cup of dark decaf, this is one of the best.  I have had a difficult time finding good dark roast decafs and have been delighted with this one.
My daughter adores this toy!  Only down side, it seems to go through batteries pretty quickly compared to another similar toy.  But sound is good and it's easy for little ones to use!
the baby loves it and after 2 days in chair he started to sit up by him self on the floor

This play pen is well constructed for the money. It is more sterdier than most playards. I loved the colors and how easy it was to put it together.The diaper wipe compartment holder could have been a little stronger to be able to hold stuff without dropping down.

This is the WORST dresser ever! Especially since it is for a baby's room! Putting it together was a nightmare, parts were missing that we had to have resent.  It is a very cheaply manufactured product that should never be sold for a children's room.  The drawers fall apart every time you open them because the pieces don't lock together correctly.  When trying to get the company to send replacement parts, they refused to respond.  After sending a dozen emails and constantly calling, it took them 8 months to finally respond, just to send more cheap materials. And the bottom of the drawer is nothing but a thin piece of board that barely holds clothes.  This is not something you want in a child's room where they can really hurt themselves. The dresser looks nice but it is complete crap.  It scratches and marks very easily. Go with better quality furniture, your child's life is at risk!
they work but after wearing, washing and drying one time they loose their shape and are kinda cockeyed now. I cant explain it but they just dont lay the same.
I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my brother who is into experimenting with different diets, paleo included. He said they were gross and would rather just cut "cookies" out of his diet.

I decided to add chia seeds to my veggie smoothies due to the Super Food they are claimed to be. Although this has been my first experience with chia seeds, It seems to be a quality product and I will be buying this brand again.

This high chair was very easy to assemble.  The print on the highchair is very stylish.  The material wipes down easily.  The safety straps are easy to use.  The two selling points on this highchair were that a.) it has a compact fold b.) the tray lid is removable and dishwasher safe.  The trendy seat cover was an added bonus.  The high chair is level with a kitchen/dining room table.  It is not super high and awkward like other high chairs.  My husband and I like the chair so much that we are considering to get one for our house for everyday use.
The down side is that it doesn't stay creamy.  Mine is all powdery and worthless except in a smoothy.  I actually loved it when I first got it and was great on toast.

Looks exactly like the picture love it. Washed it before putting on the crib it did not shrink it is the first washing .I love that it can be used for a boy or a girl. Will order more of Pam Grace bedding sets the colours are beautiful and the fabric seems to be very strong if anything goes wrong i will write a future review so far really no complaints. Thanks a bunch
Yummy green tea with ginger and a hint of sweet!  goes down smooth and the bottle is glass so it is great to recycle for water later!

I absolutely love my Ergo carrier.  I've gotten a lot of compliments on the zebra print too. I have a very active 19 month old and a newborn, so I wear my Ergo most of the day. It's super comfortable and easy to put on and take off. By far one of the best purchases I have made.
This is my absolute favorite trail mix ever!  Just the perfect blend of sweet, salty, crunchy and soft.  I order this item over and over.

This brush works really well for me. I used to use the full cylindrical style brush and had the same complaints as others with splashing everywhere when you pull this type back out of the bottle. The shape of the bristles definitely reduce the amount of splattering. The fact that the bristles aren't in a full cylinder, does not at all compromise the effectiveness of cleaning the inside of the bottle. In fact, they tend to conform much better than the cylindrical style.

In addition, I actually don't have any AVENT bottles. I use it for plastic & glass Medela bottles and glass Dr. Brown's bottles. No problems fitting.

The only obvious downside is no suction cup or anything to stand it upright. I usually have the bottles soaking in a bowl before cleaning, and so I just rest this brush across the container in between cleaning one bottle and the next.

I LOVE being able to see my baby on the video. The video quality is nice and we have no issues seeing her when it is dark in her room etc.   I love every thing about the monitor EXCEPT the battery life. As long as we keep the hand held unit plugged in there are no issues. But unplug it for 5 minutes and we start getting the battery warning light and it will shut off shortly after. Not acceptable since we keep the unit plugged in 99.9% of the day. Being winter, it hasnt caused much of an issue yet but with spring/summer approaching we will be outside more and I expect this to be an issue. I have contacted Safety 1st to see if they have any suggestions. If not I may do some research and consider purchasing another monitor that can hold a charge.  UPDATE:  1 year after purchasing this I just threw it in the trash.  Not only did it still not hold a charge but it wouldnt even stay on while it was plugged in.  Do not buy this monitor.
By far the best baby product we purchased.  My little one slept in it until he outgrew it.
Love this mirror!  It works great and is really good sized.  I didn't realize it would be so big. We are very pleased.

The new flavors are absolutely wonderful.  I still love the old gold-bears, but having some new flavors is a welcome change.  My favorite are lime, black courant, and apple.  You can taste that these are indeed juicier.  Only wish these came in bigger bags!

Somewhat disappointing. I clipped these on to my 20 month old's pants with no belt loops and while his pants stayed up, they forced the pants to gap downward and the Dapper Snapper to go across his back, touching his skin. I have to readjust often to fix this.

This caddy is a lot smaller than I thought it was going to be. In the picture it looks like it is a lot bigger than it actually is. I am having twins, so I needed it to hold double the amount of a single baby, so I am disappointed in the size. I ordered the JJ Cole caddy from my friend's registry and now wish I would have ordered that one for myself. It's bigger, sturdier, and comes with a changing pad....for the same price or slightly cheaper. I'd definitely go with that one if you are trying to decide on a diaper caddy.
I love these light flavorful peas you can snack on any time of day! You'll find yourself working through the bag in no time at all.
Delicious tasting snack great with a cup of coffee. Reminds me of Joya rings that I had as a kid in Brooklyn
just what the doctor ordered.  My wife truly enjoys the taste and they work perfectly with our Hamilton coffee maker

Don't get these expecting "chocolate." They are raw cacao pieces - no processing, no sugar, nothing, so they are a bit bitter. I can't keep chocolate chips in the house, else I eat them by the handful, but I really like chocolate. I get these and put them in my cereal, smoothies, and/or yogurt to satisfy my chocolate cravings. They're really good if you know what to expect.
I thought having a wheat and egg allergy was the end of baking for me. Cup-4-cup is a life-changer in that I an make a cake or bread product and not worry if it will turn out. Thanks!
They tastes weird but also really good at the same time! It was just a new flavor to my taste buds! They have a little sour taste to them.

I really like this carseat.  My husband and I had trouble deciding on an infant car seat because there were lots of similarities between the brands.  We decided on the Britax.  Thus when looking for a convertible seat, we naturally first thought of Britax again, but looked at others as well.  There was no comparison in the convertible seats.  The quality of the Britax is just SOOOO much better.  Yes, it's more expensive, but isn't your baby worth it?!  Would definitely buy again.
While they dont taste exactly like a regular pickle the taste is great. Plenty of spice but not too much. An excellent alternative to no pickles..

You'll sleep like a baby, when you know your baby is sleeping safely. The ASTRA VIDEO MONITOR has got to be one of the coolest, most useful products I've EVER encountered. What you have here is an easy-to-use baby audio/video monitoring system, that lets you remotely watch your child's entire room, day or night, listen to them, speak to them, and even play soothing music for them.
THE VIDEO CAMERA
The video camera has a zoom function, and can pan up, down, tilt right or left, all remotely controlled by the video screen hand helt device. That camera will point just about anywhere you want it to in the room, 300 degrees horizonal and 110 degrees verticle, without making a sound. It has amazing night vision capacity. Even with next to NO LIGHT on, the night vision function let's you see the room and the baby (in black and white), just as clearly as if it were daylight. The picture quality resembles that of a good digital camera. During daylight use, the picture is in COLOR.
THE TWO WAY AUDIO
When your baby starts to cry, the LED light on the video screen turns from blue, to a flashing orange and green color. The menu allows you to sellect the sensitivity levels, so a random noise doesnt activate the LED indicator lights. Plus the video screen turns on when crying starts, if its turned off. You can sellect how loud you hear the baby cry, and you can also sellect MUTE. You can calm the baby down by talking into the viewscreen device, which transmits your voice over the video camera's built in speaker. My elderly mother is hard of hearing, but she could hear me, and make my words out quite well, when I spoke to her over the video monitor.
SIGNAL STRENGTH
The video camera has an antenna that transmits to the hand helt view screen. The signal strength is utterly amazing. I live in a brick home, and it transmitted thru the brick walls into the newer part of the house without problems. It transmitted from downstairs to upstairs, and across 4 rooms, without any problem. In fact, I took the monitor outside, and walked down the street---FIVE HOUSES AWAY-- and still had good signal strength. I see no reason why you shouldnt get good transmission from the video camera to the view screen, even if you're in the yard, or down in the cellar, and the baby's room is upstairs.
THE LULLABY FEATURE
If your baby calms down in response to music, you can direct the video camera to play one of three preprogrammed lullabies over the speaker. The sound is a bit mechanical, but no different than a baby's crib toy that you wind up to play a song. You push the MENU button, and then chose one of three songs. 1. Twinkle Twinkle Little Star. 2. Strauss Venanese Walze 3. Oh Johnny Boy (old irish tune)
EASE OF USE
The instructions are in easy to read, easy to understand english. You unpack it, insert and charge the battery, plug in the Video camera, turn it on, and it's working. If you want to get fancy, you can buy multiple video cameras, and have them all transmit to one view screen. It didnt even take me a minute to figure out how all this works. The feature design is very intuitive. You have the button you push to transmit your voice, the on/off switch on the side, the up/down/right/left arrows on the toggle button, just like on a DVD remote, to point the camera around. To transmit your voice you push a MIC button. You have the menu button, so you can adjust the sound sensitivity, the view screen brightness, chose the lullaby, etc. The view screen has various icons, that lets you know signal strength, if the battery is charged, if the MUTE is on, as well as every other possible function. The battery will operate for 48 hours between charges, if you use the \\"POWER SAVE\\" mode. When the battery is low, the blue LED light flashes slowly. Believe me, the ASTRA monitor's use is very intuitive, and easy.
OVERALL IMPRESSION
I'm just so \\"WOWed\\" by this baby monitor. The box comes with mounting hardware, so you can mount the camera up high on the wall. Maybe it wont matter with a baby, but if you want to put this in the kid's playroom, I'd mount it up on the wall. Since the camera will tilt up and down, swivel right to left, and zoom, you'll be able to remotely move the camera's lense to see the ENTIRE room, if its up in the corner. As long as kids dont play with this and break it, you'll be using this for years. The video camera and the view screen have a very modern style too, and are both VERY small. The round camera device is only about four and a half inches tall. If you have any problems understanding how your monitor works, or if its not working right, you can call up CUSTOMER SUPPORT--for as long as you own the device. In fact, there's a \\"panic button\\" on the screen, which gives you their \\"800\\" number, and webpage, so you dont have to go looking for the instruction manuel. With all the features, ease of use, excellent night vision and transmission range, I believe its well worth the money spent.ou can mount the camera up high on the wall.
