Our small baby barely fit in to this on birth but he has gown in to this over time.
These are great. They are just once piece so its super easy to clean and fits just right on my medela pump. Will definitely be ordering from here again!

My son actually naps in the bassinet all day while we're out and about. I've even changed his diaper in it on the go. It has allowed me and husband to continue to eat out at restaurants on a regular basis. I will miss the bassinet when he is old enough for the seat, but I'm sure we'll fall in love with that too!
The maneuverability is fabulous. When I'm walking our dog and pushing the stroller, being able to use one hand is essential.
I don't typically take it in the car because we walk most places, but when I do, it is cumbersome to break down. Although it has gotten easier with practice.
The under storage could be bigger, which I believe they have improved for the 2013 model. Also the handle is difficult to take off. Again, I read they fixed that for the new version.
Overall, this is one of our favorite and most loved baby purchases. We use it every single day!
This is a very handy product to have.  It has it's own carry case, which is a great plus.  It's perfect for traveling to grandparents or even hotels.

The glowing reviews of these 'cakes' (in the loosest possible sense of the definition of cake) caused me to buy them along with an order of robust English tea (which in the event fully lived up to its definition of robust tea).
They looked a bit dodgy to me even as I looked at them in their individual plastic containers but trusting to the five star reviews I dove in. These things are utterly horrible. They are just mushy, mealy, sugar gut bombs that are so unpalatable that I thought I had eaten four of them and found the next day that I had three remaining.
After the first two, I thought that I should give them a fair shot at changing my initial revulsion and so went back and ate (as I thought) two more to confirm my worst fears.
These are frightfully bad. So bad, in fact, that I had to read the contents just out of morbid curiosity. Sure enough, apart from Wheat (proportionately the third most ingredient in the mix) these are nothing but sugar and fat: #1 Sugar #2 Vegetable Oils (fat) #4 Glucose Syrup (sugar) #5 Vegetable Glycerin (fat) #6 Vegetable fats (fat) #7 Dextrose (sugar) #8 Dried Egg White (finally something neither fat nor sugar) #9 Whey powder (Whoops, fat again) #10 Corn Starch.
There is no flavor to speak of, other than cloying sweet sugar burn and, as I said, the texture is mushy and mealy.

I'm not a food snob. I eat fast food often. In fact I went to not one, not two, but THREE fast food joints today for coffee drinks and a fried fish sandwich.
I bought a lot of these as giveaways to customers because I thought they'd be a novel treat but I gotta say, I'm going to apologize as I leave them. I have to imagine that we can make things that are every bit as loathsome right here in the USA. I find that my guys like the cakes from Sara Lee, which are admittedly a bit much for me for pretty much the same reasons that I don't like these--only less so-- but I will eat one of those on occasion and sometimes almost enjoy it.njoy it.

I like the Nairn's oatmeal GF cookies, though I prefer the plain ones better.  These were good, but the raisins had a slightly weird texture.  There was nothing wrong with them, it just seemed like it didn't really fit in with the cookie.  Their products are a bit expensive, but I like packages of cookies that are wrapped in smaller servings inside - it helps me to not eat the whole box at once.

These pods are great.  I find that you need to use the 2 cup device, but then just 1 cup when you run the machine.  the 2 cup option is too watery for my taste.  This is one of the few coffees that I don't have to add anything to... yum!

I honestly came here to leave this review. I've always enjoyed a good black tea with milk and sugar. After having officially given up coffee, I've gone through my fair share of teas trying to find that perfect morning cup. I am by no means a connoisseur however and tea drinkers are passionate and use some verbiage that goes over my head when reading reviews. After drinking Twining's English & Irish Breakfast varieties, and several other brands of the same kind, I had given up finding something strong and smooth. They were either way too weak (tastes like watery milk even when only using a spot of milk) or too bitter. I forgot Tazo's Awake (English Breakfast) was brewing for a little over 5 min. and it was undrinkable. Searching here this came up finally. I put it in my cart and forgot about it. Lo and behold walking through one of my local discount markets (Reny's in Maine) ; you might find it in Job Lot, Dollar stores, etc, have no idea why; I found this for $3.99!! Thats the regular price, so Amazon is definitely way overpriced. I brewed one as soon as I got home and BOOM! Strong, malty , smooth and not a HINT of bitterness. In fact it matters not whether you leave it in 3 minutes or 10. The taste kind of plateaus out and I even walk around with the bag in my cup after adding milk and a few sugars. It's seriously good. I love the bag (same as pictured here) , reminds me of living in Ireland but the sticker will eventually give out (I have about 2 cups a day). Just as a measured experiment I brewed a Twinings Irish Breakfast yesterday and it was awful. Dreadfully weak after 9 minutes in the cup. When you squeeze one of the Thompson's tea bags, it has coppery, brown concentrate still coming out.

THANK GOD. I cant believe its taken this long for someone to figure out how to make a good tasting energy drink with coconut water. I've literally been trying every one and each is just like drinking old dishwasher water that's been sitting for months. This stuff is the real deal.  It tastes great, and gives me the energy i need to do my real passion, Cliff jumping.  There are 4 things I do to get ready for a jump. Pack my parachute, Check my safety chute, Chug a Greater Than, and STEP BACK.  I cant say enough about this stuff. I just ordered a new case, and it showed up at my doorstep 3 days later. Id bathe in it if i could, matter of fact, ill be right back.

When my exclusively breastfed baby started daycare at 3 months old, he had never had a bottle in his mouth. I put my pumped breastmilk in these bottles, and he took to them very easily! There was no nipple confusion, and he still prefers my breast, but these work perfectly when I cant be there. I also love that these are simple, as in they have 3 parts, bottle, screw-on nipple, and lid. No extra rings or crap. They do just fine in the dishwasher also.

I have been buying this granola for years. It is so delicious especially with Greek yogurt. My lunches are very enjoyable because I look forward to mixing the two together. Its like a treat and so satisfying. Give this a try with yogurt. It's a nutritious meal or even just a little snack in a bag.  I'm very happy Amazon is carrying this product!

I have purchased before and been very pleased with this item in the past. So when I received this product again. expecting a favorable product, this time I am very disapointed. It is supposed to be a Jasmine Green Tea but falls short. There is hardly a hint of jasmine when I opened the bag and even less when brewed and sipped on. Will look for a different brand next time. Unless Amazon and the company they buy this product from can give me a suitable explanation for the poor quality.

My tub has small bumps to help protect against slipping therefore it didn't provide a smooth enough surface for the suction cups to stick to. Stuck great on the countertop so it can work but just not with my tub.

I received the Beef Ravioli Meal with wheat flatbread, cornbread, grape jelly, and Reese's pieces...

Of course the pack included the heater, utensil (spoon), and napkin... I wish it also included the beverage base, coffee and creamer but it didn't... I wonder if this was for this particular meal or All Eversafe MRE products... For this reason I awarded only three stars...

I have these in my range bag as a quasi bug-out-bag... And they will be absolutely perfect for that purpose... Or if I do some light backpacking and/or camping these would be great as well!

The ravioli tasted reasonably good (think Chef Boyardee) and if I were hungry or had exerted myself over the course of a day I'm sure this would really taste good! And the included heater is so convenient!

I love this soy milk. It tastes not as great when it's not cold so I wouldn't drink it straight away when it comes in the mail but it ships very fast and it's much easier than carrying it from the store and a little cheaper also. And the panda's super cute. I have to admit that this is the reason I originally tried this product at wholefoods.

I use coconut oil twice a day by swishing it around my mouth for 10 minutes each time. It has made my teeth whiter and breath better than ever. I read that it was good for your mouth and teeth, It is true. This is the best coconut oil that I have tasted. I use 1 teaspoon daily. Do not swallow the oil. Spit it into the barrel. If you spit into the sink it is oil so it can clog your pipes. See the difference it makes daily.

I had waited anxiously for McDonald's  to put their coffee out to the public.It always tasted so good in the restaurant.At first I bought the ground and thought I just wasn't using the correct measurements so I put it away.My daughter gave me a K-cup for Christmas and I thought this would definitely do the trick.I have bought several 15-packs but still like others better. Sorry

There are two reasons why I bought this chair for our baby.   1) At age 3 months, she is nearly 25\\" and outgrew her regular bouncer already.   2) She has GERD (gasy, acid reflux), so I want something that sits more upright without putting a lot of pressure on her tummy    This is a great chair and meets all of my baby's needs. She had a great time bouncing herself at the high setting and nap soundly with the lower setting. Although her acid reflux is being controlled by medicine now, she is always happy sitting in this chair.     The only complain I have is difficulty to put her in the chair while I am alone. I usually try to slide her into the chair, but if her legs are not at the right position, the sliding doesnt really work and can become frastrating.     Other than that, it's an awesome bouncer and I wish I could have bought this chair much sooner.

I have been using Icy Hot since my teenage years because my life was all sports. Back then, which was many years ago now, Icy Hot only had the cream and I hated the smell on my hands but I continued to use it because it did relieve my soreness. Now, at age of 30, Icy Hot now has many different kinds of solutions to put their product on your body, the cream, the spray, the patches, and the roller. Last year, I tried the roller for the first time and now its all I use. I mainly use it for my lower back and my knee because I have had many surgeries (Back fusion, 6 knee surgeries)and I am always sore. I do use it around 4 times a day. It feels great on the back, there is no mess, and its quick to apply on your skin. I have never been burned, even on days when I use it more then 4 times. It just gives a nice warm and soothing feel. It's very important never to apply it before a workout, somehow the sweat activates the Icy Hot even more and it really starts to get hot. It just doesn't bother me that much because my back is use to it. The 2.5 oz bottle last me around 2 months, that's a long time with how much I use it. I highly recommend this product for anyone who wants to get some relief on their body, it really does help.
Good honey! Arrived in good shape, nothing different than any other honey I've had. Bottle is convenient, upside-down style.
These are a little sweeter than I like, so I just extend the brewing time on my Tassimo and they come out perfect!! These are now on my "must have" list!!

The Nosefrida works great for its intended use -- cleaning out your baby's nose. Two people really help, but it could be done by a persistent single parent, especially laying your infant on a changing table. You should disassemble the device and wash out the plastic tube with every use. I washed it with Diabetic Alcohol (91 percent), though I personally am not diabetic, to disinfect it. IMPORTANT: One must let it thoroughly dry due to fumes and/or rewash with water before the next use. I did not want to re-infect my infant with a prior illness.

The problem, and I mean severe problem, quite nearly a health hazard, is that the Nosefrida will inoculate whoever is using it with the same illness that is sickening your child. A persistent user will apply strong vacuum to the device, and the filter, of course, is meant for capturing media and doesn't remove airborne germs. Every time a user breathes deeply using the Nosefrida they are driving bacteria and/or virii deep into the air sacs of their lungs. Obviously, it's used on children with upper respiratory infection. In the adult applying the Nosefrida service, this infection is instantly transmitted deep within their chest.

Given that children and adults are susceptible to different grades of pathogens, this can be very bad. Although as an adult you probably have built-up resistance to upper respiratory agents, you may have never been exposed to them in this novel manner. Users are essentially engineering an unnatural exposure in one of the worst places possible -- deep within their body, and to ultra concentrated pathogens that are usually presented through casual person-to-person contact. Since your child may have an evolved infectious agent that you weren't exposed to as a kid, you can and probably will get whatever they have.

The Nosefrida made me very ill twice. Just know that you are strongly exposing yourself to respiratory illness with this device. And, although it does help your child, the cost of having a sick parent may not be worth the benefit of an occasional partially clear nose. There are other devices that do the same thing, too, though maybe not as efficiently.child, the cost of having a sick parent may not be worth the benefit of an occasional partially clear nose. There are other devices that do the same thing, too, though maybe not as efficiently.
I love these swaddlers and each of my kids have used them and loved them. They are great for swaddling, breastfeeding cover up, etc.
I got one of these pops last Halloween and liked it so much I ordered a box. Nice sour flavor - definitely one of the better pops I've had.

I am EXTREMELY disappointed in the dresser I just received.  After waiting weeks for delivery of the product we opened the package to find wood with a light cherry finish.  The furniture we have for the rest of our nursery is all espresso finish.  I am due next week and our baby is going to come home to a nursery with all of his clean clothes scattered about.  After all the time and effort I took "nesting" and getting things ready for the baby this is completely unacceptable.  Everything else is perfect except for this.

This playard is lightweight, easy to move, and sturdy. Our baby does well in it rolling and trying to crawl, and it was simple to set up. It was reasonably priced, too, compared to some of the other options we were considering like the one from 4Moms.

Strong English tea, no doubt about it.  No funky after taste, either.  Just bold and delicious and the best pick me up.  It's my preferred brand and I've been drinking English teas for a good 25 years now.  I've been known to clear the shelf at TJMaxx when the boxes of 40 and 80 pop up.  Imagine my surprise and delight when I discovered that I could get 440 bags from Amazon!!!  If you buy the 440 of London Cuppa, then please keep your tea in a tin, to preserve the flavour and don't ever store it in the freezer.  It will moisten and mold there.

I purchased this so my son (grade school) could take warm food for lunch.  It does in fact keep his food warm until lunchtime (around three hours or so.)  I've washed this in the dishwasher (top rack) and have had no trouble with the seal or other parts.  My son's big complaint is that he has a difficult time getting to his food as the mouth of the jar is too small.  For younger kids with limited lunch time and even more limited patience, this is a deal breaker.  I will continue to look for a suitable container.

I was overjoyed to receive this stroller. I loved the color and the features. The sun shade was what drew me to this stroller. It can completely cover the babies. In addition, there are the thoughtful features in the sun shade that will allow you to unzip the cloth portion to reveal a netted portion to help with air flow while the child is reclined and the sun shade is in the full coverage position. I absolutely love all the pockets. So handy! The very first time we used it and were folding it up to put in the back of the van, the single cup holder that hooks to the side of the frame fell off and went unnoticed in the parking lot. :( I would love to see a parent tray as well as some sort of child trays.

I love this thing! Best $25 I've spent in a while for a baby who doesn't want to sleep in his crib yet. He loves this thing. Glides across the floor for when he has to be in the kitchen watching my every move, and then back into the bedroom for bedtime. I was able to barely fit it in my suitcase when traveling, thank goodness! I would buy this again in a heartbeat. Inexpensive option amidst the wildly expensive ones out there!

I just bought one, and try to install via my ipad, but with no luck.
Call tech support, and was told that ipad is not supported, I need to find way (myself) to download an iphone app then install
on my ipad. But if not supported, not sure how and if it even works. When I bought the cam, I am pretty sure it is supposed it can be used with ipad. I bought it because i thought is easy to install on my ipad. Product is not cheap and I felt cheated.

I purchased this at a big chain store, because I had a gift-card. But I would've purchased through Amazon.com, as I buy lots of stuff through Amazon.com, and it is cheaper through Amazon.com. I cannot recommend this product enough! I don't want the sun directly in my baby's face, and this does the job perfectly! I was, initially, aggravated that the product didn't come with instructions, but quickly realized there are endless ways of attaching it to your stroller, as every stroller is constructed differently. You can do an image search and find some suggestions, if you absolutely have no idea how to attach this to your stroller. You'll figure it out quickly.
High quality product, it is practical to go shopping with your baby, just Picked size is greater than a traditional umbrella stroller

Got this highchair for my 6 month old that just started to eat solids.  Happy with my purchase so far.      My MAIN COMPLAINT is the assembly.  It isn't awful, and my biggest problem was my fault (figured out several steps later I had the frame in backwards).  However as the directions say tightening the screws into the metal bars requires \\"extra force\\" and they really mean it.  With my mistake, I was exhausted by the time I got this thing together.  So be careful to check you put the frame in the right direction!!  Ha ha.      I love the teething toy for the baby.  She can play with it and if she drops it is is tethered to the tray and she wont lose it.  The bigger tree toy is a bit too high up for her to play with now and she doesnt really understand that the buttons she can reach cause the music and lights to start playing.  She does enjoy playing with the tree when I hold her up so she can reach it.  Despite all these toys, her favorite thing to do is chew on the straps :-)      I will say I think it would be nice if the tray stayed attached or there was a place on the chair to hold the tray when not in use.  I am a bit messy and I need to make sure there is a clear spot in our small kitchen to put the tray when I am taking her out of the seat.      It has not been a problem for me, but there is no grip to the feet and wheels of this chair.  It is all smooth plastic down there and you can push the chair around even with the brakes set on the wheels.  Also, each of the four wheels has a separate brake that you need to undo before you can wheel it around.      Our home is still full of \\"disposable\\" furniture from our grad school days, so if we had nice sturdy chairs in our kitchen we might have just gotten a booster seat with tray that can attach to a chair.  This is a lot more expensive and will take up a good deal of space compared to the booster seats.
This fits my 15 pound 4 month old very well and I'm using it with either a Thirsties cover or a homemade wool soaker.  It's a bulletproof nighttime diaper and it's super soft!!!

I've tried a number of flour blends in an attempt to recreate our family chocolate chip cookie recipe, but usually they come out brittle, extra bland, etc.

I found this flour at a local store (along with other great XO Baking Co. products) and decided to give it one more try.

It was easily the closest thing to the original taste and texture of my usual cookies. Guests enjoyed them (they were gone after just a couple hours) and I had a little taste of nostalgia as I enjoyed my first good gluten free chocolate chip cookie in a long time.

For the uninitiated, it's worth mentioning that this blend saves a ton of time as you don't have to buy all the individual ingredients for the flour blend. They also sell a 5 pound bag for those of us who do a great deal of baking.

Before finding the Hutzler 571 banana slicer my life was in shambles.  Day after day I would come to work with my whole banana.  My colleagues would snicker while watching me eat saying things like â€œoh yeah, you eat that bananaâ€ and â€œbet you canâ€™t fit that whole banana in your mouth.â€ Being the competitor that I am, I always did, proving them wrong. After shoving an entire banana in my mouth for the fifth time that week I knew something had to change. I wouldâ€™ve gladly sliced the banana but never had the time or steady hands, and due to my aichmophobia (fear of sharp pointy objects) I was unable to use a knife to cut the banana. The one time I tried to cut my banana was disastrous. I woke up five hours earlier than usual in order to prepare for the task at hand. Placing the banana on the counter I began thinking of ways to slice it. I decided to go with a spoonâ€¦BIG MISTAKE! After hours of meticulously slicing away, I was finally finished. The result was horrific. Each slice was curved and a different size than the other. Now running late for work I quickly threw my banana chunks in a Tupperware and left. When I arrived at my cubicle I tried eating my banana as discretely as possible. It didnâ€™t work. My co-worker David saw me eating and all hell broke loose. â€œHey guys come have a look at this!â€ Everyone rushed over and instantly broke out into laughter upon the sight of my hideous banana chunks. One person shouted â€œwho cut that banana a four year old?!â€ while another said â€œbet you canâ€™t fit all those chunks in your mouth.â€ I quickly shoved the remaining pieces in my mouth and ran for the bathroom. While contemplating if I would ever eat a banana again, I started looking up funny amazon reviews to help cheer me up. While reading, I stumbled across the Hutzler 571 banana slicer. While others mocked it not noticing its significance, I realized my banana eating days were not over. Quickly ordering the two-pack I waited for it to arrive, knowing the humiliation would soon be over. When it finally arrived I quickly grabbed a banana, peeled it, and used my Hutzler 571 banana slicer. The results were astonishing. Each slice came out perfectly. I couldnâ€™t have been more pleased, and was more than excited to show off my amazingly symmetrical banana slices at the office. The next day was the beginning of a whole new work environment. I proudly opened my Tupperware revealing the greatness I had created. While eating I heard a gasp and someone say â€œthat is the most beautifully sliced banana Iâ€™ve ever seen.â€ My confidence was restored. Because of the Hutzler 571. I can proudly eat my bananas wherever I please without the fear of being made fun of. This has made me more confident and because of that I am now looking at a promotion. So while you sit back and make fun of this product, just know the Hutzler 571 banana slicer saved my life.
Everyone in the family loves these.  There is a flavor for everyone.  Just about the right amount for snacks or lunch.
Worth every dime. Our daughter said best sleep she has had in a long time. The pillow is AWESOME pregnant or not!
I love cooking with McCormick California Garlic salt. Our grocery store no longer carries it. What a joyful surprise when I found it on Amazon.

If you're looking for steel cut oats, make sure you want the quick cooking before you buy.  I made that mistake.  The oats are fine; I was just looking for the ones that are not quick cooking.  My fault.

Item is not as pictured.  I read the description carefully -- it says it includes both a blue and pink mat/backing.  I read the other reviewers' comments saying that they were disappointed when they saw it was not as described... they got a silver mat/backing instead. I was hopeful that I would get the right item... sadly no.  I got the silver mat/backing like some other people. I think they should have been honest and updated the product description.
The cost per serving was great but many in the office do not like Chai so I will be trying another flavor.
my children are now 4 and still love this toy.  it is stury and batteries last long.  i would definitly recommend this to anyone.  price is excellent too.
It does what it is supposed to do and I have depended on this tea for many years with it meeting all my expectations.

Pros:
-really adorable
-several toys to play with and you can change the position all the time
-comes with a little pillow
-bars are detachable for exclusive tummy time play
-extra loops for more toys or switching the position of toys
-machine washable

Cons:
-price
-toys don't hang low enough in the center areas
-a couple of the toys aren't really interesting

We loved this activity mat for our son. We purchased it when he was about 1 month old. We started using it with him to get some tummy time without the bars installed, and then transitioned to having some time on his back to reach up and grab the toys. We never really used the pillow all that much. His favorites were the owl that jingles, the bird with the rattle balls, and the bird with a wooden ring. The apple and the squirrel don't really do anything; they're just cute. We actually bought a second owl to use in the stroller and car because he loved it so much. You can buy it separately. My only complaint about this gym is that the toys were too high up for our son to reach. He wanted to be able to grab them and pull them to him as well so we put his favorites on ID badge clips so that he could pull them closer (we were always with him when he was playing with it). It would be nice if the cloth strips were elastic or if they included some links to make some toys hang lower. It is nice that there are loops to hook toys all the way down the bars. The mat has some textured leaves, a little mirror, and a squeaker.

I bought this for my wife before she had a baby. It is more on the pricey end for pump bags, but it is definitely stylish. That is the main reason I purchased it for her. It is very functional, and very spacious. After occupying the side pockets for the pump and bottles, there is plenty of room in the main bag section. She doesn't need an additional purse when going to work. However, when we travel with the baby, it isn't enough to also act as a diaper bag as well.

We have used the Normandy blend packages for years now for great meals, the two bags we bought yesterday consisted of over 50% carrots.  We had to supplement with packages of other vegetables to get a proper balance.  Is this a cost cutting move or an accident?
The boy is enjoying him self in it. He is playing and learning. But after a while he Wales with it

This is the WORST thermometer I have ever used in my entire life! I don't care much about the ease of use etc, as much as I care about the accuracy of the device. This thermometer is REALLY INACCURATE, and would shamelessly show a variance of up to .5 F even when the temperature of the same person is checked back to back (less than a minute of time difference) in the identical way! They should be sued for inaccuracy and misleading the users. Extremely disappointed. Would have returned the device if I wasn't so lazy about the process of returning it!

i really wish that it wasnt so grainy when you bit into it and eat it .-.
i really loved how you made it xD

It's the perfect size for our changing table. We went with the Carter's dot cover and it fits great. I personally don't mind that the material doesn't hug the changing pad super tight...I can live with that. I also like that it's four-sided. It's not super deep, but I don't think that'll be an issue. My only worry is the prop 65 (I think that's right...not looking at it right now) warning that comes with it due to materials it is made from. Our little girl won't be on it enough, I think, for it to cause any problem...and we will always have a cover on it (I'm even contemplating using cheap hand towels on top of the cover to keep it from having to be washed as much), but no Mama wants to see a cancer warning on a product they buy for their baby. I've been told not to worry so much about it, especially with the cover and since we are NOT using this as a sleeper for our baby. When we got it, we sat it outside for a full day to let it air out, just to be safe. I think it's going to work out well for us.
These flavors are wonderful.  I like the pour  spouts.  Very easy for kids to use.  These were used for an outdoor summer birthday party and everyone came back for seconds.
this soda is horrible do not waste your money! I ordered a case of this stuff.....I'd rather drink water!!  I'm so not a big water drinker!!
Love the flavor.  Easy to top with peanut butter or tuna fish or whatever you like.  Keeps well in my pantry so can buy a case at a time.
Fast shipping and a good price. My husband loves this stuff from his childhood so I bought it for him as a gift.
Tasty and gluten free are always a plus.  I expected chocolate, an oversight on my part.  No chocolate, but yummy coconut and sesame taste!

WOW! It is really good! I never dreamed I would like bacon gum, but it is fantastic! The mint is not quite as minty as I like but the other unusual flavors are great and long lasting. Great texture too. I will buy it again for sure!

First of all, let me say that after ordering this last night I was stunned to get the cups before lunch today. Twelve hour turnaround from Amazon - unbelievable.

Anyway, I'd been eyeing these for a while for use at my office, because we have a poland spring machine with an instant hot tap. A coworker had also bought all of us coffee gift baskets for the holidays, and I have a Keurig machine at home so not much use for those there. I'd brought in an old French press of mine, but the drip grind is really too fine and I got tired of all the grounds in my coffee, so last night I ordered the Melitta.

I was going to get the single cone thing, but went for the cups package just because it seems like a good deal. I'm really glad I did, too, because my Starbucks mug popped a seal this morning and is leaking, so now I have a new travel mug.

For the cost of a half dozen cups of Starbucks now I can just use all the coffee that we already have, and it seems to brew pretty well. For those of you who like stronger coffee, like I do, it's not exactly rocket science pouring the coffee back through the filter into a second cup, since it does drip through pretty fast. Great little device.

Obviously this isn't going to make the best coffee in the world, but if you're in an office/shop that has ready access to either a microwave or instant hot water, it's definitely an affordable option. It doesn't take up any counter space, and takes less time away from work than dealing with a whole coffee pot.
Fast relief all natural can't beat that. I've been using this for years. I never had to take pharmaceutical spray every again.
The crib arrived in one day and even though the packaging was damaged, the crib was perfect.  It looks beautiful and went together easily.  We really like it.
Bought this as a Christmas gift for my mother.  She said the figs were too dry and really did not have a good flavor.  Would not recommend.

Great necklace, have had lots of comments.  Looks like real jewelry, but is a wonderful teether ring that my son absolutly loves!  The clasp that ties it together comes loose every now and again, otherwise great purchase.
Arrived quickly.  Well packaged!  Did the job it was intended for; it was a gift for a friend.  Outstanding!
80 cups for $30 or 120 for $100? How does that make any sense. How about 3 x 80= 240 for $90

The canisters were packed too tightly and a few broken open, spilling oatmeal everywhere and leaving multiple canisters broken open. Pretty disappointed as I will probably need to throw two or more of them out.

Great sofa but small and gets dirty easily, hard to clean!!! Sure at first we'd spray and scrub every juice spill and pretend make up mark. But several years later we've given up - it's just gross, ready to chuck it in the garbage since it's too stained to donate. Wish the cover came off to toss in the washer. If it were easier to clean (soft wipe-off fabric or removable) it'd get 5 stars because it's cute, sturdy for it's small size, and easy to move around. Green is very girl/boy/decor friendly.

Having a lactose intolerant in our home that loves sweets, this Kit Kat Dark Chocolate is a godsend.  Just as a precaution they also take medicine before eating yet, I'm not sure that's necessary.  Anyway, with low or no lactose in this treat, they can eat without fear of food related discomfort.  It would be swell if more items of this kind were easily available.  Oh, did I say that these Kit Kats are delicious?

Oh how I have LONGED to have Surge again, and now, thanks to Amazon, I have been reunited with my long lost love.

The original Mountain Dew, 100% legit, delicious, and harmful to your guts. BUT SO WORTH EVERY DROP
This tea is just OK. I don;t love it because it doesn't taste nearly as good as tea made with fresh Lavender. It is also messy, and should come in bags.
Unfortunately the vanilla ones were sold out when I found these. I still had to buy a package. They reminded me of Italy and were delicious but not as good as the vanilla flavor.
This is exactly what we needed for our 45 lb. dog. Great quality and easy to install. Very happy with the purchase, price, and transaction.

This play mat is so cute and colorful, really so much nicer to look at than all the others that I have seen.  It has plenty of interactive play without all the synthetic annoying noisest that babies don't need.  We love it!

Love this!!!!!!!  I have a regular baby bath tub and I used it with my son for the first month or so and it was a real chore to bathe him.  You're so busy trying to keep them from sliding to one side or getting water in their ears.  You have to keep one hand on the baby at all times so trying to wash with only one hand is very difficult.  Then I saw this bather on Amazon.com and I read the reviews.  I decided to try it and I'm so glad I did.  My son is 3 months old now and we use this bather for every bath.  Mostly, I just set it inside of the baby bath tub.  He fits right down inside and there is no more sliding around.  I am free to use two hands to wash him and he stays warm during the bath so no more screaming.  Other times I lay it in our bath tub and he just lays there staring up at me.  I have already told all my pregnant friends about this safer bather.  I just love it because it helps make his bath time a good bonding time...not something we're both dreading.
My daughter has everything decoprated in owls for my grandaughters room, she adored this pillow and my grandbaby loves to sleep with it!
It has a tough skin with a mushy inside. Didn't like it at first, but it grew on me.
Excellent product.  I love the popchips.  The taste is great and you feel healthy eating them, even though you're fooling yourself.

After much research, I finally came across this stroller.  I needed a larger-than-average umbrella style stroller for my tall 4 year old for our trip to Disney, but I didn't want to pay a ridiculous amount of money for something we aren't going to use often.  This holds up to 55 lbs. and the back can be made taller, which is just what we needed.  My son was comfortable and liked being able to pull the cover down to keep the sun out of his eyes.  It's easy to maneuver (if you find it difficult, check the front brakes...my son kept kicking them on).  The handles are tall, as well, which is great for my husband who is 6'3".  It was easy to fold when it was time to get on the buses at Disney and it was easy for my son to get in and out of.  We have another trip scheduled for next year and I'm hoping my son will be able to use it then as well.
Sugar is sugar, I do not understand the need to be superflous when it comes to describing sugar.  It is sweet.

deployed in the military doesn't always mean you need to miss out on the finer things in life. Another co-worker and myself enjoy our coffee everyday and talking about the brewing smells that come with it. I was able to snag this for 3 bucks a brick. This is some smooth and great tasting coffee. The taste going down your throat is amazing and when we open a new vacuum sealed bag we both take a big whiff of that great ground coffee smell. It makes a pretty strong cup of joe(caffeine too) and not for that bad of a price. Our bags don't expire until the end of 2012 but we don't have to worry about that since we are on our third bag already... this won't replace our regular brands but is a good change. thanks to amazon for shipping this to us.
But our stroller didn't fit by a long shot. We have a contours tandem 2 stroller. Thought we would try it but didn't work out. Very nice bag though!

I like this product for walking in wooded areas with a lot of bugs.  I bought this for my City Micro, but I also use it on my City Elite.  Baby Jogger will tell you that you need to buy the specific canopy for each stroller -- you do not!!  This item is much cheaper than the one that is supposedly made for the City Elite and fits both strollers just fine.  I only gave it four starts because it is well made and I use it on both strollers, if Baby Jogger would stop price gouging their customers I would give it five stars.  As is I think Baby Jogger should include some standard items for their strollers

The high mountain coffee beans are very close in flavor to the blue mountain beans, but with a significant savings in price.  We liked them quite a bit.  The only downside is that they no longer are available through prime so we will probably switch to something else.

First time user of fondant.  Always heard it had no taste and was rather difficult to use.  Not true of this product.  Loved it.  Very glad I ordered the colored fondant though.  Could take a lot of food coloring to get this red otherwise.  Grandson loved his Lightning McQueen cake.
This cherry jam is the best available in the USA. I've used it for 15 years and hope it is always available.

Save your money on this. I bought this what is supposed to be maple flavoring to add to a brown sugar syrup recipe. This has no "maple" flavor at all. It doesn't matter how much I add either! A complete waste of money!

I live in Texas, so it might be the reason that the Fiji water was very warm when I recieved. However, I think the bottled water delivered without careful handling. The Fiji bottled water taste was not very good and the hot weather could damage the Fji bottled water.
Grey color is awesome.  Wasn't sure about it before it arrived by wow, it's nice.  This is our second babyletto and they are great quality and modern.

It is an OK seat, but here are some things you have to know before buying it:
1. It is NOT made of 100% cotton. There is no cotton at all, it's all polyester. Very soft and nice, but not cotton. I think Amazon should correct the mistake in the description. All other seats I found were also made of polyester, looks like there is no way to get anything natural.
2. The canopy is NOT detachable. This makes it quite challenging for washer/dryer. I have a pretty big washer, so the seat cover fits even with the canopy (and the canopy is flexible, so it washes OK). But I didn't even try to put the whole thing into the dryer. It's very inconvenient for an infant seat, since accidents happen all the time. Also, the whole process of taking the cover off the seat and putting it bask is kind of challenging.
3. The vibration turns off automatically after about 20 min (or may be 30 min). Probably, music does the same, but we never use it. Sometimes when the vibration turns off it makes the sleeping baby wake up.

I didn't return it, because my baby likes it and I decided not to risk. It is light-weight and good-looking. But non-detachable canopy and polyester instead of cotton were a big surprise.

This is the only toy, bouncer, or carrier my now 10 week old baby likes.  He has been using it since about 5 weeks old and he just loves it more and more every day.  He loves the moving little animals and the lights on the waterfall.  The lights made it very useful for a young baby who was too young to play with toys yet.  Now he sits there and \\"talks\\" to the animals.  This is the only way I can get anything done around the house.  BUY THIS!

Arrived on time without any problems.  This became part of a jungle themed baby shower gift.  It is a very cute grooming accessory and looks exactly as it appears online.  A very nice present at a very good price.
we cannot get enough of these -  we cannot find in the stores and we bring them to work to share ;-)
The flavor was great but the raisins started out hard as rocks and after much chewing turned to rubber and stuck to teeth like no other raisins have ever done.  Your jaws will get quite a work-out.
She'll play with this toy for 30 minutes straight.  It makes lots of little noises (not electronic) and has plenty of things to grab onto with little hands.  I definitely recommend it.
Very warm and soothing but fragrance is a little too sweet for me. Arrived quickly in great condition.

This made a wonderful tea. Its flavor packs a punch of fruity goodness. Don't use too much. 2 tablespoons is enought for a very large mug. I boil water and add the leaves and let it sit for about 10 minutes and filter it through a strained. It is a large bag and and economical.

I thought this seemed pretty cool, but I could never get it to work. It didn't come with instructions, but it seems pretty self-explanatory: one end in the baby's nose, one end in mama's mouth, a little foam "filter" in the mouthpiece, and suck the snot into the plastic syringe-like tube. Nope. My son (then 10mos) was fascinated by the process and miraculously lay perfectly still every time I tried it (likely wondering what in the h*ll I was trying to do) butâ€¦. really nothing much came out even when he was terribly snotted up. At best I could get the snot close enough to his nostrils to then squeeze out with a tissue. But I could also taste the snot-- the filter keeps actual boogs out of the mouthpiece, but it doesn't keep out the generalâ€¦ aromaâ€¦ of the mucus. I'm not squeamish, but it was a bit gross. Plus how are you supposed to clean the little foam filter? Or if you're supposed to cut another one from the included extra (tiny) square of foam, how do you cut it into another perfect cylinder to fit into the mouthpiece? Not worth the effort. Went back to the tissue and taught my son to blow.

I wouldn't recommend this travel system to anyone. I would probably steer them towards a Graco Snugride or a Britax system. The seat portion of the stroller came broken (which could happen with any travel system). They did ship a new piece no questions asked. The wheels seem a little wobbly. It doesn't feel sturdy. But my real beef is with the infant carrier - oh how I loathe the carrier. The way it fastens is so frustrating, especially when a baby is screaming and you're trying to hurry. My suggestion to any person looking to purchase a travel system, stroller, infant carrier, etc. is to go to the store and play around with it. To buckle the baby in this infant carrier you have to place the two pieces over one another then click them in. If your baby starts squirming or screaming, it's just obnoxious. Sure - not a huge deal, but if you're putting your baby in the carrier every day it gets annoying really quickly. For just a little bit more you could get a Britax system which gets better reviews, or go with a trusty Chicco or Graco. Any friends who have purchased those have had great things to say.

This bag costs almost $200, I bought the black one because any mother would know not to own anything white that you don't want to be polka-dotted with pens, markers, baby food and rubber stamps.  Anyway, it is very well made, very earth friendly, and it came with a wipes container even though the description says it only comes with the changing pad.  The wipes container is awesome, it doesn't dry wipes out! Well, in the end I am not going to keep this bag.  I will pass it on to someone else because I can't stand the shoulder straps, they keep sliding off my shoulders and I don't want to be holding it all the time.  I like to be hands free and you can't really hang this on the stroller unless your stroller handle isn't one bar but two handles.  So, my attempt to find a diaper bag for night outings/formal dinners with kids hasn't ended yet!
Love this tub. Great for any age. Do not have to worry about baby trying to turn over while in this tub. Highly recommend.
A beautiful plant with vibrant colors, it looks great next to my bedroom window. It came very carefully packaged and in good condition.

Perfect for wedding showers or baby showers  !  Or Picnics. It's just the perfect mix of ingredients!!!  I love the mix of chicken pineapple avocado and orange slices. You can't go wrong with this salad!!

I had an infantino swift classic carrier, which hurt my back. This carrier takes pressure off the shoulders and places it evenly to help with the strain of baby wearing.  It's comfortable, durable, and breathable.  It fits a bit large in my opinion.  I'm 5'2", and when I first purchased this carrier I was ~150 lbs,  a size 12, and my son was around 4 months old at 15 lbs.  I still needed to take the straps in a good deal, however, it still fit fine now that my son is larger and I'm smaller.
They were fresh and very tasteful.  The product was very impressive.  I would buy again.
I really like coconut but this wrap had a flavor that was off to me.

I do love these as a treat. I've been on WW for eight months now and I miss convenience foods to an extent. This fills that need nicely. I will say a few of the cakes were hard and had some mold, but only a few. The rest were fine. I assume it was simple packaging problems for those particular cakes.  Otherwise, I'm enjoying them slowly.  UPDATE: I'm editing my review here to give kudos to the Potemkin Village. Once they found out about the moldy product, they refunded my money and more. I've purchased other products from that that were great. I will order from them again, and I do realize this product may be different in that it's quicker to turn bad.

We bought some Sopressata  Salami in New York when we were there and it was the real thing. Our parents used to make it and it was wonderful. The Sopressata we got in New York tasted just like we were used to. My husband was very disappointed in this Salami that we ordered.  I wish I could say he liked it but he didn't. Sorry.

Organic food just tastes better.  I didn't believe it at first, then I tried it.  Imagine my surprise when it applied to canned goods as well.  These just taste so fresh, and I love that they have no sodium.  A very good buy.
I am very happy with the sprouted spelt flour that I purchased. It arrived in a timely manner as well.

We researched for various swings before buy this one, and at the end we decided this one was the one we were going to purchase. We don't regret at all. Our little monkey is so happy with it. I couldn't believe that he would enjoy this toy so much. He loves jumping on it to the point that he put his \\"sad lip\\" when we take him out.

We first used it when my son was 4 months old, since he could hold head steady when upright. My son is very large baby (21 pounds at 4 months check up and 70 cm) and one of the first things I was worried about was if the seat would be too small for him, or he would grow it up very soon. But it is pretty wide and still fits in it without a problem.

The jumperoo has 2 buttons, one for sound or music, and another one for off-and music volume (2 different settings). My son is annoyed by the music one, but he loves the sounds. He also likes very much the lights of the two flowers on the sides.
He doesn't play very much with the toys, they are average, and one of them, the mirror, I have never seen him using it. He loves the 2 toys hanging and try to reach them all the time.

The fabric on the seat is removable (easy enough) and it can be washed.

We are happy that we got this one over the baby Einstein one. We have a friend that bought that one (the Einstein) and it barely jumps compare to the jumperoo. And since our son enjoy jumping the most -and I think that's the purpose when you buy this kind of toy- I am sure that we made the right decision.

The battery is awful!  I have only used one camera at a time. When I put my son down for bed at 8:00 I turn it on. By 1:00, at the longest, the battery is dead. What good is a monitor when the battery dies so fast.

I get around a shipment a week all year round from Amazon, and I can not remember ever writing a review. But I am making a point of expressing my anger over this product. I buy lots of tea from many sources and white peony is one of my favorites. The package says it is organic and of the finest quality. It was possibly the worst tea I have ever tasted. In fact, after a couple of pots, I actually threw nearly the whole half pound in the trash. And the price wasn't even that good. I subsequently bought a pound of excellent organic white peony from Whole Foods for less. Whatever they are, this is not a tea company.
This is like healthy candy to me. It has the same calories (200) as any candy bar with a lot of fiber and protein. It's my favorite flavor KIND bar.

The Graco Blossom was exactly what my daughter & SON=IN=LAW wanted,
They really like it

They put it together the day after I BROUGHT it to them.

Perfect door stopper to prevent a toddler's fingers from grabbing the door hinges.  These are pretty heavy duty 'rubber' material that works on both sides of the door (handle side & hinge side).  When not in use, it can be hung on the door knob itself.  I mainly use it on the door sides - for handle side, it helps to prevent doors from slamming but able to partially close door. for hinge side, it keeps the door fully open and when tried to close, it'll go halfway and 'bounce' its way back open.  Great design and very sturdy.
I got this for my nephew on his first birthday. He LOVES it! Worth every penny to hear his laugh as he play with it.

My husband and I were at a local food store and found what we thought to be dried pineapple slices. After getting it home we found out it was candied ginger. We spoke with some friends who love the stuff and found out that it has stomach calming abilities. I suffer from panic attacks and often find myself nauseous. After doing more research, ginger is used not only to calm nausea but also to calm nerves. Instead of taking the perscribed medication, I turn to ginger as a first response. We quickly ran out of the first purchased batch of mistaken ginger we bought.
I went on a research mission to find the best ginger out there. After reading many reviews I decided on Ginger People Crystallized Ginger. The best decision I've made this year! It's a small container but the Ginger is amazing. Much milder than the original stuff but with very little strings. The Ginger is in small squares that once you bite into them, they are so crist and crunchy. I want to eat the stuff all the time now, not just to curb my boughts of nerves and nausea. This is defintely going to be a recurring purchase in my house!
Love this coffee. The little k-cup style containers work well with my Keurig brewer without problem. The coffee is rich and full-bodied. I've already ordered a second box.

I love it cant wait to use it this summer when baby arrives,it was very easy to set up I did it on my own since hubby was working at the time and within 15 mins I was able to put everything together it also matches perfectly with my SOHO diaper bag that was also purchased here on amazon.Love the fact that the stroller is very easy to close and carseat is light weight.

FOOD
Pros
--Quick to make
-- Perfect portions
-- Convenient envelopes that you can take with you.

Cons
This flavor is very sweet; I usually enjoy the lower sugar version, but it's not always available in bulk. When I think it's too sweet or mushy, I pour in a handful of raw, steel-cut oats with the Apples and Cinnamon before pouring the hot water.

BUYING ON AMAZON
I use the brick and mortar stores to sample products. The items I love and use the most are often at the same price or lower on Amazon (especially once you figure in the costs to drive to the store). These items are often available in bulk online when the local stores run out of my favorites quickly.

Quaker Instant Oatmeal, Apples and Cinnamon is one of those bulk items I prefer buying here.

A step up from the sippy cup as it states but can still spill down their fronts as they drink just not like a regular cup would it is much more contained and helpful that way, little guy loves it as it makes him feel grown.
I love it!  I no longer have to wake up my son to get his temperature.  This is super convenient and fast!
Plants arrived healthy and even more mature than I anticipated.  Great for pairing with smaller buddies in an airplant terrarium.
I love Sriricha.....I use it on everything. Dilivery was very fast , Siricha puts a kick on everything,I was pleased to find it on this website

I love this product! It fit so many of our needs all in one system. Where our newborn is going to sleep is no longer a question and with so many functions it's worth every penny! It was pretty easy to assemble and didn't require any tools. The insert is really simple to remove and its packing function is really handy for transport. We decided to reverse the insert so the baby changing station didn't cover the storage compartment below. We figured if the baby is in the changing station and you needed something from the storage below it might be a hassle to get to it. Fortunately it hooks in any way you want. So far, no complaints.

This is an efficient,easy to use pump and that's worked well for me for almost a year.Check if your insurance covers pump rentals.If you do buy,it's an authorized health cost on your tax deduction.This pump goes on sale every few months at the large baby stores and if you catch the right sale, you can get freebies with your pump. Medela or DrBrown's bottles fit,so you can pump into either.The unlabled black bag is discreet, but other mothers have recognized it.
Sent to a friend who was craving it and was snowbound.  She loved it and the idea that someone cared enough to send her soup.

I had not heard of these until last year. I live in the United States, so we don't have these around where I live. I heard about these due to the Yogscast. Simon Lane had\s a huge infatuation with them. I looked up what they were, and was immediately interested. I finally purchased them a about a month ago, and was VERY happy with my purchase the moment I popped one into my mouth. The best way I can explain these to people is that it is like a small snack cake version of those flavored Tootsie Pop's. That may be a bit inarticulate, but it's the best I can do to explain it. I can't recommend these enough.
I bought this to frame a picture of me and my daughter.  It is precious!  I woud recommend this item.

I notice all the positive reviews are from 2008, when Yuban coffee DID taste good.  Now, there is no taste nor aroma. Kraft sent a coupon because of my complaint. Still poor tasting coffee, or I should say no taste. I have tried several brands of coffee in the last few months, with the same result. Has there been a bad crop of beans, or is the roasting done overseas or what??? My friends & I are very disappointed.    Aileen B. boyle  boylekern@earthlink.net

This is the third review I have tried to write, I have said all I can say, the service was excellent, the shipping was on time, this is the first delivery I had since I have subscribed to have it delivered once a month, I love the coffee, or I wouldn't have it delivered once a month (5lbs) and I gave it 5 stars Thank You
I received my April 8th order on the day it was suppose to be here. But I'm really disappointed with it, the flavor is not there, it is weak and has a different flavor than the Highlander Grogg I have been buying. I don't know what has happened but it's definetly not Highlander Grogg, which I have been drinking for 15 yrs. It's an item you can't return, which I understand why, but also what do I do with 5lbs of coffee I can't drink, and am wondering if my next order will be as bad.
I used them for my face to do castor oil cleanse. They are very soft. So for a baby it should be very nice. They work well took off all my makeup.
Smooth and robust.  If you like a dark roast coffee, you will love these.  They are great.  We would reccomend to all.
This can of anchovies is just as I remembered them from as a kid growing up. My Dad used to buy them like this. Perfect!

The fit of the cover is very nice. I got the cover as my lady wanted something other than just the white one that came with the pillow. She is the one that put it on the pillow and did say that it was tough to get on. The odd shape of the pillow didn't help.

I have seen some with zippers but I don't like a cold/hard/annoying zipper on my pillows. It might have been easier to put on the pillow if it had a zipper but I didn't want that and like the fit of it once it was on the pillow.

Provides significantly longer life than the previous battery which is nice.  Not seeing the same benefits some other reviewers mentioned with regard to a reduction in the pops, clicks, and static that are common to the summer monitor that this goes into.

I mix it with my whey protein EAS lean shake, half a banana and some water and ice.  I expected it to taste bad, but it is very tasty.  I don't like a lot of vegetables so this is a great way to get them!

The 'chocolate' (I use that term loosely here) is so waxy, it never melts in your mouth. It just coats with grossness. The only reason this has any stars is there is a cone involved still. Skip these, go with the plain.

We go through Italian Seasoning so fast you would think it was salt and pepper but we like flavors and this package is full of them.  On our shelf we had an almost empty but un-expired date of another brand's Italian Seasoning.  I removed the cap and smelled the old spice and I was astonished to smell nothing at all except a hint of muskiness such as old seaweed.  Get thee to the trash can and open a bottle of real Italian and sure enough the comparison was similar to cream cheese and chalk.  McCormick has been a favorite of ours for years and while we have used other brands this brand always seems to edge its way back to the top regardless of what the others do.

My family just went on a 13 hr road trip, and the car seat was great except that I had to use some tightly rolled towels to get the car seat in a position so my 2 yr old could sleep in it comfortably otherwise she would sleep with her chin touching her chest. That is the only thing keeping me form rating it 5 stars.

So we like dried fruit in snacks- trail mixes, yogurt and oatmeal -  and these cherries are fantastic!  My local grocery only stocks those horrible sugar-coated dried fruits with who-knows-what other ingredients and you can only eat so many raisins so these are a welcomed addition to our line up.  Slightly tart and chewy.

I specifically searched for a larger tree to cover a wall in our office that has no furniture on it. When I saw this picture, I thought perfect being others were much smaller when reading the descriptions. The tree part is small, I think they took into account the random birds that you can place higher. The tree section it's self is only about 4 feet tall. And the application was okay, def needed two people. I've put up others that were much simpler to apply, but for the price, it wasn't too bad.

I have to have my green chile.  Man, it beats getting bags shipped in the mail with dry iced packages, read expensive!!  Hey this is already for use too, so how much more convenience can one get?  Totally worth it for those who want green chile away from the Land of Enchantment.

I really like this flavoring. I try to stay away from sugar and artificial sweeteners so this was perfect because it contains absolutely no sweetener so I can add my own (mostly liquid stevia).  I also love vanilla flavoring in many things I make so I sometimes use this in place of extract which can be pricey if you use it a lot. For example, I make my own almond milk so I like to add vanilla to sweeten and lighten the taste. This works better than an extract because there is no alcohol taste. I also make blueberry syrup with agave and this flavoring and it turns out very good. I put it in pancake batter and the flavor still holds after cooking (also with cookies). I use this all the time and now I am not dropping $10 every couple of weeks for vanilla extract.

I'm allergic to soy and these babies are the only thing I could find that resembled my sweet childhood memories. I had to take off a star though because the taste is a bit off. The texture of these cookies are very different as it feels like it dissolves in my mouth and it's got a bland sugar taste to it.

EDIT 11/10/14: On second thought, they're actually pretty good. I've grown to like them after having them for about a week now.

This is a good price for this "double stash" as I call it.
I'm so addicted I can't get enough :)
I love Heath bars.  Chocolate and toffee, what more could you want.  They arrived quickly and in perfect condition.  Will definitely buy again.

This carseat was very easy to install (much easier that the directions make it seem). It is way more secure and comfortable than the Graco infant seat I was using. The color and pattern are very pretty.  It fits nicely in my car and is very stable.  The latch hooks are really easy to install. I am extremely happy with this purchase.  Getting one for dad's car too.

When my daughter was in her infant car seat/carrier, this was a great toy to use during shopping trips.  At first, she would just stare at the toys swinging back and forth.  When she was able to grab, she loved to feel the different textures of the bugs.  I also attached it to her swing at home for extra amusement.
So yummy!  I really like that the ingredients are natural and real.  I have no problems with the natural sugars in this and it is a good source of protein.

I use Nestles in my Frappuccino's along with a couple of other items. 8oz non fat milk, 2 Tbsp Nestles Cocoa, 3 Tbsp Carnation instant breakfast drink mix ( chocolate of course ) -- 2 or 3 Tbsp Hersheys Syrup , 16 ice cubes ( aprox 12 ounces of ice ) . Blend all up until ice is crushed. Comes out almost like a malt or shake. To vary it , I sometimes put leftover coffee in the ice tray- freeze it and use the frozen coffee cubes in the blender instead of plain ice. I sometimes add a Candy Cane to give a refreshing minty taste.
I do not buy Hersheys Cocoa only because it costs more. Both brands act the same . Nestles is $2.25 and Hersheys is $3.00 for the same ounces at walmart
God Bless YOU

Honey Smacks Cereal, 15.3 Ounce (433g) Box, from Honey Smacks.
I did not think that it was possible, but Kelloggâ€™s finally did it. In Honey Smacks, they made Sugar the main ingredient by weight (over 50%). It is now a sugar cereal, with a few other ingredients added to make it look like a cereal instead of a box of sugar cubes. Kelloggâ€™s should go back to calling this cereal Sugar Smacks, as the honey is only a minor ingredient. This product is a sugar and honey coated puffed wheat cereal. As such, it will contribute to dental problems and high blood sugar Type 2 Diabetes. This is nothing for Kelloggâ€™s to be proud of. As a pre-diabetic, I found that after a bowl of this good tasting cereal my blood sugar spiked. I had to drink a glass of water to smooth out the spike, and take a nap until the spike passed. I dumped the rest of this box of cereal into the galvanized trash barrel that I use to store the mixture of bird food that I put in my birdfeeders. The birds and squirrels seem to like it better than I do. Three stars for this good tasting, but unhealthy, breakfast cereal.
