If you don't have one of this get it, my 4th month old baby can stay staring at it for a while

I have ordered Green Bulk Organic Pumpkin seeds several times and have been thrilled with the freshness and quality.  I buy these raw seeds to soak and prepare the way I prefer for health.  These seeds are a great source of magnesium.  I will continue to purchase these seeds from Green Bulk.
This makes a great print and dries on the paper quick. It's easy to remove from the kids skin but be aware that it is a very light blue. The print is very visible, just a light color.

19 years ago I had our first baby. we got her a tangiball and she loved it. When she outgrew it we gave it to our 45 pound dog. it has been her faborite chew toy and the most durable one shes ever had. This year I had our fourth child and I determined that he needed a tangiball too. I ordered two--one for the the new baby and one for the dog.  I couldn't be more pleased with the quality of this amazing  toy!
After about six months, these are still working great.  LED nightlights from China often get dim in a few weeks and I've had several that did so.  These seem as bright as new after six months.

Oh my gosh...I have been on a pre-op diet and have been using broth as a low-cal snack. I have tried a TON of broths and this is my hands-down favorite! I use about a cup and a half of water per cube. YUM.
Nice snack bag but def thinner than their competitor Itzy Ritzy bags. Washes in the washing machine well.

Overall this is a very nice set. The fabric is very soft. This fits a toddler bed perfectly. The entire set can be machine washed and holds up VERY well in washer/dryer. There is one thing to note, though. The sheets are not cotton. They are synthetic and NOT breathable. For an older toddler, this is fine. They are satiny and soft. I would absolutely not recommend this set for any child under 18 months or who has not transitioned fully to a toddler bed, because of breathability issues / suffocation concerns. Not for infants who cannot move blankets from their face easily.

My bathroom faucet is dinky and needed an extender - not just for my daughter to use but for me, too! Makes washing my hands so much easier without bumping into the side of the sink. Cute pink color too.

I was always a fan of Dave's, so I bought this at a local store to try Blair's and I'm glad I did.  The jalepeno sause is very mild (for me) but one of the most delicious condiments I've ever tasted.  The Afterdeath is a bit painful, but still very tasty on rice & beans, burritos, or any chicken dish I've tried it on.  The Sudden Death kicked my ass when I underestimated it, but now a few drops in a dish or pot are just right if I want heat without changing flavor much.

I received this potty to try out and review.  We just started potty training and so far I like this potty.  It has a durable design and my daughter likes to go and sit on it...even tho she has not put anything in it yet.  ;)  It being a 3 in one design is also nice because it has more than one use.  The arm & hammer freshener is also a nice tough which I'm sure will come in hand once she really begins to use the potty.  One thing I will say about the potty and the reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is the step stool is a bit slippery.  It would be nice if it has some grip strips added to it so that little feet don't slip off of it.
I have always used Cremora and can no longer find it in my area, so I purchased the Daily Chef creamer and I love it. It gives my coffee a rich creamy taste and dissolves instantly.

We used similar type of nipples in the hospital when our baby was born and wanted to have the same with us when we travel from one place to another as being disposable they come pretty handy. Would recommend these not for daily use but when you are traveling. Its good that we found them on Amazon :)

That would be because my tongue is blaring! The sauce has a sneak up type heat to it. Doesn't hit you right away but when it does it's definitively good you CAN STILL taste the flavor of the sauce and the food and that's what I love about it. This is not a sauce meant to be all heat and nothing else. It's meant to compliment the food you eat it with. The packaging is very cool and suites the sauce well and you get a skull key chain also. If I had to say any negatives about this sauce I would say how hard it is to pour. It does not come out very quickly because it's very thick. My only gripe, otherwise great stuff! Try it!
My bottle I realized was well past the use by date! Yes, FRESH is much better.
Stops working after a year and only one year warranty.  Devices won't link to each other and solutions offered by customer service don't work.
Great grits. Real grits take a little while longer to cook, but it's worth the wait. I bought these as a stocking stuffer for my husband and he loved them.

My 20 month old loves bunnies.  Bunny everything.  We ordered this bunny as a more portable option than most of her little collection.  The product arrived and it is much softer than I imagined both on the head and the body.  I also thought the animal's face pictured on the website looked a little more like a mouse than a bunny-but the product is all bunny.  This product is the perfect size for little toddler hands.  Finally, I have to note how quickly the bunny arrived.  I placed my order on Saturday afternoon through Amazon to American Gift Factory in California, and the bunny arrived in my mailbox in Indiana on Wednesday morning.  Wow.

I have been taking this drink for 6 years now and I still get the same boost of energy from it everyday. I take it right before my workout and it  give's me that shot of energy that I need to get me going. God knows it's hard to get myself motivated to get into the gym let alone a 1hour workout class. This stuff not only gives me that shot of energy right away, but it stays that way for hours, do dont take it too late in the day.. from my experience. No jitters either or upset stomach..
they fit in my outlets easy to remove cap if needed. it does not hide the cord but at least my child will stop pilling on the plugs

Pads were soft and work well so far.  Held up fairly well in the washer and dryer, though I did have to press one out with the iron because it kinda bunched and wrinkled too much to easily slip into my bra without being pressed.  They seem to be adequately thick without feeling like pillows in your bra.  So far they are proving much more economical and less harsh against my skin than the disposables.

I would highly recommend this product to any mother that has to wake up with their child in the middle of the night.  I received a sample of this product to review and I wish I would have known about it when I had my first child!  You just clip the light on to whatever your wearing so that you can see the baby during the nighttime feedings.  It does not have to be used by only nursing moms, this is great to use even if you are bottle feeding.  I have actually used the light as a night light for reading books when I am putting the kids to sleep!
The pump was very weak - easier to use the manual pump and got better results, regret buying this product

This bottle warmer is easy to use and very quick. Anyone purchasing this will likely want to disregard the chart that it provides stating how much water to use for heating per oz of milk. The provided measure tube is marked with arbitrary numbers at inconsistent differences of measurement. You will need to experiment with different water levels to achieve the best possible temperature for the bottle.
It should also be noted that this bottle warmer is easy to clean. This is especially important for us, since we have a lot of minerals in our well water.
This bottle warmer has helped keep me sane in the middle of the night.
Love it. Works great and easy to install. Had no problems with it and received it early. Very happy.
Haven't eaten Spam in ages...this was excellent!  Bought it for hurricane season but I think it might be gone way before storm season is over.

I personally love cooking with agave and I have a lot of friends who have expressed interest in starting to use agave instead of sugar, so I've purchased a few of these combos and given them out as gifts.  Everyone loves them!

10 ounces of product, not 20 ounces. 10 ounces of product, not 20 ounces. 10 ounces of product, not 20 ounces. 10 ounces of product, not 20 ounces. 10 ounces of product, not 20 ounces. 10 ounces of product, not 20 ounces. 10 ounces of product, not 20 ounces.

We bought a mini-crib for my daughter to use for our granddaughter when she is at our house. I got the upgraded mattress that is 5in thick so I could not find a fitted pad. This worked perfectly, washed and dried just fine.

I have this and the boppy, luna lullaby works best in a variety of situtions.

First, the pillow is more comfortable for the baby than the boppy and our baby loved falling asleep on it

Second, I could fit into this pillow post partum; the boppy is very small where as the luna is wider

Third, the luna is longer so our child (who nursed past a year) was able to fit on it beyond her first birthday so we got much more use out of it

Took this pillow when we flew internationally and nationally; it was fantastic -- really comfortable and our child happily slept plus it is not as dense as the boppy so we were able to squeeze/fold it into smaller nooks to carry through the airport!

So glad I got this one!

These are a must for keeping unwanted germs off of your children.

Very handy. We keep these on us for when we are going to be in a public place where bathroom cleanliness is always uncertain. It lays over the seat easily and is just as easy to dispose of.

I'm glad I chose to buy the Dream On Me 3\\" Portable Crib Mattress, even after reading the negative reviews about how slim it actually is. Unlike our heavier adult bodies that can adjust to waterbeds or airbeds and so on, **babies need firmness**. I placed this product on my dining room table and pressed on it with just my upper body strength and it felt fine for what the baby needs. Once the waterproof mattress cover and crib sheet went on it, it was perfect. I can see this working out for baby through at least the first year.

I have an extra-tall son, so I wanted to buy ONE car seat for him and use it for the rest of his car-restraint life. Britax of course has a great reputation for safety, and this seat by far had the highest weight limit while still using the 5-pt harness, which was very important to me. Installing and adjusting the seat was fairly easy; the only reason I gave it 4 stars was because of the seat-belt path directions (Britax says to use the seat belt rather than the LATCH for kids 40lbs or more). There are two paths to choose from, depending on where the buckle sits when you place the carseat into the seat. Per instructions, my belt would need to take the "long path" however when I tried that, the belt was stretched out too far for it to lock (no 'slack' at all) so we had to re-do it with the "short path" which worked perfectly fine. Not an issue really, but Britax made it sound a little more complicated than it needed to be. Overall this is a GREAT carseat for long-term and worth the pricetag.
Nice and smooth great for all your grilling and smoked meats, add some red chile powder or other heat spice to really liven up the flavor.

We've been using this with our twin boys since we moved them to their cribs 3 months ago. There are many things I like about it. It shows temperature which is awesome. It has a nice big display, and the night vision is well done. The battery life is also pretty good. I thought we'd use the scroll function a lot more, but so far we've rarely used it, which is why I wish I'd bought something cheaper that had fewer features.

On the negative side, the range on this thing isn't what I'd expect for over $200. We tried to take it on our front porch once and had to go back inside because it kept cutting out. Our house is pretty sturdy brick, but it's also tiny so it's stupid that we couldn't use it on our porch. Also, the reception is very easily disrupted/glitched by things like using your wireless Internet or running the microwave. It doesn't disrupt the connection permanently, it just kind of causes it to disconnect for a second which is just kind of annoying and a little lame for such an expensive device. Another annoyance is that the stand in the back holds it at a great angle for sitting on the couch, but a horrible angle for putting on a bedside table while you sleep. This is pretty easily solved, however, by putting something a few cm high underneath the stand.

Overall this has been fine for us and I'm not unhappy with my purchase, but I just think that I could've gotten everything I need and use for at least $50 less.

I did research and read that SAF is about the best yeast in the world.  Well... I have found it works better with some recipes and not as well with others.  (Whole Wheat vs White, Home Milled Flour vs Store Bought).  This is also a large amount of yeast.  I am not sure if it is to be refrigerated or not... but I have chosen to vacuum seal it in a Mason Jar and store in fridge to try and keep it fresh for as long as possible.  In the future, I will stick with the other smaller jars I can get at the grocery store.

The car seat base works well with the car seat and it makes it easier to take the car seat from one car to the next.  The base is well made and works well.   The item arrived promptly.  I have no complaints.

This is a great changing pad.  It closes up to easily fit in a diaper bag or large purse , has room for wet wipes, diapers etc.  And can quickly and easily be wiped clean.  I highly recommend it and the color choices are terrific

I love Biscotti and ordered three kinds. Of the three I like this one the least. It is made with anise seeds in it, and while not overpowering, I can still taste the anise, which I dislike immensely. I will give them away to someone who does like anise. And I'm sure they will be thrilled because the overall quality of the Biscotti is excellent.

Lots of buds but lots of seeds too. I use for tea with chamomile tea and sugar or honey. Taste is very good. I do feel relaxed after a cup but definitely not stoned. Its hemp people not pot so no THC. Other then that it is a great way to get cbd into the system. Hint to the shipper, please contain better in at least a envelope without breathing holes. When I opened the mailbox you could smell it so I'm guessing all that handled it smelled it. It smells like hemp but the other version too. Just don't want to have to try and explain it to the paranoid ones.

My baby loved this for the 3 weeks or so he fit in it.  Babies can't use this until they have sufficient back and neck control that they won't fall over.  But the leg holes are (presumably deliberately) small to help hold them in, so if you have a big baby (like mine) with chunky legs, the time between when they are capable of using it and when they still fit is very brief.  At this price (I paid over $40), it certainly isn't worth it.

Purchased for the grandkids as the next step beyond sippy cups.  This one allows you to use as either a cup or sippy cup, the kids enjoy them, they're easy to clean and so far undamaged by the "kids".
It tastes good.  Not the top grade, but comparing to its price, it's worth it. I will order again.

I have tried other \\"natural\\" diapers, such as Seventh Generation, but I have returned to these. Seventh Generation diapers have a chemical smell to them that I can't stand. These are great diapers with an adorable little leaf design on them. I have no complaints and only purchase these diapers!

We loved the bassinet for my little one when we first brought her home, but a few weeks later the bassinet started to dip inwards because of her weight ( I honestly was expecting it to stay firm longer). I used the bassinet and changing station for the first month and transitioned my baby easily into the playard from the second month. Though when you take away the bassinet, it makes it super awkward leaving the changing station hooked up, so we had to take that down so the baby could sleep comfortably. Wish the design would incorporate a better way to use the changing station once the bassinet is removed.

Our first child would take his bottles room temperature, so we weren't really sure what to do when our newest addition only ate warmed bottles. The bottle warmer we had was kind of a pain, so we ordered this and loved it! It heats really quickly, and it's great to have the water available any time. If we needed a little more formula, we could pour just the amount we needed without going through the hassle of heating just an ounce or two to mix with our powder. Highly recommend!
This chair is exactly what we were looking for.  Small enough for our tiny kitchen and strong enough to grow with my son.

These oats are delicious. I purchased them to make "over night fridge oatmeal" and they taste great.  I have also made them on the stove with water and they came out great!  Love the Bob's Red Mill brand!

My son loves this potty seat.  We bought it for him when he first expressed interest in potty training although he only sat on it fully clothed.  He loves to dance to the music.  It's now about a year down the road and he is actually using it.  I love how it says \\"open\\" or \\"up\\" when he lifts the toilet lid to use it b/c then I know he's using it.  A lot of other reviews complain about the loudness and the annoying sensitity.  There is a switch in back where you can turn all the sound OFF.  Overall I thought this was great product; hopefully we can wean him off of it soon and get him going in the big potty.

Comfortable for both mom and baby. Highly configurable so it can be used for as long as you are able to carry the weight of your baby. Even I have used it around the house in a pinch and I have to say, it is very comfortable. A number of other new and expectant mothers have asked my wife about this sling and she has been more than happy to recommend it to anyone.
Good bottles. I learned I had to bend them while washing to get the soap from between the overlapping plastic. I enjoy the drop ins though.

A exceptional gift froa friend of mine, pretty cool design, wonderful colours, totally confortably for the baby!!!!!!!!! How much can I say, a pleaant laugh says everythin!!!!! totally reccomended!!!!!

I really like this toy.  It plays nice non-annoying music and has funny sounds that amuse babies.  My baby likes the silly sounds mode the best.  It also has a thing with rattling beads for spinning and a screen with lights.  I would recommend this if your child likes musical toys.
GREAT FLAVOR!!!!  I use it for most of my Asian dishes requiring Toasted Sesame Oil!  It does not over power your recipes unless you use too much of course!  A little dab will do ya!!!
Excellent car seat! We upgraded my 3 year old son to this from his Britax Marathon 70.....excellent and by far safest seat! My son loves it!

This stuff is awesome! It tastes like a cross between coffee, and hot chocolate. I am so addicted to it, and drink it every single day. It's kind of hard to find in stores, so I buy it on Amazon by the case.

I've ordered this 3 times now. I mainly use it to make Jerk marinade, and it usually turns out great.. The value verse grocery store jars of spices is just off the chart.

I didn't give this 5 stars, because I've noticed inconsistency in the strength of the spice. Sometimes it tastes flat and a little stale instead of fresh and vibrant.

I was leery about making this purchase after reading many of the reviews, but I was in need of a cheap car seat. It's pretty light weight that my 6 year old can carry it with her brother in it. The visor is very flimsy, but I didn't buy for the visor. I would recommend it if you're in a pinch.

I bought these for my newborn, since they are supposed to start from 7-8 pounds.  However, since they have snaps, there is no way to adjust the leg size, unlike Thirsties covers or Bumgenius one-size that have velcro.  With velcro you can just pull the velcro tighter, even overlap the flaps to get the legs tighter.  For a tall skinny baby with thin legs, like mine, it leaks everywhere since the legs can't fit.  Also, the inserts are really bulky, just like the regular bumgenius insert, but without a newborn option like what they come with.  These seem great and I so want them to work, but we're going to have to wait until she grows.  For now we're using prefolds with Thirsties Duo wraps since they are smaller and have leg gussets and velcro to get a better fit, [[ASIN:B003AJXY1U Thirsties Duo Wrap Snap, Meadow, Size One (6-18 lbs)]]and then we're using regular Bum Genius 3.0 one-size diapers [[ASIN:B000OFT7OG bumGenius One-Size Cloth Diaper Blossom]]since they can fit more tightly.    *edit* Even at 11 pounds, the legs on these still don't fit our tall thin baby.  *edit* at 13 pounds, these now seem to fit, though the legs could be a bit tighter, they aren't leaking.  Since we had to change to the regular size inserts in her bumgenius 3.0 diapers, these Flips are now trimmer than those, and so we have grown to prefer them.  We would still like the legs to fit better like Thirsties, but washing just inserts is so easy, we'll definitely be using them from this point on.
it tastes like oranges but it's not naturally sweet like some other Yogi teas so it's just alright for me.
I went with the reviews & bought this in bulk.  Now I wish I would of tried them first.  I am not very picky, but these I don't like.  They really don't have any flavor.

Very simple diaper to let baby move around from birth till toddler stage. I like these One size simplex because it grow as your baby grow and you need not to take the diaper and cloth soaker separate when washing them.

These 100% cotton and for diaper rashes we usually bound to change every one hour. Only leaving baby wet with cloth diapers invite the rashes so these are main thing to remember when dealing with cloth diapering.

They grow with your baby as they have front snap to make size adjustable and upper front snap to make perfect fit around the baby waist. I use the bio-degradable liner for my baby when we started her solid food because those stool are quite messy and smell bad. Liners are boon to all cloth diaper mother because it make life easy as carry the potty liner in one waste bin which you can keep close or wrap in poly bag when you throw into waste bin.
Great taste and easy to use.  I have tried several brands of espresso pods since Starbucks quit selling them, and this is the best so far.  I will definitely order again.

Although my wife really enjoyed this, I am only giving it 3 stars because it arrived thawed out completely. I was gonna throw it away but my wife insisted on cooking it and eating it. Luckily she didn't get sick.
This product was exactly what we needed.  It has a great cherry flavor and is used many ways. It shipped promptly and made us very happy!
This is a great product.  I normally use the rock sugar from Teavana (and I still do) but I wanted to try this and it's just as good.

So my original review on this was a bit harsh. I did not care for the caramel they used in these. It left a weird after taste. Kind of like they added alcohol to the recipe or something. However I was contacted by head of the company and was explained that the recipe they use is not the normal caramel one would expect. It doesn't say that in the description of these but they are working with amazon to fix that. They do however carry these in the traditional vanilla flavored caramel that I think most people think of when they think caramel. I will try them out. I will also say that this company has the best customer service that I ever experienced on amazon. Or really anywhere. It's service like this that will keep me and other customers coming back because other than the caramel I had no other complaints. It came fresh and decorated nice and the chocolate was tasty.

It's perfect! My son loves to cuddle it! I couldn't be happier! Thinking about getting a second one to keep in his play room so he can relax with it when he wants to rest!
I have many friends with children the same age and will highly recommend it to all of them :)

THIS PRODUCT IS ONLY GOOD FOR THE TRASH....INACCURATE READINGS & HARD TO FIT COVERS. MAKES NEW PARENTS LIKE US WORRY MORE WHEN IT READS TEMP OF A NON FEVERISH BABY AT 101!
DON'T WASTE YOUR $$$!
It's a great product, great name.  Lighter tasting then grey poupon, which we really like.  Still,  Jack Daniels ground Dijon is delicious.
my boyfriend tells me how it decreases his pain as soon as he takes it. not quite sure how well it resolves the stones. still working on it.

This is the best green tea powder I have ever had and the best price for organic green tea powder of this quality.  It gives me extra energy without heart palpitations which is amazing and wonderful!!!!  Kiss Me Organics is Number One on the list!!!!!

I bought them for Louanne my daughter and we have found so many different ways to use this bag ! I keep them all the time in my diaper bag... They have a perfect size to organize so many things ... one for snacks, one for extra pacifiers, and sometimes one with just the extras.

I loathe instant mashed potatoes. Seriously. I can always taste the difference. I get upset with restaurants that tell me they make their own but don't. I won't eat them, though others in my family will. My local store had a clearance on these--a real deal (3 packets for $1), so I bought them for those that do like them, a rainy-day kind of thing. Well, it 'rained' last night. After I made them, I tried them, just to see how much they needed doctoring and what I had to add to make them nearly palatable. To my shock and amazement--they needed NOTHING! They tasted like my own homemade mashed 'taters. I ate them along with everyone else. Now I'm sorry that I only bought a dollar's worth. We're having them again tonight--by popular choice. Try them. I think you, too, will be pleasantly shocked. And no mashing, either:)

As good as I remember it! Just wish I could find in the markets like I used to my whole life. Hate paying the shipping charge.... Definitely recommend the beef summer sausage over the others.
Would like to get the larger version.
Pleased with the seller's description and speed of delivery!
Great stuff that my kids first got introduced to at space camp over 25 years ago and that we continue to but each Christmas.
My 9 month loves this toy!  I like how there are items inside each ring so when he shakes it, it makes noise!
I use this at work and it is awesome. Easy to open and close and tall so my dog cannot jump over. It does have parts to allow you to drill into the wall but you don't have to
These really hold it in. My daughter drinks a lot so she goes a lot and she has never wet her clothes while wearing these.

This is simply the greatest water enhancer ever made.  I have no problem saying I'm addicted. The orange is good too, but strawberry wins hands down. I don't drink soda, so I always have my Crush with me when I eat out. The kids love it too.

I got this for my wife, unfortunately it didn't help her at all with pain relief from pumping.  The package came with the assorted attachments in a plastic bag with no instructions or directions for washing etc.

I got this for my grandson when he was maybe six months old as an oral stimulation alternative for him. He was the type of kiddo who always wanted to mouth and chew on things. It worked pretty well. Now he is 19 months old, and his mom and dad use it to brush his teeth. He looks forward to having his teeth brushed with it, I found out when I babysat him tonight. Granted, it does not look all that much like a toothbrush, but HE knows EXACTLY what it is. I could have died laughing when I was brushing the little guy's teeth, and he started making a krrrrrrrrrrr sound in the back of his throat like the sound his mom and dad's (electronic) toothbrushes make.  :)

he loves this blanket  he's only 4 weeks old but he knows he likes it he looks so peaceful wrapped up in it and if he is in a different blanket he cries more  its a very soft blanket i would recommend it to anyone with a newborn , makes a great gift from a god parent for a godson and i believe there was a little girls blanket as well
They dissolve more easily than the rest of the non-eco friendly and, like the rest, are difficult to write or draw with in the water, but I think that these are better/easier to clean up. Less waxy.

These have just the right amount of mint taste to them.  We use them to make mint chocolate chip cookies and use broken up pieces instead of chips.  Recipe is in Drenna Burton's \\"Eat, Drink and Be Vegan\\".

Love sleep sacks!  I'm a NICU nurse and love these as an option for safe sleep over any type of loose blankets.  In my old hospital we used to give these out to NICU grads for safe sleep practices!  My 4 month old sleeps in one every night and keeps him toasty. He doesn't like the swaddle with wings anymore because he loves his arms free.
Loved this so much the day care kids asked if he could bring it to day care

The Munchkin Medicator worked really well for our baby when she was fussy with colic (acid reflux, or whatever they guessed it was). We put some Gripe Water in the little feeder and she was able to suck it down on her own, while being comforted by the pacifier-like top. I hated having to use the syringes most of these pain management products came with, so messy, not the best way to administer. So, this was a great alternative.

My daughter is 10 months now, but I still use this randomly if she wakes in the night and won't calm down. It seems to soothe her.

Good stuff.  My malted shake was thick and wonderful just like I remember from my childhood at the local old fashioned delicatessen counter. I have not used the malted powder for anything else yet but it already brought back great memories. I will buy it again.

Straight from the can I like the carbon original mix much better than the chocolate mix.   When I bought this I was looking for substantial chocolate flavor, and these did not deliver.  They were good, and I never made a bad waffle (I used up a 3 pack of the 33oz cans before I wrote this review)  They come out a darkish brown and hinted at chocolate flavoring, but just lacked the chocolaty umphh I wanted.  Luckily this can be addressed, I add a tablespoon of Hershey's classic dark cocoa powder per cup of mix -  that kicks the chocolate up a couple of notches and makes the waffle interior really dark.

Perhaps I am not as much of a coffee snob as some, but I do love eight o'clock coffee Colombian because it is rich and strong. I buy the whole bean and grind it myself. I purchased this order for my brother, who is also fond of strong coffee. This is great quality coffee.
We find it very hard to find this Viennese Chocolate Cafe drink mix as it is always sold out in stores.  We buy it in bulk and we buy it from Amazon. Great Item.

I looked forward to trying this but it gave me horrible heart palpitations and ringing in my ears, blurred vision and breathlessness, and that was only with half a teaspoon! If you have a tendency toward high blood pressure this might not be for you...

I have had a Keurig brewer for a few years now and tried many different kcup varieties, never have i had any issues with a kcup until i bought the Gevalia brand.I'm not sure if it is due to the ridges in the cup or some other design flaw, but every time I brew, I end up with copious amounts of grounds in my cup.  with other kcups, when you remove the used cup, nothing leaks from the bottom, however, when you remove the Gevalia kcup, be ready for a mess all over your counter. i would give no stars if I could.

Amazing.... The short term answer to my exhaustion problems.  Do I think this sucker is worth $300?  Big. Fat. NO.  Did I care when I ordered it?  NOPE.  People will do anything for a baby to sleep.  ANYTHING.  Luckily, this sucker can be turned into a bassinet and a play yard for my daughter.  So I guess I wasted $200 on a pack 'n play she'll never use. :/

This is one of the best things that I bought for our baby. When swaddling her with a blanket, I'd have to swaddle her so tight that I was afraid that if she needed to shift or lean to one side to clear her throat - she'd struggle. This has awesome velcro and is super soft. It's easy for me to swaddle her so that she can't get out - but leave the swaddle loose enough that she can shift as needed. This also takes the pain out of doing a bad swaddle with a blanket and eliminates those pesky hands that keep escaping the swaddle. Our baby is so calm when she's in this swaddle - it's been a life saver.

Surprised it fit our orbit baby g3 infant car seat but it did great! It's not easy traveling with baby so this made it much easier and served it's purpose even though you will look ridiculous carrying it on your back so we're not winning any fashion awards but protects our car seat fantastically!Handle could be stronger and thicker

this was great for ababy that is having trouble eating n thriving .  gives him food all the timesubed it forpassifier and child was 10 il in 1 week gained6 oz because food was always available for him 24/7 .just kept it full and threw out pasifier .. he growing like a weed now ..thank you

Great product! super-easy installation and sturdy hooks that stay in place no matter what. I use them on a daily basis to hang not only the diaper bag (which is very heavy with all the baby stuff), but also my handbag, some shopping bags and even my son's lunch bag when I picked him from school, and they hold everything!. I thought the set was wonderful and the person I gave it to really loved it for Christmas present. I would definitely recommend this product.

This has been a family favorite for decades! We are so happy to see it back! We use it in chili con queso, chili and homemade enchilada gravy. It has a definite kick! Always looking for additional things to add it to!

At times, dark chocolate can have an almost chalky quality to it. Not this bar from Lindt! I truly enjoyed this 70% dark recipe. It is not bitter either, and even has a creaminess to it that is very enjoyable.

One of the things I like about the satisfaction of dark chocolate itself is the way I can enjoy one or two squares, and don't feel like I need to eat the whole bar. As a result, this bar was several little treats over a few days for me.

So Good! I have been eating only these the past few days because I have not been in the mood for anything else. All favors are good, I like the "Veggie Six Mix". I will buy VeganBurger again.

Tastes very good put it on all my foods even saute with it. will purchase more

Love the packets for controlling the amount of sugar used. Better for your body compared to refined sugar.

I recently purchased the 50 count Green Mountain Breakfast Blend and I have to say that the price was unbeatable, Not to mention the coffee. I only drink Green Mountain Coffee. I know, it is called Skinny Pop. Which is great if you are 39 and trying to lose weight. But if you are 4, you apparently could care less about the name! My children DEVOURED this popcorn! It is fresh, delicious, and just so great as a snack. I loved the individual sizes so that they kids could grab one on their own and eat it themselves. I absolutely love this flavor as well, and we will be purchasing more in the future.

My daughter got one of these as a gift and she loves it so much that we bought another one as a backup.  It really helps her to sleep and I've had several friends say the same about their kids.  The only caution I'd give is to wash it often.  It may have just been my daughter, but she loves to suck on it.  She ended up with a little infection on her face because of that.  Once we bought a second one and washed it more often (twice a week), the problem went away (we had to get some medicine from the doctor too).
It is easy to install with a clear view of my baby seat. I am pleased and we will be ordering a second mirror for our other car. Thanks!
Baby loves to grab the sun in the crib. Mirror is OK - large (about 10 inch square?), not quite flat but safe for baby.

Bought this for a baby shower gift.  I always like to buy a variety of items for different developmental stages so when the kids get there, the parents have it on hand.  I like to colors and that it is textures. I like that here are 4 of them so as some are dirty you always have some to use.
We really like the caramel flavor of Popcorners Chips. Haven't been able to find them in the store as easily as before. They're always sold out.

I think I see what it going on.  These are totally variable!  My first ~5 cans over the last few months were amazing- salty, crunchy, fresh, and fantastic.  But I just bought one that is terrible- stale, burnt, dry, and not salty.  I think it totally depends on the batch, and there is no way to know what you are going to get.  This is such a bummer because the first ones were seriously amazing.  I will try returning this can and seeing if it is just this one batch.

V8 vegetable juice has been a staple in our kitchen for decades.  The spicy hot variety adds a little zing without overdoing it.  It is great cold but it is also a really tasty hot drink when microwaved and a little parmesan or blue cheese is added on top.  With crackers and some fruit or veggies it makes a great light lunch or quick snack.  It is also one of the items in my kitchen cabinet that I grab when making soup as it enriches the flavor nicely.  The best thing is to know that I am enjoying something that both tastes good and is for for me.  And subscribe and save makes it a good deal price wise.
This is my favorite coffee! Could not find it in my local stores this past winter, so this purchase was a real treat!

I like it, the only thing "wrong" with it is the top part for baby's head is not "stiff" enough to fully support it. Also, once you figure how to navigate baby into it by yourself it is a little tricky as to where baby's arms go- but once you figure it out you are fine. Those are my only 2 "issues" with it. My husband and I are overweight (slightly over 200 lbs)and the straps are accommodating for that which was my fear.
Good sports drink that doesn't have all the CRAP Gatorade and powerade has in it

After reading the other reviews, I was so anxious to try this popcorn.  I've been trying every popcorn available on Amazon.  The Amish brand (non-Wabash Valley) are good, but small.  The Fireworks Orchard blossom is also very good, but also somewhat small.  Therefore, to see a \\"large\\" popcorn advertised was exciting.       However, the popcorn didn't pop any bigger than cheap store-bought popcorn, but had ten times as many hulls!  The broken hulls are large, hard and curled.  Few kernals didn't have open hulls still attached, and trying to break off the hull destroyed the fluffy part.  There were more hull pieces than popped kernals.   The few white/yellow parts are also sort of rubbery/chewy and have no flavor.       Terribly expensive.  It would be worth it if the popcorn were half-way decent, but it isn't.  If you don't pick out the hulls, your mouth is full of them and they are stuck between your teeth and caught in your throat.  I always pop in a frying pan on the stove top for best results.  This was popped the same way as all the other brands.  I will try it one more time, hoping for different results and will update this if the next batch is better.

I bought this for my daughter because of her fascination with tags. She loves that it is very colorful, and she love that the \\"tags\\" have many different textures. I can't seem to get it out of her mouth. The actual blanket is very soft, and it is very cute. It is extremely easy to wash, and is small enough to bring with us everywhere. I'm so glad that I bought one. Definitely worth the extra money.
Not what I expected. Everything was in order but it seems to be a bit overpriced.

Just got it a week ago. We attached it using sticky tape provided. We have real ceramic tile in the bath and it holds well. Useful and cute. I am guessing people complaining that it does not stick attached it to porous surface, like plastic or paint.

I was skeptical that I would even need breast pads before my baby was born.  I received these as a gift from a wise friend who was a new mother, and now I understand why.  Bamboobies are a must-have for breastfeeding moms.  I've been wearing them since my milk came in and continue to be amazed that my milk never leaks through the pad.  The material is soft and all-natural, making it useable for my sensitive skin as well.  I would buy bamboobies as a shower gift for any new mom, and will continue to wear them daily myself.
This is the best outdoor mat we have, and it is so easy to take with us, wherever we go.
These flowers lasted so long & they were gorgeous! They came just as they were starting to bloom.

Looks great and the taste was OK. This lasagna is easy to bring somewhere, like a trip. This was the one I was looking for because my baby doesn't like puree. It is very hard to find chunky baby food during trip. The size and softness of chunk was good for my baby. She is a big eater and likes chunky food but she doesn't eat this Lasagna first. She ate all after cheese added.

I searched and searched for a bottle my breastfed baby would take.  I tried several more expensive bottles that were specifically recommended for breastfed babies and nothing.  I gave this to her and she took it almost immediately.  The shape of the nipple is perfect for her latch and she could finally create suction.  With other nipples she would act like she didn't know how to work it.  It does have some design issues with the bottle itself..milk gets trapped around the rim and with pumped breastmilk, every drop is precious.  If not for that tiny flaw, I would be giving it a five because it is such a relief to finally find a bottle she will drink from.  Previous to finding this she would go on a hunger strike everytime I went to work.

I had high hopes for this monitor after reading all of the positive reviews but have been very disappointed. The handheld display only holds a charge for about 15 minutes before it starts beeping loudly, then it loses power.  The signal is also easily lost and our house is not that big. The whole point of getting the monitor was to be able to sleep in my room while also being able to hear her if she needs something. With a weak signal and battery that dies quickly, it is unreliable and useless. I'll be shopping for a new monitor.

These are great! I put some in the freezer so they will stay fresh. Perfect crunch to put in salads, anything that I cook and want crunch added to the dish. Also use in cereal sometimes.
These are fresh and very good

I have such a hard time finding the blankets that have the satin on the entire back side. When I saw this it looked really cute and had many good reviews. However, the soft side of this blanket is more like a short hair type of material and it sheds easily. It gets all over my daughters fingers when she cuddles with it and I manage to pull some out when I put it into the washer. It will probably get put into the closet and stay there. Unless someone wants mine, haha.
...what a poor product. If you expect a soft and chewy old time Abba Zaba , this is NOT it. We tossed over half of it. It was not not worth the effort to send it back.

I spent many hours going over and over which baby monitor to get.....this one won, and my children just love the versatility in it.  Both families have said that they just love it and use it everyday....alittle bit more expensive, but when it gets great  reviews, just sometimes you bite the bullet and say, "oh well, what the heck"

I bought this for my niece who has a newborn and a 2-year-old.  She absolutely loves it.  Color was great - can be used for a girl or boy and her husband doesn't mind carrying it.  Would definitely recommend.

This is a staple in my house, oh so many uses and all of the with outstanding results.  I have turned many family members on to this product and they have all fallen in love with it.  Yes it is a little on the expensive side but goes a long way.  Just be sure you get cold pressed extra virgin oil, it is the best....

I would highly recommend this tea. It is well balanced and is sweet enough with the pomegranate ingredients that it does not require any additional sweetener. I would highly recommend this tea for anyone looking for a great green tea flavored with pomegranate.

I kept hesitating because of the cost (they're just balls, right?), but eventually got them for my 11-month old.  She loves them!  It's one of the few things she'll bring to me on her own, and nearly anything we do with them makes her giggle.  It turns out, the design *is* made for her, and the little something extra was worth it.

In my area all the hospitals give this brand out when you have a baby. They aren't the best looking brand out there but they seem to be very functional at calming a new baby. I was happy to see Amazon offer different colors then the standard hospital issued teal and the price was really good. I wish the part that sticks out of the babies mouth was smaller because when you are trying to take pictures it feels like it's covering the babies entire face!! The product is really great for what it is though. Highly recommend these for a baby girl they are extremely durable and when the baby starts cutting teeth you don't have to worry about them chewing parts of it off!
I ordered this as a Christmas gift for someone who collects trains and is hard to buy for. He really liked the gift.
The cookies were broken when I opened the package, but it tasted okay.  These cookies are smaller and did not have as much creme filling as other brands.
Loved this since I was little. They do need to figure out a way to keep the marshmallow filling from sticking to the package.
Great pillow- my 2 year old daughter loves it and actually is sleeping longer in her crib! Plus she is not waking up as frequently so she must be more comfortable.

So we just took a vacation and we needed a temporary gate to block off the stairs of our beach house. I was expecting a flimsy little gate but this thing was the complete opposite. It took 5 minutes to install. The rubber pads on the ends were perfect and held very well, even with two rambunctious toddlers pulling on it. The gate mechanism itself was really nice. Simply lift and swing to open. There's a lock mechanism as well so that kids can't accidentally open the gate. The hold-open feature was also much appreciated for after the kids went to bed.

This gate is actually better then the permanent gates that I have around our house...that says something, especially at the price this sells for.

These are wonderful! I filled these with apple sauce for my kindergartner and she loves them! They are so easy to use, fill and clean. I no longer need to put the sauce in a tupperware, in a bag and a spoon, just a simple pack of these and she is all set to go.

After barely a week with this \\"amazing\\" teether - the rubber is peeling! Small bits of the bottom of the feet are breaking off. I couldn't believe it after seeing such great reviews. Pretty scary to see rubber missing from your child's toy - especially after paying $16! I would have expected better quality for the price. Amazon made it an easy return though!

I bought these cups for my daughter to transition her into a "big girls" cup. They are great cups, I bought several, the problem was that one of them keeps losing its "gasket". When this comes out of the lid it causes the cup to leak. The other cups have been ok so far... Keeping fingers crossed we just received one bum cup.

I have been using these in recipes as I cook since the volume is just about the right amount.  So far I have found them all flavorful, easy to work with and good tasting.  I have also used some of the oils for homemade bruschetta.  It works well for that.

These tea bags by Stash, special occasion green tea, are pretty darn good as far as green tea bags go. They have a definate green tea flavor, and are not a wishy-washy green tea wanna be. They are about as good as brewing a Japanese loose green tea leaf yourself, but without the hassle. Great for your everyday fix.

We've been enjoying these candies for years, but the store(s) where have found the product have stopped carrying them and several appeals to store management have been fruitless. Happy to have found the candy on-line, where we will continue to purchase at a substantial discount from retail, albeit in a larger initial volume than ordinarily.

Assuming this protector works, then it's good.  But be prepared for the plastic smell.  Eventually that will go away, but it's pretty strong at the beginning. After the smell has gone it's a good thing to have.

this item is my worst purchase on Amamzon - 4 months and all the screws are falling off. The glider makes so much noise that i cannot have my baby aleep in my arms. overall a really bad buy -

Depending on what I put it on, this sometimes seems really nice and other times the nasty aftertaste hits. They've sure tried hard with this; I count at least 5 different sugarless sweeteners. And it flows just like normal syrup, that's a plus. But there's no way you'll get away with sneaking this product on the unsuspecting. It is a nice option for the dedicated low-carber.

The upside is that your kids will NOT sneak this to make chocolate milk and leave you with an almost empty bottle in the fridge.
Love the tank and set up, however the cork top came broken. I am hoping to get in touch with Hinterland so that they will send me a new top. Other than that, this is such a cute set up.

The only negative I can say about these chips is that for me they were a bit too spicy. I had to have these with something to drink. However, I was impressed with how much flavor these had and how they don't TASTE like healthy chips. That's the best kind of healthy choices right? Theirs is organic and is half the price of this but no way does the CostCo stuff taste anywhere as good as this nor does this Cost Co stuff fluff up and cook nearly as well!  Guess u get what u pay for!!!! I'll stick with this as the taste is unbeatable for the price! TruRoots is a bargin for the pounds that u get!! And please don't raise the price because I said urs is the best out there!!  Lol
A little hard to review a product like this but it came as described so I am pleased :) Washed well and fit my mattress.

The Cheezy Chipotle flavour is my favorite. Plus, this is a very healthy snack. I highly recommend them but if you have a Whole Foods near you DO NOT BUY THEM HERE for this insane price. Whole Foods sells them for $4.99 and they are frequently on sale. Today I bought a bag for $4.29. In fact, I only buy them on sale as I consider $4.99 too expensive for 2.2 ounces of dried kale (let alone the $5.99 being charged here on Amazon.)

Considering how seriously expensive Whole Foods stores are, and how online selling doesn't incur the same overhead expenses as retail stores do, the makers of Kale Krunch are TRULY ripping people off here for 2.2 ounces of dried kale. Great product. Questionable company ethics.

Made our trip a snap. Was great not to have to fit our car seat down the narrow aisle of the Embraer.

One thing I miss dreadfully in avoiding wheat most of the time is Pop Tarts. I ran across these and, even though they are missing the frosting and don't taste exactly like Pop Tarts, they are the next best thing. So far, I've only had these strawberry ones and they were pretty good, even untoasted. I would definitely buy them again.

Diet Coke has always been one of my favorite diet drinks. I have to admit that the new Diet Coke with Splenda tastes better in my opinion, but this one will suffice. It is especially good on a hot, humid day in southwest Louisiana, where I'm from. A really cold shot of Diet Coke goes down a lot easier than its classic counterpart.

Pick up a bottle today and enjoy it for what it is. It's a pretty good diet drink that doesn't make you feel as guilty as when you drink down the good ol' original.

My son is so comfortable in this chair. I love the colors, I love how it reclines, and most of all I love how it folds up and lowers for storage. I put the high chair in the lowest position and close the legs only 1 notch so it's still stable to stand and I put it under a desk/organizer in my kitchen instead of a chair, it's a great place for storage and I can't believe how small this high chair can become. I really like that it has a cloth cover because it's so soft and comfortable for my son. My brother has a chair with a plastic type pad and it's gross! It is hard and food gets caked in the creases no matter how much they clean it. My little guy just started eating on his own so I bought 2 Eddie Bauer cotton denim convertable carseat covers for $4.00 each at a local discount store. It takes me 2 seconds to put it on and he can make a big mess and I don't mind, I wash one and use one.
The leg holes aren't meant for babies with chunky legs but otherwise a decent seat that's easy to take anywhere

This is a great blend of rouille spices that is both fresh and in generally good proportion. What I mean by 'generally good' is that is is good as is, but I augment this mix with a little more saffron and cayenne pepper. Otherwise, it is a great convenience to have a ready mixed blend that is fresh and aromatic.

About the way I augment this: when I am ready to add the spices to the base of my rouille (more about the base below), I use a quarter of a vial of [[ASIN:B008ZLNC5G Powder Saffron, organic premium Persian powder saffron]] and an additional half teaspoon of cayenne. The powdered saffron is actually not significantly more than the three percent of saffron that is already in this mix. Regarding the cayenne - I find that the extra that I add gives the rouille a little more bite, and especially if I am making rouille the traditional way with bread crumbs instead of egg yolks.

I mentioned a 'base' for my rouille. I make it the traditional way with fish stock, olive oil, bread crumbs and spices. I also make it using egg yolks as a base. This, too, is authentic, but I think the bread crumb recipe is the original. Finally, when I am pressed for time and want to set the rouille out as a spread over baguettes I simply mix the spices into store bought mayonnaise. Blasphemy, I know, but sometimes one needs to break rules. In all cases this mix works perfectly. To my palate the end result is as close to authentic I am likely to achieve.

The bottom line is this blend is both fresh and aromatic, and works well even without my changes and augmentations. I always keep some on hand in my spice cabinet.

Every kernel pops popping in my West Bend Stir Crazy corn popper.  Check out my other pop corn ingredient reviews.  This is good corn to pop with but for the Movie Theater pop corn experience (if that's what you seek), there are a few other ingredients you need to use

I bought the Keurig for my husband who really did not want it. I don't drink coffee but love, love gadgets. So order to enjoy my new GADGET I had to find something to make. I found Grove Square Cappuccino by accident. I add some whipped cream on the top and what I end up with is a heavenly dessert that has none of the bitter taste of coffee. I also bought the French Vanilla version and decided I liked it so much that I am on a monthly plan. For anyone who loves flavored drinks this is perfect. And my hubby finally came around and uses the Keurig for his coffee. He does not use this drink since it does not have a coffee taste, thank goodness.

I have been watching negatives and positives. It is all a matter of preference and taste. I happen to love this coffee because it is sweet and does not taste like coffee. I simply hate coffee and this is a way to enjoy the Keurig and share some time with my husband who does drink coffee. As for the additives... welcome to this world of the 21st century! It satifies my sweet tooth and keeps me from eating cake, cookies, pie and ice cream. So Grove Square bring it on.

I bought this product because the manufacturer said it works with the most popular models of car seats.  I have an Evenflo car seat and it did NOT work with this stroller.  A few pages into the instructions, and after assembling the whole thing it lists a 1-800 number to call if your EXACT model of car seat is not listed in the instruction booklet.  The customer service rep. informed me that this stroller will not work with my car seat AT ALL!  I am 9 months pregnant, and not happy that I had to drive very far to the Babies R Us store to purchase this product, drive all the way home, assemble it, and then read in the middle of the instructions that I need customer service, only to find out that the product will not work with my car seat.  After disassembling the stroller, TRYING to repack it in the box, and driving all the way back to the store to return it, I have decided that Baby Trend is not the company for me.  I will not buy any more of their products since I feel they could have been more honest in their advertising on the box, and on the internet regarding this product's specifications.  I feel I was mislead, and I do not trust this company nor it's products.

If anybody is wondering about trying raw honey as an acne cleanse I highly recommend this stuff. I spread it all over my face twice a day, before bed and when I wake up. I leave it on from anywhere between 20 minutes and an hour. My acne was seriously gone in a matter of days, and my skin is so soft now because of this honey. And it tastes great in my morning coffee!

I received my package and I did receive at least 30 different (brand) varieties. However, I was a little disappointed that they were mostly coffee. I had selected this particular product because it advertised coffees, teas, cocoas, apple ciders, iced coffees, iced teas, etc. and I was actually hoping to get a variety of all those samples. My package contained coffees, bold coffees, decaf coffees, flavored coffees, with only five teas and 1 hot chocolate, which was a disappointment for my kids. No apple ciders, no iced coffees and duplicates of at least 5 coffees. On the plus side, they did send me more than just 30 k-cups, but receiving two hazelnuts from two different companies is not what I would call a different flavor, just a different brand, so I don't think I really received the 30 different flavors that was guaranteed. I also wish I had been sent more of the variety of other items, rather than the duplicates of coffee. The samples were good and tasted fresh. About two weeks ago I got two Nizo Solace bras and I love the support they provide. They are my favorite bras by far for several reasons:

(1) The bras are comfortable while being supportive. They do a great job of lifting the breasts and supporting the back all day long. I wear am petite and wear a 34D bra size so a good fit in a bra is a lifesaver. In other nursing bras I have struggled with back aches, but when I started wearing the Nizo bras the back aches stopped.

(2) These bras also look awesome under my clothes again because they are way more supportive than your average nursing bra. The support keeps the chest lifted and allows me to wear form fitting clothes without feeling frumpy.

(3) The cup insert is fantastic. The insert discreetly hides sensitive nipples or nursing pads so when I am wearing a Nizo bra I feel more confident.

I bought this set for cheaper at Wal-Mart,  but I thought I would share my experience so far. First, let me just say, this baby monitor is awesome!  I had a nice one a lng time ago, but it was not chargeable. Having the rechargeable parent unit is amazing. I will save so much on batteries and electric. It wont have to s tay constantly plugged,  even though I find it kind of upsetting that the cord for the cameras is removable making it easy fornmy toddler to pull it out. On the bright side of that, the camera is mountable and has the sliding (over the nail or screws head) detail to keep it from  flying down on your little love. The two way communication feature is impressive, as I did not even read that it had that feature. I was a little disappointed that it looks exactly like the tilt & zoom model (other than the cam having tilt & zoom on the cameras). So, when I saw it at Wal-Mart for cheaper after reading about the tilt & zoom model I thought I was getting one hell of a deal for two cameras with tilt and zoom. I think the colors and design should be a little bit more unique between the two models. I cannot manage to position this camera to see everything I need to see. Having two kids in one room and two in another makes placement a bit of a dilemma.  I will most likely need at least two more cameras to see everything, and they are almost as expensive as this whole set for one.
Not tall enough ended up liking bumbo one better , I just added stickers to cuzomize .

I ran out of Rock in Green and went for 2 weeks without ordering new.  By the time I got my order, the diapers were wreaking from using another detergent. This bag lasts about 3-4 months for me, depending on how many times a week I run a load of diapers...so the cost is WELL worth it!

I rolled my eyes when someone told me these produced "movie theater popcorn"--and then I had to eat crow!  Perfectly portioned and the butter and seasonings melt and distribute just like they're supposed to.  We've been eating these for 7 years now--we'll never order anything else!
This isn't my favorite Republic of Tea Green Tea. The berry just doesn't quite work for me. If you want an awesome flavor go for the ginger peach green.
Love them. Specially that they don't need those rim inserts like the smaller bottles have.

When I'm lazy, in a hurry or traveling, I like my soup cups. My usual favorite soup cup flavors are lentil bean or chicken noodle, but it was my first time trying this brand so I was a little hesitant. Glad I tried this. It has the classic split-pea soup flavor and I'll probably get it again for emergency rations.

It's quick, easy and decently satisfying. I love it for travel because sometimes I'm with people who either lag or aren't hungry as early as I can be. So as long as I have hot water access, this takes the edge off my hunger pangs or wanting to eat bad or sugary foods.

We've been using this for over a year. We purchased it when our daughter was about 6 months old. She was having a difficult time falling asleep. She would suck her thumb, but start crying, then repeat that over and over becoming more and more upset. If we went in her room to calm her or even opened her door, she'd become extremely distraught- wondering why we would \\"appear and disappear\\". We even tried offering a variety of \\"lovey\\" items in her crib. Like satin, furry, knit, or flannel blankets. Nothing helped. I was becoming extremely emotional, feeling I was making things worse. We needed a video monitor. We purchased it from a children's store for about $60. We had already had an audio monitor that we purchased, so couldn't spend too much on a video one too. The first time we used it, we knew immediately we would never use the sound. In a small house, 900 sq ft ranch, we can hear everything in every room so using the sound was unnecessary. I wanted to see her, see what was upsetting her. In the first week of using it, we discovered that she was \\"petting\\" the sleeve of her fleece pajamas while sucking her thumb! Each time she'd get close to falling asleep while \\"petting\\" her sleeve, her body would relax- she would go from being on her side to her back again. Each time that happened she would start crying. Seeing this, we knew the solution to help our daughter fall asleep. We gave her fleece footie pj's to hold and snuggle with :) she chose her own lovie and started falling asleep with zero fuss. I tell you this story, because if the price wasn't right, we wouldn't have purchased this video monitor. We're grateful Summer offers a basic video monitor that plugs into the wall. People call it old fashion and loud, but I call it a \\"night saver\\". Our daughter will be turning 2 soon. I still use the monitor every night when I put her to bed. We use it now to teach good bedtime habits, like laying down in her crib vs. standing and jumping. The monitor has held up nicely.We noticed interference when the antenna on the camera was messed with, but it was an easy fix. The sound is it's biggest downfall, a constant static noise. With the sound of, the lights still let you know visually if there is talking/singing/or crying going on. It's fit our needs perfectly! Oh, she still falls asleep with her \\"feece\\" every nap and night.

Mediocre taste and a bit boring. Great advertising - doesn't Rhino Peri-Peri make you curious? Sounds exotic.

Ingredients (from the label): Roasted Tomatoes, Water. onions, cider vinegar, lemon, etc, etc

By law: ingredients are listed in descending order. Peri Peri chiles are near the end of the list.

This sauce is nothing more than one in thousands of boutique hot sauces trying to gain market share

Taste: You are greeted with tomatoes, then onion, and the sauce finishes with mild to medium heat. It does seem to have garlic flavor notes but garlic is not a listed ingredient.

The bottle has a wide neck opening and for good reason - you'll need a lot of this sauce for a family sized meal. If you really like this stuff you'll be spending a lot of money to keep it in stock.

There is nothing terribly wrong with this sauce nor anything very impressive

On the plus side this sauce is not overly hot. I'm not a fan of excessively hot hot sauces. It also does not have a lot of vinegar which is another plus.

But in the end it is BORING- - so many other hot sauces are better or more interesting

Try these hot sauces before you consider this one (all of which you'll find in your local supermarket):

Huy Fong Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce (aka Rooster Sauce)
Cholula
Tabascos Chipotle

Exotiic/Boutique Hot Sauces - start with these (on-line only):

CaJohns (a winner of many awards)
Marie Sharp's

This sauce has the slow burn and spread type of heat from the north Caribbean, but is easily tolerable if you are familiar with the Jamaican sauces. There is a slight bite, but nothing like some of the Mexican or Mesoamerican sauces.

Piquant and tang are the two main components of the flavor profile. There is also a sweetness that characterizes sauces from this area of the Caribbean, and even a hint of bitterness from the turmeric. In fact, this has a fairly complete profile that, while not perfectly balanced, is not overly dominated by any single flavor characteristic.

While it has enough salt to be useful as the only condiment on a table, the actual sodium content per serving is a relatively low 65mg. It's also a thick, viscous sauce that can be spread or used as a rich dip. In fact, aside from the sodium, the calories are so low that the bottle claims 0 per serving. No cholesterol either.

If you try this and decide that the heat is wimpy (some friends have made that very statement, although I do not agree), try their [[ASIN:B0075ANB8Q Hell Fire Hot Pepper Sauce by Tortuga]]. It's definitely hot, but not the same wonderful flavor as this one. That sauce is a tad sour and one dimensional in flavor - but if you are seeking heat that one will not disappoint.

One final note: this sauce requires refrigeration after you open it, so it's not one to take on a prolonged camping trip unless you can provide some way to store it at low temperatures.
This chair is unsafe.  There are no shoulder straps.  My one year old pulled in his feet, stood up and fell onto his head.  This product should be recalled.

I love that these are the thick cotton washcloths instead of the carters ones that are soft, however they are some kind of blend that feels too cheap. When I was my son with these I feel like I'm really getting all his chubby folds clean.

I actually bought this to wear for a halloween costume as outerwear and decided not to use it.  For my shape (thin, but with a large backside), this girdle really doesn't help me attain a nice shape. It does suck everything in, but sort of uniformly and without thought to areas that ladies might like a little curve.  It definitely flattened my curvy backside.  It also pulls in the hips and thigh quite a bit, but doesn't loosen up toward the bottom, so your leg fat below the girdle ends up looking weird.  It is also difficult to walk with it on.  I ended up feeling more like a walking sausage than I did a sexy woman.

we had to punch holes and then use zip ties to fasten it to the banister.
needs some kind of better approach to make the attachments not an eye sore.

I loved the aden + anais burpy bibs until I found these- this is definitely a better value and I love this product. The only difference is they do not have a snap- this would allow the burp cloth to turn into a bib. Doesn't bother me as I have yet to use either as a bib. Good quality, washes well and I love the solid colors.

This was so rancid it filled my entire kitchen with the most horrible smell when I tried to use it.  UGH! The great thing is that I contacted Amazon via there chat method and even though the product came from an outside company, Amazon refunded my money while I was online with the CDustomer Service agent.  Great Service!  Awful product :(

This product saved us a lot of time. Without it, we would have had to bundle up the baby each time we went out. With it, we simply laid a blanket over him, zipped the coverall and headed out the door. When we arrived where we were going, a simple zip made the baby comfortable again. This was especially handy when running errands--zip to go to the warm car, unzip in the warm car, zip to leave the warm car, unzip inside the warm destination. Can you imagine taking a coat on and off in all these instances?
it worked great for about 5 days. Had to send it back to manufacturer for replacememt. Waiting for its return.

The best ginger tea I've ever had.  It has lots of flavor and you can't over brew it.  Buying from Amazon in a six box pack is quite a bit cheaper than buying it at Wal Mart - and my charity gets money too!!!!

This product is of medium quality compared with the German or French products. It is not cleaned of tiny tissues and although I kept it in the refrigerator, the product developed a blue coat...at least one of the cans. The other 2 cans were OK. There is however a much bigger quantity compared to the little, more expensive German/French cans. Even after taking it apart and cleaning the small tissues or smashed/fragmented pieces, one is left with a lot more product.

My son has enjoyed this toy from day one. He likes looking at all the colors and seeing himself in the mirror. He also enjoys the added on items that he can play with. We have used this since he was about 1 month old and he still likes it several months later. I use it to distract him during diaper changes, which works great. This toy is well worth the money and makes a great gift too! It can be hung anywhere(crib, car) or can stand on it's own. Very versitile!

The only thing Earl Grey about this tea is the label on the outside. Earl Grey has a very distinctive smell and this tea has none of it. It's just a generic black tea.

We had some English breakfast k-cups at home and I did a blind test and was unable to tell which tea I was drinking. That's ridiculous because with real Earl Grey I should have been able to tell without even tasting it.
Wish these were easier to find, I love hazelnut chocolate and these are tops in my book! If they were easier to locate I would have to spend all my time at the gym working them off.

I eat this stuff almost everyday. It's low in calories for an instant soup mix, and it tastes remarkably like the real thing. My only issue is that I have found a 30 piece carton of the regular packages (still 2.1 oz) at my local asian market for $10.99. Plus I don't have to wait a week to get it. But If you can't get it that way, I would definitely order some, and order som Sriracha hot sauce to go with it. You may also want to try it with fresh basil leaves, mung bean sprouts, and the most important ingredient.... lime.    I LOVE IT!

I love this, and I only knocked it down a star for one reason: The swivel isn't very smooth, so it's difficult for my five month old to swivel around to see the different toys.

That said, everything else is PERFECT. He loves this thing. He laughs and jumps in it non stop and doesn't get bored! The bounce on this thing is great and doesn't take a lot of effort for him to really get a good jump in. And the toys are bright and fun. Also there's an off switch on the noisy toys. So when Mommy and/or Daddy get tired of hearing the music on loop, they can turn it off. My son doesn't really mind when i turn the sound off anyway, so long as he can JUMP.

This thing is a life saver. My boy was getting tired of his play mat and swing. So when I need to do chores, I put him in his bouncer and he's plenty entertained.

I have 4 diaper bags and this is my favortie!  I bought it for a plane trip and I now use it everyday!  I LOVE THIS bag and it has replaced bags that were 5 times the price.  I can take everything I need and then some!  The front pocket is awesome to hold all of my personal belongings so I don't need to use a purse. I highly recommend!
good quality and came as expected.  Turns out my 3-month-old daughter wasn't ready for a heavier flow; she spit up more than usual, so we'll try introducing them again in a month.

Made a good snack while in Disney!  The kids enjoyed the packaging and the taste was as expected - good.  We added these snack backs to Disney carry-ons that we purchased for our children, prior to a surprise trip south.
My favorite London tea, if you like a full bodied tea that is not bitter this is for you
Received the starter kit as a gift for my newborn (and 20 month old) and we're obsessed. Love the smell and texture. Highly recommend!

Who knew? I dutifully have 1 cup of coffee a day. I sometimes like that taste, usually not, I guess I like the idea of it more. I often get through 0.5 a cup before tossing it.. until Veranda. I bought several varieties recently (not at Amazon, but I'm sure I'll be buying this from Amazon in the future!) And came across this after going through a pack of the house blend, and I found on the first sip when I usually brace myself, it went down smoothly!!

That must been a fluke, I thought, and took another sip and the same thing happened. It tastes good! Smooth. Wait, is this really starbucks coffee? It is, It is! Do they really brew this at the stores? I'll have to try it there also. It tastes so ..... nice. I'm even having a second cup today. And I'll even manage to drink the whole cup while it's hot. I can end my research on finding the perfect coffee cup that keeps the coffee hot for a long period of time, maybe it won't be necessary after all. :) ~Stacy

I like the Golden Lakanto much better for baking, just to expensive to keep buying this sweetener, I do love the taste better than most sweeteners but just can't afford it at the amount of baking I do.
Brews a perfect cup, love my Pike's single cups!!  Closest thing to having a fresh pour right from the store itself.  If you like Pike's at Starbucks, this is a good purchase for you.

exactly as description states. I will never understand why people expect something that is NOT what is described THEN complain. These little fluffy valances are EXACTLY what I wanted. This lining with TULLE layers. Simple description. Sunlight comes through, needs at touch up because it has been squashed and sent through the mail. I put mine in a low dryer with a damp towel for about 10 minutes and they came out PERFECT. Three of them in my kitchen windows to hide a very ugly motorhome next door that shows above the fence. NOW I see, climbing Jasmine, fence and fluffy white curtains. If I had more windows that would work with these I would absolutely buy more.
This is the best instant cappuccino -- its even frothy!  You can even add it to a regular cup of coffee.

DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!    I actually read the other review on this but decided to put it on my baby registry anyway. What a mistake. The hoody is navy and red and the pants are black and red. Then the white shirt inside was stained from the red on the hoody part. I thought maybe it was just a fluke with the other reviewer, but I was obviously wrong.

I just want to say THANK YOU!  Finally I have found a Stevia that meets all my expectations!  I have tried many thinking they were just okay, but this one is GREAT!  No after taste, no bitter taste, it is PERFECT!  I did not want any fillers or made in China products.

Works great as an essential all natural ingredient for making my homemade deodorant which I found on Dr. Josh Axe's webpage.  I've yet to try it for cooking but the product comes with information on recipe uses.
i have found that this product is much better in the larger bags, the company doesn't seem to know how to keep the smaller bags fresh.

Since i am too lazy and fat to go to the store, i ordered these. they shipped them right to my house. i opened them up, and most of them were pretty good. one had some mold, and one was moving by itself. then it attacked me. other then that, they were great. then my parrot started talking to it in Spanish. then i realized, since when did i have a parrot? so i shooed him away. great donuts.

Love using this, particularly on steaks.  I first bought this 7 years ago in Atlanta.  Just tried one bottle then.Have reordered so often, always order a half dozen at a time and also enjoy gifting this to others.

Love the versatility of it and the quality of the fabrics.  The little sleeper is one of the softest fabrics I've ever felt.  The only downside I've found is that it doesn't fit through any bedroom doors unless nearly completely folded down.

And it is pretty durable.  It is a good buy. Pretty good value for your money. Also it  arrived in like 2 days. Amazon is really good about that. My things always arrive sooner than expected.

I have trouble finding other than clover honey where I live.
