I found it on Amazon amd was very happy to do so.  It tastes great, probably because it comes from Florida.

I've been using the Maxi Cosi car seat for 4 months and have waited to write my review until now. My baby was 8 lbs when she was born, and she fits in the car seat just fine. The base was easy to install. I use the car seat on a daily base, it is easy to snaps in and out of the car seat base, and my Mamas & Papas Urbo Stroller ( you need to buy an adapter separately ). When you install the seat to the base ,you will hear a â€œclickâ€ sound, it always gives me a peace of mind and I know I install the seat correctly when I hear that sound.

The seat padding is made with cotton, so my baby wonâ€™t sweat. Cleaning the car seat is very straight forward and fairly easy. It doesn't take much time and energy for me to take the fabric cover off as it is simply constructed. I throw it into the washing machine, and dry it with low heat. The fabric doesn't shrink, and it wasn't that difficult to put the cover back together.
I brought the car seat in black, and use it with my Mamas & Papas Urbo stroller, and received a lot of compliments.

Overall my baby look comfortable in the seat, and Iâ€™m very happy with the purchase.

The picture is of a bed rail, what I received was a guard rail. I already have a guard rail and I just need the bed rail. I searched for a bed rail and this is what came up. I am so frustrated with Babi Italia.  At least Amazon has an understanding return policy and customer service. My search continues for my lifestyle crib.

I received a FREE bottle of Frank's RedHot Sweet Chili Sauce from Smiley360 and tried it first with the recipe they provided which was FRANK's RedHot Sweet ChiliÂ® Cream Cheese Dip. This recipe was really yummy, but since it has cream cheese in it the spiciness is toned down quite a bit. I have never tried Frank's products before and I tried this also just by itself straight on my tongue. This has a slightly chunky sweet and spicy flavor. I found it very good on oriental and Hawaiian foods also. This product doesn't have MSG or artificial colors. Great product!
This is a firm but soft pillow.  Small enough for my child and leaves room decide him so he can place his favorite animals right beside his head! Great packaging and easy to clean.

This blanket wasn't quite as thick as I thought it would be, but it is still so soft!  I haven't washed it yet, but I can't wait to use it for my new baby in March!  I love the silky edges.  I got the chocolate color and it is gorgeous!  It's a great size too!  Bigger than I expected it to be.  I am a happy mama and I hope baby loves it as much as I do.

Love it, great tasting coffee, great price, my son loves it also. One of his new favorites. I love the Hawaiian coffees anyway, this is little milder but still rich tasting blend. I've re ordered this already. And will again.
I bought this for my wife because it is her favorite.  I was not a lemon tea person but after drinking this tea I because one.
great product!  used this once my newborn started wriggling her arms out of my other swaddled.  The Woombie really is wriggle proof!

I gave this to two dogs (Zoey and Halia). Zoey is the baby only two years old and eats anything, of course she loves them. But Halia is older and probably more picky, she didn't eat it. I think its a great product especially for the price since many dog treats can be outrageously expensive. I think in general most dogs would like it, but if your dog is a picky eater then it my be debatable. It's an added bonus to have some essential nutrients like Calcium and Phosphorous in the product. I really wish I could get Halia to eat them:(
I do love this coffee. I use the single brew pods at work (where I am now drinking a cup) and also at home!  Previously ordered "Buzzworthy," but changed after my daughter brought me these.

This rack is wonderful.  I am 7 months into using it and it has served its purpose.  It is the only one I have had so I cannot compare it to anything.  I used to pump 4 times a day on top of having bottle dishes and it held quit a bit!
Very tasty.  Sometimes some packages are a little dry, but overall very good.  We like this jerky because it isn't sweet, like most.

These stroller hooks have definitely been a lifesaver for me. They hold a ton of weight. I am able to throw at least 5-7 bags on each hook, which is a necessity because my diaper bag takes up the whole bottom of my stroller. So, I put my purse and my shopping bags on my swivel hooks. My only complaint is that they do fall off when I put my stroller in the car--this of course could be my fault as I am often in too big of a hurry to close the hooks. Overall, these hooks are definitely a necessity for every shopping mom.
Coffee is excellent. The K-Cup is different in that a filter is at the bottom and really provides a great taste. Set up a subscription and you can not beat the quality and price!

Delicious and much better for us than a candy bar.  We eat these only occassionally since it's not a super healthy choice.  But, it definitely tastes good and satisfies when you have a sweet tooth acting up.

Im a little disappointed that I can't throw these in the dryer, lol! Maybe all cotton sheets are that way. I've never purchased any before now. They seem durable and well made though,  which is important.  I'm just scared my husband will accidentally throw them in a hot dryer without realizing... my fingers are crossed!

So pretty and contemporarey. I have this bed set with espresso furniture, lilac walls and green tea carpeting. I was so happy when I found this set it really brought the room together especially with the walls and carpeting. Good quality too and impressive as I've gotten many compliments!

I chose this product, because it was on sale for cyber Monday! I liked the color! Even though I wasn't satisfied with the wheels for the stroller I'm still giving this a 5 star.  The wheels/rims are all made of plastic.
Pretty hot and very tasty. My husband loves hot sauce and this sauce is a new favorite. Well worth a try if you love to spice things up
The product itself was as advertised and cheaper than anywhere else. I just didn't care for the texture of the stuff made with the flour.
I can't believe zero calories and zero fat could taste so good!  I have been taking a travel pack with me when I go out to a restaurant... an easy way to stay on course on a diet!
This is an old time brand  of cookie from England.  It's similar to a graham cracker, but much better since it has the whole grain.  They go great with coffee or tea.

Great product, exactly as described. I used this with my essential oils to make some DIY products and it worked great. It doesn't smell like coconut, it just has an earthy scent to it. Would buy again.

The OXO Tot Dishwasher basket is great for keeping control of your infant and toddler bottle and cup accessories, including baby nipples, Sippy Cup straws and such that would otherwise get caught in the bottom of your dishwasher.  The product works as described and you'll save money by extending the life of bottles, nipples, etc.

I really like this coffee but,I'll be dammed if I'm going to pay $91.8 cents a cup
just to support GM's stock price.I hope whatever they're smoking over in corporate
is worth it..

Pros: it sits higher than Boppy and My Brest Friend (I have all 3 pillows).
The print is stylish.
It has these contours on the pillow, where baby fits.

Cons:
There's nothing securing the pillow to your body. The Boppy curves around you and you can use the ends to "clamp" it on t least one side of your waist. The first few days postpartum, still with a very round belly, this Balboa pillow would not stay put close to me. You'd have to be really skinny or wait until a few weeks postpartum to use it. Would be nice if they added a Velcro strap like My Brest Friend. Would be the perfect recombination of body fit and height.

All that said, I do use it while on the glider chair. I prop the sides up with blankets to "incline"/angle it a few degrees towards me, and nurse baby this way. I do always have the feeling it's going to slip away down my thighs.

Boppy is more adjustable precisely because it isn't as firm or tall, although you will have to also prop it up to nurse baby without straining your back leaning forward. My bottom line: there is no perfect nursing pillow yet (for me, at least), you'll have to experiment and see what fits your needs. Different pillows seem to fit different nursing situations: sitting in bed, on a recliner or glider chair, etc.
This is the second time I buy this brand of Honey Wedderspoon Raw Manuka Honey Active 12+ (500g), 17.6-Ounce Jar, it tastes nice and it's better quality than the honey bear brand.
The texture is strange, but It tastes good and keeps me awake and alert on days when I feel kind of sleepy.

I am very happy with this product, as well as with the Vegg Baking Mix and the cookbook.  It is the most "eggy" substitute that I have tried, both in taste and in consistency.  I have not had good luck with vegan crepes, but I made the ones out of the Vegg cookbook and they were "eggcellent"!  I have tried the Baking Mix in my homemade bread and English muffin recipes that call for eggs, and both have worked very well.  Great in tofu scramble, too.

These say they are for ages 3-6, but I think they're very small.  They fit my 2 1/2 year old perfectly, but are quite small for my almost 5 year old.  They are well made and have a wonderful replacement policy if they are lost or get broken, plus they're adorable.

I have just tried the double chocolate cookie. It will certainly satisfy a sweet tooth, tastes great and very much feels like a treat.

However, people could easily mislead the nutritional information and scoff the whole cookie thinking it is just 210 cals when that is only for half the cookie! To induldge in the whole cookie (which is what you want to do once you have opened it!) would be over 400 cals! I cannot justify that in my daily calorie count and I exercise...a lot! Each to their own of course, if you are extremely active or have it in place of a meal then its justified.

To half this cookie, it is actually quite crumbly so its not always a clean cut.

I think it needs to be hightlighted that the nutritional information for the cookies and the brownies is for half the contents of the packet!

Overall great taste but would be better packaged into a relaistic calorie intake (of half the size!).
They had a chemical smell to them when I opened them.  I was too nervous to try them out, so I tossed them and bought some from a different supplier.

I have now used these bottles with 2 children (the first time 17 years ago and am using them again with my 5 month old) and they work wonderfully. I recently decided to buy the Dr. Brown's because I had heard that the venting system was great. What I found, however, is that Dr. Brown's glass bottles use a plastic straw made from potentially hazardous materials so we returned those right away. Evenflo glass bottles are easy to clean with no small peices that require special cleaning tools. They also don't get scratched up like plastic. They are sturdy (we dropped one and it rolled under the car without breaking.)

I do not use the standard nipples because I have always preferred Gerber Nuk but the batch of these I ordered did come with silicone nipples.

In her constant search for the next to keep her amused, we bought this exersaucer for our six month old daughter.  At first, she simply enjoyed the sensation of \\"standing\\" upright.  Now that she has two teeth appearing, she is really enjoying bending the flower and hat mirrors towards her to chew on them.  She is also getting much more stability in her legs as a result of this toy. I anticipate the stacking, spinning and sorting toys will appeal to her in the future.     Some of the early reviews about the legs had me worried - we decided to try it anyhow and we're glad we did.  It is slightly challenging to put the legs together, but not much more than any infant / toddler toy.  All in all, this is definitely worth it.  I highly recommend it if you're looking for an exersaucer for a girl.
I used to love Reeses...now I only kinda like Reeses because they just don't compare.
i love the dark chocolate, and nuts.  THis is the best combination.  I have this as my breakfast in the morning.
My 12 month old really likes these cups!  I like that they don't have several parts and are spill proof!  I would recommend these for children 6 months - 16 months.

I really want a Kinder Egg, but I decided I'd settle for a bar if I had to. I ordered these and they arrived in less than a week. They are delicious! They're very smooth and creamy. I'm glad I tried them. They're small (the perfect size for a little snack after lunch), so I think I'll have to order another box soon.

I decided to give this little guy a try since my baby (10 weeks old) falls asleep very well, but wakes up very easily. I was hoping this little sheep could help my baby stay in sleep mode, and so far so good! Now when I get her out of the car (still in her car seat) and move her into the house, the white noise of the sheep has seemed to help her keep on sleeping - obviously a very good thing for any new mom.

We also love this sheep because:
- plush, cute, and soft!
- easily attaches to her car seat, stroller, or crib
- since baby still sleeps in a basinet next to our bed we've been enjoying the white noise as well
- the sound machine is removable for easy cleaning of the sheep, or sheep can become a cuddle toy
- volume control is lovely
- there are several good sound choices, you can find what works for your baby, for ours it's the stream
- the timer means better battery life

I have a feeling the sleep sheep is going to be a part of our family for quite a while! I definitely recommend this for any family with an infant. Additionally, this would be a fantastic baby shower gift!

Love 'em Love 'em Love 'em
I was at a 100th birthday party, and the birthday girl received these as her gift a few years back. She shared some with me and I was hooked. I took a picture of the package so I might one day get some for myself. It wasn't easy, but I finally found the brand name Truffettes de France truffles. Thanks Chocmod!
The plants are good but not as expected I was thinking on a green plant and it is more an aquatic brown plant
THIS IS NOT SAFE AND ITS ALSO ILLEGAL TO USE!! DO NOT BUY!! AMAZON, PLEASE REMOVE THESE!

Scottish oats are fine, I just like rolled and steel cut oats better. These taste the same as steel cut, but have a gummier, less crunchy texture. They're like the instant oats of the steel cut world.

Quality is tip top, I'd buy from Bob's Red Mill again.

Since my cat loves to go outside, but also loves to run away and jump fences this product was a must get. I got the large, and my cat isnâ€™t very big, and yet the harness is still kind of tight (even being as adjusted as possible). My cat was able to walk for the most part considering he wasnâ€™t used to having something around his body. However after much practice he was able to walk normally.
**Helpful Tip** if you are going to be walking your cat near cars I would wait on it. My cat was terrified when a car would drive by in my neighborhood. But after he got used to it he didnâ€™t get scared as much. I would suggest walking your cat in a park, or practice at night when there are less cars going around.

I put these in my daughter's plastic tub because she kept slipping when she was a baby.  These solved the problem.  Now that she is too big for the baby tub, I removed them and placed them in our regular bath and they still work.
I love this product and was pleased to find a case available for a better price that I could get at the grocery store.  Shipped  promptly.
This flavor is better than The mango Lime  Unfortunately I had bought 24 of those,  Regardless the flavor, this energy drink does provide energy pretty fast and it last for many hours.

I first started bathing our daughter in the tub without one of these but realized that was killing me. So I bought this for myself a few months back and fell in love. When I bath her anywhere else I am just dying that I know have my kneeler. I actually bought this one for a friend for a shower. I told them they were going to love it. I will have to check back with them in a few months and see if I was right.
Always like The Root Beer candy.  Came on time and as always is loaded with flavor.
love to know i have plenty of peppercorn in stock/ tired of looking to them at the grocery store now I have several/  thanks
i can use the same amount of water to heat the same bottle with the same amount of milk in it and get a different result every time. however it does heat milk evenly.
I have always enjoyed Lapsang Souchong loose tea. My normal brand (Twinnings)no longer carries the Lapsang Souchong in loose form, so I decided to try this. A very good cup of tea.
These are so nice on baby nails!  Easy to use and they are super sharp so clipping is a breeze.  Knock on wood  because I haven't draw blood with them yet and my baby is almost 5 months old!

I love these cappuccinos, they're rich and creamy and don't require any sugar or creamer.  The hazelnut is really nutty and delicious.  It's great having a k cup that you don't have to worry about adding cream/sugar too. Perfect for me!
I wish i thought of this! Perfect for baby to have something to hold, esp in the first months when they get startled & jump easily!
Perfect for make your own I use this to make "paleo/bulletproof" chocolate and it's perfect. Nice flavor good packaging.
Wonderful assortment of flavors!! It was a big treat for my fiancÃ©e. He loved it!!! It also came very well packed. And delivery was fast
I LOVE this blanket!  The colors are bright and beautiful.  The blanket is so soft as well.  I can't wait to use this in her nursery!
my shipment came a day early. everything that i needed ws in this medela bag. it works wonders giving me my milk in half  of the time as the evenflo one i purchased before!
Use this every day for Dr Brown's bottle pieces, pacifiers, and pretty much any other small baby paraphenalia that needs to be washed.

I bought this to travel with as my son is allergic to dairy and needs something to eat his cereal with. I agree with the other reviewer that it does not have the protein( only 2 gms) and calcium( 8%) to compare with milk or soy milk so it would not be a good idea to drink it all the time in place of soy milk. But it makes for a great travel drink given the restrictions in carrying liquids aboard planes. It mixes easily in cold water and tastes fantastic. Yes, it does taste better than 2% milk.   I figure it is better than nothing for trips to places which don't stock soy milk.
Awesome flowers at an amazing price! I wish weekend shipping was an option. I'm definitely satisfied nonetheless!

I'm not sure if the product I received and am reviewing is the same as others have talked about, but I found this SQUEEZ'EMS to be great for carrying a cold beverage. I used it for myself, but was comfortable enough with my 7 year old nephew carrying it as well. The top is not one that you pull off. It unscrews, and securely fits on the pouch. It is easy to fill, and I had no problems with leaks, even when my frozen juice began to unthaw.

Again, reading through some of the reviews I wonder if this product has been revamped and the more negative reviews are part of the first version of the pouch. Either way, my experience has been nothing but great.

This is an excellent product, the bag is a little strange at first, but the product is very fresh & re-seals very well. I've got most of my family switched over now!!!  You get a lot of product for your money. I will be ordering this again for sure but I've still got half a bag!!

Not what I would classify as \\"premium\\".  These beans are very shriveled and small.  Not what I was expecting.  I will attempt to use them to make my vanilla, but I will not order from this company in the future. I sure wish I had read all of the reviews.  I could saved some money.

McCormick cinnamon is actually cassia. daily use can be toxic. almost all USA cinnamon is cassia so if you take it daily for health purposes you are wasting your money and can actually be harming your body.
the first time I tried this tea was in a little in the Belgian province called Jesuseke...it was awesome. so good, I look everywhere until I could get it shipped to my home

I'm disappointed that they couldn't have put real dried blueberries in this \\"Blueberry\\" Pancake Mix. It has imitation blueberry pieces which are made of: dextrose, fractionated palm kernel oil, enriched flour [wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamin mononitrate, riboflavin, folic acid], citric acid, cellulose gum, maltodextrin, artificial flavor, red 40, blue 1, blue 2).

Seems like real blueberries would be simpler and healthier. On the label on the front of the box under the big word \\"Blueberry\\" they say \\"With Imitation Blueberries\\". Non-the-less, it tastes pretty good and they look like blueberries. So, in this day and age of imitation everything, they did well. If it looks like a duck & quacks like a duck.....
This tasted good, but I don't know if I would buy this many of one flavor again.  I tend to get tired of one flavor before it is all used up.

I have ordered these for my two kids and also given them as gifts. I love that they are durable and can be switched around from bottles to cups! When my kids started daycare I always got asked where I got these, as the staff didn't have to keep relabeling my kid's bottles. Cool and worth it for the price!
These are the only olives with pimentos I have found that are not mushy. They are firm and plump and taste great. I don't really taste the vermouth. You will still need to add vermouth.
I am very pleased with my purchase of the French roast coffee.  It has a nice delicious rich flavor.  Looking forward to my next cup.

I love my Galaxy babyletto cover.  The top is plush and is made of a poly/cotton blend.  So, it's great and easy to clean.  It's soft to the touch.  It's also really sturdy with the piping all around the cover.  Also, I love that the print is around the sides because it matches the rest of my nursery.  The cover totally blows the other changing pad covers I own out of the water.

I have already owned two of these Levana models [[ASIN:B001FB567U Levana BABYVIEW20 Interference-Free Digital Wireless Video Baby Monitor with Night Light Lullaby Camera]] and was rather pleased. I found the second one I acquired (after 2 years of use and abuse of the first one) was less disruptive to my wi-fi.

Anywho, I wanted to give this even FANCIER model a go.

Like:
~The camera is on a stand that allows for MUCH easier positioning.
~WALKY TALKY...wish that had been around when my little guy was first born.
~Temp reading of the room
~Even less disruptive to Wifi

Same (but like):
~Voice (vox) activated... though this one you can adjust the sensitivity for the sounds it reacts to
~Lullaby option
~Night light

Not so much:
~While the picture quality is good, it's a touch more grainy and jerky, in my opinion.
~I don't like having to go into a menu to turn the VOX option on/off

Overall, the improvements are worth upgrading to this model. If nothing else, having the option to 'talk' back into baby's room and tell them you're coming would have helped with my stress at times when I was delayed in getting to the room.

This product worked well for the couple times we were able to use it.   Since our tub faucet was more square than round, it took a bit of work to fit it so that it wouldn't leak. We could live with that, however, since it was a nice low-powered shower for the baby and the temperature-sensitive cheeks were easily understood.    Unfortunately, it only worked for a few baths before the hose went from kinking all over to just collapsing on itself and not allowing water to pass through anymore. Once this happened, we had to stop using it entirely.

As new parents we have learned that waterproof liners on cribs are essential.  We use them all the time and often put layers of sheets in between and then add another one of these in case we have to strip the bed in the middle of the night.  These liners have been very handy and we love them!

I bought these because my toddler won't let me brush her teeth with a regular tooth brush.  WIth these wipes, I can get in there quickly and get her teeth clean.  She does still think it's funny to bite my finger (hard!) when I'm doing her molars, but at least I know they're getting cleaned.  With the wipes, she can't clamp her mouth shut or steal the tooth brush from me so it's not a huge battle.
This stroller has far exceeded my expectations. I have used it for both walking and running and it pushes like a breeze. I would highly recommend this stroller and would absolutely buy it again.

I went gluten free about 4 months ago. I LOVE ramen and well ramen has gluten in it, so I couldn't have it. Came across this at whole foods decided to try it. It is fabulous, the texture is spot on to ramen. It cooks in 4 mins so its good for a quick lunch or dinner. Add some chicken, tofu or veggies or maybe an egg!

Bon appetit!
Expensive for 1 oz but I understand it's ceremonial. Already switch to culinary one. 4 stars I would go for it
It was a gift for my brother's new grandchild. They sad they love it and it is great and picture and sound are excellent.
Not what I expected. I my opinion there is no substitute for fresh garlic juice.
I got this for my daughter it is so cute but the vibration sucks!! It went out after only 2 times using I feel this was a waste of money even new batteries didn't help music works but not vibration
Avent makes a wonderful product.  Leak proof, closest to breast nipple easy to clean.  Wish bottles were thinner and taller though instead of so huge and wide.

Well it doesn't exactly have the same amount of sugar as the gum you see on TV so naturally it doesn't last as long. Tastes best the first 5 min & then it's a mild minty flavor at best for the rest of the duration you chomp on this for. I got it for the xylitol & health benefits they say it contains.
Great product. This is a must have for everyone with a little one.  Works great in the car seat and stroller!

I just got my order and I think it's just ok.  I got 50 different K-Cups, sure.  I was hoping to get a good mix of coffee, tea, cocoa and maybe an apple cider.  I was secretly hoping for a brew over ice variety, as well.  No such luck.  I got mostly coffee and a few teas.  Some of the coffees were sort of doubles, even though not technically.  By that I mean that I would get a french vanilla and a french vanilla decaf.  So, there were at least 5 flavors that I got with a decaf of the same flavor.  My biggest issue with these is the expiration dates.  My K-Cups had expiration dates ranging from 3 months ago to 1/2013.  In fact, my batch had 5 expired K-Cups.  The expiration dates for them were early February, so that's not even close to being good.  I wasn't too happy to find that 10% of my order was expired.  Perhaps this is just a fluke or perhaps I'm the only one who wrote a review that checked the expiration dates on every single K-Cup received.  I may try this again in a few months to see if I get the same result.  If I do, I'll add an update to this review.
I like this coconut oil but wish they'd consider a glass container for easy heating to liquify the oil.  Works as well as any oils I've purchased in the past and I do like the small containers.
Since my last purchase, the fruitcake seems to have more fruit and less nuts and cake. I wish it would have more nuts and cake and less fruit.

I got his car seat for my 10 month old and am so happy I did!  This car seat is so easy to install - even rear facing -  and you're able to get it very snug, without ANY movement.  I also like the fact that it comes with the shoulder straps so it doesn't dig into his neck.  The color is great and I love the material - it's a surface that you can wipe clean which is a huge bonus.  Even though it's a seat that you have to re-thread the straps, it's super easy to do.  I thought that was going to be the downfall,  but it's really no bother at all.  Love love love this seat!
so far everything order has been as described and what I expected. Nothing has arrived undamaged or late. I will just repeat this message for each item. All has been great.

These taste much like the Nongshim Spicy bowls minus the spice.  Much better flavor than the Nissin bowls I have tried.  Add a little Sriracha and you have a great quick lunch with in my opinion better flavor than the Spicy Nongshims.  The bowl itself is pretty solid and won't crumble and pour hot soup all over your hands when you remove it from the microwave.

My baby girl loves this. I don't put her in much - only because we're following the attachment parenting style and prefer to baby wear - but in reality there are times I need to put her down and this is great. She's comfortable, it rocks gently (unlike the terrifying FP snugglebunny swing we have which caused her to vomit!), plus its portable and folds easy.

I like that the buttons to open it don't have to be pressed at the same time. I can press one, then the other without the first one locking again. This is crucial because when I want to put my daughter in it I have her in my arms and only have one hand to work with.

The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I wish it came with a mobile for some stimulation if she's not sleeping. Other than that its perfect!
I just got back home from vacation in Costa Rica. We ate so much ceviche while we were there. I decided to start making my own. It's fantastic. The combonation of the spices was spot on!

I bought [[ASIN:B000I2OKEW Lamaze Patty the Panda]] and [[ASIN:B000I2MRLK Lamaze Jacques the Peacock]] in addition to [[ASIN:B000I2MRLU Lamaze Mortimer the Moose]]. My 4-month old is interested in all of her Lamaze toys, but if you are only going to buy one, I definitely recommend the moose. My baby is fascinated by the moose, he has a soft body, rubber antlers and his feet dangle, with brightly colored ends and bells.
Just like everyone else the bib looks great when it arrives, but on the first wash in cold water the decal came off.
This black tea is the best k cup tea I have found to date. It tastes like tea should and I enjoy drinking it. I recommend this tea.

I bought this hat because I needed a warm enough hat for my soon to come newborn baby and because I am living in a very cold and snowy area it is a must have. I did try to find all kind of warm hats but this is the only one that kept coming up on my searches as a good enough, warm, and nice hat. There is not a lot of selection out there but this is good enough.
I keep this lip balm with me all the time.  Love that it naturally keeps my lips soft and smooth.
I usually use liquid creamer in my coffee (no sugar) but this was so sweet I did not add anything after the first time.

That's the worst item i have ever bought!
Was already broken all within 1 month of use.
Waste of money!

I am glad to find this still online and hope they aren't discontinuing the product.
Local stores are not carrying it anymore as of recently.
This is the best spice mix I have ever seen from a bottle.
We use it as a base for other mixtures, straight up on many foods,
and grind it down to powder for other applications.
It is versatile and flavorful, almost any herbs can be added to it
for a more diversified range of flavors.
Simply an excellent product.
these are my favorite dark chocolate candy bars.  Can't find these any cheaper than to buy them in bulk. Thank you, Amazon...  The dark chocolate is the ultimate..
Fits perfect in graco travel pack and play bassinet. I use a regular changing pad cover as the sheet. Fits perfect. I even put a small rolled towel under mattress to give incline .perfect

Toy was fun to play with wish it had come with some kind of instructions as to how to fold the wings but after some trail and error we figured it out ,good thing it was a 12 pack because after some playing the wings chipped ( we could still play it just became a little scary to catch ) the light wad bright and fun to launch at night . Over all very happy

Washed and dried beautifully.  Definitely worth the extra ten dollars.(don't get the Pinzon brand)  And in case you are wondering the design on the two middle blankets are paper airplanes and Super Dogs with caps. Very Cute.
Have used this product for years with catnip for gallbladder flares.  Want to NEVER be without it for those times I get into toooo much fat.

I have been buying and enjoying lakerol original for about 20 years.They have been sweetened with xylitol,which I liked.
Sadly the company has changed the formulation,and it now contains stevia,which is not something I am happy about.
I won't be buying this anymore(but will keep checking to see if they return to the original formula!)
I love the salty taste and the brine.  It makes an awesome dirty martini. If you love anchovies, you will love this product.

I don't understand why not more people are complaining about this, but the volume on this monitor is really low! I've seen some other reviews that are saying the same thing, but it seems most people aren't bothered by it!? Maybe we did something wrong and should have placed the baby unit differently or done something differently on the parent unit - but I tried all kind of different constellations and locations and it didn't seem to make a difference. We were without a monitor for a while until we got this one and during that time we had to listen out for our baby when we were in the living room at night. That worked ok, but I preferred using a monitor just to make sure we'd hear him even if the tv or dishwasher was on. But when we turned this one on it make NO difference at all! The noise we heard on our own, by listen out for him across the hallway was pretty much as loud as what came out of the baby monitor! I'm sure the reception and other features are great and it seems like a good quality monitor - but all that seems pretty pointless if you still can't hear your baby! I returned it for a Graco monitor that didn't have as many good reviews - but I can hear my baby on it!
are really good has great hot after taste you will need water later very hot bring tears to your eyes
Very tasty, kinda hard to judge how much to put in, just add more water.  Everybody drink more tea. love it.

I HIGHLY RECOMMEND COCONUT OIL! I just cant imagine life without it. I love using it as a natural lotion. Let me tell you my skin has never looked more radiant in my life. It taste amazing in my protein and banana smoothies. It Give's your metabolism a extra boost. The benefits are endless and don't forget your pets! My dogs LOVE there coconut oil as well. Thy get about two tablespoon a day. One's 60lbs and my BIG BOY is 120lbs he could have more but I need to mind his calorie intake. I rub there coats down to keep them shiny and there skin moisturized. I use it on cuts, hot spots, cracked or ruff paws. Its perfect for a carrier oil adding a few drops of lavender oil to about one cup coconut oil. Depending on how strong your pup likes the lavender scent \\"start slow\\" its not for every dog. Ill put it in a small mason jar for both me and my pups to use as lotion.

I started buying Eight O'Clock Coffee five years ago because it was the cheapest whole-bean coffee I could find in the supermarket. Surprisingly, despite its lower price, it is also one of the top quality choices on the shelf. It offers a smooth, light roast flavor that I prefer to the darker roasts found in the more expensive Starbucks and Peet's Coffee brands. I have brewed my coffee via French press, AeroPress, and drip coffee maker over the past few years, and this is the variety I prefer. It's great coffee at a great price.

This product is good When drinking before or after meals. Most people can not handle drinking it with water but I have found that warming water and drinking it like hot tea makes it more tolerable. Keeps your digestion regular. Energy is boosted slightly. Helps with acid reflux.

We received this swing for a shower gift and our daughter is quite content in it.  In fact - she will only nap during the day in it!  The material is soft and snuggly and the music and sounds are great.  I love that I don't have to worry about batteries as it just plugs right into the wall.  The only thing I dislike about it is that from time-to-time it has a slight squeak and I'm anxious that the motor is wearing out already.  We've really only used it a month.  I will update if it does.

We own an orange ultralight for home, and a regular weight red one for one Grandma's house and a regular weight orange one for another Grandma's house.  I love the narrow design and it's perfect for walking in malls, zoos, community pools, National Mall and museums, Disneyland, Six Flags, to parks, etc.  It might be more cumbersome to take along on flights, hence we have 3, but it really is great for everything. I always get stopped by folks asking what kind of stroller it is. If you have two kids, this is one of the best double strollers out there.

I bought this as a present for my daughter who is a culinary student.  She is thrilled, although we haven't used it yet.  The product was complete and as pictured.  We just took some time to find a place to get the torch filled with the proper fuel.

Nice strong flavor. Similar to black teas I've purchased from Teavana but much, much more affordable. I use four heaping teaspoons in my Teavana Perfectea Maker and can get two good, large mugs (20-24 oz. each time) out of it. I will definitely purchase tea from Coffee Bean Direct again.

My wife and I decided to read the reviews on these pumps because she says they are a life saver.  We were astonished at the number of bad reviews on here.  These pumps are extremely simple to use and very effective.  Of course they aren't like the hospital grade pumps like others have noted, but they cost a FRACTION of the price.  To poo poo these pumps is quite shocking unless perhaps you had a malfunctioning unit.  They are simple, cheap, effective, adjustable, and probably a bit noisier than others, but for the price, we don't think there is a better option.  Evenflo has done right with this product.  They even have the option to operate on batteries or plugged into the wall.  The kit comes with bottles, pumps, adapters, extra parts, two ice packs, carryng case, and a thermal storage bag for traveling.  What more could one ask for at $55?

He stares at the pictures, gums it, turns the pages, and plays w the crinkle flaps.  And I can hook the book onto his car seat or stroller w those big plastic baby links (through the the loop on the spine of the book) and keep him happy when out on errands and long car rides to Grammy and Grandads.
It's not as good as the real young coconut water but is very good  and as close as it gets to the real taste.

My son loves to eat bananas in this. There is a plastic center which is part of the handle and it makes the amount you can put in much less. I have to fill it twice before he can get full. Not convenient but he still loves it

I found Pamela's Baking Mix on Amazon and was so excited because it is much cheaper than at my health food stores. Our daughter was recently diagnosed with a Gluten allergy and buying gluten free bread is ridiculously expensive. We tried other recipes for bread, but they were only so-so. This mix makes a delicious bread that tastes like fresh homemade regular bread! And most importantly? Our daughter loves it, too!
My son is 6months old and LOVES this toy. He like to chew on his blankets so I thought this would be perfect. He squeals and gets very excited when he sees this little alligator toy! Great buy!

I have used this product before to enhance gravies and gumbo.  I usually make my own roux first with a healthy oil and sometimes will add a small amount of this roux for taste. It is a better tasting roux because of the fat content of the oil used to prepare the product.  This jar was delivered as a gift to a friend in Texas who will be making her first seafood gumbo using my recipe.
These are just amazing - everyone I have given these to as stocking stuffers just raves about the flavor, etc.  Irresistable.

I had this jumparoo for my little man and it was the greatest thing that we had for him! I bought one for two of my grandsons! We tried several for our little guy and they did not come close to being as awesome as this one! Being a Mom and a Grandma, I can say that this is my favorite item for any little one!

My son love camo and airplanes so when i found this bedding set i knew he would like it.He loves it!It's very soft.He carries his pillow around the house and tries to carry his blanket but it is to big for him and mom ends up getting it for him.He wants to sleep with his planes every night.Good price to.I was going to get the pink set for my daughter but it cost $30more.Why is that?

Using my zojirushi rice cooker on quick cook with one cup of oats and 2.5 cups of water, yields enough for myself and wifes' breakfast. Seems ever so slightly mushier than the long cooking steel cut from Bob's but is barely perceptible and cooks considerable time off of cooking. With fresh raspberries, maple syrup and little milk, with that pinch of salt while cooking, it is sure to please if you are an oatmeal lover.

Y'all, these are the very best cheese straws I have ever had, and as a 15th generation southerner (and self-proclaimed cheese straw connoisseur/avid baker), I know a little something about cheese straws. Ginny O's cheese straws are better than my mama's cheese straws, both of my grandmothers' cheese straws, and even my own cheese straws- combined. They taste like the most delicious homemade cheese straws you could ever imagine, only better. They are airy and crispy while at the same time rich and buttery, with just enough spice to give them a kick without being too hot. My mouth is watering just thinking about them! They are a great gift and make a delicious and easy party appetizer- just be sure to have plenty on hand, since your guests will gobble them up as fast as you can put them out! These things are worth their weight in gold. Seriously. Be sure to order 2 boxes, you won't be disappointed (until they run out).

I love this thing. Originally I was debating between two different (much more expensive) mini cribs, since our fourth baby was going to be sharing our room. But then money was tighter than we expected and I sent my husband on a Target run to buy this bassinet while I was literally still in the hospital.

I like the modern design, it's very similar to another bassinet that costs around 2.5 times as much. It's easy to take down and assemble, and I love that all of the pieces fit neatly in the tote bag, with room to spare for any bedding we want to bring with us. It's much less bulky and heavy than a folded pack n play.

I'm not sure if Chicco makes a sheet for this or if other bassinet sheets work, but we've just been tightly tucking an aden and Anais swaddle around the mattress and it works great.

I have to address a couple of the negative reviews, the mattress cover absolutely is waterproof. Never had an issue with anything leaking through to the actual padding. Every week or two I take the cover off to wash it because it does show "stains" from my son drooling and spitting up, but the mattress underneath is fine.

Also, it's firm because little babies are supposed to sleep on a firm surface for safety reasons, but I wouldn't say that it's hard or uncomfortable. I guess I wouldn't know firsthand but my almost four month old has always slept well in it.

I would also like to note that it's roomier than I expected. It's a good compact size for hotel rooms and smaller bedrooms, but I can tell we're not going to have any issue with him outgrowing it any time soon.
Packaging was awful. The mat was bent in wrong places leaving marks on it. The color is not like the picture (baby green), it's more like bright green. The mat itself works fine.
Exact same stuff as In the restruant. It's good stuff. May be a little pricy.  I'm sure some people would just choose to steal it. But if you are a law abiding citizen, this is a good option for you.
My husband enjoys this coffee, he finds it bold and a great cup of coffee. I will be ordering more.
Just 2 or 3 gives you the shot of choc heaven you need for a pick-me-up.  Would buy it again, but the multi pack is going to last me awhile.

These Cookies are the best darn cookies I've ever had, unfortunately this deal would mean you get 12 packs for 36 $, thats 3 dollars a pack. I originally bought one pack in a store for two bucks, so these are a little bit pricey. But these cookies are so worth it. You have not had a cookie until you've had a little dutch maid lemon creme cookie, screw your Doritos and your mountain dew, these cookies are MLG, these and eggnog provide a cheap and effective MLG meal that will keep you energized for countless hours of gaming, and because they are not covered in  flavor powder, that means that you don't get your gaming controller all nasty, these are nice yummy easy to eat cookies that send a load of happiness and satisfaction to your brain as you are shreking Newbs in a 1v1 call of dewty game or battlefield. These cookies are also extremely sophisticated as each has a beautiful doily design, so they're fancy, cheap, and making you better at video games, like I want some of these right now and I am gonna order like 3 million packages, these are so MMNMMNMMM YUUMMMYYY. So fresh and delicious. These cookies are also Illuminati by the way due to the fact that they come in a pack of 36 which is divisible by 3  equaling 12, which can be divided by 3 once more, leaving one number, 4. 4 minus 3 equals one, so the numbers 3 and one show up in the problem. one eye and three sides of a triangle, coincidence? I think NOT! BUY THESE COOKIES< YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!!!!
Not too spicy. Wonderful blend of seasonings.  A little will last me a long time. Would buy again. Takes the place of several spices.

Wish the sign were just a little bit bigger. Does not obscure back window so that might be the trade off. Still feel they could have made it a tad bigger. Hoping the suction cup stays strong for a long time.

My back windows are tinted so depending on the time of day the sign can be hard to see.

I found these pretzels originally when I started eating a primarily gluten-free diet.  They taste great!  I had been getting them from my grocery store, but they are rather expensive, so I was thrilled to find them on Amazon for a less expensive price and I was able to get them for even less when I got them on auto-ship.  These pretzels are my main snack food and even my family loves them.  I would highly recommend them.

We were sent these to review and they taste like straight cacao beans to me, earthy and full of cacao goodness. Because I don't do much caffeine, I passed them onto a friend and here's what she has to say...

These little morsels are a treat! I made the most delicious banana ice cream and I sprinkled them over top! So delicious and I'm excited to add them to more healthy recipes!
I have ordered these bars for months and they are great for traveling. Unfortunately they have now discontinued the caramel bars which are my favorite!!!!
Better than any sticks Ive had from a shop. very meaty, no gristle and taste great.

Very good. A great snack. Sweet. It's hard to stop eating these.

Being Amazon requires at least 20 words. I'll also add my drawback. A little less sweetning would make these better for some folks.

After doing hours of research we chose this brand formula for our infant son after nursing just didn't work out. We started off with the regular dairy formula and he was badly constipated on it, so we switched to the lactorelief, and it has been amazing. He is not constipated at all and tolerates it very well. Also, the price on Amazon is unbeatable. You can't get it this cheap from the maker, and it is actually cheaper than some of the big name formulas that are chocked full of who knows what...
Lastly, the shipping from this company is super fast. We order a 6 pack every two weeks (a six pack actually last three weeks for us tho) and it's always delivered within three days, even tho it's not prime shipping. I can't say enough good things about the formula or the company that sells it. We love it.

According to the hype on the bag as well as the nutrition information, this whole grain is quite healthy. I've been eating it for breakfast almost every day for several months, and it seems to get me off to a good start. Since the millet itself doesn't have much flavor, I fill a large bowl with 95% millet, and 5% granola sprinkled on top (plus some ground flax seed); I then add milk. I get granola with each bite, and it makes the whole bowl really quite tasty, without being overwhelmingly sweet.

It's cheap, healthy and filling. Just make sure you have plenty of pantry space, as you get twelve large bags with this order.

This thermometer is quick and accurate but SO NOT USER FRIENDLY.  There are a million settings and I still can't figure out how to toggle from ear temperature to forehead.  The directions for a thermometer should not be complicated.  Even though it works quickly I would NOT recommend this thermometer.

I am not using this for cooking.  I have citrus trees and fruit trees and vegetables.  I use organic plant foods and manures.  The local cats, possums, raccoons, other critters(?)  tend to dig through and eat this.  So now I sprinkle a thin coating of cayenne pepper over the application of plant food, and so far this deters them.

First let me start by saying that I'm a coffee addict and have tried several different k-cup brands. I was looking for a brand of coffee for use in my Keurig brewer. I figured if I'm going to spend the extra money on single use cups they better be worth it. Well these are totally worth the price and in my opinion the flavor holds true even for a larger cup with a few tricks. I have found that when brewing a large 16 oz. cup the coffee lacks a bit of potency when it comes to the overall flavor. Instead of pressing the cup size I just press the 10 oz. cup on the first brew and then to the same cup & k-cup I run a second brew for 6 ounces of water. In doing so, Millstone hazelnut cream is the perfect cup of coffee that doesn't taste watered down as do some similar brands. This flavor is amazing, and most importantly doesn't taste artificial and overly sweet. I drink mine with only a touch of milk in effort to not diminish it's flavor. Yes, Millstone k-cups are a bit more expensive than other brands but if you want to actually ENJOY your coffee this is your brand. Highly recommended! Just a side note, this is a medium roast coffee, NOT bold (which refers to the amount of coffee in the k-cup) so if you like your coffee on the stronger side just add less milk after brewing. Happy brewing!

I bought this monitor less than 2 months ago and was very pleased with it up until a couple of nights ago when i woke up and noticed it was no longer on! The battery doesn't last very long so we have to keep it plugged up while we sleep. We had it plugged up as always and it still managed to die. After recharging it we noticed that there is a short where the charger plugs in at! I found out about the 1 year warranty through the Levana site so I am going to try and get it replaced.

Other than that, the camera works better than I imagined, the sound is great and there is no outside static or no problems with picking up cell phone conversations like I've heard about some of the competitors. Another thing is the temperature. The temperature feature only works when the camera is not charging. When the camera is on the charger the temperature reads 80 degrees the whole time. The batteries in the camera didn't last long either so we keep it plugged up as well.

One of my favorite features is the alert system. If the camera is not plugged up and dies, the monitor will beep until you turn it off so you know that the camera is no longer on! The voice activation and motion censor works well also.

Overall, I would still recommend this product, but we will see what I say once I get the second monitor. Hopefully this wont happen every time.

It has now been a while since i recieved my replacement and so far so good! I have since bought an additional camera which works well. The only problem i now have is the auto-switch feature between the cameras shuts off on its own. I'm not sure if that is the plan or a glitch though. I do not want to go through reordering another though so i manage. also shipping was a lot faster than anticipated through the Levana website, and great customer service too!

as good as any i have ever eaten. Well packages. small but that is the type. have ot place in a large gar for storage. A little olive oil on top and they keep a long time. very good overall and have already reordered.

I received this as a sample from Smiley 360. I had high hopes and expectations from it because it was from a well known brand, Mucinex. I used it on myself and my seven year old daughter and it did not work at all. The day after I felt terrible and my daughter's nose never cleared. Kind of disappointed.
I first tried this in Columbia and loved it.  I was so excited Amazon had them.  Nice smooth chocolate with the hint of expresso.

This Matcha is of great quality, if you have not had Matcha before, or if
you do not want to spend alot of money on the more expensive brands such as
Domatcha, which is one of the best!

The difference in Matchas besides the telling prices, will be the viscosity,
the texture,the nature of its froth and the color. The color should be a very
bright green, and this tea is. This tea, however will not froth very thick after
the pack has been opened and placed in the refrigerator after about two-weeks.
Other very high quality Matchas will keep that capability, due to the inherent
quality of the Matcha itself.

This tea is smooth,and taste very good. If you can't endure the wait of ordering from
Japan, or the price of other Matchas, you will not be dissapointed with this tea. You
also need a bamboo whisk; there is no escaping this necessity! The whisk seperates this
tea evenly within the water, and makes it blend with blue-berry and Pomegranate Juice, which
is what I mix it with, topped off with a Mt.Dew or a little Sprite. Yummy! I love Matcha;
I drink it everyday and hate when I run out. It's good for arthritis,detoxifying the body,
giving you energy and inhibiting depression or stress.

Enjoy.
Author Tamara H.Boman

I purchased the Diono Radian RXT Convertible Car Seat after talking with other mom friends about theirs. Everyone seems to love it. I have an SUV and a much smaller car so initially I actually purchased a different brand for it's space saving ability and really, REALLY hated it (it was a Maxi Cosi Pria) because it was incredibly hard to use. After returning that one and getting the Diono I could immediately see why everyone likes this car seat so much. It was really easy to install (didn't make me sweaty and mad), easy to adjust, and easy to use. Tightening and loosening the harness is a breeze - which sounds really insignificant until you have a bad experience with a different brand. Bonus - my child seems to like it(she's almost 1, so she hasn't told me directly)!

As for the smaller car issue, I think that with the wedge this carseat takes up about the same amount of space as our Chicco Keyfit 30, so the smaller car should be able to handle this car seat as well. I haven't tried it out because the Diono is heavy and I haven't had the need to transfer it between cars. I will update my review once we try it out in the smaller vehicle.
comming from germany I always try to find some food what reminds me of home,  Mestemacher bread is just wonderfull and healthy.
These taste great and are easy to prepare, but they sell for $2.19 at my local asian grocery store

I very much enjoy this variety of rices & couscous. Excellent quality & taste. These will be a staple in my kitchen! I like them all but my favorite is the brown & red rice mix. I recently made a dish with the brown & red rice mix that was out of this world delicious. Good stuff!
I gave this as a gift to my mother, and she enjoyed seeing some candy she has not seen in years.

These are great rock candy sticks, large size, good quality and taste.  I know some have said they are on the small size, but the ones I received measure at least 4 inches (the candy part, not including the stick) and are exactly what I expected.
my Friends best, she always drinks this when visiting me, I have to keep it coming.

My wife is English so she is particular about what tea she drinks. The best endorsement I can give is that we just ordered another four boxes of this decaffeinated tea and will be ordering more when those are gone. We order it from Amazon because we can't seem to get it in our local markets.

My 2 yr old loves these crackers, however, he won't eat them everyday. I was a little worried to purchase these in such a large quantity but couldn't pass up the great price on amazon. I received them in November 2010 and they expire in May 2011 which will be enough time for them to be consumed.     They taste great, love the Elmo and Big Bird shapes, and they are Earth's Best which means that they are organic!

I love other brands of vegetarian jerky. This one, I hate. It is spongy instead of chewy and smells and tastes like concentrated, stale, off-brand dog food. I could not get this funky crap out of my mouth fast enough. I should also mention that I'll eat just about anything, including bugs and grass. If it came down to it, I'd turn to them before ingesting another piece of this food-like substance.
Wonderful chocolate!  Deep, rich flavor and very creamy.  This is my first experience with this brand and it won't be the last *smile*.
Doesn't fit as many stuffed animals as the pic appears. Can't put ant of our daughters big stuffed animals n it, just the medium and little sized ones.
Upon receiving my shipment, one of the jars leaked all over causing a huge mess and was a waste of money for the syrup that was spilled everywhere!

First, this item was extremely easy to put together. It's true (as stated in another review) that there are only pictures to put it together, but my 12 year old son was able to assemble without the directions, so I'm sure anyone could do it with ease.  I was originally looking to get the baby bjorn highchair, but after reading reviews, and watching video reviews I didn't like that the baby bjorn didn't adjust in height or in seat positions.  As the mother of 4, I know exactly what I want in a high chair.  1.  it has to be functional.  meaning:  it needs to recline, have adjustable heights & straps, use with/without the tray, and easy to move. Phil & Teds does all that. True,  it doesn't have wheels, but that doesn't seem to matter.( If it had wheels my other children would be riding it around the kitchen I'm sure.) I can move the highchair from the kitchen, to the dining room to the living room with ease so baby can be part of the family, no matter where we are. (we have hard floors, no carpet).  2.  It needs to clean easily: I LOVE the removable foam pad, adjustable straps & strap covers, removable tray & tray cover. Our baby is 3 1/2 months old, and fits in this highchair perfectly.  BUT there is room for him to grow, and almost EVERYTHING on this highchair is adjustable, including the foot rest.  Most other high chairs on the market are hard to put little babies in, and work only with babies 5 or 6 months or older-- causing them to eat in a uncomfortable position, slumped over.  I can see our little guy growing with this high chair, and having no problems.  For the money this high chair is perfect.  Smart design, and functional details on this high chair make all the difference!
I had a fun experience using these. It was fun laying out all sorts of foods to try out. The best part is you only need half a tablet per session.
If you looking for something with a lot of flavor then look no further. These strawberry belts are AWSOME!!!!!!!!!!!!

I bought these on subscribe and save when I got 20% and that made it a really good deal, not sure if I continue to buy it without that discount. The flavor is great and definitely fresh not old like its been in the warehouse forever. Really good and a potential good price.

These people take us for fools or what. Initially before buying it i thought it was a great deal price-wise but after trying this product i was very disappointed. I make my own juice using honey as a sweetener but i was amazed that i only used about 4/6 of the 1.38kg container to sweeten 2 gallons of my juice. The sweetness is highly questionable. I will try to return the second container and i am never buying this again.

LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!! It is great bc it is nice and compact and has a very soothing vibration (I know others have said it is loud and distracting, but I have not found this to be true at all). I also wish it didn't have an auto shut off, or at the very least have an option for it to be continuous, however with that said, it shuts down gently so as not to wake the baby and I haven't had my daughter wake up yet when it goes to shut off so I guess there's no real complant there.

It's small size makes it great for travel, I am able to take it with us on day trips or out of state.

I HIGHLY recommend this product!! I don't go a day without using mine and should it ever cease to work, I will definitely buy another one. :)
Great! My baby boy looks fancy in this. It's comfy too with a snap close. No Velcro which I appreciate.
Can't believe I'm ten months into this calendar.  It's so cute and will be such a great keepsake.  I look back on mine from 32 years ago to compare my son's progress with my own  :)

Purchased this to through in my bag when traveling.  Mostly to replace or even spice up the bland coffee that comes in hotel rooms.  I formerly brought Starbucks Via packets for the same purpose, but tired of having to purchase the tiny packets and discard the waste that goes along with them. Deciding which coffee is best is a mater of taste, and for me this won't replace a good cup of brewed coffee from recently ground beans. But, its definitely better than the bland hotel stuff.

This is a great product for a teething baby.  The material is soft enough that it doesn't irritate my baby's mouth and the little prints on this teether seems good for offering stimulation.  My baby used to put anything she sees in her mouth but this has offered a safe replacement for other possibly unsanitary objects.  Because shes so young, Im uncertain at this point to give this to her in a frozen state but shes loves it chilled.

I just love this mat. I chose a mat like this because I didn't want one of those letter mats, where the letters pop out all the time. I've heard complaints about those letter mats. So I went with this. It is so easy to put together and take apart. The pieces are a great size so you don't have all these tiny pieces all over the place. It's a great size for an infant to play on. I'm considering purchasing another set to make a play area even bigger. But one may be en
Cute. Fit is just about right along with size. I wish the pocket was a but bigger. Seems to be a lot of wasted space with all the stuffing.

A sweet treat with a chili bite that comes as an after taste. You can see little hunks of chili between the large sugar crystals. It is however NOT what I would describe as hot. In fact, the sugar and chili layer is so significant that if I had never tasted guava before, this product would not help me do so. You know it is fruit as it is light yellow and in "fruit sized strips". I think it would taste the same if you used cantaloupe, apple, or mango slices.
So if you want to bite of "sweet", this product will fill you sugar needs. If you want to see if you like the taste of Guava, try something different.

"Love this product! I bought it for my daughter and son (both high chair age), and love that it's disposable and covers all parts of the high chair that kids would touch. It's great to finally have a disposable cover! I don't have to wash high chair covers anymore! We eat out a lot, so this is a big plus for us! The price is reasonable! Only about $2 per cover and 6 come in a pack. Would definitely recommend this product to other parents. It's simple to put on the chair, much more convenient than cloth covers, and does exactly what it is supposed to do - protect my kids from high chair germs! It's a winner

I received a Keurig a few weeks ago and love it but didn't love the price of the K cups (I drink a lot of coffee)  I ordered the Ekobrew right away.  I have enjoyed it immensely and have no trouble making a great cup of coffee.  Unfortunately the Ekobrew I received was defective and leaked quite a bit because the lid did not seal properly.  I saw another review here on Amazon with the same issue and a comment by the company asking them to email them and they would \\"make it right\\".  So I did just that and within 10 minutes I had a response!  They apologized and said they would be happy to send me a tested replacement Ekobrew.  I was shocked but very happy to hear this.  It arrived today.  This one works wonderfully and I am thrilled with it.  More importantly I am thrilled with the customer service of this company.  I didn't need to complain or whine or prove something was wrong...they just took me at my word and made it right...even going above and beyond by including a small package of gourmet coffee with my replacement.  2 thumbs up Ekobrew!
alright I bought a few backs of these from my local Walmart and When I made them . EACH TIME THEY HAD A LOOOOOOT OF HAIR IN THEM .

I usually order quick healthy vegan groceries from amazon because I am in the army and 1.) they don't give me a lot of extra time, 2.) whenever they do provide me food it certainly is not vegan or even somewhat healthy. So i have to usually be prepared to feed myself. Although i do prefer to each lots of raw veggies, cooked quinoa, tofu ect. I do have to have things on hand that do not go bad and can be made in a matter of minutes. The brand Amy's is absolutely wonderful. I have tried at least 5 of their soups and 7 of their frozen wraps. This soup has to be my favorite. 200 calories, organic, you can not beat it. I usually add some extra cracked pepper and curry powder to it. Heats up in 3 minutes and i have something good for me and of course vegan. I know 12 cans seems like a lot but it is good to have on hand when you dont feel like going to the store or are short for time.

These are almost my favorite of the Atkins drinks.  I love the berry one even better, but these are great!  17 g of protein.  Perfect.  I get tired of trying to eat meat or eggs during the day, so these fruit drinks are my snacks.

I was not too sure I wanted to purchase something like this online, but I am sure glad I did.  I started using this heavily from my 6th month on and it has really helped me get a full nights sleep.  I find I do have to roll over about 1 or two times a night and I just rotate the pillow to accomodate.  Once you are in the habit of doing that, it is no big deal.  The velcro is adjustable and can easily fit all body sizes.  The pillow provides great back and tummy support and you can lean into the back wedge so that all of your weight isn't directly on your hip.  This pillow helped me with my hip soreness.  Great product!

I seriously don't understand the bad reviews on this product. My son (now 2 1/2) much prefers this seat to the other one we have in the house. Our other seat has a little \\"deflector\\" in the front, but he says it's too hard to get on and off of it by himself when he sits down b/c it scrapes against his privates :( He doesn't have that problem w/ this seat at all.

Yes, pee will sometimes collect under the seat, but I've found that most of the toddler seats do this. The child is still learning and has no idea where to \\"point\\" things yet, so urine ends up hitting the seat and running down underneath it. Nothing a clorox wipe won't fix very easily!

The only reason I'm giving it 4 instead of 5 stars is b/c the seat is a little TOO cushy. (My son needed help to get on and off of it for a long time b/c it was so high.)
I absolutely love these swaddles-especially since we could never get a tight swaddle with a regular cloth.  I got them for our baby shower and then ordered more because they were so great!  Love it!
Best instant MISO I've come across.  I like to add it to ramen as well.  Wonderful stuff.

I would not recommend this changing pad! The plastic surface is glued to the foam inside BUT has little wholes and when moisture enters it will come apart. I did not use a whole cover (only cloth diaper where baby lies) for the changing pad since it is plastic and easily cleanable but that just made it worse, his poop got in the wholes and in the foam. After a really bad poopy, I had to throw it away and went to the store. This time I got a pad which has no wholes in the surface since I still do not want to spend money on covers.

I've become a major fan of the Lamaze toys.  They are delightful, colorful, and stimulating for a 3+month old baby that is learning to grasp, and explore textures and sounds.  The dog has it all.  crackly sounds in the bone, jingling bells in the feet, a squeaker in the chest, and a hilarious barking/panting sound when the nose is pushed.  Not only did my 6 month old go nuts for it, my poor dog was wild about it and desperately wanted it too!  I am so pleased.  We got a super quick ship and are very very happy.
just as promised thanks will be shopping with this company many more times in the future keep up the good work

I haven't been able to find fresh green peppercorns in any if the stores where I live in Alabama. I did a search online for them and was delighted to be able to purchase them through Amazon.com. They came today and I had them on my broiled steak tonight. I love the kick they give to a dish. I am so happy to have access to them again.

This is a really cool toy fish.  I bought it for my son to play with in the tub.  It worked great for a few months with lights changing colors as it hits the water.  Needless to say it stopped working after a while.  I'd have to guess it was 3 months or so.  He's probably too old to be playing with this stuff anyways.

Well, you've heard the reviews en mass about the low volume. I use mine to monitor my elderly mother, and we basically have to yell in order to communicate one floor apart.   I guess I've had my two units, for two different rooms, for two years. I've totally replaced one of the units for a third $92, and two batteries have needed replacement. Three days ago the second unit died and now I'm starting all over in a search for a dependable monitor. Bottom line....$275 plus the price of two batteries, and it's all crap. I haven't trusted Phillips for years - just another third-tier American brand, and throw in the made in China label and you get the total screw.   For this kind of money I'd like to go out and find a truly professional one and get quality for my money. Trouble is, I really am not sure there's one out there. Best of luck.
Purchased this as a gift for Christmas for a little boy that I babysit for.  He loves trains and of course,  Thomas is #1.  Great service and was delivered in a timely fashion.

The chair is wider than most of those disney chair. So it should be able to fit age 1-5. It's a little low, but I don't think your kids would mind. You can add a couple felt pad to make it a little taller. The material is much better than similar Disney sofa/recliners. It really looks like a mini sofa, rather than a toy.

My wife and I received a waffle maker for our wedding, so we picked up a box of this at our local Wegmans.  We instantly fell in love with the taste and continued to buy it ... up until about a month ago when the Wegmans stopped carrying it.  We can't find it in any other store around where we live and have had to order it online.    We don't like the other brands and have gone crazy searching for this locally but alas, it's nowhere to be found.  We like that you don't need eggs for this mixture and the taste is spectacular.  It may seem a little thick before you add the butter or margarine but it gets to the perfect consistency in the end.    We are so happy we can still get this mix one way or another.  It's easily the best out there.
If you are looking for a really hot horseradish -- this is the one.  Atomic horseradish has to be kept refrigerated so I'm glad that I only purchased the three pack.  Will definitely purchase again.
Very happy with the price. If bought in a supermarket would pay a fortune. We make strawberry and blueberry jam during the summer months. Would buy this from Amazon again when the time comes.

I bought the belly buds when I was 19 weeks pregnant. The idea you could play music to your little one was a concept I thought was amazing. I haven't used the voice recording feature yet. The feature is online,from what I read. But very simple to use! You hook up your ipod, place the sticky side of both headphones on either side of your belly and walla! If you also want to listen to what baby is listening to there's an additional splitter where you attach your headphones. Momma and baby sharing their first moments. Sometimes,when I would put them on,the baby would move. A very cool peice of technology. A luxuary,but I felt a good one :) If this is something you're intrested in, these are the way to go,the sound volume perfect for baby,so you don't have to worry if it's too loud.

We bought the glider from Babies R  Us, and after only 2-3 weeks of use, the glider broke while my husband was rocking my one month old son in it, causing him to fall backwards. We did put this together AS INSTRUCTED.  We contacted the company, and Shermag refused to get back with us. Buyer Beware!

I love OXO products and will continue to purchase them. This is a great little cup, but it has one major drawback. The lip of the cup is VERY sharp. When I cleaned it the first time (by hand), I cut two of my fingers and the side of my hand. They are small cuts (kind of like a really bad paper cut), but still! I am hoping this is just a fluke and may consider buying another because my son seems to really like it. However, be careful the first time you clean it in case they are all like this. If it hadn't been for this flaw, I would've given it 5 stars.
Used this to stuff a Juke Box shaped pinata for a birthday party of people born in the 50's.  Big hit (pun intended)

We bought this chair when our son was about 10 months old for a trip to his Great Grandma's house.  It was great! At that age the tray worked fine (if a little small) and the chair really felt secure with the straps adjusted right. Now that he's 17 months old it still works great as a booster for trips (we travel quite a bit) and it even fits in my larger suitcase so we can take it on the plane.  One warning, make sure to read the directions on how to work the straps, they can be a little confusing at first.  Once you figure it out however, it's a great chair!

We love our amber teething necklace from Amber Crown! I have noticed a decrease in drooling and I like to think it's helping with our little ones teething pain. We also get tons of compliments because it looks so cute on him! I would recommend this product to all moms!
Produces a smooth dark roast cup of coffee.  A keurig will never replicate a cup brewed from fresh grounds, but this variety is my k-cup go to.

This is the original BBQ sauce we grew up on. Was looking to buy a barbeque sauce for the summer and noted the ingredients. Check out the first ingredient:

High Fructose Corn Syrup, Water, Distilled Vinegar, Tomato Puree [Water, Tomato Paste], Salt, Food Starch-Modified. Contains 2% or less of: Soybean Oil, Sauce Blend (Water, Hydrolyzed Corn and Soy Protein, Salt), Spice, Onion Powder, Dehydrated Garlic, Natural and Artificial Flavor, Caramel Color, Colored with (Yellow 6, Red 40, Titanium Dioxide, Blue 1).

Nutritionists recommend that you stay away from high fructose corn syrup. If you google Andrew Weill and Michael Pollan and high fructose corn syrup, they explain why it is not healthy for you or for the environment. One of the effects is that your body produces massive amounts of insulin to process HFCS which isn't good for you.

Found Stubbs BBQ sauce here on Amazon which doesn't use High Fructose Corn Syrup as an ingredient. It is delicious. It would be great if Open Pit would come out with a healthier version of their BBQ sauce which didn't involve high fructose corn syrup as a primary ingredient. Like the flavor of their sauce and would buy a healthier version of it.

When I originally ordered this product I was sent the car seat adapter for the single stroller, not the double. However, even after opening the package they quickly replaced it with the double and I have had no problems with it. I wish there was a cup holder on the other side of the adapter, but there isn't one on the original stroller either, so I guess not a big deal. I haven't been able to find a detachable one though that doesn't twist around the bar.

I eat a lot of rice and chose this mix to add some variety over the usual staples of white and brown rice.
The texture is good with the kernels well separated, and the flavor is a nice mild blend of the different rices, giving it a different type of nutty taste without being bland, or too overwhelming. Definitely a great break from the basics.
It reheats well (because I eat rice everyday, instead of bread for my starch, I make several servings at a time).
I have decided to wash it before cooking, otherwise the color from the darker rices is very rich. Great if you like all your rice a brown/purple shade, but I prefer to see all the different types and colors separately. A personal preference that doesn't effect the flavor at all.
The is my 2nd order and I really like this stuff, I hear it is in Walmart now but I don't know yet if it is cheaper there. I like the seasoning ones too for cooking with. Great product!

Got these for a zombie birthday party I threw for my son and they were a hit!  Who doesn't love little gummy brains?!?!  They tasted good, came quickly and got eaten up by a lot of little zombies.  If you need gummy brains, these are it!

I love this 9 count sampler because you'll never be bored with all the variety offered here. I'm not always in the mood to repeat teas, so this extremely varied offering really makes me happy.

The smells and tastes delicious and the packaging is so nice that you can always offer it as a gift.
Nice tasting salt. Not too salty, if that makes any sense. 1 tsp in warm water followed by 16 oz. water is great for the health! Read Dr. David Brownstein's "Salt Your Way To Health." Be well!

I placed my order for 2 boxes of this Watermelon Laffy Taffy, with seeds. I didn't buy 2 pieces of it because I \\"thought\\" I knew what I was getting.
