I \\"thought\\" Amazon would be a more commitment oriented corporation. For what I recieved...... I got 2 boxes.... 64 laffy taffy's watermelon flavor, and it did NOT have the seeds. I wouldn't have ordered $56 of laffy taffy if I wanted the WRONG one. The picture on the website is definitely not the picture of the laffy taffy I recieved. I for one am very ashamed of the service I have recieved and warn all others to steer clear of this product if you are looking for the taffy with the seeds.... this is NOT the right one.
We love this tea. I make it cold using 4 bags and everyone seems to enjoy it's light minty flavor.

Have you ever eaten a Twix bar and thought, "Is that it?"  These cookies will fix that disappointment and sadness from Twix impotence.These cookies are big, 220 calories each, but one is more than enough. Surrounded by chocolate and covered with a thin layer of caramel is a cookie that is crisp, but tender, and reminds me of shortbread. The chocolate is mild, but pleasant and there is a nice balance of sweet and slightly salty. Highly recommend!

LOVE this little bunny!! My now 2 year old used to light up everytime we gave this to her when she was a baby-big smiles and hugs :) She loved the look of him and also the music. She is also very snuggly. My 6 month old has now taken him as her favorite stuffed animal. Again, her face lights up with big smiles & hugs when she sees him. She loves the music & she also currently loves to munch on his ears lol ;) I highly recommend this little guy. Haba is a very trusted & reliable brand.
These seeds exploded out of the ground. The seeds I received have a 99% germination rate.
These leg warmers were chosen by an expecting mother and know she will like them.  Maybe she will have more feedback when she can use them.

I bought this for my granddaughter, but did not give it to her, instead I have it as part of a baby gift to a friend.
I thought it was too small for my granddaughter since she is 14 months. This is good for 12 months and under.

I like that it is relatively healthy, that I can store it in a desk drawer at work due to it being shelf-stable, and that it only takes 60 seconds in the microwave.  But the flavor is definitely a notch below a similar thing that's frozen, not shelf-stable.  I guess it's as good-tasting as healthy, shelf-stable meat dishes can possibly be with the current technology.

Received these and they tasted good and were very fresh. I am a very fit 27 year old male. I bought these to help boost testosterone naturally and they definitely worked.  They actually probably worked too well. I definitely do not have a testosterone deficiency but wanted to boost my levels anyways. Why not, right?  I did end up breaking out all over my face in about a week from eating 6-8 per day.  I used them in conjunction with cod liver oil capsules and vitamin D but i believe these were the culprit of the blemishes since it is a known side effect. I am going to wait until my face heals then scale back my consumption of the nuts to see if I can find a level that works to boost test a little but does not cause me to break out. Overall they are a good product but use with caution as these are powerful enough to cause unwanted side effects if you already have normal testosterone levels like me.

Very cute, but fit a little large.

Update---- I bought these back when my son was born and after 8 months he can finally actually wear them. They do not fit at all like 0-12 month socks should. I would say they are more like the size of your average 6-12 month size or even a 12 month that is cut a tad bit on the small side.

Well, we went through a bit of a roller coaster ride with this thing. We early on decided we wanted this car seat when our lil girl out grew her infant seat. We were really excited about everything and went to a store to try one out, sadly it wouldn't fit in our Ford Explorer in a way that allowed anyone to ride in the front seat comfortably. We had heard about the angle adjuster but just weren't certain. So after more research we ordered one in daytona. I really liked the cobalt color, but my wife didn't think it was appropriate for a girl. She liked the spring color but that was just too flowery for me. We both liked black striped one but worried about it getting hot. We also liked plum, but my wife was afraid it would get too hot, so we settled on the daytona.

Ordered them both from Amazon, got 1 day shipping with our prime trial for $4 each. They both arrived by 2:30 the next day.

First tried seeing if I could fit it without the AA, but while it could fit, I am 6'3\\" and it would be uncomfortable for me to sit behind the steering wheel. My wife could fit and she is 5'4\\". But again she wasn't completely comfortable.

So inserted AA and it gave me plenty of room in the drivers seat. The latch system works great as well! It was very simple to hook up and adjust. There are a few things I had learned in advance watching the videos that made it easier.

Lots of people complain about how you have to adjust the straps in the seat, I really didn't find it any different then our keyfit infant carrier. Actually I thought the straps are a little less complicated for adjusting. With the carseat out of the car, it literally took me just a couple of minutes to adjust the straps, the buckel a little longer but that was because my wife had to do it sense my hands were too large.

I do like how the buckel and straps are easier to put out of the way when putting our LO in and out of the car seat. She is 9 months old and 30\\" and 20lbs so the chest clamp is a little huge on her, but she will grow into it. She likes being able to see out the windows when driving.

The straps can be a little hard to tighten, but they strap on snug around her and stay in place good.

Ours came with two covers on the straps which cushion the straps over the shoulders, this does make it easier to get her snug without worrying about being too tight.

Tethering was simple, our 2011 explorer doesn't have rear facing anchors, so we used the tethering attachment that was provided with the xrt and it was no problem at all. Tethering supplied far more stability to the top of the car seat then I actually expected.

The Head wings that some have an issue with we haven't used yet, I just moved them up to the highest setting and left them there. Although we are probably going to have to get another type of baby mirror as the wings get in the way of being able to see our current one.

Now, the thing is heavy. People say it is close 25+lbs and I don't doubt it, but it is very solid, altogether very simple, and does a wonderful job at its purpose.

I also heartily suggest watching the videos on youtube before getting this, it makes installation much easier as the instructions don't always get as specific as you might like.d and 30\\" and 20lbs so the chest clamp is a little huge on her, but she will grow into it. For years looking for a magical item to help me with my constant nightly sinus congestion, that was not addictive or expensive and not recommended for my health issues, bad heart (Clariton-D), I bought this with no real positive expectations. I have been using this for over two weeks and it has simply been awesome.

I basically get congested during non allergy seasons only at night. I use this basically twice a night, once an hour or two after dinner and once before going to bed and I have not had any issue breathing while sleeping. If I take nothing at all but just use a saline spray my sinus congestion impacts my sleeping nearly a 100% of the time.

**Update** Turns out my problems were from a very large polyp in one of my sinus cavities that three doctors failed to figure out. This helped but obviously my condition is was probably not something most can compare to.

I do not know how helpful it will be come allergy seasons where my congestion goes from bad to obnoxiously bad and I have not been on it long enough to know if it loses effectiveness or it has addictive issues like Affrin. But if it does not this is simply the magic item I have been looking for.

Everyone likes a different seat for different reasons...we liked this one because it can stay with our son the entire time he's required by law to be in a seat...that saves money in the long run. We have had it (forward facing) for 2 months, and we love it! It's roomy, comfortable, and stylish. It was easy to install (actually easier than his rear-facing one was), the straps have never twisted, and the buckle is simple to do. Just put the two pieces together, hold them in one hand, and snap them into the buckle that you're holding with the other hand. It's a breeze! If you can rub two quarters together with one hand, you can do this buckle. And really, it's designed to keep the child from unbuckling himself during a trip...isn't a few extra seconds snapping a weird buckle together worth a child's life? We buy these car seats for their safety features, not our convenience. The pillow is also a nice feature, and if the baby is too short for it yet, like ours, it just flips behind the back of the seat. We have been really impressed with this carseat, and recommed it highly.

I wish I had bought these bottles from the VERY beginning. I just wish I had bought a few sets of these instead of other playtex bottles which do not have sippy cup nipples.

I recommend to all moms: buy the 9 oz bottles with sippy nipples, and the slow and medium flow nipples to fit. Don't bother with the small 5 oz bottles.

I bought the orange and green from Amazon, and a pack of red and blue locally. It's hard to find boy colors locally. I've been wanting another set to replace my playtex, and all i can find are pink and purple.

I bought 6 of these cups for my daughter when she was 15 months old and she still uses them. She is almost 2 1/2 years old. I bought a three pack at a wholesale club for a great price. I used this to transition my daughter from a bottle. This worked great. I didn't want to use the traditional sippy cup because I saw no value in that over a bottle. The dentist said that sippy cups work on the same principle as a bottle and there is really no value in terms of liquids sitting near their teeth and creating cavities. With a straw it by-passes their teeth. I also liked the idea of teaching her how to use a straw so that if we were out of the house (on a trip) we would always have a cup she could use. You can always find a cup with a straw. I liked this cup because when the lid was closed it never leaked, not once. It does as some reviewers mentioned, sometimes have liquid come up from the straw. This happens more often if the cup is very full or if you put in cold milk and the cup is on the full side and sits on a table, as it warms up. This really was not a big issue for us. We don't let our daughter walk around all day with milk or juice. She drinks that most often at the table with meals or while sitting on the couch reading stories. With water this was never an issue. If you are the type to let your child walk around all day with milk and maybe juice and discover the cups hours, even days later than this cup is not for you. Yes, if the cup is not closed it may leak (more like dribble), plus if it is left for days I am sure the inner parts of the straw will get moldy. I mean what wouldn't at that point. I think this cup functions as it should and I certainly never had to worry about spills. When you first get it you MUST squeeze the straw to make it work. I ran the cups and parts separately through the dishwaher. I would also use a small Dr Browns bottle brush for the straws. Yes, it's a hassle to take apart, clean and put back together, so are bottle and any sippy cups. You just have to deal with that. My daughter still uses these but not often, beacause she uses a regular cup. I would recommend and if needed buy again.

I \\"upgraded\\" from the Advanced Pump Instyle (API) and was very sorry.  Despite getting the motor replaced by the company, it has nowhere near the suction that the API has.  Furthermore, the strap that's supposed to attach to the bra only works with Medela bras and one other kind.  I can't attach it to the majority of the nursing bras I have.

That this product ever made it past the concept stage is shocking. So you don't want hot spots from the microwave? Heating the milk with vaporized water is stupid and wreckless. I have a degree in biochemistry and let me tell you one of the simplest facts of chemistry: when water is vaporized and becomes steam, the temperature of the steam must be above 212 fahrenheit. This product heats the milk by exposing it to vaporized water above 212+ degrees! It vaporizes the water very well, so let's call it 220 degree vapor. That's the replacement for microwave hotspots? The outer portion of the milk will rapidly heated by the steam, likely destroying some of the immunity and nutrients that the breast milk is supposed to provide.

Furthermore, after reading lots of the comments here, it seems that the heating element is very unstable, and may only last days, weeks or months before routinely under- or over-heating the milk. I would not take the chance of scalding my baby. This product is a lawsuit waiting to happen.

The fact that the user has a step where you have to very precisely measure the water that will be vaporized, or you burn your baby is also a drawback, to say the least.

Currently I am using a good digital thermometer and a small pot. I put hot tap water in the pot, measure the water temp at about 100 to 110 degrees, and put the bottle in that for a few minutes.

Arizona Green Tea should never be touted as a health drink. The product is definately a better alternative to Soda but this alone does not make it healthy. Read the label to discover that 1 litter has about 280 calories,38 grams of Sugar and next to nothing in terms of vitamins. Products that profess to be Green Teas often only have small amounts of Green tea present. With very little Green tea you will not get the full health effects. The best way to consume is to boil your own instead of depending upon beaverage distributors.

Understand, I like this product and regulary consume it but it's just not what people profess it to be. If you are trying to lose fat donot drink high calorie liquids which can add unecessary calories you don't need. Drink water instead.

I went on YouTube & learned how to make my own Caramel Macchiato so had to have the caramel sauce topping.  People say drink will only taste good with the real deal from the real coffee company... not true.  This caramel sauce tastes exactly like the coffee company's caramel sauce.  I was initially turned off when I saw "sugar free" on the bottle because I would rather eat real sugar than artificial sweetener but does not taste sugar free or has that off taste that artificial sweeteners impart.  Overall tastes just like the famous coffee shop caramel sauce.  One thing ... if you do buy a nozzle for this you cannot use the regular nozzles that fit on alchohol size bottles the opening on this container is bigger... regular bottles are one inch across this is 1 1/2 inch across just so you don't order the incorrect nozzle.  I just open the cap & pour the sauce on top of the coffee.

This is truly a revolutionary product- we have tried everything from fans to shades and nothing works like the Geleeo.  Anyone with a child in a stroller in NYC knows how hot and sweaty (and in turn, CRANKY!) kids in strollers get and this is truly a game changer.  Highly recommend!!!!!
It's a great sterilizer but dr. Browns glass bottles don't fit standing. You will have put them flat and only few can fit.
....cup of tea. I'm not the tea drinker in the house but my wife says it is very very good.

The only bottle better than this is the new Pura Insulated Bottle - best non plastic bottles out there! We have been using them since my son was born - were able to try several nipples until he found one he liked. I breast feed, but we used a bottle so Daddy could help out at night from week two on. It is now 10 months and we still love them! I enjoy the disks to turn the short bottles into snack dispenser, and we are now part time using the sippy spout and straw all with great success. My 12 year old liked them so much we had to buy her one with the straw! We are sold!!
This is my baby's favorite cup! It is very helpful when you start weaning the baby from the bottle or sippy cup and helps transition faster to a regular cup. Great quality too!
Biggest... Ripoff... Ever!!! Huge box, just barely any candy. I had to see my little brothers face in disappointment. I will never buy any products from these people again!

This tub is awful. The grip in the back does not help to hold baby in place at all. Baby slips all over the place.The bar with the spinning toy on it has very sharp edges. When bathing my baby, she would always get her feet caught under it and they would get all scrathed up. As a toddler tub, it isn't much better.Baby still slips all over when leaning back into the seat. When taking baby out, her thighs would get all scratched up from the safety bar's sharp edges.And as for the spinning toy, the one on our tub doesn't spin.

I am so glad I got these for our new bob stroller! They were slightly hard for my husband to attach, but they fit great, don't interfere  with any of the stroller functions and give us the much needed extra storage. Without these we'd be unable to store all that we need for our little one in the bob. They attach to the bars on the side right next to seat/shade and don't hit the wheels even on the se. Highly recommended! We keep the bjorn carrier and a hat in one and a bottle warmer, bottle, burp rag in the other and still have room.

Beautiful crib and looks lovely, unfortunately one side was missing the grips inside the holes for the screws. We were able to improvise by removing some others and refitting it. Aside from thar frustration, the crib is beautiful.
I like my coffee, but I don't like the after taste, by blending New Orleans blend with Arabica medium roast, I have the best of both worlds AND a great cup of coffee that all my friends like as well.
I bought these for my 5 and 2 year old kids. These have worn well, go in the dishwasher and are just the right size. Perfect!
Where you were at 3 years ago??????  This is a must have. Huge and clear mirror. The best part is that you can move it around to check baby in any seat.
...and I attribute most of it to this product.  Amazing.  I have used it for the past 7 months or so and since I bought this my little one has slept through the night every night since.

I did a lot of research on bottle warmer and I think this is one of the best one out there. Even though it takes longer to warm the milk compare to others, I really like this product because it warms the milk evenly without over heating and keeps bottle warm for at least half an hour if you don't get to it right away.

I have been gluten free for 6 weeks.  I tried the pre-made pizza crust from my local grocery store...yuck!  Decided to give Chebe a try and was pleasantly surprised.  I am so glad I can eat pizza again.
Seller offered a good price for the product and it arrived as advertised. Fast shipping.
Not quite as tough or large capacity of the one I had for my kids - but the only one I could find for the grandbaby.
The visor doesn't stay up and nothing keeps it in place, so it will slip off when put up.  My concern is it may be a hazard for suffocating.

I had a lot of trouble choosing a convertible carseat when my son outgrew his infant carrier.  We didn't have a large budget and everything in my budget was rated low or \\"suitable for back-up\\".  After reading everything online I could find, and actually looking at the carseats in person at the store, I went with this model.      It installs easilly, is not difficult to adjust the strap height if you read the directions, works well both with the latch system and without, is small enough to fit in my smaller car, and seems to be comfortable for my son.  Oh, and no trouble with straps twisting.  And baby loves the handy little mesh pockets for his toys!    The only down-side is that if he falls asleep, his head slumps sideways, but I don't think that's unique to this model...just a downside of sitting upright.    So coming from someone that can't afford $200 carseats for our vehicles, this one does very well as our full-time carseat, and I may very well buy a second one for my husband's vehicle when finances allow.    My advice is to read the directions.  And if you have any trouble getting it fitted, take advantage of your local police/fire-department services.  I accidently put the seatbelt through the wrong slot and had trouble with the seat tipping over (!!!), but the day that happened, I made one phone call to the police department's expert and she knew exactly what I'd done and how to correct it.  No problems since (and wouldn't have been if I'd read the directions properly in the first place).

We have used these clippers since our daughter was a month old, I don't have anything to compare them to but really I don't need to because they are great.  Easily and quickly trims little baby nails... when I can keep the itty bitty hands still.

First had with dinner at my grandparents home, the are Magyarorszag, now can have at my home!!!!! If you love spicy and salty you will absolutly love this. Very nice well rounded flavor spicy, i had no problem with order or product except it was delivered a day after expexted dilevery, i add it to everything i eat

There just DELICIOUS.....tender and soft gummy eyes, not like some of the things you et that are really tough.
Purchase was easy and a big hit with the kids at one our girl scout meeting.

Looking for something to increase my order to $25.00 I found this and tried it.

I'll certainly get more next time my order is less than $25.00.
great stuff.  use it in my tea every morning instead of honey.  less calories and taste better.  great for ice tea because it disolves fast.

$15 really?! really? This is no justification for this price gauging. Call a relative and have them buy some in the store and mail them to you if you can't get these in the store. The nerve of selling these for 3 times the store price! Shame
The Vue-cups Cafe Cappuccinos were awesome. I got the Kuerig Vue coffee machine for Christmas and have been extremely with the frothers.
The taste is fine - not awesome, not abhorrent. I try to drink 2-3 cups a day to maintain hydration and milk supply. I wouldn't say it's a favorite.

These are not maxipads... Well, okay, they perform more or less the same function, and are designed with elastic down the sides to capture a greater volume of liquid as is released when a child urinates.  I have used these with both my now fully potty trained 3 yr old girl and my mostly potty trained 23-month old boy.  They are amazing.  Both kids wanted to stop using diapers before they were ready.  PODS gave them a discrete way of feel self-assured on a shopping trip or at the park, and still let them feel in control of their bodies.  I ran out and thought maybe we were done with them but my son actually wants another box.  When we're through that one, I bet we're done with diapers forever!!

Four and a half pounds of chocolate chips PER BAG..... Whoa. !!!!  The price was very good- and the shipping quite reasonable.  The chips are obviously fresh and have been stored/shipped properly (no cocoa butter 'film').

This had a slight fish taste and the texture of slippery rubber.  I have only tried one of the three and maybe I didn't cook them long enough.  I will try one more of the 3 pack I have, but if it turns out like the first one it will be the last one.
The product blends nicely in either my morning tea or my afternoon shake.  I have been using the gelatin for a month now and my nails are growing out much stronger.

Fun versatile play gym that's perfect for babies AND toddlers once they start sitting and standing up.

For the "lay and play" stage, the play gym is colorful with plenty of bright objects to entertain a baby. The mat itself is also machine washable which is great - these things get dirty fast. For the "sit and play" stage, this play gym has the added bonus of having ball slides on both sides. Baby/toddler can put the balls in at the bridge (or most likely have an adult do it for them) and watch them slide down the sides. Sounds mundane, but infinitely entertaining to a kid. For the "stand and play" stage, the bridge is sturdy enough for the toddler to hang on to and pull himself/herself up.

Heads up: this play gym does require 3 AAA batteries for the sounds and the lights that are not included with the package

This is from " It's Delish".....no problem with order or delivery but poor quality macadamia nut. Had a dirt taste and a large percent of the nuts were dark brown and not really edible (unless you like them dark brown). I absolutely love macadamia nuts and I will eat these but I was not too impressed.

My wife and I have given the Moby several tries, we've watched videos from the website and from youTube to figure out the best way to use it.  Neither of us are very happy with it.  We both find it very difficult to get it on correctly and it takes so long to get it right that my son gets pissed off waiting to be put in it.    It also seems that no matter how tight I make the thing, my son slips down or doesn't stay upright or something.  And like I said, I've watched the videos and tried different ways of putting it on.  My wife has as well.    I'll take my pocket sling or my Becco over this thing any day.

Seitenbacher Vegetable Broth and Seasoning has been on my shelf for years.  I love the taste.  I use it in everything from gravy to homemade cream soups and even seasoning on homemade breads.  It is simply delicious and nutritious, and no junk ingredients.  Just plain vegetables and herbs. :    My daughter and I are sensitive to wheat and gluten, and Seitenbacher still stays on the shelf.  No wheat, no gluten, no artificial anything!!    Amazon, you are amazing!  I ordered this product on a Friday morning and it was at my door by Saturday afternoon, just in time for me to make my soup.  :  YIPPEE!!!  Thank you.

Love this stuff. Excellent size, reusable container. I use the mix for mocha coffee. I use 2 spoonfuls in the bottom of a grande, pouring hot coffee over the powder, mixing it, adding warm milk and mixing again before adding whipping cream. I use equal parts coffee and milk, with 4 spoonfuls of coffee grounds used to make the coffee.

Not everyone likes them the way I do but I love my own technique too much to not share it. I don't foam the milk, not fond of how it tastes when I do it. I may be doing it wrong, so I just microwave a half of a regular coffee cup of milk, precisely.

I suppose this is good for hot chocolate but I've never used it for that.
We use this for iced tea in our iced tea maker. Its delicious as is without sweetener. We buy it by the case

Delicious sunflower nuts, I mix the Honey Roasted with the Unsalted

I have tried most of the varieties of Good Sense Sunflower Nuts, and have enjoyed them all. My two favorites--so far--are the Honey Roasted & Unsalted. But I have found that a 50/50 mix of these two varieties is what I enjoy most. The mixture is the just right compromise.

I debated between this and other gym for quite a while. The reviews of this sold me, and I can attest that they are very accurate. My baby has used this everyday, at least once a day but often more, since he was just a few weeks old. I have loved watching him grow with it, from just watching the lights to kicking with the music to finally grabbing the toys.

The large mat and many tags for hanging toys makes this a great mat for tummy time. It washes up easily. You can either wipe messes, usually spit up, away or just throw it in the washer, in a pillow case to avoid snagging the leaf or fasteners for the toys.

As I mentioned, my baby has used this everyday since he was just a few weeks old. He is now almost 5 months and we are still using the first set of batteries. There is just no stopping this thing.

I had a small 3 oz. bottle of this soy sauce. It is very good. So I looked online for larger sizes. After checking the volume that I thought was about 8oz., I placed the order. It seemed expensive, especially with the $7 shipping. What came was a bottle that was tiny. It is only about 1 oz. Very misleading and confusing. The info next to the bottle says 100ml but the description says 8 oz.
This is the only green tea I drink. I have 2-3 glasses of iced tea every day. It's my favorite tea! Delicious and great price!

Lipton Soup from Canada has another winner in there Veggie Soup. I originally bought the Chicken Noodle with White Meat and thought it was great for a powdered Soup and a quick alternative to coffee. Unfortunately it's unavailable on Amazon right now and I thought the Veggie soup would be a nice alternative.

Well it didn't disappoint, it was quite good for a powdered soup. Although my cup of soup did not look like the picture of there cup of soup on the package.
However it was tasty but I still prefer the Lipton Chicken Noodle with White Meat Soup over this Spring Vegetable Soup.

This soup is fairly healthy, its all natural and low in everything that is bad for you. True it's a bit salty, but if you add a little extra water it will be fine.

This soup is consistently good unlike Grandma's. Depending on the holiday or occasion Grandma's soup would not be consistent all the time. It all depended on how much she indulged as to how the soup came out. I thought it might be a good idea to keep a couple of pouches of Lipton handy just in case.

These might have been better under different circumstances, but they were stuffed into our mailbox, in summer, in Florida heat, for an afternoon before I could retrieve them. The chocolate had long since melted and now I had a gooey mess. I tried eating them anyway a couple times and ended up sick to my stomach both times. Not sure if that was the product itself, or the heat that got to it, but I would recommend paying a little bit more to buy a similar product in a grocery store where shipping is not part of the equation.
Had Elmo car seat cover for my first grandson and bought this car seat cover for my second grandson who loves Sponge Bob.
It was just ok, not too much better than over the counter bars.  I am a Weight Watcher and there are too many points in this for me.

LEAD CONTAINATION is aREAL HIDDEN DANGER IN CHINESE MATCHA!!! In 2013 ConsumerLab.com(a leading provider of consumer information and independent evaluations of products that affect health and nutrition  ) advised people NOT TO EAT or CONSUME MATCHA from china until they are sure about the purity of the matcha! The only way to be sure about the purity of the chinese matcha is to see laboratory test results on the amount of lead present in the chinese matcha. I would like to see the actual laboratory test result on lead content of uvernal Chinese matcha. Once I see the laboratory test results on Amazon, I will decide whether or not it is safe to drink this Chinese Matcha!!! I will finish this review after uvernal displays the lab report on Amazon.

Terrible texture, despite several trials of cooking lengths and with/without salted water.  Always turns out mushy, sticks to my teeth, and breaks easily.  Raccoto brand of 8-grain-pasta has a similar nutrition profile (with more fiber I think?) and tastes/feels much much better. And, as a bonus, is about a third of the price of Ezekiel-- at my local store, at least.   Goodluck!
i dont have to be worried if i forgot something.....now i have everything i could need for my baby in my car....stress free.....good quality....the best one i found.....

I like this soap to use in the shower for myself (I don't have a baby to use it on, otherwise I would!).  It's a nice gentle unscented soap that I feel good about using. The larger size is the way to go.

Though this item is expensive, if you're looking for a sweetner that isn't \\"artificial\\" and actually tastes like sugar, while lower in calories with no aftertaste, this is the product to try. I have been using it daily since it arrived two weeks ago and I find it tastes so much like sugar that I don't feel like I'm trying to cut back on calories by drinking a \\"diet\\" beverage. I use it in herbal iced tea and it is wonderful.

I bought this steak seasoning for my brother in law. He loves to grill out and I wanted to get him something he couldn't buy at the local grocery store. The Chicago steak seasoning has a great flavor that makes your home grilled steaks taste like you just paid forty bucks for them. Will definitely get some for myself.
I have tried other Protein Waters and I like this one the best.  I love the lemonade flavor and It has 5 grams of protein which help me to fight off hunger pains in the middle of the afternoon.
I thought it looked just like it did on line perfect for my 2 grandson ages 2 and 9 months

I love this dispenser. It's the perfect size for my diaper bag and the clip is great. The bags, although they seem a little big for one newborn or size 1 diaper, don't rip and smell nice. My bag doesn't smell like baby poo!
We got them for our 1 year old and she tolerates them:)  They are adorable, durable, and they do come with a stretchy rubber strap to help keep them on your child's head.
Not worth anything.  The item looks and feels cheap because it is made cheaply.  I returned the item.  Do not recommend.

My daughter will be 7yo in April and she is picky about her seats. She really likes this one however. She likes the red color and the comfortable headrest and wings make it easy for her to nap in the car. She's in the 85-90% height but is all legs so its been hard to find a seat that fits her properly. But this one fits. I like the way it attaches with LATCH straps and the crotch clip makes it more secure like being in a 5pt. harness. I highly recommend!

Great car seat, it meets all of our expectations.  This is our first upright car seat and we couldn't be happier for the price.  If you are debating on buying this car seat, don't hesitate.  Our kiddo was so comfortable that they took a nap on our first day of using it.  P.S. we are using the seat with harnesses and have not yet switched to using the seat without the harnesses or in the booster seat stage.

Product works great for freezing baby sized purees. Customer service is very attentive, we received four emails with helpful tips and tricks to prepare and freeze baby food....very helpful for a new mom!
These cones are exactly what i needed for my sisters baby shower.. i planned the menu to be mini foods and this was just one of the icings on the cake

Wow. These are SURPRISINGLY good. I'm not in to sweet stuff but hubby is and because we are searching more natural drinks for him we have this a shot. Also tried the berry twist version of this drink. And tried a different grand if lemon drink called "nuun all day" tablets.
Results from someone who drinks coke zero everyday....
The nuun drink was barf. Very stevia tasting. With after taste.
The berry version was sweet and would be good with vodka in it because seemingly syrupy. Ice cut it a bit and it's definitely tolerable.
The winner was this one.
Sweet and lemony. not zingy enough though so he said he'd add a squirt of lemon juice but overall he was very pleased and that's saying a lot!!

The shopping on this Amazon site is INSANE. I will buy from earthfare store at $5 a box for the5 measly packets...until Amazon cuts the shipping
We attach this fan to my son's carseat carrier when we go on walks in the stroller and it keeps him cool and the clip stays put! Love it!
My son chewed the string off and pulled it out so it will no longer hang around his neck.  Since it is silicone we have not been able to string another string through the frog

This mix makes more than 12 cookies and they are really good!  I had a real problem with my milk supply and was having to supplement with a bottle, which totally bummed me out.  I can't take fenugreek so I had to find an alternative to help with my supply.  I started eating these cookies and my milk supply increased rather quickly.  Now, my baby boy is exclusively breastfed and I couldn't be more thrilled!
You can't go wrong with Lindt Lindor chocolate truffles of any flavor or blend. We enjoyed this spring mix of milk and white chocolates; sweet, creamy, and delightful.
Most of the cans are so badly dented that I am afraid to use them.  In addition, the packaging is very poor.  Certainly not worth the high price.

My family likes the savory blend of this seasoning.  It doesn't have an overbearing salty taste and has just the right amount of thyme, which my people are partial to.  I add it to sausage gravy and most of our beef dishes and would probably add it to chicken, too, but we are beef farmers so that is what we usually have.  I can't find it in any of our local stores anymore so I stock up on Amazon and share it with my son and daughter-in-law.

Good tea produced in a single N espresso coffee machines.  All of the teas in this set have a clear color and a very nice blend of herbs and flavors. I will probably re order this set, Recommend for a fast cuppa.

This tea is very light and has a delicate flavor.  It is a VERY pleasing taste.  It tastes the way a flower smells.  This tea was my first experience with loose leaf tea, and I must say that I was pleasantly surprised!  I am eager to try other flavors too!

Our baby loved to be swaddled but constantly would break out of swaddle blankets.  This worked great!  We used it until she started rolling over and could no longer be swaddled.  We definitely would recommend this product!

Tastes more like a combination of Thai lemongrass soup and hot and sour soup instead of actual pad Thai.  Very nice spice factor to it and good amount of noodles that satisfy.  Filling for lunch or dinner.  Ordered through Amazon prime and literally received in 24 hours!  Signed up for subscription service and paying only 1.50 per cup, a good deal in my book and love that it comes directly to my door.  I would otherwise have to drive 45 minutes to buy in a local grocery store.  So pleased!  Tasty and cheap lunch option.  Will keep several in my desk for work!  Thanks Amazon and thanks Dr. McDougall!

Adobo con Cumino is the best seasoning for everything you make.  I am in the St. Louis area, and travel to Chicago every other weekend or so to pick up my Goya staples including Adobo and cafe... there's no replacement.  Adobo makes everything taste amazing, just don't use too much.
I thought this would be the perfect addition to my 3 year old daughter's bed and I wasn't disappointed. She loved it and it wasn't so bad to put together either. 2 thumbs up!

i like flavored coffee but your coffee is high grocery stores sell theres for 10.00 but dont have the variety id like to see you put variety together in one box rather then the same kind but bring the price down

I bought this because I am not a fan of the plastic packaging that the wipes we use comes in.  This container holds plenty of wipes for my diaper bag and dispenses them well.  The wipes do seem to dry out a little bit faster in this holder but I am still happy with the purchase.
I am super picky w/ my coffee and I have to say this is an excellent coffee! I can tell it's freshly grounded and pure as soon as I opened the package and fast shipping!
I am not sure that my skin looks any better but I like having this tea at work.  I enjoy smelling it as much as drinking it! Each packet is just the right amount for a nice cup of tea.
Gave as a gift and the new mommy loves it! Also, there was no assembly required, you just open or fold to close.
Doesn't require an acquired taste, like many other products for those suffering from celiac.  Add a little apple sauce or fruit and you will find this a morning treat.

Drink this stuff every night. Tastes better than any other bedtime or chamomile tea I have tried, and there have been many. Also love the little messages on each tea bag that remind you how to live a good life.

OMG....this play pen is a life saver. My son crawls around like crazy. When I'm in the kitchen cleaning up or fixing dinner I can't always be watching him so this is perfect. He hangs out and plays or stands up and (tries) to talk to me. I don't keep him in here for a long period of time because I feel that he needs to be a kid and crawl around too. It's easy to pack up too. I took it to the park with me. I shoved it in the bottom of our UppaBaby Vista stroller. #NYCMom

**KEY NOTE*** the middle part has to be up for the sides to bend down.
Make sure you get the right type of paci holder for your paci. We use the gum drop type and this one does not work with it.  My error for not reading the description.

These are perfect for my 19-month-old daughter.  They look like underpants, but the extra padding in the crotch prevents any 'major' accidents.  If she is having an accident, she usually feels wet early enough to get to the potty before peeing through to her clothes.  My little one is on the smaller end for her age and the leg holes are snug around her thighs.  This is good to prevent leaks, but if your little one has chubby thighs, be aware that it may be a little too tight for them.  I also like the soft cotton material- so much better than a synthetic disposable pull-up!  They also wash and wear very well.
I have had this product for 2 days and so far the suction is strong. My son have it filled to the top with toys! I wish it came in a different color tho

After reading the good reviews, I decided to try these. My first complaint is that you can't write on the tab with a regular pen. You need a sharpie. Then a handful (10 or so) bags leaked on me. It can be pretty uspetting, even though I know it's probably some temporary snafu in the production. I threw those out and finished the box. I won't be using these again. Going back to Lansinoh, which are medical grade and sterile.

I like these Imse Vimse swim diapers pretty well, although they are not my favorite.  They are very thin, with no absorbent material at all.  I know that pretty much all swim diapers do not absorb but rather just keep in solid messes, but this was so thin as to be not quite what I'm used to.  The print is cute, though!
I received a sample pack and I must say it was delicious. I love this coffee.  Thank Barrie House...
Amazon is the only place I can find this stuff and it tasted great. Price is what you should expect for these.
My sister-in-law liked the coffee, especially the Vanilla Bean one.  It was fun to have multiple kinds to try from one package.  She liked it
These are my favorite light snack.  They have a perfect blend of flavor and saltiness and aren't too filling, even if you \\"accidentally\\" eat half the box in one sitting.
Delicious and healthy snack. They are very lightly sweetened, and come in the shape of a cylinder. Love these !
We bought this after comparison shopping for the newborn. Even though he's now almost 8 months old he still loves hanging around it to play on.

Swaddling with a regular blanket never came easy to me and I was always concerned that my baby would come unswaddled in the night. It was a real relief to discover this product.  It is so comforting to know that there are products like these that are designed specifically with safety in mind.  For a new parent, peace of mind is just as important as a restful night's sleep!

I've searched high and low for a naturally decaffinated tea that tastes good and I can't believe that I finally found it in the Madagascar Vanilla Red tea.  The vanilla aroma is so relaxing and the taste is heavenly.  I add half milk and half water with a little sweetener.  It's so good that I use it in place of a dessert.  I can't believe that I've actually found a tea that I like and that won't wire me up.  I can drink it morning, noon and night.  I have a lot of food allergies and this tea doesn't bother me at all.  I'm so thankful that Celestial Seasonings has produced this tea.

I mix this coffee with the ordinary (but decent quality) supermarket coffee in a 3:1 ratio, giving me four times the luxurious taste for a really economical price! I have been doing this for YEARS... I am so spoiled that I can't drink ordinary coffee any more!
extremely overpriced and the picture is for the glass bottles we received plastic ones. The marinade tastes much better in the glass bottle.

Beware, there's a reason it's on sale and so cheap--defective batch! The "buckets" are sewn on about 1/2" higher on the right side than on the left, so they droop very noticeably to the left. Looks pretty awful and there's really no way to fix it. I agree with the other reviewers that the hooks are all wrong. Way, way too big to be able to close a door with this hanging over it...and yes, they are cheap, crappy plastic. Mine arrived dirty. Ew!
After a recent trip to Italy, I had to find the right cocoa for their version of Hot Chocolate. This was one we had in Italy and it came out perfect! loved it.

This product works great. It can be a little time consuming to put this on the bottom of the chair until you get the hang of it, or it could just be the space between the chair legs that made it harder for me. It functions as it should. If you put it on one way, it works to lift shorter children up, if you flip it the other way it works for slightly taller children. It's easy to figure out which way to use it, just look for the depth of the \\"shelves\\" that you would put the chair legs onto. If it's higher up, it's for shorter children, if it's lower than it's for taller children. It works great, and worth the price. Great product.
The amount of spread that I can use to stay on my diet is small compared to what is in the jar.  It was not sweet enough for me to use frequently and hard to spread

My 11 week old loves it, and she can't even get full use out of it yet. Best $8 spent on a toy yet for her. Highly recommend. Parent plus: the music actually is pleasant to listen to, and the volume is adjustable to a decent level.

love this straw sippy! easy to clean, quality plastic, and leaks the least of the 3 straw sippies we've tried. The optional handles are also a nice feature. At first we didn't like these as much b/c there's no weighted straw, but in the end it makes no difference. She can drink all the milk without a weighted straw. Just bought more of these :-)

I bought this tub when my son was 6 months old - it was perfect for when he was getting too big for the sink and was not sturdy enough to sit up on his own in the big tub. Also great as a mini pool outside on those hot summer days!! Just the right size to cool off. Don't waste your money on the sit-up bath seats that look like booster seats - the hard plastic is very uncomfotable on little ones! A great value and it deflates for easy storage when your child outgrows it.

This product has good flavor but it sure gave my jaw a workout with it being so tough. Not the kind of chewy I was expecting...very disappointing. I agree with the other reviewer in that I was expecting 6 packages of licorice not a bag with six pieces. The picture shows five sticks in the pack so I made the false assumption that the 6-count referred to the number of packs. I don't miss the other five packs though. There is much better licorice on Amazon's shelves.
My daughter's favorite tea! She normally does not like lavender in her tea but loves this blend. She prefers it ice cold .

I absolutely love this towel! Not only is it multi-functional, but the quality is top notch! I love how it protects my clothes from getting wet and how I can immediately wrap my baby once I take her out of her bath tub. It is soft, comfortable and practical. I would definitely recommend accua it to anyone!

Wonderful. Love that it has the waterproof lining in the middle so my baby's clothes and chest stay dry even if the front of the bib is saturated (which it often is from my little drool machine). Very cute mobile when looking at it from the outside. When a child looks up its rather boring. All the fun, color, design and looks are for adults. When a child looks up they see blue things moving. I bagged the stuff up and threw it in the garbage can. I didn't want the animals to have to endure it. This stuff is pitiful. Must have been sitting around the store for 20 years. No taste whatsoever. Do yourself a favor and avoid this stuff like the plague

Less wrinkles and less joint pain. I'm really glad I bought this item. The wrinkles under my eyes are much less and yes I can admit I've had Botox in the past but honestly I don't see myself going back to it or at least not as often. Before I started this collagen I was planning on getting a few units of Botox for my crows feet and now, I don't need it. I'm so pleasantly surprised. Also I have had a significant reduction in my back and neck pain. I blend 2 tbsp into my smoothie everyday. Would definitely continue to buy this item. Good luck!
No comment on healthiness, just that I find it slightly different from Hellmans/Best Foods but just as good.

By the time this was left on my door step to the time I got to the door and tore it open because my kids were so excited to get into these chocolates and see the prizes (which took about less than 2 minutes), we were disappointed to find out that the chocolate "eggs" were melted and not shaped like eggs at all (see pictures). Some of the chocolate melted onto the inside of the box (see pictures). I could hear the "surprise" shaking inside so I wasn't worried the chocolate melted all over it. (I have never purchased this kind of product before so I didn't know what to expect and was just excited to see how my kids would react.) I told them we had to put the eggs in the refrigerator because the chocolate was so melted that there was no way peeling the wrapper off would be easy. When the chocolate finally hardened enough, peeling the wrapper was still hard to do. The chocolate did melt enough to get inside the plastic egg that is inside the chocolate. The paper inside had some chocolate that I was able to wipe off, but it left a spot on it. The actual surprise was wrapped in plastic so it was protected from the melted chocolate. The surprise itself was disappointing. They were erasers with the characters from "Inside Out" on them. In the picture of the erasers, you can see the green one (Disgust) is peeling off in random spots. I felt like the surprises were misleading because the box made it look like the surprises might be a small toy or figurine from "Inside Out." Nope. They were little white erasers contained inside plastic eggs found inside melted chocolate mess. I would definitely never buy these again nor would I recommend this product to anyone. Ever. Awful and disappointing. One good thing - the chocolate mess tasted good (but the clean up was not fun).

i love this stuff! i initially bought it because it's a raw product that supposed to have healthy benefits (which i don't doubt at all) though i buy it now for the taste! it's incredible on salads! it's *slightly* spicy (really more \\"zesty\\" - the perfect word for it) and has a bit of a green taste... kind of like that found in arugula. it goes really well with vinegar based dressings - not so much with creamy ones, though your tastes may say otherwise. my favorite is spinach with cranberries, pine nuts, a little vinaigrette and this salad booster. a little goes a LONG way... you really only need about 2 teaspoons of the stuff to enjoy the flavor.

if you're a cheese person, blue or a hard grated parmesan would probably be amazing, though if you're not, try the \\"vegan cheesy\\" flavor salad booster or just add some nutritional yeast to this one, which is basically the same thing and cheaper :)

[[ASIN:B002863BIW Bragg Nutritional Yeast Seasoning - 4.5 oz - Flake]]

Would repurchase.  Mix it in a blender.  And keep if the fridge if you are using it in coffee.  As another reviewer said it will clump if you add it to coffee dry.  That was disappointing but I don't think the product was meant to be used that way.

Great taste, pure product. No aftertaste and none of that gunk from the fillers that they put in other products with stevia. Very convenient ordering online and get a discount with the other products I order on autoship :)

Bought for my niece. I blew plenty of time playing with it when it came in even though it was in the box still. Can't wait till she opens it so I can get back to playing with it.

This high chair is excellent. It's easy to put together and works great. It Wipes down great as well! My daughter seems very comfortable in it. I use both the newborn and toddler settings for my 5 1/2 month old. In the newborn setting, I especially like how the seat can be adjusted to two heights--one...one at about 70 degrees and the other at about 20 degrees. I also like the fact that the tray has different settings as well. A last point, the high chair doesn't seem to have any sharp edges that a kid could inadvertently scratch herself on...I highly recommend this!

These are so much better than the Sassy brand ones! Lightly scented, not overwhelming like the Sassy ones. About the same price and size, but definitely much better. I've ordered them multiple times now!

I got this chair for my 11 month old. She loves this chair. She crawls into with her blanket and rocks or \\"reads\\" books. It is wonderful. This is third seat cover we have bought. We have one that's a couple years old and still in perfect condition. They do not compromise the car seat being secured yet they are sturdy. Defiantly a must for all cars.

When I first saw the new system of reusable diapers, I was very confused. But after getting them, I realized how ingenious. I love the Velcro, the adjustable sizing snaps, the color! I bleach these with my diapers and they don't run or loose their color. Except the white one oddly enough. Caution though. After a number of bleaches, they do loose their waterproofness. But that didn't happen till after 6 to 8 months of twice a week bleaching. Lots of money saved. Lot's of landfill space not used :) Time to buy more.

This tea has a nice flavor and is nice to drink in the evening (with most of the herbs being traditional evening  flavors).  But the tea itself is not a sleep aid or sleep supplement.  Its 25 mg of Valerian is several hundred times less Valerian than a standard Valerian extract pill.  They add an extremely small amount of Valerian so they can charge more for a 'medicinal' product - note the warning that you should not operate machinery.  My advice is spend a dollar less and get yourself regular Sleepytime.  It's a great tea.

If you like a delicous snack and you want to maintain your health also, these chips are the way to go! Rice works, plain with salt, are great for people who are allergic to gluten products. They digest well, and are made- not from white rice- but brown rice. For extra good nutrition, they are delicious with hummus and salsa. There is no downside here. They are also dairy-free. Of all the chips and snacks I have tasted, these are the best-tasting and best-for-you snacks I know!!![[ASIN:B000UOHJ6O riceworks Sea Salt, 5.5-Ounce Bag (Pack of 12)]]

I would give it 5 stars if the shreds were larger. Some are big, but the majority are smallish flakes.

My husband had a baby swing when he was infant and my mother-in-law said he enjoyed it, so I decided to purchased this item for our newborn to surprised my husband upon his returning from Afghanistan. We had been talking about his childhood and how he thought having a swing would help calm and soothe our baby. When my husband returned from his deployment, the cradle 'N Swing was at our home and we put it together. We immediately ran into problems with assembling the lower seat tube and the short tube, into the upper seat tube. The M5 x 40 mm bolt would not go into the upper seat tube completely and the bolt is sticking out which is unsafe and may loosen once our baby is in the swing. Also, once plugging the swing in, we tested each of the buttons on the motorized frame. The mobile does not work when pushing the button and you can hear a clicking sound like the mobile is trying to move but nothing happens. We are very disappointed with this product and I thought it would have been much better than what we received.

These are a life saver with a little baby. Mine had reflux and was so colicky he spit up all the time. When he was a newborn he slept in a bassinet and we used these on top of the sheet so if he spit up on it or peed/pooped out of his diaper all we had to do was take this off, throw it in the laundry, and replace with a new one. It absorbs the wetness, but it doesn't leak through so the bassinet stayed dry. We also used these when we transitioned him to his crib for the spitting up. And then we used them on his changing pad because we only had 1 cover for that, and it saved us multiple times from having to do laundry in that moment to wash the 1 cover we had because he peed while changing a diaper. They're so useful for so many things (no diaper time) when they're little that it's worth buying a couple packs of them.

This gift box of chocolates offers a nice variety of chocolate flavors, both milk chocolate and dark chocolate varieties. My personal favorites were the dark chocoalte flavors, but I liked the milk chocolate varieties as well. The chocolate is smooth and the flavors are nicely balanced with the chocolate. These are great sippy cups, until they're not. The awesome thing is that it's just 2 pieces...the cup and lid. The not awesome thing is the silicone vent and drink hole eventually wear out and then you've got leaks. The First Years DOES NOT sell separate lids, so you have to trash both lid and cup and buy a whole new cup. Yuck.

As much as I love these cups, we've transitioned our entire sippy cup stock to Munchkin Click Locks...at least I can replace the valve or straw on those when they start leaking instead of buying a whole new cup.

I have had this wok for just shy of two years. Simply put, I love it, It heats up fast, and holds the heat.

As for the seasoning issue, carbon steel is unique. You don't need to baby it. But you have to realize that it isn't stainless steel or a nonstick pan.

After I use it, I soak the interior of the wok and clean it with a scrub pad designed for non stick pans, with a little soap. I then rinse it, and put it on a warm burner till the wok is fully dry. Carbon steel does rust if you scratch it, or you don't get it dry. If you do that step, in 2 years your wok will have \\"character\\". It might not be pretty, but it will work great-and in the kitchen, that is what matters.

And best of all, you don't need to keep re-seasoning it if you wash it right!

Product is probably fine. It was my first purchase of Ceylon Cinnamon. I will stick with the other in the future. It is not a good choice for cinnamon in my opinion. Probably good if you need it to be kind to your liver. Mine will just have to get along with the regular.
