I received these at a promotional price for testing and review purposes. In my opinion these decaf kona coffee k-cups are simple to use, and work well with any keurig. I think the flavor is good, but I prefer a darker bolder taste, and I think these are a more milder taste with a medium brew. I also feel that when piercing the top of the k-cup, it seems to take a little more effort for the poke pin to actually pierce through. Other than that I feel these are perfect for my mid afternoon, evening cups of coffee. I love coffee and drink all day, at all hours. This decaf fits into my schedule and helps fill my coffee craving any time I need to.
Yummy and good for a quick burst of energy when on a cycling tour. It's got chocolate so it will melt on hot day, but you can still eat them just fine.

I keep these coming through subscription and just love the Sweet and Salty Nut Granola Bars made by Nature Valley (It's like eating candy but atleast I know I am getting something good (like fiber and protein).  I am not worried about weight gain or loss and just like having theses around for me and my grandchildren.
I love earl grey tea. I looked everywhere for a real one, and here it is full of aroma and body. Drink hot or cold. A real joy
This tea is super yummy! I love that it's caffeine free and and organic. It helped my skin out a lot as well.
I bought this as a gift for my nephew who has yet to be born.  This toy is incredibly cute!  He is going to love it!

If your child has much of a will, or brainpower, s/he will take it off at night...and if they're really clever, they might put it back on in the AM :)  We switched to the Mavala yucky tasting stuff for my almost 5-yr old, and that worked like a CHARM.  In solidarity, I put that stuff on my finger nails (which I used to bite), and we both kicked our bad habits!

We have tried numerous brands of coffee
even different LavAzza coffee's
But this one in the Black can is by far the best
We have re-reordered a few times already
and will order more again

My 2.5 yo wouldn't always eat her fresh fruit or fruit cups. This solved the problem. I pack it in every lunch. They could be bigger, like at least 4oz or even 6oz would be better. When she eats them at home, she'll have 2.
Easy to clean, easy to store, easy to use.  Can't get better than this when storing your baby food
Love them. They stick great without the suction cups. I've only had them a week but they seem like they will last a while.

I know opinions vary but I think these are the best potty's!  The bowl is small so it's easy to rinse out even in small sinks.  There are other potty's that have softer seats but then there are more parts to clean.  Simple design, easy to clean.
I Love this coffee. Bold but smooth blend. Tastes like Expensive specialty coffee.  Stands up to milk and sugar. Great black too

We bought this potty after looking at a lot of other potties. I really like how the chamber comes out and has a spout for easier pouring into the toilet. I also like the 3 - in - 1 feature where the potty seat can fit onto adult toilets and the potty convert to a stepping stool. My daughter is very comfortable sitting on this potty. The only issues I have with it is:  First, the little odor control disk does not do anything. Literally. It is just a marketing ploy. If you dump out the potty every time your child uses it, rinse it out, and then dry it, then you will not have any stink. Besides, the disk lost its scent after a week. Second, the removable potty seat tends to stick to my daughter's rear and come up with her when she stands, before clanging back down - sometimes not even back onto the potty. I put my foot on the potty seat as she stands to prevent this. Third, the wipes on the side are so irritating we don't even use them. The package is hard to open, you push and push the little release button and it still WON'T open! I have to pry it open while holding down the catch. And then the wipes are hard to pull out and tear frequently. These wipes are the worst I've ever seen as far as durability. They tear even when wiping. So to sum everything in a nutshell:  the potty itself is great, but don't bother with replacing the scent disks or wipes.

I bought a box of these natural cashew bars as a gift for an amazing co-worker who is on the paleo diet. However, upon receipt, I was notified that she cannot eat nuts. As such, during a co-worker gathering, I decided to spread the wealth and give these bars out. My co-workers liked these bars so much that they asked me where to get them, and one of them even offered to pay me for a bar so she can bring it home to her husband (I rejected her payment, of course). I personally like them a lot, as well. In terms of food bars, my favorite ones are probably KIND brand bars, followed by Pure Organic brand bars, followed by these Caveman brand bars. Do note that these bars are a bit hard and tough to chew, so if you prefer softer food bars, you may want to avoid these. Of course, you can buy some to give them out to a gathering, like I did!
it is a really good low sensory item, and she is not able to chew tthru them as she can with many other items

I purchased this seat to transition from a rear facing infant seat.  I will be using as a forward facing seat only. Set up was very easy straps adjust very easy. Install took less than 10 minutes very easy anchors directly to car and feels very secure! Seat itself is very padded seems like it would be comfy and the fabric is plush and soft. Harness buckles are not hard to unbuckle but they are child proof. Best part is the extra room we gained in the front passenger seat. I do have a newer mid sized vehicle so that may have aided in the easy installation. This is a great carseat for the price I would recommend buying great quality!!!

I received this pump via insurance. I have used it maybe 10-15 times in the last month and it's already broken. The pumping action stopped working and zeros show up on the screen and then go away. I would NOT recommend this pump to anyone for this reason. However the functionality of the pump when it does work is great.

Reminds me of the restaurant in Philadelphia called The Original Bookbinders which is no longer in business.  These goodies were on everyone's table with fresh horseradish and you slathered on the cracker and popped in you mouth.  I have never found these in any grocery store or gourmet shop.  I am happy Amazon found this product and sells it.  They are fabulous.

This was my first macaroons to try, and I thought the cookies were a great experience. The chocolate was my favorite flavor. The shipping went without any problems and the cookies were intact. I would purchase again.

Bought this because of the great reviews. However it tasted terrible - fermented or spiked with alcohol. Not sure if I got a bad one or what but my kids hated it too. So disappointed. I was so looking forward to adding it to my espresso but it ruined it instead. Now will have to throw away the whole bottle. I hate wasting.

Good way to use fresh ground coffee in Keurig system. Only drawback was it was
a very tight fit in brewer.

I have sent reviews before on this product. I love them! The are really tasty and yummy. I have celiac and terrible food allergies and there aren't any really good treats I can eat. I also suffer from nausea and that was my original reason for trying them. They work like a charm. Couldn't live without them!
Flowers are very cute and the perfect size for a newborn or young infant.  The head bands are soft and stretchy.  Great buy!

I FINALLY RECEIVED THIS COFFEE AND COULD NOT WAIT TO TRY IT. THIS IS TRULY WHAT MOUNTAIN GROWN ORGANIC ARABICA COFFEE

SHOULD TASTE LIKE. YOU CAN JUST TELL FROM THE SAVORY SWEET TASTE, FULL BODY, AND INCREDIBLY SMOOTH FINISH. ABSOLUTELY

NO BITTER AFTERTASTE JUST LIKE A FINE BRANDY. IT IS SO WELL BALANCED AND HAS A CRISP RICH FLAVOR. AN AMAZING CHOCOLATEY

AROMA WITH ROASTED NUT UNDERTONES. THE CHOCOLATE IN PARTICULAR LINGERS IN A RESONANT FINISH. THIS IS DEFINITELY THE PURE

COFFEE LOVERS DREAM CUP. THIS IS WORTH EVERY PENNY. JUST AS GOOD AS JAMAICAN BLUE MOUNTAIN AT A QUARTER OF THE PRICE.

THIS IS THE COFFEE I WILL BE DRINKING FROM NOW ON. ONE FINAL NOTE TO TOP IT OFF IT IS USDA ORGANIC.

the taste is ok but it's not what I expected. It's basically dried and ground nuts and texturized vegetable protein that you have to reconstitute. I really feel irritated with amazaon sometimes with the product descriptions. I couldn't really tell what I was buying. It will be good to mix it in something such as soup or casserole but on it's own, I don't think the taste and consistency make it enjoyable.
I purchased the icing color set with the Abby Cadabby cake pan and they worked out great!
Delicious tea - I used with Takeya pitcher and go through a lot of this stuff. worth it.

I've eaten Sapporo Ichiban instant ramen for over 30 years now and Chicken is one of my favorite flavors. There's really no contest between this brand and other brands, so really the only "competition" Sapporo Ichiban has is between its flavors. Chicken and Shrimp are my hands-down favorite flavors, but Original is great too. Beef is good, but I don't eat it very often. I've never really taken to any other flavors just because eating those just makes me think, "I could be eating a chicken or a shrimp one...." My kids love these, so I'm passing on the love for these. I refuse to let them eat Top Ramen or Mum's, two brands that I find awful. The Sapporo Ichiban noodles are perfect and the broth just amazing. Yes, they're bad for you, but if you're going to be eating instant ramen anyway, you might as well eat the best one.

these little stickers are awesome and encourage you to photograph your baby every month as he/she grows during his/her first year of life. I really like this idea, and am so happy that I have photos every month of my baby for the first 12 months (where you see most rapid changes) - I would definitely recommend to everyone. Is also a great/thoughtful gift for new parents.

If you're looking for a pie filling like Wilderness or Comstock that has chunks, or full sized fruit in it, this isn't the product for you. If you're looking for a topping for a cheesecake, turnover, or tart filling, this works very well.  It isn't overly sweet, as a jam would be, and has a nice strawberry flavor.  The berries are present, but well cooked so the filling isn't chunky.  I used it as a tart filling and it turned out nicely. The tarts were well received (and liked!) by the recipients.  Some fruit fillings have a \\"gelatiny\\" texture. Not this one. It's more like a cooked fruit puree.  Would also be great as a filling for thumbprint cookies.  If you need a fruit filling for a dessert, you could be very creative with this strawberry filling.
These beans are good, but I was sort of shocked to find a rather sizable dirt clump fall out of the box.  I'm sure it was harmless, but it was still a bit shocking :)
with shipping charges, it would be double the price per bottle for me to buy it here, at my local organic store, it's $7.65 for 32 oz
Bought a crib for first grandchild and looked for an organic sheet.  This was exactly what I had in mind. Needed a back up sheet so I've ordered a second one.

I started to drink this last week in addition to my regular water intake and other fluid intake. After 24 hours I started to develop weird white pussy sores on the inside of my mouth, underneath my tongue. Yea, nasty. I stopped drinking this and after 4-5 days they cleared up. I called my doctor and he said that was weird, that it should not be the tea. So, I tried it again. Those sores came right back. Maybe it is my body \\"detoxifying\\" itself? I have taken a lot of the ingredients in this tea in other teas before, so I am not sure that it is an allergic reaction. I am questioning the quality of the tea at this point.

Such a weird thing.
Holds many, many poopy diapers and does exactly what it is supposed to.  Seals in foul smell as well.  Top of bag secures well with plastic snap.

I love these Brazil nuts! They are larger and have a better flavor than the ones I used to buy at my local store.  Try them once and you'll become a repeat customer, like me. Seriously...they are so much better.

I am a huge fan of the Haribo line of products and never thought I would find a product to match Haribo in quality and taste. Boy, was I wrong!

I bought these gummies from another website because they were on sale and I was a few bucks away from free s/h. I didn't expect much. These candies are VERY gummy. Some might consider them too hard/too chewy but to me they were the perfect texture. The flavors are not too strong and not overly fake tasting. I liked the pineapple and the orange ones best but they were all winners.

I'm now buying this 4-pack from Amazon so I can stock up! This is a great price for these gummies.

I would highly recommend this item to anyone but especially to Haribo lovers.

I am new to this brand of K-cups, but I have used 10 of mine and have not experienced any problems. I love the light roast because the others are too strong for my personal taste.  Don't know if the cups have been improved or not, but work great in my Cuisinart Keurig brewer.
Great price for the best protein out there!  It has a natural, earthy flavor that does take a little getting used to.

Matress fit our portable crib perfect! It is good quality and seems to be quite comfortable for the baby. The only problem is that it is not convenient for travel. The matress is stiff and can't be rolled for travel or storage.
Perfect for a vacation with young children. Great for use on public transportation! Worked well for my infant, 5 mos, and toddler, 3 yrs. The built in chair harness was great for use in restaurants!!
Great seats - cup holders not the best, but easy assembly and cool design.  My boys really like them.  Would recommend
To my mind, this is the best of the Zevia flavors. Zevia is so hard to find that it is great to have it delivered to your door.
I gave this purchase a five star, because it arrive before it was too and arrived in a very cushioned box. I also go a great price for the pops which are very hard to find.

We love this. We have purchased so many blankies for my son. We've paid $5-$30 each and this is the one that he loves the most. I think it's all the "nubs" on each corner and down the back. We've had to purchase multiple angel dear puppy blankies to make sure we always have a clean one on hand. Love them!

I was looking for a teether for my son that he could wear, and therefore hopefully not put it down and loose immediately. This watch is a good size for toddlers, I was somewhat concerned about the sizing. It's 1 3/4 " in diameter, for the wrist. It isn't super soft, it's bendable, but the watch part is rather hard for chewing. I am happy with this, if you are looking for a super chewy teether, like silicone, you may be disappointed. I have had poor luck with soft silicone teethers, they always break for my son, and I have to buy a new one. I would recommend depending on your child.

Fell in love with these last summer. And they're so hard to find in my local grocery stores. So glad I found it here. They're a refreshing add in to my water when I want something with a bit of flavor.
Great product! Stays on strong! Keeps my little guy from opening the window all the way!

I purchased this to downsize from a heavy bulky seat. My 5yr old grandson helped assemble the arms and back, an was convinced, its a big boy's seat, he can adapt when he grows "bigger".  It fit in my car and anchored easily. The guides for my seat belts cross his body and buckle without a hitch. He can manage it himself and we are happy with the cool red accents.
The owl is really darling, but the eyes are not sewn on but plastic - so makes me nervous because I know a child that choked and died on a stuffed animal eye or nose.
It's bland while you're drinking it without any real chocolate or hazelnut flavor and leaves a horrible aftertaste once you've drank it.

The actual flavor of the taffy was okay, not exactly like the ones my grandma put next to my bed at night when I stayed with her. However, the problem with this taffy was the way the machine wrapped each piece. There was taffy that oozed out of the waxed paper and when you unwrapped it small pieces of taffy flakes flew all over.  They are sticky and when you try to brush off they melt and do not come off until the item is washed. We had a bowl of them at a dinner party and proceeded to eat them in the living room after dinner. Well long story short pieces landed on upholstered furniture and several of our guests clothing. I was unable to remove from our love seat without damage, my husband used ice on his sweater to try and remove the taffy and had better luck, it truly ended up being a huge mess and did a lot of damage. In the bag there were huge clusters of pieces stuck together because of so much oozing out. Maybe this was a fluke and does not always happen but I ended up throwing away the rest of the bag to prevent any more damage.
I have tried many good honeys but this is by far the best ever,you'll never want clover or orange blossom after this!Please keep stocking this as there is no substitute nearly as good.

I currently have been stationed in Yokosuka, Japan in the Navy since last year and have been craving UTZ brand chips which are my favorite, me being an east coast native and all. I ordered the product last week and it's already here. My wife, daughter and I have almost ate half the box already. The chips are fresh and crisp having traveled such a great distance.Highly recommend Utz Quality Foods, Inc....great service with great products!
My bearded dragons loved these.  They lasted a long time in the refrigerator and worked great for guttloading the feeder crickets and dubias.  Will definitely be ordering again.

I love this machine, especially since my younger son HATES anything cold touching him.

my only issue is the lid, my two year old barely tilted it too far back and broke it off and now it doesnt stay on all the time. But other than that , it keeps wipes at just the right temp. I was worried about it getting too hot , but we havent had an issue with that and the nightlight is very convenient for night changes. it keeps me from having to turn on our artificial sun of a ceiling light that wakes my babies up for good.

also, the little baggies and baggie holder were a great bonus. I keep it attached to the diaper bag. Its a very convenient way to keep your diaper bag from getting stinked up by dirty nappies until you can get to a garbage can.

My brother LOVES these and can't resist popping a quarter into the vending machine every time he sees them.

I bought this big bag so I could send him a pound at a time for birthday's and Christmas, etc.

Keeping a pound for myself.
I use this to keep ants away from my beehives. It works well. Ants don' like cinnamon powder.

Elmo is very soft, cuddly for the child.  My daughter treats him more like a baby than sees him as a harness.  The harness itself is very durable, easy to put on, and the straps are large enough that it doesn't rub uncomfortably against their shoulders or back.  The middle strap has velcro, but is such a thick piece of velcro that I can't see anyone pulling it off easily.      The pocket has a zipper, which is a negative, velcro would have been MUCH better.  Also, the inside cloth lining sort of comes inside out (Elmo is very plush) which can get caught in the zipper.  The pocket is SO small that I can't see putting anything in it (anything you could fit in it would probably be a choking hazard to your child, so why you would put it in there anyway I have no clue.  Maybe a pacifier for those who are still hooked to their pacifiers, or pennies for older toddlers...)    Otherwise it's a GREAT safety harness.  Unlike the ones that have the toy or bag on the back of the child (where they can't play with it, look at it, or cuddle it) this one has Elmo in front where she can give him kisses on the head, and show him off to people.

Not nearly as good as the other brand of apple chips. The only nutritional value they have at all is 2 g of dietary fiber per bag. My kids will not eat them, and now I have to eat 24 bags of mediocre, over-priced apple chips.

Usually at home I fix 'real' oatmeal in a pan. But, when I travel that is not possible. This is great to take along. Just a packet for each day and I can fix it with hot water from the coffee maker in the hotel room. Tastes good and is just what I want. Grab a fruit from the lobby (if they have any) and I'm ready for the day.

I love these shakes and have at least one a day. My favorite is the chocolate -- WHY is it 'under review?'
I just went to buy another case (I buy probably 2 a month) before I run out, only to find you are not selling it at the moment.
Please bring it back -- right away!

I light light to medium brews, but this one was a little light to me. I had to use a smaller cup size on the Keurig to get more of the flavor. It's not bad just very light so make sure that's what you are looking for. It was almost a little watered down for me.

So hard to put onto the main pillow. You will need two people and it will take you about 10 mins. It should come with some instructions on an easy way to put it on the pillow, or technique of some sort. I almost started crying putting this thing on.
this is a great chew toy for my twins... easy for them to grip, makes a sqeaking noise, and fits perfectly in their mouth.
I bought it to try and didn't like the taste, but it's probably what it's suppose to be
So far this is the only product like this with the only ingredient being almonds and nothing else. Love it!
Gave both my kids the confidence to get it done on their own...except the wiping, of course ;)

Magic manna. Yes, it does harden as temperatures drop, but that is the nature of the product. I add it to my home made coconut milk kefir. It gives it the natural coconut flavor it would otherwise lack.

The tartness and texture that I was looking for!  My local store recently stopped carrying good quality Pomegranate Molasses (switched to one that is more of a sugar syrup than a reduced juice).  Unlike the cheaper brand, this pomegranate molasses tastes more like concentrated pomegranate than candy, so it is wonderful in both sweet AND savory recipes.  I love putting a dash into homemade vinaigrette dressing--it adds a real richness and depth of flavor.

Having developed a wheat allergy, I have really been missing lasagna and other pastas - always on the search for something that tastes even remotely \\"normal\\", I am pleased to say this is great! Recommend!

I'm relatively new to cloth diapering...my little guy is 6 mos and I decided to try it out. I bought a few different brands after doing a lot of review reading. I wanted AIO's for sure, no diaper stuffing for me. And I've tried ones like Flip with someone else's kid and hated them. Anyway...between swaddlebees (which after seeing it I returned it without even trying it), Bummis Tots Bots (which won second place with me), and Bum Genius Freetime, I liked Thirsties the best. They fit great, are soft inside and you don't have to mess with trying to get the liners in the right spot (like with the BG). I also like the Tots Bots, I just take forever to tuck the long liner inside and smooth it out, otherwise that one washes and wears great as well. I don't have issues with the velcro (I am not a fan of snaps), the laundry tabs work just fine. I always line dry my diapers. Turn these Thirsties inside out when you hang them, they'll dry faster. I wash a load at night and they're dry by morning. I also have one MotherEase diaper for nights, so far that works great too, absorbs a lot! I've never put extra liners in any of my diapers yet. I don't have issues with them leaking. My son would leak everyday (messy diapers) with disposables, haven't had issues with any of the cloth ones. Yay! Out of my small stash of 10 diapers, 5 are Thirsties. :)

**update, now that my son is almost 8 mos, I still am glad we switched to cloth diapers and I'm loving the Thirsties AIO! I had to use disposables a few days ago because I was saving our cloth diapers for our out of town trip and of course my son had a messy diaper. It leaked horribly (and we buy top of the line Huggies diapers, not the cheap ones) and I realized then that since going cloth, I haven't had issues with leakages all over his clothes, I haven't had to deal with stains. It's been great. That said, the Bum Genius and MotherEase diapers have done just as well as the Thirsties in the leaking dept. However, we have hada few overnight wet leaks, my son thinks he still needs to wake up several times a night to nurse so unless I change him in the middle of the night (which he hates and screams the whole time) there are mornings his PJs are wet. Maybe getting a liner for overnights would be a good idea. He does wake up in the mornings with messy diapers sometimes and those do not leak, just the wetness.
This product is amazing!! She used to get so sweaty in her car seat. Not anymore! My daughter is kept cool during the 100+ degree summer!

I read the reviews on all the bath tubs before deciding on this one. My daughter is 9 weeks old now and she seems to really like it. She enjoys her bath and doesn't scream, so I guess that is a good sign!! I like the fact that it is cushioned and retains the water and stays warm. It doesn't take up too much room in the bathroom and dries pretty quickly. I am glad I made this purchase and it is a reasonable price!! I would recommend it to everyone.
I really like this company. The Products are  excellent and I am never disappointed. I have been a satisfied customer for more than a couple of years.

we got this for my son thinking he would love it, but he actually hates it. it is very difficult to get his little legs to move it over carpet, and there's not enough smooth surfaces in our home for him to move on. the only good thing is the mini maestro can come off so he can play with it in his lap.
I liked it in the photo but when I got it and checkedit out in our own  kid's room, it was not quite as cute as in the photo.

Amazing is all I can say.  It shipped quick, it is a bit smaller in size to what it looks like in the picture so make sure to read the weight before you order.  My father is a diabetic and he is very picky in what he eats.  We could not find sugar-free halva anywhere except online.  The texture is amazing, it smells delicious, and as a bonus it has pistachio pieces inside as well!  It is a bit on the oily side, which is odd for halva, however, the little bit of oil is only on top when you open the container.  Be careful eating this as eating too much will give you diarrhea due to the sorbitol sweetener.  Will definitely buy again!
My favorite almond flour. Just wish they had it in stock more often! It's very finely ground and bakes really well!

Received this as a shower gift and it is a lifesaver.
It is true that if you have motion going it uses more energy from the batteries -- duh!
The light is bright, that's why they call it a nightlight; if you don't like it, turn it off.
The light is blue and VERY calming.
The sound can be adjusted to three levels.
It straps SECURELY to side or end of crib. (I read another review that said they have a hard time with the straps BUT was changing batteries at 3am in the dark with a screaming kid; try changing batteries sooner, like 6pm)
It has wonderful bubbles for baby to see and hear -- just like my fish aquarium = soothing!
It goes for 18 minutes and I've only gone back in maybe three times to restart.
I've had it 8 months, changed batteries twice (so 3 sets batteries in 8 months)
Never leaks and baby DOES kick it a lot, using feet to turn on and off.
Absolutely the SINGLE MOST IMPORTANT ITEM bought or received, including the crib.

This product is constantly sucking milk back into the tubing.  I always have to clean the tubing out. It is very aggravating being a school teacher and having to clean my tubing everyday on my already shortened lunch period.

Wasn't expecting much...I just wanted a reasonably priced mayo that I could buy in bulk that tasted good...

...and JFG's Real Mayo does just that! It has a better egg flavor than Helmann's and a better price...and good consistency too. It is easy to mix and holds up well without overpowering the other flavors in recipes. I will definitely buy this product from Amazon again!
Hershey's big chocolate bars are the best if you plan on making candy. I melted it down to use for making Easter candy

My wife and I (mostly my wife) spent weeks searching for the right highchair. After physically taking our daughter to half a dozen stores and propping her up in close to a dozen chairs, we are very satisfied with this model. It rolls from room to room, and doubles as a easy chair where our daughter plays for hours a day. It's good looking, too, and comes with a simple one-color cover, if you don't like the patterned cushion. The only complaint is that it could be a few inches higher so we don't need to lean over so far to feed her. By the way, we started using it when our daughter was just five and a half months old and 16 pounds. She fits in it very securely; doesn't get lost in it like she did in most others. We are not yet using the tray, but expect to within a month or so.
I had this flavor tea while visiting a coastal coffee/tea house. I had truly enjoyed it and was thrilled to find it here. I still enjoy this as part of my tea rotation.

Good stuff-no chemicals-just a light bit of flavor.  I usd to buy this stuff at a local grocery store for $159 a bottle.  There are additional flavors as well.  I like them all and buy large quanties of it.
OMGatos!! This is delicious no matter if I make it strong or week. My kids even love it! Will be ordering more. Tastes like it came fresh from a coffee shop. Excellent
Love them!  They have a good ginger taste and they are nice and crisp.  Time to order more.

I absolutely reccommend the Jeep Liberty Renegade Walker!!  I have a 3 month old son and let me tell you, he absolutely loves it!!  He presses all the buttons and turns the wheel.  Sometimes he even takes a step backward in it.  I know that some people think that walkers aren't safe because of stairs; but when you have a child that young the stairs should be off limits anyway.  If you're thinking about buying this item please do, your child will love it. You will too when you see his/her happy face.
Ugh, I'm such a sucker for candy. And these are pretty inexpensive compared to what they cost in stores.

ahh.. this has become a staple around here.  from making a sauce.. to making soups where i toss in meat, mushrooms, rice, noodles or macaroni or whatever.. i love this stuff.  this was my second time.. a repeat purchase and i will buy it again.
It has taken quite a few washes (as they recommend) to get to full absorbency. But these inserts last my son the entire night (with a stay dry insert on top) without any leaks! Love these inserts!
I love that this is fairly neutral and will go with different themes if I  decide to change things up a little later on.

We got 2 of these and had the same problem with both.  The cloth on this cover already had some snags on it when we took it out of the package.  After washing it as directed, it has gotten even worse.  It has strings hanging all over it.  It's a very useful item, but the quality of the fabric is terrible! A friend of mine had the same problem, and she recommends the Especially for Baby brand (less expensive and better quality).
Just what I've been looking for....I eat Craisins every single day, and I'm always looking to reduce sugar intake....

If you're having trouble to eat your fish, this is perfect for it. I've tried it out with chicken as well, but fish and this are just perfect together, you just have to be careful to add it till the las couple of minutes of cooking time because the herbs might burn. If you love fish pair it with this and you'll se how different and delicious will taste. The price was very good though in supermarkets might be a little bit less expensive but it won't last for long in the shelves. (but I'm talking about cents!)
I make a gel out of these seeds. Keep a jar in the fridge. Put them in the morning smoothie. Helps with appetite and sustains energy.
This is a life savior. It stoped the fight over the cup holders between me and my wife lol. It fits my F-150 2013 cup holders perfectly.

This product is great !  It is half the price of a \\"My K-cup\\", you don't need to remove anything on your brewer to use it and it is a breeze to use and clean.  I am so glad I checked out Amazon, as I had never heard of this product before. Thanks Amazon!

My wife wanted this stroller so that we could easily push around our new born and our daughter who just turned 5. Overall, we really like it, but it could be better. With the infant seat installed (Chicco Keyfit 30), there isn't much room left for the older one to sit without getting a major crook in her neck. So, she mostly stands on it instead. I'm hoping she will have more room once our little one moves from the infant seat to the regular toddler seat. Also, it's very hard to set the latch to keep the unit folded up or closed with the infant seat attachment on. It bumps into the handle in the folded position making it hard to close that last inch to have the latch reach the peg. No one will want to remove the infant attachment each time you close it. It will close and latch, but it isn't super easy. Last, the orange strap for the infant seat is a bit of a pain. With it strapped, you can't really easily get your infant in/out of the infant seat, so you find yourself taking the strap on/off a lot. It ends up not always getting re-snapped and the plastic ends drag on the ground when pushing the stroller. The plastic end/snap also isn't one handed friendly to unstrap, since it has a safety button in the middle that has to be pressed in addition to the two side buttons. This means if you have something in one hand and need to unstrap the belt, it's a bit of a challenge with one hand. Especially when your infant is the thing in your other hand which is probably more of a safety issue than a little one (more likely the one riding on the back) from unstrapping it.

Overall, all of our complaints are with regards to the infant seat attachment. They could use some improvements in that area. The rest is great. Nice shade, rolls very nice and the cup holder device pockets are great.
I bought these products largely to show my support and belief in Paula Deen.  I love all of her spice mixes and this one did not disappoint.

I purchased this for my newborn and ill review the pros and cons for this product. I LOVE the storage part underneath the playard, I put all her receiving blankets and blankets there. I also love the bassinet, she can snooze all day in there! As for cons I disliked how the changing table was slightly tilted so when I changed her she would roll over! I now use it to put all my wipes and diapers on and just change her on the bed. 4 stars for this playard.
I had a friend who had something like this once.  Maybe it was this product.  I think it tastes great and is a safe alternative to tobacco.  I only wish it was sold somewhere in town.  Thanks

Customer service (one woman for the US area) was very nice, but I'm not willing to give my credit card to someone to pay for an unknown shipping amount to have a replacement clock sent.

Item arrived sooner than indicated, had the factory smell so I washed it with dreft detergent. I don't want gaps as my goal was to keep my 2 month old's limbs safely inside the crib. I'm not quite satisfied.

We needed something to contain our 9 month old who wanted to crawl to things like the cat food, dirty shoes by the door, and other \\"no-no\\" things.  He has a playpen, but we wanted something that had more square footage so he could crawl and stand and play without feeling too confined.  We got the extension piece and it turned the play yard into 19sq feet - it is perfect.  He has learned to pull himself up, and stand, and walk around the bars, but can not move the pen, nor climb on it due to the vertical slats.  If you have the play yard, it is totally worth the investment to get the extension pieces.

I searched around online and all the local stores for a baby book that I liked. The stores had very limited selection and online the prices seemed fairly expensive. I finally settled on this one thru Amazon.com (made by Carters). This baby book is perfect. The quality is really great and it has tons of pages to fill. It has 76 pages, each one color with some cute graphics such as elephants, monkeys and turtles. It covers some interesting topics from first teeth to cost of living. There isn't a ton of space for pictures, but I'm sure if I cut down the 4x6 prints that I could squeeze in plenty.

This tray protector is easily taken off the tray by my daughter (14 months) and flung across the kitchen.  She spends more time playing with it than she does eating her food.  I'm considering using sticky-back velcro to keep it in place as the fit is not very snug.

These cups are amazing! Great for transitioning a toddler to a big boy cup with no lid. I'm took the handles off the smaller cup bc they slid off easily to avoid it looking like a sippy cup. These are my new favorite cups and I will be ordering more!

It's a good camera, except for one thing...it completely borked our wireless network (as another reviewer mentioned). Unfortunately, we didn't even THINK that the camera might be the reason, and it took us MONTHS of troubleshooting (new routers, new modems, etc.) to figure out that the cause was this stupid camera. (We had had a Summer monitor before with no problems...but apparently the two-way feature on the camera is the issue.)

If it weren't for the network issue, I'd give it five stars. But since it was a complete failure I had to give it one star.

The grip was very easy to install and the quality of the product and instructions were
excellent

It is positioned in the centre of the handle, so that you have to walk off centre in relationship to the stroller...
on a very leveled road, it works well, however in order to steer it, one would have to walk even farther left or right off centre, which is not possible on a narrow path. On roads where there is an incline or a slant, it is too much effort to use the grip. May be beacuse I am using the grip, I have been noticing that many roads in my Victoria BC are like that.

it also presses against the soft tissue of the arm, which resulted in my wife abandoning the grip.
I am happy to trade my back ache for the arm ache :-)

In the city, I use it 40-50% pf the time and fortunately it is easy to move it out of the way so that one can go back to using stroller's original handle.

overall it is a good product but with limitations one needs to consider before buying.

*In case this will help anyone who doesn't want to dry their SprayPal in a bucket next to the toilet...with both the toilet lid and seat lifted (ours are lightweight and stay up in place), we just loop a string under the back part of the clip and loop it over the top of the lid and seat and catch the other end of the string loop around the flush handle. Works great to let it drip/air dry into the toilet, and then you can store it on the floor next to the toilet after it dries. We are using this often enough now that it doesn't make sense for us to wait for it to dry, unclasp it, fold it, and store it under our sink after each use. Loved the overall look, idea, and features of this chair with 3 exceptions.  First off, while there are only 2 wheels on the front of the chair and none on the back, my 2 year old was able to walk right over to the chair and push it around our dining room floor without a problem.  I'm sure if we had carpet it wouldn't be an issue, my our older pergo flooring didn't present much of a challenge.  We bought this for our newborn, but certainly don't want his sister sliding him around the room.  Secondly, regardless of what other reviewers have said, the t-bar is absolutely closer to the back of the seat than other high chairs.  We even went to Babies R Us and compared this chair to all the other ones in the aisle, and it has a solid 2 inches less space than any of the others.  Lastly, the tray has the LOUDEST snap that I've ever heard.  Maybe that seems like a weak complaint, but it sounds like the thing is breaking when you take it off and it's way too loud to do while there's a newborn (or 2 year old) sitting right in front of it.  In the end, this was returned as soon as I could box it up and get it to UPS.
The cookies that were sent to me had a best buy date 2 days after i received them (it was a case of cookies).  Lucky for me Amazon refunded my money anyhow.  I would not buy from Knotts again.

The caramel and cheddar popcorn in this mix are an unusual combination. I thought it might resemble the sweet and slightly salty taste of [[ASIN:B009WN4HQO Crunch N Munch]]. Instead it's more like grabbing a handful of two snacks that are meant to be eaten separately, and putting them together. My kids and I tried this out and we found ourselves sort of separating the pieces or just eating one type or another. The kettle pieces have a slightly sweet taste to them, so they mixed in with the caramel pieces.

If you're one who really likes snacks with a mix of contrasting flavors, this one might be just perfect for you. However if you're just looking for a good popcorn mix for a snack, you might not like the combination of cheese with caramel flavors as much as you might think you will.

I'm actually not much of one for pink, but when I gave my older kids a chance to choose the color for their baby sister, this is what we ended up with.  I have to say that I'm completely satisfied.  We had previously owned one of those 'switched to a stepstool, multi-layered potty' things and I HATED it.  So much so that we simply bypassed the 'potty chair' thing and taught the kids to sit backwards on the toilet instead from the time we started toilet training.  This one is so easy.  Two whole pieces.  All solid.  No nooks and crannies to clean.  Why did we get it if we're used to using the regular toilet for potty training?  Well, we are using this with our... yes, we're a little crazy... 5 month old.  (We're all allowed to try at least one weird thing with each child, right?) She can sit on it easily and it is streamlined enough that it can sit under her swing between uses.  (some people might have issues with having a toilet in the living room, I realize, but if you're not one of them.. this is the best option for size and aesthetic.)  I truly think that when my youngest is using the big potty, I would be tempted to keep it in the back of the van for emergency use.  It would work for my three year old as well, though it is obviously a bit closer to the ground than most.  All in all, if I had to do it over, this is the only one we would get and for $15, it's a steal.
These liners are great! So soft and complete coverage! Great price too. Perfect for using rash cream with cloth dipes!

And it's about time, too! This was definitely one of Disney's better shows in the early/mid-90s. Both kids and adults can get a good laugh out of this show and the humor should hold up well over the years, nothing too dated.

Especially when there's also supposed to be captioning, surround sound and decent artwork on the packaging. Disney also apparently learned their lesson with previous DVD series releases and this time they're including the pilot. Only the first 25 eps of season 1, though, so hopefully the second half will be along soon.

They products has a great shape and is convenient.  The pictures don't do them justice.  The colors are so cute.  The product is a good quality product with strong stitching.  This allows the product to be machine washed often and not wear out.  Just what every new mom needs.  My sister loved them.

Lots of chocolate for your money, and much nicer than regular bars. The chocolate melts in your mouth and tastes delicious. It is easy to break into small sections, but not overly fragile.

[[ASIN:B000GRER9W Teeccino All-Purpose Grind, Java, Caffeine-Free Herbal Coffee, 8.5-Ounce Cans (Pack of 6)]]Price is right.  Flavor is great even though I prefer one of the other flavors.  I won't say it is great for you, but it does beat coffee and it is pretty good when iced.

LOVE these things!  I mean, if you haven't tried them, you might be thinking..."pita chips????"  Well, let me tell you, you're missing out!  They're wonderful.  I personally hate fresh pita BREAD that you buy in the store, but these are so AMAZING since they're baked chips!  I must eat 3 regular sizer big bags a week at home, and the fact that they're baked makes me feel much better about eating them.  If you like hummus (or any dip, salsa or salad really), these are a must have!  My favorite hummus is Sabra brand - and I think they are both made by the same family of companies - especially the Pine Nut flavor.  I also love Stacy's "Everything Bagel Crisps!  My favorite flavor of the 3 in this variety pack is the naked chips, which may give you the notion they are plain, but they are actually very delicious, and I enjoy them best just "naked" as described (right out of the bag with nothing on them).  They have only wholesome ingredients and I love the convenience of the individual portion sized bags.  I usually keep a few extra of the individual portion sized snacks and lunch items at my desk and that way not only do I have a back up meal or snack for when I get too busy to take a real lunch break, but sometimes, just as an act of kindness, I'll brighten a coworkers day and take them a snack when I see they have a particularly heavy workload or just want to brighten someone's day.  Also nice when we have a group brown bag or bible study lunch and you need something easy to eat or nibble on.  Another thing I like about having a few extra at work is that if I wind up sitting down with a friend during the lunch hour, I can share without feeling like I don't have my own lunch, and they don't feel guilty about it either.  I love the nice, thicker texture of the naked ones and the parmesan ones.  The cinnamon ones seem a bit thinner and lighter and crispier and perfect if you want a bit of a sweet snack but don't want to go crazy overboard with a heavy sugar-laden guilt trip.  These are also wonderful if you like chips with your sandwich, you can just eat your tuna or chicken salad, for example, right on the chips and forgo the bread.  That way you get the crunchy chip experience and can leave out the extra carbs.sugar-laden guilt trip.  These are also wonderful if you like chips with your sandwich, you can just eat your tuna or chicken salad, for example, right on the chips and forgo the bread.  That way you get the crunchy chip experience and can leave out the extra carbs.

I really wanted to like this tea. I drink a lot of ice tea in the summer, but hate taking up a lot of shelf space in the refrigerator. I always drink unsweetened tea, fairly strong. I was pleased that this tea came out strong enough that I could add more ice and even some water, but I was disappointed in the flavor. To me it tastes exactly like Nestea instant tea powder. Yuck!    I am thinking about trying some of the \\"sweet tea\\" options, but if they are just sweet flavors over the same yucky base, I don't think it would be an improvement.   Stick to putting a tea bag in a glass and boiling some water through your Keurig.
Very sturdy and easy to train your child on how to use the Potty...had to buy two for twins...both learned within 3 days

If you have Tommee Tippee bottles these are heaven sent. Super convenient to take formula on the go without having to take the entire formula container or a separate container for it. Highly recommend.

It is perfect. We are using it for an antique doll crib and it fit perfectly. The doll loves it as well. She reports it is very comfortable. My granddaughter also got in the crib with the doll and liked it very much. It came very quickly and arrived in perfect shape.

My baby loves to lay on this.  It's just enough cushion to keep him comfy.  It's easy to take with us also.  It is a little smaller then I'd like but other then that it's easy to wash and take with us.
The toy does not stay in the suction base very well, but my son loves to play with it anywhere.  Great toy.

What a convenience it is using the Senseo coffee pods, no mess, pre-measured, and less than a minute from start to finish--which is a rich, flavorful cup of coffee!!
Besides that, it is often difficult to locate a local store that sells Senseo. So when I realize that I'm running low, I simply go on Amazon, search for the best deal, and like magic--it's usually on my doorstep in 2 days!! Such a deal!!!

For security purposes I needed a way to see my front gate without being seen, and I wondered if this unit could handle the job.  It's perfect; now I can see who is out there without having to open the blind.  Everything works as advertised with no interference from my internet wi-fi, cordless phone or satellite TV.  There are two adapters; one looks a bit different but the company says they are interchangeable.  I placed the camera in the window overlooking the gate and it gives an excellent clear, wide-angle picture in daylight.  Since it did not work through the dark reflective coating, I removed a small area of the film for the camera to see through. The low-light infrared function is great and the monitor can increase or decrease the light level.  The sound function is a bonus, and the portability is a great feature in case I need to watch from different rooms.  Still another application for this system is to view TV.  I can't get satellite programs on my bedroom TV, but I can put the camera in front of the TV that does get them, turn up the sound louder, and watch the little monitor in bed.  The quality of course is not great, but it can be done.  I'm sure I'll think of more applications as it is so versatile.  The technology of this digital video monitor is fabulous.  The designers have thought of everything, and last but not least, the affordable price is very much appreciated.  Customer service is excellent; a human answers the phone promptly. The DXR-5 has solved a longstanding problem for me with no unwanted complications.  It should be listed under Home Security as well if you ask me.

I have always loved Oreo cookies, splitting them in half and doubling up on the insides (way before Double Stuff Oreo cookies). Dunking them in milk is also a favorite thing to do. So when I heard there was a new Oreo product out I decided to give it a try.

First of all the packaging is great it is a thin plastic / metallic wrapping that pulls open and than self sticks when you close which keeps the cookies closed. All though the bag is dark and it is hard to see the cookies inside so I almost threw out the last two. You don't get as many cookies as a normal Oreo package. I believe my bag had 27 cookies with a serving being 3 cookies (really 5 is closer to what you will eat at a time).

Taste wise they taste like the peanut butter cookies from the Girl Scouts perhaps a tad bit thinner. The cookies are great but if you gave me a blind taste test and asked if I felt there was any Oreo in the cookie I would say no. I tried to dunk one in milk and it was not tasty at all so be warned. Once again a great cookie but it just did not have the Oreo taste to it in any way.
This is so handy. I take my grand daughter from room to room. She fits nicely and is so comfy. It's easy to clean and the quality is outstanding . I would recommend this to everyone with a new baby.

Just recently I decided to look for it again and was so excited to find it on Amazon! I'm a huge chili fan and this is my favorite! Highly recommend it. You can adjust the heat level to your liking.
