I love Halo Sleep sack products!
This is the first Early Walker I have purchased for my mobile little guy & I'm once again impressed.
You can tuck baby's feet away into the sack when it's time for bed or he can have have his little piggies out & crawling, walking around creating an MC Hammer-like pants for him to move around in. Adorable!
The fabric is lightweight, snugly, & perfect for summer nights in a house that likes to run the air conditioner.
I love that the zipper ends at the bottom of the sack!
It's amazing how much easier & less disruptive it is to change a sleepy baby when the zipper ends at the toes! I won't bother with other sleepy sacks that don't.

**UPDATED**

**** We've had this seat for just about a year now. We've also added another daughter since then. Happily, this seat is not overly wide (about 19\\") so we were able to fit it in the backseat of our sedan with a Combi Shuttle and an original Sunshine Kids Radian. They puzzle together nicely.

The seat still looks brand-new. Even with my daughter's messy habits (sunflower seeds and grape juice, anyone?) the fabric has NO stains. Very easy to clean and impressive stain resistance.

We did find a cupholder that fits onto the side of the seat. Brica makes them as well as Fisher price. It's even brown so it matches.

The only thing I've noticed is that the straps tend to get twisted when my daughter buckles herself in. I haven't noticed any permanent deformation, though.

When the seat is installed with the seatbelt, I also noticed the shoulder belt can be felt through the seat fabric. It's right across the lower back, but my daughter hasn't complained about any discomfort so I'm guessing her weight is enough to smash it flat.

Still very happy with this seat and will be purchasing a \\"sister\\" booster and convertible seat for our other two when we get our new, larger vehicle. ******

It just arrived this evening, but everything looks great so far.

My eighteen-month-old daughter loves it. She started clapping as soon as she saw it leave the box. She looks very comfortable sitting in it and I had to fight to get her out.

The FABRIC (Hanna) is very durable, similar in texture to twill. I think it will hold up nicely and feels cool to the touch- very good for our southern summers.

It was a breeze to INSTALL. It took my husband literally one minute to get the job done in our Mercury Sable sedan. It was as simple as latch, latch, latch, pull, pull, pull. Solid!

I have just two downsides that I can see so far, having not used it for long.

Thereis no CUPHOLDER. I didn't realize this until after it was ordered. I might be able to find an aftermarket attachment or one that will hang nearby in the car. Kind of disappointing in such a pricey seat, though.

This thing is HEAVY! I mean, \\"holy cow, I think I just pulled something\\" heavy. Not a huge issue unless you're going to have to carry it up stairs a lot or take it in and out of a taxi all day. The weight is probably due to the steel frame. In this case, \\"heavy\\" means \\"safe and sturdy,\\" I think.

Overall, a very nice, sporty, and attractive seat. I feel like there is a little race car driver in my back seat. I almost wish we had a reason to replace my older daughter's Britax so that she could have one of these, too. :)

At first opening the package you get a strong fish smell. That is the oil seasoning. I was highly suspicious of that odor and how it would affect the taste of the noodles. After i combined all the seasoning and add the hot water and mixed it together it came to a nice aroma and a hearty broth. The seasoning packets contain a soup base, oil seasoning, and a coconut powder packet. The coconut combines really well into the soup and gives it a slight sweet undertone to the soup which really gives it an authentic asian taste. This is really a rich broth and one of my favorites. Do not let the fish smell deter you this is fantastic!

I LOVE this thing.  We had the swaddleme's but my baby was able to roll side to side in them from the day she left the hospital.  She could always break out of the swaddle blankets and I wasn't good enough at them to not worry about fabric getting to close to her face.  The miracle blanket keeps their arms at their sides so she couldn't roll around in it.  She slept fantastic in it and never broke out of it.  We stopped using it at 3mo when she rolled back to tummy and I was sad to see it go.

I bought these at a local market. I've eaten a bunch of them and what I have to say is... Do not expect an immediate tea flavor. A lot of Asian foods are about the lingering after taste. I found that the strongest flavor upon first taste is of course dark chocolate. The next thing I noticed was a strong flavor of butter. And 5 minutes later, I'm still tasting the tea. The texture is not as soft as you would expect. However, any softer, and they wouldn't hold shape or the cream. Overall, I like them, but at $8 for 10, I probably won't be buying them on a regular basis. It's not standard American fare, and when you embark on a new taste, you have to open your mind and palate to new ideas. You also have to understand the way other people enjoy their food. It's a cultural thing. I'm sure there is someone from another country out there who finds tater tot casserole repulsive. The first time.

Based on reviews, I bought this \\"stuff\\", even my dogs won't eat it.
Some one got me again, probably won't be the last time that I buy \\"STUFF\\". You know what I mean...right?
But...the next time I see 5 reviews, 5 stars and no other reviews, I'll run like the wind.
Should be labeled \\"STUFF\\"

I discovered this bouncer at my baby's daycare - they told me he had a favorite chair. I didn't know what that meant, but when I put him in this bouncer I saw his face light up as he started bending his whole body up toward the toys. This is a noticeable winner! He really loves this bouncer, and he learned to use his legs to bring toys closer to his arms.

I love this tea. It was recomended to me by my friend and all I can say it is great. It has a smooth taste, and divine smell. Great tea.
Only, do not leave it to seep for too long because then it gets bitter.

Boy am I glad I didn't listen to the negative feedback written about this chair. I waited for it to become available for about 3 months and it was totally worth the wait. It is the cutest most convenient little chair on the market and matches my dining room set perfectly! I was actually surprised that it matched because the color is called espresso which I thought would be black but its more of a chocolate cherry color...beautiful. This chair is well built and very sturdy. It is a perfect height for feeding so you don't need to reach up to your baby while sitting on your own chair. It is super easy to clean and the for deeper cleaning you just remove the plastic tray and throw the cushion in the washing machine. My baby also loves the convenient footrest. After testing out a few of those white plastic clunker chairs I\\"m even more happy that I purchased this stylish compact chair which takes up almost no room and is great for our small apartment. The tray also doesn't get stained like the white ones do. I have heard other people brag that their high chairs recline but umm.. why would you want your baby to lay back in her highchair? I find it odd. Anyway I really just felt like I had to write a review for this chair to let everyone know how great it is and that this is the highchair for you! (and no i don't work for svan or anka :)

Looks great...matches other espresso products from Stork Craft (I have the crib as well!  Looks great together!)  Pretty easy to put together.  Drawers slide smoothly and close nicely...great sturdy and large handles that do not spin in circles (or loosen over time)  like other products I've encountered. Going to make a great changing table/dresser for our little one...can't wait to fill in now!

This has GOT to be the worst tasting food I have ever had in my mouth.  Seriously, if I were starving in the wilderness I would eat tree bark before I would put this stuff in my mouth.  Absolutely NASTY !!!  Stay away !!!
I love how is sooths my son to sleep..He loves the bright colors..I like that its low to the ground
Got this item in the mail, the product was packed very well and had no damages to it. The taste is wonderful, I loved it.
Great quality and price on these beans.  I have purchased before, and most certainly will purchase again as I am very impressed. I use the beans to make my own vanilla.

OMG, I cannot say enough good things about this product. We call it Las Vegas since it has so many things that are so close together. We have twin boys, so we have 2 of these and they are life saver. We have taken several road trips and for each one, they have kept the boys occupied for hours and allowed us to keep driving as opposed to pulling over to calm them down.

Highly recommended
Well made and cute.  Soft. But way too bulky and it turns so that the soft part isn't always there when you pick it up with your arm.  Also for me it's too big to use when carrying with my hand.

We LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!! We get compliments on it all the time when we are out to eat. This lives in my son's diaper bag so that anytime we go to a restaurant or to company's house for dinner we will have it. I love the fact that it is a CLEAN place to cut up food for my son, or dump Puffs or Cheerios out for him to grab (I would never be able to do that on a restaurant table - GERMS!!! And if he had a plate he would just knock it off the table.) The best part is the little hanging crumb catcher. There will still be a few things that make it to the floor, but the little catcher is AWESOME and catches most of the things he drops. This should be in every mama's diaper bag!!
just as described. my 18-month old loves it and it's really helped him settle down for bed.

Not a fan of the material, fit is way too tight and the seam on the inside of the beanie leaves marks on my baby's head.  My LO has a pretty small HC (in the 10th percentile) and at 2 months old we had to stop putting this on him because of the tight fit.
It took awhile for me to find a sippy cup that my daughter would take. She liked the soft nipple-like feel of this silicone spout the best. Now she takes any kind of sippy cup!

I've tried several of the Kind snack bars and this is one of my favorites. It has just the right mix of sweet (dark chocolate), savory (the nuts), and a hint of salt. It's a bit more expensive than some other snack bars, but well worth it, to my taste. I especially like the fact that it's made of just simple food -- no polysyllabic mystery-molecules from a laboratory someplace.

Bought this for us to transport my grandchild and have a second carriage at our house.I love it. I love the fact that you can buy an additional base for less than $35.00 to add it to\   my husbands car. so no need to purchase a second expensive car seat. A very good investment. Excellent quality and wheels just glide sooo smoothely even oven rough concrete. Also like the fact that car seat removes from carriage no need to buy a second carriage as baby gets older.

I must say day to day I do not and cannot use this pillow.  I get to sweaty and can't turn over.  The not being able to turn over part is why I purchased this though.  I had shoulder surgery and was trying to sleep in a recliner.  It was not going well.  I tried this pillow and was able to sleep in BED.  It kept me from being able to turn over onto my bad shoulder.  For that reason I love this pillow.  It is now put away in the even of any other events.

My son slept in this for 4 months and it was a life saver! We loved the vibrating feature at first. When he was really young it helped put him to sleep. I remember reading other negative reviews and I have no complains. I wash the bedding every week or so and had no problems.

This was what I used to think was the best stevia, until I tried Nunaturals alcohol free liquid stevias.
Nunaturals Vanilla (Alcohol free) is smoother, less bitter (not bitter at all), with a better vanilla taste than SweetLeaf.

Finally!  As a diabetic I have to be careful about the number of carbs I consume in one meal.  Pasta of any kind has been pretty much of a no-no for me but this product makes eating my favorite pasta and meatballs possible again.  Thank you Dreamfields pasta!!
This stroller is awesome!  I have had nothing but a sleeping baby front facing after I ordered this stroller from Amazon.

This is a robust tea, full of flavor, and it stands up well to milk.  You'd never guess it was decaffeinated by the taste!  Makes great iced tea, too.  Just don't steep it longer than five minutes (less if you dunk your teabag) or it will turn bitter.
I was very surprised at the tiny size of this product.  I guess I should have paid more attention to the specifications, not just the picture.
Fun and simple, love the tiny little ants embroided on the fabric and an understated detail.  Not as much fabric as expected, but still worth purchasing.  I just love these!
I use this to keep the squirles out of my bird feeders, it work most of the time. it seems very hot

I use my Boppy every day, while breastfeeding or just cuddling with the baby. I love that instead of stuffing a bunch of pillows under my arms to support the baby, I just slide my Boppy in there and relax.

I used to photograph babies for a living and we would prop them up using Boppys as well. To get the youngest ones to sit up, we'd use two of them. However, for tummy poses, one is just great.

The baby feels nice and secure surrounded by our favorite pillow.
Not available all year, we pick up several of these during the Thanksgiving / Christmas period.  Enjoy them very much.  Good quality, haven't had any leakers (dry); good flavor.

Right now it's great, but when my grand-kids are able to stand I don't think it will be so awesome cuz when weight hits the top of them they kind of wave back and forth so i'm not looking forward to that so much but it looks great.

I like that it was expandable, tall and fits the doorway but it was a huge hassle to set up. We did not use the screw-in caps because we live in a rental. I like that it doesn't NEED them (most gates require screws so this was a real plus) but would probably be stronger with them. Case in point: My toddler was able to shake the door hard enough and it popped off. So I obviously tightened it and it now keeps him out but then the auto-close did not work correctly. I followed all the steps, did their trouble-shooting guide etc but it just didn't work well. So we manually close it each time and it keeps the little one from entering our kitchen which is the main point anyways. It also comes with expandable parts so you can use one gate for many areas (or if you move).

I have used Community coffee for several years.  I was introduced to it when I lived in Louisiana and became addicited to it.  Was happy to find it at Amazon as it is not always easy to find out side of Louisiana.
that being said some of the other flavors have a strange after taste but the cherry is great,so i would try it

I thought I'd look on amazon for something that resembled coal to use as a prank gift for Christmas. When I saw this I knew this was it. It was perfect. Arrived just in time. Me having waited foolishly until the week before Christmas, I didn't think it would make it in time. Maybe just the day before Christmas? Fast shipping. Excellent product. Perfect gift, to use as a prank or just as a funny gift to give someone. Plus after you done you still are left with a beautiful tin canister to keep. Awesome!

Disappointed in this product. I bought this replacement pack after my first one started leaking fluid out of the little cells. This one started leaking almost immediately. Now a couple of the squares are deflated. No telling where the mystery liquid went...

Dream fields pasta is wonderful...tastes like real pasta without raising diabetic husband's blood sugar.  I cook the smaller shapes in my microwave pasta boat and simply sub the lasagna in any no cook lasagna recipe (such as Barilla's) with fantastic results. I only wish they made a curly egg noodle!

Oh thank the sweet baby milf squeezin Jesus I have found this! It is the best! I am buying a case immediately. The competitors crap in the stores is just that...CRAP! This is the real deal party people!
They are so delicious! This is the only place I can find them. I wish they would sell them in stores around here. Very addicting!

My package arrived, but every single can is damaged. The box if fine, which leads me to believe that my product was damaged before it was shipped. which really makes me angry. I was excited to find this product online because I have struggled finding it in stores, but next time I may reconsider choosing amazon because of the poor condition of its arrival.

I think nuts are supposed to be good for humans so I started ordering these about two years ago as part of my prime subscription.  I get four cans a month and I can tell you they are delicious!  These cans are not cheaped out with about 95 % peanuts.  There is a righteous mixture of the more expensive nuts and they are always fresh.  They are delivered to my door once a month and I usually run out about a week before the next prime order comes in.  I feel great after eating these nuts and sometimes I feel like superman.  Try them you will like them I guarantee it.

I ordered 3 cases total from this manufacturer. I love the product and order a caseof 6 18 oz containers.

On this order, I removed the lid which was askew and found the seal on top was torn.

Not a huge problem but it means I wont eat it and so i paid for 6 packages but will only be able to eat 5 of them.

The product is otherwise undamaged inthe 5 remaining canisters.
These were a big hit at my sister's Parisian themed bridal shower.  They were perfect for the desert table.

This is a great accessory. It's small enough to keep in the car trunk all the time. It lives in my Prius and I still have room for groceries, etc. It's much easier to use this on quick outings than lugging around the car seat by hand.

This is NOT a replacement for a full-sized stroller. It is small and meant for relatively smooth, flat surfaces such as parking lots and stores. It's not really robust enough for long walks or hikes. The basket is average sized, but not accessible without removing the car seat.

It works with any Graco infant seat with either the quick connect or classic connect label, which is great for families who plan to have multiple children.

Overall it is a great accessory. I'm happy with it.

I would recommend this to any family that needs
Love how easy it is to push around and maneuver.  This was the easiest thing I have ever assembled in my life!  Only negative is that the foot rest keeps coming off.

Although the price was very low, unfortunately, the quality was also. Having been a woodwind repairman and professional-level brass player for many years, I am familiar with what key oil and valve oil viscosity (for lack of a better word)should be. It is poosble that the bottle was mis-labled or there was a mixup in the manufacturing process. Anyhow.....it is too thin for woodwind key oil.  Afraid to try it on my valves. Don't want to get them gummed up.  I recommend not buying this product.

This protein bar is delicious and different without being hot like so many things are today.  I don't care for hot tasting foods mainly because if they are hot, I can't taste them!  Don't bother with the macho hot, go for the slightly stronger and more robust flavor of these bars!

My husband refused to drill into our new kitchen cabinets and after trying other devices (which I REALLY could not open) I read the reviews and settled on this.  Shipping was fast and they are just great!  Easy to operate (for us not the little ones), can be opned with one hand while holding baby, and provides a little distraction to baby with the string and tassle....takes his mind off getting into the cabinet!

The good about the pies is they taste great
The bad is poor cooking instructions (they burn easy). They smaller than they look and suited more for a snack than meal.
Even with the great taste they are not worth the high price.
Very little effect on majority of weeds, applied on sunny hot day, only killed the wimpiest weeds. Tried 2 applications with same result.  Definately would not purchase again.
Every other booster seat sucks compared to this one. It fits perfectly in our chair, doesn't slip and is easy to clean. Exactly what we wanted.

These caramels must have melted in the warehouse or on the way here.  They were impossible to unwrap, the plastic around them was so thin it ripped getting it off and some caramels ended up with plastic wrapper still in it, and were essentially a blob  which half had to be thrown out.  What a bummer!

I had purchased this last Christmas for my mother who loves Italian loaves.  She usually gets back to me when she really likes something I get her.  She never said anything until a month or so ago when she asked where I got the bread and would I buy more.  So, I ordered more and have changed my review from 2 stars to 5 stars.

This looks great!  At first we thought it was too small for the space when it arrived on a small rolled up poster paper.  But now that it is on the wall we are very happy! It has a nice elegant look, not too childish, but something we believe our child will love to stare at :)  It was also easy to work with.  We even had to take some pieces down so we could move them around to get it right.

Bought the gift-set version of this item, which comes with ground coffee. Tried using that, as per the instructions, and it backed up, overflowing with water and grounds, which not only makes a poor cup of coffee--weak AND coffee grounds present--but makes the machine very messy and must be cleaned. Tried it with coffee to the fill line, and 3/4 of that, and then with only half of that, didn't matter as the problem still occurred. As the instructions for this point out, I can't change the pressure on my Keurig, so they need to compensate for that, but haven't. I would not recommend buying this. I'm also not sure that there is a good solution for a refillable K-cup product at all; after doing some research it sounds like even Keurig's version is bad, just read the reviews for it. Most say it produces weak coffee and breaks in 1-2 months.

I am returning this product.

Therefore I do not have anything to compare it to. I am making vanilla extract with it and so far so good! It's been about 3 1/2 weeks and it smells heavenly. It'll be ready to use for sure by Christmas. The packaging was sealed and it smelled so fresh when I opened it!! I'd recommend it!
The wheel doesn't maneuver very well and the seat is starting to rip, I only used it for a day.  My son is 17 months and weighs 23lbs.
bought them for a pea in the pod baby shower, but they really taste good and are healthy so that is great
Cute, cute, cute!  I just wish I would have bought the next size up.  6 to 12 months seems like it is only going to fit for 6 to 7 months.  I would buy another one for a friend any day.
I enjoy this bar made with Whole Wheat. I love anything raspberry as well! I don't feel guilty eating these..morning, noon or night!
Excellent,  love this spice. I mixed it with other spices. Makes a nice rub for my chicken wings.  Gives a nice heat to my food.

i love that it has a nice long strap, it helps in north eastern ohio winters when you have lots of bulk and only two hands! it also was nice that it has the small insulated pack, i could pack it the night before and put it in the fridge and in the morning just grab and go. it also was additional storage when i was pumping, id put one frozen bottle and one refrigerator bottle and never had to worry about my husband running out when he had the baby. the side pockets were a good size, an the front pocket was great for meds. i hardly used the mat, but it had its uses too! i need to find it in pink now, b/c this baby is a girl!
It a strong but not too strong perfect for my husband who loves this product. It's the only brand he likes

This has been a great baby monitor for us. We can hear our baby just fine with this product. Save some money and don't buy a video monitor.

The range for this product is great! We have a basement entertainment room that is essentially as far away from our baby's room as we can get in this house. We have had no problems and can hear our baby as if she is right next to us (with the volume turned up of course).

We set the product to mute when watching a movie, but the LED indicators definitely let you know if baby is making noise.

I'm saddened to read these reviews by wives of diabetics who think they are doing their husbands a favor by using agave. You may as well be using corn syrup. Though it doesn't cause an insulin spike it has all the same effects and speeds the development of insulin resistance.
Great  pillow, my 23 month old loves it.  Plenty of support but yet still very comfortable!

I tried the Quaker Real Medleys with an ounce of skepticism. From past experiences I was expecting freeze dried fruit and a mild flavor. I was quite surprised though.

I had the Quaker Real Medleys Apple Walnut Oatmeal, and although it's not quite my style flavorwise (picky eater) it was pretty good. The flavor was strong. The fruit still tasted good. Also, it was a lot easier than mixing up my own oatmeal concoction in the morning.

I could see it being an excellent breakfast for a kid on the go (the container is pretty great) or to take with you to the office when you're in a hurry in the morning. It definitely felt like I was eating healthy.
Great flavor,  not too strong,  just slightly salty an a little sweet. . If you like real black licorice you will enjoy this. It's addicting.

I ordered this because I needed bulk items since I grocery shop on a bicycle. (Living in a college town known for bicyclists.) Nonfat dry milk is hard to find. I'm glad I found it here! It tastes great.
Love this seasoning. Puts just the right amount of kick to your dish. Multi use for all dishes."Bam" Buy It.

Product was not packaged well; the box was caved in and smashed when delivered. Nothing easy or simple about installing or using this gate, especially if you have uneven walls (baseboards) to drywall.  Included is a cut out Guide to mark the wall; but it is not accurate.   It takes 2 people to install the gate because of the way it is put together and how heavy it is. The spaces are wide and the gate does not sit close to the floor after installation leaving too much space if you are using it for pets, had to attach plexiglass to fill the spaces. The gate is not easy to open and Drops down when you swing it open unless you make your own adjustments.   It looks nice after finally getting it even but to open it you have to move a latch then lift the heavy gate from a small notch to swing it.  Not recommended by me. Cheaper is not always better!

This is a good coffee for the conventional coffee makers. I currently use a Keurig K-Cup coffee maker. I find it inconvenient to have to fill up a K-Cup plastic coffee holder with this coffee and then clean the holder after brewing is done. So I am not using this coffee as much.

I do use Melitta's Espresso coffee already packaged in K-Cup and find it pretty tasty.

I love Gimbals Lava Balls. They are the best chewy cinnamon candy around......I just wish I did not have such a hard time finding them.

Gimbals, please make these chewy lava balls available year round EVERYWHERE!!!!!!

These are the perfect substitute for low carbers as it is almost identical to peanuts in taste but with a low-carb friendly nutritional value. This is also a great way to get some fiber in your diet as you will head to the bathroom starting day 1.
I love this non GMO gum!  Etailz also got it to me very quickly!  Thank you!

I bought this item from amazon for $125 and of course free shipping.  Walmrt had them in store for almost $80 but they were no longer availble when I wanted to buy one.    My baby sleeps well at night and we are happy with it, it fits inside the crib very well.  I'd definitely buy it again if I need another one.  No complaints other then the price.
its good any kind of spaghetti sauce... next time i will try my  country sauce ... i love this miracle noodles ... i recommend this so very healthy product...
Our hotel in Bangkok had this tea and I just fell in love with it. I took a bag home with me to the states and started searching.
These are really good. My husband and daughter fought over them!!  They are so soft and chewy and they taste like cinnamon.

This system works well across a large house.  The annoying tune at start up is gone on the latest model (have had two of these models).  We like how easy it is to adjust the volume, put it in sleep mode, and pan the camera.  The camera has an amazing pan ability - just one needed per room.  The night vision is also pretty good.  Also, the clip to carry it around is very handy.  The movers dropped our old camera on a marble hearth and broke it. Didn't realize just how useful and needed this camera is until we didn't have it!  The new camera couldn't get here fast enough!
My kids love these fruit snacks - they are soft and easy to chew.  And since they are Annie's, I feel good about them.

We have already had to wash this 2 times since we got it as our daughter soaked the bed as she was too full in her diaper.  Needless to say, this doesn't hold onto water after going through the spin cycle in the washer and it dries really fast too.  Great product!

For an off the shelf microwaveable product, this tortilla soup is amazing. We love tortilla soup and often eat it both in the U.S. and Mexico. Campbell's version holds it own among the best we have had. It would be even more perfect if Campbells could use tortilla strips instead of rice. Also nice...Amazon's price is much lower than our local supermarkets.

Very pleased!  Cookies were fresh and arrived intact and in time for my husband's birthday. I was so happy to find these cookies on Amazon as they are my husband's favorite. His grandmother (now deceased) used to ship these from Germany to him; and until now, I wasn't able to find them anywhere.  My only wish is that they would come in larger bags as the packages are small and rather expensive.  Nonetheless, thank you Amazon for carrying this product!

The Graco Pack 'n Play Playard Snuggle Suite truly stands up to its name. The fact that this product is designed for your infant all the way through toddler hood makes it a smart buy for parents who are on a tight budget. This pack 'n play not only is portable so it is easy to use from room to room and while traveling but the removable bouncer seat that you can take baby with you anywhere in the house is so awesome! As a busy mom who is always on the go, this product is ideal for me. The soothing music helps keep baby calm and relaxed. I highly recommend this product for any new mom or mom-to-be! Disclosure: While I received this product for free, the opinions and thoughts included in this review are my own.
These leaves add so much flavor when I make a curry - highly recommend. The quality is good, the price is great!

Not the best taste but glad I tried. I have mixed with other almond and coconut floors for a good mix. for me taste is a little bitter.

KP
I ordered this for my sister and she loves it. I am ordering mine through the Subscribe & Save program too for next month's order.

Really disappointed. I bought two not knowing it had so many drops in one that would last me a really long time (my fault).

However the droppers in both are not good. I don't even touch the dropper and the drop fly out of it. I can't tell if I am giving my daughter too much or little, so I stopped using it and am looking into another company. What's even more disappointing is I contacted the company and emailed them about these being defective and they never bothered to get back to me.

Great toddler bed... my 2 yr old grandson loves to sleep on it when he comes for a visit.  My daughter has one that they take with them when traveling, vacation, etc.;  sturdy, easy to step-up and store.
These are the best tomatoes for the best price.  No preservatives or citric acid.  Create a delicious easy sauce with garlic, olive oil, fresh basil, salt and pepper.

A friend  with diabetes  had a growth removed from her leg. Because diabetics have very thin skin, two months had passed and the wound had still not healed.  She was also in pain.   On hearing this, I over-nighted  two bottles of Trivedi Water to her and suggested that every time she changed the bandages--twice a day--she put some Trivedi Water on the wound and let it dry before she put on a fresh bandage.  In TWO DAYS she saw such a difference in her leg she could hardly contain her enthusiasim. She went to the doctor two days later for a scheduled appointment and on seeing the progress, her doctor said that instead of going every week to have the wound checked, she didn't have to go back for another three weeks.    My friend kept using the Trivedi Water and when she did go back to the doctor three weeks later her leg had completely cleared up and the wound completely healed! She cannot stop thanking me for sending the water to her. She is now also drinking it.  Anyone who is familiar with  diabetes knows that it takes quite long for incisions and open wounds to heal, not to mention that it is especially painful.  This water is truly God sent!  Thank you, Mr. Trivedi, for making it available to everyone through Amazon.  Much love to you. Albina
I would not order this Espresso pod again, there are others that are much better. Espresso should be dark and robust, not weak like this brand. Very disappointed.

I love that it has the spring part that makes my milk store upright and evenly.  This makes it easy to stack when I transfer it to my chest freezer.  Also, less likely to rip or pop when transporting to daycare or dethawing because no odd shaped bags.
I grew up on these cause I loved them. Now, though I still love them, I eat for the health benefits. Truly the best sardine on the market.

I just purchased this at a 'scratch and dent' store and I have to say I love it! The smell is not overwhelming and it really helps my skin! I've tried just about everything on the market and this so far has won me over. I have yet to use it for baking and from all the reviews it looks like I found another winner!

Kicking horse Hoodoo blend was a pleasant surpirse.  An excellent dark, rich coffee with mild after tones.  This would pair well with a good dessert, or as a morning wake up call.  I have coffee tasted as a former employee of a major coffee chain - this one ranks up with the best!  Too bad I can only give it 5 stars when I would give it 10 - time to reorder.
Easy to setup and install. Arm rests are great and cup holder is actually functional. Looks very comfortable for my son.

I used the NUK moisturizing balm stick with my first baby and found it to be super easy and not messy at all. It also helped a lot with sore nipples. The convenience of it coming in the tube like Chapstick is so easy to throw in your diaper bag or purse on the go if your brestfeeding. I bought it again for my second child and will be using it with her as well. Good purchase and baby never had a problem with its taste and you don't have to clean it off before feeding. Would recommend to all my friends since you don't have to get it all over your hands. Better than the traditional lanolin cream that can be messy and you have to use your hands to apply it.
The kids and birds (my parrots love cereal, normally) don't like it, I do, especially with banana or strawberry on top.

Good product except the duck started taking on water when a few small holes appeared where there are bubbles in the rubber.

Update: Contacted customer service and they were excellent! Not only did they send a replacement but also a few other products! Upgraded to 5 stars
This is a cute Hello Kitty nursery lamp, for the price. It fits in well with the nursery theme and colors.

I gave this product a three because that is what I felt it deserved. The product takes up as much space as a dinner plate; I had to rearrange the items in my kitchen in order to store it, it now rests of top of my refridgerator. The product works well, it safely sterilizes bottles, nipples, and the parts for my breast pump but as far as the bottles are conconcerned if you have long/tall bottles they will not fit inside unless you lay them flat. Those are my only problems with this product, the price was ok but it would probably be cheaper to buy it in-store; it cuts out the extra shipping and handling fees.

i purchased this blanket along with a picnic tote for my son's 6th month wedding anniv. They havent used it yet but they loved it.I did a lot of surfing researching for a top grade picnic blanket, and I had no problem deciding afterwards. The size played a big part, but all of the
other qualities such as the material, colors, upkeep, etc. made it an exceptional choice. You cant go wrong with a lifetime guarantee!
TY Freddie & Sebbie

One thing I've noticed about many other brands of booster seats is how light and insubstantial they seem.  Not so with Britax - as with their car seats this booster seat is solid protection.  It's a heavy, solid seat but also well padded and contoured for comfort.  The built-in slide guard helps ensure that your child can't slip underneath the belt and out of the seat which is I think the best feature.  The back is removable for when your child gets to that stage/age where they no longer need such a large booster seat.    We've loved using the Britax car seats and are happy to move up to their booster seat now, both for the safety and comfort it provides.

I go through a lot of chia. This was priced well and shipped quickly. Other brands only come in small packages. Chia stores well so everyone should buy the largest they can afford. I use it to make chia cereal everyday. 3 tbsp with almond milk, sliced apples and bananas, blueberries and walnuts. Good tasting and healthy.

I would have thought that having a portable child unit would be kind of silly, but I ended up buying this just for that feature. If my child went to sleep in a different room than hers, I could simply use this.

I also use it as a travel monitor. (So I dont have to take mine off every time we travel - which we do quite a bit.) I havent had any problems with reception. I do wish the parent unit had a recharging base. I use rechargable batteries, but it would be much more convenient to just put it on a base to charge, rather than having to unscrew the battery compartment.

Overall, I've been very happy with it.

Love this stroller.  We first started out with the chicco travel system.  We liked it, but didnt LOVE it.  I love that this stroller has so many options for one or two seating (for when we have another).  The only negative thing is the locking mechanism.  It does'nt stay locked, which makes it hard when you are getting it in and out of cars.  Its a little on the heavy side, but very easy to pick up and unfold by myself.  Also, if you choose black, beware that in the summer it will get hot.  We have to put something down on the foot rest area for my son because it gets very hot on his legs.
This has been a great starter for butternut squash soup, Chicken pot pie ... I'm so mad I can't find it on the shelf anymore!
They arrived on time and fresh.  An expensive way to shop for food though.  I wish they were sold on the Wesr Coast.

I SHOULD HAVE BOUGHT THIS STROLLER WHEN my baby was born, so I could stroll with my 2 yr old and baby, but I was stubborn and waited until she was 14 months.   I love love love it and I am really judgemental on gear...I love the easy unfold and fold up.  This stroller comes with snack trays, that lift up for easy in and out - a HUGE basket that holds everything, the front inset wheels are supurb!  An excellent redesign!  The cup holder is nice but whatever doesn't hold all cups/bottles - i don't mind,   I really love the separate sun shades for each side they go really low.  The recline is nice for each child as well.  Unfortunately, the con, drawback,  is the seat belt.  Its terrible, the shoulder straps are not bolted down to the back of the seat -they are free and just a little part slides on the back of the seat, but oh well- Peg Perego is passing it off as some 180 mobility thing.  The breaks are great, nice big handle.  BUT you will need a little clip or hook or something to hold that extra bag or purse.  It is much lighter than i had expected.  I was going to buy this from Target and pay more - but took a chance - and bought from Amazon, I saved 100$, shipping and tax - SO nice!! I am so glad i did  as I am very satisfied with this stroller!!  I would recommend it, if you are not for the tatum (long strollers) I did not like those, i bought one -the joovy ergo - and Hated it- it was SOOO LONG like a limo - and Heavy. I could not fold the damn thing - I was not strong enuf- i eventually sold it on craigslist and waited til my mind changed and started liking the side by sides...  Just keep your options open and look/reseach it all -     I did read numerous other reviews on this stroller(60/40)and don't worry about the squeaky wheel - it can be fixed with some WD40---  Go for it and you'll love it too!!  Good luck, Mom of 2 Girls now 3 and 14months and they love sitting by each other and visiting, etc!!
The print is adorable yet sophisticated, and teh quality of the materials are wonderful. Its just perfect for our little boy!

This is THE tub to get.  My only regret is that I didn't have it until my fourth child!  I've tried many tubs and bath seats.  This is the only one that I can honestly say has worked perfectly from baby stage to stage.  Fits perfectly in our kitchen double sink.  I'm not breaking my back at bath time.  Baby is comfortable and happy in it.  The "bump" in the bottom of the tub holds baby up very nicely so I'm not having to worry about him sliding down while bathing.  Learn from my trials and errors - get this for your first baby and keep it for the rest!

Wow! Perfect for breast fed babies!! No nipple confusion and he drinks milk like a champ while my mom keeps him.  He is satisfied after eating and he matches on it just like he does in my breast. I have tried Lansinoh and it was horrible. Even with their stage 1 nipples he had a poor latch and got too much milk and kept choking. These bottles are great! I bought several more  he now eats and sleeps for my mom just like he does for me.
Nice product, smelled great. I've used it in homemade body butters and soaps. no problems.

I'm so happy I can finally enjoy my Nescafe in the morning, couldn't find this product in US.
It is just the best taste!

I love coconut oil. I do not love the taste of coconut.

These are both very strongly coconut flavored. I really liked the idea of the spray can but cant get past the taste it leaves on EVERYTHING.

I get some UNFLAVORED coconut oil from ebay now.

The letters came just as described. We used them for my sister's baby shower. I was in a bit of a rush to get these, and the seller assured me that it would get there on time.... and it did with PLENTY of time. Great service, fast shipping, and great product. My sister can't wait to hang them up in her new little one's nursery. Thank you!

It's awesome, taste just like the mango pudding you get at Chinese dim sum. Mix with 2 cups of milk and 1 cup water. Sugar content is acceptable (if you can stick with 4oz portions) and the milk provides protein. It's a delightful treat. But $8.99 a box is too steep.
Love the keurig and finally a mix of kcups that are caffeinated and not flavored! (I can't stand it when mixes throw in a few decaf or hot chocolates or something. I just want coffee!)

Exactly what I was looking for!!  I was afraid these would be too small, but they are perfect.  The designs are cute, the buttons aren't flimsy, the fabric is suuuuper soft and they are very comfortable.  Just what I needed, definitely worth the purchase, total game changer!

My usual morning ritual is a hot cup of instant coffee, with a heaping spoon of creamer, and a single packet of Splenda. I was curious how  my coffee would taste if I substituted Splenda for Pure Via, which I received free from BzzAgent.  So I went for it! My first impression is that Pure Via isn't as sweet as Splenda so my coffee tasted a bit off. But I didn't give up! So on day 2, I tried 2 packets of Pure Via and this time attained the same level of sweetness that I am accustomed to in my coffee. Woo hoo my usual cup of coffee is back in full effect and there is no aftertaste! BUT I am not too sure I like the idea of putting two packets of sweetener in my mug...makes me feel like I am being excessive in terms if effort and how I'd have to buy 2x the packets if I were to replace my Splenda. I do give it Pure Via credit for being 100% natural though and continuing to make me feel guilt-free about my daily cup (or two) of coffee!
Light weight and has held up really well for my 10 year old granddaughter that I bought as a gift.
I was glad to have these on hand for my daughter but the only thing is 3 of the 4 came in with the containers open
I was looking for a good source of organic chia seeds and was having a hard time finding them locally. Very happy with the product and will purchase it again!
These were awesome!!!!  Will definately order again to keep the family tradition!! My husbands family when they were alive would get this directly from Germany.. Nice to know I can find them here
Not as fine as the Reese popcorn salt that I thought this replaced. However, it has good taste and is better than anything else I have found.
Used it at a party for my new grandson named Henry of course - decoration and goodie bag in one

I ordered this for my sister because she liked mine so much. She actually wore mine and a motorcycle trip from TN to CA. She was amazed how she wasn't sore at all after 3 straight days on the back of a bike!
This has a great mild flavor and arrived promptly.  I've just started using it so I will check back in on how it has helped my supply.
This popcorn is delicious! I have purchased all kinds of bagged popcorn and this is by far the best! Give it a try, you'll love it too!

I absolutely love this product.  I developed a dairy allergy in my early adulthood and am an avid cook.  I use this cream all the time!  One reason I really like this is that it isn't pre-sweetened, so it works well in cooking where other dairy free creams don't.  I've made pasta sauces, cream soups, french toast and lots of other things. (I'm sure the flavored varieties would be great with french toast!)  I haven't tried the other varieties yet, but I'm excited to try the whipped cream.  If you're trying to cook for someone with a dairy allergy - this product is a must-have in the pantry.
This is the best carmel corn I have ever had.  It doesn't last long in our house because it is so amazing.  Enough said!
I tried to make it through one bag of these beans, but the roast was not dark enough for my taste, even though that's how it's labeled.
You can actually smell the coffee with these pods, something you can't do with the cups.  The  coffee taste great and will be the only one I order from now on.

I bought this for my 9 month old to use at the beach. Now that she is pulling up she can crawl out of it but it works great to lay her in if she falls asleep and I want to keep the sand off of her. I use a umbrella for shade. It was cheaper than the baby bed tents. It would be a great beach play area or ball pit for a sitter.

I have had four of the heavier version and three of the lighter jersey kind. They are the most practical and comfortable sleep sacks made. They hold up beautifully and just get softer as you use them. I wash them two or three times a week and have no issues. Other expensive brands I have tried all had issues with the zippers after multiple washings. The snaps at the shoulders make getting them on a breeze.
normally you can just soak rice noodles in water however these need to be soaks in hot water before eating but not to long otherwise they will turn to mush

I give 5 stars for the natural non-fizzy carbonation of Perrier Mineral Water. No aftertaste from added carbon. Aside from natual water, Perrier is my only drink. It is refreshing, unobtrusive to the stomach, and gives a great lift to the day. The bottle is just the right size for satisfaction. The price is affordable, and the service is exceptional.

I found this backpack secondhand and couldn't pass it up. Our child loves her old backpack carrier, but she is getting to big for it. I thought we had struck it lucky when we found this. After some extended wearing, I find that that is not true...    PROS:  Extremely well-built  Light weight  secures baby  backpack carries A LOT (when properly packed)  can attach small toy for baby's amusement    CONS:  HOT  Too long for smaller individuals (5'2 and the support rests too far down)  Puts all of the weight on your shoulders  Uncomfortable for wearer    I gave this product 3 stars because this carrier works for Daddy. He is a very large man (7'1) and this backpack easily accommodates him and Baby. I, however, did not have as much success and will be using our old carrier from the 1980s until we find an alternative.
Very healthy and delicious.  Enjoying them as a snack.  I have to stop myself from eating more than a cup.
Part of our Macrobiotic diet. We are in our 70's and our lab and blood work was amazing. This tea took the place of our coffee.

Bought to use the bag as a gag gift - this was the best one I could find.  Worked perfect when filled with my own items.  The pre-packaged first aid items - not impressed.  I bunch of cheap bandaids, a very few packets of wipes, ointment, etc.  Even had stickers that counted in the number of items that were included.  I didn't buy it for the first-aid supplies - if I had I would have been mad!  It was great for my purpose of re-using the nice-sized "Dr. Kit" for a gift.

This particular kind of pacifier was loved by my niece, so I wanted to try them and can't find them anywhere but here. Neither of my kids ended up using pacifiers, but this is a good one and Amazon is the only place I could find them.

I'll start off by mentioning I'm a bit of a stroller snob and I love researching products, so my research has been extensive. Also, I've used MANY strollers, so my review takes into consideration all other strollers I've tried. Basically, this stroller is perfect.

Here's why:
1. The seat is adjustable in so many ways! Baby can face me or face away from me. The seat goes from sitting fully upright to laying flat. The footrest is adjustable to work with each seat position.
2. The straps are easy to adjust. Just a few snaps and it adjusts to the right height.
3. Ridiculously easy to assemble. For someone who has little patience for readings instruction manuals, this was a key feature.
4. Folds with seat forward AND rear facing. No need to turn the seat around to fold it up. Huge plus!
5. Has the ability to work with infant carriers. I'm hoping baby #2 tolerates the infant carrier so I can make use of this convenient feature!
6. A bassinet attachment is available. That's originally why I purchased this stroller. My baby hated the infant carrier, so I wanted a bassinet stroller. By the time I purchased this, baby was actually big enough to sit in the seat (she was 10 lbs at birth), so I didn't need to purchase the separate bassinet. And since the seat reclines, she was still able to sleep in it. Huzzah!
7. Smooth ride. Goodness me, it rides so smooth! I push with one hand with ease. My mom used it when watching baby and she still raves about how easily she could maneuver it.
8. Affordable. I wasn't ready to make the plunge to purchase the City Select. Since I don't plan on having my kids close enough to have two in a stroller, the Versa was the best option for me.
9. Apparently it's possible to purchase GT wheels for the Versa! I just learned this and I'm so excited. I will definitely purchase them. However, the wheels it comes with are excellent. No need for other wheels unless you'll be doing anything a little more off-road.
10. The storage basket underneath is so roomy! I've grocery shopped with this thing and it was awesome.
11. The handlebar is adjustable. I'm 5'9", so I had to have a taller stroller. I'm sure this works for shorter individuals as well, since the handles adjust.
12. The fabric is so easy to wipe clean (and machine washable!) and I love the silver color. I purchased the silver because black is too hot for our AZ summers and silver should handle sun fading better than the other colors.
13. Comfort. Baby loves this stroller and she's picky. She had to see me for the first 6 months of her life, but now she faces outward. She's tall and has plenty of room to grow into this with its tall height and deep seat.
14. The canopy is incredible! It's large and provides extensive coverage. When not in use, it's not in the way as it folds up compactly.

The only con to this stroller is the weight. It's heavy. I just purchased the City Mini to travel with and I hope I like that as much as I love the Versa. For every day use, the weight isn't an issue. I get it in and out of the trunk fine and don't have any need to carry it. I put baby in the car before folding it and placing it in the trunk.

If you're looking for a Versa-tile (ðŸ˜‰) single stroller that's affordable, this is the one for you!

I love this safer bather. It is soft on baby's back and keeps her in place. I've not had a problem with it starting to smell like mildew. I just wring it out after every bath and hang it up to dry. Now that she's older (7 months) she doesn't sit still any more but I will use it with next baby.
Baby loves this, we used in the "baby pool". will bring in for the tub in the fall.
Super soft and stretchy and fits our Pack n Play Mattress perfectly.  We use it under a sheet and it gives a nice bit of extra padding and protection.
My husband loves this coffee. He first had this coffe at thats amore years ago.  A little on the pricey side but worth every penny.
This is a very basic toy- but its cute and feels well made. My baby is still on the way but I'm excited to have it in my nursery for her arrival!
I bought a pura kiki normal bottle, which I would rate a 5 in  heart beat, but the spout on this bottle comes out easily. I am not satisfied with this product.

I ordered the pack of 9.One would think they would all be packaged together like i have gotten in the regular kind, but NO there are dusty/dirty boxes and there are THREE different expiration dates. Its 2/8/14 today and they exp March 18 2014, April 30 1014, July 17 2014. I'm fine with the July date maybe even April but you know the ones that exp in march are OLD. I love these hash browns, the crappy  thing here is the SELLER not the product. I find it very unprofessional to be sending out almost expired product. I buy the regular flavor at the local grocery store and they are typically expiration dated about 10 to 12 months out. I would be very Leary of what you buy from this seller, you may receive item that have or are about to expire.

I purchased this while I was pregnant with my son. It came with a lot of things that i needed and was a really good price. My only issue is that the comforter and sheet were washed and they seemed to have shrunk. But other than that, this was worth the price.

I hate stirring milk over a hot stove. I won't drink Swiss Miss because it's thick and oversweet. This mix is just about right, and it's fast and easy. I use two heaping teaspoons to 8 oz of water and add a splash of half and half. Perfect. If you want it even creamier, make it with milk or add a splash of cream or whipped cream. It's great in coffee too.
bought these as a gift and baby's momma said that they were the only socks she had that would stay on her baby's feet.  she loved them!

These cookies were purchased because I thought they would be like the Kashi Almond Butter Cookie but I couldn't stop with one.  They are too yummy for me.  I'll buy them once in awhile after I've reached my goal weight.

I read a lot of good things about the Woombie so decided to give it a try.  We have an escape artist and he's used to the Halo SleepSack Swaddles after being in the NICU for 3 weeks.  After so many reviews and buying multiple kinds of swaddlers (we personally weren't fans of the Halo ones, even if he was), we got a convertible Woombie and the Wrap and Snap.  We found he does not seem to like the W&S one and I found it a bit annoying to be honest.  While he wasnâ€™t able to escape it, the wrap was a bit tighter than he liked and we could only loosen it by so much without it becoming unsafe.  Especially since the wrap went around a couple times â€“ which I wasnâ€™t a fan of.  He did like the Convertible one since we could let his arms out while it was â€œawake timeâ€ and we liked the snugger fit of the fabric over the Summer Infant version.  So yes, we definitely like the Woombie and Iâ€™ll probably get a couple more convertible ones. I'd give this a 5 if only the wrap wasn't so long.  Otherwise, a good product.

This is some of the best tea I've ever had, and it is well-priced here.  I take a box to the office and keep one at home.  Ginger aids digesting and circulation.  If you find it too sweet, use half a packet.

We've used this model for five months, and consider it a quality product. It's great for daily use, and our child plays in it regularly. Overall, I feel like the construction is good, however it is important to read the instructions when assembling it. It is easy to assemble as long as you have a good understanding of the order in which it must be assembled.

We ran into problems with ours and had to replace it after a relative tried to assemble it after we collapsed it in order to travel. Since he was unfamiliar with the re-assembly instructions, he placed a lot of strain on the plastic in the corner and split it, leaving it dangerously weak. We replaced it with the same model because we were pleased with the first.

When used properly, the play yard has never even hinted at such a problem. It collapses quickly, and re-assembles quickly. It is great for travel.

It would be five stars if the bassinet was more firm. I never felt completely comfortable allowing our child to sleep in it at night when we traveled. Otherwise, I highly recommend it.

Love the Dudes Fry Sauce! If you have not tried it, you have no idea what I am talking about!
A friend from Utah turned me on to this 10 years ago, but I had forgotten about it until a recent visit to a local bar. They served it with some killer tater tots, and I had to find some!

I though the taste was great. I like mine sweet so I add either honey or splenda. It was very good hot as well as iced. I will purchase this tea again. It taste a lot like the tea from Panera Bread which is what I was going for.
delicious!  I love the taste and drink it daily.  I was hoping for the "energy boost" so many talk about when drinking ginseng tea, unfortunately, I didn't get that.

This product tastes wonderful! The box contains four packs, each pack can be heated up I n the microwave for a mere 90 seconds... and there you have a delicious quick side, dip or even main meal. I love the taste and use a whole pack (without anything else) daily.
Service was impeccable; the boxes where shipped within the promised time frame, tracking orders were provided and delivery was, again, within the allotted time frame.

I purchased this item recently to use with my 2 kids (1 and 3). We have a BOB stroller (our stroller of choice), but needed a smaller option to take into the city on vacation. I had heard from friends that older kids love Buggy Boards, so I decided to give this one a try. It is definitely a hit. My three year old daughter loves it. Installation took a little time, but was nothing I couldn't handle. You have to adjust your stride just a bit while walking with it, but it's really no big deal at all. My only disappointment was that when flipping it up, it really doesn't flip up flat against the stroller. However, this really hasn't been a problem, because it comes on and off so easily. I would definitely recommend this product. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I do think it's a bit pricey for what it is.

Great Lapsang Souchong just like I remember it.  Quick delivery, good packaging.  We used to call it 'stinky' tea in my family (decades ago)  It has the woody/fire smell, definitive aroma, not for everyone, but I love it.
We live in Georgia but are from Canada.  Getting a "taste of home" is what we needed!  It is far better getting it through Amazon than having my parents ship it to us.  More cost effective too!
some of the packs have small size bars. Tasty and very crispy. I would recommend this product but I would appreciate if the company gets it in right size consistently.

These are awesome!  They fit so nicely on the seats of my car and do a fabulous job in protecting the leather from getting damaged by my kids' feet.  They're a total life-saver and both my husband and I are so glad that we now have them in our cars.

I loved working with this fondant. It was easy to apply and spread and I live in a temperate country. Also in terms of taste it is on the better side of most store bought. DO not expect it to taste like homemade marshmellow fondant but it does not taste artificial. The white is also a nice bright white that takes colour well and can be spread pretty thinly without tearing

This powdered coconut water taste terrible.

Tastes nothing like how coconut water should taste.

Spend more money on the real thing.

I used to be able to buy Badia brand chives pretty reasonably priced but can't find them anymore at grocers and I refuse to pay about $5.00 for a regular size jar on the spice shelf at grocers. I am sooooooo happy to have found these and will for sure be a return customer. The size of the rings are very slightly larger than what I was used to buying, but they are not too much noticeably bigger so that will not be an issue but just wanted to let you know. They seem to be fresh enough and have a nice green color to them. I like to add a lot of them to sour cream along with some salt & pepper all mixed up and allowed to sit a few hours in fridge to serve along with my baked potatoes. Everyone seems to love them that way.....but it takes a lot of chives to achieve the taste so now with this large size container I can add without freaking out about the cost.

So these diapers came in wayyyy faster than expected- less than 2 weeks! I gave 4 stars because we haven't used them yet (baby isn't here yet) but I tried pouring water in them (fast & slow) kind of as a test and I was really impressed- so I'm excited to use them in July!
Easy to handle and very modern. I like everything about it. Runs very good in the forrest. Jest what I needed and expected.

Our baby is a heavy wetter!! These are very absorbent and work great at night.

The only thing I don't like about them is that I have to put them thru a third rise cycle because the smell stays with them.
Looks just as the picture online. Very cute option for monthly photos. Stickers a easier to read in person, especially gray one.
So in love with this bedding for my daughter! Shipping took a little longer then expected but worth the wait!

Excellent purchase. Wish I had know about the cups sooner. Just wish the colors were brighter
Saves a good deal of money per cup and allows for use of coffee that is on sale or a flavor preference
Good quality, easy to clean

I have used sugar animals in baking before and they were hard as a rock! These were fantastic!!! They were like little soft sugar cubes. Not a single one was broken when delivered. Also delivered fast. They made my cupcakes look so cute!!! I made the cupcakes for my best friend's SOON TO BEE MRS bachelorette party.

This onesie is made of thin but not flimsy fabric, so i don't have to worry about my baby overheating in the summer. The sizes, though, are inaccurate. I bought the 12-month size so that my 5-month-old would have room to grow in it, but they fit him perfectly. (I'll admit that he's a little big for his age, but according to the growth charts he's only the size of a 7-month-old, which still seems a bit young to be filling out a garment for 12-month-olds.)

Order a size or two larger than you think you should need, and you'll probably be perfectly happy with this onesie.

This milk is such a great value to have on hand, less expensive than milk from store and lasts so much longer.  I haven't used it for baking yet.  It does dissolve a lot more easily than other powders I have used.  The flavor is not quite as desirable as others I have tried for drinking, though when I mix it with equal portions of Nido whole milk, it tastes great.

Didn't come with any instructions! It wouldn't stay on sliding glass door only wanted to use it for a week at the beach house but had to get something else. Didn't work for me thought it was a good idea, might have worked for someone else.

This is the real deal right here. I boil 5-6 tablespoons in a medium saucepan for about 5 minutes and strain it into a pitcher through a cut of cheesecloth. Serve with your sweetener of choice and some condensed milk or half and half and eat your heart out 4$ per glass Thai food place.
You get 2 of the bags pictured which ought to last me an unreasonably long time.
Best thing in our nursery! Never have to do extra laundry, easy to wipe down after an inevitable mess.
Rachael Ray's cooking show had this featured on the show I ordered for my daughter who just delivered after I ordered. I know she will love it.
I love the taste of this coconut milk.  I use it in numerous recipes.  I will definitely buy more.

I have used Zipfizz for a long time, and I actually first tried it at  Costco.  The flavors are pretty good, although I usually add more water then the instructions recommend. I feel that the flavor is too strong otherwise.  I feel a slight energy boost that lasts a few hours, but it does not give me the jitters like other energy drink have done in the past.  I drink it mostly because I no longer drink soda, but I want something other than straight water to drink with my lunch and need an occasional boost.  I haven't grown tired of the three flavors yet, although I prefer the orange and grape tubes over the fruit punch. It is nice that the tubes are easy to cary around and do not take up lots of room. The packaging I think could be done a little better as to not use up so much room in my cabinets and to be a little more economically friendly.

We decided to try something different than what our other friends had purchased.   So we got the Diaper Champ and it is great.  Holds more,easy to use and cheaper because you do not have to buy the replacement bags.  We have no noticed any odor.  We use Glad odor shields garbage bags and have had no problem.

the picture is slightly deceiving, it is very small about the size of a lemon, i thought this would be bigger like a baseball or grapefruit. its cute and my 6 month old daughter likes it well enough but it wasnt worth the money spent.

These did not have a very good flavor. They had way too much packaging--each individually wrapped in plastic. Finally, they had a not very pleasant texture which crumbled and broke easily, often before I get them out of the packaging.

These are really good! I love all their cookies. But.. all the packages that I have bought are mostly pieces and crumbs. If I get two whole cookies I feel lucky! I can't buy them when I have guests because I can't serve guests a bunch of cookie crumbs. I would buy them often if the packaging could keep more of them whole.

I got this swaddle/sleep sack for my 3.5 month old, as she was getting too long to be swaddled in the Miracle Blanket. I chose this product because it would be large enough to swaddle her for a few more weeks, and then can be used to swaddle arms-free, and eventually just as a sleep sack. My first disappointment was when I opened the package and saw that the swaddling wings are permanently attached to the sleep sack. The product description on Amazon.com says: \\"The unique 2-in-1 design allows the swaddle feature to be removed when baby outgrows the need for swaddling and the wearable blanket can be used alone\\" -- that is not the case. I decided to try it, anyway, for swaddling, but it isn't very good at swaddling -- my daughter can get her arms out the bottom and push the swaddling part up towards her face, which seems unsafe and certainly doesn't help her sleep. I regret not having read the other reviews before buying this and hope Amazon will correct the product description to show that this cannot be used as a sleepsack without the swaddle.

The model I have is actually the Chicco Keyfit30 Magic (referred to from here on out as \\"Magic\\") which is in essence the same as the original Keyfit30 car seats (referred to from here on out as \\"Original\\")but with a few improvements. But even with the improvements, I rated the Magic 4 stars because there was one issue that wasn't addressed and could be an issue depending on your child.

But I compared the two models side by side at the local Babies R Us and decided on the Magic model and here is why:

1. The Canopy on the Magic is larger than on the Original(even when the extra sun visor on the Original is extended) plus it has an extendable mesh section on it as well.

2. I've read other reviews where they had problems with the canopy on the Original not staying in place and this was fixed on the Magic model as well.

3. There was also another review here that said there was piping on the car seat cover that left a dent in their son's head and that issue was addressed on the Magic as well - they removed it altogether.

4. The material felt breathable (but only time will tell as my son is not here yet)and much more plush/cushiony overall. Even the infant inserts felt thicker, which may or may not be a good thing (again, my son is not here yet).

The only con that Chicco did not address in this new model is that the crotch strap/latch is not adjustable so it only has the one position/length. (Or if it is adjustable, I haven't figured it out yet.)I know that some reviewers had issue with this but I guess that would vary from child to child.

So far the only place that I have found this new model is at Babies R' Us and it's only available in one color scheme which wouldn't have been my first choice (I really liked the Midori colors) but I opted for the improvements over 1st choice in color.

Anyway, I hope this helps those who are still searching for a car seat.

*****UPDATE 3/29/13******

I'm really happy with this infant car seat and am glad I bought it!

The canopy with the extension was the perfect size and I liked the mesh extension - it came in handy down here in Houston. No real issues with my son getting too hot and sweaty (I really don't think there is any car seat that can keep your child completely sweat free during the Houston summers). The cover is easy to remove and wash and no problems with the crotch strap being too short and my son was in the upper 90th percentiles for weight and height.

Seller was great, and I love the ghee. Was using another store-bought ghee, but I like the extra precaution of knowing it doesn't have the proteins that can affect my husband (lactose intolerant) and myself (healing leaky gut on AIP). Tastes great, too! Whirl it (and herbs/seasonings) into hot steamed cauliflower or carrots in your food processor for 'mashed potatoes' as a side dish!

LOVE! LOVE! LOVE! so much energy and so rewarding when complete! My eyes were nice and bright and i felt so energized, cant wait to order again! Also all the juices were very tasty, I will defiantly be doing the 5 day one next :)

I've drunk whole-bean Tanzanian peaberry for about 20 years.  My first source was the large national retailer and wholesaler Green Mountain, which roasted their Tanzanian peaberry light to medium.  Although the beans made good coffee, Green Mountain's price eventually became higher than I thought reasonable.  An internet seach led me to a small family-owned and family-operated roaster in Tennessee.  Their beans were also light to medium and, thus, had a dry appearance.  That level of roasting was to my liking because the beans retain more caffeine, and the natural flavor of the coffee is more apparent than with darker roasts.  When the Tennessee roaster's computer system crashed and online sales were temporarily suspended, I did another internet search and found Amazon's Tanzanian peaberry roasted by Coffee Bean Direct.  It has essentially the same good taste as the Tanzanian peaberry from the Tennessee roaster, and the price is lower.  I'm totally satisfied with the beans roasted by Coffee Bean Direct, and the shipping by Amazon is quick enough that buying three pounds at a time allows me to place my next order before the current one runs out.

This has worked perfect for us. The nightlight is good enough to keep you from tripping on stuff, and when the projector is on it is bright enough to actually see stuff in the room but not wake up the baby. The sounds are great with good volume control. The sound activation is great as well.

This stuff is amazing. I mean AMAZING.

I am glad I did, as it really is as wonderful as they say. I feel a lot better about giving this to my kids when they can have candy, than giving them the lab-created 'main brands.' Read the label on a bag of 'WW's' and then read the bag on this. Much better!

Sadly, I contacted the Unreal company on two occasions asking for help getting Unreal Candy into my town, and they were pretty lackadaisical about the whole thing. I guess they don't care if we have it here or not. :(

It's too expensive with shipping to order it online, so I'll have to wait until my little town carries it. Hopefully they'll change their policies on attempting to move into new markets.

In the mean time, I highly recommend you give this a try if they sell it in your town, or order it here at least once so you can see how unreal it really is.

I do use the ice pack for the one that I take to work and it is a tight fit using caps instead of tops. I have used literally dozens and dozens of different products from different brands, half of which were those with natural ingredients.  Out of ALL of these products Devita's Natural Perfecting Time face lotion is hands down the best of them all.  It makes my skin soft, supple, land almost glowing, but not in a shiny or glossy way.  It absorbs perfectly, and it is safe to use under the eyes because all of the ingredients are totally natural.  But my favorite thing about Devita's Perfecting Time face lotion, is that in contains argireline - so it tightens and firms while smoothing and nourishing your skin.  It really does work like botox!  It's unbelievable.  Number 1 on my list of favorite face moisturizers!  Only the "Perfecting Time" version contains argireline, so don't think that just because it's Devita and it's a face lotion that it is the same.  Argireline is one of the ingredients in found exclusively in "Perfecting Time."

This is a great product. The reason why I choose this stroller was because my sister has purchased the same stroller but the double version and I used it and loved it. I couldn't believe how well it turned, specially, at the mall and in and out of stores. For use a large stroller (the double one) it maneuvered extremely well! Also, I owned three other strollers prior to this one and one being a Perego Pliko P3 stroller that is supposed to be an outstanding stroller (however the price is outrageous compared to this stroller), and of all the strollers I have owned and used, I disliked them all this is by far the best product! I have not had any problems with this stroller. I have recommended it to many people and many people have actually stopped me on the road to asked me what kind of stroller it was and where they can get it. It is so easy to maneuver and great looking. The only issue would be that it is a bit heavier than any of the other strollers I used but it's not that bad considering all the other great aspects about it. I love that it has a cup holder that detaches. It has a seat that reclines and also can be removed to face out or mommy. I LOVE THAT! Plus, it comes with a universal attachment for if your baby is an infant and you want to just take the babies car seat out of the car and click in right onto the stroller, it works. That is the best... the only thing I was disappointed with and didn't realize it until I purchased it and got home was that it wasn't quite compatible with my Britax car seat. You can still use it with Britax (although, the manufacturer doesn't recommend it) but it doesn't CLICK in and you MUST use the straps provided with the stroller to keep the car seat secure. It really wasn't so much an issue for me, as my child is 7 months old and big enough to use the seat provided. (I did use the car seat attachment a few times, but had to keep the straps on tight) I hope that this review is helpful. If you are debating about getting this stroller and something else, I HIGHLY recommend this one. Specially, the one with the one wheeled front. That way, you can use it for walking/running as well. This stroller truly is all in one and perfect.oller and something else, I HIGHLY recommend this one. Specially, the one with the one wheeled front. That way, you can use it for walking/running as well. This stroller truly is all in one and perfect.
