So happy with this item! Glad I did the research and found it. Highly recommended!

ScribbleDrips

Love these type of "super foods".  Easy to use.  Great way to add Omega 3 essentials to my diet.  I like plant based fatty acids.  I soak these before adding to my smoothies for added thickening action.
Overall a great seat that is easy to install and get our son into.  He seems to find it comfortable as well.  The only complaint is that the strap release latch is hard to find.  Otherwise its great.

Where to begin?  We have the Aspen Storkcraft Stages Crib since 2006.  It was missing essential pieces of hardware when it arrived, no problem to call and order, they came a week or 2 later.  Not that hard to put together, but wood is flimsier than it looks in the photo.  First the crib rail split in the center of the top rail.  Ordered a new crib rail, $60.  Daughter teething on tops of side rails, now it looks like crud b/c finish is missing.  Then drawer keeps falling off tracks.  Then I notice that the wood in the rear right corner on the back rail (which is eventually supposed to be the headboard for the child's bed transformation) is split around a bolt.  The company will not offer any assistance, asked me for photos, and won't replace the piece unless I pay for it!!!  The brackets that hold the board that supports the mattress keep getting recalled.  Oh, and one more wonderful thing: in order to make this crib--> toddler bed--> child's bed, you have to buy more pieces to it!!!! I would not have spent the money on this had I known it was going to be such a problem.  Thank goodness it was a gift!!!!    Bottom line: BUY A DIFFERENT CRIB!!!

I have to say that the Stinger Waffles are the best energy snack to come on the market in years. I love these things. I cycle, and the fact that these are flat make them really easy to carry in a jersey pocket. They don't have huge amounts of calories, but they definitely help me keep going during a long workout. And they taste so good, that I keep them around as regular snacks, even when I am not exercising.

The only downside to these (and the reasons they get 4 stars): the packages aren't the easiest to open. I usually only open them when stopped if it is during a ride. If I could give half-stars, these would be 4.5!

I bought this gate because it said it was a pressure mounted gate and I didn't want to ruin my walls.  When it arrived, I discovered that my options were to screw the mounting cups into the walls or use the included adhesive disks to attach the mounting cups to the walls.  So my options were to ruin the walls with screw holes or ruin them with adhesive residue.  I overcame this issue by using the temporary adhesive strips that you pull to release, but I'm sure that the manufacturer would not approve.  As far as the function of the gate goes, it's great.  It's easy to open with one hand and the self-closing feature is nice so that you can't forget to close it behind you.  So overall, if you're looking for a pressure mounted gate, it's probably not what you're looking for unless you do it the way I suggested.  If you're not necessarily wanting it to pressure mount, this is a good choice.

i really like this seat, it feels safe, is sturdy and well reinforced. it is very comfortable for my son.   update 2/2011  i still love this seat  pros:   the cover comes off for cleaning which is very important to me! its harder for me to take off, but i have inflammatory arthritis in my hands so i have trouble with things like that. so i am not the best judge of how difficult it is.    there is a metal bar that reinforces the seat (the car's seatbelt goes through it), after looking at many other car seats this one seems like the strongest and safest design.    the seat is still very comfortable for my son, i really like the reclining option (there are 2 choices when they are still under a certain weight). when he falls asleep his head doesnt fall into an awkward angle very often. we have a back-up carseat in my husbands car that is not a britax, and everytime my son falls asleep in that one i have to pull over and prop his head up! (we dont have to use that one very often, but almost every car ride over 15 mins puts my son to sleep).    i was able to keep him rear facing comfortably until he was about 15 months old, and he was well over 20 LBS by then! (my goal was to keep him rear facing as long as possible)

What a precious little nightlight. I have purchased 5 of them so far, and each recipient has been thrilled. A starry sky, a sliver of a moon, soft colors cover the ceiling and provide a soothing, calming shower of magic. Even adults will drift off to sleep easily and quickly, with this lovely star show overhead....
as a substitute for sweet chocolaty stuff, this satisfies my wife's cravings.  I think it is good in that regard.

I love the fact that I can pop out frozen food and create a big store of baby foods.  I don't feel as if the lids hold/seal ultra tight, though, so packing for a trip makes me a little worried - but no big deal because I haven't had any leaks so far.
Very pretty, soft and cuddly blanket. Nice for newborn. Not sure how it will hold up in the wash but it seems like it will be ok.

I got these, 4 pounds worth, over six months ago. I keep them in the frig and still have a little more to go. They taste as fresh today as the day I got them. I like that after taking a portion, it's easy to close their bags with not even a small air bubble. The bag walls actually merge together from the top of the contents to the top of the bag. I'm happy with the product.
These are pretty good- I like the ones with dark Chocolate and sea salt better
Aside from the Puntini wrappers not having the flavors stated on them.... they were great. Very happy with them!
Great stuff ! I luv it! I first had Suzie in Antigua. The people here in ky love Susie's sauce!

This crib is solid wood with a metal spring base, very minimal smell to the paint and is aesthetically pleasing. It was very important to us to purchase a crib which didn't have any mdf or manufactured wood that could off gas formaldehyde. I wanted a crib which was white with airflow around all sides. I also bought the moonlite slumber dual side mattress which fits this perfectly. The fact that this crib has adjustable height for the mattress base is great, it also converts to a junior bed and the matching side bar is included. One of the best purchases for our nursery.

I have had this item set up with the cubby unit and door unit for about 9 months.  The quality has been fantastic and it is a perfect storage unit for our three year old.  The great thing is that this product is almost exactly like the system in Pottery Barn Kids, but at a fraction of the price.  I would highly recommend this product.

I got this for our son for Christmas and he loves it.  Great for chewing on and it's easy to take with us on the go.  The rattle isn't too loud so it won't bother your ears even if they shake it for hours :)  Would highly recommend.
The Jack Daniel's chocolates are delicious! I bought these for my boyfriend for Valentine's Day and we absolutely love them.

EXCELLENT....VERY SATISFIED ........... EXCELLENT VERY GOOD QUALITY GOOD OPTION FOR THE PRICE AND RECOMMEND ... MUYBUEN BUY QUALITY, EXCELLENTVERY SATISFIED ........... EXCELLENT VERY GOOD QUALITY GOOD OPTION FOR THE PRICE AND RECOMMEND ... MUYBUEN BUY QUALITY, EXCELLENT

We mix these in with pecans, walnuts, almonds, sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds and unsweetened coconut flakes to make a great low carb, paleo/primal friendly snack. Just a handful has enough good quality healthy fats in it to keep you going for hours until your next meal.

I use Amazon for most of my purchases and update my reviews if anything changes with the products. I do this so other Amazon users can get a real feel for the life of the product. You can look at my review which will be close to my purchase date and tell how the product is doing as time passes. I am not associated with any company and all opinions are my very own.

This is a good product, made well and very useful for my needs.  I have had this fence (adjustable) for almost a year now and it is good as new.  It has never failed to keep my dog from running out the front door, and luckily I suppose, he has never tried to knock it down.
Good quality product, not the easiest to use but effective for children and pets, good price, bought one for each entryway.

I've tried two flavors - Pepperoni and Original Wild - and have enjoyed them both.  The texture's pretty good - nice and chewy.  The moisture level is okay, but it could be improved by being just a tiny bit more moist. There's also a little bit of an aftertaste (which I didn't find to be unpleasant, but some might).  The spice level on the Pepperoni and Original Wild flavors were perfect. The Original Wild was medium hot, so it might be a little too much for some.  I loved it though.  I recommend that people try to buy this locally before spending a lot of money on it.  I bought mine from a local vegan store online, then discovered that a large grocery chain carries it in their health food section.

These lil crunchies are usually very good. We usually get the veggie dip and mild cheddar varieties and my daughter crunches them down. I made the mistake of purchasing the apple and sweet potato flavor has Amazon had them for a really great price.  They are a little skinnier than the cheddar and veggie kind, which is fine. They smell like apples. But, they taste like nail polish remover. Just, not good at all. I do not recommend this flavor! I am going to stick to the cheddar.
YUMMY...The white chocolate makes it taste more like a decadent treat than a HEALTHY BREAKFAST BAR! It's hard to stop with one!

I love this cup holder! I did have a hard time trying to loosen the strap. I did not know to twist the cap anti-clockwise and it was not stated in the instructions. So I knocked one star off for lack of clear information.     It fits perfectly on the handlebar of my son's trike. Love it!

Works great so far. Our daughter likes it, and it fits well in my truck. No complaints.

The cup holders tuck out of the way when not being used too. It's kind of a bad location for cupholders anyways, easy to get knocked out.

These taste great, and you can use them with your mates to have a food fight. While its in the wrapper slap each other in the face with them. Its pretty funny getting a piece of stretchy food across your face.
The assortment we received was what we ordered ; however the outside chocolate had greyed a bit as if they were old.  Some pieces tasted just a little stale.  Arrived when promised.
tastes good and doesn't give that wired, nervous feeling that most coffees do. can drink 2-3 cups a day. I usually can't handle more than 1 cup of commercial unorganic  brands.

I really like this baby food maker! As a first time mom, I had no idea how much baby food I would actually make or how difficult it might be. The Babycook is easy to use and super cute! I noticed some reviewers said they found mold in the water basin, but mine does not.  I have cleaned it with white vinegar as the directions say, but I also leave the lid off of the water basin for a little while after using it so it can dry out. My only complaint is that I sometimes wish the cooking bowl was bigger. I can usually only fit 1 pear in it at a time, and if I have 3 pears to cook, it takes 3 cooking cycles.

This is a great stoller as a single. What I wish I knew before I bought it was that it really doesn't convert well to a double. If that is a factor for you in deciding between this and another stroller that doesn't convert, you'd might as well factor it out... When you put the rumble seat on, there isn't much head clearance between it and the main seat (both seats also have to face the parent). The only way to get decent head clearance is for the main seat to be fully upright, which is not appropriate for my 3 month old baby. Perhaps if you had two toddlers you could use this stroller as a double, but with a toddler and baby don't bother with the rumble seat.

Considering the poor usability of the rumble seat, this stroller is comparable to other nice single strollers that don't have the conversion option. In that case, I wonder if I should have bought a Chameleon. The Chameleon is an inch or two narrower and has air-filled wheels. The width and the wheels are the two things I do not like about the Vista. Fortunately, they are the only two things I don't like about it. Aside from that, this is an AWESOME stroller:

-great height - baby sits up higher than most strollers (an advantage over the bugaboo). We even use ours in the house and roll her up to the table so she can see us at meal times, or roll her into the kitchen to watch me cook
-easy to steer and push
-lots of recline positions (in the 2012 model), one-hand recline
-peek-a-boo window (bugaboo doesn't have one)
-adjustable footrest
-bassinet and seat are separate pieces so you can use both without switching the fabric (chameleon is one frame that converts)
-fold is so easy! there's no \\"technique\\" you just hold a button with one hand and give the handle bar a little push with the other. just need to push handle bar in (like telescoping), not down. easy.
-enormous basket - makes the stroller look a little big but it's convenient and easy to find stuff inyour basket
-easy to switch seat back and forth - I actually prefer this one over bugaboo's memory buttons because it's easier to set the seat back in

My baby and toddler both love riding in this stroller (but separately, since we returned the rumble seat). IF ONLY UPPABABY WOULD SELL REPLACEMENT AIR TIRES!! Also I find it a little tricky to get up and down curbs - it has to be tipped quite a bit.

Oh, and a word about the Piggyback board. It's not bad, but not as nice as I expected coming from Uppababy. It rattles a lot going down the sidewalk and doesn't fold away as easily as I would have liked. It's kind of a pain, actually. You have to strap it to the footrest, and the footrest has to be all the way down. But my son rides on it for short trips if his legs get tired and he likes it well enough. I just don't like leaving it on the stroller if I'm not going to need it.

I'm happy with this stroller, but I still wonder if I should have gone with the Chameleon - mostly for the air-filled tires! I compromised on the tires so that I could have a convertible stroller, which didn't pan out since the rumble seat is useless. Ah well.

I bought these containers because I was pureeing food at home for my 6 month old son.  They are nice because they can be put through the dishwasher and they store easily.  I really didn't use them for very long though because my son quickly moved on up to 3 oz or more snacks.  But they were nice while he was only eating 1 - 2 oz.
This product is helpful in smoothies with a low calorie addition. I am pleased with it and it's price.
Bought this as part of a baby gift - it is adorable and well made.  Very happy!
I received a hook on hanging toy. Very cute and well-made, but does not match the picture here. There's no snack cup.
I enjoyed this coffee on the small mug setting (7.25 oz). It's smooth yet robust with no bitterness. Highly recommended.
Love it! Fits nice and loose, and keeps her safe and warm. I'll definitely be ordering more of these sleepsacks!
A wonderful decaf coffee.  Would highly recommend to anyone that wants a flavored coffee with a couple of cookies.  Think I'll go have one right now!

Great replacement for granola bars, which I'm sick of now, and better than oatmeal/choco cookies for on the run... little cranberries really provide taste, just a great overall snack in a nice portion.

Absolutely amazing on vanilla ice cream and my fiancÃ© made homemade strawberry banana whipped cream with it. The taste was very clean and it added some nice real strawberry red coloring to the cream. I love that the product is NON GMO project approved and with a minimal ingredient deck. Gonna add this to plain yogurt and see what it tastes like. Most fruit yogurts have tons of sugar.
Discovered sodium free chicken boullion years ago. Makes an easy chicken soup! Moving to a rural area, could not find it in jars except online.
I purchased these to use for a baby shower. They were the perfect size. Arrived very quickly.

My son uses Nuk, the bottles are kind of big that being said, the rack does its job but the fit is pretty snug. Cannot dry a lot of bottles at a time because of that. I you use Nuk, I wouldnâ€™t recommend buying this rack.
I love that it is all natural, and it has more in the pack than some of it's competitors.  I will buy this again :)

These look very cute!! I was surprised by how well they turned out. I will try to post pics later.  My daughter has a small room and I am buying another pack as I used all of these sheets on two walls. If you have a lot of space to cover you might want two packs, but for the price, it's well worth it!

If I had known about Chef 5 Minute Meals 20 years ago, I would not have been so reluctant to haul gear up the side of mountains, or lose a nail while setting up a tent. There would have been a hot, pretty tasty meal awaiting me...that I DID NOT HAVE TO COOK! Is this haute cuisine? No. But it is hot and better-tasting than any other emergency food out there.

i heard from quite a few that there are health benefits in using a product like this. so i thought i would try it out for example in smoothies and other things. good quality product. i am happy with this purchase. i hope to reap some health benefits from using it. bob's red mill products are high quality.

The Muir Glen line of fire roasted tomatoes are the highest quality domestic canned tomatoes you will find. The flesh is deep red and flavorful and the Smokey notes from the fire roasting are incredible! I use the diced tomatoes with green chilies for everything, but the homemade salsa we make with them is to die for, actually better than what we make with our own home grown tomatoes. Very highly recommended.

Homemade Roasted Salsa

3-cans Muir Glen Organic Diced Tomatoes, Fire Roasted with Gree Chilies
2-cups Roland diced roasted red peppers (drained)
[[ASIN:B000V7OY4U Roland Roasted Red Peppers, Diced, 27.5-Ounce Can (Pack of 5)]]
1-large sweet onion diced
5-cloves chopped garlic
1-teaspoon cumin
1-teaspoon chili powder
2-tablespoons Empacadora San Marcos Chipotle Peppers in Adobo Sauce
[[ASIN:B000H27MYI Empacadora San Marcos Chipotle Peppers in Adobo Sauce, 11-Ounce Cans (Pack of 12)]]

Use a stick (or other) blender to puree the Chipotle Peppers in Adobo Sauce (these things have wonderful flavor, but are very hot. They are what will be providing the heat in your salsa so adjust according to your taste). Mix everything together in a sealed container and set in the fridge overnight so the flavors can marry. Serve with [[ASIN:B000V0BQ4S Good Health Solea Polenta Corn Chips Guacamole, 5-Ounce Bag (Pack of 12)]]. Fore a little less kick! use [[ASIN:B000LKZ9IC Muir Glen Organic Diced Tomatoes, Fire Roasted, 14.5-Ounce Cans (Pack of 12)]]
We love Truffle Salt and this is the best we've ever had. It is pungent and tasty and adds flavor to anything you add it to. Absolutely recommend this to anyone looking for a delicious Truffle salt.

This item is incredible.  I'm a Starbucks gold card carrier and love their coffee.  But I must say the Java with a little vanilla soy milk comes close or even better than their Americana.  I thought coffee substitutes were kinda like fake cheese, why bother?  A friend brewed a pot and I liked it from the first sip.  Now here's what I found, you have to be precise on the measuring.  Too little and it's your classic water downed coffee substitute and too much and it goes a little bitter.  I found 4 cups in the coffee maker, 2 rounded off tablespoon scoops (the plastic kind) and it's great!  Haven't been to Starbucks since discovering their Java.  Sometimes mix a little Almond Amaretto.
Great taste and no hard kernels "like the other brands ". great buy!!  and the only one our family buys.
Yakami Orchard Japanese Yuzu Kosho Rub is spicy hot and very flavorful. I use the spice rub for most meats: beef, chicken and pork.
I would have rated it a 5 but nearly an ounce of the oil leaked out. The sender did a great job of packaging and trying to secure it so I didn't contact them for a refund or credit.

if you like a bit of spicy sauce...

Traditionally we ate it in England with a 'fry-up' bacon, sausage, cheese, tomato, blood pudding breakfast.

It also goes well with cottage cheese and crackers; pork chop; cheese on toast; scrambled egg...

Excellent product in the plastic bottles.

Get product! If u need foods to stay warm run hot water in then dry and add hotfood. For cold just put in freezer for 10 minutes add cold food.and it last for hours. The cold does last longer then the warmth does. My daughter has used it for twoyears for school lunch

While it may work in theory, this product is TB117 compliant, so it means it contains toxic flame retardants in the foam. This is what your baby's head rests on, sweats on, touches. I had one too, 3 years ago, before I realized how these flame retardants are in so much baby gear. I'd say avoid this and all foam products for your child (and yourself) unless you know that the foam and exterior fabric have not been treated with flame retardants. If they say TB117 on the tag, you should avoid.

Babies love these pacifiers!! I order them for gifts for everyone expecting. Very well made and too cute!!
I would have given it 5 stars but it was 2 days late being delivered and it was a gift.

Second time ordering these protein bars. I cannot say enough about how good they are and the high quality ingredients. All real, no junk, nothing on the label that you don't recognize. I have tried lots of different ones and almost all of them bother my stomach in some way, except Marigold bars.  They are filling and taste wonderful, not fake.

This is the perfect size for my baby, who started to eat cereal. When she progresses to eating fruit/vegetable, the compartments would be used. What really makes this a great bowl is the ergonomic design, where my left thumb easily slides into the handle, and the bowl rests on my palm stably and comfortably.

Don't waist your time with car bottle warmers, this is the best for on the go warming. You won't have to worry about it melting your bottles or catching on fire! The water stays hot for hours on hours and is simple to use. My only complaint is that ours would leak just a little but just into the plastic lid (that doubles as a cup for warming) not even enough to lose a star. I will purchase it for mommies to be!

--Very refreshing after being refrigerated. Excellent drink first thing in the morning.What's missing? The white jelly meat
from the inside of the coconut.

I've always loved the mineraly taste of Perrier, and I prefer the plastic bottles to glass. It seems more carbonated. Before trying this, I liked lime slightly more than plain, and disliked lemon. This is my new favorite.

The other review was correct in saying the grapefruit is more of a smell than a taste. It's so subtle that you could pour tap water back into an empty bottle and get a similar level of flavor.

Most importantly, it contains no artificial sweeteners. I dislike the aftertaste of all artificial sweeteners, including the small(er) amounts added to tonic and soda waters. This has none of that. Nor is it affected by or will affect your appetite for sweets. It's not that kind of drink.

I did not like one at all. I was expecting a punch flavor and it was barely there. It had a cherry taste to it. I like certain cherry soda, but.... It did seem to have given me a small boost of energy though.

I would not recommend this product to anyone. The taste of the drink is overly sickly sweet and bland. Our kids also did not care for taste and their drinks ended up going done the drain. I will not waste my money buying this product again.

The shiitake mushroom Happy Pho is absolutely delicious!  So flavorful, healthy and really easy to make.  Even my one year old daughter loved it!  I can't wait to try all of the other flavors.   Thanks for offering such a great product!

Yup, FOUR times! Thank goodness Babies R Us has a great return policy! I recommend saving the box if you do indeed decide to buy this piece of junk.
There was nothing good about it in our opinion. It's a cool concept, but cheaply made. It's flimsy, it skips 9 out of 10 times, it eats batteries up within a few hours. It also has a lowsy volume control/speaker system. Yes, I know it's a babies CD player, but for $50 (which is ridiculous), shouldn't it have some stereo sound to it?
SO, thumbs down for this product. And if you must buy it or get it as a gift, save that box so you can keep returning it to Babies R Us!

I bought this item for my grandson's pack n play.  I read reviews before I bought it and some people mentioned it is a tight fit.  Do Not put this in the dryer.  I just hang it to dry.  If it shrinks even the smallest amount it will be too small to use.  Otherwise, the fabric is nice and soft and it has a cute print.
This stuff is great on any veggies but especially good on scrambled eggs. People will wonder what the heck you put on your eggs to make it taste gourmet.

The sage I received was not quite a pound and it was not finely ground at all (as in the photo).  It smelled wonderful but I was concerned about the visible stems so I wrote customer service.  A replacement was sent - which was identical to the original shipment.  I don't know what to do at this point - I can use it in stuffing but will look elsewhere for a finer grind on the sage.
The clear jel was very good . It did the job that i needed to do. Was very happy with it will tell others.
This cocoa powder works great in my mineral foundation. The closure on the packaging does not stay shut unless I try about 10 times. Kind of frustrating.

I used my BOB Revolution for the first time today and I loved it! Here's what i like about it:
-Made of high quality, light materials
-Easily maneuverable and very smooth over any surface
-Sun canopy blocks out sun from any angle without obstructing the passenger's view
-Large viewing window on top of canopy
-Storage basket is large and easily accessible
-Seat reclines
-Straps are easy to adjust
-Front wheel is easy to lock and unlock (the pivoting front wheel is a MUST on a jogger)
-Easy to fold and transport
-Brake is easy to engage and disengage
This stroller is worth the money!
Very short.  Can't say my daughter was much interested in this more than a few times, compared with other books.

If your kids are older this might work for you but we found that our crawling kiddo would lean onto the front panel to reach into the chest for his toys which resulted in the panel folding in and bending.

I bought my sister a nice olive oil dispenser for Christmas and needed to get a little something to go with it. She LOVES olive oil and I had gotten her a few from a wine store a few years ago which she loved but we put a $ limit now so I saw these and read a few reviews and she absolutley is enjoying each one.. Cute bottles and great flavors... I repackaged them in a nice gift bag..

Spend more money and get better quality.  3 cups were sealed incorrectly and had to be thrown away right from the box.  Almost all of the coffee we brewed were filled with coffee grinds due to poor quality of the cups so we spent more money throwing away coffee in the long run.  No savings at all.  Wolfgang Puck Jamaica Meâ€Ž Crazy is better quality and flavor.

So glad that they finally made these with open legs - our son likes them but the last XL size does not fit him any more and he really does not like blankets. I was worried how I would deal with the winter - but this is great!
Great texture and all-spice flavor for anyone who loves granola but wants to avoid grains. I buy for me and to give to friends

As a nut the Cashew is one of my favorites. The pepper flavor was interesting and added a unique flavor to this already great nut. The salt was a bit much. Salt tastes good but i would cut the salt by 75% here. It was very overpowering and required water almost immediately.
this suit is way small for its recommendation.  2 sizes too small for its label.  I had to buy it twice to get the size right and then i still returned it for sizing.
Omg this thing is do tinyam not sure I will put my baby in there. This small size shd be for a really tiny preemie

I ordered this expecting more than a lightly flavored chai. Maybe that was my misconception. Other than that I like the tea, it is something different and I'm glad that I took a chance on it. I'm also able to share it with fellow tea lovers.
Wow,  If you like chocolate and raspberry , you can't go wrong buying this coffee.  This coffee is a total treat.

My baby likes this formula better than other brand names we tried. I know that that might be different for every baby as they have different tastes. But it's also organic and has a better price than most non-organic formulas. Overall a really good deal.

Arrived promptly, was well packaged and taste delicious. The production date clearly stamped on the package, only two months before I got it, the shelf-life is 20 months. No cooking direction in English, but it cooks just like white rice (1cup of buckweat to 2 cups of water) - sort and rinse it before cooking. I like to cook it in rice cooker.  I tried different brands of buchweat grown in U.S., but was very disappointed. I recommend this product and will buy it again.

Due to busy schedules, sometimes we just need something quick for dinner that doesn't require much thought. This is definitely one of the better wheat free gluten free boxed dinners out there, and I actually look forward to eating it. It is a little too salty in my opinion, but I don't season the chicken or veggies I add, and that seems to cut the salt a bit. It is definitely quick and easy, and tasty, too. I will buy again!

Received my order today. They taste great, but look horrible. Not just melted (which I understand), but also crushed. The bag of candy was shipped from Japan in a regular paper envelope. So I basically received a bag of kit-kat crumbs.
I was so pleased with this item that I am sure I will definitely order it again.

Purchased the book for my 10 month old grandson.  Expected he would hear the animals' sounds, but there is no audio in this book.  You have to be the one to make the sounds.  As I'm far away, that I can't do.  Very disappointed.

I consider myself a very good baker, but my pies always lacked the silky texture I consider aesthetically beautiful.  I think food should look appetizing as well as taste great.  Other thickening agents made the pies gummy or would solidify.  My custard pies are silky and my fruit pies have never been better!  Tasty and beautiful to the last bite!  Thank you = )

I bought this when it was on manager's special and deeply discounted.  The instructions work perfectly.  I travel frequently and have these as back-up food or for when I have access to hot water but won't be able to wash dishes.  This meal is flavorful but a little thin on the veggies. If the price were lower, I would but more.

I bought this wrap after reading many glowing reviews on both amazon & other sites.  I have been shown in person how to wrap this, but it is fairly complicated & needs practice.  I am a small person, so I have so much extra fabric that it is a problem.  I have tried wrapping the extra around my waist a few more times, but I end up feeling like I am being constricted by a boa constructor.  THe other downside w/ this wrap is that it is almost impossible to wrap when you are out of the house (you just end up dragging it around on the floor...).  The solution is to wrap it before you leave the house, but this was never comfortable for me.  And as the other reviewers say, it get's VERY warm for the baby....I am so disappointed in this product - I am sending it back to Amazon today & getting a baby K'tan instead.  Same concept, no wrapping needed!!!

This has been the best purchase we have made! We purchased this when our daughter was 5 wks. old and now she is a year and we still use it! The vibration feature is wonderful for soothing your newborn. They will be entertained for long periods of time by the lights and music. And now that our daughter is 1 she still likes to sit in it to watch a video. Easy to change fabric cover if it gets dirty- Has held up great.  Cant say enough good things about this product!
nice taste, smell, consistency.  Arrived when expected.  Went well in my biscotti and was too lazy to go to the grocery store.  love the one day shipping.

This is TWO pounds of salt, not five. TWO!
As the description was truncated on my phone display, I thought I was buying FIVE pounds of salt.
The quality and packaging is fine, which is why my review is three stars.

I couldn't find these in the stores but I needed them for a recipe. The cinnamon really packs a punch. Great chips!
John's wife

I agree the Starbucks Latte was good.  Sadly, Starbucks and Craft have discontinued their relationship and we will no longer be able to get Starbucks coffee anywhere once they sell out current stock.  Call Tassimo and they will send you a free sample of Jacobs Latte Macchiato.  It is great.  As good or better than Starbucks Latte.  Try it, you'll be happy you did.  I give the Jacobs Latte Macchiato 5 stars.
Grind my own each morning.  Using a Perc.  These beans are just the ticket.  Flavor nice and full.  Not bitter or bitey
I was looking around for a Bompo or Megachair and found they cost over $30. I came upon this chair which costs about the same but has the play tray. My 4 month old loves it. A great buy.
awesome service could not get any better than this ,the product was fresh and i received my package in just a few days awesome
Super easy to put on the car seat. Very soft on the inside and I like the zipper/velcro combo.
This tea is OK, but i've had better! It's not sweet enough and I need to add sugar! If you're a southerner like me, brew your own!

When we received our swing, the toy/snack tray was missing. We called fisher price and a representative has sent one. We should be recieving it in a few days. Besides that it was easy enough to put together and I see that my baby is very comfortable in this swing. He will be fussy and I have done all I can for him so I put him in it and he either falls asleep or is soothed, almost instantly. Or other times I have to make dinner or something that requires both of my hands and I put him in there and he is fine, especially if the swing setting is on a low speed. If he is really upset though, a higher speed is more effective. One thing I was a bit disappointed in was the song setting, you cant choose the songs, and they play the same order every time. You cant even skip a song. But he doesn't seem to mind. The motor is a bit loud but then thats all the more soothing for baby. If this swing is the one you want, you wont be disappointed -unless of course you recieve it without a tray hahaha

I read online about Amy's soups, I was trying to lose weight and needed to include healthier things in my diet; so I bought different soups from Amy's kitchen but the Lentil soup is my favorite. It's rich, tasty and filling and I am definitely going to buy some more soon.

I've bought this nougat in England and brought it home, so was delighted to find I could buy it here.  The nougat is delicious -- not too sweet and very tasty!  And it was fresh and soft when it arrived, and well packed by the shipper.

I absolutely LOVE this pump. I had ordered one through Amazon only to be disappointed that they sent me the wrong pump. I finally just went to Toys R Us and bought the Pump In Style Advanced. I had gotten an Ameda Purely Yours pump through insurance when I was pregnant and it stopped working about two months after I delivered. So I had been hand pumping at home ever since and my daughter is now 8 months old. I finally decided to break down and purchase a good pump. I knew Medela was a great brand (I work in a hospital and we have a pumping room with Medela Symphony pumps) and that Medela was the best way to go for me. My supply had gone down quite a bit not only from not being able to pump as much with the hand pump, but my husband had been in the hospital 11 days from complications with appendicitis. So as soon as I got the pump, my supply is going back up again and I am thrilled. I absolutely recommend this pump.

My daughter hated the highchair because she couldn't sit at the table like her sister. Now, with this chair- she is eating with us! It's super easy to attach and I like that I can throw the fabric in the washer from time to time to clean it.

Piment d'Espelette is a nice alternative to red or cayenne pepper.  For flake like than powder, the heat is a bit more mild than usual hot peppers with a slightly sweet undertone.  I like it and this shipper sent the product swiftly and packed well (thanks), but it's a bit expensive for what it is.
My husband and I love Bruce's Sweet Potato pancakes. I usually add 1/8 teaspoon pumpkin pie spices. Never get tired of them!

My grandfather had serious constipation that negatively affected his quality of life. By hearing great stories about this tea from others, I offered my grandpa to try it. It immediately relieved his constipation and he has been regular for the past three months. He has a new life and has thanked every time I see him. My only concern is that repeated use may lead to tolerance and resuming of his constipation
ITS A GOOD GREEN TEA.  LOTS OF FLAVOR, NOT LEAF DUST GOOD QUALITY TEA  HAVING SOME NOW
True to size but hard to peel it off without it all sticking to each other- kept tangling up. Parts keep unsticking from the wall.
Our 18 month old son loves riding in this over his very expensive stroller.  It is lightweight and very easy to use.  It fits both my husband and I very nicely.  Well worth the money!

I bought this sling to replace my old sling that I had used for 8 years. I like this sling even better. The padding is so comfortable on my shoulder and my baby is extremely comfortable in it. I also get a lot of compliments on the look of it. I would definitely recommend!

These rum cakes are one of a kind. You won't find anything like them anywhere else. They are so moist and delicious tasting its hard to stop at one slice. What's even better is because they are packaged so well they are easy to travel with and keep for a long time.
This was a great deal on one of the best tasting seasonings. I use it for so many dishes. It really perks up chicken.
These filters sure beat having to clean out the grounds out of the filters.  There are other brands out there but for the price these are great!
Daelmans Caramel Wafers taste amazing! They taste great with coffee! Only 1 bad thing: EXPENSIVE! But besides that, well worth the taste!
THIS WAS ANOTHER PERFECT ITEM FOR THE DR. SEUSS THEMED BABY SHOWER. I USED IT TO PUT THE OTHER GIFTS INSIDE.
I absolutely love this oatmeal. Bought it originally when I had a baby for convenience purposes only...and now it has become one of my staples!!
I was a little worried that I was wasting my money buying coffee at this price, so I'm surprised at the good rich taste.  You could say, it has a rich taste for a low price.
Monster hit some kind of sweet spot with this stuff.  Some of their other concoctions are decent, but none nearly as delicious as Mean Bean.
Very simple design that so far does the trick. Suction cups stick so far and hopefully will hold up to the Arizona summer heat.
Love it, it's a great deal and a beautiful set. Well worth every penny. the delivery was pretty fast for standard as well. I would highly recommend  to all moms looking for bed sets.

This is a fun toy for baby when s/he starts to be able to grab things, even inadvertently. Attempts to chew can lead to frustration, but my son seemed to "learn" the cause-and-effect of shake to hear the rattle pretty quickly.  Also, the toss-and-mom-will-give-it-back-to-you-while-making-a-funny-noise-and-face bit makes him giggle :)

I loved my regular ultimate crib sheets, but after a year the snaps started to break on one, so I needed another. The organic version was cheaper so I opted for it, but it's not as good. It's either shrunk or wasn't as big to begin with (I think the problem is shrinkage though). I wash my kids' sheets in hot water, and when I put this on the crib it is about 2 inches short both ways. Because of the elastic on the snaps it works OK, but it's harder to put on and because of the gap my son messes with the sides more than the other version.     I say go with the regular version until they get the sizing right on this one.

Perfect all around olive oil. We cook with it, use it as a skin and massage oil, salad dressing, and even as a kinky hair fix. Flavor is rich and clean and just perfect as a all purpose, high quality oil.

Love having my own wheatgrass at the house. The 5 lb bag is perfect for me because I throw a handful of wheatgrass in to my smoothies every day. I do harvest it twice, even though I know there are significantly less nutrients in the second harvest. I have had zero problem growing it.
This is awesome oil and it smells so good. I use it for facials, hair and skin moisturizer. Sometimes cooking when I'm out of butter.
I love this product. Tastes great in soups and stews,and just about any savory one would want to add it to.

This one is ok. It's patchy sound and unclear quality make for frustrating scenarios sometimes but seeing as how we got it for a good deal on cyber Monday it was worth it. Otherwise I probably would have returned it. It doesn't come with the ability to wall mount either which is something we needed.
It was what I wanted but I had no idea there were two.  I must have missed something in the description.

I'm no salt connoisseur, but this stuff really tastes great. And, the seervice was exceptional, and they send you nice informative little newsletters.

Pricey, but worth it if you love salt and want to try the good stuff...
The right mix for the perfect Hangar 1 Mandarin Martini.  Use in 1 to four ratio of mix to martini and sugar to taste.
I just heard these are no longer allowed to be sold in the United States due to deaths of children!! That's why they are coming from ISRAEL ! Why is AMAZON SELLING THESE!!

I am not a fan of polyester. Having said that, I bought this set because my kids LOVE trains and the reviews were good. When I tried it out, the pillow cover and sheet kept shifting and didn't stay in place due to the fabric. I have a cotton fitted sheet from Pottery Barn and it stays in place much better. I am sending this back. The print and style is very good and it is awesome for the price, but I just don't like polyester, I prefer cotton sheets since they seem to stay in place much better and seem more breathable.
My little 2 year old Grandson loves stacking these blocks, plays with them all the time!
I had a sinus headache and I used Sinufix, within 30 minutes the headache was gone.  I have a collection of various nasal sprays and this one is the best.
This tea has a smooth delicate slightly smokey flavor. I have definitely become a fan and will order again. Simpson and Vail has a very good variety and great service.

These vanilla beans came in plump and juicy - they're fantastic. I was worried they would be thin and dried up, but they were actually the best vanilla beans I have ever bought! I'm going to order them next time and hope for the same.

This is a great matcha powder! I've used it in making shortbread and in making (a lot of) green tea lattes! They always turn out a beautiful, bright green color and taste pretty good as well!

If you want to a simple yet yummy green tea "latte" recipe...here you go!
1-1.5 tsp matcha
1 cup organic, unsweetened soy milk
1 tsp honey

yay! that's it~

I'm extremely happy I found these gates on Amazon. They fold up out of the way when baby is not in the room, so you don't have a clungy gate for everyone to walk through every time they want to get in and out of a room. Easy set up. The latch system takes some getting used to, but I feel confident my daughter won't be opening this gate for as long as we need it.
on auto refill! everyday after hot yoga - better than fake color in gatorade and more electrolytes :)
This stuff is great, all large pieces so far. Just add some lime juice and sweeten to taste - almost like cool aide but much better for you.
Love this seasoning...don't ever want to be without it.  Service great; will definitely order again and recommend that others do too.

Really good loose leaf yerba mate.

Leaves are little bigger than what I have purchased in the past. Not sure if that is a good or a bad thing, but it seems to get into the bombadilla less.

Great flavor.
This is a very good soup to have with your lunch. It gives you a boost in the middle of the day.
Excellent used in cereal. The strawberry flavor predominates. A great combo of 2 fruits. A satisfying taste sensation!
Works great.  The best solution is not to locate light switches stupid high.  But plan B, if you do have a light switch that is too high, this is your solution!

I love the size of these blankets and the prints are just darling. I used them to swaddle my little one. They worked out perfectly. My only complaint is that they are very warm. I live in FL though so that might be a bonus for someone living in a cooler area.

Godivas  are always delicious  but if you are looking for a big assortment of chocolates try a different box. Thats why I gave it 3 stars but the chocolates in this box are excellent quality and taste great.
Love these little clips!!! So useful and so very adorable! Every mom should have these with an infant car seat.
This snack is so tasty! I love the .5 ounce serving sizes. Perfect for the kids lunches with their sandwiches! Way better chips or Cheetos! Highly recommended!
Decent coffee and will buy again. The price is very good. The beans are good quality and not lots of broken pieces and odd looking bean. Healthy whole bean.
I love being able to buy these from Amazon. I personally think that Walkers crisps are better than any crisps/chips that I can get in the US. Great taste, great value!

Excited to receive my Subscribe and Save order of Frosted Flakes only to find the cereal completely infested with BUGS!!! Nasty, Nasty, NASTY!!!  Canceling any future orders right now and requesting a refund.  Gag....

We got this when our second daughter was born. Have been using it for five months now and we are very very happy with it. The picture is good and we are happy with the battery life. Glad we purchased it.

My daughter loves saying with it, but isn't quite ready to brave it yet. The flushing mechanism is of special interest. We have tried using it as a stool for the potty seat, but the rounded design keep poo s it from being adequately stable. Unless she steps in it dead center and stays centered (so.etching I can't always do on a stool), it tips over.

This is a gorgeous necklace that is perfect for a teething little one! The beads are small which is nice because they aren't heavy and they look nice with any outfit. I love that the beads don't have knots between them so they can't move and all get stuck on one end of the necklace which can be very frustrating. It comes with a breakaway clasp which is nice for peace of mind since my kids like to wear anything they find sitting around. I was very excited to read in the description that it wouldn't snag on my hair, however I didn't find this to be the case. It pulled out a lot of my hair!! Overall though, I love this necklace and would absolutely recommend it.

I got this item at a discounted price for leaving an unbiased review.
Smells great.  Sweet but not too sweet.  I use this on my body and face. I love Jason's products.
This is an excellent product. It is difficult to find a decaf coffe k-cup in the stores. This product has excellent flavor and arrives well packaged when shipped.  I strongly recommend this product.
I would definitely buy these bars again. Great flavor. I like them better than the original kind bars.  Healthy snack

I have tried Cafix, Caf-Lib, and Dandy Blend, and Dandy Blend has become my favorite.

The first thing you must do when trying coffee substitutes is to set your expectations. The reviews I read said these products tasted like coffee. They do not taste like any coffee I have ever had. That is not necessarily a bad thing, but if you are expecting a coffee-like taste when you try one of these, you will be disappointed. I drank my coffee black, and so that is how I prepared these. Perhaps with sweetener and/or creamer these do taste more like coffee.

If you are looking for a warm beverage to drink in the place of coffee, Dandy Blend and Caf-Lib are my top two favorites. Try them both to discover which one you prefer.
Been drinking the "goats" off and on since before Starbucks was even a (widespread) thing.  Barista for years.  Goats inspired me to learn everything I know about coffee.  Best blend there is imo.

In my experiences buying these at the store, the ones with the twist off caps had the problem of smelling/tasting like sour milk. It listed milk as an ingredient right on the can. But the pop top cans never had this problem and also never listed milk as an ingredient. I figured they must have changed the formula. Plus, reading the code on the bottom of the can showed that the twist off cap style were made in 2012. At least every one I had seen. So I thought i had this all figured out, the twist offs were just expired or a different formula altogether. I buy the pop top cans every day at the local gas station. I don't even see the twist off style anymore. So I figured it was safe to subscribe on Amazon so I didn't have to stop at the store every day plus risk them being out of it.

I did indeed receive the pop top cans from Amazon, which is what's pictured in the listing. However, they suffer from the sour milk taste/smell. It's undrinkable. So for those who understand what that's all about, you don't want to order from Amazon.

I compared the can from Amazon to the one from the store that tasted normal, and the only difference at all was the code stamped on the bottom of the can. They appeared quite different, clearly not stamped by the same machines, so I wonder if they're made in different locations and maybe that has something to do with it.

So disappointed, I hate stopping at the store all the time for these.

We got these because they were recommended with the pump but for the start up kit I got with from the hospital we also got tubes.  Both worked so we probably wouldn't have had to purchase these.  They work just fine though.
Love these sip cups.  Really only used one spout, but they have been great and have been lasting for a very long time!

I use this in my tea brewing system and it is so delicious.  I love Numi because they care about there not being pesticides in the leaves unlike most of the other well known brands.  This is a very nice breakfast tea.

did i say the best ? You simply cannot beat Callebaut in terms of taste, texture and quality. This is serious chocolate with serious specs. ideal for baking and post processing. lighter flavored than its dark twin. comes with instructions for ideal storage and working temperature

Item arrived on time. I am not sure how it works with my lil guys reflux and teething symptoms yet. Quality is great, my only complaint is the clasp is very hard to take off and on. Especially with a young child that squirms. I love the twist clasp that came with amber necklace..wish this was the same.

I received a bag of this as a bonus/free sample for buying Pop Chips (Medora).  HOLY MOLY!  These have a great taste and blows other chips out of the water!  They don't feel heavy after eating, don't have oils or dust to leave on your hand, taste amazing like tortilla with sesame, salt, and ground black pepper, and just tastes wonderful.  If it was cheaper, I would never pick up any other bags of chips again.  Whenever I have a craving, I end up picking up regular tortilla chips, Doritos, or Pop Chips just because I can't afford to eat these multigrain chips all the time, but I always feel like I'm settling for a lesser product.  These multigrain chips are the holy grail of chips.  I may consider asking for a raise at work or switching careers just to gain more funds to cover the cost of these.  It's worth it.

Love this monitor!! So easy to use and I especially love that the monitor is paired with the parent unit so I can take it anywhere. I live on a half care and I can still use the monitor at the far end of my property with great sound and picture quality.
Best features:
Automute when no change in sound level for a few seconds, so we don't have to listen to the white noise machine next to his crib while we sleep.
You can adjust brightness and sound levels.
Talking into it is easy and baby loves hearing from us.
Adjustable kickstand on back
Temperature on screen
Great battery life

Only negative slightly annoying to find a good spot to hang this on baby room wall and the camera has to be manually moved by hand to see other areas because the cam downy pan/tilt on its own just zoom.

I usually but Essentia or Essence pH water, but was curious about this water. It wasn't bad, but it wasn't very good either. It sort of had a cloudy taste, for lack of a better word. I think the best water comparison I can think of is arrowhead spring water.

I bought this crib cover b/c it was waterproof and small enough to cover a dog bed.  I have ruined lots of dog beds when my dogs have an accident on them,and then the whole thing has to be washed, not just the cover.  putting this over the bed, and under the cover, protected the bed and lets me just wash the cover.  Idk why they dont make these for dog beds, but a crb cover was as small as I could find and it works great!

All 3 of my kids have used this book lovingly.  This, and all the other soft activity books like it have been a hit.  Ours is an older version of this same book (we have no music).  The jammies for the bear have gotten misplaced, but they LOVED taking him out of his overalls and putting on his jammies... Pricey book, but it has kept it's shape better than a lot of our other well used books (except for the missing jammies)
Forget diaper pins!  Snappi cloth diaper fasteners take only a second to secure baby's diaper.  I couldn't even imagine trying to pin his cloth diapers.  So easy!

finally I don't have to try stuffing my huge diaper bag underneath my stroller in the basket beneath the seat where it does not fit easily and I have to yank it out really hard... these make my life MUCH easier so I can hang the diaper bag on them on the handle! works GREAT

When our daughter was little, she would stick her legs through the crib and move around, twisting her legs, and then screaming in pain.  I thought she almost broke her leg once, she was screaming so much.  She is fine, but we got this right away!  We have the Hensvik Ikea crib with only open bars on the front and back.  Its solid on the sides.  I was able to get it to work.  There are two panels that come and they just velcro together.  It works perfectly!  HIGHLY recommend this.

This is the perfect accessory to my joovy caboose. I like it even better than a traditional \\"parent tray\\"! It holds all of my items and there is still room for more. The cup holder fits every cup I have put into it securely, and I love the zippered pocket. It fits perfectly on my stroller and looks great, I am so glad I bought this and would highly highly reccomend it!!
The sheet is soft even after a few washes. My only complaint is it doesn't seem to lay flat. It bunches in the middle no matter how many times I try to straighten it out.
Box was quite a bit smaller than expected for the price.  But it took care of a Christmas stocking stuffer anyway.  Will not do this again.
Epic Find!  Impossible to find this brand of M&M in the US.  Seems to only be available in Germany and some Italy's Auto Grills on the freeways. Better and more reasonable than a trip to Europe/
Good product and quick delivery although the shipping charges are almost as expensive as the product.
very useful, just what i need it for my needs. I recommend it if you don't want ti break your walls.
Works great! Only change would be that the water reservoir attach and seal for better portability. But that's minor.

I've been drinking chocolate instant breakfast since high school. That was lot of years ago and I still love it. Since I drink a glass of this every morning. I recently moved and the local grocer doesn't carry it.  The town is small, so I shop on the Internet a lot. I buy a lot at Amazon too. However, two different price checks sent me to Amazon for this item. Both were advertised as the lowest but they were not. One of Amazon's listings was almost twice the price of a walmart store. Even Walgreen on line lists it for 4.99 per box of 10 packages. I would give this a five star if not for the price. Amazon's price is not always better.

Tacky plastic material. 99 cent store garbage. Don't waste your money Moms! I am extremely disapointed with my purchase of this diaper bag. I wish I had gotten my money back. I know everyone says be careful with purchases on amazon, I had just never had the experience of something coming that doesn't really look as good as the picture.. in my opinion this is 'mis leading advertising' too bad I was really excited for a new diaper bag too.... but I'm back to the vera bradley one that's falling apart till I can save up for something new :( also never got a *kelly fly magnet or whatever else is in the description.. ?

Although we love Nonni's Biscotti, these full-size biscotti seem to arrive in many pieces.  Almost everyone has broken during transit.  Like the biscotti very much but wish they would arrive intact.  Amazon needs to find a better way to package them for shipping.
This is a very good trail mix.  I am extremely pleased with my purchase. I will purchase this product once again

While once visiting Hawaii I stopped in the Kona area of the Big Island and sampled some of the coffee that they sell.  The coffee is grown from the volcanic rocky soil that covers the island, and I thought it had a unique taste.  When I sampled this coffee it reminded me of standing on the porch overlooking that Hawaiian landscape.  I find this simple blend to my taste and perhaps you will too.
Super walker that entertains for hours. Lots of fun activities and easy to clean up with a top tray popping out. Good investment for the money.
this absorbs really quickly on my skin and does not leave me feeling greasy.  Also have used on my face and hair.

I just finished putting this stroller together and it was pretty easy I must say. The directions did seem a little \\"overworded\\" though. I took my 36 month old down the driveway and back for a test \\"drive\\" and it was SO smooth! And we live on gravel/sand roads. My only problem is my son is over 39\\" tall and his feet dangle a little on the sides. Great buy though.
Great product - no mess and your kids can play the foam pieces in or out of the tub. I wish more toys were this versatile.
I love the Stacy's Multigrain Pita Chips. They go great with sandwiches and dips. Sometimes I just crave them all by themselves. It is so easy to order them through Amazon and at a great price too.

This is my first ever food review on Amazon, but I had to, you know, like communicate about this wonderful soup. My first carton arrived today and I'm not even finished with the first bowl. (Hint: don't spill any into your keyboard like I just did.) Anyway, look, this stuff is freaking GREAT! A little sweet and nicely spicy (spicier than I would have guessed, given the gustatory leanings of Whitebread America -- good thing I'm not running for President, huh?). So it's not vegetarian, so what? Get over it. Move on. Be in the Now with this delicious soup. (This review endorsed by the law firm of Oprah, Chopra & Tolle)

I bought these Gum because they are simply the best. The flavor lasts for a long time. My girlfriend loves to chew them, she even cuts them in half so they could last longer LOL. Next time I would try the Peppermint flavor.
well constructed, easy to install, user friendly and looks nice.  my 4 year old quickly was able to determine the difference between "his" seat from his younger sister's seat.
I ordered this valence for my bathroom window (not a baby room).  It serves it's purpose of providing privacy and is a very modern print, which helped to update my bathroom.  Good quality!
I love deep dark taste of coffee this has it. Like a bit more then the Colombian but both are very good. Like dark and rich..this is for you!
This is a great product. I really enjoyed the great true taste of Licorice.I would recommend this product to anyone.

This is something my mother was looking for at all the stores for my new little baby. We finally found it, perfect, exactly what she wanted. Baby loves the lights around the sun. It has a great song/sound to it, plays for a good duration. Easy to pull! LOVE HIGHLY RECOMMEND GETTING!

[[ASIN:B000K8V1PA Stacy's Pita Chips, Cinnamon Sugar, 6-Ounce Bag (Pack of 12)] I go out of my way to find this product! I adore it. Love to eat these with a cup of ice cream on the side! Or all by themselves! Yummmmy!

I have had sticky toffee puddings in both Britain and the United States. This particular brand makes without a doubt the WORST I have ever had. In fact, it's not sticky toffee pudding. It's some kind of chemical mixture which is shaped into a food-like product. WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT BUY IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

While I loved how thick and cushioned this product was, the double backing tape was not strong enough to adhere to my brick fireplace and stand up to my daughter pulling on it.  I ended up using another product that uses double backing velcro which she thus far has not been able to remove.
Can't go wrong with a pacifier w/ a cap. My daughter doesn't like pacifiers all that much but u can get her to take this one longer than most.
I love everything pumpkin and this coffee was delicious.  I have a friend that raved about it so I bought some.  It pleased my palette and I love Green Mountain Coffee.

This seasoning makes a very passable chili.  I made mine in the crock pot, and it was super easy, great for a weeknight dinner during the winter.  It's very easy, all in the packet, plus some ground beef, beans, diced tomatoes, and onions.  The result was not the most flavorful chili I've ever eaten, but it was decent.  I've no doubt that if I spent time blending my own herbs and spices I could make something more flavorful, but I'm way too lazy.  This seasoning is touted as gluten free.  I have no idea if that's the norm for chili seasoning or not, so I can't comment on how it compares to others.  Overall, cheap, cheerful, easy dinner solution.

Our little guy scoots around a ton and didn't particularily like running into the bed gate we had on his new twin bed, so I was really glad when I found these, because I was tired of him waking up!  They were super easy to put on (we put them all around his bed because he ends up all over) and while they make the bed look kinda funny, they totally work!  I also think it gave him a better sense of security going from his crib to a big bed... kinda makes him feel blocked in.  At any rate, they totally worked for us!  Sometimes we even go in and he's awake, leaning with his back against one of them reading to himself!  Double bonus!

The texture of these baked fries resembled really crisp potato snacks, similar to a Calbee Potato Stick or a Snapea Crisp. If you haven't had them, it is very crunchy and you can feel the popped nature within it.

The cheese flavor was strong, leaving me dry and needing water only after eating a few. My bag also came with a lot of the cheddar coating, more than needed in the bag - so much that left several clumps everywhere. After eating for a bit, my fingers would be severely coated with excess clumps that was very offputting.

It may have just been my bag and an isolated case but either way, the flavor was a bit too strong for my tastes. The best thing about these fries was the texture.

This product is everything it claims!....Keeps my Baby happy and \\"busy\\".            Would recommend this for new parents that need a little break now and then and they will know their baby     is safe and secure using this.  Lots of room and well built. easy to set up and take back down.   carrying bag could be a little better...but all in all a great item!

Background: I'm obsessed with peanut butter! Kinda get my diet into the woods w overindulgence. I always eat the plain ground peanuts, nothing added...so I'm already pretty accustom to a plain taste. I can put fats other places in my diet, with items I'm not likely to take scoop after scoop...after scoop of.

Looked into this as a nice alternative to my high calorie snack. I really like it!!! Yes, it's a consistency different than true peanut butter. More of a mousse-gelatin type consistency. The taste is NOT bad, I eat little teaspoons here and there, just to get a taste. I like the dried raisins in there.

I'm really not a picky eater, but I also don't just eat something to eat it.

It's a product that acts as a nice substitute for those who are trying to avoid the added calories of peanut butter, but still like that little taste of a snack here and there. I haven't tried it in large scoops or on anything. Just little tasty teaspoons :)

I'll buy it again.

My oldest son (who weighs 55 lbs) is also able to sit comfortably in it; and pushing him is a breeze! Oatmeal is yummy for breakfast.

When we got our box of oatmeal in the mail, though, my husband became quite upset because of reports in the spring of 2012 about mercury in oatmeal. After doing a little more research, I found out that the mercury wasn't in the oatmeal, per se, but rather in the high fructose corn syrup that is in many instant oatmeals. Happily, Quaker instant oatmeal doesn't contain high fructose corn syrup. Though probably not as healthy as buying your own plain oats and flavoring it yourself, this breakfast shouldn't cause undo alarm.

Here's the ingredient list:

Whole grain rolled oats, sugar, natural and artifical flavor, salt, calcium carbonate, guar gum, caramel color, niacinamide (B vitamin), reduced iron, vitamin A palmitate, pyrixodine, hydrochloride (B vitamin), riboflavin (B vitamin), thiamin, mononitrate (B vitamin), and folic acid (B vitamin).

When I buy products I'm not personally familiar with, I read the reviews...which is one reason why I buy a LOT on Amazon...the reviews and ease of comparison with other similar products. I read all the reviews on this product and was a bit concerned I might not like it, but decided to try it anyway. I need to lose weight and have painful arthritis in one hip. I'm trying to cut down on foods that cause inflammation to lessen the pain levels. I've been on almost every diet there is and have found it difficult to give up so much of the food I love. So, when I read about Miracle Noodles I was a bit skeptical...0 calories??? 0 carbs??? Gluten free??? How could that be???

Well..I was very pleased with my first attempt at cooking with these. First of all...when I opened the package, expecting a dreadful odor (per other reviewers), I was quite pleasantly surprised that I couldn't detect any odor at all...perhaps that was an anomaly, but there it is!!! (BTW...I have a pretty good sense of smell, so that wasn't the reason I wasn't smelling the \\"fishy\\" odor other reviewers stressed.) I prepared the fettuccini noodles, as instructed, and tasted one. Truly, they have no taste by themselves. The texture is a bit like a soft gummy...I certainly wouldn't call them \\"slimy.\\" I cut up a chicken breast and some onions and garlic and sauteed them in some extra-virgin olive oil, seasoning with salt, pepper and Bragg's Liquid Amino (which tastes like a very mild, far less salty, soy sauce or tamari, for those not acquainted with it), and stirred in the noodles after they had been drained and placed on paper towels (there was no sticking to the pan I \\"cooked\\" them in or to the paper towels...nice!!!) I REALLY enjoyed the meal...it was satisfying, and I felt \\"comfortably full\\". The noodles took on the flavors of the rest of the mixture. I ate them for breakfast (strange breakfast...I know... :) ) and wasn't hungry for the rest of the day, but ate a late supper when my husband arrived home after a meeting (after 9 pm).

I am looking forward to trying the rice and angel hair. I'm sure that Miracle Noodles will become part of my diet...water soluble fiber and no calories??? Rock ON!!!! I'll be looking at the other product this company offers!!!

Ok, so I bought these to brew my own coffee on the Keurig B40 in December 2013. I'm not a coffee snob, but I would like to get a good cup of coffee without having to pay more than $0.50/K-cup. When I first bought these, I had some problems getting a strong brew and at times I would go back to the K-cups. I didn't have my own grinder at the time so I would grind the beans at the store-provided commercial blade grinder. I tried everything from coarse auto-drip to almost super-fine espresso but it seemed that nothing would give me a strong brew (even tried brewing at the smallest cup setting). The coarser grinds tended to be a little better but it was still really weak compared to a K-cup brew.

After getting the same results with the Brewooze refillable cups, I got a manually-operated Hario slim burr grinder a few weeks ago. That was a game-changer. On its default factory setting, I got excellent, very strong coffee both at the 8 and 10 oz cup settings! The folks that say that "It's all in the grind" are right. Switching to a burr grinder has made all the difference. It's made a convert out of me. Burr grinders seem to extract the flavor better and its definitely noticeable for me. I estimate that the setting is to a medium to medium fine ground and it works. I'm writing this review in August 2015 and I think Brew & Save has another offering that has more refillable cups than this listing. I wouldn't mind buying this again, but I'd go with another refillable cup if it has cheaper and had similar or better ratings since, again, it's more about getting a good grind than the refillable itself. Well that's at least my humble opinion.

It also says something about "new improved texture". I definitely recommend using a blender, almond milk/milk, coffee or something with some other flavor besides water to mask the actual taste of what you will be drinking. Maybe a banana? get to that below.

For myself I currently use almond milk mixed with a teaspoon of another vegetarian protein powder and this makes it palatable. I also take half the recommended dose otherwise for the first little bit you might find yourself a tad bloated due to all healthiness loaded into this little canister. I am a petite sized woman so I find a teaspoon plus a teaspoon of my other veg. protein powder works for me.

I have been taking this for a couple weeks and really notice a difference in how I feel, my energy level has increased, and cravings have decreased A LOT! I work out everyday, eat very healthy but even individuals such as myself are prone to those "I only had couple cookies" when it may have actually more than a "couple"...then leads to the dreaded extra long workout.

I have found with traditional protein powders in the past something lacking, and usually hungry after an hour. I find it tedious to add fruits to make a smoothie when this is already loaded with everything you could imagine. I can see adding half a banana?? to mask. Ohh and this will be green.

Taste, texture aside great product. Stick with it you will notice a difference. Something to remember, the stuff that is the healthiest for us sometimes doesn't taste the best.

ther are great, a little small maybe, but safe and fun to use. The only downside are the round lids, they are too flimsy. The vento box is great, is the piece I like the most. And my son loves the cup

Unfortunately I bought two and the first broke before a month and the second was stuck on the automatic voice setting to there was no way to turn it off.
