Perfect for my toddler niece who loves Dora, and is one rough little tomboy. Fast delivery, too!!
Velcro does not stay. Had to go buy S hooks to get it to attach to our pack and play.

We have a Honda Odyssey.  We have baby #5 on the way in a few weeks.  All of our kids are still in car seats.  The only empty spot was on the back row, between two Britax car seats.  We tried putting the 5th car seat there, but there wasn't room.      We really didn't want to buy a new vehicle when there ARE five spots in the back for our five kids.  Someone mentioned these car seats, so we decided to give them a try.      We were a little bit worried from other reviews that they wouldn't fit securely in our van.  We are very picky about our car seats not budging!  So, we decided to give them a try.    We bought three of these car seats to fit in the back row - for our three oldest kids.  My husband is the one who installed them.  He said it was very quick and easy, BUT the top part was pretty wiggly.  He's fairly experienced in putting car seats in and tried many things to get them in tightly.  It wasn't secure enough.  We don't have the LATCH system on the back row, nor do we have tethers.  So, we couldn't use either of those to secure it in.  We use the locking clip \\"Mighty Tite\\" to secure them in tightly and it works well.  You can probably use any type of locking clip to secure them in if you have a car seat that you can't get in tight enough.

I probably should have heeded the reviews, but I was hopeful that this bright, sunny musical diversion would provide entertainment for my granddaughter on the changing table.  When it first arrived, the lights flashed as the song played--all was well and she loved it, especially the lights.  Gradually, however, one after another of the lights failed over 2-4 months. The music is still lilting and lovely, the bee on the pull string very cute, but the lights are gone and along with it the enchantment.  I consider this a \\"failed\\" product, but then, my fault for not believing the reviews and taking a risk.
Love love it... First and best product I have ordered for my nephew. My niece was happy to receive this as a gift

This clip is wonderful and a must have for new moms.  It is especially great if you're purse or diaper bag's straps are too short to drape over the handlebar of your stroller.  Plus, it has tons of extra uses, even after your kids have outgrown strollers!  An all around great product at a great price!

Came in a single large bag contained in a cardboard box. Clean, no unwanted objects or organisms. Got here sooner than expected. Tastes great after toasting for a few minutes and cooking as I would any other cereal. Tastes even better after soaking for a day in yogurt and blending for use as pancake batter. The kids love the taste and we could probably write a cookbook based on all the recipes we've come up with. If there are any cons, I'd have preferred a better bag. We're lucky the bag held up as well as it did but it looked as though it was on the verge of breaking. We had to bag the groats up into seperate resealable bags right away.

These are quite good and my fiance loves them.  Unfortunately for me, the chocolate is very dark, so I can't eat them (migraine trigger).  Can't hold that against the brownies though!  I will say that the ones I got do not have chocolate frosting on the top, they have powdered sugar on top.

We've had this for a few months now and our 10 1/2 month old daughter has always been on the petite side, which is good, because I don't think a larger baby would fit in this.  The toys are somewhat flimsy and uninteresting; I've always had to put extra toys on the try to keep her occupied while I get her food ready.  I have used this in place of a high chair at times and it's worked great for that.  I just sit on the floor and feed her.  Of course cleaning it up is a pain, but it's not intended for use as a high chair so I have to accept that.  As far as rolling/using it as a walker, it's kind of difficult to maneuver and get it to roll, even on hardwood floors.  She has figured out how to go backward as is common in most babies.  Overall I would rate this product as \\"OK\\".  I am unsure if I would buy it again.

Very good lemonade mix.  Close to fresh in taste.  Love that it has stevia.  I like it so much more than crystal light or any of the other mixes with artificial sweeteners.  I can take it anywhere, mix it in bottled water, and have a refreshing, healthy, safe, cool drink.
great product,tasty in soups, difficult to find in stores. I make a lot of soup great to have a case on hand.

I use the Natural Brown, 2 cup Melitta filter paper and a Melitta cone to make the best coffee this side of anywhere. Of course, it is necessary to use the best coffee, and that can only be found at Peet's. The coffee must be ground very fine, and since I like strong coffee, I use two scoops to make one cup.
OK, here's the rest of the drill: First insert the filter paper in the cone, position it over the cup and fill with hot water. The hot water rinses the filter and preheats the cup. Next, add two scoops (or one and a half if you like your coffee weaker)and lightly tamp it down to pack it but do not tear the filter. Pour the hot water out of the cup. Replace the filter and coffee over the cup and add a small amount of hot water, wetting the grounds. DO NOT USE BOILING HOT WATER! Boiling hot water dissolves acids and makes the coffee bitter. The water temperature should be about 180 to 190 Fahrenheidt. After the first bit of water had drained into the cup, add more water.
Even if you have been used to adding sugar to your coffee, please try it without. There will be no bitterness and in fact, you can make the coffee stronger than you ever imagined and there'll be no bitterness.
You are welcome!
Very good flavor and energy boost.  I'd love to see this in pouches but I just make my own with a tea bag.

I confess that I didn't use the recipe on the box, I threw it into a crockpot with some chicken and other stuff. Turned out great though--not too spicy, not a thick, starch-like consistency, and it stuck to the food instead of draining off of it, into a pool on the plate.
These work the best for my babies. I breastfed and thus brand was the only ones they would take. They didn't experience nipple confusion either.

Love this product!! I originally bought this to monitor the water temperature for myself while pregnant but I will most definitely continue to use it once baby is here. It activates immediately when put in water and turns off as soon as you take it out. I love that not only does it tell you the digital temperature, but it lights up (pretty brightly) blue for cold, green for warm, and red for hot. Exactly what I was looking for.

I do feel difference in using the tea in my body, muscles are more relaxed, I use the tea bags on my face when I am done feels nice rubbing a warm tea bag on your face! This works better than the oil in my opinion. Tea has a mellow taste not strong like black tea and not as sharp tasting as green tea.

These chipotle bbq chips are really, really good. Crispy, not heavy, spicy, but not too hot.  No weird after taste. Filling.  Amazon's price is a little high, I bought mine from a coop and paid $10 less than here.  I just received my first case and have already placed an order for another.    I just recently heard about the blood type diet; for my blood type, I am supposed to stay away from corn products and potato products--try that in the United States when you really want something salty and crunchy without making it yourself--you just want a snack that makes you feel like you just ruined your diet.  This product does just that--very good chips.

Best jumper! Easy set up. Can be stored flat with minimal effort. My baby loves it! I liked this one way better than the other jumpers. It has different stations that he loves! Has a great jumping motion(not too much, not too little). And the music that they use is all classical and has a great variety. It doesn't drive us crazy like some baby stuff can. Highly recommend!
I love this tea!  It's my new favorite.  I wish they carried it all year.

Just suck it up and pay for a more sturdy glider;  the price was very attractive and so is the chair but it squeaked within days and broke within weeks when we needed it most.  Yes, I am a 210lb male with a 20lb child and may have rocked somewhat more rigorously than the average person but I have never broken a chair before.

I received this product to review from summer infant. My daughter is 16 months old. it worked very well for us. The material was super soft. She even loved running around in the house with it on. It was difficult at first to figure out how to get her in the seat with the poncho but after a few days we got it down easier. -hspencer

I love Campbell's Tomato Soup. When I found that even Walmart was selling it for $1.50 a can (it doesn't seem that long ago that it could be found for .25 - .50 cents per can!!) I decided it was time to buy in bulk. The [[ASIN:B005VBD4BA Campbell's Red & White Tomato Soup, 15.2-Ounce Cans (Pack of 12)]] came out to $1.295 a can (free Prime shipping) AND it's got more in the can. I use the [[ASIN:B0038QL890 Cool Touch Microwave Bowl]]. A regular can of soup fits quite leaving plenty of room at the top. These 15.2 ounce cans fill the bowl, with just a little left at the top.

BUT ... keep in mind that it's not necessarily the healthiest food. Not only does it have a lot of sodium (which pretty much all processed foods do, unfortunately), but it's got a LOT more carbs than I could have imagined: 20g, 12g of that is sugar. Yikes! Well, I still love it, but it certainly gives me something to think about! Now, where did I put the crackers ....
We've used this formula since the first month to supplement nursing, and we've been very happy, no issues at all.
don't know what to say after tasting.. like other reviews with "one" star, it's tooooooooooo factory-taste.... I just threw them all
Not as peachy as I would have liked, but it was fairly good.  I didn't realize at the time it was green tea, that may be the difference as well!
The men in our family look forward to receiving these sausages every year and has become a traditional gift that they enjoy especially with the numerous footbal games in the near future!

Bought for my daughters 7th birthday. Came well packaged with a nice Thank You picture and business card! She LOVED her gift and I loved the price, quality and speed in which I received my order! Will be purchasing again Please make more Popin Cookin bundles with different candy kits.

I just got my Zooper Waltz and think it is a very cool stroller!  It took me all of 2 minutes to put it together and figure everything out.  The Waltz is very lightweight compared to many other chunky travel systems.  I read somewhere that the Waltz didn't fit well with the Britax Companion carseat, but ours fit beautifully and doesn't wobble a bit when securely fastened to the stroller.  Some things about the Waltz that won us over are:  You can access the basket even when the seat is fully reclined (unlike the Maclaren Techno we almost bought).  The wheels are bigger than most other strollers in its class.  The seat fully reclines for a sleeping baby  It came with a cup holder, foot muff, and a rain cover.  The fabric is removable and washable    All in all we are very pleased!

Wow, definitely delish! It is very handy, but that doesn't take away from the overall flavor and seasonings at all. Very lightly seasoned, you really taste the flavor of the meat. I will recommend and order again.
Love my Bistro Medley Merlot olives from Mezzetta!  Our local supermarket stopped carrying them for some reason, but I'm so glad I was able to order them through Amazon.  Thank you so much!

It is nice to just hear some soft music that baby likes, and I believe it is good for their little brains.

This is great! Ordered it to separate one side of the yard from the other side and this fit perfectly between our house and garage. Can I just say that I was a bit skeptical that this would work. I saw some reviews from people who said it didn't come up but I decided to risk it. I needed a couple of coworker gifts for people who brag that there is no such a thing as too hot of a salsa. I thought it would be a funny gift and a cute little package. I got one for myself because I thought it was cool and pretended it was a gift from the dog.

So I started it Christmas day. It was very simple. For a long time nothing came up. I looked it up and saw that it needs to be kept warm, and it does mean WARM. The house is around 65 at night so clearly that's too cold for it. I put it under a plant lamp and two days later I had seedlings.

The only problem is that I sort of stirred the dirt around with my finger looking for signs of life. Thanks to that the plants are all coming up around the edges and they're so small I'm afraid to do anything about it right now.

ps. I am SO not eating these if I actually get peppers.
This is my favorite seasoning. I move from LA to WI years ago and Gould not get this on store shelves. Amazon beats the Tony Chachere's site by far!

These taste great. If you haven't tried any other brand try this one. I found it to be just as good as the rest.

I add coconut oil to my coffee and I also do a bit of cooking with it, so my usage isn't too heavy so for me a 54oz container lasts ages. Excellent value product.

I love love this diaper pail.  We had a Diaper Genie with our first child and I hated paying for all the refils.  I also found that it never really contained the smell.  With this one we use regular kitchen garbage bags (actually, the scented ones)and use the Arm & Hammer Nursery Air Fresheners in the air freshener spot inside the lid. We're huge fans of these tumblers.  My girl is three and she still uses them at night when she brings water to bed.  I'll admit the older ones do leak just a bit when held at a certain angle, but a few drops of water aren't bothering us.  We've been really happy with these.

They inserts document out in the wash but I always rinse mine before so it isn't a big deal.  The color snaps make it dad friendly or sleep deprived mom friendly.  Overall I love these dipes and they make up the majority of my stash.  The new improvements made with the g3.0 were amazing and now I am selling my 2.0s for the newer version.

I was very please to have been introduced and found this wonderful, refreshing healthy drink.  One of my ongoing problems right now is trying to get my 93 year old mother to consume more  fluids, as she has taken a dislike to water.  Well Zola......thank you, thank you, thank you!  She absolutely loved it, as did I and I do not think i will have a problem anymore with her fluid intake.  She can drink to her hearts content with my having the comfort of knowing she is putting a high quality, delicious product in her system.

We are no strangers to walk through gates. We have used different types over the years. We bought this one because we found it for a good price, it doesn't have the bar across the bottom and we liked the slim design.

Upon installation, however we discovered the screws are worthless. The first one we tried to use broke. That did not surprise us because we had read the reviews. We wanted to see for ourselves and sure enough... those screws are worthless. My husband is a Carpenter by trade so he just went into the garage and got longer and stronger screws.

We've had this gate installed for 3 months now and we still love it. I would say our gate is in a high traffic area. With 7 children in the house I would say we open and close this gate at least 30+ times a day. It's still in perfect working condition.

I was so satisfied with my earlier purchase of Haci Bekir Rose Flavored Turkish Delight candy that I ordered Hazer Baba Pistachio Turkish Delight. Unfortunately, this follow-up purchase was not as satisfying: A) my request for two day delivery amounted to eight days,
B) the packages were very small when compared to my earlier purchase and C) the cost was much too high when considering the enclosed amount.

I was a big fan of Turkish Delight since I first discovered this candy during a visit to Turkey two years ago and , I might add, my initial purchase of Haci Bekir supported my taste for this candy. However, the fact that my request for two day delivery wasn't met and the tiny amount of packaged HazerBaba candy has dampened my interest in a future order.

My favorite gift to give at any baby shower.  Something no one else thinks of and something the parents can use over and over again and feel good about placing their child into a shopping cart or high chair/booster.  It's a winner every time!

As with any new mom, I did a lot of research on everything I purchased - EVERYTHING! I decided to go with Born Free glass bottles. I am so glad I did. I have been using these bottles for 6 weeks now. My husband noticed that inside the glass ring is plastic. We realized the plastic valve was breaking and adhering to the inside the of the glass bottle.

These bottles and sheets saved me lots if time in my last trip to Thailand . Boo leaking , great size and works perfect! I had the avent one and I hated them first for the price and second because the milk touch the lid witch had no use for me since you have to wash the bottle every time you use it.  Go for these, great value and great product!

These cups are terrible.  I got them when the Take n Toss weren't available and I am very disappointed.  No matter how I put the lid on, they leak out of the side of the lid.  If you just twist it on, it practically pours out, but if you snap it on and then twist you only get a steady drip. As if that is so much better.      I would never buy these again.  I'm not sure how they ever ended up on store shelves to begin with.  Don't they test these things???

We have so many teething rings, but this is by far my daughters favorite!!! she started teething early at 3m and couldn't really hold onto any other teething items....at 8m it is still one of her favorites!!!

Our original got damaged by grandparent's dog.  Very happy to see the replacement easily available.  My almost 2 yr old loves this thing.  Might need to get a second one to rotate one through the wash.

Best teethers ever. They are small in size and thin (not filled with water) but my son loves them. They have little holes that fit his tiny fingers perfectly so he can grasp them and keep them without dropping a thousand times. The little bumps and silicon feels good, in fact it looks like something that is a good texture to chew on!  FABULOUS baby shower gift! I'm buying several just to have on hand for last minute gifts.

First off, the crackers tasted weird. I think it was the chili powder, but I can't be sure.

Secondly, they are quite small and would be difficult to really \\"scoop\\" any sort of dip with them.

Thirdly, they are not all the same size. Some of the crackers were 1 inch long, which is really small for a cracker.

Fourthly they really smell like doggie biscuits.

Like there is an uncanny resemblance in the smell to doggie biscuits!

Fifth and the most serious of the issues, is the fact that 70-80% of the crackers came all crumbed in the box.

I literally had to sift through the rubble to find a few whole crackers to eat. The rest is good for nothing more than throwing on top of a soup or stew.

If only 10-20% were crumbed it wouldn't be so bad, but the majority of them were crumbed up.

Not cool.

And on top of it, I bought two boxes and they BOTH were crumbled up.

Perhaps it happened during shipment, who knows. I doubt it as they were well protected in the box, surrounded by other items.

Perhaps if and when Whole Foods gets them in stock I'll buy them there. At least I can open them up and see if they're all broken or not.

Let me start of by saying, wow... what a wonderful idea for a product! It's an absolute shame that it has a few minor flaws that kind of ruin it.

Initial setup and cleaning the machine was fairly easy, but it's very important that you adhere closely to the instructions. There is a wheel inside that "scoops" formula to be mixed to the proper consistency, and if you do not set it properly your baby's bottles will not come out with the proper ratio of dry formula to water. If you take the time to acknowledge this, everything SHOULD work perfectly.

I say should for a reason. Despite closely following the instruction manual, setting everything to specifications for our babies' formula, and maintaining the machine daily as suggested, there were concerns after the first couple of days about the formula not being mixed properly. Our concerns were quickly validated after about a week when the formula had gone from milky white to looking like cloudy water. After dismantling the machine for a full cleaning, it became very clear what the problem was. The "chute" that combines the formula and water either splashes up or somehow otherwise allows moisture to enter the compartment that the dry formula is stored in.

Baby formula is highly sensitive to moisture, so that little bit of water or steam caused the powder to solidify like dried paste to the bottom of the container. Even though we cleaned the part that dispenses the mixed formula on a daily basis, this significantly constricted the amount of powder that dropped down to be mixed in the first place. In hindsight, I'm sure this could have been cleaned out daily as well... but you probably would have had to stick a butter knife or something similar up into there. Even then there is the risk of pushing old, crusty formula back into the food that your baby is eventually going to end up consuming.

After thorough cleaning of the entire machine, I ensured that there was no moisture whatsoever on or in any of the parts. It was re-assembled and used for no more than 2 days before the same problem began to occur. We brought the product back to the store it was purchased at without hesitation and have happily prepared our babies' bottles by hand ever since. At least now we know they are getting the proper nutrition that they need.

It's also notable that during the time we used this machine, our power bill increased significantly.

If it weren't for the moisture problem and the power usage, this baby food maker could have been a 5-star product all day long. The convenience factor alone is worth it's weight in gold.moisture whatsoever on or in any of the parts. It was re-assembled and used for no more than 2 days before the same problem began to occur. I have had this for a month now and we use it nightly. Overall this is a great product for the money.

Pros:
Video camera is clear even at night and has a zoom feature, so you can zoom in on your little one;
Night light (though isn't that bright, and if you have it away from the changing area, there it really only helps you see your little one for night time feeding;
lullabies, my little one loves to hear the music!
Temp - love that you can set temp guides and an alarm goes off if it gets too hot or too cold (based on what you input)
adjust screen brightness
Two way talk - though I do not use this as mine is only 3 months old, this will be useful in the future when he gets older, now my husband just likes to mess with me;
ability to add more cameras (up to 3 more), this was huge for me as we are planning on having more children

Cons:
no panoramic ability, so the view you have on the screen is your view unless you zoom and my little one moves all around the crib, so I have had to adjust the camera several times to make sure I can see him;
LOUD beep when parents unit comes on sometimes (randomly) or when it reconnects to the camera. (not sure if it is loud on the childs unit, I don't think it is, if it is it hasn't bothered my little one) but it is definitely loud on the parents unit.
If you use the batteries on the childs unit (I do not recommend) the childrens and parents unit lose connection A LOT, I just tried this for the first time and it has lost connection so far at least 10 times in 20 mins. so I would keep it plugged in if possible
no ability to connect to iPhone, ipdad etc.

Overall this is a great product for the money. Would I like a bigger screen on the parents unit, sure, would I love to move the childs camera via the parents unit, sure, would I like to connect to my iPhone, sure but for the price, it works well and I am happy with it.

I thought this one seemed like a great idea - it's tall, self-closing, not plastic.  But the self-closing thing, as it turns out, is more trouble than it's worth.  Annoying: In the morning, for example, when I'm running upstairs a thousand times to get 'one last thing,' and baby is downstairs all morning, I don't want to deal with the gate clanging shut behind me or opening it up when I have arms full of stuff.  Noisy: The gate's hinge is loud - I'm sure I would apply some WD40 if I were to keep it, but it's brand new (and we're not keeping it).  Louder still is the sound it makes when I shut the gate.  Even if I'm super careful, there are contact points up top and at the bottom that are metal-on-metal.  If those parts had been plastic or somehow padded, it would be a better model.  Weak: But it still wouldn't fit our hallway.  We decided to block the hallway next to the top of the stairs instead of the exact top of the stairs - works better for full hands to have a nice landing up there.  Although this gate says it can be expanded the full range, the truth is that right in between sizes the gate is either really weak (the little bolts that screw out are wobbly when the gate is pushed on) or if we add the other section, the gate is too big.
Item came on time and in great condition. This Godiva white chocolate is beyond delicious. Thank you.

We bought this at Whole Foods for $10 2 years ago.  We used it for my daughter for months, and now we're using it for my son.  We put the small pieces in the same basket we use for bottles, etc, in the dishwasher, and they always come out fine.    I agree the food is not smooth, but this is essentially a \\"ricer\\", not a food processor.  We've made all kinds of stuff in here, and use it every day.  Prunes especially come out with a texture the babies like, but we've done peaches, apples, pears, carrots, sweet potato, green beans, peas, you name it for first foods.      I've never had anything leak through the bottom.    I would buy this again.  I am not sure how, if at all, this is any different than the kidco one.
These are super great. Good quality, easy to clean. Best mats I have found. Lovely prints to choose from as well
It was a little strange at first (everyone should guess that with jalapeÃ±os in a food that is typically sweet). The taste really grew in me, it's now one of my favorites.

Packaged well! Shipped great! Perfect for my pillows that I made. I got organic cotton zipper cases and stuffed it with these buckwheat hulls. They are very clean and do not have an odor. I like that they are locally grown. 10 pounds is enough for 1 and 1/2 standard pillows...if you like them very fluffy, then it's only enough for one. I also would like to mention that the price for these buckwheat hulls is phenomenal! Thank you LA Linen! :)
Ketchup, salt and vinegar chips, and muss-melon are the best tasting foods with the mberry. Completely change the flavor into something much sweeter and better tasting. Definitely worth a try.
Best peanut butter around.  I love the crunchy style.  There is no oil floating at the top that has to be mixed in with the actual butter.

Delicious, and tastes very similar to the Butterbeer provided in Florida. I have been trying unsuccessfully to create my own recipe but Flying Cauldron has figured out the right blend of ingredients! Kudos!
However, I purchased three and only two would work. I do plan to exchange when I can. The grandson's loved it!
I grew up eating these as a child!  It is wonderful to be able to get these through Amazon ! They are light and delicious!

This thing is really cool.  It rocks your baby, either side to side or front to back.  It plays 16 different tunes for baby.  It has a light show that projects various moving shapes that is mesmerizing for baby.  It has a mobile, a veil, a comfy seat that can be reclined to horizontal (with a 3 point harness).  You could basically use it as a bassinet in a pinch.  And it has an attachable tray.  I looked at all of 'em on Amazon, and in my opinion this is by far the best value if you can get it on sale.
I do not care for minty gum. This gum has a minty quality to it that I don't care for.

I've read about the benefits of green tea for years, but was hesitant to try it. I have drank tea - black tea - for many, many years. I recently read how green tea helps increase metabolism and thought I'd give it a go.

Well, I'm pleasantly surprised! A couple things. First off, the tea, when brewed, is actually green. A greenish-brown, to be exact. Second, I was anticipating that it would be an acquired taste, but I loved it immediately! Yay! I just googled, \\"How much green tea is too much\\", haha! I found a recommendation that 4-6 cups is a good amount, which will mean probably a couple mugs for me. It does have a small amount of caffeine, which I want to limit in my diet.

I definitely recommend!

This stuff is addictive.  Everyone in my family who's tried it loves it, especially the whole dried fruits and nuts-- it's almost more like trail mix than granola.  Also, the flakes and grain bits taste kind of like Captain Crunch, which I like.    Makes a great add-in for cookies and muffins, too.

We haven't actually used it yet since our grandchild isn't due until the end of December.  I took it out of the box to look at it and I think it will be perfect for when they visit.  It won't take up much room easy to store and will be get to take to with if we go out to eat.

When it came time for my first grandchild's Easter, I knew it was time to continue a valued tradition- Steiff animals. I received my first Steiff in the late 1950's from my father's cousin who was stationed in post-war Berlin. Now, the 3rd generation has her first and we all fell in love with this darling little lamb.

We like the fact that Dr. brown nipples are not that expensive to replace. Also they do not wear out that quickly and retain their soft shape. Our lil guy was on level 1 for the longest time then went through level 2 & 3 fairly quickly then ended up at level 4 by the time he was 15mo. Y cut we bought but hardly used; maybe more useful if you make your baby's bottle thicker with rice cereal or alike.
Love the toy bag! Kids really enjoyed it at bath time and instead of there toys going in the floor after bath they were able to just toss them in the bag so no additional water mess.
I like the smell and taste of the tea. but I don't see much difference in my face. may be it is helping little but I can't see much difference in my face.

I have been gluten free for 10 years and these are some of the first cookies that I have tasted that actually taste like a cookie!  No cardboard taste as some have mentioned.  They are a hard crunchy cookie.  I especially love using them similar to a biscotti - dunking them in coffee.
I bought the decaf variety of flavors and love it!  When we have dinner guests everyone can choose their favorite flavor and won't be awake all night from the caffeine.

Tastes like a rancid dishrag pickled in brine.  No sign of spoilage - just bad tasting.  I bought based on the rave reviews of others here so I thought I'd chime in with my opinion.  I'm comparing this with the Fresh and Easy house brand - scarcely the premium - that costs less and is scrumptious.
We ordered these to give out for Halloween, they were a good price, but be aware that the candies themselves were teeny.

I use this bag all the time. It's got plenty of room and plenty of pockets without being overwhelming and losing too many things. I've only used it for two months, so I haven't experienced any wear and tear yet. I would recommend this bag.

The under parts of the tray and the seat under the cushion are not so easy to clean as we had hoped.  The wheels on the front make no sense either because you cannot move the chair around  without tipping it in an awkward way.

The price is good and I ordered a pack with subscription. When it arrived, I opened one can and made crab meat spaghetti. The taste is disappointing - quite plain and not tasty at all. Have to cancel the subscription.

I purchased these candy canes off season.  Upon arrival, I noticed that they are super small.  I figured they were the average small size.  They are even smaller than I had imagined!  Not to mention the fact that about 3/4 of the box were completely broken... and not in just two pieces.  There is no way this happened during shipping, as everything was packaged securely.  Upon further review, I noticed that this is not the first time these people have gotten complaints for this very same thing.  Shame on me for not noticing and SHAME ON GREENBRIAR FOR CHARGING AN ARM AND A LEG FOR BROKEN CRAP.  When I went to try and get a replacement, not only was replacement NOT an option, but I was expected to mail the darn things back to get a refund!  Not worth the time and money... and I'm completely disgusted.  Hoping to discourage people from buying this rip-off item.

We loved these diapers.  We put the microfiber insert in the pocked and the hemp over the top of the fleece then snapped the two together.  The fleece gave my baby heat rash.  The hemp did not.  They held a lot of pee.  Had a few leeks, but no diaper is perfect.  He grew out of these in the rise before the waist.  I'm thinking he was around 23 inches and 12 pounds.  The size two diapers are a lot bigger.  We had to put them aside for a bit.  At 15 pounds and 26 inches they are starting to fit, but still really wide between the legs.  Go with the snaps over the velcro.  I tossed the velcro diaper as the velcro didn't hold.  He'd role at night, the velcro would come open and open diapers do not hold a thing.

I've had Mighty Leaf tea in a dessert place in Vancouver, BC and thought it tasted so good and decided to look for it in the web.  Glad to find it in Amazon but somehow the tea bags don't taste as good as when I had it the last time.
This product is very well made.  Easy to put together.  Very bright colors for baby to focus on.
I'll sure be ordering this again! They were great! I like my lemon candy tart, but sweet too. These were just the right amount of sweet AND tart! Yum!!

I had bought the Heavenly Babies Burp Cloths at the retail store, and was very pleased with the product. It was soft, form fitting and made with cotton and without any dyes It fit the shoulders well due to the contoured shape. I was so happy to see the product advertised on Amazon, as the store didn't have any more in stock when I went back to buy more.
Unfortunately, when I ordered 2 packages of 2 burp cloths each on line, I didn't realize until I opened up one package that this product was nothing like the original. It was made of a stiff polyester material which I would not even think of placing a baby's face on at all. I am in the process of returning the second package, as I would not use this product.
I gave it one star in case someone might consider using this product only because it is contoured shape and large, but I really would not recommend it and find it disappointing that the original product has been replaced with such a stiff and \\"baby unfriendly\\" product.
I hope that the manufacturer will read this and will consider producing the original product which I would give a 5 star rating to.
Sounded good in the description-a low carb, lower calorie bread.  It baked up fine in my bread machine but tasted terrible.  It was rubbery and tasted like Metamucil.
I have used Dr. Bonner's for many years, and will continue life-long or as long as it is sold.  Great product!

I have never written a review for Amazon but I saw some of the poor reviews on the Diaper Champ and had to add my two cents . . .

When my sister got pregnant she could not decide if she should register for the Diaper Champ or the Diaper Genie. She left it up to me and after reviewing both items I went with the Diaper Champ . . . The idea of having to continually purchase bags for the Diaper Genie seemed like a waste when the Diaper Champ lets you use any type of bag . . . My nephew is now over two years old and while he has begun potty training, my sister still uses the Diaper Champ I gave her . . .

When it came time for me to choose a diaper disposal system, I put the Diaper Champ on my registry. Yes, it can be a bit tricky to open (I found using two hands works best) but then again do I want something that is holding wet and otherwise dirty diapers to open easily? True, the mechanism sometimes won't \\"swing\\" the dirty diaper into the pail but HELLO that is a sign that it is probably time to put in a new bag. Yes, it can eventually start to smell if you don't change it regularly . . . but then again if you used a metal safe lined with carbon to hold your kids diapers eventually baby poop and pee smell would emanate from it if you didn't clean it out regularly . . . Realistically the thing holds dirty stinky diapers and yep it is going to smell when you open it but hey . . . my kids tush smells when I wipe it but I still love him :)

My personal tip . . . if you belong to a wholesale club like BJ's, Costco or Sam's check to see if they have the Glad Kitchen Bags. The BJ's we shop in has a box of 200 for $9.99. As long as you do not attempt to overstuff them (i.e., get lazy and don't change the bag regularly) they work perfectly. I also use them in the small garbage pails in our apartment. I could wait for a sale and use a coupon (the way I shop for most things) but it takes months to go through the box and I like knowing they are always on hand . . . At about $.05 a bag, the super duper box of bags makes my life easy and that as any parent knows is ***PRICELESS***.
I gave the cup as a gift. It is sturdy with a lid and straw. The cup is double lined with water and glitter between the layers. The top fits firmly on the cup. I would purchase this cup again.
She's not due till December, and is already using it for support.  She loves it and the color is great.
It's a pretty set but as others have stated the fabric is very rough.  It's probably the roughest bedding fabric I've ever felt.  I'm returning it.

I don't drink smothies and just mix with water - have tried with many different concentrations and just can not get this down - I even make an 8 oz jug and take it to work and try to just drink it by the end of the day - have given up as I just carry it around - very disappointed

I bought this in a Target store and unfortunately had to return it. The strap would benefit your average 6 foot 4 300 pound woman, but not anyone else. I'm 5 foot 8 inches tall and 155 pounds and it didn't adjust small enough to raise my child to my chest area. I'm sorry but having my baby dangle around my waist in a sling that is more like a closed duffel bag was not right for me or my child. Spend a bit more and get a Nojo sling or better yet, type in &quot;baby sling&quot; on Ebay and get one custom made for around 25 dollars.
This product would be great if it actually worked well.  It comes apart too easy and is not very powerful at all. I do like the lulaby music you can play to distract the child.
I am kind of addicted to lemon, so of course this product satisfied that need.  It doesn't much matter to me, as long as it's lemon, and these tartlets are definitely that.
These are soft and durable. I use them on my grandchild, who has some problems and drools a little.They are fabulous!

After spending a large portion of November traveling, we decided we really needed a portable high chair since it was next to impossible to feed our then 7-month-old daughter in a hotel room. I checked out all the different ones available at our local Toys 'R Us, and ended up with this one, since it seemed to be the most compact when folded up. We have only used it once since our purchase, to test it out, but it will definately get a lot of use when we travel in the future or go to a restaurant where there are no high chairs available.
One of the reviewers commented that it was hard to use the dial to retract the straps when it was on a chair...that's because you aren't supposed to retract the straps to tighten it...that's what the adjustable buckles are for. The dial is only for use when putting the chair away, to keep the straps from being an annoying nuisance.

Why does tuscan whole milk have to be whole? Why can't it be half
Or a quarter or an eighth or a one hundredth!

These are delicious. They are only about 150 calories with Lots of Fibre which is healthy. Delicious and Fibre - Terrific Combination.
Only negative and it is a big one for me is the price. Almost 3 dollars a bar . If the price comes down I would be a regular buyer.
I don't like getting round black floaties floating to the surface in my morning oatmeal.  Organic matter or not, that is not part of a complete breakfast.  Going back to store bought oats.
This dip has great flavor and gets better each day-a good snap and dash of heat. Unfortunately they have discontinued this flavor-wish they would bring it back.
This is my favorite of all the flavors, but I'm not a fan of raspberry anyway.  The orange is also very good.

I was told it was very easy to assemble. My husband's daughter is expecting her 1st child and she likes it very much. She piked it out at target's and had it in her baby regisiter, however I was able to obtain on Amazon for a much lesser price, saved on shipping which was a plus, and had it delievered to her home. Satisfied customer, would recommend according to her & her significant other.
I love this coffee.  Timothy's is a good all-around coffee if you're not sure what to order.  It isn't too strong and the variety pack let me try all the different kinds.

I purchased this because I didn't want my carseat to get damaged when it was checked.  Overall, the travel bag worked great. It was a little difficult to roll but there was a lot of space in the bag where you could put other items.  That helped a lot since my other bag was over the weight limit.

I bought this for my boyfriends daughter that comes live with us every other weekend. It works great for her clothes since she only keeps a little bit at our house. She is 8 and size of it is perfect for her size and needs. She can also keep some stuff on top of it.
I like pink and white dots design.
So if you want a little storage this is a way to go.

Definitly the book to buy. It has lots of room inside and lets you put your own personal story in even before baby. This baby book lets you use it for both boys and girls and if you look on the net you can find many more things to go along with this. There are books, toys, figurines and many more.
My favorite tea of all time. Always arrives promptly, well-packaged...and knowing that it is organic makes a good product great.

I usually try to give most products the benefit of the doubt that there's a certain amount of user error that factors into some of the negative online reviews.  But Amazon reviewers got this one spot on. There are far too many grooves and crevices, and, most importantly, the underlying tray (not the one you remove to clean) inevitably gets dirty with every meal and is very difficult to clean.  Because the underlying tray is made up of two separate pieces of plastic that are screwed together, water eventually seeps in and mold begins to develop.  Had to eventually just throw out the chair.  It's a shame, b/c the chair really does look great.
my kid likes to chew on the straw and flattens them often.  disappointed that they don't sell replacement straws separately.  the cups seem durable.
THis is what I was told by the person that used it.  If there is a way to improve it, I would be interested.  I was told that it is "kind of" dry.

Best coffee i had and organic. full body taste. Must buy if you like coffee. my co-worker love this coffee as well.
as well.

Excellent Italian canned tomatoes. I have used 6 of 12 cans already and every can has been perfect. Big tomatoes, peeled very well. The liquid is a thick sauce, not a watery juice. Excellent for marinara. You can't go wrong. Plus save all the hauling cans from the store. I am very satified and will order another box when I use these up...Plus free shipping...how can you go wrong?
Donna Beverin
This non-alcoholic wine was delicious. All of the flavor without the alcohol and definitely not just "grape juice." Prompt delivery and good packaging. Will order again.
I love these, they are a quick lunch with ok taste. I would prefer a bit more sauce but this works as a quick lunch.
Have never more giddy to get a product. We are cooking more than ever. Love the taste

I bought this swing because I was looking for a travel swing to bring places.  Since we already have an expensive swing; I tried to save money and purchse a lesser expensive swing - bad mistake.  This swing took over 2 + hours to put together and was difficult.  The product seems cheap.  My 8 week old child kept sliding down in the swing; although I had strapped him into the harness system (difficult and time consuming as well).  Although my child has good physical development for his age; he kept sliding down.  The swing provided no support at all. Now that I want to return the swing; it is even more challenging to take apart.   Take my advice, don't try to save money on baby equiptment!

Upon reading the one review that said this was not non-GMO, I called Bob's Red Mill to ask. They said that all their products are non-GMO and they only purchase from non-GMO vendors. The reason it isn't advertised on every product is because they can't advertise it until all the testing is completed (and one other reason, which escapes me at the moment).

I have bought walnuts at various places, looking for quality at the best price. This brand is as good as any others I've found. Sam's currently carries them at $14.00 for the 32 ounce bag. That is a dollar less than the bulk price at my nearest organic shop (Truck Patch), and considerably cheaper than I have found in other places. Amazon's price is not horrible if you presume that shipping is included in the price. If you have to pay for shipping, there are better prices -- as mentioned above. (This is no "slam" on Amazon, just facts. I have found Amazon to be extremely helpful and plan to do business with them for the foreseeable future.)

You will run into a bad nut every so often, but this is true in nearly every bag I have found, no matter the brand. Other than that, the flavor of these nuts is better than I have found elsewhere and I will continue to buy this brand until and unless the quality declines. Certainly worth a try in my opinion.

Initial impressions: Opaque white color. Delicate closed-nose smelling faintly of butter. Really opens up after three or four weeks when it  develops a bouquet like a Prussian cavalry stable, though loses its beautiful tearing properties in its curd-like state. Palate of white, steamed rice. Faint after taste of bovine teat. Canonical pairing is packeted biscuits but those keen on adventure will match it with high-acidity lemon or lime squash. Tuscan Whole Milk is very similar in structure and overall body to its mountainous cousin Montepulciano Latte Nobile but lacks the sugar-forward properties of its brother vintage, Tuscan Chocolate.  Overall impressions: a fine example of lactose-forward, mammary-secreted Italian-mammalian fluid. 4 Stars.
if you want strong coffee this is the strongest, darkest, boldest out there.   This is the best one I have tried. Nothing comes close.
I'm a chai lover- and this is one of my favorites. Creamy, delicious, with a little bit of spice. Just mix with water!
Works flawlessly, even with older, squishier bananas. I was quite surprised, exceeded my expectations and I am very happy with my purchase :)
The ornament is adorable, but it IS DATED 2012 on the back of it.  It was not supposed to be dated.

We bought this without inspecting in person - big mistake.  I am shocked at the poor quality of this mattress.  My daughter is only 17 lbs but leaves a visible indentation in the mattress when she sleeps on it.  It's quite soft and doesn't seem like a good quality mattress at all.  Doesn't seem like a \\"Crown Jewel\\" to me.
The range is horrible. They claim 900 ft. It actually has around a 100 ft range. The battery lasts only a couple hours before it turns off.

This project is a good size for my 7 month old she will be able to fit in it for a while. It is sooooo soft and I love how the zipper zips down instead of up, so I don't have to worry about her putting it in her mouth during the night. My baby girl seems to enjoy sleeping in these.
I LOVE these chips ! !  I order them every month now and most of the time have them all eaten before it comes time to get more.
Product was received fresh and meets my needs for a healthy omega 3 supplement to my diet.  Will purchase again.
A great buy for your money.  Flavors are dark chocolate, white chocolate and milk chocolate and each one is very tasty.

Received as a holiday gift, this little jar of joy may be the nicest taste of marmalade in my experience. Sweet and tart in the finest marmy tradition, with a smoky hint of whisky to keep your crumpets interesting.

Recommended for a special treat, but not for everyday use at this price.

Product performs as described.  Provides protection to hard cornered surfaces.  Cuts well and Is probably reusable.  The 2-sided tape that comes with it is junk though so order 2 rolls of 3M double-sided tape to use with it.

I tried this cold medicine on my son when he got a cold from another classmate. I accept the mission from smiley 360 for a sample of the medicine. I did like that it was his favorite flavor and he did not hesistate to try it. I was amazed on how fast it worked and he was back at school two days later. I will be buying more of the Mucinex for my son when needed.
Was a great sample to try.

Maria Arevalo
Not only did they arrive on time but they were perfectly a day away from opening, once they bloomed looked exactly like the photo. They also smelled spectacular.

Lists ingredients as: peaches, pears, pineapples, halved cherries, artificial color red #3, water, and sugar.  I think they should list the water and sugar before the cherries and artificial color, as there is obviously more of these ingredients.  The cherries are very few and far between, but this is not my concern.  It is healthy and non-perishable.      OK, so my only beef is that I ordered these on August 13 2011, and the \\"best used by\\" date is December 23 2011.  This is more of a supplier issue than an issue with Amazon.  Don't kill the messenger.  Also, these cans are a product of China, distributed in Norwalk, California.  So, enjoy your fruit cocktail!

Although I don't regret buying Sophie, she's overpriced and my daughter preferred the other Vulli teethers to Sophie. I think Sophie might be cuter and more acceptable looking, but the other ones are built better than Sophie.
We couldn't possibly be more pleased with the flavor of thus excellent Breakfast Blend coffee!!
My baby loves this thing! She's 7 months and has loved since she was 3 months. Gets her ready for brushing teeth also. Very good quality.

This review is to address the concerns over reviewers encountered, which I did not:

* I did get the correct amount of K-Cups (at the time of writing this review, the description states you'll get 35).
* All 35 K-Cups were unique, as described.
* There was a good variety of teas, coffees, and some interesting ones like apple cider/Kaluha/etc. that made this 35 pack a good purchase.

The 35 K-Cups were packed in a brown paper Duro bag , exactly like I get from the Italian sandwich shop down the road when I pick up an order. This makes this item an ugly gift for someone unless you were expecting to repack the K-Cups yourself prior to handing them over.

The bag also provides no protection to the K-Cups, and one of them was crushed - although not sufficiently as to be unusable.

All in all, I think this is a good purchase.
Got this for a crib, now use for toddler bed. Still going strong despite two kids jumping on it every night!

Got this for my Mom, I was over her house and I have shared many of the flavors.  Very distinct difference for each of the blends and very well described on the description of each blend so you know what to expect when you brew it.  Makes a great gift.
The initial smell was strong & not very pleasant. But fried organic veggies lightly & VERY tasty!! Plus healthy!  Great combination. Fast shipment.

This seat is wonderful, my son loves it and he falls asleep in it no problem. While this seat is very heavy, it seems very well made and sturdy. It easily adjusts for the straps to be raised or lowered depending on height of your child, the button to loosen the straps to let the child in or buckle them is easily used and placed conveniently and with the click tight technology, it is a breeze to install. We have gone through several car seats, as we have 3 little ones. We already have one of these seats and needed another for my other son, so it was a no brainer to go for this model once again. We are a Britax Family, I like that they seem to be on top of new technology and I have yet to receive one that has had any issues.
I don't have any more flys in my house! Really pleased with the Venus fly trap

I use this in my ubbi diapee pale. Does not absorb smell and hold up well in the wash. I have two so that way when one is in the wash I have the 2nd one in the diaper pale. Also works great as laundry basket when you are fine washing it and the diapers.

On Sunday I indulge myself with dreams of being on holiday in the UK. So I fix eggs, bacon, toast, coffee, fry some tomatoes and mushrooms, and heat up these B&M beans.
Perfect! Now if amazon.com would only carry English-style sausages!

I was so happy to find this product in bulk for I am baker and this way I didn't have to stay in line at the grocery store, it just came to me by mail.
Plus I use this product all time and people always comment how fluffy and fresh tasty all my homemade cookies and cakes taste!!

This is actually the first time I have tried the Blue Raspberry Jolly Rancher hard candies and they are delicious. They have a very intense raspberry flavor, along with that classic mix of Jolly Rancher \\"sweet and tart\\". One warning though, they definitely will turn your tongue blue, so be prepared! This is a huge bag of candy, so there will be plenty to go around and then some, whatever your needs. I know there has been some discussion regarding the use of both corn syrup and sugar being used as a sweetener in these candies, but I suggest people just follow their own nutritional regimen and requirements. For myself, I believe both of these sweetening additives are equally as natural and also equally as refined and processed. Just like with any sweet treat, moderation is the healthiest rule to follow. But while you are \\"moderating\\", definitely enjoy these candies! Yum!

I really liked that this baby soap is an all natural product.  I am pregnant and purchased this baby wash to use on my soon to be born daughter as well as my 20 month old son.  I wondered if the citrus scent would be a good choice for babies and in my opinion it is too strong for a new born.  I have used it on my son for about a month and really like it except that it stings his eyes.  He would start to fuss, cry, and say " owie" when I washed his hair and face with it.  At first I thought he was just being difficult but then I washed my face with it and it really stung my eyes!  At least he could tell me that it was hurting him, but a newborn would not be able to.  I definitely will not use this product on my new born and won't purchase it again.  CK

Just assembled this today for newly arrived baby girl. First, the control panel was loose from the body due to a broken tab. I did not realize this at first and just snapped it into place thinking it was supposed to come that way. Later I found the broken tab among the plastic. Assembly was fairly straight forward until I got to the last tube which was missing the little plastic bolt grommet thingy. Found it in one of the cardboard protective pieces and luckily it fit on to the tube so I could complete the assembly. Then I plug it in, start the motor and wow does this sound like it's powered by popsicle sticks and rubber bands. I assume it's broken due to A) the broken tab on the motor/control panel and B) the loud noise. Then I come here and see this is a common issue. If it lasts and she likes it then I'll forgive and forget, but as it is now I wish I had purchased one locally just in case any of these issues come back to haunt me a few months from now.

Oh last thing, this is a BIG piece of equipment so be prepared for that. Check one out in a local store first. I don't think we'll have room for this and all of the other nursery accoutrement so for now it's in the living room.

not compatible with swing maxi at all.
the pump flow is very bad, not recommended at all.

My two and a half year old daughter loves these as a fashion statement-- just like mommy! They fit her little legs perfectly, and she can pull them on and off herself. They fit over her leggings too, just like mommy's do. She was very excited to receive these in the mail yesterday. She had specifically requested "purple leg warmers" and these were the perfect find without having to go to a store to look for them.

Canadian maple syrup is the best in the world. I love this late-season offering - it is rich, dark, and full-bodied. Shipping on this product was unbelievably fast (with Amazon Prime) and the syrup arrived in stellar condition. Thank you, Canadian Finest!

This is the best cool brew tea I've ever had.  The raspberry and lemon are the best.  I've tried others and they don't measure up.  I don't normally like the flavored teas, but these are really good.  Of course the sweeter the better!
The ingredients is excellent  but the dispenser  should be more better . also canderel gold was the best  for carry in pocket
The description does not include the information on country of origin. I would not have bought this if I had known that it was not grown in the USA.

You get 3 packages of these. I need to read the description a little better lol. Anyway, they're really nice BUT, use the pepper sparingly bc it's pretty spicy. It grounds in pretty large pieces but, lovely when used corrrectly.

I am still adapting to regulating the quantity to a serving. I got this product, mainly for making summer drinks. I am amazed how little is needed to sweeten 2 qts.  I wish I had taken better notice of the suggested item to go along with this product, Amazon suggested.  "Norpro 3080 Mini Stainless Steel Measuring Spoons, Set includes ( tad, dash, pinch, smidgen and a drop $6.76 "  The only issue I have is the package, it was not zipped sealed within the sealed package, it would have been helpful to contain the powdery substance. Fast delivery, but, with next Amazon order, I will be picking up the mini measuring spoons. It's nice to know there is a natural substance so I can avoid the chemical sweeteners, that I swear, starting my ears to ring, and eyesight to be foggy. or it may be old age.

It's amazing, my daughter loves it and she is 3 months. Easy to remove and replace bouncer. Music is soothing and can control volume of it. 2 speed vibrations. Well worth the money. Definitely recommend buying this product to any mom.much cheaper than buying a bouncer and swing separately and much less hassle. Also very simple and easy to assemble.
I love these peel and stick stickers! There awesomely cute and brighten up any room automatically. I will buy more of them for sure.
Shipped promptly, Priced competitively, Excellent taste, robust, not acidic but very enjoyable \\"to the last sip\\". I can recommend others trying this brand and this specific roast flavor.

Love that I can use this for my infant in negative temperature. Keeps her nice and warm on walks and transporting from car to restaurant, home, shopping, etc. So easy to place in carseat and simple to wash.
this product is very good. I intented to purchase alot more of this product.Please plan on keeping this pproduct on hand at all times.

Have been drinking once or twice a day for three weeks now.  Skin is beginning to clear.  No more painful pimples.  I needed a gentle detox for health issues as well, and this is very gentle.  No side effects, and I am very sensitive.  My only wish is that they made this in organic.  :)

This is a nice travel spoon that I keep in the diaper bag. I like the rubber coating over the metal as my baby likes to bite down on her spoons.
This works out really well. The spoon is not too deep, which i like!

Pop Secret Homestyle used to be my favorite brand of popcorn.  It had the perfect blend of salt and butter...when it was made with real Land o' Lakes butter.  The last two cases I ordered did NOT have real butter in them.  They were both of the Homestyle flavor, but neither had the \\"Made with real Land o' Lakes butter\\" graphic on the boxes.  The boxes in this last case of popcorn I ordered was merely labelled \\"a taste of butter\\", and was listed in the ingredients as \\"artificial and natural flavoring\\".  I've written to the company asking why they took out the real butter, but they have yet to respond.  I don't know why they'd change the recipe when it was so good before.  I hope they change it back.  In the Amazon pages for both the 8-6 packs and the 12-3 pack boxes, the picture shows the box with the real butter graphic on them, but that's not what I ended up with.

My son really needed to be transitioned to a seat were he can sit properly at a table ( with out kneeling in the chair) This seat is great. I am sure I will use the tray when we travel but we are trying to get away from the tray thing all together. My son is 19 mo old and he did great in the fp space saver high chair till this point. I am not sure why people are commenting on this booster not tilting properly -- I didn't think it was designed for an infant to start feeding. We should have got it a few months ago when he started climbing on his own into the highchair. Straps securely to out wooden kitchen chairs. easy to wipe down or vacuum out. :)

UPDATE!!  The seller contacted me promptly and let me know where the sling is made.  It is in Spain.  They also stated that there are videos for the other tie styles on their website.  Because of this I changed the rating to 5 stars.  :)  I gave this 4 stars for the reason that I thought this was made in the USA because of the name.  I know this is more my fault, but since I cannot find the origin anywhere and it was misleading in the title I give this product 4 stars.  I tried looking on the packaging for the made origin and cannot find it.  I would just like to know out of curiosity.  The material is thicker than I thought, but our winters get very cold here in Indiana, so I am completely fine with that.  Other than that, the sling seems like it will work just fine for my new soon to be.  I bought the grey one, and it is a nice color.  It is a solid grey color, not heather grey if you were curious.  There is no marking to let you know where the middle is.  I just drew a heart on the inside after I found the middle.  If it washes out, I'll sew on a button.  The sling is long!  So I don't see it being a problem for anyone to be able to use, small or large.  One thing I wish it had was instructions on the different sling tie styles that can be used.  If I'm not mistaken I thought these types of slings could be used newborn through 35 lbs, but the tie style needs be changed.  There is only the newborn/front facing style (or the one in the main picture).

This teething necklace is great!!  It is very sturdily made.  The thread/string is very durable, and wouldn't break no matter how hard I pulled.  The stones are solid and had no chips or cracks to weaken them.  I would recommend this product, but want to make sure that people know to always watch their child during the use of this or any other teething instrument.  A good way to prevent any potential accidents would be to put this snuggly (but not too tight) around baby's ankle.

i bought it twice. actually they ar not good for my baby, 6 month because pence are not solid.
i found another seller's safety playpen with door after wasting my money.

I ordered this product and used it a little before 11 weeks.  It took me a while, but I was able to find the fetal heartbeat.  It was really neat!!  :)  It seems to pick up and read the mother's pulse more readily, which I think interferes with the count on the LCD.  It was reading my pulse at 68, and the baby at around 130.  But I counted my pulse, and it was around 85, and the baby was consistently at 170ish.  So, you can clearly hear both heartbeats, but I wouldn't rely on the screen for an accurate reading.  That said, I would recommend this product b/c you can hear the heartbeat pretty early and put your mind at ease.  I think the model A is the same thing without the LCD screen and a little cheaper, so that may be the route to go.  Maybe the accuracy of the reading increases with fetal age, but since it wasn't reading my pulse correctly, I'm not sure about that.
Arrived all in due time. Great quality. My first choice in healthy beverage alternatives. Drink one in the morning and you'll feel refreshed and ready for anything!

It is no secret in my house that I am an avid lover of chocolate. One night I had the sudden impulse to get these, and I am very bad at ignoring my impulses. Sadly to say, these did not last long...

Still delicious though!

All of the "Sparkling ICE Spring Water" flavors are delicious. Unfortunately, for medical reasons I have been told to curtail my use of anything carbonated, so I will probably not be purchasing them again. If you have no medical reason to avoid carbonated drinks, I thing you will find these very satisfying. They are large, so the price, to me, is reasonable.

I bought this for our youngest to prevent her plate from ending up on the floor. IT WORKS! We have a smooth, lacquered wood table instead of a high chair I have always used a Graco Tot N Loc with each of our 5 children. To make the suction strong I run the underside of the plate under the faucet, then flip over and put the food on the plate. I do not cut on this plate as the material won't stand up to much abuse. Then, I place the plate at the table and push down on the center. We've had this for 6 weeks and I should have bought is sooner. The price is well worth the quality and performance!
Sounds a little tinny, buttons either a little touchy or I'm heavy handed. Still good for the price
I love bold coffee and my daughter in law  is from Peru, so I had to try it. It is very good! I have it on auto shipment now. Go on and try it!
Great brewed flavor, bold but not bitter. Tastes just as good as brewed and so quick and convenient. To me this tastes like good plain tea-like liptons orange pekoe and pekoe bags. very similar.
I have a thing about cappuccinos and I had run out and I had this selection before so I just reordered

This is the real stuff everyone.

Don't buy this if on a diet, but what a cookie for a special occasion or snack.

They stay fresh, and have no unnatural preservatives. Sugar, butter, flour, salt: it's a treasured snack.

I agree with the other posters here. Why are you charging so much for K cups?? There is a Dunkin Donuts on almost every corner and I can get the same product for so much less. Why would anyone order from Amazon for that price? Give us a break.
This is a must have for parents! Easy to clean and soft. We use ares still with our 2 year old and work great! Love It!

You know it -- the craving for that black licorice, anise flavor in your mouth...  These suckers fit the bill.  I would suggest a full five-star rating if the flavor were stronger, but these are definitely the best I have found.  To be clear, the package is 10.6 ounces, the serving size 5 pieces, and the number of servings (is listed as) 26.  All in all, ouzo candy is a great after-meal palate cleanser.

One of the most delicious, flavorful teas I have ever had, and I have been drinking herbal tea for decades.
It's an excellent digestive, with a very vibrant taste.
This was a big hit at Christmas dinner with both kids and adults.  The set makes a nice hostess gift when visiting family or friends at the holidays and the candy was very tasty.
Very nice baby book, bought it from amazon warehouse so I got it cheaper due to a minor damage. It was affordable and just what I wanted

Wow...I've spent alot more in the big coffee stores for this flavor...Arbuckle's is the best when it comes to Blueberry Muffin...there is nothing better then finding a good blueberry muffin to go with this coffee..and I only fill coffee tank to 8 cups...I like it med strong.  Wonderful stuff

It's cute and may be useful for kids who need carry only a lunch and a waterbottle. But for us it was useless, as it just cannot fit 4 boxes - lunch, morning snack, 3pm and 5pm snacks and a water bottle. I am keeping it because i didn't return in time, but next time I'll be sure to check the dimensions. I liked the Dabbawala bags a lot better as they are elastic and can fit in lot more than it's size!
I bought these for my Grandma, and she liked them!  I don't really know how good they are myself though.

I used the Tropical Traditions Organic Coconut Flour in 1 recipe so far for a coconut orange cake.  It was good, but a bit dense.  I will continue to experiment with different recipes as I know this flour is much better for you than the regular processed flour.  Happy buying!
Great for Iced Tea too! It shipped quickly and the price is reasonable, better than any place else I have found the K cups.
BOUGHT THIS FOR MY PARENTS AND GOT TO TRY SOME. ITS JUST AVG, DOESN'T HAVE A SMOOTH FINISH LIKE MOST OF THEIR COFFEES. SO I WOULD NOT BUY AGAIN.

This coffee could become my new go-to morning coffee. Unlike a typical breakfast blend, which is often sharp and harsh, this coffee has a more rounded flavor. I'm not sure I tasted the caramel element that the product description mentions but I like the coffee for just plain drinking. This would go well with donuts or light fare, and I didn't have any problems with grounds ending up in the coffee.
If you want a flavored coffee, you have to try this one. We think it is great. And it smells terrific.

Yes, very expensive for a jar of cherries. Totally worth it if you value good cocktails. The syrup they are packed in is very thick and even more flavorful than the actual cherries. You'll never use those nuclear-red things from the grocery store again.

That's right. If my husband didn't make any comment about this tahini when he made his first batch of hummus with it last week, that means he had nothing to complain about. That means it was way better than the last brand he complained about every time he used it, and that was a lot of times, because it takes a while to go through a 16 oz jar 2 Tbsp at a time!

It's kosher. It's organic. It tastes good. What's not to like? Buy it now. You know you want it.
Not much to say here.  We love this and bought another base to use.  Dishwasher safe or just wipe it.  Very handy.
We really liked the flavor of this one and recommend it to everyone.  Doesn't really taste like vanilla chai, but it's good nonetheless.
First one we bought was missing pieces and the second one has a \\"hinge\\" that is not safe.  Buy from another company.  Poor instructions and poor quality product.
I love these! I use them during all of my workouts. They taste like Fresca :)
Wish I had purchased more of this type of candy assortment. Candy was well received by all who stuck their hand in the candy jar!

Made by JFC. I use this for Ma Po Dofu. It doesn't have the taste and texture of soybean (or preserved soybean) that many Szechwan chili sauces have. Been using this for decades, and since it's hard to find, have tried many alternatives: This is (to my taste) the best of the bunch.

We've been trying it out with our 6 month old for a week thus far. We decided to give this a try because my daughter hates the bottle and I don't like spouted/straw tops. Also, giving her milk out of a bottle is always a battle for my husband so now that she is older we are trying a cup to make things easier. Right now, we've just been working with water but things are going well. Of course we have to hold on tight to it but she reaches for it and is getting better at swallowing more than she spills each day. I do like the shape because unlike a regular cup, the slant gives them and you holding the cup more control over the flow. I've let her drink from my regular glass and it poured out the sides of her mouth. This cup helps guide the water.

Update: I've warmed up to cups with straws for their portability and to make it easier for others feeding to not have a mess, but I still like this cup. Our daughter drinks water well from it but not breast milk (but that has nothing to do with the cup). I only gave it 4 stars because it's pricy for such a little cup.
I think I love this more than my 8 month old! It kind of taste like cake batter

Love it, just like in New Orleans!

Sorry, but as long as you REQUIRE a minimum number of words, I will not take the time and effort to complete your reviews.
I bought this hoping to use it for lemons and limes. Last night I needed to juice a lemon, so tried it out. It broke. Am going back to my tried-and-true glass juicer.

There's definitely a ramp up period and learning curve to making kefir from grains.  I'm still working through it, but it takes effort every day and patience.  The kefir starter kits that don't involve grains are much easier to produce a good product from, though I understand the health benefits are not as great so I'm continuing on this path until I get it right!

Can't begin to tell you how much this thing has saved my sanity. This thing has given her HOURS of entertaining. Every day she sits underneath it and bats at the toys. Also a good indicator of how her motor skills are coming along. She is obsessed with the butterfly. Always trying to put it in her mouth. It attaches to everything too. So, anywhere you go, you have entertainment. Pretty amazing for something I spent less than ten bucks on! If only it where organic.... hint hint.

Frustrating instructions for assembly, and it's not all that easy to put up. The instructions only made sense in retrospect, ie. "Oh, that's what they meant". I put this together for the first time after assembling an ikea nightstand, which was considerably quicker and easier out of the box.

Also, once you disassemble it doesn't pack up as conveniently as I'd hoped if you want to bring the changing table and the bassinet with it.

The quality is good, and once set up seems very functional but I'm just not as excited about traveling around with this.

Bought this during my deployment since everyone in my office loved soup.  And it was also conveniently packaged in a bowl.  Luckil though, someone realized we couldn't microwave the bowl so we used the Keurig hot water and it worked out great.
I love this product.  I have been looking all over for a crib set that is pink with red ladybugs!  Usually it is pink with pink ladybugs!  So happy with this product!

I splurged on this pillow for myself late in my pregnancy but it just didn't work for me. I think I'm too tall for it (I'm about 5'9\\"), so the bottom part of the pillow wrapped between my legs higher than I would have liked (I would have preferred it to wrap more between my knees than between my thighs). Also, because of my long torso my belly isn't very big, and although it does need support while I sleep it did not stick out far enough to take advantage of the part of the pillow designed to support the belly. After one night of terrible sleep I gave up on this pillow.  Even though it didn't work for me I do think it's a good product/great idea. I do wish it wrapped around the back in some way so that the user would really only need the one pillow to be comfortable all night, but it's wonderfully fluffy and the cover was a pretty, calm pattern and was easy to get on and off.    In the end I gifted it to a friend who recently found out she was pregnant. I hope it works for her!

Being recently gluten free I missed graham crackers, these are a tasty gluten free alternative. The texture and taste isn't the same and is a little bit far from what a real graham cracker tastes like, but these are still good and work for the same uses as a traditional graham cracker.

I liked these at first. They're quite absorbent and fit my toddler well, but it seems no matter how many times I wash and/or strip them, they still stink. I guess they may work for other people, but we're sticking with bamboo from now on.

As other reviewers have stated the shoulder straps on this are puny and I corrected that problem with buying JJCole shoulder straps in pink at BuyBuybaby for $9.99.  Those work great and no longer does my little one get cuts on her neck.  The car seat seems small but maybe my baby is just big?  She's probably 24\\" now at 3.5 months and her feet are hanging over the edge.  This concerns me in so far as how soon I'm going to have to buy another car seat.  I was hoping to get a year out of it, but it's not looking like it!!  My real gripe about this product has more to do with the actual stroller system it connects to which I have also reviewed.  So if you are here, as I arrived here, to buy the matching car seat to match the Mia Moda stroller then I'd advise you to look for a different system.  Seriously.

for my little Thomas lover, i am pretty happy with the Thomas seat and step stool. seat is a little big and slides around a little bit but the stool is really great because non-slip bottom. would have prefered a smidge cheaper but if Thomas gets him excited about potty training then it was worth it!
3rd set given as a gifts.  Great convenience and safety item for parents with  babies  and/or young children.  Fantastic for Grandparents  house.
This set of two Sophie's was great. My friend is expecting twins. I like that they came individually wrapped so that I can buy more for the friends having single babies and split the Sophie's up.

Good price for a product that my sister claims will prevent ticks and therefore Lyme disease. I like it; some don't because of the distinctive aroma. It remains a staple in our shower from early spring to late fall.

I could not get the netting to fit completely over my convertible crib.  My son then grabbed a hold of the extra netting and pulled it into the crib!!  I wasn't sure if it would work on my crib so I wasn't overly disappointed, however I was definitely safety concerned about the extra netting he just grabbed.

My daughter is almost 5 and we still use these!  Much better than the Munchkin plastic spoons and the Gerber silver utensils.
