The spoon is deep so it holds a lot of food for soups, cereals, etc.  And the spork is great too so the food doesn't fall off easily during the motion of bringing the fork to your mouth.  The food always falls off the Gerber ones.  It might not be the best spoon for a baby trying to learn to self feed but they are perfect for 2+ years!

I ordered salted and unsalted frm two different companies. This was fresh and pretty tasty but I prefer salt. Sesame taste doesn't seem stong enough.
Price right. Packaging one very large bag with no reseal.
This spray taste like coconut.  The should have used expeller pressed coconut to remove the flavor.  This is not a product you want to use on all foods.

First of all, whatever brand of xylitol you choose, make sure it's BIRCH (not corn) and MADE IN THE USA (not China).  This xylitol is made in the USA from birch.  I was using the Health Garden brand, which is also very good, but this tastes even better.  This works very well for chia puddings, baked goods, and homemade chocolate.  I use it primarily when I'm making sweets that will be eaten by people who eat a standard american diet and aren't accustomed to weird things like stevia, etc.  This really is a great substitute for sugar.

I like these lollipops a lot, but because of their shape, they're awkward to eat until they're half gone.  I'd like them a little smaller ad/or maybe thinner and then they'd be perfect.  I know they have hard candies, but I like pops.  When I mentioned that to the lady at the counter, she said, "So write to them and tell them."  I did that, actually, and the answer is that they like to hear from customers, etc. etc  No plans to offer smaller pops however.

Our son just turned 4 months and he likes to be in a sitting position to watch everything around him. So we bought this product instead of the Bumb0 which can only be used for a couple of months.  He loves to sit in it.  It's very sturdy and easy to put him in.

We prefer a medium bodied, medium roast cup of coffee which we drink black. While this technically fits those requirements, my wife and I both found this coffee to be lacking much flavor. The Donut Shop Coffee is better, but we're still working on finding one we really like. We've been SBC and Peet's fans for years, but no K Kups yet.

We'll keep this as extra coffee for parties and get-togethers, but it definitely won't be our daily blend.
Fast delivery, very well packaged.  This product is a piece of engineering...!   Very reliable and accurate.  Totally recomend it.
I love this product and have been drinking it for years.  It is perfect any time of day or evening, but I most enjoy it mid-mornings and mid-afternoons.  Very refreshing and helps me relax!
Works great!  No issues with the suction cups - I didn't even have to use the heavy duty ones.

My 4 year old is too big/tall for this already, I am extremely dissapointed.  Also, as others have mentioned, the headrest needs to be readjusted often because any bump causes it to lower.  I plan to buy a Britax, I should have in the first place. :(
The creamy texture is fantastic and very little oil sits on top meaning very little stirring is required. It is a little blander than other almond butters I have tried, but quite good overall.

I have back problems so was looking for a medium sized bag that would be comfortable to carry, and this one has been great.

Pros:
1. It is the perfect size--fits everything I need but doesn't feel like I'm lugging around a suitcase. Actually it could hold a lot more than I carry in it, as I'm trying to keep it light because of my back problems. It has plenty of pockets to keep things organized.

2. The strap is very comfortable--it is well padded and has a non-slip surface that keeps it on my shoulder. It is comfortable on one shoulder or slung across my chest.

3. It comes with hooks that you attach to the handles of your stroller. At first I thought this was silly, but it's now one of my favorite features. It keeps the bag securely within easy reach and high enough that I don't kick it when walking. If I hung it by the strap it would be too low, and it's a hassle to get it in and out of the basket, so I love these hooks.

4. We have the \\"Black Stitch\\" color, and it is neutral enough to be for a boy or a girl and sleek enough that I still feel like a professional adult when I carry it.

Cons:
1. The changing pad is surprisingly heavy. It is large, which is nice, but keeping the bag light is a priority to me so I use a lighter one.

2. The pockets on the side are small--I have to push hard to get a 20oz water bottle in them.

3. I wish it had a short handle in addition to the shoulder strap--it would sometimes be easier to haul everything if it did.

One note, the price on Amazon seems to fluctuate by as much as twenty dollars, so I would keep an eye on it and buy it when it's less expensive.

Our baby just loves this swing! It holds him so comfortably and he adores the light feature. He has even started cooing to the music. This is our third child, but possibly the best piece of baby equipment we have ever purchased. I highly recommend it!
Bugaboo BEE Stroller - The BEST $529 stroller you can buy on the market! It is very well designed and constructed. Light, stylish, smooth, very comfortable for the baby. Excellent!

I wasn't sure I would like this tea; but I took a chance after reading some reviews regarding the "Hot" in the "Hot Cinnamon Spice". It was sounding like it just might be something I could enjoy. So as soon as it arrived I opened it up and took a whiff, OMG, it smelled absolutely divine and spicey! I was very careful with the measurement of tea, the water temp and infuse time. I wanted the first cup to be per instructions so I could then adjust accordingly to my own personal taste. Well that first cup was an experience, It smelled exquisite, my first sip was soon after infusing and it was steaming hot. It was almost too sweet, I don't ever use sweetener in anything, not a big fan; but the sweet cloves in it was very sweet and not sure how I felt about that. After the tea cooled to a more drinkable temperature, my holey tea-bud, it was a thousand times better than that first sip. The sweetness was tempered and all the flavors came together in a wonderful balance. The "Hot" Cinnamon got spicey and I loved it. It was a great cup of tea all the way down to the last drop. Well almost the last drop, it has so much cinnamon in it that it does have a little more tea sediment than most loose teas, but it was such a fine dusting that it was still drinkable to the last drop. That last drop just has a little kick. So my final grade is A+++. My personal adjustment is a heaping "perfect teaspoon" per cup (I like it strong and spicy), I do keep to the 5 minute suggested brew time. I do hold my anticipation in check and wait until it is a drinkable temp so I can avoid that first saccharin sweet effect of the clove it gets when it's too hot. Then it is perfect start to finish. I am going through it way too fast. I will be reordering very soon. It is my favorite afternoon wind-down tea and also my afternoon need-a-second-wind tea, whichever the day requires. What else can I say, I love this tea, and yes, the cinnamon is deliciously spicy, yum!
Just as good as the nutiva and the price was right.  My only complaint is that is comes in a plastic jar.  I would recommend this brand.
I sent this fruit basket to my son and family.  They said it was very good and enjoyed it very much.
They are very cute, and I like this brand for my twins niece and nephew. I got those as a present.

Love the mint flavor to this one, and the stevia adds a little natural sweetness.  The flavors are not overdone though, and simply enhance the vegetal flavor of the green tea.  Very good addition to my office beverage selection.
The projector is neat and the choices for music or white noise are great.  It also has a night light, but it isn't very bright.
Thank goodness for Amazon! Coffee Crisp is not available in Third World called the Deep South. I love to share them (sparingly) with my southern friends.

We used them in the daycare I worked at and loved them there, but now I love it even more at home!!! I tried nursing with a pillow or blankets to help... or nothing at all... OMG, I can't believe how much the boppy help!!! This isnt the one I have.. mine has sailboats on it to match my son's nursery... but it really doesnt matter... same product.. my preemie is so much easier to hold with the help of this while nursing. LOVE IT

The aroma is of maple, and maybe bacon. The taste is disappointing. To be more than fair, how could it not be? Because of course, it's not, say, maple syrup and bacon, but instead the lightest broth of tea, with a suggestion in the aroma of maple, and maybe bacon.

Taste is subjective; I didn't like it. You may. So, while I don't want to be over-harsh on something that is more or less what it claimed to be -- tea, and that is from a good company -- I think if I had had a review like this to read, I would might be better off.

The company could improve things by offering a sample packet perhaps of its teas, instead of a 2 lbs bag.

These nursing pads are amazing. I received them as a gift, and they are perfect. I have been using them for about 2 months, and I have not had a leak yet. The are absorbent, and their circumference is large enough that they don't show through clothing. They are also easy to care for. I have tried other cloth nursing pads, but they were just too small and not absorbent enough; disposable were wasteful and scrunched up any time I went to nurse. These wool pads have been the perfect solution for me.

These nursing pads are now my go-to item for mothers I know who plan to breastfeed.

I love this booster chair!  I bought it for travel, but have since set it up at home and put away the high chair.  It straps very securely to our dining chairs, and my son has tried everything to get out of it after he is finished eating, but has yet to escape without my letting him out.  The pop-out legs helped out a lot because my son is small/short.  He was 14 mos. when we first used it, and it was perfect then, and it continues to be now, a month later.  All the straps work well, and it's very easy to take to a friend's house and set up. I've even put it on a plastic patio chair, and it still worked great!

So beyond disappointed.... When I was picking out a swaddler blanket for my daughter I was told to stick with the Aden and Anais blankets because they are the best and the most versatile.
I shopped around and found these ones- thinking that since they are more expensive they are probably the 'better' ones to get. Boy was I wrong. Yes, when you open the box and touch the fabric they are super soft and luxurious but when you swaddle your baby- the blanket does not hold in place and in a funny way is slippery.
Then you go and wash it.
I washed it as instructed on the tag. But it came out pimply and stringy. The fabric now looks old and definitely not like it was barely used once.
I would stick to the basic cotton swaddle blankets from aden and anais. (I got ONE as a hand me down and have been re-using it for two weeks now and it still looks brand new.)
Now, of only there was a way to get rid of these....
I just received this product and I love the design, I do not know what I am having and it works great for both genders.   There is so many pieces for a great price! Would definatly recommend.

I received my Maxy Moo Moo waterproof bibs and used them almost immediately (after washing them of course). I love the bright colors and the size which keeps my 3 month old baby, who is constantly drooling, nice and dry. I'm glad I bought 2 orders. I will defenitely order them again and have told some of my new mommy friends and family about them. Thanks Maxy Moo Moo!

i've been singing the praises of this product which is my favorite new snack... sweet crunchy goodness with maca-endocrine adaptogen, mesquite-blood sugar, astragalus and reishi-immune boosters...
i love any snack that i can eat and feel good about it. i always have it in the car on trips now.
maca has that nutty malty flavor and i can taste the coconut, i just love it.
i was just adding it to my christmas wish list and saw someone gave it only one star... so undeservedly!! super yum

As a first time mom I did a lot of research on the items my new baby was going to be using.  The Kick 'n Play Bouncer came HIGHLY recommended, little did I know that it really was the best!  I am so happy with it.  My son uses it everyday... he is now 5 months and our every morning ritual is for him to sit in the boucer while I iron and get ready, he loves it!  Thank you to you all for the wonderful recommendation!

I can't find this brand in the stores here anymore.  I tried a number of other kinds, since it is kind of a pain to order a whole box of it.  It is definitely worth it.  This was shipped promptly and arrived faster than I expected.

Looks great! No damage during shipping, no missing parts, pretty simple for two to put together.  Bought along with the Stork Craft Avalon 6 Drawer Universal Dresser (also in Espresso) and they match great!
I prefer dunkin donuts chocolate glazed donut over this plus any other chocolate coffee I have tried. This is not very good at all. I mix regular coffee with chocolate coffee.

I bought this for my daughter when she was still about 3 months. (She was very frustrated that she couldn't sit up right unassisted) Since it is for 4 month and up I just used a small pillow for support.
I bought it from Amazon for about $35.00. I think for that price it was a perfect item. I am sad to see it being sold for $73. I do not think it is worth $73 dollars.
The orange platform is misleading - it is not bouncy. This is a good item for a younger, more inactive baby.
But considering the price hike, it's better to invest your money in an exersaucer that really bounces. (At this point I have upgraded this at a thrift store for Fisher Price's Laugh and Learn Jumperoo. )
It does swivel 360 degrees smoothly.
After washing the seat, it never really sat perfectly (could be user error).
My initial thought when I opened the box and put it together was dismayed at how cheap and plastic-y it seemed.
It was durable and still in great condition 4 months later. It just wasn't stimulating anymore.
This item served it's purpose, but seeing the increase in price made me want to write a review to let mommies know it's not worth more than $40.00/$50.00

I bake with a blend of stevia, xylitol and erythritol as a sugar substitute but they all have a "light" sugar taste (and of course too much stevia gets bitter and some people pick up a licorice flavor). Coconut sugar still has plenty of calories but they aren't empty calories and it has a rich flavor more like brown sugar. I can still cut lots of calories with my stevia blend while maintaining excellent flavor with the coconut sugar, especially with the added ginger root. I highly recommend it!

Product appears to me to be of average quality and hole size, and not adequate for no-see-ums nor as fine as the picture shows.  What I received I could buy localy for half, but I thought I was getting better quality.
product of great quality and usefulness so called it 5 stars in perfect good presentation totally recommend people expect or think that having a baby

really nice to have this product available on amazon. My grandmother and my aunts used to spend an entire day rolling these by hand, so it is a luxury to find them on the shelf and tasting rather good. don't forget to dip them in plain Yogurt seasoned with mint
I like it. It appears well made, very sturdy and the compartments are of a useful size. Perfect for my needs.

When I read the directions for this Smokehouse Bacon Parmesan pasta, the liquid amount seemed rather high to me. So I reduced the water and milk to 1 cup each. I found the result creamy and good; not quite like homemade, but pretty nice for Monday night after a long day at work. Upon visiting Amazon to review the product, I found that a previous reviewer, RDToo had already recommended the liquid reduction I used! So, I hand credit for the idea to RDToo!

I'm giving the product three stars because of the required amendment to the cooking instructions in order to make a side dish with good taste and texture. If the original directions had called for 1 cup of water and milk each, I would have awarded the product 4 stars for flavor and texture.

I usually eat whole grain pasta, but I intend to keep a few of these Knorr Pasta sides in the pantry for those nights when a quick and easy dinner is all I can muster.

This decal looks so nice on the wall and really spruces up my child's room. The nicest part is that it's removable and won't leave any residue or ruin the paint if we ever need to remove it. This is a great and affordable decor option for anyone, but especially for those who like to change up decor every so often or if you rent and can't apply permanent paint or decor to your walls. It's also way easier than painting a design like this on the wall. We love it!

I made sure to follow the instructions by first washing and drying the wall really well - especially since it is textured so it's always a bit tougher to apply decals on texture. I've applied vinyl decals before so I didn't really need to consult the instructions for the application, but if you have never done this before, definitely read the instructions and view the Bobee instructional video.

It was pretty easy to apply, although they didn't include a plastic scraper tool that helps get the vinyl to stick without air bubbles, so I used a credit card instead. Make sure you rub the letters several times before peeling away the backing and always peel very slowly at an angle, and you will be good to go!

I received this product in exchange for an honest review.

I've ordered the 10-pk starter kit twice now and I definitely can tell that these cookies do improve the thickness of my milk. I've had a low flow since my baby was born and was recommended by my sister in law to try milkmakers cookies. Not only do they taste great (oatmeal chocolate chip) but as I said, my milk comes out thicker and even whiter. I highly recommend these cookies and am thinking about subscribing to receive them monthly.  Thank you milkmakers!

I bought this set and it's about half the price right now of any other bathing suits for babies (and that includes ones that don't have the nice coverups). It's awesome, because it's been hard to find a bathing suit for a younger baby (under 12 months). The few that are out there are one-pieces, and I prefer tankinis.     The 6-9 month size fits my 6 month old daughter fantastically--and gives her room to grow. The quality is really excellent--especially for the price. The color is vibrant (pics don't do it justice), and the detail work is really awesome. The fact that it comes with a coverup is a nice plus. My daughter looks so cute in it! :)

pretty good for less fat, could not ask for more. Had good taste, enough salt, prepared well.. Need to buy locally as it's not a good idea to buy so many at once. Does anyone know of where to get them here in Los Angeles CA?
I had some TH last year when I went to Vancouver. This taste very similar to the original. Very pleased with this product.

This thing is huge and very hard to get in/out of my Yukon...not Yugo...Yukon. The harness appears to have openings that are smaller than the straps that fit through them, so very difficult to adjust...whacked my infant several times by accident while trying to move them. Truly disappointed that for the money it isn't a little easier to use. Love the looks, dislike the function.
I purchased the BebePOD Boost and added this tray with a suction cup toy.  It works okay.  I wish it was bigger, had a higher lip at the edge, and was more stable.  It's quite wobbly and small.
These are robust and clean alternatives to paper clips for holding heavy diapers. This is getting ridiculous: I had to say 7 more words about diaper safety pins for this review to be accepted.

Love the shape, size and overall concept of this bag. I was very excited to get it as a diaper bag. It is a lot bigger than I thought but fits great on the stroller like it says. The only thing I didn't like was that the interior was black which made it really hard to find pockets and see things. If you can get it in a different color with a different color inside that isn't black, it's worth every penny. I  no longer use it because it was to hard to see what was inside.

I have the larger ones of these I bought at Costco and my son loves them.  Since I got through sippy and straw cups like they're going out of style, I thought, screw, buy these!  Well they are perfect for little hands, they DON'T leak!!!  A bit of a pain to wash, but which kids cups aren't.  They are super colorful and durable.  Love them and recommend them to anyone with kids.

We bought this book for our daughter. I am very pleased with it. It is so pretty and the pages are very colorful and decorated nicely. The information it asks you is like any other baby book. Example: About Mommy, About Daddy, Family Tree, When mommy began labor, when she was born, etc. VERY PLEASED. Also arrived at the right time!

its wonderful
I like it sooo much
I feel fresh after I take it
soooo I recommended for any one

At first this appears to NOT work with the Baby Jogger City Select...but keep reading becuase it does. My husband is mechanically inclined and can make most things work. Just before he set to \\"modifying\\" this to MAKE it work he discovered it will only fit on the handle when the handle is extended. Pull your handle out and part of it will be exposed that does not have the rubber cushion. THIS is where it must go. Yes you loose one extension section of your handle bar but it's not that bad. The handle will still extend one more section. I generally liked having the handle at it's shortest but having it extended to the first position really isn't that big a deal or difference. If it REALLY bugs you then you could trim the handle bar cushion to allow for the cup holder and then never remove the cup holder. The fact that the cup holder part can come on and off with the twist of a knob is really handy as well if you don't want to break it off when stowing the stroller.
All in all for what's available for the City Select (and it's precious little) this is a decent product.
This is the best iced tea I can find for the Keurig.  It has the right amount of lemon and sugar mix.  I can't find it in stores anywhere.  I am happy that Amazon still carries it.

Trust me, I have tried them all. These are the best!
I can't find them at any local supermarket, so well I ordered a full box.
Got to do what you got to do sometimes!

I cannot drink full caffeine, always looking for a quality coffee on sale, this one seemed a good choice. Pleasantly surprised at the wonderful quality, its makes a rich but mild cup of coffee. Coffee is packed in smaller amounts in foil bags so you dont have a 1lb can open for a week or more. Good buy if you can still get it.

Looked all over to find these socks for my granddaughter.  They were supposed to be shipped fairly soon.  Well, weeks later no socks had appeared.  When I tracked the package, they said undeliverable.  That was nonsense, because the other things I had sent to address were deliverable.  Not to be notified till a couple of weeks after Christmas, just was unacceptable.  Would never order from this seller again
I love this cereal! It's good for me and it tastes great, so glad I can enjoy something good for me that will actually help me to lose weight!

I have only used this carrier since my daughter has been big enough to wear on my back, but it is amazing.  She is very comfortable in it, and the weight is distributed so evenly for me that it's like she weighs nothing.  I am 5'0\\" and 105lbs, so carrying a 30lb child on my back while hiking, and even just walking around town, would throw off my balance with other carriers... but not with the Ergo.  I really really love this carrier.  I am about to have a little boy, just ordered the infant insert for my Ergo, and cannot wait to try it as a front carrier.  I will update this eventually :)

I have a Tassimo machine, and its becoming more and more difficult finding the disks in local stores. So pleased I can still order on amazon. :)  This brand of coffee is very good and flavorful, I would recommend.

I bought a 2T-3T for my 16 month old who is currently wearing 18mo clothes at 26 lbs, thinking it would be a little big and he could grown into it.  I also have a 3 year old (37 1/2 in, 31 lbs), wearing 3T.  This is huge for the 3 year old.  I can't say I'd get a smaller size, because I don't know what I'd get, but they can grow into this. Love the fabric and the idea, as we live in Alaska and take the kids to a remote cabin in the woods where it can get kind of chilly.

Our 5 month old baby loves both of these products! The music from the BE Take A Long Tunes are pleasant to listen to and teaches him coordination by pressing the button to start the classical music.  He absolutely loves the Jumper though.  He can go for 45+ minutes just bouncing in there with shouts and giggles of pleasure. (Just make sure you read the directions to make sure your baby is clipped in at the right height to get the right amount of bouncing and don't hurt their little feet or knees).  I highly recommend this product to any new parents who need a break from carrying their baby for a while.

I bought this for my 6.5 month old. But it was too small and did not seem comfortable.  It was hard to adjust the straps.  The buckle latch is too large, wide, and bulky, and it rubbed against the baby's legs.  There was no slack to allow for more room.  I returned the carseat.  The return policy at amazon is nice.  Free return shipping and full refund.
I can't get enough of Happy-Cola.  The 5 pound bag is a great value.  I have ordered it several times from Amazon and it has always arrived quickly and very fresh - the expiration date is a year out.

Just received my first order today. I purchased lots of different styles of this company's products and will review each one as I try them. Well packaged and delivered, 2 packs had lost their vacuum. Was given 2 different samples to try and will review those as well when I taste them. I consider myself somewhat of an unofficial jerky connoisseur, even making my own jerky in the past. I like the meat to shine through the taste, not sugar or salt. A vegetarian I am not!

Tasted my first pepperoni mild short shot today. Upon the first bite I noticed it didn't have squishy fat oozing out of it like I remember these types of beef sticks having years ago when I ate them as a kid. It had a mild pepperoni taste, not hot, not spicy. Was that a slight hint of vinegar behind the nuance of flavor? Had a nice, firm mouth-feel and a slight 'snap' around the edges when bitten into. Wasn't hit with any sweet, and it certainly wasn't over salted. Over-all, I rate this product high on the beef stick scale. These weren't dried out, they were supple. As a treat, I gave my dog a couple inches of it. When his face came up to my hand and his nose hit the beef-stick, his eyes sort of rolled back in his head, Ha! To say the least, he loved it too!

I have put all the packs of beef into my big freezer so they stay fresh and hold their integrity, since I bought over 150.00 worth (free shipping with 125.00 or more, at this time!) I started a low carb diet and these are the perfect snack item to have on hand. The beef is USA grown! I would reorder these mild pepperoni short sticks again.

My wife and I buy organic, and we bought this tea for that reason.  However, we now agree that this is the best tasting iced tea we've ever had!  It's amazing!  We took it to our Thanksgiving dinner at my parents' house, and everyone there thought the same thing.  This tea tastes great!  Nothing better!
This is a very good drink and It tastes like cherries and I love cherries!! :D Also, Its got Rainbow Dash on it, how cool is that?

I got used to the taste of sardines really quickly. The label says smoked flavor, but I barely taste the smoked flavor. Only bad thing about buy sardines to eat is that it leaves the room smelling like fish. My housemates don't appreciate me eating this.

We originally purchased a Graco Snugfit 35 but upgraded to this car seat when the buckles on the Graco started cutting into our baby's thighs (at only 4 months!). You can tell a huge difference in quality between this model and the Graco - the Maxi Cosi padding and fabric are much nicer and the canopy is more generous. The crotch strap is longer and better placed so our baby is much more comfortable. It's also noticeably lighter, and easy to attach to our stroller (UPPAbaby Vista).

Love it and wish we had purchased this from the beginning!

Had for two months now. 9 month old learned how to drink out of these on day two. Grasped this better than the sippy cup idea. Wished they were in 5oz but they work and wash great! I hope I can find a travel version of the same thing so we can cover the straw when we go out.
My daughter loves Dora this is the best production of product that has came out she uses the bowl every day and the silverware.

This unsweetened coconut contains Sulfur Dioxide, a preservative that is not acceptable for me to consume.  I WISH that this was in the product description so I wouldn't be stuck with 66 ounces of coconut crap that is not fit for consumption.  Amazon won't let em return or exchange it, so I get to throw $30 in the trash!  AWESOME!!
I like this sheet. it fits very well and cotton is not bad. for the price, it's a good buy.
Great flavor and they do not get sharp at the end like some suckers do. they dissolve slowly in the bathtub too.

While I liked most of the flavors offered in this sampler, unlike the guaranteed 25 different flavors there we about 3 flavors that I got 2 of so that is why I gave 4 stars instead of 5.  There were some flavors that I had hoped to get in this sampler that were not in the box I got, so I was just a little disappointed at that but all in all it was a good sample pack.

I ordered a med and a large, not sure what size I would need. I ended up keeping both because they are great wet bags- contain the smell and moisture no problem. The medium is the perfect size to send with her in her diaper bag for a full day of diapers. The large has a great snap handle that I have attached to her changing table that can easily hold a few days if you want. All in all, great wet bag!

These mini bears are the perfect size and they have excellent flavor. It is the perfect snack and I love that they are individually wrapped. I have bought this product multiple times. Highly recommended product!
This had a nice apple flavor, but it had a weird aftertaste.  I'm not into energy drinks and this one just proved again why I'm not.

I am a first time Mom and my 5 month old daughter loves this exersaucer!  Keeps her busy for a while and she doesn't seem to get tired of it at all.  She loves that she can stand on her own to play, but also when she gets tired, she can take a rest in the seat.  The activities are great and she loves all the bright lights and colors.  The music is also really nice.  We have also added a few of our own toys as well... the ones that are easy to connect onto things.  So far, we are all very pleased with this exersaucer!  Definitely a great buy!

Perfect training underpants. I have several brands and those are the most effective (although also the most expensive).  Very soft and comfortable. The band around the waist is not too tight, which is a case in some other brands.  Fit as expected (size small is almost too small for my 96th percentile for height and 25th percentile for weight, super skinny 3-year old, the medium size are perfect).  Super cute designs (we have dinos and giraffes).

I have been drinking Choc Full o'Nuts for 40 years, so I already knew that it is a quality Columbian coffee.
I am enjoying it tremendously.

I'm not a ketchup fan but this is a huge step above ketchup and I love it.  It has a little spicy kick to it which I love.  What I don't love is the price of shipping.  It's in a heavy glass bottle, PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE change your packaging to plastic, I can't afford $6 shipping for a bottle of ketchup.  Until then I'll have to love it from a distance :-(.

I was all for it when i first bought this item, until it broke and i started to do my research again to see if this item is worth an exchange. Reading some reviews from other moms who used this "education system" is scary. Their kids becoming deft, which i could see happening since this product is SO LOUD. I even asked my doctor about this product and she told me to not to waste my time and how dangerous it is since it is loud. Reading peoples reviews on here it sounds convincing to buy but understand how their kids were most likely going to be as intelligent as they claim the magical baby plus system did to their kid. I know many parents who never used this and their kids are just fine. To risk your kid becoming deft if your choice but I would rather keep it in gods hands and what ever happens, happens.

I don't like chewing gums with all the fake sweeteners and what negative things those and other harmful ingredients can do. So for me Glee Gum is a good substitute.
I would give it more than 3 stars however, the product's flavor goes away pretty quickly and it does seem to stick to dental work sometimes.
Even with that said, I'll buy it again due to the lack of better products on the market.

Well balanced not a dark roast like most starry espresso blend. But a medium dark Italian style coffe. Rich coffee with dark chocolate notes mellow tannins no grassy or floral notes just well Vance's.

I was supposed to stash this away as a Christmas present for my 7 month old, but I pressed the button to play the music and she heard it....well that was it, she was so interested I went ahead and gave it to her. She loves it. Her hands are a little too tiny to pick it up for longs periods of time, but she'll be able to soon. She rocked back and forth to the music and didn't have any trouble pressing the button over and over. The music is not annoying at all, there is a volume button at the top, but I don't even find the loudest setting irritating in the slightest. I know she'll love this toy for many months to come. Highly recommend it!
Best mixed nuts on the market right now! Not TOO much salt like some mixed nuts BUT just enough to give them a good flavor!
Just love that late night cup of coffee and this hits the spot. Perfect brew, great convieniance and you can;t beat the price. i would recomend this k cup to anyone with a kuerig coffee maker.

Pu-erh tea is a real treat! I love the ritual that goes into enjoying a pit of tea and this is all ritual. You pour boiling water over the Tuo Cha for a few seconds and then carry on how you would normal tea. This Pu-erh is of good quality, had a rich slightly nutty taste. Purists enjoy the tea alone, but I will occasionally mix in warm soy milk and honey.
Looked everywhere for this until I thought to "google" it. Here it was on "old faithful" Amazon! I ordered a surplus as all my friends love to come by for Bloody Mary's! This is my secret ingredient!
This Christmas Cake was very disappointing. It was very dry and crumbly. I would not purchase again. Not at all what I'd expect from Food Ireland.

ordered this and the same day saw it in Walmart on sale. Still didnt cancel my order because of free shipping. The back strap doesnt really holds the seat belt and keeps sliding down from my sons shoulder. Not useful for long distance travels.

Great flavor. It is sweet, but not overwhelming or bitter with other energy drinks. It gave me just enough energy to get me through the day without feeling groggy. I got this product for free thanks to V8 V-fusion + Energy.

The only reason I didn't like them was because I couldn't order the small Flanges and these were supposedly m/l but really it was a adapter for Medium - don't like that because it doesn't give the same effect.
I like the Ameda pump though, the flanges that come with it are perfect but I accidentally broke one so had to buy another.
I still want to find a pink rabbit, but the blue one works ok for now!  Have daughter who cannot do without her rabbie.
I absolutely LOVE my new Moby wrap! It makes life so much easier! I've always wanted one and was super excited to finally get one!
This flavorful high quality rice is an excellent product for the price. The texture and short cooking time were also a plus.  I will order this again!

If I could rate this product a "0" I would. This product design on this item is extremely poor. I am on my second unit (both brand new) and have had the same luck with both. The main problem is that the cds skip constantly -- even when the unit is NOT bumped. The result is far from relaxing. Remember those old diskmen that skipped constantly because they didn't have internal baffling? This is just like that. I even followed the protocol for cleaning unit #2(per the company's instructions) before giving up on it. The cleaning made no difference with the skipping. I'm surprised that this product remains on the market considering it's poor design. I've decided I am getting a regular cd/cassette player jambox to set next to the crib.
I have to say that I read all of the negative reviews first, and ignored them because I wanted this product (or at least the concept of it) so badly. For once, I should've listened to others' advice.
Tastes good. Fresh. Only complain I have is that its slightly sweeter than many dates.
Product was not that great. Tasted a little old and hope you love strawberry because that is pretty much the only flavor you are gonna get.

Have had this for 2 weeks, leaves and stems turned yellowish. Followed directions to a T, other than having to buy a taller vase...the one that came with plant was too short! Ended up throwing the plant away...quite disappointed.

We have a delta porta crib, that is indeed our regular crib. We didn't get a big convertible crib, as just don't have the space right now, and this small size is great for a baby up to 1-2 years. This mattress is a nice snug fit, and thick . Hope it holds up! Plus, a nice price.

Being a first time parent, used diaper odor filling the nursery/house was a big concern for us..but this has been a great life and time saver. Its a simple piece of plastic equipment that will keep your nursery clean and totally odorless..i know one of the main concerns is that refills for this pail are expensive..but searching on the internet showed target up & up brand refills are compatible with these to save you some bucks :-)

Definitely must have for every nursery !!
This item more than met my expectation.  I love the fact that all assembly parts were included.  Look beautiful in the room.

This was a gift for my brother. I can't comment on the cherry flavor, but I've tried the regular flavor and the root beer flavor, and they're both pretty good.

The big draw here was the low cost vs. many other merchants' offers. It was entirely reasonable and featured free shipping, which was great.

The drawback was the slow shipping (everyone else charged an exorbitant amount for shipping vs the free cost here), but as long as you plan ahead, you'll get your shipment in time for a birthday/holiday/LAN party.
Well made and beautiful. My two year old princess never wants to take it off. Thanks for a great product

my product came well ahead of time, my diabetic mother is enjoying her snack candies a lot. she is really happy I  keep finding candies here that are available which they are not available in our grocery stores.  thank you so much for my orders

My favorite crunchy granola bars.  Being a Type II diabetic I need to have 3 snacks a day and these are the most delicious way to keep my sugar even between meals.  The price on Amazon and the huge amounts mean I don't have to make a grocery run to the local market when the store boxes of 6 run out.

This was a reward for her hard work studying. She is excited about collected more stamps so I can buy another one of these products for her. She really enjoyed making the gummy candy and mixing the colors. I'd say it's a bit educational as well.

I've just had kid #4...why did I not buy this earlier?  I really like this player, but I wish the default wasn't hearbeat (if it gets unplugged, when you plug it back in it defaults to heartbeat, I believe). The white noise is all we play, and we really like it. Adjustment of volume is easy, and all is well. The light can be really bright in a dark room, so sometimes I throw something over it. Overall, I'd buy it again and again...

My wife and I have always put fish sauce in our pho and never really thought to add it to anything else.  I did a little research and found this to be the most recommended brand of fish sauce available.  It does not disappoint.  Very good flavor and it's not overly salty like some.  There are two ingredients, fish and salt.  The fish are caught by the company making the sauce and barreled within the day!  I prefer this Vietnamese fish sauce over the Thai sauces that I have tried.  We add it to rice, fish marinades, dips and it goes really well when added to spicy dishes.  Use it for whatever!
Can't wait to make fresh Chicago-style popcorn for the Seahawks games this fall!  Go Seahawks!
Of all the Quinoa I have used this is the best one.  The taste is wonderful and I make it on a regular basic .
Another great product my parents have turned me on to. I love putting this on my tacos, roasted chicken, and always in my scrambled eggs!

Very cute pouchâ€¦I can fit two size 4 diapers, 2 of the Munchkin changing pads and some disposable bibs. However, this pouch is great if you have a large bag, but it doesn't fit in a medium tote or satchel unless you don't carry anything else.
This makes the popcorn at home even better.  Just what was needed for movie theater popcorn.  Such a large box for home use.  I shared it with friends.
The pacifiers I received are nuk pacifiers and worked out fine, but they are not the pacifiers in the photograph.
Very well made...perfect size...very sparkly...will look beautiful on top of the wedding cake...affordable, best price on the internet!

I first ran across this at Wal-Mart.  It was fabulously fragranced and flavored with cinnamon and cloves.  When I was ready to purchase it again, of course Wal-Mart no longer carried it.  I ordered two from Amazon: the fragrance is completely different--unpleasant to me--and so is the flavor.  The ingredient list is the same, so it must be a quality control issue.  I'm sorry I sent one as a Christmas gift.
What can I say...excellent classic product, low sodium and very convenient to use.  Will definitely buy again when it runs out.  Arrived in full separate manufacturers box.

I've a difficult time drinking red raspberry leaf tea in the past. I wanted to try it again during my second pregnancy for uterine health. This time I steeped it in boiling water, added lots of honey, and poured it over ice. It's still not the best tasting tea variety, but this particular brand seems a bit more palletable than some others. As far as it's potency/effectiveness, I suppose I won't know until the baby comes (although realistically I'm not sure I'll even know then).

This price is amazing, too. I kicked myself for paying twice as much at a local health food store. I will definitely be buying my next box here instead.
Item just as described.  Got this with the matching valances.  Looks super cute in her bedroom.  Very happy with this purchase.
This is a great dressing. It is way overpriced on Amazon and we will not order again. You can google this and find several very good recipes that you can make yourself.
Our boss loves these and therefore we have them on board every time he comes. They are awesome to snack on.
The product is in a resealable container so it is perfect for single service use.  Goes with Grilled cheese sandwiches just perfectly!

Prior to ordering these on Amazon, I had purchased a smaller, more expensive, pack of Haribo Gummi Bears from a nearby Target. Upon trying them, I was immediately hooked on the taste, these Gummi Bears having a much more flavorful experience compared to other generic brands. Thus, I came across this 5-pound bag, and based on my previous encounter with the brand, immediately made the purchase. The item arrived in a timely manner and was simply the bag of Gummi Bears, depicted in the stock picture, enclosed in a box. The taste was what I remembered, yet the size of each bear was slightly bigger than the ones I purchased at Target, which I personally have no complaints over. The only problem I had was that the Gummi Bears I received weren't the freshest, being a little hard to chew in contrast to their jelly-like appearance. During the first few days I snacked on these, they caused my jaw to undergo some pain, making it difficult to chew while eating, whether it be these bears or other food. However, due to my stubbornness, I continued to eat these delectable treats and the pain eventually went away.
In conclusion, these Gummi Bears taste great and are a bargain for the price listed here. My only complaint is that they're a little tough to chew. I'm not sure if it's the specific product I received, but this is my general opinion for the time being.

I recieved exactly what the description stated! Excellent condition and packaging. Was disappointed it didn't play on my tv, but knew in advance it wouldn't play in a standard Us DVD player. I watched it in my laptop. Love them!

This summer I was diagnosed with a hiatal hernia. Coffee, Tea and Chocolate would hurt my stomach so I had to go cold turkey and quit.When I read the ingredients on the package I wasn't too convinced it would taste good. Wow, I was wrong. Naturalis Inka has been an answer to my prayer. It is like drinking instant coffee without the caffeine. I missed my morning cup of coffee with flavored creamers and now I can look forward to having it again and a night time cup  also. I found this at my local health food store.  I highly recommend this product for those who can not have caffeine.

This was the first time I ordered this brand. All six cans were rancid. I returned them right away and canceled my subscription. You would think baby food products have a better quality control but I guess some companies do not care.
This is a great potty seat for my twin toddler girls. It's simple, comfortable, and easy to clean.  No messes at all.

I bought this blanket for my grandson's baptism. It came in a matter of days, in perfect condition. The blanket was beautiful and was soft enough for a newborn. This blanket will be a keepsake for generations and I would recommend this for any mother.

The only reason I ordered this was because it said it was in a glass bottle.
It wasn't. Very disappointed about that.

Delivered on time and very cute.
Even nicer than I though just looking at the pictures. So that's why I am happy with my purchase.

This is a good product.  It allows for quick and easy disposal of diapers, wipes, etc. and does not require any special bags.  Unlike other reviewers, I have not had any problems with it getting stuck. It does start to smell when there are poopy diapers in it, but I can't imagine that any product could completely eliminate poopy diaper odor!! If you change the bag regularly, you should not have any problem with odor.

Weak and over priced. I thought this would be highly concentrated from all the great reviews. On person mentioned double the amount used .. i found triple the amount still didn't suffice. 2 stars for a good try. I won't be buying this again. Back to the real thing.

I LOVE this cocoa mix! Got it as a gift from a friend once, and I'm so glad I found it on Amazon. Don't get too hung up on labels, since it doesn't taste like Mexican cocoa, or regular cocoa, but there's something ridiculously tasty about it! I especially recommend trying it as a frozen hot chocolate (recipe on the bag)- the flavors are more intense that way.

P.S. Don't use as much as it suggests on the bag- the flavor gets kind of overpowering that way..
Seems to be good quality, stitching and everything seems to be holding up well after a couple of washes.  Velcro holds throughout the night.

I used a boppy with the first two, and now I'm using My Brest Friend with my 6 week old son. It's much better than the boppy. The boppy never seemed to be in the right place for support. I would end up using several pillows around the boppy to support myself. The back support of My Brest Friend and the adjustable strap make it totally comfortable. As a mom of two preschoolers as well as a newborn, I sometimes have to get up and walk around while he's nursing, and it's great that the pillow stays in place instead of dropping to the floor. It also makes for more comfortable nursing in the hospital (when you have to nurse on a hospital bed) and in the car (when you don't have any other pillows around you).

My only complaints are that the silent release buckle isn't always silent, unless you press it just right -- I guess I haven't learned the trick of it yet. Also, the cover is not as easy to wash and put back on as the boppy. I still sometimes use an extra pillow underneath the side I'm nursing on for extra support, but it's not as needed as it was with the boppy.

Love this tea!  It is delicious.  Discovered it years ago when I was put a clear liquid diet prior to surgery.  A friend shared the contents of her tea chest, and this delightful brew was one of the varieties I tried.  I have been hooked ever since.  For some reason this is no longer available in my local grocery stores, so I am very pleased it is available online.
Does not taste like a good hot chocolate should. Very dilute taste.... I am upset

I have very mixed feelings about this car seat. Some parts of it work well and other things about it are annoying so here's the list:

The Good:
- Price: I think everyone has established this point. For $39 you can't get anything else and honestly, if you're really strapped for money and that is your primary concern my recommendation is to just buy the seat and not read on because for the price it really is good enough and it meets all the safety requirements.
- Durable Cover: I've washed this thing endless times, it's a poly material that seems to wash very well and still look decent. Once it's out of the washer it's also practically dry so just air drying overnight or a quick tumble and you're good to go. Not getting it back on is a different story ... read below under The Bad.
- Size and Weight: It's very lightweight, I think the lightest on the market which makes it easy to transport although it has no place to hold while moving it so it's awkward. As well, it's narrow so I'm fairly confident that you can fit 3 of them in the back of most cars.
- No Clunky/Clear View: Due to lack of cushioning this seat provides ample view for your child to look out the window, perfect for curious toddlers.

The Bad:
- Incompatibility: This seat in the top brands so it's not going to be compatible with a lot of other things so check to see what you really need this for. If it's just going in the car and never moving, then you should be okay. My biggest peeve right now is that I recently found out it's not compatible with the GoGo Baby Travelmate which is a great asset while traveling with your car seat. So even though it's lightweight enough for travel, it doesn't sit with a travelmate so you can wheel it and your baby all around the airport. HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!
- Messy: It seems like there wasn't a lot of thought that went into this car seat. The various clasp systems are in the back. I made the mistake of pulling it out once to try to use them and you can never get them neatly tied up again so you have a bunch of buckles and stuff hanging behind it. This really bothers me. Also makes it hard to travel with when all these things are hanging off of it.
- Poor Base: The base is poorly designed and can really cause some damage to your leather, especially with a heavier child. I bought a mat from Amazon to go under it to protect my seats and still my daughter is 22 lbs and when I take the seat of sometimes I can see that the base has made grooves in my leather.
- Difficult to Clean: Okay, make sure you don't take the cover off for a quick wash. You pretty much have to reassemble the whole seat back together after washing the cover. The simplicity of the latches are cool, I'll give it that, but simplicity doesn't always mean ease.
- No Neck Support: I don't mind the lack of cushioning so I won't put it as a con and my daughter seems okay with that aspect as well, but there's absolutely no neck support here so if she ever falls asleep in it her head is all over the place and she really doesn't look comfy.

So a 3-star rating is very adequate as it really is just OK. I've been putting up with it because I don't want to buy another car seat and then have this sitting on my hands but now that I know it doesn't fit the travelmate I'm forced to buy another car seat making me wonder why I put up with this for so long.an never get them neatly tied up again so you have a bunch of buckles and stuff hanging behind it. This really bothers me. Also makes it hard to travel with when all these things are hanging off of it. - Poor Base: The base is poorly designed and can really cause some damage to your leather, especially with a heavier child. I bought a mat from Amazon to go under it to protect my seats and still my daughter is 22 lbs and when I take the seat of sometimes I can see that the base has made grooves in my leather. - Difficult to Clean: Okay, make sure you don't take the cover off for a quick wash. You pretty much have to reassemble the whole seat back together after washing the cover. The simplicity of the latches are cool, I'll give it that, but simplicity doesn't always mean ease. - No Neck Support: I don't mind the lack of cushioning so I won't put it as a con and my daughter seems okay with that aspect as well, but there's absolutely no neck support here so if she ever falls asleep in it her head is all over the place and she really doesn't look comfy. So a 3-star rating is very adequate as it really is just OK. I've been putting up with it because I don't want to buy another car seat and then have this sitting on my hands but now that I know it doesn't fit the travelmate I'm forced to buy another car seat making me wonder why I put up with this for so long.

I've tried about six brands of protein bars. Most of these were awful. I think the higher protein content is what causes the nasty flavor. However, though there was the presence of that nasty protein taste, it wasn't as strong. The outer coating, as well as the strawberry flavor are two of the good flavors. I actually enjoyed eating it and could have eaten another. I had energy and wasn't hungry for awhile. I had heard that pasta was an energy food. But this protein bar performed better than a couple servings of mac & cheese, which had me hungry an hour or two afterwards. I think I paid $1 for a single bar at a local grocer.

This swing has been a staple of our nighttime ritual for the past five weeks (since little one was a week old), but the past week has seen it die a slow death. At first, it was just the noise (a loud \\"clack-clack\\" as it swung back and forth), but tonight it finally bombed out completely. Not only is the \\"clack-clack\\" so loud I can hear it in another room, but the swing is barely moving at all. Mostly, it's just sitting there grinding out loud noises. Back it goes. I'll have to find a replacement for it QUICKLY! :-(    Here's what I would say about it *if it were working*:    WHAT WE LOVE -     The two position chair - right now we use it in more of a \\"cradle\\" position, but it can be adjusted to a more upright position when he is older.    The two swinging choices (back-to-front or side-to-side). He definitely likes side-to-side more for sleeping.    WHAT WE LIKE -     The music and \\"nature sounds\\" - both are decent. Nothing fancy, but at least it doesn't sound like a tinny music box. I wish there was more of a \\"white noise\\" option - the nature sounds work just okay for white noise - there are some louder nature sounds that punctuate the soundtrack every now and again and can be startling.    The swing is quite vigorous when empty. Once you put a kiddo in it, however, the \\"six swing speeds\\" really produce about the same amount of swinging (full power a little more, minimum power a little less). Not bad, but not as much variety as one might hope. And our kid is only nine pounds right now - I wonder how much less swinging a 18 pound baby might get...    WHAT WE DON'T LIKE -   (apart from it's complete failure within a month or so of set up)    The padding on the chair is a bit thin. I ended up using the fluffy support \\"pillow\\" we had gotten little guy for his car seat in the swing to keep him comfortable. Probably not as much of a problem for bigger babies, but for those under three or four months, it's a little spartan...    The safety straps are really long. Totallyineffective for a little one (though also not important for little ones, given their lack of mobility), but sometimes it's hard to get them out of the way while putting the baby in. Don't want him having to sit with a big plastic buckle jammed in his heiny...    Will probably get a more \\"plush\\" swing the next time around given that we now know how much he loves swings!

The product is great - I like a one teaspoon serving for my drinks and this tablet is much easier than trying to do a half of one of those 2 teaspoon packets. I would give it a 5 star rating except that I would like to shoot the packaging person that came up with the dispenser. It's often difficult to get the tablet out and sometimes the tablets get crushed trying to get them out.

These are okay, but I wasn't crazy about the container.  They seemed to absorb some of the taste of the container, which I found very off-putting.  Also, I wish they'd use real sugar instead of cheap substitutes.  There's really no excuse to use that junk anymore.  I'd gladly pay a few extra cents a serving or whatever for the real thing.  They use substandard ingredients, and it's not as good of a value.  You're paying more for the cup when you can just buy a regular package and separate them into bags yourself for a much more cost-efficient snack.
It is almost impossible to find mixes with Splenda.  This is also delicious.  I will keep ordering.

I love Marmite as an enhancement to soups, stews and gravies. I eat quite a bit of venison and the Marmite adds a depth of flavor that is just wonderful in pot roasts and stews. The fact that it is high in B vitamins is a bonus. I wholeheartedly recommend this product. I have used it for years and will continue to order it regularly. For first time users, beware it's very strong and a small amount goes a long way.
I really liked this soup.  The ingredients are super and the taste is great.  It is a hearty soup and makes a meal for me and I am a big guy 6'2" and 210 pounds.

I picked this up at a local supermarket today after recently watching an advertisement on TV. Man, they got me good. Once you flip the top, it has one of those \\"no mess\\" type nozzles that squirts out only as long as pressure is applied to the bottle. Kinda neato. In terms of the actual taste and flavor, I used 8oz of water and initially, one half-second squirt of Mio Liquid Berry Pomegranate flavoring. I stirred it for a bit, and after much heart-wrenching anticipation, I was...not overly impressed. The initial resembling taste that I could recall would closely mimic that of Propel Water. It has a similar after taste after smacking the lips and tongue a bit.     I found that if you really want it to be flavored water and not water with a hint of flavor, you have to use much longer squirts. I tried a one-second squirt, and my water tasted much better. I could really taste the berry and pomegranate flavoring, but not impressive enough to have a second glass. It advertises 24 servings per bottle, but I can't imagine what little flavor you will be tasting if you really tried to stretch it to 24 servings. In my case, maybe more like 10-12.     My dealbreaker with this is that it provides no nutritional supplementation (i.e., antioxidants, vitamins, electrolytes, etc.), such as Propel, Vitamin Water, etc. So it really does just enhance the flavor of water. Seriously? I never thought water tasted that bad to begin with. But for mutants that have a hard time knocking back their non-flavored daily H20, this might do the trick. It's kind of cool to try out of novelty, and it definitely doesn't taste bad (they also have a plethora of yummy-delicious sounding flavors). But other than that, I can't imagine this being a household item. This is definitely not as cool as the bad boy putting is his pocket carrying with him around, as the commercial depicted. But one day if this does have nutritional supplementation, then watch out, because it's gonna be epic.

I received these blankets for my baby shower and we hardly used them.  My daughter was on the larger side and these blankets were too small to swaddle her in.  We used these mainly to lay her down on for changing.  I have since packed them away.  I highly recommend any of the Koala Baby blankets. We've only been using this for a couple of days but I wanted to share how we feel about this diaper bag back pack. LOVE IT! The quality of the backpack (material & design) is seen and felt from the first moment it was taken out of the the package. The price for these is kinda high as ginger people website sells a large 2lb bag for $10 and it is more than in these small boxes.    But amazon has free US shipping,and no tax...so not sure what is better?    Ginger people also has amazing candied ginger! This swing has worked really well for us. Our lives would be so much harder without it! When we first brought our son home he wasn't immediately crazy about it. At about a month and a half of age is when it became really valuable. Our son is a reluctant napper and we use this swing for at least one of daily naps. If we are going to be busy for a minute and want him safely entertained, he happily watches the mobile (and now at 4 months has started batting at the stars--so cute!). We use the plug-in option. I think buying batteries for this would be very expensive. At least for our uses since sometimes he naps for over an hour in the swing.

I would definitely recommend this swing to other parents. We have had no problems with it, the music is not annoying, and it gets our son to nap! That is priceless to a new parent!

Overall this brand is good but I think it is lacking in \\"spicyness\\" as they don't seem spicy at all. I don't , not like them but I just wish they had more \\"sweet spicy\\" flavor instead of more sweet. The package I got was a bit old I think as it was a bit dry but not inedible. Don't get me wrong, I love jerky but these could be better and maybe fresher. My only real complaint other than it's dryness is it just isn't spicy enough to be called spicy. As I anticipated, the caramels were excellent as always. I was, however, disappointed in the packaging by Going to the Sun Gifts. The red gift box that the three lbs. of sea salt caramels were packed in looked like it had been used and/shipped several times as it was crumpled and torn in several spots and was certainly not appropriate for gift-giving. The free 24bag of assorted caramels was torn with several of the caramels lying loose in the bottom of the packaging box. All of this was despite the packaging box being in remarkably good shape. I can only imagine the items were packed as we found them and the damage was not done during shipping. I doubt I will buy from this vendor again.

We got this for our baby's room, which is about 50-60 ft away from our bedroom, measuring straight through the walls. It works very well, and will even pick up the soft lullaby music we play at bedtime. The greatest part is that there is no white noise or static with this one. When it's quiet in the baby's room, I frequently have to check the monitor to make sure it's still on because there aren't any cracks and pops like with some of the other baby monitors we've used.

We keep both units plugged in all the time, so I can't comment on the battery life. But overall I'd recommend this for a simple, solid baby monitor.

Little Prince noodles do not only provide "seemingly" authentic Seaweed/Ocotopus flavored treats, but it also provides some amount of nutritional value via the kelp & low caloric value of these.

If you can picture maybe eating a piece of seaweed & dipping it in "sweet & sour" sauce from your favorite local chinese food place, that's what I would compare these too.

Would not recommend eating these stoned, via I think the flavor is a lot stronger without being stoned. The "Noodle Seaweed" is a great flavor in my opinion & shows a unique side of Taiwan via the flavor/packaging. Would highly recommend these.

Don't waste money on any other bouncy chair...I bought 2 second hand other chairs that were useless. My twin boys and I survived the first year with the help of these chairs.
I also bought 2 swings which were a waste of money because my boys would only stay in them 5 minutes..

I love black tea, I often drink Earl Grey as my go-to choice.  I'd call myself a fairly 'advanced' tea drinker, and I like some of the other teas that Tao of Tea makes, such as their Black Dragon Oolong.  However, I didn't really like this tea.  I find the rose flavor to be WAY too strong.  I'd prefer something with a hint of rose in a black tea flavor, but this tastes like eating a whole flower out of the garden.  I find myself thinning it out with some English Breakfast tea to make it palatable.

The difference is the peanut butter is very smooth with speckles of Butterfinger crunch within. Surprisingly delicious and for me, better than Butterfinger themselves due to the thicker coating of chocolate embracement. If you enjoy Butterfinger then I can't see how not being impressed by texture, flavor, and modern shape these tasty treats confirm. I don't typically review products, unless I feel it is absolutely worth-while. This stroller has been an awesome investment. We live on a gravel driveway and have a large yard. This stroller handles the bumps and inconsistencies of such terrain without a problem. The option to place the car seat safely onto the stroller is great, especially for not disturbing a sleeping baby after a car ride. It handles great wherever. So whether you are hitting up the mall, walking paths, or just bumming around the yard with your little one, this stroller has it all.

Pros:
Car seat attachment option for little babies. Grows with the child!
Large, rubber tires for a comfy ride on all surfaces.
Cup holders for baby and mom and dad!
Basket below for shopping bags, diaper bag, toys, etc.
Ergonomic handle on car seat.

Cons:
A bit large when folded down. We have to get creative getting it to fit into our one smaller car.

The tuna has a good flavor and has no fishy smell. The difference between this and other canned albacore is that this has tuna oil added to increase the omega-3 content. As tuna already has omega-3 fatty acids in it, I don't know how necessary it is for more to be added.

All I know is this tuna passed the most important test - it tastes really good.

This is the best travel system out there! As for the grocery cart situation, you aren't supposed to be putting ANY carriers in the top of carts due to it being unsafe! (whether it clicks in or not) This stroller is lightweight, has adjustable handles and great storage room under the stroller. The carrier base has levels built in so that you can properly install it into your car! It also has a compartment in the middle that can store things that you may need quickly, and also keep the owners manual safe.

This stroller is SO easy to fold up, with just one hand and foot! I can hold my son in the other hand while I do it-if needed! That was a big selling point on my part-besides the adjustable handles.

I love how you can put the leg rest all the way up, and recline the back all the way down to make this stroller like a carriage so that my baby can go on a \\"stroll\\" around the neighborhood comfy in just the stroller part, instead of having to be in the carrier. And he can easily fall asleep and I feel safe leaving him in it to finish his nap in the house, when we get back.

You definitely MUST at least check this travel system out before deciding on one for yourself. You won't be sorry!

This is a great safety gate. We live on a 55mph road with a nice big driveway, and now I feel a lot safer letting my son ride his bike in the driveway. The retracting feature is brilliant. The gate closes up very neatly when not in use. The poles fit into two PVC pipes that are placed in the ground, which makes the gate easily set up and taken down. It sags a little in the middle, because our driveway is fairly wide, but it gets the job done. Perfect for anyone with kids.

Love them! All the Just Tomatoes products are great and tasty - a wonderful snack and so much better than chips!  Amazon does a great job delivering them to my door quickly and without crushing the products!
